text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Toi - mi pomeduncu - duncu to mpomuli - ki Yesus Kristus . Yesus muli Magau ' Daud , muli Abraham .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Ngkai Abraham rata hi Daud , hanga ' ntu ' a - na Yesus toi - ramo : Abraham mpobubu Ishak , Ishak mpobubu Yakub , Yakub mpobubu Yehuda pai ' ompi ' - ompi ' - na ,

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Yehuda mpobubu Peres pai ' Zerah ( hanga ' tina - ra : Tamar ) , Peres mpobubu Hezron , Hezron mpobubu Ram ,

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Ram mpobubu Aminadab , Aminadab mpobubu Nahason , Nahason mpobubu Salmon ,

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Salmon mpobubu Boas ( hanga ' tina - na : Rahab ) , Boas mpobubu Obed ( hanga ' tina - na : Rut ) , Obed mpobubu Isai ,

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: pai ' Isai mpobubu Magau ' Daud . Daud mpobubu Salomo ( tina - na : balu - na Uria ) ,

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Salomo mpobubu Rehabeam , Rehabeam mpobubu Abia , Abia mpobubu Asa ,

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Asa mpobubu Yosafat , Yosafat mpobubu Yoram , Yoram mpobubu Uzia ,

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Uzia mpobubu Yotam , Yotam mpobubu Ahas , Ahas mpobubu Hizkia ,

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Hizkia mpobubu Manasye , Manasye mpobubu Amon , Amon mpobubu Yosia ,

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Yosia mpobubu Yekhonya pai ' ompi ' - na .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Ngkai karatawani - ra to Yahudi hilou hi Babel rata hi kaputu - na Yesus , hanga ' ntu ' a - na Yesus , toi - ra : Yekhonya mpobubu Sealtiel , Sealtiel mpobubu Zerubabel ,

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Zerubabel mpobubu Abihud , Abihud mpobubu Elyakim , Elyakim mpobubu Azor ,

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Azor mpobubu Zadok , Zadok mpobubu Akhim , Akhim mpobubu Eliud ,

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Eliud mpobubu Eleazar , Eleazar mpobubu Matan , Matan mpobubu Yakub ,

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Yakub mpobubu Yusuf tomane - na Maria .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Jadi ' , ngkai Abraham rata hi Daud , kadea pomeduncu to mpomuli - ki Yesus hampulu ' opo ' lapi . Ngkai Daud rata hi karatawani - ra to Yahudi lou hi Babel , hampulu ' opo ' lapi wo ' o . Pai ' ngkai karatawani - ra to Yahudi lou hi Babel rata hi kaputu - na Kristus , hampulu ' opo ' lapi wo ' o .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Hewa toi tutura kaputu - na Yesus Kristus . Tina - na to rahanga ' Maria mokamae ' hante Yusuf . Aga kako ' ia - ra ncamoko , muu - mule ' motina ' i - imi Maria . Potina ' i - na toe , ngkai baraka ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Yusuf , tauna to mengkoru hi Atura Musa . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' hi rala nono - na : " Kupohu lau - mi pokamae ' - ku hante Maria . " Aga uma - i dota mpaka ' ea ' Maria . Jadi ' , patuju - na bona napohu bongo - wadi , uma mingki ' ra ' incai ntodea .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Bula - na Yusuf mokanono mpopekiri toe , mo ' ompo ' - i . Ompo ' - na toe , mpohilo - i hadua mala ' eka Pue ' to mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Yusuf , muli Magau ' Daud ! Neo ' - ko morara ' mpotobine - i Maria . Apa ' ana ' to napotina ' i - ki toe ria , jadi ' ngkai baraka ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Mo ' ana ' - i mpai ' , hadua ana ' tomane . Ana ' toei mpai ' , kana nuhanga ' - i ` Yesus , ' apa ' Hi ' a mpai ' to mpohore ntodea - na ngkai jeko ' - ra . "

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Hawe ' ea toe majadi ' bona madupa ' - mi napa to na ' uli ' Pue ' hante wiwi nabi - na owi , hewa toi :

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: " Hadua toronaa mpai ' motina ' i , mpo ' ana ' - ki hadua ana ' tomane . Ana ' toei mpai ' rahanga ' Imanuel . " Batua - na : " Alata ' ala mpodohei - ta . "

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Pemata - na Yusuf , natuku ' mpu ' u - mi napa to na ' uli ' - ki mala ' eka Pue ' toe - e we ' i . Napotobine moto - imi Maria .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: Aga ko ' ia - ra hampoturua , duu ' - na Maria mo ' ana ' . Kaputu - na ana ' toei , Yusuf mpohanga ' - i Yesus .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Yesus putu hi ngata Betlehem tana ' Yudea nto ' u poparenta - na Magau ' Herodes . Nto ' u toe , ba hangkuja dua tauna rata hi Yerusalem ngkai ngata to molaa tono ' mata ' eo . Torata toera , tauna to nginca mponaa tanda hi betue ' .

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: Mepekune ' - ra hi pue ' ngata Yerusalem , ra ' uli ' : " Hiapa - idi Ana ' to lako ' putu to jadi ' Magau ' to Yahudi - e ? Hi mata ' eo kihilo betue ' to mpobatuai kaputu - na . Toe pai ' tumai - kai doko ' mpopue ' - i . "

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Magau ' Herodes karia - na ana ' to jadi ' magau ' mpai ' , konce pai ' koro ' - imi , wae wo ' o hawe ' ea tauna hi Yerusalem .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Ngkai ree , kanakio ' - rami hawe ' ea imam pangkeni hante guru - guru agama Yahudi tumai moromu . Kahiruru ' - ra omea - mi , napekune ' - ra : " Hiapa mpu ' u - koiwo kaputua - na Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Alata ' ala owi - e ? "

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Ratompoi ' - i hewa toi : " Hi ngata Betlehem tana ' Yudea . Ki ' inca toe , apa ' ria Lolita Pue ' to na ' uki ' hadua nabi owi - e . Na ' uli ' Pue ' :

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: ` Ngata Betlehem hi tana ' Yehuda , ngata to kedi ' - wadi . Aga nau ' wae , bohe lau - pi mpai ' hanga ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea ngata bohe hi tana ' Yehuda . Apa ' ngkai Betlehem toe mpai ' , mehupa ' hadua Pangkeni to mpokeni ntodea - ku to Israel . ' "

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Herodes lolita toe , nakio ' bongo - ramo to nginca mponaa betue ' toera mpohirua ' - ki bona uma ra ' incai tau ntani ' - na . Napekune ' - ra ba nto ' uma mpu ' u betue ' toe lomo ' - na mehupa ' .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Oti toe , nahubui - ramo hilou hi Betlehem , na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - mokoi hi Betlehem , nipewulihi ' lompe ' kahiapa - na Ana ' tetui . Ane nirua ' - ipi , tumai - mokoi mpo ' uli ' - ka , bona hilou wo ' o - a - kuwo mpopue ' - i . "

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Kahilou - rami . Hi lengko ohea , rahilo wo ' o - mi betue ' to rahilo hi tono ' mata ' eo - e wengi . Uma - pi mowo kagoe ' - ra mpohilo betue ' toe . Betue ' toe mpori ' uluhi - ra duu ' - na mento ' o hintoto po ' ohaa ' Ana ' toei .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Karata - ra , mesua ' - ramo hi rala tomi , mpohilo Ana ' toei hante Maria , tina - na . Mowilingkudu - ramo mpopue ' - i . Oti toe , karabongka - nami pontimamahia rewa - ra , pai ' rajuju - mi pepue ' - ra hi Ana ' toei . Pepue ' - ra toe : bulawa , pai ' anu mohonga to masuli ' oli - na to rahanga ' dupa ' pai ' mur .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Oti toe , Alata ' ala mpololitai - ra hi rala ompo ' - ra , na ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' - pokoi nculii ' hi Herodes ! " Jadi ' ponculia ' - ra toe , uma - rapa ntara hi Yerusalem , meleli ' - ramo ntara hi ohea ntani ' - na .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: Pe ' ongko ' - ra to nginca mponaa betue ' toera , mehupa ' wo ' o - mi mala ' eka Pue ' hi Yusuf hi rala ompo ' - na . Na ' uli ' mala ' eka toei : " Yusuf ! Herodes mpopali ' Ana ' tetui doko ' napatehi . Memata - moko , keni - imi Ana ' tetui hante tina - na , malai - koi hilou hi tana ' Mesir ! Mo ' oha ' - mokoi ulu hi ria duu ' - na ria lolita - ku mpai ' mpo ' uli ' - kokoi . "

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Pemata - nami Yusuf , pai ' hi bengi toe palai - nami mpokeni Maria pai ' Yesus hilou hi Mesir .

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: Mo ' oha ' - ramo hi ria duu ' - na Magau ' Herodes mate . Jadi ' , Yesus rakeni hilou hi tana ' Mesir toe , bona ane rakeni nculii ' - ipi mpai ' , madupa ' - mi Lolita Pue ' to napohowa ' nabi owi to mpo ' uli ' : " Kukio ' Ana ' - ku tumai ngkai Mesir . "

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Kana ' inca - na Herodes karapakawa ' - na to nginca mponaa betue ' toera , uma - pi mowo roe - na . Toe pai ' nahawai ' tantara - na hilou mpopatehi hawe ' ea ana ' tomane hi Betlehem pai ' hi ngata to ntololikia - na , bona ngalai ' ana ' to jadi ' magau ' toei mpai ' rapohipatehii . Na ' inca moto Herodes nto ' uma lomo ' pehupa ' - na betue ' toe , apa ' napekune ' wengi hi to nginca mponaa betue ' toera . Toe pai ' napehubui bona hawe ' ea ana ' tomane hi Betlehem rapatehi , ngkai ana ' lei to lako ' putu duu ' rata hi ana ' to rompae - mi umuru - ra .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Kajadia ' toe mpopadupa ' Lolita Pue ' to napohowa ' nabi Yeremia owi , to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi :

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: " Hi ngata Rama uma mowo pogeo ' pai ' potantangi ' . Rahel mpotantangii ' ana ' - ana ' - na . Uma - i ma ' ala tanta ' ua , apa ' uma - rapa ria . "

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: Bula - ra Yusuf , Maria pai ' Yesus hi Mesir , Magau ' Herodes mate . Oti toe , mehupa ' wo ' o - imi mala ' eka Pue ' hi Yusuf hi rala ompo ' - na .

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: Na ' uli ' mala ' eka toei : " Tauna to doko ' mpopatehi Ana ' tetui , mate - imi . Wae - pi , memata - moko , keni - imi Ana ' tetui ntali tina - na , nculii ' - mokoi hilou hi tana ' Israel . "

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Memata mpu ' u - imi Yusuf mpokeni Ana ' toei hante Maria , nculii ' hi tana ' to Israel .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: Tapi ' na ' epe Yusuf , Arkelaus ana ' Herodes mposampei tuama - na jadi ' magau ' hi tana ' Yudea . Toe pai ' me ' eka ' - i hilou hi ria . Ngkai ree , ria wo ' o - mi petudui ' Pue ' to nahilo Yusuf hi rala ompo ' - na . Toe pai ' hilou - ramo hi tana ' Galilea ,

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: pai ' mo ' oha ' - ra hi ngata to rahanga ' Nazaret . Ngkai toe wo ' o - mi , madupa ' - mi lolita nabi owi to mpolowa Ana ' toei , to mpo ' uli ' : Hi ' a mpai ' rakahangai ' to Nazaret .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: Ba hangkuja kahae - na oti toe , rata - mi Yohanes Topeniu ' hi papada to wao ' hi Yudea , pai ' natepu ' u - mi mpopalele Lolita Pue ' hi ntodea ,

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: na ' uli ' - raka : " Medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , apa ' neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . "

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Yohanes toe - imi to nalowa nabi Yesaya owi . Na ' uli ' Yesaya hewa toi : Ria tauna to mekio ' hi papada to wao ' , na ' uli ' : ` Neo ' rata - imi Pue ' ! Porodo ami ' - miki ohea - na . Nipakalempe ami ' - mi ohea to natara mpai ' . ' "

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Pohea - na Yohanes rababehi ngkai wulu porewua to rahanga ' unta . Salepe ' - na ngkai kuliba . Koni ' - na lari pai ' ue wani .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Wori ' tauna to hilou hi papada to wao ' doko ' mpo ' epe lolita - na . Ria - ra ngkai ngata Yerusalem , pai ' ngkai humalili ' tana ' Yudea , ria wo ' o ngkai ngata - ngata to hampanca ' ua ue Yordan .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Hilou - ra mpangaku ' jeko ' - ra , pai ' naniu ' - ra hi ue Yordan tanda kamedea - ra ngkai jeko ' - ra .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Wori ' wo ' o pangkeni agama Yahudi to rahanga ' to Parisi pai ' to Saduki tumai mpopeniu ' hi Yohanes . Kanahilo - ra rata , na ' uli ' - raka : " He koi ' to bengku ' gau ' - ni ! Napa pai ' tumai mpopeniu ' - koie ? Ba ni ' uli ' - koina , ma ' ala mpai ' nipasalewa roe Alata ' ala to neo ' mporumpa ' - koi !

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Ane bongko medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , babehi - mokoi gau ' to lompe ' .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Pai ' neo ' nipoperaha kamuli - na Abraham - koi , neo ' ni ' uli ' hi rala nono - ni : ` Uma - hawo mpai ' nahuku ' - kai Alata ' ala . ' Tetu - e uma makono ! Bona ni ' inca : muli Abraham bisa napajadi ' Alata ' ala ngkai watu - watu toe lau .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Neo ' rata - mi pehuku ' Alata ' ala ! Pehuku ' - na hewa pati to rodo ami ' - mi hi tawu kaju . Butu ngkaju - na to uma lompe ' wua ' - na , bate ratoki pai ' ratene ' hi rala apu . "

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yohanes : " Aku ' toi mponiu ' - koi hante ue , tanda kamedea - ni ngkai jeko ' - ni . Tapi ' tumai - i mpai ' ngkabokoa ' ngkai aku ' hadua to meliu kuasa - na ngkai aku ' . Bangku ' jadi ' pahawaa ' - na to mpokeni sapatu ' - na , uma - a - kuwo natao . Hi ' a mpai ' to mponiu ' - koi hante Inoha ' Tomoroli ' pai ' hante apu .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Hi ' a ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki tauna to mpowiri ' pae . Nagaa ' pae to mo ' ihi ngkai to lopa ' - na duu ' - na me ' itu ' . Pae to mo ' ihi napuna ' hi rala wilulu , pai ' to lopa ' - na nasuwe hi rala apu to jela ' ncuu duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Yesus tumai ngkai tana ' Galilea rata hi ue Yordan . Rata hi ria , mpopeniu ' wo ' o - i - hawo hi Yohanes .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Tapi ' Yohanes , uma - i daho ' mponiu ' - i , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Kakoo - kono - na , aku ' toi - dile to toto - na mpopeniu ' hi Iko - e , hiaa ' Iko lau - di to tumai hi aku ' ! "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Niu ' - ama - hana . Natao moto tababehi toi , bona tatuku ' hawe ' ea konoa Alata ' ala . " Ngkai ree , naniu ' mpu ' u - imi .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus raniu ' , mencore - imi ngkai rala ue . Tebea ncorobaa - mi langi ' , pai ' nahilo - hawo , Inoha ' Alata ' ala mana ' u tumai hewa danci mangkebodo , hompo hi Hi ' a .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Oti toe , ra ' epe - mi lolita Alata ' ala ngkai langi ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Hi ' a toi - mi ana ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' . Hi ' a - mi to mpakagoe ' nono - ku . "

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Oti toe , Inoha ' Alata ' ala mpopakeni Yesus hilou hi papada to wao ' , bona Magau ' Anudaa ' mposori - i .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Opo ' mpulu ' eo opo ' mpulu ' bengi mopuasa ' - i . Ngkai ree , mo ' oro ' - imi .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Rata Magau ' Topesori mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Ane Ana ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - ko , wae - pi hubui watu toe - ra lau mewali pongkoni ' ! "

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : ` Manusia ' uma tuwu ' ngkai pongkoni ' - wadi . Tuwu ' - ra ngkai kampotuku ' - ra butu mela lolita to napohowa ' Alata ' ala . ' "

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Oti toe , Magau ' Anudaa ' mpopakeni - i hilou hi Yerusalem , ngata to moroli ' , napopokore - i hi lolo wumu Tomi Alata ' ala ,

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ane Ana ' Alata ' ala - ko , mengkanawu ' - ko ngkai rei ! Uma - ko mpai ' moapa - apa , apa ' ria te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' : ` Pue ' Alata ' ala mpohubui mala ' eka - na mpetalawai ' - ko ngkai silaka . Rahorongko - ko bona witi ' - nu uma dungku hi watu . ' "

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Aga ria wo ' o te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Neo ' tasori Pue ' - ta , Pue ' Alata ' ala ! ' "

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Oti toe Magau ' Anudaa ' mpakeni tena Yesus lou hi lolo bulu ' to molangko lia , pai ' napopohiloi - i hawe ' ea kamagaua ' hi dunia ' hante ka ' uaa ' - na .

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: Na ' uli ' - ki : " Hawe ' ea toe lau kuwai ' - koko , ane motingkua ' - ko mpopue ' - a . "

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Hampetompoi ' Yesus : " Palai - ko topesori ! Apa ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : ` Kana mepue ' - ta hi Pue ' - ta , Pue ' Alata ' ala . Muntu ' Hi ' a - wadi to natao tapengkorui . ' "

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Ngkai ree , malai mpu ' u - imi Magau ' Anudaa ' mpalahii Yesus , pai ' oti toe rata - ramo mala ' eka mpomawai - i .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Ko ' ia mahae ngkai ree , Yohanes Topeniu ' rahoko ' pai ' ratarungku ' . Kana ' epe - na Yesus kareba toe , hilou nculii ' - imi hi ngata Nazaret hi tana ' Galilea .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Oti toe , kaliliu - imi ngkai Nazaret hilou mo ' oha ' hi ngata Kapernaum . Kapernaum toe , ngata hi wiwi ' rano Galilea , hi tana ' Zebulon pai ' Naftali .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Yesus mo ' oha ' hi ree , alaa - na madupa ' - mi lolita to napohowa ' nabi Yesaya owi , hewa toi moni - na :

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: " Ane tana ' - ra to Zebulon pai ' to Naftali , tana ' to mohu ' hi rano Galilea , pai ' tana ' to hi dipo ue Yordan . Tana ' toe rapo ' ohai ' wori ' tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi .

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: Ri ' ulu , tauna toera hi rala kabengia - na , pai ' me ' eka ' - ra mpoka ' eka ' kamatea . Aga wae lau , mpohilo - ramo - rawo baja to bohe , apa ' mehupa ' - mi eo to mehini mpohinii - ra . "

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Ntepu ' u ngkai ree , Yesus mpoparata Lolita Pue ' , na ' uli ' : " Medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , apa ' neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . "

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Bula - na Yesus momako ' hi wiwi ' rano Galilea , mpohilo - i rodua to ntali ompi ' , hanga ' - ra Simon ( to rahanga ' wo ' o Petrus ) hante Andreas ompi ' - na . Nto ' u toe , bula - ra mebau ' hi rano mojala ' , apa ' toe - mi - rawo bago - ra .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Mai - mokoi ntuku ' - a ! Uma - pokoi mebau ' mpali ' uru . Ngkai wae lau kuwai ' - koi pobago mpotudui ' tauna mepangala ' hi Aku ' . "

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Karapalahii - nami jala ' - ra , pai ' ntepu ' u eo toe mpotuku ' Yesus - ramo .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpokaliliu pomako ' - na , nahilo wo ' o - mi rodua to ntali ompi ' : Yakobus pai ' Yohanes , ana ' - na Zebedeus . Hira ' toe , bula - ra mpokolompehii jala ' - ra hi rala sakaya hante tuama - ra . Yesus mpokio ' - ra jadi ' topetuku ' - na .

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: Karapalahii - na wo ' o - mi - rawo sakaya - ra pai ' tuama - ra , mpotuku ' Yesus wo ' o - ramo - rawo .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Yesus modao ' hobo ' hi tana ' Galilea pai ' - i metudui ' hi rala tomi posampayaa . Mpoparata - i Kareba Lompe ' , na ' uli ' : " Neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . " Yesus mpaka ' uri ' wo ' o hawe ' ea tauna to peda ' pai ' to keru .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Pobago - na Yesus toe tetolele hi hawe ' ea ngata hi propinsi Siria , alaa - na wori ' tauna tumai doko ' mpohirua ' - ki . Mpokeni - ra hawe ' ea doo - ra to mpotodohaka to wori ' nyala haki ' - ra pai ' kasusaa ' - ra , ba to nahawi ' seta , ba to limpuangaa ba to pungku . Napaka ' uri ' - ra omea .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Nto ' u toe , wori ' lia tauna to mpotuku ' Yesus . Ria - ra to ngkai tana ' Galilea , ngkai Dekapolis , ngkai Yerusalem , ngkai tana ' Yudea , pai ' ria wo ' o - ra ngkai dipo ue Yordan .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Kanahilo - na Yesus tauna to wori ' toera , manake ' - imi hilou hi bulu ' - na , pai ' - i mohura . Rata - ramo topetuku ' - na mpomohui ' - i .

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: Natudui ' - ra , na ' uli ' - raka :

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: " Marasi ' tauna to mpo ' inca kampe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra hi poncilo Alata ' ala , apa ' hira ' toe - mi mpai ' to jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala , pai ' Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' - ra .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: Marasi ' tauna to susa ' nono - ra , apa ' Alata ' ala moto mpai ' mpotanta ' u - ra .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Marasi ' tauna to dingki ' nono - ra , apa ' hira ' mpai ' to mporata napa to najanci Alata ' ala .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: Marasi ' tauna to doko ' lia jadi ' monoa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala , apa ' Alata ' ala moto mpai ' to mpowai ' - ra napa to rapali ' toe .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: Marasi ' tauna to ma ' ahi ' hi doo - ra , apa ' Alata ' ala wo ' o mpai ' mpoka ' ahi ' - ra .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: Marasi ' tauna to moroli ' nono - ra , apa ' hira ' mpai ' to mpohilo Alata ' ala .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: Marasi ' tauna to mpopohintuwu ' doo , apa ' hira ' - mi mpai ' to rahanga ' ana ' Alata ' ala .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Marasi ' tauna to rabalinai ' sabana mpobabehi - ra konoa Alata ' ala , apa ' hira ' toe - mi mpai ' to jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala , pai ' Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' - ra .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: " Marasi ' - koi ane raruge ' - koi tauna , rabalinai ' pai ' rabalihi - koi hante wori ' nyala lolita pebalihi sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Nabi - nabi to owi , rabalinai ' wo ' o - ra - rawo hewa toe . Jadi ' , pakagoe ' - mi nono - ni , apa ' bohe mpai ' rasi ' to nirata hi rala suruga .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: " Koi ' to mpotuku ' - a ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki poi ' , to mpokeni kalompea ' hi manusia ' . Aga ane uma - di nituku ' tudui ' - kue , koi ' hewa poi ' to mononto , uma - pi bisa rapomopoi ' nculii ' , pai ' uma - pi ria kalaua - na , alaa - na ratadi - mi pai ' rapolisaa .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: " Koi ' to mpotuku ' - a , hewa baja to mpobajahi hawe ' ea tauna . Ngata to rawangu hi lolo bulu ' uma kalerua .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Pai ' uma ria tauna to mposuwe palita pai ' napopoi ' hante kura . Bate natu ' u hi pontu ' ua - na bona hini - na rahilo hawe ' ea tauna to hi rala tomi .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Wae wo ' o baja to hi rala nono - ni neo ' niwuni . Kana lompe ' kehi - ni , bona hawe ' ea tauna mpohilo , alaa - ra mpo ' une ' Tuama - ni to hi rala suruga .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: " Neo ' nipekiri katumai - ku tohe ' i - e , ba tumai mpokero Atura Pue ' to na ' uki ' Musa hante tudui ' nabi - nabi owi . Uma - a tumai mpokero . Katumai - ku toi - le , bona mpopadupa ' napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura toe .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Mpu ' u - mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : butu mela lolita to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Atura Pue ' bate kana madupa ' . Ane da rii - ria - pidi langi ' pai ' dunia ' toi , uma ria hamelaa lolita hi rala Atura Pue ' to uma madupa ' , nau ' to kedi ' lia .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi , hema - hema to mpotiboki nau ' hanyala - wadi parenta to hi rala Atura Pue ' , nau ' parenta to kedi ' lia , pai ' mpotudui ' tau ntani ' - na mpobabehi hewa toe wo ' o , tau tetui mpai ' to kedi ' lia katuwu ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea ntodea - na Alata ' ala . Aga hema to mpotuku ' hawe ' ea parenta to hi rala Atura Pue ' pai ' mpotudui ' tau ntani ' - na mpobabehi hewa toe wo ' o , tau tetui to bohe lia katuwu ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea ntodea Alata ' ala .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Jadi ' , ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ane uma - koi jadi ' monoa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala , bate uma - koi jadi ' ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Pai ' kamonoa ' - ni tetu kana meliu ngkai kamonoa ' - ra guru agama pai ' to Parisi .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: " Ni ' inca moto parenta to ra ' uli ' - raka ntu ' a - ta owi to mpo ' uli ' : ` Neo ' mepatehi , pai ' hema to mepatehi kana rapohurai kara - kara - na pai ' rahuku ' . '

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: Aga Aku ' mpo ' uli ' : hema to mpokaroe doo - na , bate rapohurai mpai ' kara - kara - na . Hema to mpotipo ' doo - na , bate - na rakeni hi topohura bohe . Pai ' hema to mpakiwojo doo - na , masipato ' lia - i ratadi hi rala apu naraka .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: " Jadi ' , ane rapa ' - na mesua ' - ta hi Tomi Alata ' ala doko ' mpokeni pepue ' - ta , pai ' muu - mule ' takiwoi karia - na doo - ta to peda ' nono - na hi kita ' ,

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: bahaka - mi ulu pepue ' - ta hi nyanyoa meja ' pontunua pepue ' , nculii ' - tamo ulu momekalompei ' . Oti toe - di , pai ' lako ' nculii ' - ta hilou mpotonu pepue ' - ta hi Alata ' ala .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: " Wae wo ' o , ane ria to doko ' mpakilu - ta hi topohura , pari - pari mpali ' kahintuwuaa ' nto ' u - ta hi lengko ohea - pidi hilou hi topohura . Apa ' ane uma ria kahintuwuaa ' - ta , bate nabua ' - ta mpai ' hi topohura , pai ' topohura mpotonu - ta hi polisi , pai ' polisi mpopesua ' - ta hi rala tarungku ' .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Mpu ' u - mpu ' u ku ' uli ' : uma - tapa tebahaka ngkai rala tarungku ' ane da koo - ko ' ia oti tabayari waya ' - ta .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: " Ni ' inca moto karia - na parenta owi to mpo ' uli ' : ` Neo ' mobualo ' . '

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: Aga Aku ' mpo ' uli ' : hema to mponaa tobine pai ' ria nono - na mpokahina - i , mobualo ' - imi hi rala nono - na .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Jadi ' , ane rapa ' - na mata ka ' ana - ta to mpakeni - ta mojeko ' , jungki ' lau - imi pai ' petadi . Agina lau - pi moronto mata - ta hamali , ngkai hawe ' ea woto - ta ratadi hi rala naraka .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na pale ka ' ana - ta mpakeni - ta mojeko ' , pua ' pai ' petadi . Agina lau - pi moronto pale - ta hamali , ngkai hawe ' ea woto - ta ratadi hi rala naraka .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: " Ria wo ' o lolita owi to mpo ' uli ' : Ane ria tomane to mpogaa ' - ki tobine - na , kana nawai ' - i sura pogaa ' .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: Aga Aku ' mpo ' uli ' : hema to mpobahaka tobine - na , bo tobine - na toe uma - hawo mogau ' sala ' , mojeko ' - i , apa ' hi ' a to mebahaka toei mpakeni tobine - na mobualo ' , ane motomanei nculii ' - i . Pai ' tomane to mpotobine kabulisa doo , mobualo ' wo ' o - imi - hawo .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: " Ni ' inca wo ' o karia - na parenta to ra ' uli ' - raka ntu ' a - ta owi to mpo ' uli ' : ` Neo ' mo ' ungkere ' ngkai pojanci - nu ba posumpa - nu . Napa to nujanci - mi hi nyanyoa Alata ' ala , bate kana nubabehi . '

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: Aga Aku ' mpo ' uli ' : neo ' lau - ta mosumpa . Ane mpobabehi - ta janci , neo ' mosumpa mpokahangai ' langi ' ba dunia ' . Apa ' langi ' pohuraa Alata ' ala , pai ' dunia ' pentodua - na . Neo ' mosumpa mpokahangai ' ngata Yerusalem , apa ' toe ngata Alata ' ala , Magau ' to bohe .

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Neo ' wo ' o mosumpa mpokahangai ' woo ' - ta , apa ' uma tapakulei ' mpakabula ba mpomo ' eta wuluwoo ' - ta , nau ' ba hangkaho - wadi .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Ane patuju - ta mpo ' uli ' io ' , uli ' - mi ` Io ' . ' Ane patuju - ta mpo ' uli ' uma , uli ' wo ' o ` Uma . ' Uma - hana lompe ' ane taperohoi lolita - ta hante mosumpa , apa ' kehi to hewa toe mehupa ' ngkai Magau ' Anudaa ' .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: " Ni ' inca moto parenta owi to mpo ' uli ' : ` Ane ria to motuda ' pai ' to hadua mpojungki ' mata doo ba mpowuka ngihi ' doo , jungki ' wo ' o - ki - hawo mata - na , pai ' wuka wo ' o - ki - hawo ngihi ' - na . '

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: Aga Aku ' mpo ' uli ' : neo ' tapehawai doo to mpobabehi to dada ' a hi kita ' . Ane rapa ' - na ria to mpohopo ' kulimpi - ta hamali , tonu wo ' o - ki to hamali .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Ane ria to mpakilu - ta hi topohura pai ' mperapi ' - i baju - ta , wai ' lau wo ' o - i abe ' - ta .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Ane hadua tantara mpewuku - ta mpokolo - ki kenia - na nte hakilo kalaa - na , kolo lau - miki kenia - na nte rokilo kalaa - na .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Ane ria to mperapii ' - ta ba napa - napa , wai ' - i - hawo . Pai ' neo ' takabosii ' doo to doko ' mpeboloi - ta ba napa - napa .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: " Ni ' inca wo ' o tudui ' to mpo ' uli ' : ` Poka ' ahi ' hingka doo - nu , pokahuku ' bali ' - nu . '

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: Aga Aku ' mpo ' uli ' : kana tapoka ' ahi ' bali ' - ta , pai ' taposampayai - ra to mpobalinai ' - ta .

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Apa ' ane lompe ' nono - ta hi bali ' - ta , tatuku ' - mi po ' ingku Alata ' ala , Tuama - ta to hi rala suruga . Apa ' lompe ' nono - na Alata ' ala hi hawe ' ea tauna : napopehupa ' eo hi tauna to lompe ' pai ' hi tauna to dada ' a , napopana ' u uda hi tauna to monoa ' pai ' hi tauna to bengku ' nono - ra .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Ane tapoka ' ahi ' muntu ' tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' - ta - wadi , uma mpai ' nahiwili - taka Alata ' ala kehi - ta toe . Bangku ' topesingara ' paja ' to dada ' a gau ' - ra , mpoka ' ahi ' moto - ra - rawo tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' - ra .

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Ane lompe ' nono - ta muntu ' hi ema ' - ta - wadi , napa pelabia - na kehi - ta toe - e ? Bangku ' tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala , bate toe wo ' o - rawo po ' ingku - ra .

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Kita ' kana lompe ' po ' ingku - ta hante uma ria ruke - ruke - na , hewa po ' ingku - na Alata ' ala Tuama - ta to hi rala suruga .

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: " Pelompehi - e ' , neo ' - ta mpobabehi ada agama hi mata ntodea bona rahilo doo - wadi . Ane hewa toe gau ' - ta , uma - ta mpai ' nagane ' Alata ' ala , Tuama - ta to hi rala suruga .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Jadi ' , ane mewai ' - ta doi hi tauna to kabu , neo ' - hawo ntora ra ' uli ' hilau , hewa kabiasaa - ra tauna to lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi . Hira ' toe mpopehilo kalompe ' nono - ra hi rala tomi posampayaa ba hi karajaa bona ra ' une ' doo . Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : uma mpai ' ria napa - napa to rarata ngkai Alata ' ala , apa ' mpolia ' rarata - mi - rana pe ' une ' doo .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: Jadi ' ane kita ' mewai ' , agina tatonu bongo pewai ' - ta , neo ' ra ' uli ' hilau .

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: Agina tatonu pewai ' - ta tetu , hante uma ria to mpo ' incai . Tuama - ta to hi rala suruga - wadi to mpo ' inca . Nahilo kehi - ta to uma ra ' incai doo , pai ' nahiwili - taka mpai ' .

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: " Ane mosampaya , neo ' - ta hewa tauna to lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi . Konoa - ra , mosampaya ngkokore hi rala tomi posampayaa ba hi porompengaa ohea bona rahilo doo . Jadi ' , apa ' mpolia ' rarata - mi - rana pe ' une ' doo , mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : uma - rapa mpai ' mporata napa - napa ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: Jadi ' , ane mosampaya - ta , mesua ' hi rala tomi , unca wobo ' , pai ' - ta lako ' mosampaya - di hi Tuama - ta to uma kahiloa . Apa ' nahilo moto - di kehi - ta to uma ra ' incai doo , pai ' nahiwili - taka mpai ' .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: " Ane mosampaya , neo ' ntora rahuu - hulii ' hante uma ria pekiri , hewa tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala . Ra ' uli ' - rana , ane moloe pololita - ra , madupa ' mpai ' posampaya - ra .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Neo ' mpenau ' kehi - ra toe ! Na ' inca ami ' - mi Tuama - ta to hi rala suruga napa to taparaluu kako ' ia - na taperapi ' .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: Jadi ' , mosampaya hewa toi : Tuama - kai to hi rala suruga , Pomperapia ' - kai , bona hawe ' ea tauna mpobila ' hanga ' - nu to moroli ' ,

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: bona Iko jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , bona hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' mpobabehi konoa - nu , hibalia hante ihi ' suruga .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Wai ' - kai pongkoni ' to kiparaluu eo toe lau .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Ampungi sala ' - kai , hewa kai ' wo ' o mpo ' ampungi sala ' doo hi kai ' .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Neo ' - kai nupelele ' rasori , bahaka - kai ngkai kuasa anudaa ' . ( ( Apa ' Iko - mi Magau ' to mokuasa pai ' to bohe tuwu ' - nu , duu ' kahae - hae - na . Amin . ) )

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: " Ane ta ' ampungi doo - ta to masala ' hi kita ' , Tuama - ta to hi rala suruga wo ' o mpo ' ampungi sala ' - ta .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: Aga ane uma ta ' ampungi doo to masala ' hi kita ' , wae wo ' o Tuama - ta to hi rala suruga , uma - ta na ' ampungi .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: " Ane mopuasa ' , neo ' mengkamonto ' hewa tauna to lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi . Ane mopuasa ' - ra , mengkamonto ' - ra pai ' tungkai ' uma - ra monoku ba mokarabii , bona rahilo doo kamopuasa ' - ra . Kiwoi - e ' : apa ' mpolia ' rarata - mi - rana pe ' une ' doo , uma - rapa mpai ' mporata napa - napa ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: Jadi ' , ane mopuasa ' - ta , monoku pai ' mokarabii - ta ,

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: bona neo ' ra ' incai doo kamopuasa ' - ta . Muntu ' Tuama - ta to hi rala suruga to uma kahiloa , Hi ' a - wadi to mpo ' inca kamopuasa ' - ta . Nahilo moto kehi - ta to uma ra ' incai doo , pai ' nahiwili - taka mpai ' .

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: " Neo ' mporumpu rewa hi dunia ' . Apa ' rewa hi dunia ' ma ' ala naserohi anutuwu ' ba jadi ' ta ' igaraa ' . Pontimamahia rewa - ta ma ' ala rabongka pai ' rewa - ta rapanako .

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: Kana mporumpu - ta rewa hi rala suruga . Rewa - ta hi rala suruga toe , uma mpai ' moronto , apa ' uma - hana ria to meta ' igaraai ' hi ria , pai ' uma ria anutuwu ' to mposerohi , pai ' uma ria to mpanako .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Apa ' hiapa pontimamahia rewa - ta , hi retu wo ' o nono - ta .

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: " Mata - ta ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki hulu ' . Ane lompe ' mata - ta , monoto pehilo - ta .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: Aga ane mogawu mata - ta , hewa mobengi pehilo - ta . Jadi ' , ane Pue ' mpobajahi nono - ta pai ' tapomobengi nculii ' , uma mowo kamobengi riki - na .

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: " Uma - hawo ria hadua tauna to mobago hi rodua tua . Apa ' hadua mpai ' nape ' ahi ' , hadua napokahuku ' . Hadua natuku ' - ki hawa ' - na , hadua nasapuaka . Wae wo ' o kita ' , uma - ta bisa mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala , pai ' hamali - ta ntora mporumpu rewa dunia ' .

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: " Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : neo ' - koi me ' eka ' ba mpo ' uli ' : ` Napa - le ' to takoni ' - e pai ' to ta ' inu - e ? ' Neo ' - koi me ' eka ' ba mpo ' uli ' : ` Napa - le ' to tapohea - e ? ' Apa ' tuwu ' - ni meliu ngkai pongkoni ' pai ' pohea .

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Penonoi - dile danci to ngkalimoko hilou tumai - e . Uma - ra molia ' , uma - ra mepae , uma ria wilulu - ra . Aga nau ' wae , Tuama - ni to hi rala suruga mpowai ' moto - ra pongkoni ' . Hiaa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala , koi ' meliu katuwu ' - ni ngkai katuwu ' danci , pai ' meliu pompewili ' - na hi koi ' ngkai pompewili ' - na danci .

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: Napa - mi kalaua - na wori ' rahi pekiri - ni pai ' kakoroa ' - ni . Apa ' nau ' sese ' ncuu - ta mpopekiri wori ' nyala , uma - ta bisa mpodonihii umuru - ta nau ' kampa ' hamengi .

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: " Napa pai ' sese ' rahi - koi mpopekiri pohea - ni ? Penonoi - dile katuwu ' wunga hi papada - e . Uma - ra mobago , uma - ra mpobabehi pohea - ra .

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Aga ku ' uli ' - kokoi : bangku ' Magau ' Salomo - hawoe ' hante hawe ' ea ka ' uaa ' - na , pohea - na uma hewa kancola - na wunga toera lau .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Jadi ' , ane Alata ' ala mpakancola kowo ' to hi papada toera lau - - to ria hi eo toe lau , pai ' rasuwe mepulo - - peliu - liu - nami koi ' ! Meliu pompewili ' - na hi koi ' . Jadi ' , napa - di pai ' uma nipangala ' pompewili ' - nae ?

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: " Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : neo ' - koi me ' eka ' ba mpo ' uli ' : ` Napa - le ' to takoni ' pai ' to ta ' inu - e ? Napa - le ' to tapohea - e ? '

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Hawe ' ea tetu lau to ntora rapenonoi tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala . Koi ' , neo ' - pi nipoka ' eka ' tetu lau , apa ' Tuama - ni to hi rala suruga mpo ' inca kaniparaluu - na hawe ' ea tetu lau .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: To kana tapenonoi , toi : babehi napa to monoa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala , bona Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ta . Ane toe - pi to tapopori ' ulu , to ntani ' - ntani ' - na nawai ' moto - ta mpai ' omea .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Jadi ' , neo ' - ta sese ' mpopekiri napa to jadi ' eo mepulo . Eo toe lau hono ' - mi - hawo kasusaa ' - na , neo ' - pi radonihii tena mpekiri to jadi ' hi eo mepulo .

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: " Neo ' - ta mposalai ' doo , bona uma wo ' o - ta mpai ' nasalai ' Alata ' ala .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Apa ' pohuka ' to tapake ' hi doo , tetu wo ' o - hawo mpai ' to rapopohuka ' - taka . Batua - na , ane liu rahi - ta mposalai ' doo , hewa toe wo ' o mpai ' Alata ' ala mpobotuhi kara - kara - ta .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: " Napa pai ' mponaa - ta gege ' hi mata doo , hiaa ' wince ' kaju to hi mata - ta moto uma ta ' incai karia - na !

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: Beiwa - ta ma ' ala mpo ' uli ' - ki doo : ` Mai kulali gege ' - nu , ' bo ria moto wo ' o - di wince ' kaju hi mata - ta .

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Neo ' mpetolompei ' kehi ! Kana talali ulu wince ' to hi mata - ta , bona monoto mata - ta mpolali gege ' doo .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: " Anu to moroli ' neo ' rawai ' - ki dike ' , nee - neo ' mpai ' tumai nahoko ' lau - ta - wadi . Anu to masuli ' oli - na neo ' rarora - ki wawu , apa ' na ' ihe ' mara - wadi - hana .

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: " Perapi ' - mi hi Alata ' ala , nawai ' moto - ta mpai ' . Pali ' kaparaluua - ta hi Alata ' ala , tarata moto mpai ' . Neo ' tabahakai mpopebea wobo ' , Alata ' ala mpobea moto - taka mpai ' wobo ' - na .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Apa ' hema to merapi ' bate rawai ' . Hema to mpali ' bate mporata . Hema to mpopebea wobo ' , bate rabea - ki wobo ' .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: " Ha ria - koi to mpowai ' watu hi ana ' - ni ane ana ' - ni mperapi ' koni ' - e ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: Ba mpowai ' - i ule ane mperapi ' - i bau ' - e ? Uma - hawo .

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Nau ' hewa apa - mi kadada ' a - nie , ni ' inca moto mpowai ' to lompe ' hi ana ' - ni . Peliu - liu - nami Tuama - ni to hi rala suruga ! Na ' inca lia mpewai ' to lompe ' hi tauna to merapi ' hi Hi ' a .

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: " Hawe ' ea po ' ingku to tapokono rababehi doo hi kita ' , toe wo ' o to kana tababehi hi doo . Toe - mile tudui ' Atura Pue ' pai ' tudui ' nabi - nabi - e .

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: " Mesua ' - koi ntara wobo ' to jopi ' , apa ' mowela ' wobo ' pai ' ohea to mpotoa ' naraka , pai ' wori ' wo ' o tauna to ntara hi ohea toe .

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: Tapi ' kedi ' wobo ' pai ' jopi ' ohea to mpotoa ' katuwua ' to lompe ' , hangkedi ' lia - wadi tauna to mpotara .

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: " Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi , apa ' ria tauna to mpo ' uli ' , nabi - ra . Ntaa ' boa ' - radi . Hiloa - ra hewa tauna to mepangala ' hi Alata ' ala . Tapi ' patuju - ra doko ' mpokero pepangala ' doo - wadi .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Ta ' inca pebagiu - ra ane tanaa wua ' pobago - ra . Wua ' anggur uma rahopu ' ngkai walaa to morui . Wua ' ara uma rahopu ' ngkai jilata .

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Kaju to morudu ' , wua ' - na lompe ' . Kaju to kee ' , uma wo ' o lompe ' wua ' - na .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Uma ria kaju to lompe ' mowua ' dada ' a , pai ' uma ria kaju to dada ' a mowua ' to lompe ' .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Kaju to uma mowua ' lompe ' , bate ratoki pai ' raropu . Wae wo ' o Alata ' ala bate mpohuku ' nabi to boa ' toera . Ta ' inca kaboa ' - ra ane tanaa wua ' pobago - ra .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: " Wori ' tauna to mpokio ' - a ` Pue ' ! Pue ' ! ' aga uma hawe ' ea - ra to jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Muntu ' tauna to mpobabehi konoa Tuama - ku - wadi to jadi ' ntodea - na .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Hi Eo Kiama mpai ' , wori ' tauna mpo ' uli ' - ka : ` Pue ' ! Pue ' ! Ha uma nu ' incai , kai ' - mi to mpoparata Lolita Alata ' ala hi rala hanga ' - nue ? Hi rala hanga ' - nu kipopalai seta . Pai ' wori ' wo ' o tanda mekoncehi kibabehi hante hanga ' - nu Pue ' . '

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: " Kutompoi ' - ra mpai ' : ` Uma - kuna ku ' incai - koi ! Palai - koi ngkai rei , koi ' to dada ' a po ' ingku - ni . '

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: " Hema to mpo ' epe lolita - ku toi pai ' natuku ' , tauna toei hewa tauna to pante mpowangu tomi - na hi lolo parawatu to moroho .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Karata - na uda , mowo ' ue , pai ' ngolu ' mporumpa ' tomi toe , tapi ' uma - i modungka , apa ' rawangu hi lolo watu to moroho .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: " Aga tauna to mpo ' epe lolita - ku toi pai ' uma natuku ' , tauna toei hewa to wojo to mpowangu tomi - na hi lolo wo ' one .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Karata - na uda , mowo ' ue , pai ' ngolu ' mporumpa ' tomi toe , kamodungka - nami , mokero hangkani . "

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Kahudu - na Yesus mpololita hawe ' ea toe , rapokakonce tauna to mpo ' epe tudui ' - na .

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Apa ' uma - i metudui ' hewa guru - guru agama . Petudui ' - na , hewa tauna to mokuasa mpu ' u .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Kamana ' u - na Yesus ngkai lolo bulu ' , wori ' tauna to mpotuku ' - i .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Nto ' u toe , ria hadua tauna to mohaki ' poko ' tumai motingkua ' hi nyanyoa Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , ane ma ' ala , paka ' uri ' - a - kuwo ! "

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Yesus mpojama - i , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ma ' ala moto . Kupaka ' uri ' - moko ! " Hampinisi mata mo ' uri ' - imi , uma - pi ria haki ' - na .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Neo ' nulolita hi hema - hema napa to jadi ' tohe ' i - e . Hilou - moko ulu mpopehuwu woto - nu hi imam bona nahilo kamo ' uri ' - numi , pai ' keni pepue ' - nu hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Musa , bona monoa ' hi hawe ' ea tauna kamo ' uri ' - nu mpu ' u - mi . "

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Pesua ' - na Yesus hi ngata Kapernaum , rata hadua tadulako tantara to Roma mpohirua ' - ki pai ' mpopetulungi ,

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: na ' uli ' : " Tuama , batua - ku peda ' lia - i ria hi tomi . Ntora turu - i - wadi , pai ' ntora ntodohaka - i . "

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Tilou moto - a mpaka ' uri ' - i . "

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Natompoi ' tadulako tantara toei : " Tuama , aku ' toi - le , bela - a to Yahudi , uma - a - kuna natao nupencuai ' . Nau ' hamela - wadi lolita nu ' uli ' , mo ' uri ' - i mpai ' batua - ku .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Apa ' aku ' toi - e , pahawaa ' wo ' o - a - wadi - kuwo , pai ' ria wo ' o - ra - kuwo to kuhawai ' . Ane rapa ' - na ria hawa ' - ku hi hadua tantara mpo ' uli ' - ki : ` Hilou - ko ! ' bate hilou - i . Ane mekio ' - a hi tantara kahadua - na ` Mai - ko ! ' bate tumai - i . Ane ku ' uli ' - raka batua - ku : ` Babehi toe ! ' bate rababehi . Wae wo ' o Iko Tuama , uma - ko mingki ' hilou hi tomi - ku . Lolita - nu - wadi nu ' uli ' hi rehe ' i , bate madupa ' mpai ' hi tomi - ku ria . "

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Konce - i Yesus mpo ' epe lolita tadulako tantara toei . Toe pai ' me ' ili ' - i hi tauna to mpotuku ' - i , na ' uli ' - raka : " Uma mowo pepangala ' - na tau tohe ' ii ! Nau ' hi to Yahudi muli Israel , ko ' ia ria haduaa kurata to bohe pepangala ' - na , hewa tau toii .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca : hi eo mpeno ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' , wori ' tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi to jadi ' ntodea - na . Tumai - ra ngkai tono ' mata ' eo pai ' ngkai kasoloa , mohura goe ' - goe ' - ra hangkaa - ngkania hante Abraham , Ishak pai ' Yakub , ntu ' a to Yahudi owi .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Kakoo - kono - na , ke to Yahudi - hana to natao jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Hiaa ' wori ' - ra mpai ' to ra ' uncahi hi mali - na pai ' ratadi hi rala kabengia - na to molaa ngkai Alata ' ala . Hi ria - ramo mpai ' ntora geo ' pai ' ntodohaka . "

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki tadulako tantara toei : " Nculii ' - moko , apa ' napa to nupangala ' bate madupa ' . " Hinto ' u toe , mo ' uri ' mpu ' u - imi batua - na to peda ' hi tomi - na .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: Hangkani , Yesus hilou hi tomi Petrus . Hi ria mpohilo - i piniana - na Petrus tobine hi poturua - na apa ' ngkelengi ' - i .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Yesus mpokamu pale - na , ncaliu mo ' uri ' - imi . Kaliliu memata - imi - hawo , pai ' - i mpolayani Yesus .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Ncimonou ' toe , wori ' tauna tumai hi Yesus , mpokeni doo - ra ba ompi ' - ra to mohaki ' ba to nahawi ' seta . Yesus mpopalai seta toera hante hamela lau - wadi lolita - na , pai ' napaka ' uri ' - ra hawe ' ea tauna to mohaki ' .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Ngkai hawe ' ea to nababehi Yesus toe , madupa ' - mi lolita nabi Yesaya owi to mpo ' uli ' : " Hi ' a - mi to mpokolo pontodohakaa - ta pai ' mpaka ' uri ' haki ' - ta . "

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , wori ' lia tauna mpotipuhi Yesus . Kanahilo - ra , na ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Hilou - tamo hi dipo rano . "

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Nto ' u toe , ria hadua guru agama Yahudi tumai hi Yesus , mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , hiapa kahiloua - nu , doko ' kutuku ' - ko ! "

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Yesus mpotompoi ' - i , na ' uli ' : " Bangko ' ria pulo ' u - ra , pai ' danci ria peta - ra . Aga Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , uma - kuna ria tomi - ku kupoturui . "

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Oti toe , ria wo ' o hadua topetuku ' - na to mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , piliu - a - kuwo ulu nculii ' hi tomi - ku . Ane mate - damo tuama - ku pai ' - i ratana , bo kutuku ' - moko . "

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: Yesus mpotompoi ' - i hante walatu toi : " Tuku ' - ama ! Pelele ' moto - ramo tomate mpotana hingka tomate - ra . "

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Ngkai ree , ngkahe ' mpu ' u - imi Yesus hi rala sakaya hante ana ' guru - na , pai ' - ra me ' ongko ' .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Muu - mule ' rata ncorobaa ngolu ' bohe mpojago rano , alaa - na balumpa mporumpa ' sakaya - ra . Nto ' u toe , leta ' moto - i Yesus .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Ana ' guru - na hilou mpolike - i , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' ! Tulungi ! Mate - ta toi - e ! "

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' me ' eka ' - koi ! Kura ' rahi pepangala ' - ni . " Pemata - nami Yesus mpo ' uli ' : " Mento ' o - ko ngolu ' ! Rodo - moko balumpa ! " Hangaa molino - mi omea .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Kampohilo - ra toe , rapokakonce ra ' uli ' : " Hema mpu ' u - idi - hana tauna toii - e ? Ngolu ' pai ' rano molino - di - hana ntuku ' hawa ' - nae ! "

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Rata - imi Yesus hante ana ' guru - na hi dipo rano hi tana ' - ra to Gadara . Rata hi ria , mehupa ' rodua tauna ngkai daeo ' , tumai mpohirua ' - ki Yesus . To rodua toera , tauna to napesuai ' seta , buko ' lia - ra , alaa - na uma hema to daho ' ntara hi ree .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Mekio ' - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Ee Ana ' Alata ' ala ! Napa - di - kona pai ' tumai - koe ? Neo ' - kai nusesa ' - e ' ! Ko ' ia rata tempo - na . "

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Uma molaa ngkai ree , ria wori ' wawu mojume .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Seta to mehawi ' hi tauna toera merapi ' hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Ane kana nupopalai - kai ngkai rei , hubui - kai mesua ' hi wawu toera mai . "

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Koi ' - mokoi ! " Malai mpu ' u - ramo seta toera , kaliliu mesua ' hi wawu . Ngkai ree , mparampuli - ramo - rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala ' hi rano , kaliliu hi rala ue , pai ' - ra mate bonga - mi .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Karahilo - na tauna to mpodoo wawu toera napa to jadi ' hi wawu - ra pai ' napa to jadi ' hi tauna to kahawia ' toera , pokeno - rami hilou hi rala ngata mpoparata kajadia ' toe .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Toe pai ' mo ' iko - ramo tumai pue ' ngata doko ' mpohirua ' - ki Yesus . Karahilo - na Yesus , raperapi ' bona malai - i ngkai ngata - ra .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Ngkai ree , mehawi ' sakaya wo ' o - imi Yesus hante doo - na , pedipo - rami nculii ' hilou hi po ' ohaa ' - ra hi ngata Kapernaum .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Rata hi ria , ria to mpokowa ' hadua topungku tumai hi Yesus . Kanahilo - na kabohe pepangala ' - ra , na ' uli ' hi topungku toei : " Ana ' - ku , pakaroho nono - nu ! Te ' ampungi - mi jeko ' - nu . "

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Ba hangkuja dua guru agama mpo ' epe lolita - na Yesus toe . Mololita bongo - ramo hi rala nono - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Dada ' a lia - i tau toii ! Na ' uli ' - hana hibalia tuwu ' - na hante tuwu ' - na Alata ' ala ! "

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Ntaa ' na ' inca moto - di Yesus to hi rala nono - rae . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' kedi ' rahi nono - ni !

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ria mpu ' u kuasa - ku hi dunia ' mpo ' ampungi jeko ' . Tapi ' ane ku ' uli ' : ` Te ' ampungi - mi jeko ' - nu , ' uma ni ' incai ba te ' ampungi mpu ' u - di jeko ' - na ba uma - di . Aga ane ku ' uli ' : ` Memata pai ' momako ' - moko , ' nihilo mpai ' kadupa ' - na ba ka ' uma - na . Jadi ' , kupopohiloi - koi karia - na kuasa - ku mpo ' ampungi jeko ' . " Ngkai ree , kamewili ' - nami hi topungku toei , na ' uli ' - ki : " Memata - moko , ongko ' - mi pokowaa ' - nu , pai ' - ko nculii ' - mi ! "

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Pemata - na mpu ' u - mi topungku toei , pai ' - i nculii ' hilou hi tomi - na .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Karahilo - na ntodea to jadi ' toe , me ' eka ' - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Uma mowo - e ' baraka ' - na Alata ' ala ! Nawai ' mpu ' u - tano kuasa to bohe hewa toe hi manusia ' - e ! "

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus malai ngkai ree . Hi lengko ohea , mpohilo - i hadua topesingara ' paja ' bula - na mohura hi kantoro ' - na , hanga ' - na Matius . Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Tuku ' - ama ! " Kamokore - nami Matius kaliliu mpotuku ' Yesus .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na ngkoni ' hi tomi Matius , pai ' wori ' wo ' o - ra topesingara ' paja ' pai ' tau ntani ' - na to ra ' uli ' ntodea dada ' a kehi - ra tumai ngkoni ' dohe - ra .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Ria - ra to Parisi to mpohilo toe . Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na Yesus : " Napa pai ' guru - ni ngkoni ' hangkaa - ngkania hante topesingara ' paja ' pai ' tauna topojeko ' - e ! "

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Yesus mpo ' epe lolita - ra toe , toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Tauna to uma peda ' , uma mingki ' rapokulii ' . Tauna to peda ' - wadi - hawo to paraluu rapokulii ' .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Uma - a tumai mpokio ' tauna to monoa ' ingku - ra . Katumai - ku toi - le , mpokio ' topojeko ' - a - kuna bona medea - ra ngkai jeko ' - ra . Jadi ' , paresa ' - koi ulu napa batua - na Lolita Alata ' ala to te ' uki ' hewa toi : ` Uma kuperapi ' porewua to nipopepue ' hi Aku ' . To kuperapi ' - le , bona ma ' ahi ' - koi hi doo . ' "

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Ngkai ree , rata - ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku ' Yohanes Topeniu ' hi Yesus . Mepekune ' - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Napa pai ' topetuku ' - nu , uma - ra mopuasa ' - e ? Hiaa ' ane kai ' - kaina hante to Parisi , biasa mopuasa ' - ka - kaina ntuku ' ada - kai . "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Yesus mpotompoi ' - ra hante lolita rapa ' toi , na ' uli ' - raka : " Tauna hi posusa ' poncamokoa bate goe ' - goe ' dohe topemua ' , uma - ra mopuasa ' bula - na topemua ' ria - pidi dohe - ra . Tapi ' rata mpai ' tempo - na , topemua ' ra ' ala ' ngkai laintongo ' - ra . Nto ' u toe - damo , pai ' lako ' mopuasa ' - rada . "

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' lolita rapa ' to ronyala - pi , na ' uli ' : " Uma ria haduaa tauna to mpotelepei baju to hae hante pontaia ' to bo ' u . Apa ' pontaia ' to bo ' u mongkuru ' mpai ' , duu ' - na mpoheu ' baju to hae toe , alaa - na kaboo - bohea lau - mi mpai ' heu ' - na .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Wae wo ' o uma lompe ' mpotua anggur to bo ' u hi pontu ' ua to hae . Apa ' ane dede ' - i - damo , mopengka pontu ' ua to hae toe , alaa - na mobowo lau - mi anggur , pai ' mpadaa ' wo ' o - mi pontu ' ua - na . Anggur to bo ' u kana ratua hi pontu ' ua to bo ' u , bona lompe ' omea . "

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mololita - pidi , rata hadua pangkeni hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi , kaliliu mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa Yesus mpopetulungi , na ' uli ' - ki : " Ana ' - ku tobine lako ' mate lia - i . Lou - ta hi tomi - ku , nujama bona tuwu ' nculii ' - i . "

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Kamokore - nami Yesus mpotuku ' tauna toei , pai ' ana ' guru - na hilou wo ' o - ra mpotuku ' - i .

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: Hi lengko ohea , tumai hadua tobine mpomohui ' - i ngkai tilingkuria - na . Tobine toei hampulu ' rompae - imi moraa ' ncuu , uma ria katoo - tontoa ' - na . Na ' uli ' hi rala nono - na : " Nau ' kureo baju - na - wadi , bate mo ' uri ' - ale mpai ' . " Ngkai ree , kanaganga - nami wuntu baju Yesus .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o - hawo , me ' ili ' - imi Yesus hi tobine toei , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ana ' - ku , pakaroho nono - nu ! Mo ' uri ' - moko , sabana pepangala ' - nu hi Aku ' . " Ngkai ree , mo ' uri ' mpu ' u - imi .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Oti toe , Yesus kaliliu momako ' hilou hi tomi pangkeni agama Yahudi toei we ' i . Karata - na hi ria , nahilo - hawo wori ' tauna to molalowe pai ' to motantangi ' .

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Malai - koi omea ngkai rei . Uma - ile mate - e . Leta ' - i - wadi . " Mpo ' epe toe - e we ' i , rapotawai lau - i - wadi .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Ka ' oti - na napopalai tauna toera , mesua ' - imi hi poturua ana ' toei , pai ' - i mpokamu pale - na . Kaliliu memata - imi ana ' toei .
