text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Kareba toe molele - mi hobo ' hi ngata toe pai ' hi hawe ' ea ngata to mohu ' .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mpopaliliu pomako ' - na , hi lengko ohea ria rodua towero mpotuku ' - i , pai ' - ra mekio ' : " Muli Magau ' Daud ! Poka ' ahi ' - ka - kaiwo ! "

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Kamesua ' - na Yesus hi rala tomi , metuku ' - ramo towero to rodua toera mpohirua ' - ki . Napekune ' - ra : " Ha nipangala ' karia - na kuasa - ku mpaka ' uri ' - koi ? " Ratompoi ' : " Kipangala ' , Pue ' ! "

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Ngkai ree najama - mi mata - ra pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Kupaka ' uri ' - mokoi ntuku ' pepangala ' - ni . "

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Kaliliu pehilo - ramo . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpotagi - ra , na ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' nilolita hi hema - hema napa to kubabehi hi koi ' toi - e ' ! "

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Ntaa ' we ' i , hilou lau - ramo mpopalele kareba toe hi hawe ' ea ngata to mohu ' .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Kamalai - ra towero toera , ria wo ' o - mi to mpokeni hadua tauna to peda ' tumai hi Yesus . Tauna toei uma howa ' mololita apa ' nahawi ' seta - i .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Wae kanawuso - na Yesus seta to mpesuai ' - i toe - e , howa ' - imi - hawo mololita . Konce - ramo ntodea mpohilo to jadi ' toe , ra ' uli ' : " Uma mowo kabaraka ' - nae ' ! Ko ' ia ria hangkania tahilo to hewa Hi ' a toe hi tana ' to Israel ! "

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Aga to Parisi , uma rapangalai ' kuasa - na Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Ah ! Kuasa - na tetu - le ngkai magau ' seta . Toe - hawo pai ' ria baraka ' - na mpopalai seta - e . "

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Yesus modao ' mpokinomo butu ngata - na . Metudui ' - i hi tomi posampayaa , mpoparata Kareba Lompe ' , na ' uli ' : " Neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . " Mpaka ' uri ' wo ' o - i hawe ' ea tauna to peda ' pai ' to keru .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Tuna nono - na mpohilo tauna to wori ' , apa ' wori ' kasusaa ' - ra , pai ' uma hema to mpotulungi - ra , hewa bima to uma te ' ewu .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Tauna to wori ' toera hewa pae to taha ' . Wori ' pae to kana rapepae , aga topepae uma - ra wori ' .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Toe pai ' kana mekakae - koi hi pue ' bonea , niperapi ' bona nahubui tauna hilou mepae hi bonea - na . "

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Yesus mpokio ' ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua bona morumpu , pai ' nawai ' - ra kuasa mpopalai anudaa ' pai ' mpaka ' uri ' hawe ' ea tauna to peda ' pai ' to keru .

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Hanga ' suro Pue ' Yesus to hampulu ' rodua toera , toi - ramo : Lomo ' - na Simon , to rahanga ' wo ' o Petrus ; oti toe , Andreas ompi ' - na Simon , Yakobus ana ' Zebedeus ; Yohanes ompi ' - na Yakobus ; Filipus ; Bartolomeus ; Tomas ; Matius topesingara ' paja ' ; Yakobus ana ' Alfeus ; Tadeus ; Simon to Zelot ; pai ' Yudas Iskariot ( hi ' a mpai ' to mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - na ) .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: To hampulu ' rodua toera nasuro Yesus hilou ngkeni Kareba Lompe ' . Kako ' ia - ra me ' ongko ' , natudui ' - ra hewa toi : " Neo ' - koi hilou hi ngata to bela - ra to Yahudi . Neo ' - koi hilou hi ngata to Samaria .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Hilou - koi ulu hi hingka to Yahudi - ta muli Israel . Hira ' toe hewa bima to puha .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Uli ' - raka hewa toi : ` Neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . '

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Paka ' uri ' tauna to peda ' , potuwu ' tauna to mate , paka ' uri ' tauna to mohaki ' poko ' , popalai seta to mpohawi ' manusia ' . Hawe ' ea rasi ' to nawai ' - kokoi Alata ' ala , nawai ' mara , uma ni ' oli . Jadi ' , kana nipewai ' mara wo ' o - wadi - koiwo to ria hi koi ' .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: " Neo ' ngkeni wori ' rewa hi pomakoa ' - ni . Neo ' ngkeni doi ba bulawa ba pera ' .

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: Neo ' ngkeni boku , neo ' mpokeni rontonga ' baju ba sapatu ' ba lua ' . Apa ' masipato ' moto - koi rawai ' kaparaluua - ni ngkai tauna to nikarebai Lolita Pue ' .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: " Ane rata - koi hi hameha ' ngata , pali ' hi retu tauna to lompe ' nono - ra to doko ' mpotarima - koi hi rala tomi - ra . Mo ' oha ' - mokoi hi retu duu ' - ni kaliliu mpai ' hi ngata ntani ' - na .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Ane mesua ' - koi hi rala tomi , uli ' - raka pue ' tomi : ` Pue ' mpogane ' - koi ! '

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Ane lompe ' nono - ra pue ' tomi , bate nagane ' - ra Pue ' Ala . Aga ane uma - di lompe ' nono - ra , uma raratai kalompea ' tuwu ' ngkai Pue ' .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Ane ria pue ' tomi ba pue ' ngata to uma dota mpotarima - koi ba to uma dota mpo ' epe lolita - ni , palahii tomi ba ngata toe , pai ' nitonta awu to mentaka ' hi palanta ' witi ' - ni , rapotanda kanahuku ' - ra mpai ' Alata ' ala .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Penonoi : hi Eo Kiama , meliu pehuku ' Alata ' ala mpohuku ' tauna toera ngkai pehuku ' - na hi pue ' ngata Sodom pai ' Gomora owi .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: " Pelompehi , apa ' kuhubui - koi hilou hi olo ' tauna to dada ' a . Koi ' mpai ' hewa bima hi olo ' serigala . Kana mo ' akala - koi hewa asi , aga mo ' alusu ' nono - ni hante uma ria patuju - ni to dada ' a .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Pelompehi mpu ' u - koie ' , apa ' rahoko ' - koi mpai ' pai ' rapakilu hi topohura agama . Raweba ' - koi hi rala tomi posampayaa .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Rakeni - koi hilou hi topoparenta pai ' hi magau ' sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' . Hinto ' u toe - mi mpai ' ria loga - ni mololita hi topoparenta pai ' hi tau ntani ' - na to bela - ra to Yahudi , mpololita pepangala ' - ni hi Aku ' .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: " Ane rakeni - koi hilou hi topohura , neo ' - koi me ' eka ' ba napa - mi mpai ' to ni ' uli ' - raka ba beiwa petompoi ' - ni . Apa ' nto ' u toe mpai ' , Alata ' ala moto mpo ' uli ' - kokoi napa to masipato ' ni ' uli ' .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Jadi ' , napa to ni ' uli ' nto ' u toe , bela ngkai pekiri - ni moto . Lolita - ni tetu mpai ' mehuwu ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to nawai ' - kokoi Tuama - ni to hi rala suruga . Hi ' a - mi mpai ' to mponotohi - koi napa to ni ' uli ' nto ' u - ni mololita .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: " Rata mpai ' tempo - na , hawe ' ea tauna mpokahuku ' - koi sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' . Ria mpai ' tauna to mpewai ' ompi ' - ra ba ana ' - ra moto bona rapatehi sabana petuku ' - ra hi Aku ' . Ria wo ' o ana ' to mpo ' ewa totu ' a - ra pai ' mpopatehi - ra . Aga tauna to tida mepangala ' hi Aku ' duu ' hi ka ' omea - na , bate mporata - ra kalompea ' hi eo mpeno .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Ane rabalinai ' - koi hi ngata to hameha ' , malai - koi hilou hi kahangata - na . Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : kako ' ia - na hudu bago - ni mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi hawe ' ea ngata to Israel , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' rata nculii ' .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: " Ana ' sikola uma meliu karabila ' - na ngkai guru - na . Hadua batua uma meliu ngkai maradika - na .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Biasa - na ana ' sikola mpotuku ' kehi guru - na , pai ' batua mpotuku ' kehi maradika - na . Jadi ' , pelompehi , apa ' Aku ' Pue ' - ni , pai ' koi ' topetuku ' - ku . Ane Aku ' rahanga ' Beelzebul , magau ' hawe ' ea seta , peliu - nami koi ' to mpotuku ' - a . Bate raruge ' wo ' o - koi mpai ' .

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: " Aga nau ' wae , neo ' nipoka ' eka ' tauna to mpo ' ewa - koi . Apa ' hawe ' ea kehi - ra to tewunii ' bate kahiloa mpai ' . Hawe ' ea to hi rala nono - ra bate telohu mpai ' .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: " Napa to ku ' uli ' - kokoi to uma ra ' epei tau ntani ' - na , kana nilolita hi hawe ' ea tauna . Napa to kuwara ' - wadi - kokoi hi tilinga - ni , uli ' pakalonto ' hi tilinga ntodea .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Neo ' - koi mpoka ' eka ' manusia ' to doko ' mpopatehi - koi , apa ' uma ria kuasa - ra mpohuku ' - koi hi rala naraka . To nipoka ' eka ' - le , Alata ' ala , apa ' mokuasa - i mpatehi - koi , pai ' mokuasa wo ' o - i mpohuku ' - koi hi rala naraka .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: " Roma ' a rone biasa - na rapobalu ' nte hampepa ' doi see - wadi . Aga nau ' wae , uma ria hama ' aa to mate ane uma konoa Alata ' ala Tuama - ni .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Hiaa ' meliu pompewili ' - na Alata ' ala hi koi ' . Na ' inca lia - koi , bangku ' kawori ' wuluwoo ' - ni nabila ' pai ' na ' inca omea .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Jadi ' , neo ' - koi me ' eka ' . Meliu - pi pompewili ' - na Alata ' ala hi koi ' ngkai pompewili ' - na rone to wori ' .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: " Hema - hema to mpangaku ' hi doo kahi ' a - na topetuku ' - ku , hi ' a wo ' o mpai ' kupangaku ' hi Tuama - ku to hi rala suruga , ku ' uli ' : ` Tau toei topetuku ' - ku . '

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Aga hema to mpo ' uli ' hi doo kabela - nai topetuku ' - ku , hi ' a wo ' o mpai ' kusapu hi Tuama - ku to hi rala suruga , ku ' uli ' : ` Tau toei , bela - i topetuku ' - ku . '

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: " Neo ' ba ni ' uli ' wae , katumai - ku toi mpopohintuwu ' tauna . Uma - e ' ! Katumai - ku toi , tumai mpoposisala tauna .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Apa ' katumai - ku toi , tauna hantomi mome ' ewa lau , hantongo ' mpotuku ' - a , hantongo ' uma . Ana ' tomane mposisala - ki tuama - na , ana ' tobine mposisala - ki tina - na , minia mposisala - ki piniana - na .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: " Tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' tina - na ba tuama - na meliu ngkai ahi ' - na hi Aku ' , uma - i masipato ' jadi ' topetuku ' - ku . Tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' ana ' - na meliu ngkai ahi ' - na hi Aku ' , uma - i masipato ' jadi ' topetuku ' - ku .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Tauna to jadi ' topetuku ' - ku ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki tauna to mpopaha ' a kaju parika ' - na pai ' mpotuku ' laa ' - ku , apa ' bate mporata kaparia - i mpai ' , ba paiana rapatehi mpu ' u - i sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' . Jadi ' , hema to uma sadia mporata kaparia hewa toe , uma - i masipato ' jadi ' topetuku ' - ku .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Hema to mpobahaka konoa - na moto pai ' mpotuku ' - a nau ' rapatehi - i mpai ' , hi ' a - mi to mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' . Aga hema to mpentaei konoa - na moto , uma - i mpai ' mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: " Hema to mpotarima - koi , hibali mpotarima Aku ' - ramo . Hema to mpotarima - a , hibali mpotarima Alata ' ala wo ' o - ramo , apa ' Hi ' a - mi to mposuro - a .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Hema to mpotarima hadua suro Alata ' ala apa ' suro Alata ' ala mpu ' u - i , hi ' a mpai ' mporata hiwili - na hewa to rahiwili - ki tauna to nasuro Alata ' ala . Hema to mpotarima hadua tauna to monoa ' apa ' monoa ' mpu ' u - i , hi ' a mpai ' mporata hiwili - na hewa to rahiwili - ki tauna to monoa ' .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Hema to mpotulungi hadua topetuku ' - ku apa ' topetuku ' - ku mpu ' u - i , bate mporata - ra hiwili - na hi eo mpeno . Nau ' ue mara - wadi nawai ' - ki hadua topetuku ' - ku to kedi ' tuwu ' - na , bate mporata - i mpai ' hiwili - na . "

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Kahudu - na Yesus mpotudui ' ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua , hilou - imi metudui ' pai ' mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' hi rala ngata - ngata to mohu ' .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Nto ' u toe , Yohanes Topeniu ' bula - na ratarungku ' . Na ' epe Yohanes napa to napobago Kristus . Toe pai ' nahubui ba hangkuja dua topetuku ' - na hilou hi Yesus mpekune ' - i hewa toi :

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: " Ba Iko mpu ' u - midi Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Alata ' ala - e , ba ria - pidi to ntani ' - na to kipopea ? " Hilou mpu ' u - ramo mpoparata pompekunea ' Yohanes toe hi Yesus .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Kana ' epe - na Yesus pompekunea ' toe , na ' uli ' - raka suro toera : " Nculii ' - mokoi , uli ' - ki retu hawe ' ea napa to ni ' epe pai ' to nihilo :

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: To wero pehilo - mi , to kejo momako ' monoa ' - mi , topohaki ' poko ' mo ' uri ' , to wongo pe ' epe , tomate kupotuwu ' nculii ' , pai ' Kareba Lompe ' kuparata - mi hi tauna to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Marasi ' - ra tauna to uma morara ' nono - ra hi Aku ' . "

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Kanculii ' - ra suro Yohanes Topeniu ' toera , mololita - imi Yesus hi ntodea , mpotompo ' wiwi Yohanes . Na ' uli ' : " Napa patuju - ni hilou mpohirua ' - ki Yohanes hi tana ' to wao ' ? Ba doko ' - koi mpohilo tauna to morara ' nono - na , to hewa pimpi to nawui ngolu ' molue hilou tumai ? Uma - hawo , apa ' uma hewa toe kehi - na Yohanes .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Jadi ' , hilou doko ' mpohilo napa - dikoie ? Ba doko ' mpohilo tauna to ncola pohea - na ? Uma wo ' o - hawo , apa ' tauna to ncola pohea - ra , hi tomi magau ' - ra - wadi - hana .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Jadi ' , hilou doko ' mpohilo napa - dikoie ? Ba doko ' mpohilo nabi - dikoi ? Ane tetu , makono lia . Apa ' Yohanes tetui meliu ngkai nabi to ntani ' - na .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Apa ' hi ' a tetu - mi to mporodo nono - ra ntodea mpotarima - a , hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' owi . Na ' uli ' Alata ' ala : ` Hi ' a toi - mi suro - ku , kuhubui - i meri ' ulu ngkai Iko , bona mporodo ohea - nu . ' "

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ngkai hawe ' ea tauna to putu hi dunia ' toi , uma ria haduaa to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - na ngkai Yohanes Topeniu ' . Aga ngkai wae lau , marasi ' mpu ' u - ra tauna to jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Nau ' to kedi ' lia tuwu ' - ra , meliu kamarasi ' - ra ngkai Yohanes .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Ngkai lomo ' pobago - na Yohanes Topeniu ' rata hi tempo toi , tauna to dada ' a mpohuduwukui mpo ' ewa topetuku ' Alata ' ala doko ' mpokuasai - ra .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Ngkai nabi - nabi owi duu ' hi Yohanes tempo toi , hawe ' ea nabi pai ' Atura Musa mpolowa napa to kana jadi ' .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Ria nabi owi to mpolowa karata - na nculii ' nabi Elia . Jadi ' , ane dota nipangala ' , Yohanes toe - mile nabi Elia to ralowa owi - e .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Hema to tilingaa , pe ' epei lompe ' !

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: " Uma mowo tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi ! Toi - mi lolita rapa ' - ku to kurapai ' - raka . Hira ' hewa ana ' to mohura hi wiwi ' karajaa to mpobawai ema ' - ra ,

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: ra ' uli ' : ` Kibawai - koi molalowe , uma - koi dota goe ' dohe - kai . Kibawai - koi motantangi ' , uma wo ' o - koi dota geo ' dohe - kai . '

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Batua - na : Yohanes Topeniu ' uma rapokonoi , Aku ' wo ' o uma rapokonoi . Katumai - na Yohanes , mopuasa ' - i pai ' uma - i nginu to melanguhi . Rapoka ' oja ' - i , ra ' uli ' : ` Kahawia ' - i - hanale ! '

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Hiaa ' katumai - ku Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , nginu - a pai ' ngkoni ' - a . Rapoka ' oja ' wo ' o - a - wadi , ra ' uli ' : ` Hilo - i ! Tojampa , topalangu - langu , bale - ra topesingara ' paja ' pai ' doo - ra topojeko ' ! ' Aga nau ' wae , ta ' inca kamonoto - na patuju Alata ' ala ane tanaa gau ' topetuku ' - na . "

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpokamaro to Yahudi to mo ' oha ' hi ngata - ngata hi tana ' Galilea , apa ' nau ' jau moto - mi nababehi anu mekoncehi hi ngata - ra , uma oa ' - ra medea ngkai kehi - ra to dada ' a .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Silaka - koi to Korazim pai ' to Betsaida ! Wori ' moto - mi tanda mekoncehi kubabehi hi ngata - ni , aga uma oa ' - koi medea ngkai jeko ' - ni . Ane rapa ' - na tanda mekoncehi toe rababehi hi rala ngata Tirus pai ' Sidon , ke mahae - ramo - rana medea ngkai jeko ' - ra , nau ' bela - ra to Yahudi . Ke mpo ' ala ' karu ' - ramo rapohea , pai ' mpohawui ' woto - ra hante awu , tanda kasoho ' nono - ra .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca : hi Eo Kiama mpai ' , meliu - pi pehuku ' - na Alata ' ala hi koi ' ngkai pehuku ' - na hi to Tirus pai ' to Sidon .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: " Pai ' koi ' wo ' o to Kapernaum ! Ha ni ' uli ' - koina wae , na ' ongko ' napomolangko - koi mpai ' Alata ' ala - e ? Uma - e ' ! Natadi pai ' nahuku ' lau - dakoi mpai ' . Ane rapa ' - na tanda mekoncehi to kubabehi hi ngata - ni tetu rababehi owi hi ngata Sodom , ke uma - hawo nakero Alata ' ala , ke ria - pidi ngata toe duu ' hewa toe - e lau .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca : hi Eo Kiama mpai ' meliu - pi pehuku ' - na Alata ' ala hi koi ' ngkai pehuku ' - na hi to Sodom owi . "

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Yesus mosampaya , na ' uli ' : " O Mama , Pue ' langi ' pai ' dunia ' ! Mpo ' uli ' - a tarima kasi , apa ' hawe ' ea toe lau nupopohiloi - raka tauna to uma pe ' incai , tapi ' nuwunii ' - raka tauna to nginca pai ' tauna to pante ,

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: apa ' wae - mi konoa - nu Mama .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: " Hawe ' ea - na natonu - maka Tuama - ku . Uma ria haduaa to mpo ' incai - a , Aku ' Ana ' Alata ' ala , muntu ' Tuama - ku to mpo ' inca - a . Wae wo ' o uma ria to mpo ' incai - i Tuama - ku , muntu ' Aku ' Ana ' - na to mpo ' inca - i , pai ' hema - hema to kupopo ' incai kahema - nai Tuama - ku .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: " Mai - mokoi omea to lenge ' , pai ' to motomo kinolo - ni , Aku ' moto mpobole kinolo - ni .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Kolo - mi kinolo to kupopokoloi - kokoi , pai ' mpopetudui ' - koi hi Aku ' , nirata moto mpai ' kalompea ' tuwu ' kao ' - ni . Apa ' mo ' olu - a pai ' dingki ' nono - ku .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Hawa ' - ku uma mokoro , pai ' kinolo to kupopokoloi - kokoi monangko ' - wadi . "

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Hangkani , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na ntara rala bonea hi Eo Sabat , eo pepuea ' - ra to Yahudi . Bula - ra mpotara bonea toe , ana ' guru - na mpotepo ' wua ' gandum pai ' raru ' a apa ' mo ' oro ' - ra .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Ria to Parisi to mpohilo - ra . To Parisi toera mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Hilo - dile ana ' guru - nue ! Mpotiboki - ra atura agama - ta , mobago - ra hi eo pepuea ' ! "

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Daud hante ema ' - na owi apa ' mo ' oro ' - ra - rawoe ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Mesua ' - ramo hi rala tomi pepuea ' , pai ' - ra mpokoni ' roti to rapopepue ' hi Alata ' ala . Ane ntuku ' ada agama - ta , imam - wadi - hana to ma ' ala mpokoni ' roti toe . Aga nau ' wae , gau ' - na Daud toe uma - hawo naposala ' .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Penonoi wo ' o napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Musa : imam - imam hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , mobago moto - ra hi eo pepuea ' , hiaa ' uma - hawo raposala ' .

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Jadi ' , peliu - nami Aku ' , apa ' Aku ' meliu ngkai Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Apa ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ria kuasa - ku mpo ' uli ' napa to ma ' ala rababehi hi eo pepuea ' . " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' , Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Uma kuperapi ' porewua to nipopepue ' hi Aku ' . To kuperapi ' - le , bona ma ' ahi ' - koi hi doo . ' Jadi ' , ane ke ni ' inca - hawo batua - na lolita toe - e , ke uma - hawo nisalai ' - ra to uma masala ' . "

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Pe ' ongko ' - na Yesus ngkai ree , hilou - i hi hantomi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Hi ree , ria hadua tauna to mate pale - na hamali . Ba hangkuja dua tauna mpali ' kasalaa ' Yesus , meka ' ba mobago - i - hana hi eo pepuea ' . Toe pai ' mepekune ' - ra hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Guru , ha ma ' ala moto - hawo mpaka ' uri ' topeda ' hi eo pepuea ' - e ? "

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Rapa ' - na ria bima - ta hama ' a , pai ' bima toe monawu ' hi rala wulou ' laa hi eo pepuea ' , ha tapelele ' - imi hi rala wulou ' laa - e ! Ha uma tahore - i nau ' hi eo pepuea ' - e !

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Hiaa ' manusia ' meliu tuwu ' - na ngkai bima . Jadi ' ane wae , ma ' ala lia - ta mpotulungi tauna hi eo pepuea ' . "

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki tauna to mate pale - na toei : " Tanoa pale - nu ! " Kanatanoa - nami - hawo pale - na , ncaliu mo ' uri ' - mi , moroho nculii ' hewa pale - na to hamali .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Ngkai ree , malai - ramo to Parisi ngkai tomi posampayaa , pai ' - ra mpali ' akala bona Yesus rapatehi .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Na ' inca Yesus karia - na patuju - ra to Parisi to dada ' a hi Hi ' a . Toe pai ' malai - imi ngkai ree , pai ' wori ' tauna to mpotuku ' - i . Mpaka ' uri ' - i hawe ' ea - ra to peda ' .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' nitolele hilau napa to kubabehi - kokoi toi . "

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Jadi ' , madupa ' - mi Lolita Alata ' ala to napohowa ' nabi Yesaya owi . Hewa toi moni - na :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: " Hi ' a toi - mi Batua - ku to kupelihi , kupe ' ahi ' - i , pai ' napakagoe ' nono - ku . Inoha ' - ku kuwai ' - ki . Kamonoa ' poparenta - ku naparata hi hawe ' ea tauna .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Uma - i mehono ' , uma - i mejeu ' , uma napesukui mololita hi karajaa .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Tauna to lente pepangala ' - ra , uma - ra na ' oho ' . Natulungi - ra to ncaruku ' mepangala ' . Mobago ncuu - i duu ' - na poparenta - na Alata ' ala to monoa ' rata hi dunia ' .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Hawe ' ea manusia ' mposarumaka - i . "

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Oti toe , ria wo ' o tauna to tumai hi Yesus mpokeni hadua tauna to kahawia ' . Tauna toei , wero pai ' uma - i howa ' mololita . Yesus mpaka ' uri ' - i , alaa - na pehilo pai ' howa ' - imi mololita .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Konce - ramo tauna to mpohilo toe , alaa - na momepekune ' - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Meka ' Hi ' a toi - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' muli Magau ' Daud to rajanci owi - e ! "

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Kara ' epe - na to Parisi lolita toe , ra ' uli ' : " Ah , kuasa - na tetu - le ngkai Beelzebul , magau ' hawe ' ea seta . Toe - hawo pai ' ria baraka ' - na mpopalai seta - e . "

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Ntaa ' na ' inca - di Yesus napa to hi rala nono - rae . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ane rapa ' - na ria hadua magau ' , pai ' ntodea hi rala kamagaua ' - na ntora mome ' ewa , bate mogero mpai ' kamagaua ' - na toe - e . Ane tau hangata ba tau hantina ntora motuda ' , uma mpai ' hintuwu ' ngata ba posantinaa toe .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Wae wo ' o hi kamagaua ' seta . Ane magau ' seta mpopalai hingka seta - na , batua - na seta mpo ' ewa hingka seta - na , alaa - na mogero mpai ' kamagaua ' - na seta toe .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Ni ' uli ' Aku ' mpopalai seta hante kuasa ngkai Beelzebul . Aga ria wo ' o doo - ni moto to mpopalai seta . Hante kuasa napa doo - ni tetu mpopalai seta ? Tantu hante kuasa Alata ' ala . Jadi ' , ngkai pobabehi doo - ni moto , monoto - mi kamasala ' pebalihi - ni tetu .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Aku ' mpopalai seta hante baraka ' ngkai Inoha ' Alata ' ala . Jadi ' , ngkai toe monoa ' - mi ni ' inca karata - nami tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi laintongo ' - ni .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: " Seta ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki tauna to parimuku . Ane mesua ' - ta hi rala tomi tauna to parimuku doko ' mpo ' ala ' ihi ' tomi - na , kana tahoo ' ncala ' - i , pai ' lako ' ma ' ala tapatau ' rewa - na . Wae wo ' o , ane Aku ' mpopalai seta , batua - na , meliu kuasa - ku ngkai seta .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: " Hema to uma tono ' hi Aku ' , kakono - na bali ' - ku - imi . Hema to uma mpotulungi - a mobago , hi ' a to mpobalinai ' pobago - ku .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca : hawe ' ea jeko ' pai ' lolita pesapuaka manusia ' ma ' ala ra ' ampungi . Ane ria tauna to mposapuaka - a ka ' Aku ' - na Ana ' Manusia ' , ma ' ala - pidi te ' ampungi sala ' - na toe . Aga ane mposapuaka - i Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , uma ria ampungia - na , lompe ' tempo toi , lompe ' hi eo mpeno - na . "

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: Na ' uli ' tena Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka to Parisi : " Ane kaju to lompe ' - i , lompe ' wo ' o - hawo wua ' - na . Ane kaju to uma lompe ' - i , uma wo ' o - hawo lompe ' wua ' - na . Kalompe ' - na kaju ba ka ' uma - na , incana hi wua ' - na .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Dada ' a lia - koi ! Uma ami ' - koi ma ' ala mpohowa ' lolita to lompe ' - e , bo dada ' a - dakoie . Apa ' napa ihi ' nono - ta , toe wo ' o to howa ' hi wiwi - ta .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Tauna to lompe ' - hana , bate mpohowa ' lolita to lompe ' - ra , apa ' ntora mpoinono - ra to lompe ' . Wae wo ' o tauna to dada ' a , dada ' a wo ' o lolita - ra , apa ' ntora mpoinono to dada ' a - ra .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca : hi Eo Kiama mpai ' , butu dua tauna kana mpotangku butu mela lolita - na . Nau ' lolita to uma motuju , kana natangku .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Apa ' ngkai lolita - ta moto - hawo mpai ' , rabotuhi kamasala ' - ta ba kamonoa ' - ta . "

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Oti toe , ba hangkuja dua guru agama pai ' to Parisi mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , doko ' - ka - kaina mpohilo - ko mpobabehi tanda to mekoncehi , bona monoa ' ki ' inca kangkai Alata ' ala - na mpu ' u - ko . "

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma mowo kada ' a - ni koi ' tetu lau ! Meleli ' oa ' - ko - koina ngkai Alata ' ala ! Merapi ' - koi bona kupopohiloi - koi tanda to mekoncehi . Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi - kokoi . Sampale to rapopohiloi - kokoi , tanda hewa to jadi ' hi nabi Yunus owi .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Hewa nabi Yunus tolu eo tolu mengi hi rala ta ' i uru bohe , wae wo ' o mpai ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' hi rala daeo ' tolu eo tolu mengi .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Hi Eo Kiama mpai ' , pue ' ngata Niniwe rapotuwu ' nculii ' hangkaa - ngkania hante koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi , pai ' - ra mpotudo ' sala ' - ni . Apa ' hira ' , medea - ramo - rana ngkai jeko ' - ra kampo ' epe - ra pololita nabi Yunus . Hiaa ' ria - mi hi laintongo ' - ni to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - na ngkai nabi Yunus , aga uma oa ' nipangala ' lolita - na .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Wae wo ' o hi Eo Kiama , raja bine ngkai Selatan rapotuwu ' nculii ' hangkaa - ngkania hante koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi , pai ' natudo ' sala ' - ni . Apa ' momako ' - i tumai ngkai ngata - na to molaa lia , apa ' doko ' mpu ' u - i mpo ' epe lolita Magau ' Salomo to pante lia . Hiaa ' ria - mi hi laintongo ' - ni to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - na ngkai Salomo , aga uma oa ' nipangala ' lolita - na .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: " Tauna to dada ' a to tuwu ' tempo toi ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki hadua tauna to napesuai ' anudaa ' . Malai - imi anudaa ' ngkai tau toei , pai ' - i modao ' - dao ' hi kawaoa ' - na mpali ' po ' ohaa ' - na . Apa ' uma ria naruai ' , na ' uli ' - mi : ` Agina nculii ' lau - ama hi po ' ohaa ' to kupalahii toe wengi ria . '

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: Ponculi ' - nami hilou hi tauna to napalahii - e wengi , nahilo - hawo uma ria to mpo ' ohai ' - i . Tauna toei hewa tomi to boa - wadi , molela ' tepehaii , hinapa ' hiloa - na .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Toe pai ' hilou ncala ' - i mpokio ' pitu hingka anudaa ' - na to meliu kadada ' a - ra ngkai hi ' a . Tumai - ramo mesua ' hi tauna to napalahii toe - e wengi , pai ' mo ' oha ' - ramo hi ree . Ka ' omea - na tampai kampe ' ahii ' tauna toei ngkai lomo ' - na . Wae wo ' o mpai ' to majadi ' hi tauna to dada ' a tempo toi : meliu lau - mi mpai ' kasilaka - ra , apa ' oja ' - ra mpotarima - a . "

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mololita - pidi mpololitai tauna to wori ' , rata - mi tina - na hante ompi ' - ompi ' - na . Mokore - ra hi mali tomi doko ' mpololitai - i .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Hadua tauna mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , oe - ra ria tina - nu pai ' ompi ' - nu hi mali - na , doko ' mpohirua ' - koko . "

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpotudo ' ana ' guru - na pai ' na ' uli ' : " Ane tina - ku pai ' ompi ' - kule , hira ' toe - ramo lau .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Apa ' hema - hema to mpobabehi konoa Tuama - ku to hi rala suruga , hira ' - mi ompi ' - ku pai ' hira ' - mi tina - ku . "

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Hi eo toe wo ' o , malai - imi Yesus ngkai tomi toe hilou hi wiwi ' rano , pai ' - i mohura .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Wori ' lia tauna morumpu mpotololiki - i , toe pai ' hilou - imi mpohawi ' sakaya , mohura hi rala - na , pai ' tauna to wori ' mokore hi talinti .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Wori ' nyala lolita rapa ' natudui ' - raka , na ' uli ' : " Ria hadua topohawu ' hilou mohawu ' .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Rala mpohawu ' - na toe , ria hawua ' - na to monawu ' hi mata ohea . Rata danci mpotilo ' hawua ' toe duu ' - na oti .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Ria wo ' o to monawu ' hi tana ' to watua , hangkedi ' - wadi tana ' - na . Hinawu ' - na toe sohi ' lia tuwu ' , apa ' moreni ' tana ' - na .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Kamorani ' - na eo , molaju - imi duu ' - na bangi , apa ' uma monala rali ' - na .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Ria wo ' o to monawu ' hi laintongo ' rui . Tuwu ' rui mpo ' upi ' hinawu ' toe , alaa - na mate .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Ria wo ' o hawua ' to monawu ' hi tana ' to morudu ' . Mowua ' hawua ' toe , ria to ha ' atu ngkani ngkai hinawu ' - na , ria to ono mpulu ' , ria to tolu mpulu ' .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Hema - koi to tilingaa , pe ' epei lompe ' ! "

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Tumai - ramo ana ' guru - na mpomohui ' - i , pai ' - ra mepekune ' , ra ' uli ' : " Guru , napa pai ' mpake ' lolita rapa ' - ko ane mpotudui ' ntodea - e ? "

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Owi , Alata ' ala ko ' ia mpopo ' incai manusia ' beiwa - i mpai ' jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Aga hewa toe lau , napopo ' incai - mokoi tudui ' toe . Tapi ' ane ntodea - hana , uma napiliu - ra omea mpo ' inca tudui ' toe . Toe pai ' kuwalatu - raka hante lolita rapa ' .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata ' ala , ranotohi nono - ra bona kawoo - woria ' Lolita Alata ' ala to ra ' inca . Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata ' ala , nau ' ria hangkedi ' to ra ' inca , ra ' alai ' lau - ra .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Toe pai ' mololita hante lolita rapa ' - ae ane mpololitai - a ntodea , apa ' tilingaa moto - ra aga uma ra ' incai batua - na to ra ' epe . Mataa moto - ra aga uma ra ' incai batua - na to rahilo .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Ngkai toe , madupa ' - mi Lolita Alata ' ala to napohowa ' nabi Yesaya owi . Hewa toi moni - na : ` Pe ' epe moto - ra , aga uma oa ' ra ' incai batua - na . Pehilo moto - ra , aga hewa to uma oa ' rahiloi mpu ' u .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Apa ' moko ' o nono - ra , mengkawongo - ra pai ' mengkawero - ra : oja ' - ra pehilo hante mata - ra , oja ' - ra pe ' epe hante tilinga - ra , oja ' - ra ranotohi nono - ra . Toe pai ' uma - ra mpai ' nculii ' hi Aku ' , pai ' uma - ra kuwai ' kalompea ' . ' "

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Aga koi ' , uma mowo kamarasi ' - ni , apa ' nihilo - mi - koina napa to kubabehi , pai ' ni ' epe - mi - koina tudui ' - ku .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Mpu ' u - mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : wori ' nabi pai ' tauna to monoa ' owi to doko ' mpohilo napa to nihilo koi ' toi , aga uma - rana rahiloi . Doko ' lia - ra mpo ' epe napa to ni ' epe - mi koi ' , aga uma - rana ra ' epei .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: " Pe ' epei , ku ' uli ' - kokoi napa batua - na lolita rapa ' topohawu ' toe we ' i .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Hawua ' to monawu ' hi mata ohea mpobatuai tauna to mpo ' epe moto kareba to mpo ' uli ' beiwa Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' , aga uma rapoinono . Rata anudaa ' mpohagoi - ra lolita toe ngkai rala nono - ra .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: " Hawua ' to monawu ' hi tana ' to watua - hawo mpobatuai tauna to mpo ' epe Kareba Lompe ' , ncaliu goe ' nono - ra mpo ' epe .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Aga uma moroho pepangala ' - ra , toe pai ' uma - ra ntaha mahae . Ane rabalinai ' - ra ba rapakasusa ' sabana pepangala ' - ra hi Kareba Lompe ' toe , kamo ' ungkere ' - rami .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: " Hawua ' to monawu ' hi olo ' rui - hawo mpobatuai tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala , aga sese ' - ra ntora mpenonoi katuwu ' - ra hi rala dunia ' - wadi , pai ' doko ' - ra mporumpu rewa dunia ' - wadi . Hawe ' ea toe mposesei ' - ra , alaa - na uma ria po ' ohaa ' Lolita Alata ' ala hi rala nono - ra , pai ' uma ria kalaua - na Lolita toe hi katuwu ' - ra .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: " Hawua ' to monawu ' hi tana ' to morudu ' - hawo mpobatuai tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala pai ' rapoinono mpu ' u . Hi tauna toe - ramo Lolita Alata ' ala mowua ' mpu ' u . Ria to mowua ' hangkedi ' , ria to mowua ' wori ' , ria to mowua ' wori ' lia . "

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Yesus mpololita hanyala - pi lolita rapa ' hi ntodea , na ' uli ' : " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , kajadi ' - na hewa jarita toi : Hadua topobonea hilou mpohawu ' hinawu ' to lompe ' hi bonea - na .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Rala - na hamengi bula tauna leta ' , rata bali ' - na topobonea toei , mpohawui ' bonea toe hante wua ' kowo ' to neo ' hibalia pae poraui - na , pai ' - i malai .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Tuwu ' mpu ' u - mi pae toe duu ' - na huwu , incana wo ' o - mi - hawo kowo ' hi olo ' pae .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Rata - ramo to ngkoni ' gaji ' mpo ' uli ' - ki topobonea toei : ` Tuama , hawua ' to lompe ' moto - di to tahawu ' - e . Ngkaiapa - di kowo ' toe - e ria ? '

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: " Na ' uli ' pue ' bonea toei : ` Tetu - le pobago bali ' - ta . ' " Ngkai ree , ra ' uli ' wo ' o - mi to ngkoni ' gaji ' toera : ` Ane nupokono , hilou kiwuka kowo ' toe ria ! '

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: " Na ' uli ' pue ' bonea : ` Neo ' , apa ' ane niwuka kowo ' - na , nipoiwukai mpai ' pae - na .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Pelele ' moto - mi kowo ' tuwu ' hangkaa - ngkania hante pae , duu ' - na tempo mepae . Kuhubui - ra - damo topepae mpowuka ulu kowo ' , rarumpu , ratomo ' pai ' rasuwe . Oti toe , pai ' lako ' rapalimpuru - di pae - e , pai ' ratimamahi hi rala wilulu - ku . ' "

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpo ' uli ' tena hanyala - pi lolita rapa ' hi ntodea , na ' uli ' : " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , kajadi ' - na hewa jarita toi : Ria hadua tauna ngala ' unto ' hawi , lou nahawu ' hi pampa - na .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Unto ' toe monete ' lia , meliu kakedi ' - na ngkai unto ' to ntani ' - na . Aga ane tuwu ' - i - damo , meliu - mi kabohe - na ngkai ngkojo to ntani ' - na . Tuwu ' - i hewa hangkaju kaju , alaa - na rata danci mpobabehi peta - ra hi ra ' a - na . "

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Ria - pi hanyala lolita rapa ' to na ' uli ' hi ntodea . Na ' uli ' : " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , kajadi ' - na hewa toi : Hadua tobine mpo ' ala ' ragi hangkedi ' , nagalo hante lunu to wori ' . Mahae - hae , woke ' - mi omea . "

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Yesus mpotudui ' ntodea hawe ' ea toe we ' i lau mpake ' lolita rapa ' . Uma ria to natudui ' - raka ane uma hante lolita rapa ' .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Ngkai toe , madupa ' - mi lolita to na ' uki ' nabi owi - e : Kutudui ' - ra hante lolita rapa ' . Kuparata - raka tudui ' to tewunii ' ngkai lomo ' kajadi ' dunia ' . "

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpalahii tauna to wori ' toera , pai ' - i mesua ' hi rala tomi . Tumai - ramo ana ' guru - na mpomohui ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Guru , uli ' - kakai pe ' batua lolita rapa ' kowo ' to hi olo ' pae - e . "

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Pue ' bonea to mpohawu ' hawua ' to lompe ' - le , mpobatuai Aku ' - mi , Ana ' Manusia ' .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Bonea , mpobatuai dunia ' toi . Hawua ' to lompe ' , mpobatuai tauna to jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Kowo ' mpobatuai tauna to mpotuku ' Magau ' Anudaa ' .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Bali ' to mpohawu ' kowo ' , hi ' a - mi Magau ' Anudaa ' . Tempo mepae , mpobatuai Eo Kiama . Pai ' tauna topepae , mpobatuai mala ' eka .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Hewa kowo ' rarumpu pai ' rasuwe , wae wo ' o mpai ' tauna to dada ' a nto ' u Eo Kiama .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' mpohubui mala ' eka - ku hilou mporumpu hawe ' ea to dada ' a pai ' hawe ' ea to mepahala ' nawu ' ngkai laintongo ' ntodea - ku .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna toera ratadi hi rala apu to wewo ' . Hi ria - ra mpai ' ntora geo ' pai ' ntodohaka .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Tapi ' tauna to monoa ' po ' ingku - ra , uma mpai ' mowo kabohe tuwu ' - ra nto ' u toe . Mehini - ra hewa eo hi rala Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala Tuama - ra . Hema to tilingaa , pe ' epei lompe ' ! "

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane kita ' jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na , toe meliu kalompe ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea to ntani ' - na . Kajadi ' - na hewa lolita rapa ' toi : Hadua tauna mporua ' bulawa to tetawu hi rala tana ' , masuli ' lia oli - na , kaliliu natawuhi nculii ' . Ngkai kagoe ' nono - na , kahilou - nami hi tomi - na mpobalu ' hawe ' ea rewa - na , na ' oli - ki tana ' pomporuaa ' - na bulawa toe .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: " Wae wo ' o , ane kita ' jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na , kajadi ' - na hewa lolita rapa ' toi : Ria hadua padaga to mpali ' hanyala watu to rahanga ' mutiara .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Wae kanarua ' - na hameha ' mutiara to masuli ' lia oli - na , kahilou - nami mpobalu ' hawe ' ea rewa - na , pai ' na ' oli - ki mutiara toe .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , kajadi ' - na hewa lolita rapa ' toi : Hameha ' jala ' to bohe ratene ' hi rala rano . Wori ' nyala bau ' mesua ' hi rala - na .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Ka ' ihia ' - nami jala ' , topebau ' mpohore jala ' - ra hilou hi role - na , pai ' mohura - ramo mpopelihi bau ' woko ' jala ' - ra . To lompe ' rapuna ' hi pontu ' ua - ra , to uma lompe ' rapetadi .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Wae - mi mpai ' hi Eo Kiama - e : mala ' eka - mala ' eka hilou mpogaa ' tauna to dada ' a pai ' tauna to monoa ' .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Tauna to dada ' a rapetadi hi rala apu naraka . Hi ria - ra mpai ' ntora geo ' pai ' ntodohaka . "

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpekune ' - ra ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' : " Ha nipaha wa lolita rapa ' - ku toe - e we ' i lau ? " Ratompoi ' : " Kipaha moto . "

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o - miraka : " Ane wae , oi wo ' o - pi hanyala lolita rapa ' - ku : Ane ria guru agama Yahudi to mpopetudui ' tudui ' to mpo ' uli ' kamoparenta - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' - ta , guru agama toe ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki pue ' tomi : ngkai pontimamahia rewa - na na ' ue ' pai ' napopehuwu rewa to hae pai ' rewa to bo ' u wo ' o . "

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Kahudu - na Yesus mpololita hawe ' ea lolita rapa ' toe , malai - imi ngkai ree ,

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: hilou hi ngata - na moto . Hi ria - i metudui ' hi rala tomi posampayaa . Konce - ramo tauna to mpo ' epe lolita - na , ra ' uli ' : " Hema - di to mpotudui ' - i pai ' - i pante hewa toe - e ? Pai ' ngkaiapa baraka ' - na mpobabehi anu mekoncehi - e ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Bo ana ' topowangu tomi - i - wadi - hawo . Tina - na , Maria . Ompi ' - na hira ' Yakobus , Yusuf , Simon pai ' Yudas .

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Ompi ' - na tobine , ria omea wo ' o - ra dohe - ta hi rehe ' i . Napa - di - hana pai ' ria - ki baraka ' - na mpobabehi hawe ' ea toe - e lau ? "

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Toe pai ' oja ' - ra mepangala ' hi Yesus . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Hadua nabi bate rabila ' hiapa kahilouaa - na . Aga hi ngata - na pai ' hi tomi - na moto , uma lau - i rabila ' . "

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Toe pai ' Yesus uma mpobabehi wori ' tanda mekoncehi hi ria , apa ' uma - ra mepangala ' .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Nto ' u toe topoparenta hi Galilea , Herodes Antipas . Na ' epe Herodes napa to nababehi Yesus .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka topobago - na : " Bate Yohanes Topeniu ' - le Yesus toei lou ! Tuwu ' nculii ' - imi ! Toe - hana pai ' ria baraka ' - na mpobabehi tanda to mekoncehi . "

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Hewa toi tutura kamate - na Yohanes Topeniu ' . Magau ' Herodes mpo ' ago Herodias , tobine ompi ' - na moto to rahanga ' Filipus . Wori ' ngkani Yohanes mpokamaro Herodes ngkai gau ' - na toe , na ' uli ' - ki : " Uma - ko ma ' ala mpotobine tobine tetui ! Gau ' - nu tetu mpotiboki Atura Musa ! " Ngkai ree , Herodes mpopahawa ' tantara - na mpohoko ' Yohanes . Rahoko ' mpu ' u - imi , rahoo ' , pai ' - i ratarungku ' .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Kakono - na , Herodes doko ' mpopatehi lau - imi , aga me ' eka ' - i mpoka ' eka ' ntodea , apa ' ra ' uli ' ntodea , Yohanes toe hadua nabi .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Ngkai ree , nto ' u - na Herodes mpobabehi karamea mpokiwoi eo kaputua - na , ana ' - na Herodias tobine modero ' hi nyanyoa torata . Goe ' lia - i Herodes mpohilo podero ' - na .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Nakeni kagoe ' - na rahi , mojanci pai ' mosumpa - i hi toronaa toei , na ' uli ' - ki : " Napa - napa to nuperapi ' , bate kuwai ' - ko ! "

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe , Herodias mpo ' ukei ' ana ' - na bona mperapi ' woo ' Yohanes Topeniu ' . Jadi ' , na ' uli ' toronaa toei mpo ' uli ' - ki Herodes : " Merapi ' - a woo ' - na Yohanes Topeniu ' ratu ' u hi lolo dula toi ! "

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Mpo ' epe pomperapia ' toe - di , kasoho ' - nami nono - na Herodes . Aga nau ' wae , apa ' mpolia ' mosumpa - imi we ' i ra ' epe torata - nae , toe pai ' mohawa ' - imi bona pomperapia ' toronaa toei rapadupa ' .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Nahubui - mi tantara - na hilou hi rala tarungku ' mpopata ' wuroko ' Yohanes .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Woo ' Yohanes toe rakeni hi lolo dula , ratonu - ki toronaa toei , pai ' hi ' a mpokeni hilou hi tina - na .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Kara ' epe - na topetuku ' - na Yohanes kamate - nami , hilou - ramo - rawo mpo ' ala ' woto - na pai ' ratana . Oti toe pai ' - ra hilou mpokeni tolele - na hi Yesus .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Yesus tolele kamate - na Yohanes toe , pehawi ' - nami hi sakaya , pai ' - i malai ngkai ree hilou hi kawaoa ' - na . Patuju Yesus bona ntodea neo ' mpotuku ' - i . Ntaa ' we ' i , kara ' epe - na ntodea kahilou - nami Yesus , pe ' ongko ' - ra wo ' o - mi - rawo ngkai ngata - ra hilou mpotuku ' - i , aga merole - ra - rana .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Pehompo - na Yesus ngkai sakaya , nahilo - hawo wori ' tauna mpopea - i . Metumu ' - mi ahi ' - na mpohilo - ra , pai ' - i mpaka ' uri ' - ra to peda ' .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Ncimonou ' - mi , tumai - ramo ana ' guru - na mpomohui ' - i , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , neo ' limpa - mi eo - na , pai ' wao ' - hana hi rehe ' i lau . Agina tahubui - ramo ntodea toera lau hilou hi ngata to mohu ' mpo ' oli pongkoni ' - ra . "

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma - ra mingki ' hilou . Koi ' - mi - hawo to mpopokoni ' - ra . "

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Ratompoi ' ana ' guru - na : " Uma - kaiwo ria napa - napa hi kai ' , wuwu lima meha ' roti pai ' bau ' uru rongkaju - wadi . "

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Keni tumai . "

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Oti toe nahubui - ramo ntodea toera mohura hi kowo ' . Kamohura - rami - rawo hi kowo ' , pai ' na ' ala ' - mi roti to lima meha ' pai ' uru to rongkaju - e we ' i , pai ' - i ngkongoa ' hi langi ' mosampaya . Oti toe napihe - pihe - mi roti toe , pai ' natonu - raka ana ' guru - na bona rabagi hi ntodea .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Ngkoni ' omea - ramo duu ' - ra bohu . Ka ' oti - ra ngkoni ' , rarumpu - mi toro - na , hampulu ' roluncu - pi .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Kawori ' - ra to ngkoni ' nto ' u toe , ba ria - ra lima ncobu tu ? paka ' tomane - pidi , ko ' ia tebila ' tobine pai ' ana ' - ana ' .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpohubui ana ' guru - na mosakaya meri ' ulu hilou hi dipo rano , pai ' - i mpohubui tauna to wori ' toera nculii ' hilou hi tomi - ra .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Kanculii ' - ra tauna toera , manake ' - imi Yesus hilou hi lolo bulu ' , pai ' - i mosampaya hadudua - na . Duu ' bengi , hi ria oa ' - i - pidi .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Hiaa ' ana ' guru - nae we ' i , hi laintongo ' rano - ramo , molaa - mi ngkai role - na . Bingko - bingko - na sakaya - ra nakeni balumpa , apa ' ngolu ' mewui tono ' ngkai nyanyoa sakaya - ra .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Parabaja , Yesus momako ' hi lolo ue mpototoaka - ra .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Pehilo - ra ana ' guru - na ria to momako ' hi lolo ue , wilingkoroa - ramo , pai ' ra ' uli ' : " Etu tope ' ekahi ! " Me ' au - ramo nakeni eka ' - ra .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Ncaliu na ' uli ' - raka Yesus : " Pakaroho nono - ni ! Neo ' me ' eka ' ! Aku ' - mile toi - e . "

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Ane Iko mpu ' u - mi tetu - e Pue ' , kio ' wo ' o - a - kuwo tilou momako ' hi lolo ue . "

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Tumai - moko ! " Pehompo - nami Petrus ngkai rala sakaya , momako ' hi lolo ue mpototopa Yesus .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Aga kanahilo - na bohe rahi ngolu ' hi rano , me ' eka ' - imi , pai ' katenoo - nonoa ' - imi . Kamekio ' - nami : " Tulungi - a - kuwo Pue ' ! "

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Kana ' ulu - nami Yesus pale - na mpentoe Petrus , na ' uli ' - ki : " Kura ' rahi - kona pepangala ' - nu ! Napa pai ' morara ' nono - nu ! "

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Kangkahe ' - ra hi rala sakaya , ncaliu ora - mi ngolu ' - na .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Ana ' guru - na to hi rala sakaya toe mponyompa - i , ra ' uli ' : " Makono mpu ' u , Ana ' Alata ' ala - ko ! "

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Karata - ra hi dipo rano , mencore - ramo hi tana ' to rahanga ' Genesaret .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Kara ' inca - na pue ' ngata ria Yesus hi ngata - ra , ratolele - mi hilou hi ngata - ngata to mohu ' , alaa - na hawe ' ea to peda ' rakeni - ki Yesus .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Merapi ' - ra hi Yesus , bona napiliu - ra mporeo nau ' kampa ' wuntu baju - na - wadi . Hawe ' ea to mporeo baju - na , haliu mo ' uri ' - ramo .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Hangkani , ria - ra to Parisi hante guru agama Yahudi ngkai Yerusalem mpohirua ' - ki Yesus . Rakamaro - i , ra ' uli ' :

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: " Napa - di pai ' ana ' guru - nu mpotiboki ada totu ' a - tae ? Hangaa ngkoni ' - ramo , uma - ra mowano ncala ' ntuku ' atura . "

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Bangku ' koi ' - koiwoe ' , napa pai ' nitiboki parenta Alata ' ala hi kampotuku ' - ni ada - ni moto !

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' : ` Kana tabila ' tuama pai ' tina - ta . ' Pai ' na ' uli ' wo ' o : ` Hema to mpotipo ' tuama ba tina - na kana rapatehi . '

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: Hiaa ' koi ' metudui ' hewa toi : uma - pi mingki ' tabila ' tina pai ' tuama - ta , asala ta ' uli ' - raka hewa toi : ` Napa to masipato ' kuwai ' - kokoi totu ' a , mpolia ' kutonu - mi hi Alata ' ala . ' Jadi ' , Lolita Alata ' ala uma nisaile ' . Ada - ni moto to nipomobohe .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Hi mali - na - wadi petuku ' - ni hi Alata ' ala tetu - e ! Makono mpu ' u lolita nabi Yesaya owi to mpolowa - koi , hewa toi moni - na :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Alata ' ala : ` Tauna tohe ' era mpobila ' - a hi wiwi - ra - wadi , nono - ra molaa ngkai Aku ' .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Uma ria kalaua - ra mpopue ' - a , apa ' tudui ' - ra tudui ' manusia ' - wadi , bela tudui ' ngkai Aku ' . ' "

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpokio ' tauna to wori ' mpomohui ' - i , na ' uli ' - raka : " Epe - koi bona ni ' inca :

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Pongkoni ' to mesua ' hi nganga - ta , bela - hawo toe to mpakada ' a - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala . Lolita to mehupa ' ngkai nganga - ta , toe - die to mpakada ' a - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala - e . "

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Ngkai ree , tumai - ramo ana ' guru - na mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Nu ' inca wa kapeda ' nono - ra to Parisi mpo ' epe lolita - nue we ' i ? "

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Pelele ' - ramo to Parisi toera lou ! Apa ' butu nyala hinu ' a to uma nahu ' a Tuama - ku to hi rala suruga , bate rawuka . To Parisi toe - rale hewa pangkeni to wero , apa ' uma ra ' incai ohea to makono hilou hi Alata ' ala . Pai ' ane towero mpotete ' hingka towero - na , bate moluli ' roduaa - ra mpai ' hi rala kinali . "

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Guru , notohi - kakai lolita rapa ' tetu - e we ' i . "

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ha uma oa ' - di nipaha - e !

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Pongkoni ' to mesua ' hi rala nganga - tale kaliliu hi rala ta ' i - ta , pai ' ngkai ree kaliliu tatadi . Bela - hawo toe to mpakada ' a - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala - e .

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Aga lolita to dada ' a to mehuwu ngkai rala nono - ta pai ' to howa ' hi wiwi - ta , toe - mi to mpakada ' a tauna hi poncilo Alata ' ala .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Apa ' ngkai rala nono pehupaa ' pekiri to dada ' a , pai ' alaa - na ria to mepatehi , mobualo ' , mogau ' sala ' hi tobine ba tomane , manako , mosabi ' boa ' pai ' metipo ' .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Kehi to hewa toe - mi lau to mpakada ' a tauna hi poncilo Alata ' ala . Ane ngkoni ' uma leba ' mowano , bela - hawo toe to mpakada ' a tauna hi poncilo Alata ' ala . "

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Ngkai ree hilou - imi Yesus hi tana ' to mohu ' ngata Tirus pai ' Sidon .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Ria hadua tobine to Kanaan , bela - i to Yahudi . Tobine toei tumai hi Yesus ntora mekio ' , na ' uli ' : " Pue ' , muli Magau ' Daud ! Poka ' ahi ' - a - kuwo ! Ana ' - ku tobine kahawia ' seta , hangaa uma - ipi katonoa toe - e ria . "

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Uma - i winihi Yesus . Tumai ana ' guru - na mpomohui ' - i , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , popalai - i tobine tetui , daa ' kakakio ' - kio ' - i mpotuku ' - ta . "

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus hi tobine toei : " Alata ' ala mpohubui - a tumai mpotulungi muli to Israel - wadi , apa ' hewa bima to puha - ramo , uma - rapa mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala . "

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Ngkai ree , tumai lau - imi tobine toei motingkua ' hi nyanyoa Yesus , mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , tulungi - a - kuwo ! "

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma lompe ' mpo ' ala ' koni ' ana ' pai ' rarora - ki dike ' . "

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Na ' uli ' tobine toei : " Makono moto - di Pue ' , aga biasa moto - hawo dike ' ngkoni ' rupu ' koni ' to mohewu ' ngkai lolo meja ' hi tomi pue ' - na . "

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Bohe mpu ' u pepangala ' - nu , totina ! Wae - pi , jadi ' - mi hewa konoa - nu . " Hinto ' u toe , mo ' uri ' mpu ' u - imi ana ' - na .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Oti toe , me ' ongko ' wo ' o - imi Yesus ngkai ree , mako ' mewiwi ' rano Galilea . Manake ' - i lou hi bulu ' - na , pai ' - i mohura metudui ' .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Mo ' iko tauna mpotoa ' - i , ngkeni to pungku , to keru , to wero , to uma howa ' mololita pai ' to peda ' ntani ' - na wo ' o . Ratu ' u - ra hi nyanyoa Yesus , pai ' napaka ' uri ' - ra .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Konce - ramo ntodea mpohilo hawe ' ea tauna to napaka ' uri ' Yesus : tauna to uma howa ' mololita , howa ' - mi mololita , to keru mo ' uri ' - mi , to pungku momako ' - mi , to wero pehilo - mi . Toe pai ' mpobila ' - ramo Alata ' ala to rapue ' to Israel .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpokio ' ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' - raka : " Tuna - kuna nono - ku mpohilo tauna to wori ' toera lau . Tolu eo - ramo dohe - ku , uma ria pongkoni ' - ra . Uma lau nono - ku mpohubui - ra nculii ' ntali oro ' - ra , molinga ' - ra mpai ' hi ohea . "

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - na : " Beiwa - mile , apa ' wao ' - di hi rehe ' i - e lau . Tarata hiapa - mile pongkoni ' tapokoni ' - raka tauna to hewa toe lau kawori ' - rae ? "

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Yesus mpekune ' - ra : " Hangkuja roti to ria hi koi ' - e ? " Ratompoi ' - i : " Pitu meha ' , pai ' bau ' uru to kedi ' ba hangkuja ma ' a - wadi . "

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Ngkai ree nahubui - ramo tauna to wori ' mohura hi tana ' .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Na ' ala ' - mi roti to pitu pai ' bau ' kedi ' to ba hangkuja ma ' a toe , pai ' - i mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala . Oti toe napihe - pihe - mi pai ' nawai ' - raka ana ' guru - na bona rabagi - raka tauna to wori ' toera .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Ngkoni ' - ramo omea duu ' - ra bohu . Ka ' oti - ra ngkoni ' , ana ' guru - na mporumpu toro - na , pitu luncu - pi .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Kawori ' - ra to ngkoni ' nto ' u toe , opo ' ncobu tomane , uma tebila ' tobine pai ' ana ' .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Oti toe , nahubui - ramo nculii ' hilou hi tomi - ra , pai ' - i mpohawi ' sakaya hilou hi tana ' Magadan .
