text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Ria wo ' o ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai ' to Saduki rata hi Yesus doko ' mposori - i . Merapi ' - ra hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Babehi anu to mekoncehi bona monoto ki ' inca kangkai Alata ' ala - nu . "

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane neo ' limpa - mi eo pai ' mperelei langi ' , ni ' uli ' : ` Morawa mpai ' raoa . '

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Ane mepupulo ni ' uli ' : ` Udaa mpai ' toi - e , bo mperelei pai ' mojimuu ' - di oo lau . ' Ni ' inca lia mpelence raoa . Aga uma ni ' incai mpelence napa to nababehi Alata ' ala tempo toi .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Uma mowo kadada ' a - ni , nisapuaka oa ' - pidi Alata ' ala ! Merapi ' - koi tanda mekoncehi . Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi - kokoi . Sampale - wadi to rapopohiloi - kokoi , tanda hewa to jadi ' hi nabi Yunus owi . " Oti toe malai - imi mpalahii - ra .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Hilou - ramo Yesus hante ana ' guru - na medipo rano , aga ana ' guru - na uma mpokiwoi ngkeni boku . Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka :

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: " Pelompehi , mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi hi ragi to Parisi pai ' to Saduki - e ' ! "

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Aga uma ra ' incai batua - na walatu toe , helee momepololitai moto - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Pai ' na ' uli ' hewa toe - le , apa ' uma takiwoi ngkeni roti we ' i . "

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Ntaa ' na ' inca - di Yesus napa to ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - nae , toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' ntora mpololita ka ' uma - ni ngkeni roti - e ! Kura ' rahi pepangala ' - ni !

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Ko ' ia oa ' - tano nipaha - e ! Ha uma - pi nikiwoi roti to lima meha ' to kupokoni ' - raka tauna to lima ncobu - e ? Pai ' hangkuja luncu - pi toro - na to nirumpu ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Pai ' beiwa wo ' o hante roti to pitu meha ' kupokoni ' - raka tauna to opo ' ncobu - e ? Hangkuja luncu wo ' o - pi toro - na to nirumpu ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Napa pai ' uma oa ' nipaha kabela - na roti mpu ' u to ku ' uli ' - e ! Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi hi ragi to Parisi pai ' to Saduki . "

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Lako ' ra ' inca - di we ' i ana ' guru - nae kabela - na ragi to ragalo - ki roti to na ' uli ' Yesus - e . Patuju lolita - na , bona mo ' inga ' - inga ' - ra hi tudui ' to Parisi pai ' to Saduki .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Hilou - ramo Yesus hante ana ' guru - na hi tana ' to mohu ' hi Kaisarea Filipi . Hi ree mepekune ' Yesus hi ana ' guru - na : " Ntuku ' ponguli ' - ra ntodea , hema - a Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' toi - e ? "

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Ratompoi ' ana ' guru - na : " Ria - ra to mpo ' uli ' Yohanes Topeniu ' - ko tuwu ' nculii ' . Ria wo ' o - ra to mpo ' uli ' Iko hadua nabi to owi mehupa ' nculii ' , hewa nabi Elia , nabi Yeremia , ba nabi to ntani ' - na . "

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Napekune ' tena - ra , na ' uli ' : " Hiaa ' koi ' - koiwo mpo ' uli ' hema - a Aku ' toi - e ? "

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Natompoi ' Simon Petrus : " Iko - mile Magau ' Topetolo ' - e , Ana ' Alata ' ala to Tuwu ' . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Marasi ' mpu ' u - ko , Simon ana ' Yunus , apa ' bela manusia ' to mpopo ' incai - ko tetu - e , Tuama - ku to hi rala suruga - hana .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Jadi ' , toe pai ' rahanga ' Petrus - ko - - batua - na ` watu . ' Pai ' hi lolo parawatu tohe ' i kuwangu tomi - ku - - batua - na , kurumpu hawe ' ea tauna to mpopangala ' - a . Hawe ' ea kuasa anudaa ' uma mpokulei ' mpodagi - ra .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Kuwai ' - ko kuasa mpototu ' ai ntodea Alata ' ala . Napa to nubotuhi hi dunia ' , tetu wo ' o to nabotuhi Alata ' ala hi rala suruga : Ane nu ' uli ' neo ' , Alata ' ala - mi to mpo ' uli ' neo ' . Ane nu ' uli ' ma ' ala moto , Alata ' ala - mi to mpo ' uli ' ma ' ala moto . "

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Neo ' ulu ni ' uli ' hi hema - hema ka ' Aku ' - na Magau ' Topetolo ' . "

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Ntepu ' u ngkai tempo toe , Yesus mpakanoto hi ana ' guru - na napa to kana jadi ' hi woto - na . Na ' uli ' - raka : " Kana hilou - a hi Yerusalem . Hi ria mpai ' totu ' a ngata , imam pangkeni hante guru - guru agama mpobalinai ' - a pai ' mposesa ' - a . Rapatehi - a mpai ' , aga hi eo katolu - na tuwu ' nculii ' moto - a . "

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Aga Petrus mpo ' ai ' - i hi ncori - na pai ' nakorai ' - i na ' uli ' : " Neo ' Pue ' ! Kuperapi ' hi Alata ' ala bona nawi ' iha tetu lau ngkai Pue ' . "

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Hampe ' ili ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Palai - ko topesori ! Doko ' nulawa ' - a , bona ngalai ' neo ' - a mpotuku ' konoa Tuama - ku ? Pekiri - nu tetu - le pekiri manusia ' , bela pekiri Alata ' ala . "

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Hema to doko ' mpotuku ' - a kana mpobahaka konoa - na moto , pai ' kana napaha ' a kaju parika ' - na - - batua - na : kana natuku ' hawa ' - ku nau ' napopate - ki . Oti toe - di pai ' lako ' ma ' ala - i mpotuku ' - a .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Hema to mpentaei konoa - na moto , uma - i mpai ' mporatai katuwua ' to lompe ' . Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa - na moto sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' , nau ' napopate - ki , hi ' a mpai ' to mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Napa kalaua - na tarumpu hawe ' ea ka ' uaa ' dunia ' , ane uma taratai katuwua ' to lompe ' hi eo mpeno - na . Apa ' uma ria napa - napa to ma ' ala tasula ' - ki katuwua ' to lompe ' toe .

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Bate rata mpai ' tempo - na , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' tumai ngkai suruga mpopehuwu kabaraka ' - ku , to hewa kabaraka ' Tuama - ku , pai ' wori ' wo ' o mala ' eka mpodohei - a . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , bate kuhiwili kehi butu - butu dua tauna .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Mpu ' u - mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ngkai olo ' - ni koi ' toi , ria - koi mpai ' to ko ' ia mate kako ' ia - na nihilo - a , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , rata jadi ' Magau ' . "

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Ono mengi ngkai ree , Yesus mpobawai tolu ana ' guru - na hilou dohe - na hi bulu ' to molangko . Ana ' guru to tolu toera : Petrus , Yakobus pai ' Yohanes ompi ' - na Yakobus . Muntu ' Yesus hante ana ' guru - na to tolu toera - wadi to hi ria .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Bula - ra hi ria , mobali ' - mi lence - na . Lio - na mehini hewa eo , pai ' pohea - na mengea ' meringkila ' .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Muu - mule ' rahilo - rawo ana ' guru - nae , ria wo ' o rodua nabi to owi mpololitai Yesus . Nabi to rodua toera , Musa pai ' Elia .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Ngkai ree Petrus mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Pue ' , lompe ' lia - ta mo ' oha ' hi rehe ' i . Ane nupokono Pue ' , kubabehi tolu bamaru ' hi rehe ' i : hameha ' bagia - nu Pue ' , hameha ' bagia - na Musa pai ' hameha ' wo ' o bagia - na Elia . "

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Bula - na mololita - pidi Petrus , muu - mule ' hompo - mi limu ' to mehini mpokamoui - ra , pai ' ngkai rala limu ' toe mpo ' epe - ra topololita to mpo ' uli ' : " Hi ' a toi - mi Ana ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' . Hi ' a mpakagoe ' nono - ku . Pe ' epei - mi lolita - na ! "

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Wae kara ' epe - na ana ' guru - na lolita toe , tetumpopo ' - ramo hi tana ' apa ' me ' eka ' lia - ra .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Tumai - i Yesus mpoganga - ra , na ' uli ' - raka : " Memata - mokoi , neo ' me ' eka ' ! "

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Kamenaa - ra , uma - pi ria hewa to rahilo - e we ' i , muntu ' Yesus - damo .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Pana ' u - ra ngkai lolo bulu ' toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' ulu ni ' uli ' hi hema - hema napa to nihilo we ' i duu ' - na Aku ' , Ana ' Manusia ' , rapotuwu ' nculii ' ngkai kamatea . "

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Mepekune ' - ramo ana ' guru - na , ra ' uli ' : " Napa pai ' guru agama mpo ' uli ' nabi Elia ncala ' - di to ri ' ulu rata , pai ' lako ' rata - idi Magau ' Topetolo ' - e ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u - di , Elia kana rata mperi ' ulu , apa ' hi ' a to mporodo hawe ' ea - na .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Aga ku ' uli ' - kokoi , mpolia ' rata - imile Elia - e , aga pangkeni ngata - ta uma mpo ' incai - i . Ra ' ewa lau - idi ntuku ' konoa - ra . Wae wo ' o mpai ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' ra ' ewa ntuku ' konoa - ra . "

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Ngkai ree , rapaha - mi ana ' guru - na lolita Yesus - e we ' i : to rarapai ' - ki nabi Elia , hi ' a - mi Yohanes Topeniu ' .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Kanculii ' - ra Yesus hante ana ' guru - na to tolu toera mpohirua ' - raka ntodea , ria hadua tomane tumai mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa - na , mpo ' uli ' - ki :

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: " Pue ' , poka ' ahi ' - ka - kuwo ana ' - ku . Mohaki ' limpuangaa - i , pai ' jau - i molimpu ' nakeni haki ' - na . Jau - i modungka hi rala apu , jau wo ' o - i modungka hi rala ue .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Kukeni - imi hi ana ' guru - nu , aga uma - di rapakulei ' mpaka ' uri ' - i . "

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma mowo - koie ' ! Ko ' ia oa ' - tano mepangala ' - koie ! Mesapuaka oa ' - pidi - koi mposapuaka konoa Alata ' ala ! Ni ' uli ' - koina hangkuja tena - pi kahae - ku dohe - ni , hangkuja tena - pi kahae - na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala ' - nie ! Keni tumai ana ' tetui ! "

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpopetibo ' anudaa ' to mpopedahi ana ' toei . Palai - nami anudaa ' , pai ' mo ' uri ' - imi - hawo topeda ' toei .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Oti toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na malai ngkai ree , pai ' ana ' guru - na mpekune ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Guru , napa pai ' uma kipakulei ' mpopalai anudaa ' toei - e we ' i ? "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Wae moto - hawo - le , apa ' hangkedi ' rahi pepangala ' - nie . Ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ane rii - ria - mi pepangala ' - ta nau ' hangkutuno ' - wadi , uma ria to uma - na madupa ' . Ma ' ala ta ' uli ' - ki bulu ' toe mai : ` Mentoli - ko ngkai retu ! ' bate mentoli - ile . ( (

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Aga seta to hewa toe we ' i , sampale - i malai ane mosampaya pai ' mopuasa ' - koi . ) ) "

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Nto ' u Yesus hante topetuku ' - na morumpu hi Galilea , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ratonu - a mpai ' hi kuasa manusia ' .

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Rapatehi - a mpai ' , aga hi eo katolu - na tuwu ' nculii ' - a . " Peda ' lia - mi nono topetuku ' - na mpo ' epe lolita - na .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Karata - na Yesus hante topetuku ' - na hi ngata Kapernaum , rata to mpesingarai ' paja ' Tomi Alata ' ala hi Petrus pai ' mpekune ' - i : " Ha nabayari moto - hawo Guru - ni paja ' Tomi Alata ' ala - e , ba uma - di ? "

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Nabayari moto ! " Ngkai ree , nculii ' - imi Simon Petrus hilou hi tomi po ' ohaa ' - ra . Rata hi ria , ko ' ia - di napoka ' alai mololita - e , ncaliu Yesus - mi mpekune ' - i : " Simon , beiwa - kowo pomporata - nu : hema to kana mpobayari paja ' pai ' pepue ' hi raja to mpokuasai ngata doo ? Ntodea - na moto - di , ba pue ' ngata to nakuasai - di ? "

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Tantu pue ' ngata to nakuasai to kana mpobayari . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane wae , ntodea - na moto uma mingki ' mpobayari . Wae wo ' o kita ' to jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala , uma - ta mingki ' mpobayari paja ' Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , agina mobayari moto - tamo , bona neo ' kedi ' nono - ra hi kita ' . Jadi ' , hilou - moko hi rano mopeka . Ala ' bau ' uru to lomo ' - na nupeka . Nurata doi hi rala nganga - na hono ' pobayari paja ' hi kita ' rodua . Ala ' doi tetu , pai ' nubayari - ki paja ' Tomi Alata ' ala . "

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Hinto ' u toe , tumai - ra ana ' guru Yesus mpomohui ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Pue ' , ane jadi ' Magau ' - poko mpai ' , hema to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - nu ? "

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Yesus mpokio ' hadua ana ' to kedi ' , napopokore hi laintongo ' - ra ,

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ane uma nibalii ' kehi - ni pai ' jadi ' hewa ana ' to kedi ' toii , uma - koi mpai ' jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Hema to mpakadingki ' nono - na pai ' jadi ' hewa ana ' to kedi ' tohe ' ii , hi ' a - mi to bohe mpu ' u tuwu ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea ntodea Alata ' ala .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Hema to mpotarima hadua ana ' to kedi ' hewa ana ' toii sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' , batua - na Aku ' - mi to natarima .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: " Aga hema to mpopanawu ' hadua ana ' to kedi ' alaa - na uma - ipi mepangala ' hi Aku ' , bohe mpu ' u pehuku ' Alata ' ala hi tauna tetui . Agina lau - pi hameha ' watu po ' ahaa ' to bohe ratoe hi wuroko ' - na pai ' - i ratene ' hi rala tahi ' .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Silaka tauna hi dunia ' toi , apa ' wori ' to mpopanawu ' - ra . Bate ria mpu ' u - di to mepanawu ' - e , aga silaka - ra tauna to mepanawu ' toera .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: " Ane rapa ' - na pale - ta hamali ba witi ' - ta hamali to mpakeni - ta mojeko ' , pua ' lau - mi pai ' petadi . Agina hamali - damo pale - ta ba witi ' - ta , asala mporata - ta katuwua ' to lompe ' dohe Alata ' ala . Agina lau - pi toe , ngkai palea ntimalia pai ' witia ' ntimalia , hiaa ' ka ' omea - na ratadi - ta hi rala apu to jela ' ncuu .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Pai ' ane rapa ' - na mata - ta hamali to mpakeni - ta mojeko ' , jungki ' pai ' petadi . Agina hamali - wadi mata - ta pai ' mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' moto - ta dohe Alata ' ala , ngkai mataa ntimalia , hiaa ' ka ' omea - na ratadi - ta hi rala apu naraka .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: " Jadi ' , pelompehi mpu ' u - koi , neo ' - koi uma mposaile ' ana ' - ana ' to kedi ' hewa ana ' tohe ' ii , nau ' hadua . Apa ' mpu ' u - mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : mala ' eka to mpodoo - ra tida ncuu hi nyanyoa Tuama - ku to hi rala suruga . ( (

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Apa ' patuju - ku Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' tumai hi dunia ' , bona mpopali ' tauna to molaa ngkai Alata ' ala pai ' mpohore - ra ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra . ) )

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: " Beiwa pomporata - ni ? Ria hadua tauna to ria bima - na ha ' atu ma ' a - na . Ane moronto hama ' a , napa to nababehi ? Tantu napalahii bima - na to sio mpulu ' sio hi panapa bulu ' , pai ' - i hilou mpopali ' to hama ' a to moronto toei .

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Pai ' ane narua ' nculii ' - ipi , mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi meliu - mi kagoe ' - na mpokagoe ' bima to hama ' a toei , ngkai bima - na to sio mpulu ' sio to uma - ra - rana moronto .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Wae wo ' o Tuama - ni hi rala suruga , uma napokonoi ane ria hadua ngkai ana ' to kedi ' toi to molaa ngkai Hi ' a .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: " Ane ria ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta to masala ' hi kita ' , hilou - ta mpohirua ' - ki , pai ' uli ' - ki sala ' - na . Tababehi toe hante uma ria to ngincai , muntu ' kita ' tau rodua - wadi . Ane napangala ' lolita - ta , lompe ' nculii ' - mi pohintuwu ' - ta .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Aga ane uma - i dota mpangala ' lolita - ta , po ' ema ' hadua ba rodua dohe - ta hilou mpololitai - i . Apa ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' owi te ' uki ' hewa toi : ` Ane ria tauna to rapakilu mpobabehi sala ' , kana ria nte rodua ba tolu to jadi ' sabi ' , bona monoa ' - mi kara - kara - na . '

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Ane uma - i dota mpangala ' lolita sabi ' toera , bua ' - imi hi hawe ' ea ompi ' hampepangalaa ' . Ane uma oa ' napangalai ' nau ' hawe ' ea ompi ' hampepangalaa ' mpoparesai ' - i , pelele ' lau - imi - hana , taponcawa hewa tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala lau - imi , pai ' hewa tauna to dada ' a kehi - ra .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: " Penonoi - koi ! Napa to nibotuhi hi dunia ' , tetu wo ' o to nabotuhi Alata ' ala hi rala suruga : Ane koi ' mpo ' uli ' neo ' , Alata ' ala - mi to mpo ' uli ' neo ' . Ane koi ' mpo ' uli ' ma ' ala moto , Alata ' ala - mi to mpo ' uli ' ma ' ala moto .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ku ' uli ' wo ' o : ane ria - koi hi dunia ' toi nte rodua to hintuwu ' mekakae mperapi ' ba napa - napa , posampaya - ni toe natompoi ' Tuama - ku to hi rala suruga .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Apa ' hiapa tauna morumpu sabana Aku ' , nau ' rodua ba tolu - ra - wadi , ria - a dohe - ra . "

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Oti toe , Petrus mpomohui ' Yesus pai ' mpekune ' - i , na ' uli ' : " Pue ' , ane ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ku masala ' hi aku ' , hangkuja ngkani kana ku ' ampungi - i ? Nte pitu ngkani ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma wule ' pitu ngkani - wadi . Nau ' mo ' atu - atu ngkani - nai masala ' hi kita ' , kana ta ' ampungi - i .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Apa ' Alata ' ala hewa magau ' to hi rala lolita rapa ' toi : Ria hadua magau ' doko ' mpowile inta batua - na .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Lomo ' - na , ria hadua batua rakeni hi nyanyoa - na to mo ' inta hi juta - na .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Uma mpu ' u - hawo nakulei ' mpobayari inta - na toe . Jadi ' , mohawa ' - mi magau ' toei , na ' uli ' : ` Pobalu ' lau - imi batua tetui hante ana ' - na pai ' tobine - na pai ' hawe ' ea rewa - na , pobayari - ki inta - na . '

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: " Powingkotu ' - nami batua toei hi nyanyoa magau ' , mpopepoka ' ahi ' , na ' uli ' : ` Mosabara - ko Magau ' , kubayari moto - kuwo mpai ' inta - ku ! '

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: " Ngkai ree , metumu ' lau - mi ahi ' - na magau ' mpoka ' ahi ' batua - na toei . Nabahaka - imi pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : ` Inta - nu , uma - pi mingki ' nubayari . '

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: " Palai - na batua toei , napohirua ' - ki hadua hingka batua - na to mo ' inta hi hi ' a hi ncobu - na - wadi . Napentoe doo - na toei , nabaga ' pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : ` Bayari omea - mi inta - nu ! '

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: " Powingkotu ' - nami - hawo doo - na toei mpopepoka ' ahi ' , na ' uli ' : ` Mosabara - ko ulu bale , kubayari moto - kuwo mpai ' inta - ku ! '

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Aga uma napangalai ' pomperapia ' - na toe . Napopesua ' lau - imi hi rala tarungku ' duu ' - na tebayari omea inta - na .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: " Karahilo - na batua to ntani ' - na napa to jadi ' tohe ' e , peda ' lia - mi - rawo nono - ra . Hilou - ramo hi magau ' mpo ' uli ' kehi batua toei - e we ' i .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Mpo ' epe toe we ' i , kamoroe - nami magau ' . Mpohubui - i tauna hilou mpokio ' batua to dada ' a gau ' - na tohe ' ei . Karata - na , na ' uli ' - ki : ` Dada ' a lia - ko ! Inta - nu kupori - mi ngkai rala buku - ku , apa ' moranempale - moko hi aku ' .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Napa - di - kona pai ' uma nupoka ' ahi ' hingka batua - nu , hewa aku ' mpoka ' ahi ' - koe ! '

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Uma - pi mowo roe - na magau ' . Batua to dada ' a gau ' - na toei napopesua ' hi rala tarungku ' duu ' - na tebayari oti inta - na . "

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa ' toe , na ' uli ' : " Wae wo ' o Tuama - ku to hi rala suruga mpobabehi hi koi ' - e , ane uma - koi mpo ' ampungi doo - ni ngkai nono - ni mpu ' u . "

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Kahudu - na Yesus mpololita hawe ' ea toe , malai - imi ngkai tana ' Galilea hilou hi tana ' Yudea to hi dipo ue Yordan .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Wori ' tauna mpotuku ' - i , pai ' to peda ' napaka ' uri ' .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi tumai mposori Yesus . Rapekune ' - i : " Ntuku ' atura agama - ta , ba ma ' ala moto - hawo tomane mpogaa ' - ki tobine - na nau ' to uma kojerea ' ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Kiwoi napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' owi : lomo ' - na Topejadi ' mpajadi ' hadua tomane pai ' hadua tobine .

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Pai ' oti toe na ' uli ' : ` Tomane kana mpalahii tina pai ' tuama - na , pai ' kana tuwu ' hintuwu ' hante tobine - na , bona hira ' tau rodua toe jadi ' hewa hadua lau - ra - damo . '

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Jadi ' , hi poncilo Alata ' ala , tau hancamoko uma - pi rodua , hadua lau - ramo . Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ane ntoa ' Alata ' ala mpoposidai ' - ra , manusia ' uma ma ' ala mpogaa ' - ra . "

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Mehono ' - ra to Parisi : " Ane wae , napa pai ' Musa mohawa ' bona tomane mpowai ' sura pogaa ' hi tobine , ane doko ' napogaa ' - ki ? "

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Musa mpiliu - koi mogaa ' - le , apa ' ngkai kamotu ' a nono - ni , uma tuduia ' . Aga kakoo - kono - na , uma hewa toe ngkai lomo ' - na .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Bona ni ' inca : hema to mpogaa ' - ki tobine - na pai ' - i motobinei to ntani ' - na , mobualo ' - i - hana . Sampale - di ane mobualo ' tobine - nae , ma ' ala - mi napogaa ' - ki . "

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Ngkai ree , ana ' guru - na mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Ane wae - di kamokoro - na ada poncamoko , agina lau - pi - hawo neo ' ncamoko . "

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma hawe ' ea tauna bisa ntarima lolita tetu . Aga ria moto tauna to napakatantu Alata ' ala bona uma - ra ncamoko .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Ria tauna to uma ncamoko apa ' lawi ' hewa toe - hawo ngkai kaputu - ra . Ria wo ' o to uma ncamoko apa ' babehia tau ntani ' - na . Ria wo ' o to uma ncamoko apa ' lawi ' kadota - ra moto - rawo , bona mologa - ra mpobago bago Alata ' ala . Hema to mpakule ' mpotuku ' tudui ' toi , lompe ' ane natuku ' . "

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Hangkani , ria tauna to mpokeni ana ' - ra hi Yesus bona najama - ra pai ' naposampayai . Aga ana ' guru - na mpokaroe tauna toera .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Pelele ' moto - ra ana ' tetura tumai hi Aku ' , neo ' - ra nitagi . Apa ' tauna to hewa toe - ramo to jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . "

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Ngkai ree , najama - ramo ana ' toera , pai ' - ra nagane ' . Oti toe , malai - imi ngkai ree .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Hangkani , ria hadua tomane rata hi Yesus mpopekune ' - i : " Guru , kehi napa to lompe ' kana kubabehi bona mporata - a katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - nae ? "

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa pai ' nupekune ' - a beiwa kehi to lompe ' - e ? Uma ria ntani ' - na to lompe ' , hadua Alata ' ala - wadi . Ane doko ' mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' - ko , tuku ' - mi parenta Alata ' ala . "

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Mepekune ' tena - i tau tohe ' ei : " Parenta to ' uma ? " Natompoi ' Yesus : " Neo ' mepatehi , neo ' mobualo ' , neo ' manako , neo ' mosabi ' boa ' ,

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: kana tabila ' tina tuama - ta , pai ' poka ' ahi ' doo - ta hewa kampoka ' ahi ' - ta woto - ta moto . "

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Na ' uli ' kabilasa toei : " Hawe ' ea parenta tetu lau , kutuku ' omea - mi . Napa - pi to kana kubabehi ? "

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane doko ' - ko mpotuku ' Alata ' ala hante karoli ' - roli ' nono - nu , lou - moko ulu mpobalu ' rewa - nu , pai ' doi oli - na wai ' - raka tokabu . Ane nubabehi hewa toe , bohe mpai ' rasi ' to nurata hi rala suruga . Oti toe , pai ' tumai - moko mpotuku ' - a . "

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe we ' i , kapeda ' - nami nono - na pai ' - i malai - mi , apa ' wori ' rewa - na .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus hi ana ' guru - na : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : mokoro rahi tauna to mo ' ua ' jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ku ' uli ' wo ' o : mojoli - pi hama ' a unta ntara hi wulou ' jaru ngkai tauna to mo ' ua ' mengkoru hi Alata ' ala bona Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ra . "

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Kara ' epe ana ' guru - na lolita Yesus toe , rapokakonce lia , ra ' uli ' : " Ei ' , ane wae - di , hema lau - damo to ma ' ala mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - nae ! "

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Yesus mponaa - ra pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ane hante pakulea ' manusia ' - le , uma ami ' hema . Aga ane Alata ' ala , uma ria to uma napakule ' . "

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi - hawo Petrus : " Hiaa ' kai ' , kipalahii omea - mi - kaina bona mpotuku ' - ko . Hiwili napa mpai ' to kirata ? "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : hi eo mpeno - na nto ' u Alata ' ala mpobo ' ui omea , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' mohura hi pohuraa to ncola moparenta . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , koi ' to mpotuku ' - a toi - e , mohura wo ' o - ko - koiwo hi pohuraa to hampulu ' romeha ' , mpoparentai to Israel to hampulu ' rontina .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Hema - hema to mpalahii ompi ' - na , tuama - na ba tina - na , ana ' - na ba tomi - na ba bonea - na sabana mpotuku ' - a , bate mporata - i mpai ' ha ' atu ngkani hiwili - na , pai ' mporata wo ' o - i katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Aga wori ' tauna to bohe tuwu ' - ra tempo toi jadi ' kedi ' tuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno . Pai ' wori ' wo ' o tauna to kedi ' tuwu ' - ra tempo toi jadi ' bohe tuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno . "

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' , kajadi ' - na hewa lolita rapa ' tohe ' i : Hadua pue ' bonea anggur hilou mpopali ' tauna to dota mobago hi bonea - na . Mepupulo modao ' - i mporua ' tauna ,

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: na ' uli ' - raka : ` Hilou - koi mobago hi bonea - ku , kuwai ' - koi hore hampepa ' doi pera ' gaji ' - ni ha ' eo . ' Rapo ' io ' - mi lolita - na toe , hilou mpu ' u - ramo .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Jaa sio , hilou wo ' o - imi mpali ' to ntani ' - na , nahilo ba hangkuja dua tauna ntora - ntora hi wiwi ' karajaa .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : ` Hilou - koi mobago hi bonea - ku , kuwai ' moto - koi gaji ' to masipato ' . ' Hilou mpu ' u - ramo - rawo .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Tebua ' eo , hilou wo ' o - imi mpopali ' tauna , na ' uli ' - raka : ` Hilou - koi mobago hi bonea - ku . ' Wae wo ' o jaa tolu libe eo .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: " Ncimonou ' - mi , ba neo ' jaa lima , modao ' wo ' o - imi mporua ' tauna to ntora . Napekune ' - ra : ` Napa pai ' ntora - ntora mara - wadi - koi ha ' eoa , uma - ko - koina mobago - e ? '

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: " Ratompoi ' - i : ` Apa ' uma hema to mpopobago - kai . ' " Na ' uli ' pue ' bonea toei : ` Ane wae , hilou - mokoi mobago hi bonea - ku . ' Hilou mpu ' u - ramo - rawo .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: " Limpa - mi eo , na ' uli ' - mi pue ' bonea hi mantoro ' - na : ` Kio ' - ramo topobago toera ria , pai ' wai ' - ramo gaji ' - ra . Wai ' ulu gaji ' hi tauna to lako ' ntepu ' u mobago jaa lima we ' i . Oti toe , wai ' gaji ' hi tauna to ntepu ' u mobago jaa tolu , duu ' rata hi tauna to mobago ngkai mepuloa . '

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: " Tumai mpu ' u - ramo to mobago ntepu ' u jaa lima ncimonou ' , mporata - ramo gaji ' himpau hampepa ' doi pera ' .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Kawae - kawae - na duu ' - na rata wo ' o - ra - rawo to mobago ngkai mepuloa - e ngone . To mobago ngkai mepulo toera mpo ' uli ' hi rala nono - ra : ` Tantu meliu mpai ' to nawai ' - taka kita ' , apa ' ha ' eoa - ta - tana mobago ! ' Ntaa ' we ' i , bate hampepa ' doi pera ' wo ' o - wadi - rawo to rarata - e .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Kampohilo - ra gaji ' - ra tohe ' e , ngkunuti - ramo mpongkunutii pue ' bonea , ra ' uli ' :

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: ` To lako ' rata mobago hi ka ' omea - na , muntu ' hajaa - ra - wadi mobago . Hiaa ' kai ' , mobago ha ' eoa - ka - kaina , nahimai ' eo to ngkerepa ' . Napa - di pai ' nubayari - ra hibaa - balia hante kai ' ? '

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: " Hampetompoi ' pue ' bonea toei : ` Uma - a masala ' hi koi ' , bale . Ha uma pojanci - tami mporata - koi gaji ' hampepa ' doi pera ' rala - na ha ' eo ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Ala ' - mi - koiwo gaji ' - ni pai ' hilou - mokoi ! Konoa - kumi mpowai ' gaji ' hi tauna to rata ka ' omea - na hibalia hante to kuwai ' - kokoi koi ' .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Ha uma ma ' ala kubabehi ntuku ' konoa - ku hante doi - ku ? Napa pai ' mohingi ' - koi hi doo ane lompe ' nono - ku hi hira ' ? ' "

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa ' toe , na ' uli ' : " Wae wo ' o mpai ' hi eo mpeno - na : wori ' tauna to kedi ' tuwu ' - ra tempo toi jadi ' bohe tuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno . Pai ' wori ' wo ' o tauna to bohe tuwu ' - ra tempo toi jadi ' kedi ' tuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno . "

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Nto ' u toe , Yesus mako ' mpotoa ' ngata Yerusalem . Hi lengko ohea nakio ' - ra ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua morumpu mopatani ' , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: " Epe - koi ! Hilou - tamo tohe ' i - e mpotoa ' Yerusalem . Hi ria mpai ' , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' ratonu hi imam pangkeni pai ' guru agama , pai ' rabotuhi bona rapatehi - a .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Oti toe mpai ' , ratonu - a hi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi , rapopo ' ore ' , raweba ' , pai ' rapatehi - a hi kaju parika ' . Aga hi eo katolu - na tuwu ' nculii ' moto - a . "

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Nto ' u toe , rata tobine - na Zebedeus hante ana ' - na rodua hi Yesus . Motingkua ' - i hi nyanyoa - na apa ' ria to naperapi ' .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Napekune ' Yesus : " Napa to nuperapi ' - e ? " Na ' uli ' totina toei : " Pomperapia ' - kule , bona ane jadi ' Magau ' - poko mpai ' , ana ' - ku to rodua tohe ' ira mohura pai ' moparenta hangkaa - ngkania dohe - nu , hadua hi mali ka ' ana - nu , hadua hi mali ki ' ii - nu . "

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Uma ni ' incai napa to niperapi ' tetu . Ha nipakule ' mpai ' mpokolo kaparia to kana kukolo - e ? " Ratompoi ' ana ' guru to rodua toera : " Kipakule ' moto ! "

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u , bate nikolo mpai ' kaparia hewa to kukolo . Aga hema to mohura hi mali ka ' ana - ku pai ' hi mali ki ' ii - ku , bela Aku ' to mpakatantu . Tuama - ku - hana to mpakatantu hema to mporata bagia tetu . "

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Kara ' epe - na ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' pomperapia ' doo - ra to rodua toera , kamoroe - rami mpokaroe - ra .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Toe pai ' Yesus mpokio ' - ra omea pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ni ' inca moto kasoa - ra topoparenta to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala mpoparentai ntodea - na . Tauna to bohe pangka ' - ra mpewuku ntodea - na mpotuku ' hawa ' - na .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Aga koi ' , neo ' hewa toe kehi - ni . Hema - koi to doko ' bohe pangka ' - na , kana jadi ' pahawaa ' .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Pai ' hema to doko ' bohe hanga ' - na kana jadi ' batua - ni .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Kana nituku ' po ' ingku - ku , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' . Patuju - ku tumai hi dunia ' , uma bona jadi ' topohawa ' . Pai ' - a tumai - le , bona jadi ' pahawaa ' , duu ' - na mpewai ' woto - ku rapatehi mpotolo ' sala ' tauna to wori ' . "

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Kamalai - ra Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na ngkai ngata Yerikho , mo ' iko - ra - damo tauna mpotuku ' - i .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Hi wiwi ' ohea , ria rodua tauna to wero mohura . Kape ' epe - ra towero toera Kayesus - na to liu , mekio ' - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Pue ' , muli Magau ' Daud ! Poka ' ahi ' - ka - kaiwo ! "

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Tauna to wori ' hi ree mpokaroe - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Ngkalino - koi ! " Uma - rawo rapangalai ' , rahuduwukui lau - mi mejeu ' : " Pue ' , muli Magau ' Daud , poka ' ahi ' - ka - kaiwo ! "

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Mento ' o - imi Yesus , pai ' - i mpokio ' - ra tumai , na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa to nipokono kubabehi - kokoi ? "

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Ratompoi ' - i : " Pue ' , doko ' - ka - kaiwo pehilo ! "

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Metumu ' - mi ahi ' - na Yesus , toe pai ' naganga mata - ra . Ncaliu pehilo - ramo , pai ' - ra mpotuku ' Yesus .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Mohu ' - ramo hi Yerusalem , rata - ra hi ngata Betfage hi Bulu ' Zaitun . Hi ree , Yesus mpohubui rodua ana ' guru - na hilou meri ' ulu ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - koi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai . Rata - koi mpai ' hi ria , nihilo hama ' a keledai to tehoo ' pai ' ana ' - na mohu ' dohe - na . Bongka koloro - na pai ' keni - ra tumai .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Ane ria to mpokamaro - koi , uli ' - raka : ` Apa ' Pue ' mparaluu - ra . Napoponculi ' moto - kokoi mpai ' . ' "

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Tohe ' e majadi ' bona madupa ' napa to na ' uli ' nabi owi , hewa toi :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: " Uli ' - raka pue ' ngata Sion : Hilo , etu - imi tumai Magau ' - ni ! Dingki ' nono - na , mpohawi ' - i hama ' a keledai , mpohawi ' - i hama ' a ana ' keledai to mongura . "

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Jadi ' , hilou mpu ' u - ramo ana ' guru - na to rodua toera , rababehi hewa to nahubui - raka .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Rakeni keledai to ntali ana ' toera , ralampii hante baju - ra . Oti ralampii , mehawi ' - imi Yesus .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Hilou - ramo mpotoa ' Yerusalem . Hi kaliua - na Yesus toe , wori ' lia tauna mpokodo pohea - ra hi mata ohea , pai ' hantongo ' mpoho ' a rau kaju pai ' rakodo hi mata ohea bona mpobila ' - i .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Wori ' tauna mpotuku ' - i , ria - ra to meri ' ulu , ria wo ' o - ra to hi boko ' . Ntora mogora - ra mpo ' uli ' : Une ' - imi muli Magau ' Daud ! " Pue ' Ala mpogane ' Magau ' to tumai mpokeni hanga ' - na ! " Une ' - imi Pue ' Ala to hi rala suruga ! "

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Pesua ' - na Yesus hi ngata Yerusalem , konce - mi pue ' ngata , ra ' uli ' : " Hema - idie ? "

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Ratompoi ' tauna to dohe - na : " Yesus - le , nabi ngkai Nazaret tana ' Galilea . "

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Oti toe , mesua ' - imi Yesus hi berewe Tomi Alata ' ala , pai ' - i mpopalai hawe ' ea tauna to mobabalu ' hi ree . Nabilingko - raka meja ' - meja ' posulaa ' - ra doi , pai ' nabilingko wo ' o pohuraa topobabalu ' danci mangkebodo .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Tomi - ku mpai ' rakahangai ' tomi posampayaa . ' Hiaa ' koi ' - koina , niponcawa tomi toperampaki - di ! "

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Hi Tomi Alata ' ala , tauna towero pai ' topungku rata hi Yesus , pai ' napaka ' uri ' - ra .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Aga imam - imam pangkeni pai ' guru - guru agama , moroe - ra mpohilo tanda mekoncehi to nababehi Yesus . Gigi nono - ra mpo ' epe ana ' to mogora hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala to mpo ' uli ' : " Une ' - imi muli Magau ' Daud ! "

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Toe pai ' ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Nu ' epe wa napa to ra ' uli ' - e ! " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ku ' epe moto . Ko ' ia - tano nibasa hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' - e to mpo ' uli ' : ` Nutudui ' - ramo ana ' - ana ' pai ' ana ' lei mpohowa ' lolita pe ' une ' hi Iko . ' "

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Ngkai ree , malai - imi Yesus mpalahii - ra hilou hi mali ngata , turu hi Betania .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Kampeneo - na mepulo ngkii , hi pomako ' - ra Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na nculii ' hilou hi Yerusalem , mo ' oro ' - imi Yesus .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Mpohilo - i hi wiwi ' ohea hangkaju kaju ara . Hilou - i hi tawu - na mpali ' wua ' - na , aga uma ria nau ' hantakua , muntu ' rau - na - wadi . Toe pai ' Yesus mpototowi kaju toei , na ' uli ' : " Ngkai eo toe lau , uma - poko mowua ' - wua ' kaju toi - ko ! " Kamolaju - nami kaju ara toei .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Wae karahilo - na ana ' guru - na to jadi ' toe , rapokakonce , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa pai ' kaliliu molaju kaju ara toei - e mai ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi , ane nipangala ' pai ' uma - koi morara ' , ma ' ala wo ' o - ko - koiwo mpobabehi hewa to kubabehi hi kaju toe we ' i . Pai ' uma muntu ' tohe ' e , ma ' ala - koi mpololitai bulu ' tohe ' i : ` Te ' ongko ' - moko , pengkanawu ' - ko hi rala tahi ' ! ' bate majadi ' tetu .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Napa - napa to niperapi ' hi rala posampaya - ni , ane nipangala ' , bate nitarima . "

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Mesua ' wo ' o - imi Yesus hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala pai ' metudui ' . Bula - na metudui ' , rata - ramo imam pangkeni hante totu ' a to Yahudi mpekune ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Uli ' - kakai , ngkaiapa huraa - nu mpobabehi hawe ' ea tetu hi Tomi Alata ' ala ! Hema to mpowai ' - ko kuasa hewa tetu ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' , ria wo ' o - kuwo pompekunea ' - ku hi koi ' . Ane nitompoi ' - ka , bo ku ' uli ' - kokoi kangkaiapa - na kuasa - ku mpobabehi hawe ' ea toe lau .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Uli ' - ka pe ' : ngkaiapa kuasa - na Yohanes Topeniu ' mponiu ' tauna ? Ngkai Alata ' ala - di , ba ngkai manusia ' - di ? " Momepololitai - ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa - tale ' mpotompoi ' - ie ? Ane ta ' uli ' ngkai Alata ' ala kuasa - na , na ' uli ' - taka mpai ' : ` Ane wae , napa pai ' uma - i nipangala ' ? '

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Hiaa ' ane ta ' uli ' ngkai manusia ' - wadi kuasa - na , mpoka ' eka ' - ta ntodea , apa ' ntodea toera mpo ' uli ' Yohanes toe hadua nabi . "

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jadi ' , ratompoi ' - i : " Uma ki ' incai . " Toe pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane wae , uma wo ' o - kuwo ku ' uli ' - kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa - ku mpobabehi toe lau . "

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Napokaliliu Yesus lolita - na hi pangkeni agama Yahudi toera , na ' uli ' : " Beiwa pomporata - ni tohe ' i : Ria hadua tuama , rodua - ki ana ' - na , paka ' tomane . Hilou - i hi to tuaka , na ' uli ' - ki : ` Uto ' , eo toe lau , hilou - ko mobago hi bonea . '

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: " Natompoi ' : ` Oja ' - a Mama ! ' Aga ka ' omea - na mobali ' nono - na , hilou moto - i mobago hi bonea .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: " Ngkai ree , hilou wo ' o - i hi ana ' - na to tu ' ai , na ' uli ' - ki : ` Uto ' , hilou - ko mobago hi bonea . ' " Natompoi ' ana ' toei : ` Io ' , hilou moto - a Mama . ' Ntaa ' uma - idi hilou - e ! "

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Ngkai ree , mepekune ' - i Yesus hi pangkeni agama Yahudi , na ' uli ' : " Jadi ' , ngkai ana ' to rodua toera , hema to mpotuku ' hawa ' tuama - ra ? " Ra ' uli ' pangkeni to Yahudi toera : " To lomo ' - na . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : tauna topojeko ' , hewa topesingara ' paja ' pai ' tobine to uma tumotoa gau ' - ra , hira ' lau - mi to natarima Alata ' ala jadi ' ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na , bela koi ' .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Apa ' Yohanes Topeniu ' mpotudui ' - koi ohea to monoa ' , aga uma - koi dota mpopangala ' - i . Hiaa ' topesingara ' paja ' pai ' tobine to uma tumotoa gau ' - ra , rapangala ' - i - rana . Pai ' nau ' nihilo - mi toe , uma oa ' nibalii ' gau ' - ni pai ' uma oa ' nipangala ' - i . "

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka pangkeni agama Yahudi : " Epe wo ' o - koi lolita rapa ' tohe ' i . Ria hadua pue ' bonea mpohu ' ai bonea - na hante anggur . Nawala ntololikia - na , nababehi pompeaa ' anggur , pai ' natunya ' wo ' o pongko pompodooa . Oti toe , napewai ' bonea - na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna , pai ' hilou - imi hi ngata to molaa .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Rata - mi tempo pohopua ' wua ' anggur , napahawa ' - ra ba hangkuja dua batua - na hilou mperapi ' bagia - na .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Aga topobago bonea toera mpohoko ' batua to napahawa ' : ria - ra to rapao ' , ria to rapana ' watu , ria wo ' o to rapatehi .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Pue ' bonea toei mpahawa ' tena batua - na to ntani ' - na , meliu kawori ' - ra ngkai to lomo ' - na . Aga rapohewa toe wo ' o - ra - wadi .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Ka ' omea - na , na ' uli ' : ` Agina ana ' - ku moto - mi kupahawa ' hilou , bate rapengkorui - i mpai ' . '

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: " Ntaa ' we ' i , karahilo - na topobago bonea toera ana ' pue ' bonea tohe ' ei , mohawa ' - ramo ra ' uli ' : ` Etu - imi tumai ana ' - na , hi ' a mpai ' to jadi ' pue ' bonea toi - e . Kita tapatehi - i , bona bonea toi kita ' - mi mpai ' pue ' - na . '

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Karahoko ' - nami ana ' toei , radii ' hilou hi mali bonea pai ' rapatehi . "

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka pangkeni agama Yahudi : " Jadi ' , ane rata nculii ' - ipi pue ' bonea - e , napopai - ra topobago bonea - na toera - e ? "

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Ratompoi ' - i : " Tantu napatehi - ra tauna to dada ' a toera , pai ' bonea - na nawai ' - raka tau ntani ' - na to dota mpowai ' - i bagia - na hi tempo - na . "

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Tantu nibasa - mi lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpolowa pesapuaka - ni hi Aku ' , hewa toi moni - na : ` Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi , watu toe lau - mi to jadi ' poko parawatu . Tohe ' e majadi ' ntuku ' konoa Pue ' Alata ' ala , uma mowo kalompe ' - na hi poncilo - ta . ' "

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Jadi ' , apa ' oja ' - koi mpotarima - a jadi ' Magau ' - ni , wae - pi , bagia - ni hi rala Kamagaua ' - na Alata ' ala , ra ' ala ' ngkai koi ' pai ' rawai ' - raka tauna to mpobabehi po ' ingku to natao hi ntodea Alata ' ala . ( (

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Hewa kura to monawu ' hi watu mopengka , pai ' hewa kura to napitihi watu moreja ' , hewa toe wo ' o mpai ' tauna to mposapuaka - a . ) ) "

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Kara ' epe - na imam pangkeni pai ' to Parisi lolita - lolita rapa ' Yesus toe , ra ' inca kahira ' - na to natoa ' .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Toe pai ' rapali ' - mi ohea - ra mpohoko ' - i . Aga uma - ra daho ' , apa ' mpoka ' eka ' - ra ntodea , apa ' ntodea mpo ' uli ' Yesus hadua nabi .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Mololita tena - i Yesus hi pangkeni agama Yahudi toera , mpo ' uli ' - raka hanyala - pi lolita rapa ' . Na ' uli ' :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: " Alata ' ala hewa magau ' to hi rala jarita toi : Hadua magau ' mpobabehi karamea hi poncamokoa ana ' - na .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Mohawa ' - i hi pahawaa ' - na hilou mpokio ' tauna to rahinta ' hewa toi : ` Hilou - tamo ngkoni ' hi posusaa ' poncamokoa ! ' Aga hawe ' ea to rakio ' toera , uma - ra dota hilou .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Toe pai ' nahubui tena pahawaa ' - na to ntani ' - na , na ' uli ' - raka : ` Uli ' - raka to rahinta ' : pongkoni ' taha ' - mi , japi hante porewua to morudu ' ntani ' - na rasumale ' - mi , rodo - mi omea . Kita - mi hilou hi posusaa ' poncamokoa ! '

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Aga hawe ' ea to rakio ' toera uma mposaile ' pekio ' toe . Hore - hore hilou hi pobagoa - ra moto - ra . Ria - ra to hilou hi bonea - ra , ria - ra to hilou hi bago - ra ntani ' - na .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: To ntani ' - na wo ' o - ra mpohoko ' pahawaa ' magau ' toe , rapao ' pai ' rapatehi .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Kana ' epe - na magau ' napa to jadi ' tohe ' e , moroe lia - imi . Nahubui tantara - na hilou mpatehi topepatehi toera , pai ' mposuwe ngata - ra .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: " Oti toe , nakio ' wo ' o - ramo pahawaa ' - na , na ' uli ' - raka : ` Susa ' poncamokoa rodo - mi , aga tauna to kukio ' , uma - ra natao mpokaralai .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Wae - pi , hilou - mokoi hi ohea kama , hema - hema to nirua ' , bawai - ramo tumai mpokaralai susa ' poncamokoa . '

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Kahilou - rami - rawo pahawaa ' toera hi ohea mporumpu hawe ' ea tauna to liu , uma mpenara ' ba to lompe ' gau ' - ra ba to dada ' a . Ka ' omea - na ihia ' mpu ' u - mi tomi posusaa ' hante torata .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: " Mesua ' - imi magau ' toei mpokamata torata . Nahilo - hawo hi olo ' torata , ria hadua to uma moheai pohea posusa ' .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Na ' uli ' magau ' : ` Bale , napa - kona pai ' tumai - ko hi posusaa ' uma - ko moheai pohea posusa ' - e ? ' Uma - i - hawo winihi .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ngkai ree , mohawa ' - imi magau ' mpo ' uli ' - raka pahawaa ' - na : ` Hilu ' witi ' - na , hoo ' pale - na , petadi - i hi mali - na rala kabengia - na ! Hi ria - i mpai ' geo ' pai ' ntodohaka . ' "

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa ' - na hewa toi : " Wori ' tauna to nakio ' Alata ' ala , aga hangkedi ' - ra - wadi to napelihi jadi ' ntodea - na . "

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Ngkai ree , malai - ramo to Parisi ngkai Tomi Alata ' ala . Mohawa ' - ra mpali ' akala beiwa - ra ma ' ala mpo ' opa kahala ' lolita - na Yesus mpotompoi ' pompekunea ' - ra .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Rarata - mi akala - ra : mpahawa ' - ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku ' - ra hante ba hangkuja dua tauna to tono ' hi Magau ' Herodes hilou hi Yesus . Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , ki ' inca Guru tau manoa ' . Monoa ' lia tudui ' - nu mpo ' uli ' napa konoa Alata ' ala hi manusia ' . Uma nupengkorui ba hema - hema , apa ' uma - ko mpelence tauna .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Toe pai ' kiperapi ' bona nu ' uli ' - kakai , beiwa pomporata - nu Guru : ntuku ' atura agama - ta , ba ma ' ala moto - ta mpobayari paja ' hi Kaisar , ba uma - di ? "

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Na ' inca Yesus patuju nono - ra to dada ' a toe , toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilo mpu ' u - koie ' topebagiu ! Napa pai ' doko ' ni ' opa kahala ' lolita - ku !

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Popehuwu - ka pe ' doi to biasa nibayari - ki paja ' - e . " Ratonu - miki hampepa ' doi pera ' .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Lence hema pai ' hanga ' hema to hi doi toi ? "

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Ratompoi ' : " Lence pai ' hanga ' Kaisar . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane wae - di , wai ' - ki Kaisar napa to kasipato ' - na rawai ' - ki Kaisar , pai ' wai ' - ki Alata ' ala napa to kasipato ' - na rawai ' - ki Alata ' ala . "

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Kara ' epe - na petompoi ' Yesus tohe ' e , rapokakonce . Kamalai - rami mpalahii Yesus .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Hi eo toe wo ' o , ba hangkuja dua to Saduki rata hi Yesus . To Saduki toera , pangkeni agama Yahudi to mposapuaka tauna to mate tuwu ' nculii ' hi eo mpeno .

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Rata to Saduki toera mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , nabi Musa metudui ' hewa toi : Ane hadua tomane mate , hiaa ' uma - ki ria ana ' - na , pudupuhe - na kana mpotobine balu - na , bona ria - ki - hawo muli - na tomate toei .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Jadi ' , ria pitu to ntali ompi ' paka ' tomane . To ulumua ' motobinei , mate - i uma ria ana ' - na . Balu - na napotobine tu ' ai - na .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Ko ' ia wo ' o rapoka ' alai mo ' anai ' , mate wo ' o - imi - hawo to tu ' ai toei . Wae oa ' - mi majadi ' hi katolu - na duu ' - na hi kapitu - na .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Ka ' omea - na , mate wo ' o - imi - hawo tobine toei .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Jadi ' hi eo mpeno - na , ane tuwu ' nculii ' mpu ' u - di hawe ' ea tomate - e , hema - ramo mpai ' pue ' tobine toei ? Apa ' hawe ' ea - ra mpotobine - imi . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Sala ' rahi pekiri - ni tetu , apa ' uma nipaha ihi ' Buku Tomoroli ' , uma wo ' o ni ' incai baraka ' - na Alata ' ala .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Apa ' ane tuwu ' nculii ' - ramo tauna to mate , katuwu ' - ra hewa katuwu ' mala ' eka hi rala suruga , uma - rapa motobinei ba motomanei .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Ha ko ' ia ria nibasa lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpakanoto katuwu ' - ra nculii ' tomate - e ? Ria Lolita Alata ' ala owi to mpo ' uli ' - kokoi hewa toi :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: ` Aku ' toi - mi Alata ' ala to napue ' Abraham , Alata ' ala to napue ' Ishak , Alata ' ala to napue ' Yakub . ' Batua - na , nau ' mahae - ramo mate Abraham , Ishak pai ' Yakub , bate tuwu ' moto - ra . Apa ' bela tauna to mate to mepue ' hi Alata ' ala , tauna to tuwu ' - hana to mpopue ' - i . "

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Kara ' epe - na ntodea tudui ' - na Yesus toe , rapokakonce .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: To Saduki uma - pi tepehono ' , apa ' nadagi - ramo Yesus . Kara ' epe - na to Parisi toe , moromu wo ' o - ramo - rawo mpopali ' akala - ra mpo ' akalai Yesus .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Hadua ngkai laintongo ' - ra , hadua guru agama , mperao mpo ' opa petompoi ' Yesus hante pompekunea ' - na , na ' uli ' :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: " Guru , ngkai hawe ' ea parenta hi rala Atura Pue ' , parenta to ' uma to meliu kabohe - na ? "

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : ` Kana tapoka ' ahi ' Pue ' - ta Pue ' Alata ' ala hante nono - ta mpu ' u , tatonu hawe ' ea katuwu ' - ta hi Hi ' a , pai ' tapoka ' ahi ' - i hudu inca - ta . '

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Toe - mi parenta to meliu kabohe - na , pai ' to lomo ' - na mpu ' u .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Pai ' parenta karonyala - na to hibalia hante to lomo ' - na toe : ` Kana tapoka ' ahi ' doo - ta hewa pompoka ' ahi ' - ta woto - ta moto . '

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Hawe ' ea Atura Pue ' pai ' tudui ' nabi - nabi mentoe hi parenta to ronyala toe . "

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Bula - ra to Parisi ria - pidi morumpu hi retu , Yesus mpekune ' - ra :

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: " Beiwa pomporata - ni , hema - i Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Alata ' ala - e ? Muli hema - i ? " Ratompoi ' : " Muli Magau ' Daud . "

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane wae - di , napa pai ' Daud mpokahangai ' - i Pue ' - na ? Hante petete ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , Daud mpotompo ' wiwi Magau ' Topetolo ' hewa toi :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Pue ' Ala mpo ' uli ' - ki Pue ' - ku : ` Mohura - moko hi mali ngka ' ana - ku , duu ' - na kupopengkoru hawe ' ea bali ' - nu hi Iko . '

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Jadi ' , ane muli Daud mpu ' u - idi Magau ' Topetolo ' - e , napa pai ' Daud mpokahangai ' - i Pue ' - na ? "

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Uma ria haduaa to mpotompoi ' - i . Ntepu ' u ngkai eo toe , uma - pi hema to daho ' mpekune ' ba napa - napa hi Yesus .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpololitai ntodea pai ' topetuku ' - na , na ' uli ' :

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: " Guru - guru agama pai ' to Parisi mohura hi pohuraa Musa , apa ' hira ' to mpotudui ' - koi Atura Musa .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Toe pai ' kana nituku ' omea napa to ratudui ' - kokoi . Aga neo ' nipenau ' po ' ingku - ra , apa ' hira ' toe uma mpotuku ' napa to ratudui ' - kokoi .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Hira ' toe mpopokoloi ntodea hante parenta pai ' ada to motomo , hiaa ' hira ' moto , uma - ra mpotulungi ntodea mpotuku ' parenta pai ' ada toe .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: " Wori ' moto - hawo po ' ingku - ra to lompe ' , aga patuju - ra mpobabehi po ' ingku toe , bona rahilo doo - wadi . Mpopake ' - ra tali posampaya to mopepa ' - pepa ' , pai ' rapokaloe wua ' baju - ra , bona petuku ' - ra hi Atura Musa ma ' ala rahilo doo .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Goe ' - ra ane rapopohura - ra hi pohuraa to lompe ' hi posusaa ' . Goe ' - ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa ' hi tomi posampayaa .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Goe ' - ra ane ria tauna hi wiwi ' karajaa motingkua ' mpotabe - ra pai ' mpokahangai ' - ra ` Guru . '

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: " Aga koi ' , neo ' - koi mpopebila ' pai ' doko ' rakahangai ' ` Guru , ' apa ' hadua - wadi Guru - ni , pai ' koi ' omea ntali ompi ' - wadi .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Pai ' neo ' wo ' o nipomolangko rahi ba hema - hema hi dunia ' toi pai ' mpokahangai ' - ra ` Tuama , ' apa ' Tuama - ni hadua - wadi , Hi ' a - mi Tuama - ni to hi rala suruga .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Pai ' neo ' wo ' o - koi doko ' rakahangai ' ` Pangkeni , ' apa ' Pangkeni - ni hadua - wadi , Hi ' a - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Hema - koi to doko ' bohe tuwu ' - na , kana jadi ' pahawaa ' hi doo - na .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Tauna to mpakalangko nono - ra , Pue ' Ala bate mpodingkihi - ra , pai ' tauna to mpakadingki ' nono - ra , Pue ' Ala mpomolangko - ra .
