text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: " Pai ' koi ' guru agama pai ' to Parisi ! Bate mporata silaka - koi mpai ' ! Lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi - koi ! Tauna to doko ' jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala , nitagi - ra . Koi ' moto uma dota jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala , pai ' tau ntani ' - na to doko ' jadi ' ntodea - na , nihalawai ' lau - rada . ( (

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: " Silaka - koi , guru agama pai ' to Parisi ! Lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi - koi ! Nibagiu tobine tobalu pai ' nihagoi tomi - ra . Pai ' mosampaya - koi nipomoloe - loe , bona tewunii ' gau ' - ni to dada ' a tetu . Motomo lia mpai ' huku ' - ni . ) )

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: " Silaka - koi , guru agama pai ' to Parisi ! Lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi - koi ! Mako ' molaa - koi medipo tahi ' modao ' hi role - na , bona ngalai ' ria nte hadua tauna to jadi ' topetuku ' - ni . Pai ' ane ria - pi topetuku ' - ni , nitudui ' - ra mpotuku ' pebagiu - ni , alaa - na meliu kadada ' a gau ' - ra ngkai koi ' , pai ' meliu kamasipato ' - ra rahuku ' hi naraka ngkai koi ' .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: " Bate silaka - koi mpai ' ! Koi ' hewa to wero to doko ' mpotete ' doo ! Metudui ' - koi hewa toi : Ane ria tauna to mpobabehi pojanci pai ' mosumpa - i mpokahangai ' Tomi Alata ' ala , ni ' uli ' uma - i tehoo ' hante sumpa - na toe . Hiaa ' ane mpokahangai ' - i bulawa to hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , tehoo ' - i hante sumpa - na toe .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Wojo mpu ' u - koi , hewa to wero - koi ! Ha ni ' uli ' - koina bulawa to meliu ngkai Tomi Alata ' ala ! Hiaa ' bo Tomi Alata ' ala toe - di to mpomoroli ' bulawa to hi rala - na .

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Metudui ' wo ' o - koi hewa toi : Ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai ' meja ' pontunua pepue ' to hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , uma - i tehoo ' hante sumpa - na toe . Aga ane mpokahangai ' - i pepue ' to ratunu hi lolo meja ' toe , ni ' uli ' bate tehoo ' - i hante sumpa - na .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Hewa to wero mpu ' u - koi ! Ha ni ' uli ' - koina , pepue ' to meliu ngkai meja ' pontunua pepue ' ? Uma - e ' , apa ' meja ' toe - di to mpomoroli ' pepue ' to hi lolo - nae .

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai ' meja ' pontunua pepue ' , batua - na mpokahangai ' - i meja ' toe pai ' hawe ' ea to ratunu hi lolo - na .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Pai ' ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai ' Tomi Alata ' ala , batua - na mpokahangai ' - i Tomi Alata ' ala pai ' Alata ' ala to mo ' oha ' hi tomi toe .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Pai ' ane tauna mosumpa mpokahangai ' suruga , batua - na mpokahangai ' - i pohuraa Alata ' ala , pai ' mpokahangai ' wo ' o - i Alata ' ala to mohura hi pohuraa toe .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: " Silaka - koi , guru agama pai ' to Parisi ! Lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi - koi ! Ntahawe ' hinu ' a to kedi ' , hewa tarangkada ' , ngkoromonyi ' pai ' wunga bonea , nipopepue ' hampobagiahampulu ' hi Alata ' ala . Hiaa ' parenta hi rala Atura Pue ' to bohe mpu ' u , hewa po ' ingku to monoa ' , ma ' ahi ' hi doo , pai ' mpo ' ihii ' janci , uma nisaile ' . Kakoo - kono - na , ke parenta to bohe toe - hanale to kana nituku ' - e , pai ' neo ' wo ' o nilipo ' mpotuku ' parenta to kedi ' .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Koi ' hewa towero to mpotete ' doo . Koi ' hewa tauna to mpolali koromu ' nete ' ngkai ue ininu - ni , hiaa ' hama ' a unta , to bohe lia , ni ' ome ' lau .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: " Silaka - koi , guru agama pai ' to Parisi ! Lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi - koi ! Koi ' hewa tauna to mpobohoi ' sangkiri ' pai ' piri hi mali - na - wadi , hiaa ' hi rala - na babo ' moto . Ada agama to kahiloa hi mali - na - wadi nituku ' lia . Hiaa ' hi rala nono - ni jampa pai ' mpokahina anu doo - koi .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Hewa towero mpu ' u - koi , koi ' to Parisi ! Bohoi ' ulu rala - na sangkiri ' , bona lompe ' wo ' o to hi mali - na .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: " Silaka - koi , guru agama pai ' to Parisi ! Lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi - koi ! Hewa daeo ' to rasapuru ' bula - koi : hi mali - na lompe ' - damo hiloa - na , hiaa ' bo hi rala - na paka ' wuku kiu pai ' wori ' nyala to merungkui .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Wae wo ' o koi ' : ane hi pogau ' to hi mali - na to rahilo doo , monoa ' - koi . Hiaa ' hi rala nono - ni topebagiu - koi pai ' dada ' a kehi - ni .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: " Silaka - koi , guru agama pai ' to Parisi ! Lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi - koi ! Nipenasa - damo mpakalompe ' daeo ' - ra nabi - nabi pai ' tauna to monoa ' owi .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Molangko nono - ni , ni ' uli ' : ` Ane ke rapa ' - na tuwu ' - makai hingkala ' ia hante totu ' a - kai owi , ke uma - ka - kaina mpodohei - ra mpatehi nabi - nabi . '

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Jadi ' , nipangaku ' moto kakoi ' - na muli - ra to mpatehi nabi - nabi , pai ' kehi ntu ' a - ni tetu bate ni ' uhi .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Wae - pi , pokaliliu lau - mi mpobabehi jeko ' hewa to rababehi ntu ' a - ni tetu !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: " He topebagiu , he koi ' to bengku ' gau ' - ni ! Ha ni ' uli ' - koina tewi ' iha - koi mpai ' ngkai huku ' - ni hi rala naraka - e ?

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Ntu ' a - ni owi mpopatehi wori ' tauna to monoa ' ingku - ra , ntepu ' u ngkai kampopatehi - ra Habel , tauna to monoa ' ingku - na owi , rata - rata hi kampopatehi - ni Zakharia ana ' Berekia , to nipatehi hi berewe Tomi Alata ' ala hi olo ' tomi to moroli ' pai ' meja ' pontunua pepue ' . Jadi ' , hi koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi , kupahawa ' wo ' o mpai ' nabi , tauna to pante pai ' guru to mpotudui ' - koi lolita - ku . Hantongo ' - ra mpai ' nipatehi , hantongo ' - ra niparika ' , ria wo ' o - ra to niweba ' hi rala tomi posampayaa - ni , ria wo ' o - ra to nidapa ' hilou hi ngata - ngata petiboa ' - ra . Ka ' omea - na mpai ' , koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi - mi to mpokolo hawe ' ea kasalaa ' totu ' a - ni to mpatehi tauna to monoa ' owi .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Wae mpu ' u - di ! Koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi bate rahuku ' sabana hawe ' ea kasalaa ' - ra totu ' a - ni toe .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: " Ee to Yerusalem ! to Yerusalem ! Nipatehi - ra - koina nabi - nabi , pai ' nipana ' watu - ra - koina tauna to nasuro Alata ' ala hi koi ' . Wori ' ngkani - mi kupehuka ' ngkupui - koi , hewa hama ' a manu ' tina mpo ' urui ana ' - na hi une ' pani ' - na , aga uma - koi dota .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Bona ni ' inca : tomi pepuea ' - ni toi napalahii - kokoi mpai ' Alata ' ala .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi , uma - apa nihiloi , duu ' - na rata tempo - na ni ' uli ' : ` Une ' - imi to rata mpokeni hanga ' Pue ' Ala ! ' "

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Malai - imi Yesus ngkai Tomi Alata ' ala . Tumai - ramo ana ' guru - na mpotudo ' - ki kalompe ' pompowangu - na tomi toe .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Nihilo wa hawe ' ea tohe ' e - e lau ? Bona ni ' inca : uma mpai ' ria hamehaa ' watu to bate pomeduncu - na . Bate ragero omea mpai ' . "

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Oti toe , hilou - imi Yesus mohura hi Bulu ' Zaitun . Bula - na mohura , rata - ramo ana ' guru - na nto ' u uma ria tau ntani ' - na , pai ' - ra mpekune ' - i : " Uli ' - kakai ba nto ' uma kadupa ' - na to nu ' uli ' toe - e we ' i , pai ' napa mpai ' to jadi ' tanda karata - nu pai ' kahudua dunia ' toi . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Pelompehi , neo ' - koi ma ' ala rabagiu .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Apa ' wori ' mpai ' to mehupa ' to mpo ' uli ' kahira ' - na Magau ' Topetolo ' . Wori ' mpai ' tauna to rabagiu .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Mpo ' epe - koi mpai ' kareba panga ' ea ngkai kalaa - na , ni ' epe wo ' o moni panga ' ea to mohu ' . Aga neo ' me ' eka ' , apa ' hawe ' ea toe kana jadi ' ulu , aga kajadia ' toe uma mpobatuai karata - nami kahudua dunia ' .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , wori ' ngata mosipanga ' ei , magau ' hadua mpo ' ewa magau ' kahadua - na , pai ' hiapa - apa ria oro ' pai ' linu .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Aga hawe ' ea toe lau lako ' pontepu ' ua - na - pidi , hewa pontodohaka hadua tobine to neo ' mo ' ana ' .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: " Nto ' u toe mpai ' , rahoko ' - koi pai ' ratonu hi tauna to mposesa ' pai ' mpopatehi - koi . Tauna humalili ' dunia ' mpokahuku ' - koi sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Wori ' tauna ngkala ' ura ngkai petuku ' - ra hi Aku ' . Ria to mpewai ' doo - ra hi bali ' - ra . Wori ' tauna momepokahuku ' .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Pai ' mehupa ' wo ' o wori ' nabi boa ' to mpobagiu wori ' tauna .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Nto ' u toe , kada ' aa tauna katedoo - donihia , duu ' - na mere ' - mi ahi ' tauna to wori ' .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Aga tauna to tida mepangala ' hi Aku ' duu ' hi ka ' omea - na , hira ' - mi to mporata kalompea ' hi eo mpeno .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Pai ' Kareba Lompe ' to mpo ' uli ' beiwa Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' , bate rapalele hi humalili ' dunia ' , bona hawe ' ea manusia ' ma ' ala mpo ' epe . Oti toe - di pai ' lako ' rata kahudua dunia ' .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: " Owi nabi Daniel mpolowa karata - na to rahanga ' ` Topegerohi to dada ' a . ' ( Hema to mpobasa lolita pelowa toe , penotohi batua - na ! ) Jadi ' , ane nihilo to nalowa Daniel toe mokore hi tomi to moroli ' ,

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: agina tauna to mo ' oha ' hi Yudea metibo ' hilou hi bulu ' - na .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Tauna to mohura hi parawa - na , neo ' - pi leba ' mesua ' hi rala tomi - na mpo ' ala ' rewa - na .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Tauna to hi bonea , neo ' - pi nculii ' hi ngata mpo ' ala ' pohea - na . Kaliliu metibo ' !

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Mpe ' ahii ' - ra mpai ' tobine to nto ' u - ra motina ' i pai ' to mpentii ' ana ' - ra nto ' u toe , apa ' mokoro mpai ' petibo ' - ra .

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Mekakae - koi hi Alata ' ala bona eo petiboa ' - ni toe neo ' nto ' u tempo lengi ' ba nto ' u eo pepuea ' .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Apa ' uma mowo pesesa ' to mporumpa ' manusia ' nto ' u toe , ko ' ia ria jadi ' ngkai lomo ' kajadia ' dunia ' duu ' - na rata tempo toi , pai ' uma wo ' o - pi mpai ' ria jadi ' hi eo boko ' - na .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Aga naredehi moto mpai ' Alata ' ala tempo kaparia toe , apa ' ane uma naredehi tempo - na , bate uma ria haduaa to tuwu ' . Jadi ' , apa ' napoka ' ahi ' - ra tauna to napelihi , toe pai ' naredehi mpai ' tempo kaparia toe .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: " Nto ' u toe mpai ' , ane ria to mpo ' uli ' - kokoi : ` Hilo , Magau ' Topetolo ' ohe ' i - imi , ' ba ` Ohe ' e - i mai , ' neo ' nipangalai ' .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Apa ' mehupa ' mpai ' wori ' tauna to boa ' to mpo ' uli ' kahira ' - na Magau ' Topetolo ' , ba to mpo ' uli ' kahira ' - na nabi . Mpobabehi - ra tanda to mekoncehi lia pai ' tanda to mobaraka ' , bona mpobagiu - ra wori ' tauna . Ane ke ma ' ala , ntahawe ' tauna to napelihi Alata ' ala rabagiu wo ' o .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Kiwoi - koi ! Ku ' uli ' ami ' - mikokoi kako ' ia - na jadi ' .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: " Jadi ' , ane ria to mpo ' uli ' - kokoi : ` Hilo , Magau ' Topetolo ' oe - i ria hi papada to wao ' ! ' neo ' - koi hilou . Ane ra ' uli ' : ` Hilo , oe - i ria hi rala tomi ! ' neo ' nipangalai ' .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Apa ' ane rata nculii ' - apa mpai ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , karata - ku kahiloa hobo ' hi dunia ' , hewa pehini kila ' to mehupa ' hi mata ' eo pai ' mehini hilou hi kasoloa .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Ane ria anu mate , incana moto apa ' wori ' danci morumpu mpokoni ' . Wae wo ' o mpai ' karata - ku nculii ' hi dunia ' , uma - a tumai ngkawuni , incana moto mpai ' .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: " Ane timpaliu - damo tempo kaparia toe , hawe ' ea anu to mobaraka ' hi langi ' ralengo . Eo mobali ' mobengi , wula uma - pi mehini , betue ' roda ' ngkai langi ' .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Nto ' u toe - damo mpai ' , mehupa ' - mi tanda hi langi ' to mpobatuai karata - ku Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' . Pai ' hawe ' ea manusia ' hi dunia ' motantangi ' , apa ' rahilo - a hi lolo raoa mana ' u tumai hi rala limu ' , mobaraka ' - a pai ' uma mowo pehini - ku .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Sangkakala to bohe ratuwui ' , pai ' kuhubui mala ' eka - ku hilou mporumpu tauna to kupobagia ngkai humalili ' dunia ' , ngkai wuntu - na hamali rata hi wuntu - na hamali .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: " Petonoi - koi napa to kutudui ' - kokoi hante lolita rapa ' kaju ara . Ane nihilo rau - na mela ' pai ' mohulu - i , ni ' inca - mi kaneo ' - na mara eo .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Wae wo ' o ane nihilo - damo hawe ' ea kajadia ' toe we ' i lou , ni ' inca - mi neo ' madupa ' mpu ' u - mi to ku ' uli ' we ' i .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : hawe ' ea toe we ' i bate madupa ' kako ' ia - na mate omea tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Langi ' pai ' dunia ' mogero mpai ' , tapi ' lolita - ku bate - bate - na duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: " Aga ane eo pai ' jaa kadupa ' - na hawe ' ea toe , wuwu Tuama - ku - wadi to mpo ' inca . Uma ria to ntani ' - na to mpo ' inca . Bangku ' mala ' eka to hi rala suruga - hawoe ' , uma wo ' o - rawo ra ' incai . Bangku ' Aku ' Ana ' - nae ' , uma wo ' o - kuwo ku ' incai .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Hewa to majadi ' hi tempo nabi Nuh owi , hewa toe wo ' o mpai ' to jadi ' hi eo karata - ku Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Hi tempo nabi Nuh owi , kako ' ia - na rata ue mowo ' , manusia ' lempe ' moto , uma ra ' incai napa to neo ' mporumpa ' - ra . Ntora ngkoni ' pai ' nginu - ra - wadi , rapoponcamoko pai ' mepoponcamoko moto - ra , kawae - kawae - na duu ' - na nabi Nuh mesua ' hi rala sakaya bohe .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Karata - nami ue mowo ' mpoliu ' - ra , lako ' monoto - rada napa to majadi ' . Wae wo ' o mpai ' kalempe ' - ra manusia ' nto ' u Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' nculii ' tumai hi dunia ' .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , rodua tauna mo ' ema ' mobago hi bonea , hadua ra ' ala ' , to hadua rapalahii .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Rodua tobine to motongke ' momanyu , hadua ra ' ala ' , to hadua rapalahii .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi , apa ' uma ni ' incai nto ' uma Pue ' - ni rata .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: " Poinono lolita rapa ' - ku toi : ane na ' inca ami ' - mi pue ' tomi jaa hangkuja ngkabengia topanako rata , bate mo ' inga ' - inga ' - i - hawo , uma napelele ' - ra mesua ' hi rala tomi - na .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Hewa toe wo ' o kana rodo ami ' - mokoi mpopea - a , apa ' uma ni ' incai tempo karata - ku Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: " Rapa ' - na ria hadua batua to monoto nono - na pai ' to tida mpobago bago maradika - na . Batua toei na ' ongko ' maradika - na jadi ' topohawa ' mpohawai ' batua ntani ' - na pai ' mpowai ' - ra pongkoni ' - ra butu eo - na .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Uma mowo kamarasi ' - na ane maradika - na rata nculii ' ngkai pomakoa ' - na pai ' mporata - i bula - na mpobago bago - na .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi , maradika - na mpo ' ongko ' - i pai ' mpowai ' - i kuasa mpewili ' hawe ' ea ka ' uaa ' - na .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: " Aga ane dada ' a - di kehi - na batua toei , na ' uli ' hi rala nono - na : ` Uma - ile sohi ' tumai maradika - e . '

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: Ngkai ree , natepu ' u - mi mpoweba ' hingka batua - na , pai ' - i ntora ngkoni ' pai ' nginu hante tauna topalangu - langu .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Ntaa ' we ' i , bula - na lempe ' moto hewa toe , muu - mule ' rata - mi maradika - na hi eo pai ' hi jaa to uma na ' incai .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Batua toei raweba ' ntarurua ' , pai ' rapetadi hi mali - na , rapohewa topebagiu . Hi ria - i geo ' pai ' ntodohaka .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: " Ane rata nculii ' - apa mpai ' jadi ' Magau ' , kajadia ' hewa lolita rapa ' toi : Hampulu ' toronaa mopatuju hilou mpotomu topemua ' , hore - hore ngkeni hulu ' - ra .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Lima - ra to wojo , lima - ra to monoto nono - ra .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Lima toronaa to wojo toera , ngkeni moto - ra hulu ' - ra , aga uma - ra ngkeni lana .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Lima toronaa to monoto nono - ra mpokeni hulu ' - ra hante lana talaa - ra .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Apa ' mahae rahi karata topemua ' , tetunu ' - ramo toronaa toera , ka ' omea - na leta ' omea - ramo .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: " Mentongo ' bengi - mi , lako ' ria - di tauna to mekio ' , ra ' uli ' : ` Etu - imi tumai topemua ' ! Mai - mokoi mpotomu - i . '

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Pemata - rami toronaa to hampulu ' toera , hore - hore mporodo hulu ' - ra .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Toronaa to wojo mpo ' uli ' - raka ema ' - ra to monoto nono - ra : ` Bale , mai - kaiwo lana - ni hangkedi ' , neo ' mate - mi - kaina hulu ' - kai . '

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: " Ratompoi ' to monoto nono - ra toera : ` Uma - kaiwo hono ' ! Hilou - mokoi ulu me ' oli hi topobalu ' lana . '

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Hilou - ramo - rawo toronaa to wojo toera mpo ' oli lana . Lingku ' - ra hilou , rata mpu ' u - imi topemua ' . Lima toronaa to monoto toera , apa ' rodo ami ' - mi - rana hulu ' - ra , kaliliu mesua ' - ramo dohe topemua ' rala tomi posusaa ' , pai ' wobo ' ra ' unca - mi .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: " Oti toe rata wo ' o - ramo - rawo toronaa to wojo toera . Mekio ' - ra ngkai mali - na , ra ' uli ' : ` Pue ' ! Pue ' ! Bea - kaka - kaiwo wobo ' ! '

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: " Na ' uli ' topemua ' : ` Uma - koi ku ' incai . ' "

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Napohudu Yesus lolita rapa ' - na toe hewa toi : " Toe pai ' kana mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi , apa ' uma ni ' incai nto ' uma - a rata .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: " Ane rata nculii ' - apa mpai ' jadi ' Magau ' , kajadi ' - na hewa lolita rapa ' tohe ' i : Hadua maradika mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa . Kako ' ia - na me ' ongko ' , mpokio ' - i pahawaa ' - na napontonui doi - na , bona lingku ' - na rapopodaga rapali ' - ki donihi - na .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Nawai ' - ra hore - hore ntuku ' pakulea ' - ra . Hadua nawai ' lima ncobu doi bulawa , to hadua roncobu , pai ' to hadua wo ' o hancobu . Pai ' - i me ' ongko ' - mi .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Pahawaa ' to mporata lima ncobu doi bulawa toei , kaliliu napopodaga mpali ' donihi - na , narata mpu ' u - mi donihi - na lima ncobu wo ' o .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Wae wo ' o pahawaa ' to mporata roncobu , narata wo ' o - hawo donihi - na roncobu .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Aga pahawaa ' to mporata hancobu - wadi , hilou - i mpokae tana ' napontawui doi maradika - na .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: " Mahae ngkai ree , nculii ' - imi maradika toei , pai ' nakio ' - ra pahawaa ' - na , napongincai pompewili ' - ra doi - na .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Pahawaa ' to mporata lima ncobu doi bulawa , tumai - i mpotonu hi maradika - na hampulu ' ncobu , na ' uli ' : ` Maradika , to nutonu - ka wengi lima ncobu . Hilo , oi - mi ana ' - na , lima ncobu wo ' o . '

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: " Na ' uli ' maradika - na : ` Lompe ' - mi ! Nupopomako ' lompe ' pobago to kuwai ' - koko . Wae - pi , apa ' lawi ' monoa ' - ko hi to hangkedi ' , kusarumaka lau - moko hi to wori ' . Mai - moko , mo ' oha ' hante aku ' , pai ' goe ' - moko hangkaa - ngkania hante aku ' . '

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: " Pahawaa ' to mporata roncobu doi bulawa , rata wo ' o - imi - hawo , na ' uli ' : ` Maradika , roncobu wengi to nuwai ' - ka . Hilo , oi - mi ana ' - na roncobu wo ' o . '

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: " Na ' uli ' maradika toei : ` Lompe ' - mi ! Nupopomako ' lompe ' pobago to kuwai ' - koko . Wae - pi , apa ' lawi ' monoa ' - ko hi to hangkedi ' , kusarumaka lau - moko hi to wori ' . Mai - moko , mo ' oha ' hante aku ' , pai ' goe ' - moko hangkaa - ngkania hante aku ' . '

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: " Oti toe , rata wo ' o - imi - hawo pahawaa ' to mporata hancobu , na ' uli ' : ` Maradika , ku ' inca kaseke - nu . Nupepae to bela - kowo hinu ' a - nu , nu ' ala ' to uma nukarokoi .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Me ' eka ' - a , toe pai ' hilou - a mpowuni doi - nu hi rala tana ' . Jadi ' , ohe ' i - mi doi - nu nculii ' . '

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: " Na ' uli ' - mi maradika toei : ` Iko pahawaa ' to dada ' a pai ' to lose ! Ane nu ' inca kampepae - ku to bela hinu ' a - ku , ane nu ' inca kampo ' ala ' - ku to uma kukarokoi ,

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: napa pai ' uma nupopesua ' lau doi - ku hi bank , bona ane rata - apa , kurua ' nculii ' hante ana ' - na ! '

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi maradika toei hi pahawaa ' kahadua - na : ` Ala ' doi to hi hi ' a , wai ' - ki to ria - ki hampulu ' ncobu .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Apa ' tauna to rasarumaka hante anu to rawai ' - ki , rawai ' tena - i - pidi bona kawoo - woria ' - ki . Aga tauna to uma rasarumaka , anu hangkedi ' to ria hi hi ' a , ra ' alai ' lau - imi .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Pai ' pahawaa ' to uma motuju tetui , petadi - imi hi mali - na hi kabengia - na . Hi ria - i ntora geo ' pai ' ntodohaka . '

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: " Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ane rata nculii ' - apa mpai ' , mehini mpu ' u - mi baraka ' - ku , pai ' radohei - a hawe ' ea mala ' eka - ku . Mohura - a mpai ' moparenta hewa Magau ' hi pohuraa to ncola .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Hawe ' ea manusia ' morumpu hi nyanyoa - ku pai ' kugaa ' - ra jadi ' rontuda , hewa hadua topo ' ewu mpogaa ' bima ngkai kebe ' .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Tauna to mpobabehi konoa Alata ' ala kupahantuda hi mali ka ' ana - ku , pai ' tauna topesapuaka hi mali ki ' ii - ku .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: " Pai ' Aku ' Magau ' , ku ' uli ' - raka to hi mali ka ' ana - ku : ` Mai - mokoi to nagane ' Tuama - ku ! Mesua ' - mokoi hi rala Kamagaua ' - ku , po ' ohaa ' - ni kuporodo ami ' - mikokoi ngkai lomo ' kajadi ' dunia ' .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Apa ' nto ' u - ku mo ' oro ' , niwai ' - a pongkoni ' . Ngkamara - a , niwai ' - a ue ininu . Liu - a hi tomi - ni , nipopehani - a .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Uma ria pohea - ku , niwai ' - a pohea . Peda ' - a , nikinomo - a . Hi rala tarungku ' - a , nipencuai ' - a . '

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: " Metompoi ' - ra to hi mali ka ' ana - ku , ra ' uli ' : ` Pue ' , nto ' uma - ko kihilo mo ' oro ' pai ' kiwai ' - ko koni ' , ba ngkamara pai ' kiwai ' - ko ue ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Nto ' uma - ko liu hi tomi - kai , pai ' kipopehani - ko ? Nto ' uma - ko kihilo uma ria pohea - nu , pai ' kiwai ' - ko pohea ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Nto ' uma - ko kihilo peda ' ba hi rala tarungku ' , pai ' tilou - kai mpencuai ' - ko ? '

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: " Pai ' Aku ' Magau ' , kutompoi ' - ra : ` Bona ni ' inca : napa to nibabehi mpotulungi ompi ' - ku tohe ' ira lau , nau ' hadua ompi ' - ku to kedi ' lia katuwu ' - na , batua - na , hibalia nibabehi hi Aku ' - mi . '

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: " Oti toe mpai ' , ku ' uli ' - raka to hi mali ki ' ii - ku : ` Malai - mokoi ngkai rei , koi ' to natotowi Tuama - ku ! Mesua ' - mokoi hi rala apu to jela ' ncuu , to raporodo ami ' - miki Magau ' Anudaa ' pai ' mala ' eka to mpotuku ' - i .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Apa ' nto ' u - ku mo ' oro ' , uma - a niwai ' koni ' . Ngkamara - a , uma - a niwai ' ue ininu .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Liu - a hi tomi - ni , uma - a nipopehani . Uma ria pohea - ku , uma - a niwai ' pohea . Peda ' - a , hi rala tarungku ' - a , uma - a nipencuai ' . '

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: " Ra ' uli ' wo ' o - mi - rawo mpai ' mpo ' uli ' - ka : ` Pue ' , nto ' uma - ko kihilo mo ' oro ' ba ngkamara ba hewa tauna toliu , ba uma - ko moheai , ba peda ' ba ratarungku ' , pai ' uma - ko kitulungi ? '

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: " Pai ' Aku ' Magau ' , kutompoi ' - ra : ` Bona ni ' inca : apa ' uma - koina nitulungi - ra tauna to kedi ' tuwu ' - ra tohe ' i - era lau , batua - na , Aku ' - mi to uma nitulungi tetu - e . ' "

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Napohudu Yesus lolita - na , na ' uli ' : " Hawe ' ea tauna to dada ' a toera lau ratadi hi rala naraka pai ' rahuku ' duu ' kahae - hae - na , pai ' tauna to monoa ' mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Kahudu - na Yesus mpololita hawe ' ea tohe ' e , na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: " Ni ' inca wa karo ' eo - na - damo eo bohe Paskah ? Pai ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' rapewai ' hi pale bali ' - ku bona raparika ' . "

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Nto ' u toe , imam pangkeni pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi morumpu hi tomi Imam Bohe to rahanga ' Kayafas .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Mohawa ' - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa akala - ta mpolede pai ' mpohoko ' Yesus bona rapatehi - ie ?

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Agina neo ' ulu tahoko ' - i nto ' u eo bohe , nee - neo ' mpai ' bara ' ntodea . "

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Nto ' u Yesus hi ngata Betania , hilou - i hi tomi hadua tauna to rahanga ' Simon topohaki ' poko ' .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Bula - na hi ree , rata hadua tobine ngkeni hameha ' butolo ' ihia ' lana honga to masuli ' lia oli - na . Bula - na Yesus ngkoni ' , tumai tobine toei mpotua lana honga toe hi woo ' - na tanda pebila ' - na .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Karahilo - na ana ' guru - na napa to nababehi tobine toei , moroe - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Napa - hawo pai ' rakerei lana to masuli ' oli - na hewa tetu ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Ke agina rapobalu ' lau bona oli - na rawai ' - raka tokabu . "

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Na ' inca Yesus pekiri - ra , toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' nipedahi nono - na tobine toei ! To nababehi hi Aku ' toe - le , lompe ' .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Apa ' tokabu - hana , ria oa ' loga - ni mpotulungi - ra apa ' ria oa ' - ra doo - ni . Aga Aku ' , uma - a mpai ' ria oa ' doo - ni .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Natuai - a hante lana toe , mpakasadia ami ' woto - ku hi karatana - ku mpai ' .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : hi humalili ' dunia ' , hiapa - apa Kareba Lompe ' rapalele , napa to nababehi tobine toei we ' i bate ralolita , uma mpai ' ralipo ' - lipo ' . "

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Nto ' u toe , hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua , to rahanga ' Yudas Iskariot , hilou hi imam pangkeni .

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Ane kutonu Yesus hi rala pale - ni , napa to niwai ' - ka ? " Rabila ' - mi doi pera ' tolu mpulu ' , pai ' rawai ' - ki .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yudas mpopali ' loga to lompe ' mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - na .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Hi eo to lomo ' - na hi Posusa ' Roti to Uma Raragii , rata - ramo ana ' guru - na hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Hiapa konoa - nu kiporodo pongkoni ' Paskah to takoni ' - e mpai ' ? "

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - mokoi hi rala ngata hi tomi ni ' anu , uli ' - ki hewa toi : ` Na ' uli ' Guru : Rata - mi tempo - ku , doko ' - a mo ' eo bohe Paskah hi tomi - nu hante ana ' guru - ku . ' "

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ana ' guru Yesus toera , hilou mpu ' u - ramo hewa to nahubui - raka , pai ' - ra mporodo - mi pongkoni ' Paskah .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Kamobengi - na , Yesus hante ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua mohura ngkoni ' .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Bula - ra ngkoni ' toe , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus : " Pe ' epei - koi : hadua ngkai olo ' - ni mpobalu ' - a mpai ' hi bali ' - ku . "

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Mpo ' epe tohe ' e , peda ' - mi nono - ra ana ' guru - na , pai ' mepekune ' - ramo hadua bo hadua hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Bela - hawo aku ' to nutoa ' - e Pue ' ? "

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Tauna to mpololo ' roti hi banga ' uta hangkaa - ngkania hante Aku ' , hi ' a - mi to mpobalu ' - a .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Makono mpu ' u , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' bate mate hewa to ralowa hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' - e . Aga mpe ' ahii ' tauna to mpobalu ' - a tetui . Ke lompe ' lau - pi ane uma - i na ' ote tina - na . "

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi - hawo Yudas , to mpobalu ' - ie mpai ' : " Bela - hawo aku ' to nutoa ' - e Guru ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Hewa to nu ' uli ' tetu - midi ! "

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Bula - ra ngkoni ' , na ' ala ' - mi Yesus roti pai ' naposampayai mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala . Oti toe , napihe - pihe pai ' natonu - raka ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' : " Ala ' - mi , koni ' - mi . Toi - mi woto - ku . "

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Oti toe na ' ala ' wo ' o sangkiri ' to ihia ' anggur , na ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala pai ' natonu - raka , na ' uli ' : " Nginu - mokoi omea ,

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: apa ' toi - mi raa ' - ku to rabowo ane mate - a mpai ' . Raa ' - ku toi mpai ' mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai ' Alata ' ala hante manusia ' , bona jeko ' tauna to wori ' ra ' ampungi .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Bona ni ' inca : ntepu ' u ngkai wae lau , uma - apa nginu anggur duu ' - na rata tempo - na Tuama - ku jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' bo ' u . Nto ' u toe mpai ' mpo ' inu - a anggur to bo ' u hangkaa - ngkania hante koi ' hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . "

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Oti toe morona ' - ramo hanyala rona ' pe ' une ' . Kahudu - ra morona ' , malai - ramo ngkai ngata hilou hi Bulu ' Zaitun .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Na ' uli ' - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Bengi toe mpai ' lau , hawe ' ea - ni , molengo pepangala ' - ni hi Aku ' , apa ' ria te ' uki ' Lolita Alata ' ala to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Kupatehi topo ' ewu toei , pai ' bima inewu - na pagaa ' - gaa ' - ramo . '

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Aga ane tuwu ' nculii ' - apa mpai ' , meri ' ulu - a hilou hi tana ' Galilea , bona hirua ' hi ria - ta - damo mpai ' . "

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' - mi Petrus : " Nau ' hawe ' ea tauna molengo pepangala ' - ra hi Iko Pue ' , aku ' uma ! "

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - koko : kako ' ia - na turua ' manu ' bengi toe mpai ' lau , mpolia ' tolu ngkani - moko mposapu kanu ' inca - ku . "

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Nau ' - a mate hangkaa - ngkania dohe - nu , uma mpu ' u kusapu kaku ' inca - nu ! " Wae wo ' o - rawo pololita - ra ana ' guru - na to ntani ' - na .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Oti toe , rata - ramo hi pampa to rahanga ' Getsemani . Hi ree - i mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Koi ' , mohura hi rei - mokoi . Aku ' , lou hi ree - a mai ulu mosampaya . "

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Aga Petrus pai ' ana ' Zebedeus to rodua , nabawai - ra hilou dohe - na . Nto ' u toe , susa ' pai ' mokaratu - mi nono - na .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Susa ' lia nono - ku , hewa to neo ' mate - ama ku ' epe . Rehe ' i - mokoi ulu , dohei - a mojaga . "

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Oti toe hilou - imi molaa hangkedi ' , pai ' - i motumpa , mosampaya , na ' uli ' : " Tuama - ku , ane ma ' ala , pomolaa - ka - kuwo kaparia to neo ' mporumpa ' - a toi . Aga bela konoa - ku Aku ' to jadi ' , agina konoa - nu Iko moto . "

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' - imi hi ana ' guru - na to tolu toera , narata - ra bula - ra leta ' moto . Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Hilo ! Hajaa - wadi uma nidadahi mojaga dohe - ku ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Mojaga pai ' mosampaya - mokoi bona neo ' - koi mporata pesori . Hi rala nono - ni dota moto - koi mpobabehi to makono , aga uma nidadahi apa ' manusia ' bate lente . "

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Ngkai ree , hilou wo ' o - imi mosampaya , na ' uli ' : " Tuama - ku , ane kaparia toi uma ma ' ala rawi ' iha - ka , bate konoa - numi to majadi ' . "

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' wo ' o - imi mporata ana ' guru - na , leta ' wo ' o - ra - wadi apa ' mopoke ' mata - ra .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Hangkani wo ' o - ipi Yesus mpalahii - ra hilou mosampaya katolu ngkani - na . Posampaya - na toe hibalia hante posampaya - na to we ' i .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Ka ' oti - na mosampaya toe , nculii ' wo ' o - imi hi ana ' guru - na to tolu toera , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Turu pai ' leta ' oa ' - pada - koi ? Hilo - dile , rata - mi tempo - na Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' rapobalu ' pai ' ratonu hi tauna to dada ' a .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Memata - mokoi ! Hilo , etu - imi tumai tauna to mpobalu ' - a . Kita - mi lou . "

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mololita - pidi , rata - imi Yudas , hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua . Pai ' dohe - na wori ' wo ' o tau ntani ' - na to ngkeni piho ' pai ' sumampu . Hira ' toe rapahawa ' imam pangkeni pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Yudas mpo ' uli ' ami ' - miraka tanda bona ra ' inca kato ' uma - nai Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Hema mpai ' to ku ' eki , Hi ' a - mi Yesus . Hoko ' - imi ! "

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Jadi ' , karata - ra hi ree , kahilou - nami Yudas mpohirua ' - ki Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Wori ' tabe , Guru ! " pai ' na ' eki - i ntuku ' ada - ra to Yahudi .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Toe - tanoe pai ' tumai - koe , bale ! " Katumai - rami tauna to wori ' mpohoko ' Yesus .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Ngkai ree , hadua tauna to dohe Yesus mpowute ' piho ' - na natime - ki batua Imam Bohe , bela mpoholu tilinga - na .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Unco ' nculii ' piho ' - nu ! Apa ' hema to mpohenta piho ' mpopatehi doo , bate rapatehi wo ' o - i - hawo mpai ' hante piho ' .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: Ha uma nu ' incai , ane mpopetulungi - a hi Tuama - ku , napesahui mpahawa ' tumai hampulu ' rontuda tantara mala ' eka - na , ba melabi tena !

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Aga ane ta ' ewa - ra to mpohoko ' - a toi - e , uma mpai ' madupa ' lolita to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' owi to mpo ' uli ' hawe ' ea toe lau kana majadi ' hi Aku ' . "

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Nto ' u toe , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka tauna to wori ' toera : " Ha toperampaki - a toi - e , pai ' mingki ' tumai - koi ntali piho ' pai ' sumampu mpohoko ' - ae ! Butu eo - na mohura moto - a hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala metudui ' , napa pai ' uma - a nihoko ' nto ' u toe ?

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Aga to hewa toi - le kana majadi ' , bona madupa ' - mi napa to ra ' uki ' nabi - nabi owi hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' . " Oti toe , metibo ' - ramo hawe ' ea ana ' guru - na mpalahii - i .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Ngkai ree , tauna to mpohoko ' Yesus mpokeni - i hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe Kayafas . Hi ria morumpu - ramo guru - guru agama pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Petrus metuku ' ngkawao - wadi , duu ' - na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe . Mesua ' - i hi berewe pai ' - i mohura dohe topojaga , apa ' doko ' na ' inca ba napa mpai ' to majadi ' hi Yesus .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Nto ' u toe , imam pangkeni pai ' hawe ' ea topohura agama morumpu hi tomi Kayafas . Mpali ' - ra sabi ' boa ' to mpakilu Yesus , bona ngalai ' rahuku ' mate - i .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Aga nau ' wori ' sabi ' boa ' to mpo ' uli ' napa to nababehi Yesus , uma raruai ' to masipato ' rahuku ' mate - ki . Ka ' omea - na , ria rodua sabi ' to tumai hi nyanyoa topohura to hibalia lolita - ra ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: ra ' uli ' : " Tauna toii , ria - i - hana mpo ' uli ' : ` Tomi Alata ' ala ma ' ala kugero , pai ' rala - na tolu eo kuwangu nculii ' . ' "

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Kamokore - nami Imam Bohe pai ' - i mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Ha uma nutompoi ' - ra to mpakilu - ko toe - e ? "

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Aga Yesus , uma - i winihi . Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Imam Bohe : " Hante hanga ' Alata ' ala to Tuwu ' , uli ' - kakai to makono ! Makono mpu ' u ka ' Iko - na Magau ' Topetolo ' , Ana ' Alata ' ala - e ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Io ' , hewa to nu ' uli ' tetu - e . Pai ' ku ' uli ' tena : rata mpai ' tempo - na nihilo - a Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , mohura pai ' moparenta hi mali ka ' ana Alata ' ala to Mobaraka ' , pai ' nihilo wo ' o - a mpai ' mana ' u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu ' . "

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe we ' i , Imam Bohe mpoheu ' baju - na ngkai kamoroe - na , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Tau toii mpopohibalia woto - na hante Alata ' ala ! Uma - pi mingki ' ria sabi ' . Ni ' epe moto - mi - koiwo lolita - na mpokedi ' Alata ' ala .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Beiwa - mi - koiwo pompowile - nie ? " Ratompoi ' topohura : " Kana rahuku ' mate - imile ! "

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Ngkai ree , ra ' uelikui lio - na pai ' - i raweba ' . Ria wo ' o to mpohopo ' - i , pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki :

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: " Ee Magau ' Topetolo ' ! Pe ' uli ' pe ' ba hema to mpohopo ' - koe ! "

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Petrus mohura hi berewe . Nto ' u pohura - na toe , tumai hadua tobine to mobago hi tomi Imam Bohe , na ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Ba iko wo ' o - di doo - na Yesus to Galilea toei - e mai ? "

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Aga nasapu Petrus hi nyanyoa - ra omea , na ' uli ' : " Uma - kuna ku ' incai napa to nu ' uli ' ! "

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Ngkai ree hilou wo ' o - imi Petrus mokore mohu ' hi wobo ' wala . Ria wo ' o hadua tobine mpohilo - i pai ' mpo ' uli ' - raka tauna to hi ree : " Hi ' a toi wo ' o - le to dohe Yesus to Nazaret toei - e mai . "

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Nasapu wo ' o - wadi Petrus hante mosumpa , na ' uli ' : " Uma - kuna ku ' incai - i tau tetui ! "

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Uma mahae ngkai ree , tauna to mokore hi ree mpomohui ' Petrus , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Iko mpu ' u - di hadua doo - nae ! Incana ngkai kotu basa - nu Katogalilea - nu . "

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Mosumpa tena - i Petrus mpotuna ' woto - na , na ' uli ' : " Uma mpu ' u - kuwo ku ' incai - i ! " Nto ' u toe turua ' - mi manu ' .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Nakiwoi - mi Petrus lolita Yesus ngone to mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Kako ' ia - na turua ' manu ' , mpolia ' tolu ngkani - moko mposapu kanu ' inca - ku . " Kamalai - nami Petrus hilou hi mali - na , pai ' - i geo ' ngkai kapeda ' nono - na .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Mepupulo ngkii , hawe ' ea imam pangkeni pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi mpobotuhi : Yesus kana rapatehi .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Jadi ' , rahoo ' - imi pai ' rakeni hilou rabua ' hi Gubernur Pilatus .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Ane Yudas , to mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - na toei , kana ' inca - na karahuku ' mate - na mpai ' Yesus , soho ' - mi nono - na . Kahilou - nami hi imam pangkeni pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi , napoponculi ' - raka doi pera ' to tolu mpulu ' mpepa ' ,

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' : " Mojeko ' - ama ! Mpobalu ' - a - kuna tauna to uma masala ' , alaa - na rahuku ' mate - i ! " Ratompoi ' - i : " Napa ki ' uli ' kai ' ! Iko moto - kowo pue ' sala ' ! "

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yudas mpetadi doi tohe ' e hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , pai ' - i hilou mengkahunca ' .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Imam pangkeni mpotima ' doi toe , pai ' ra ' uli ' : " Doi toi , doi posula ' raa ' . Ntuku ' atura agama , doi to hewa tohe ' e uma ma ' ala rapuna ' hi rala peti ' pompunaa ' doi pepue ' hi Tomi Alata ' ala . "

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Hibalia - mi pohawa ' - ra , doi toe ra ' oli - ki tana ' to rahanga ' Tana ' Topobabehi Kura , bona tana ' toe rapontanai - raka tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Toe pai ' tana ' toe rahanga ' Tana ' Raa ' duu ' tempo toi .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Hante babehia - ra toe , madupa ' - mi napa to nalowa nabi Yeremia owi , hewa toi moni - na : " Ntuku ' ada to Israel , oli hadua batua tolu mpulu ' doi pera ' . Jadi ' , ra ' ala ' - mi tolu mpulu ' doi pera ' toe ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: pai ' ra ' oli - ki tana ' topobabehi kura . Tohe ' e majadi ' ntuku ' hawa ' Pue ' Alata ' ala hi aku ' . "

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Ane Yesus we ' i , karakeni - na hi Gubernur Pilatus , mokore - i hi nyanyoa - na . Pilatus mpekune ' - i : " Ha Iko mpu ' u - mi Magau ' to Yahudi - e ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Wae mpu ' u , hewa to nu ' uli ' tetu . "

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Imam pangkeni pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi mpodulu mpakilu - i . Aga uma - i winihi .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Toe pai ' Pilatus mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Ha uma nu ' epei hawe ' ea to rapakilu - kokoe ? "

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Uma hamelaa nahono ' Yesus , alaa - na napokakonce lia Gubernur .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Butu eo bohe Paskah , Gubernur biasa mpobahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku ' , ba hema konoa ntodea .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Jadi ' , mpae toe , ria hadua to ratarungku ' to ra ' inca lia ntodea . Hanga ' - na Yesus Barabas .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Jadi ' , hi pohura - na Pilatus mpohurai kara - kara Yesus toe , wori ' - mi tauna morumpu . Mepekune ' Pilatus mpekune ' - ra : " Hema to nipokono kubahaka - kokoi mpae tohe ' i ? Yesus Barabas , ba Yesus to rahanga ' Kristus - di ? "

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Pilatus mpo ' uli ' hewa toe , apa ' na ' inca ka ' uma - na - hawo masala ' - i Yesus ; pangkeni to Yahudi mpotonu Yesus hi hi ' a apa ' kamohingi ' - ra - wadi .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Nto ' u pohura - na Pilatus hi pohuraa pobotuhia toe , rata suro ngkai tobine - na to mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Neo ' - konae ' nuhuku ' - i tauna to uma masala ' tetui ! Apa ' ngkai Hi ' a alaa - ku mo ' ompo ' to mekoroi ' bengi ngone - e . "

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Aga imam pangkeni pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi , kaliliu moto - ra mpo ' ukei ' ntodea , ra ' uli ' - raka : " Perapi ' - koi hi Gubernur bona Barabas nabahaka , pai ' Yesus to nahuku ' mate ! "

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Jadi ' , mepekune ' Gubernur Pilatus hi ntodea , na ' uli ' : " Ngkai hira ' rodua tohe ' i , hema to nipokono kubahaka - kokoi ? " Ratompoi ' : " Barabas ! "

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Napekune ' tena Pilatus : " Ane wae , kupopai - imi Yesus to rahanga ' Kristus ? " Metompoi ' - ra omea : " Raparika ' - i ! "

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Mepekune ' tena - i - pidi Pilatus : " Hiaa ' napa sala ' - na ? " Rapesukui lau - mi mejeu ' : " Parika ' - imi ! "

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Ka ' omea - na nahilo Pilatus uma - pi ria kalaua - na mpololitai - ra , apa ' kameroo - rodoa ' lau - ramo . Toe pai ' na ' ala ' ue napowano hi nyanyoa ntodea pai ' na ' uli ' : " Mowano - a ! Bona nihilo , ka ' uma - na - kuwo kugalo kanipatehi - na tau toii ! Koi ' moto - koiwo to mpotangku . "

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Metompoi ' ntodea , ra ' uli ' : " Io ' , kai ' moto - kaiwo pai ' hante muli - kai to mpokolo kamate - na . "

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Ngkai ree , nabahaka - miraka Barabas , pai ' nahubui tantara - na mpoweba ' Yesus . Oti toe natonu - miraka bona raparika ' .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Oti toe , tantara Gubernur mpokeni Yesus mesua ' hi rala tomi Gubernur , pai ' - ra mpokio ' hawe ' ea doo - ra tumai mpotipuhi - i .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Raroncu - ki pohea - na pai ' rapasuai ' - i baju to mperelei to hewa baju magau ' .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Rababehi hameha ' songko ngkai walaa to morui to hewa songko magau ' , pai ' rasongkoi - ki . Rawai ' wo ' o - i lua ' hameha ' hi pale ka ' ana - na , hewa lua ' to nakamu magau ' , pai ' - ra mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa - na , ra ' uli ' : " Wori ' tabe , Magau ' to Yahudi ! "

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Ra ' uelikui - i pai ' ra ' ala ' lua ' to hi pale - na rapao ' - ki woo ' - na .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Ka ' oti - na rapopo ' ore ' hewa toe , raroncu - mi baju to rabajui - ki we ' i pai ' ra ' uncoi ' nculii ' - i pohea - na moto - mi . Oti toe rakeni - imi hilou hi mali ngata bona raparika ' .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Hi lengko ohea hirua ' - ra hante hadua tauna to rahanga ' Simon to Kirene . Tantara to Roma mpewuku Simon toe mpopaha ' a kaju parika ' - na Yesus .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Uma mahae rata - ramo hi po ' ohaa ' to rahanga ' Golgota , batua - na Bulu ' Banga ' woo ' .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Hi ree , Yesus rapopo ' inui anggur to ragalo hante pokuli ' to mopai ' . Ka ' oti - na napemita , oja ' - i mpo ' inu .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Raparika ' - imi , pai ' pohea - na rabagi - bagi hante ntene ' undi hewa pompenoa ' - ra .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Oti toe , mohura - ramo hilau mojaga .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Hi kaju parika ' - na hi lolo woo ' - na rapataka ' hampepa ' papan . Hi papan toe te ' uki ' napa to rapakilu - ki Yesus , hewa toi moni - na : TOI - MI YESUS MAGAU ' TO YAHUDI .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Ria wo ' o rodua toperampaki raparika ' dohe - na , hadua mali ka ' ana - na hadua mali ki ' ii - na .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Tauna to liu hi ree , ngkololi - ra mpopo ' ore ' - i ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: ra ' uli ' : " Nu ' uli ' - kona mpogero - ko Tomi Alata ' ala pai ' nuwangu nculii ' rala - na tolu eo ! Ane Ana ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - ko , tulungi woto - nu moto ! Mana ' u - moko ngkai kaju parika ' tetu ! "

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Wae wo ' o imam pangkeni , guru agama pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi mpopo ' ore ' - i , ra ' uli ' :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: " Tau ntani ' - na natulungi - ramo , woto - na moto - pi uma nakulei ' ntulungi . Hiaa ' bo Hi ' a he ' e Magau ' to Israel ! Agina mana ' u - i ngkai kaju parika ' - na toe , pai ' lako ' tapangala ' - i .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Ncarumaka Alata ' ala - i , pai ' na ' uli ' Ana ' Alata ' ala - i . Mai tahilo Alata ' ala mpobahaka - i , ane dota - i . "

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Ntahawe ' toperampaki to raparika ' dohe - na , meruge ' wo ' o - ra - rawo mporuge ' - i hewa toe .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Tebua ' - mi eo , muu - mule ' mobengi hobo ' hi ngata toe rala - na tolu jaa .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Jaa tolu ncimonou ' , mekio ' - imi Yesus napasimuku mpo ' uli ' : " Alata ' ala - ku ! Alata ' ala - ku ! Napa pai ' nupalahii - a ? " Hi rala basa Yahudi : " Eli ! Eli ! Lama sabakhtani ? "

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Ba hangkuja dua to mokore mohu ' hi kaju parika ' - na mpo ' epe pe ' au - na toe , ra ' uli ' : " Epe , mpokio ' nabi Elia - i ! "

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Ria hadua to mokeno hilou mpo ' ala ' hampu ' u wunga to hewa lomo ' , nabangkahi hi rala ue anggur to mo ' onco , natu ' u hi wuntu hompea pai ' napopoju ' ui - ki Yesus bona na ' inu .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' : " Popea ulu , tahilo ba tumai mpu ' u - i Elia mpotulungi - i . "

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Oti toe me ' au tena - i Yesus napesukui , pai ' modupe ' - mi inoha ' - na .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Nto ' u toe , kain porini - olo ' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala muu - mule ' mobika ' ntongo ' ngkai lolo - na rata hi une ' - na . Ria wo ' o linu , pai ' watu bohe paheka ' - heka ' .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Wori ' daeo ' mobea - mi , pai ' wori ' tauna to monoa ' ingku - ra owi rapotuwu ' nculii ' .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus tuwu ' nculii ' , mehupa ' - ra ngkai daeo ' - ra , pai ' - ra mesua ' - hi ngata Yerusalem , ngata to moroli ' toe . Wori ' tauna mpohilo - ra .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Tadulako tantara hante tantara - tantara doo - na to mpojaga Yesus , me ' eka ' lia - ramo mpo ' epe linu pai ' mpohilo hawe ' ea to jadi ' toe . Ra ' uli ' : " Ana ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - i - tawo ' ! "

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Hi ree , wori ' wo ' o tobine to menaa ngkawao . Hira ' toe tobine to mpotuku ' pai ' mpotulungi Yesus , ntepu ' u ngkai pobago - na hi tana ' Galilea .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Hanga ' - na to hadua , Maria Magdalena . To hadua wo ' o , Maria tina - na Yakobus pai ' Yusuf . Pai ' hadua wo ' o tobine - na Zebedeus .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Neo ' limpa - mi eo , tumai hadua tauna to mo ' ua ' to ngkai ngata Arimatea , hanga ' - na Yusuf . Yusuf toei , topetuku ' Yesus wo ' o - i - hawo .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Hilou - i hi Pilatus mperapi ' woto Yesus . Pilatus mpohubui tantara - na mpowai ' - i Yusuf woto - na Yesus .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Na ' ala ' mpu ' u - mi , naputu ' hante kain to bula ,

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: pai ' napopoturu hi rala daeo ' . Daeo ' toe , daeo ' to bo ' u - pidi , daeo ' pomporodoa - na Yusuf moto , to ratowi hi panapa bulu ' watu . Oti toe , naluli ' hameha ' watu to bohe na ' unca - ki daeo ' toe , pai ' - i malai - mi .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Aga Maria Magdalena pai ' Maria to ntani ' - na , mohura - ra hi mai hi mali daeo ' .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Kamepulo - na hi Eo Sabat , imam - imam pangkeni pai ' to Parisi hilou hangkaa - ngkania hi Pilatus ,

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: ra ' uli ' : " Tua Gubernur , kikiwoi lolita topebagiu toei ngone lou , bula - na tuwu ' - pidi na ' uli ' : ` Kaliu - na tolu eo , tuwu ' nculii ' - a . '

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Jadi ' , toe pai ' kiperapi ' bona Tua mpohubui tantara hilou mpojaga daeo ' - na toe ria , radongo lompe ' duu ' - na rata hi eo katolu - na , bona neo ' ria loga ana ' guru - na lou mpanako woto - na . Ra ' uli ' mpai ' hi ntodea tuwu ' nculii ' - i , duu ' - na wori ' - mi tauna to rabagiu . Helee , meliu lau - mi mpai ' kawori ' tauna to mpotuku ' - i ngkai to mpotuku ' - i bula - na tuwu ' - pidi . "

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Na ' uli ' Pilatus : " Ria moto tantara . Keni - ramo hilou mpodongo daeo ' - na hudupakulea ' - ni . "

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - ramo hi daeo ' . Rasaa ' watu po ' unca - na , bona uma ma ' ala raderu ' , pai ' rahubui tantara mpodongo daeo ' toe , bona neo ' ria to mpokabiboi .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Timpaliu - mi eo pepuea ' , kako ' ia - na mehupa ' eo hi eo Mingku , Maria Magdalena pai ' Maria to ntani ' - na hilou mpokamata daeo ' .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Ncorobaa ria linu bohe , apa ' hadua mala ' eka Pue ' mana ' u ngkai suruga tumai mpoderu ' watu po ' unca daeo ' , pai ' - i mohura hi lolo - na .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Lence - na mekiroi ' hewa kila ' , pai ' pohea - na bula ngehe .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Tantara to mpodongo hi ree , me ' eka ' lia - ramo , moridi ' - ra , pai ' uma - rapa tono mokore , hewa to mate - ramo .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Na ' uli ' mala ' eka mpo ' uli ' - raka tobine toera : " Neo ' - koi me ' eka ' , ku ' inca moto mpali ' - koi Yesus to mate raparika ' .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Uma - ipi - hana ria hi rehe ' i . Tuwu ' nculii ' - imi , hewa to na ' uli ' - kokoie wengi . Mai hilo karatu ' ua - na wengi .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Wae - pi , hilou - mokoi pesahui , uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na katuwu ' - na nculii ' - mi . Hilou meri ' ulu - i hi tana ' Galilea . Hi ria - damo mpai ' , pai ' - i nihilo . Kiwoi napa to ku ' uli ' - kokoi ! "

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Rapesahui - mi - rawo tobine toera malai ngkai daeo ' . Me ' eka ' moto - ra , aga goe ' lia wo ' o - ra . Pokeno - rami hilou apa ' doko ' raparata to jadi ' toe hi ana ' guru - na Yesus .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Muu - mule ' etu - imi Yesus mpohirua ' - raka pai ' natabe - ra . Tumai - ramo mpomohui ' - i , rakupui witi ' - na pai ' ranyompa - i .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' me ' eka ' ! Hilou - mokoi , uli ' - raka ompi ' - ku bona hilou - ra hi Galilea , hi ria mpai ' rahilo - a . "

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Lingku ' - ra tobine toera hilou , ba hangkuja dua tantara to mpodongo daeo ' hilou hi rala ngata , pai ' - ra mpoparata hi imam pangkeni hawe ' ea to jadi ' hi daeo ' we ' i .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Mohawa ' - ramo imam pangkeni toera hante totu ' a to Yahudi to ntani ' - na . Kabotu ' lolita - ra , agina mpowai ' - ra tantara wori ' doi po ' ompo wiwi - ra , bona neo ' ra ' uli ' hilau .

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
