text2: Ra ' uli ' imam pangkeni toera mpo ' uli ' - raka tantara : " Uli ' - koi hewa toi : ` Mentongo ' bengi ngone , topetuku ' Yesus tumai mpanako woto - na bula - kai leta ' . '

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Ane na ' epe Gubernur tohe ' e , kai ' - damo mpololitai - i bona neo ' - koi rapoo - popai . "

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Radoa - mi - rawo tantara doi toe , pai ' ra ' uli ' hewa to oti ratudui ' - raka . Duu ' rata hi eo tohe ' i , motote oa ' lolita toe hi to Yahudi .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Ana ' guru - na Yesus to hampulu ' hadua toera hilou hi tana ' Galilea , hi bulu ' to natudo ' ami ' - raka Yesus .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Rahilo mpu ' u - imi hi ria , pai ' ranyompa - i . Aga ria wo ' o tauna to morara ' - pidi nono - ra .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Yesus mpomohui ' - ra pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Hawe ' ea kuasa hi suruga pai ' hi dunia ' ratonu - maka .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Jadi ' , hilou - mokoi hi humalili ' dunia ' , tudui ' hawe ' ea tauna jadi ' topetuku ' - ku . Niu ' - ra hi rala hanga ' Alata ' ala to Tuama , to Ana ' pai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Tudui ' - ramo mpotuku ' hawe ' ea to kuhawai ' - kokoi . Kiwoi - koi : kudohei moto - koi duu ' - na hi kahudua dunia ' . "

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Tohe ' i - mi Kareba Lompe ' , tutura katuwu ' - na Yesus Kristus , Ana ' Alata ' ala .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Tutura - na ntepu ' u ngkai karata - na Yohanes Topeniu ' . Karata - na Yohanes toei , telowa ami ' - mi hi rala sura nabi Yesaya . Hante wiwi nabi , Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' - ki Ana ' - na hewa toi : Hi ' a toi - mi suro - ku , kuhubui - i meri ' ulu ngkai Iko , bona mporodo ohea - nu . "

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: " Mekio ' - i hi papada to wao ' , na ' uli ' : ` Neo ' rata - imi Pue ' ! Porodo ami ' - miki ohea - na . Nipakalempe ami ' - mi ohea to natara mpai ' . ' "

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Hewa to ra ' uki ' toe , mehupa ' mpu ' u - imi Yohanes Topeniu ' hi papada to wao ' . Mpoparata - i Lolita Alata ' ala hi ntodea , na ' uli ' : " Medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , pai ' kana tumai - koi kuniu ' bona Alata ' ala mpo ' ampungi jeko ' - ni . "

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Wori ' tauna to hilou hi papada to wao ' doko ' mpo ' epe lolita - na Yohanes . Ria - ra ngkai ngata Yerusalem pai ' ngkai hawe ' ea ngata hi tana ' Yudea . Hilou - ra mpangaku ' jeko ' - ra , pai ' naniu ' - ra hi ue Yordan , tanda kamedea - ra ngkai jeko ' - ra .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Pohea - na Yohanes rababehi ngkai wulu porewua to rahanga ' unta . Salepe ' - na ngkai kuliba . Koni ' - na lari pai ' ue wani .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Mpopalele - i kareba toi : " Ngkabokoa ' ngkai aku ' , tumai mpai ' to meliu kuasa - na ngkai aku ' . Bangku ' mowilingkudu mpobongka koloro sapatu ' - na , uma - a - kuwo natao .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Aku ' mponiu ' - koi hante ue tanda kamedea - ni ngkai jeko ' - ni . Aga Hi ' a mpai ' mponiu ' - koi hante Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . "

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , Yesus me ' ongko ' ngkai ngata Nazaret hi tana ' Galilea , tumai mpopeniu ' hi Yohanes . Yohanes mponiu ' - i hi ue Yordan .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Wae ka ' oti - na raniu ' , mencore - imi ngkai ue , pai ' mpohilo - imi langi ' mobea pai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mana ' u tumai molence mpo - danci mangkebodo hompo hi Hi ' a .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Alata ' ala mololita ngkai langi ' mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Iko toi - mi Ana ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' . Iko - mi to mpakagoe ' nono - ku . "

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Oti toe , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpakeni Yesus lou hi papada to wao ' .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Opo ' mpulu ' eo - i hi ria . Bula - na hi papada toe , Magau ' Anudaa ' mposori - i . Binata to me ' ila dohe - na , pai ' mala ' eka mpomawai - i .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Ko ' ia mahae ngkai ree , Yohanes Topeniu ' rahoko ' pai ' - i ratarungku ' . Nto ' u toe , hilou - imi Yesus hi tana ' Galilea , pai ' - i mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' to ngkai Alata ' ala ,

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: na ' uli ' : " Neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' ! Medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , pangala ' - mi Kareba Lompe ' . "

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Bula - na momako ' hi wiwi ' rano Galilea , mpohilo - i rodua tauna . Hanga ' - ra : Simon hante Andreas ompi ' - na . Nto ' u toe , bula - ra mebau ' hi rano mojala ' , apa ' toe - mi - rawo bago - ra .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Mai - mokoi ntuku ' - a ! Uma - pokoi mebau ' mpali ' uru . Ngkai wae lau , kuwai ' - koi pobago mpotudui ' tauna mepangala ' hi Aku ' . "

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Karapalahii - nami jala ' - ra , pai ' ntepu ' u eo toe mpotuku ' Yesus - ramo .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Napaliliu - mi Yesus momako ' , ko ' ia molaa ngkai ree mpohilo wo ' o - imi rodua to ntali ompi ' : Yakobus pai ' Yohanes , ana ' - na Zebedeus . Hira ' toe , bula - ra mpokolompehii jala ' - ra hi rala sakaya .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Nakio ' - ramo mpotuku ' - i . Jadi ' , rapalahii - mi tuama - ra hi rala sakaya hante tauna to dohe - ra to ngkoni ' gaji ' , pai ' mpotuku ' Yesus - ramo .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus hante topetuku ' - na hilou hi ngata Kapernaum . Hi eo pepuea ' to Yahudi , mesua ' - imi hi rala tomi posampayaa pai ' natepu ' u - mi metudui ' .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Konce - ramo tauna to mpo ' epe tudui ' - na . Apa ' uma - i metudui ' hewa guru - guru agama . Petudui ' - na , hewa tauna to mokuasa mpu ' u .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Nto ' u toe , ria hadua tauna to nahawi ' anudaa ' , mesua ' wo ' o - i - hawo hi tomi posampayaa toe , pai ' - i mejeu ' :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: " Ee Yesus to Nazaret ! Doko ' nupopai - dakaie ? Ba doko ' nuropuhi - dakaie ? Ku ' inca moto - kole , ka ' Iko - na Suro to moroli ' ngkai Alata ' ala - e . "

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki anudaa ' toei : " Ngkaba ' i - ko ! Palai - ko ngkai tauna tetui ! "

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Tauna toei moridi ' sabana anudaa ' , pai ' - i me ' au , pai ' malai - mi anudaa ' to mpohawi ' - i .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Konce omea - ramo tauna to mpohilo , alaa - na momepololitai - ramo ra ' uli ' : " Uma mowo - e ' ! Toi - e tudui ' to bo ' u , ria mpu ' u baraka ' - na ! Mpopalai - i anudaa ' , bo ratuku ' mpu ' u - diki - hana hawa ' - nae ! "

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Ngkai ree , kamolele - nami kareba to mpotompo ' wiwi Yesus hobo ' hi tana ' Galilea .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Kanculii ' - ra Yesus hante ana ' guru - na ngkai tomi posampayaa toe , hilou - ramo hi tomi - ra Simon pai ' Andreas . Yakobus pai ' Yohanes hilou wo ' o dohe - ra .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Hi ria , piniana - na Simon tobine ntora turu apa ' ngkelengi ' - i . Rapesahui mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus kapeda ' - na .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Ngkai ree , hilou - imi Yesus hi poturua - na , nakamu pale - na pai ' napopemata - i . Ncaliu mo ' uri ' - imi , pai ' - i mpolayani - ra .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Ncimonou ' toe , limpa - mi eo , wori ' tauna tumai hi Yesus mpokeni hawe ' ea to peda ' ba to nahawi ' seta .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Wori ' pue ' ngata tumai morumpu hi berewe tomi Simon .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Wori ' tauna to napaka ' uri ' ngkai haki ' - ra to wori ' nyala . Wori ' wo ' o seta to mpesuai ' tauna napopalai . Aga seta toera , uma - ra napiliu mololita , apa ' ra ' inca moto Kahi ' a - na Ana ' Alata ' ala .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Kamepulo - na parabaja - pidi , memata - imi Yesus pai ' - i malai ngkai ngata hilou hi kawaoa ' - na , lou mosampaya .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Simon hante doo - na hilou mpali ' - i . Kararua ' - na , ra ' uli ' - ki :

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: " Wori ' tauna mpali ' - ko Guru . "

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - tamo hi ngata ntani ' - na to mohu ' bona mpokeni Lolita Alata ' ala hi ria wo ' o - a . Apa ' toe - mi patuju - ku tumai hi dunia ' . "

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Ngkai ree , kahilou - nami Yesus hante ana ' guru - na mpokeni Lolita Alata ' ala hi hawe ' ea ngata hi tana ' Galilea . Metudui ' - i hi rala tomi - tomi posampayaa , pai ' - i mpopalai seta to mpesuai ' tauna .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Ria hadua tauna to mohaki ' poko ' rata hi Yesus . Powingkotu ' - nami mpopetulungi , na ' uli ' : " Ane ma ' ala , paka ' uri ' - a - kuwo ! "

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Metumu ' - mi ahi ' - na Yesus mpohilo - i . Toe pai ' najama - i pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ma ' ala moto , kupaka ' uri ' - moko ! "

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Hampinisi mata , moronto - mi haki ' - na , mo ' uri ' - imi .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpohubui - i hilou , na ' uli ' - ki : " Kutagi mpu ' u - ko ,

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: neo ' nulolita hi hema - hema napa to jadi ' tohe ' i - e . Hilou - moko ulu mpopehuwu woto - nu hi imam , bona nahilo kamo ' uri ' - numi , pai ' keni pepue ' - nu ntuku ' parenta to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Musa , bona monoa ' hi hawe ' ea tauna kamo ' uri ' - nu mpu ' u - mi . "

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Ntaa ' we ' i , kahilou - na tauna toei , ntora nalolita lau - mi hiapa - apa kanapaka ' uri ' - na Yesus . Alaa - na , Yesus uma - ipi bisa mesua ' hi rala ngata apa ' wori ' rahi tauna mpotipuhi - i . Mo ' oha ' hi mali ngata - i - damo hi kawaoa ' - na . Aga nau ' wae , uma oa ' ria kaputua - na tauna tumai ngkai wori ' ngata doko ' mpohirua ' - ki .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Ba hangkuja kahae - na ngkai toe , Yesus nculii ' hilou hi ngata Kapernaum . Motolele - mi karia - na Yesus hi rala tomi ,

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: toe pai ' wori ' tauna himuhu doko ' mpohilo - i . Kahimuhu - ra toe , alaa - na bihi ' - mi hi rala tomi , rata - rata hi wobo ' bihi ' tauna . Naparata - raka Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Bula - na mololita tohe ' e , tumai opo ' tauna mpokowa ' doo - ra to pungku .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Uma ria ohea - ra mpomohui ' Yesus apa ' bihi ' rahi tauna . Toe pai ' ngkahe ' tuka ' - ramo hilou hi lolo tomi , ratangka ' ata ' to hintoto Yesus , pai ' ra ' ulu doo - ra ntali ali ' - na hilou hi rala tomi .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Nahilo Yesus kabohe pepangala ' - ra toe , na ' uli ' - mi hi topungku toei : " Ana ' - ku , te ' ampungi - mi jeko ' - nu . "

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Ria wo ' o - ra - rawo ba hangkuja dua guru agama Yahudi to mohura hi rala tomi toe . Kedi ' nono - ra mpo ' epe lolita - na Yesus toe , ra ' uli ' hi rala nono - ra :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: " Daho ' rahi - i - hana tauna toei mololita hewa tetu ! Ha na ' uli ' - hana hibalia tuwu ' - na hante tuwu ' - na Alata ' ala ? Uma ria ntani ' - na to ma ' ala mpo ' ampungi jeko ' , hadua Alata ' ala - wadi . "

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Ntaa ' na ' inca moto - di Yesus napa to hi pekiri - rae . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa - di pai ' hewa tetu pekiri - nie ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ria mpu ' u kuasa - ku hi dunia ' mpo ' ampungi jeko ' . Tapi ' ane ku ' uli ' - ki topungku toei : ` Te ' ampungi - mi jeko ' - nu , ' uma ni ' incai ba te ' ampungi mpu ' u - di jeko ' - na ba uma - di . Aga ane ku ' uli ' : ` Memata - moko , lulu - mi ali ' - nu pai ' momako ' - moko , ' nihilo mpai ' kadupa ' - na ba ka ' uma - na . Jadi ' , kupopohiloi - koi karia - na kuasa - ku mpo ' ampungi jeko ' . " Ngkai ree , kamewili ' - nami hi topungku toei ,

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: na ' uli ' - ki : " Memata - moko , lulu - mi ali ' - nu , pai ' - ko nculii ' - mi ! "

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Pemata - na mpu ' u - mi topungku toei , nalulu ali ' - na , pai ' - i momako ' hilou rasabii ' tauna to wori ' . Karahilo - na tauna to wori ' napa to jadi ' toe , konce omea - ramo , pai ' - ra mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala , ra ' uli ' : " Ko ' ia ria tahiloi hewa to jadi ' tohe ' i ! "

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Oti toe , hilou wo ' o - imi Yesus hi wiwi ' rano . Wori ' lia tauna morumpu , pai ' natudui ' - ra .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Bula - na momako ' , mpohilo - i hadua topesingara ' paja ' to rahanga ' Lewi ana ' - na Alfeus , bula - na mohura hi kantoro ' - na . Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Tuku ' - ama ! " Kamokore - nami Lewi kaliliu mpotuku ' - i .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na ngkoni ' hi tomi Lewi , pai ' wori ' wo ' o - ra topesingara ' paja ' pai ' tau ntani ' - na to ra ' uli ' ntodea dada ' a kehi - ra tumai ngkoni ' dohe - ra , apa ' wori ' - ra to mpotuku ' Yesus .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Ria wo ' o hi ree ba hangkuja dua guru agama to mpotuku ' tudui ' Parisi . Kampohilo - ra Yesus ngkoni ' dohe tauna to dada ' a kehi - ra toe , ra ' uli ' - mi mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Napa pai ' guru - ni ngkoni ' hangkaa - ngkania hante topesingara ' paja ' pai ' tauna topojeko ' - e ! "

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Yesus mpo ' epe lolita - ra toe , toe pai ' napololitai - ra hante lolita rapa ' toi , na ' uli ' : " Tauna to uma peda ' , uma mingki ' rapokulii ' . Tauna to peda ' - wadi - hawo to paraluu rapokulii ' . Uma - a tumai mpokio ' tauna to monoa ' ingku - ra . Katumai - ku toi - le , mpokio ' topojeko ' - a - kuna bona medea - ra ngkai jeko ' - ra . "

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Rala - na hangkani , topetuku ' Yohanes Topeniu ' pai ' to Parisi bula - ra mopuasa ' . Ria - mi tauna rata hi Yesus mpekune ' - i : " Topetuku ' - na Yohanes Topeniu ' mopuasa ' , wae wo ' o topetuku ' to Parisi , mopuasa ' wo ' o - ra . Hiaa ' topetuku ' - nu Iko , napa pai ' uma - ra mopuasa ' ? "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Yesus mpotompoi ' - ra hante lolita rapa ' toi , na ' uli ' - raka : " Ane tauna hi posusaa ' poncamokoa , ha mopuasa ' - ra - rana bula - ra mpo ' ema ' topemua ' ? Uma - hawo . Bula - na ria - pidi topemua ' dohe - ra , uma - ra mopuasa ' .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Tapi ' rata mpai ' tempo - na , topemua ' ra ' ala ' ngkai laintongo ' - ra . Nto ' u toe - damo , pai ' lako ' mopuasa ' - rada . "

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpo ' uli ' lolita rapa ' to ronyala - pi , na ' uli ' : " Uma ria haduaa tauna to mpotelepei baju to hae hante pontaia ' to bo ' u . Apa ' pontaia ' to bo ' u mongkuru ' mpai ' , duu ' - na mpoheu ' baju to hae toe , alaa - na kaboo - bohea lau - mi heu ' - na .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Wae wo ' o uma ria tauna to mpotua anggur to bo ' u hi rala pontu ' ua to hae . Apa ' ane dede ' - ipi mpai ' , mopengka lau - mi pontu ' ua to hae toe , alaa - na mobowo lau - mi anggur , pai ' mpadaa ' - mi pontu ' ua - na . Jadi ' , anggur to bo ' u kana ra ' ihii ' hi pontu ' ua to bo ' u wo ' o - hawo . "

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Hangkani hi eo pepuea ' , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na ntara rala bonea . Bula - ra mpotara bonea toe , ana ' guru - na mpotepo ' wua ' gandum pai ' raru ' a .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: To Parisi to hi ree mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Napa - di - rana pai ' ana ' guru - nu mpotiboki atura agama - tae ? Mobago - ra - rana hi eo pepuea ' . "

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Magau ' Daud owi nto ' u Abyatar jadi ' Imam Bohe - e ? Nto ' u - na Daud hante ema ' - na mo ' oro ' pai ' uma ria anu rakoni ' , mesua ' - imi hi rala tomi pepuea ' , pai ' - i mpokoni ' roti to rapopepue ' hi Alata ' ala , pai ' nabagi wo ' o - raka doo - na . Ntuku ' ada agama - ta , imam - wadi - hana to ma ' ala mpokoni ' roti toe . Aga nau ' wae , gau ' - na Daud toe uma - hawo naposala ' . "

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Alata ' ala mpobabehi eo pepuea ' bona mpotulungi manusia ' . Bela manusia ' to rababehi bona napari ' une ' ada eo pepuea ' .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Jadi ' , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ria kuasa - ku mpo ' uli ' napa to ma ' ala rababehi hi eo pepuea ' . "

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Rala - na hangkani , mesua ' wo ' o - imi Yesus hi rala tomi posampayaa . Hi ree , ria hadua tauna to mate pale - na hamali .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Ria wo ' o - ra hi ree to Parisi to tungkai ' doko ' mpali ' kasalaa ' Yesus meka ' mobago - i hi eo pepuea ' , apa ' doko ' rapakilu - i . Jadi ' , ralelemata - i meka ' ba mepaka ' uri ' mpu ' u - i hi eo pepuea ' .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki tauna to mate pale - na hamali : " Mai - ko mokore hi laintongo ' rehe ' i . "

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' - raka to Parisi : " Ntuku ' ada agama - ta , to ' uma to ma ' ala tababehi hi eo pepuea ' : mpobabehi to lompe ' - di ba to dada ' a ? Mpotulungi doo ba mpatehi doo ? " Tapi ' to Parisi toera , oja ' - ra mpotompoi ' - i , ngkaba ' i - ra - wadi .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Mogolili Yesus mponaa - ra . Moroe - i pai ' peda ' nono - na apa ' motu ' a rahi nono - ra . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki tauna to mate pale - na hamali toei : " Tanoa pale - nu ! " Kanatanoa - nami pale - na , mo ' uri ' - imi .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Palai - ra to Parisi ngkai tomi posampayaa toe , pai ' - ra morumpu hante tauna to tono ' hi Magau ' Herodes . Mpali ' akala - ra bona Yesus rapatehi .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Yesus hante ana ' guru - na malai ngkai ree hilou hi wiwi ' rano . Wori ' to Galilea ntuku ' - i . Wori ' wo ' o to tumai ngkai tana ' Yudea ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: ngkai Yerusalem , ngkai tana ' Idumea , ngkai dipo ue Yordan , ria wo ' o ngkai ngata Tirus pai ' Sidon . Wori ' rahi tauna to tumai hi Yesus apa ' ra ' epe hawe ' ea to nababehi .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Wori ' tauna to mohaki ' napaka ' uri ' , alaa - na mome ' upi ' - ra tauna lou mpomohui ' - i doko ' mpoganga - i . Ngkai kawori ' tauna , toe pai ' nahubui ana ' guru - na mporodo sakaya nahawi ' , nee - neo ' mpai ' ra ' upi ' - i ntodea .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Rata wo ' o - ra tauna to napesuai ' anudaa ' . Kampohilo - ra Yesus kaliliu mowingkotu ' - ra hi nyanyoa - na , pai ' - ra mejeu ' , ra ' uli ' : " Iko - mi Ana ' Alata ' ala ! "

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Aga natagi mpu ' u - ra , bona neo ' ra ' uli ' kahema - nai .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus manake ' hilou hi bulu ' - na , pai ' - i mpokio ' tauna hema - hema to napokono . Rata mpu ' u - ramo ,

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: pai ' napelihi hampulu ' rodua - ra , na ' uli ' - raka : " Kupelihi - koi bona nipodohe - a , pai ' bona kusuro - koi mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' .

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: Pai ' kuwai ' - koi kuasa mpopalai seta . "

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: Tohe ' i - mi hanga ' - ra to hampulu ' rodua toera : Simon ( Yesus mpohanga ' - i Petrus ) ; oti toe , Yakobus ana ' Zebedeus ; pai ' Yohanes ompi ' - na Yakobus ( Yesus mpohanga ' - ra Boanerges - - batua - na : tauna to hewa berese ) ; oti toe , Andreas ; Filipus ; Bartolomeus ; Matius ; Tomas ; Yakobus ana ' Alfeus ; Tadeus ; Simon to Zelot ; pai ' Yudas Iskariot ( hi ' a mpai ' to mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - na ) .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus nculii ' hilou hi tomi . Aga wori ' wo ' o - wadi tauna to tumai mpotipuhi - i , alaa - na Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na uma - ra tepongkoni ' .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Toe pai ' ria tauna to mpo ' uli ' : " Wuli - imile ! " Kara ' epe - na ompi ' - na Yesus tohe ' e , hilou - ramo ke mpo ' ala ' - i .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Ria wo ' o hi ree guru agama Yahudi to lako ' rata ngkai Yerusalem . Ra ' uli ' guru agama toera : " Ah , napesuai ' Beelzebul - i - hanale , magau ' hawe ' ea seta . Magau ' seta toe - mile to mpowai ' - i kuasa mpopalai seta - e . "

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Toe pai ' Yesus mpokio ' - ra bona mpomohui ' - i , pai ' napololitai - ra hante ba hangkuja nyala lolita rapa ' , na ' uli ' : " Ha beiwa - hawo seta mpopalai hingka seta - na ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na ria hadua magau ' , pai ' ntodea hi rala kamagaua ' - na ntora mosisala , uma mpai ' ntaha mahae kamagaua ' - na toe .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Ane tau hantina ntora motuda ' , bate pagaa ' - gaa ' mpai ' posantinaa - ra .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Wae wo ' o hi kamagaua ' seta . Ane hi rala kamagaua ' seta ria posisalaa pai ' potudaa ' , kamagaua ' - na toe uma ntaha mahae , kahudua - nami mpai ' toe .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: " Seta ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki tauna to parimuku . Ane mesua ' - ta hi rala tomi tauna to parimuku doko ' mpo ' ala ' ihi ' tomi - na , kana tahoo ' ncala ' - i , pai ' lako ' ma ' ala tapatau ' rewa - na . Wae wo ' o , ane Aku ' mpopalai seta , batua - na , meliu kuasa - ku ngkai seta .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Hawe ' ea jeko ' manusia ' pai ' lolita pesapuaka - ra ma ' ala ra ' ampungi .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Aga hema to mposapuaka Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , uma ria ampungia - ra duu ' kahae - hae - na . Pesapuaka - ra toe raposala ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Pai ' hewa toe lolita - na Yesus , apa ' ria to mpo ' uli ' kanahawi ' - na anudaa ' - i , uma rapangalai ' kangkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' kuasa - na .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Ngkai ree , rata - mi tina - na pai ' ompi ' - na Yesus mokore hi mali tomi . Mpohubui - ra tauna mpokio ' - i tumai hi mali - na bona rapololitai .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Nto ' u toe , wori ' tauna mpotololiki Yesus . Ra ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , tina - nu pai ' ompi ' - nu , oe - ra ria hi mali - na mpali ' - ko . "

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Yesus mponaa tauna to mpotololiki - i , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Ane tina - ku pai ' ompi ' - kule , hira ' toe - ramo lau .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Apa ' hema - hema to mpobabehi konoa Alata ' ala , hira ' - mi ompi ' - ku pai ' hira ' - mi tina - ku . "

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Rala - na hangkani , metudui ' wo ' o - imi Yesus hi wiwi ' rano . Wori ' lia tauna morumpu mpotololiki - i . Ngkai kawori ' tauna , toe - mi pai ' hilou - i mohawi ' sakaya to hi lolo ue , mohura - i hi rala - na pai ' tauna to wori ' mokore hi talinti .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Wori ' nyala to natudui ' - raka hante lolita rapa ' . Hewa tohe ' i na ' uli ' - raka :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: " Pe ' epei ! Ria hadua topohawu ' hilou mohawu ' .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Rala mpohawu ' - na toe , ria hawua ' - na to monawu ' hi mata ohea . Rata danci mpotilo ' hawua ' toe duu ' - na oti .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Ria wo ' o to monawu ' hi tana ' to watua , hangkedi ' - wadi tana ' - na . Hinawu ' - na toe sohi ' lia tuwu ' , apa ' moreni ' tana ' - na .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Kamorani ' - na eo , molaju - imi duu ' - na bangi , apa ' uma monala rali ' - na .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Ria wo ' o to monawu ' hi laintongo ' rui . Tuwu ' rui mpo ' upi ' hinawu ' toe , alaa - na uma - i mowua ' , mate lau - idi .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Ria wo ' o hawua ' to monawu ' hi tana ' to morudu ' . Tuwu ' lompe ' hawua ' toe kakaa - kamaa , alaa - na mowua ' . Ria to nte tolu mpulu ' ngkani ngkai hinawu ' - na , ria to ono mpulu ' , ria wo ' o to ha ' atu ngkani ngkai hinawu ' - na . "

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ka ' oti - na mpololita lolita rapa ' toe , na ' uli ' - miraka : " Hema - koi to tilingaa , pe ' epei lompe ' ! "

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Oti toe , nto ' u - na Yesus hadudua - na , ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua pai ' topetuku ' - na to ntani ' - na tumai mpekune ' - i : " Napa - die batua - na lolita rapa ' toe - e we ' i ? "

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Owi , Alata ' ala ko ' ia mpopo ' incai manusia ' beiwa - i mpai ' jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Aga hewa toe lau , napopo ' incai - mokoi tudui ' toe . Tapi ' ane tauna to bela topetuku ' - ku , kutudui ' - ra hante lolita rapa ' ,

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: bona madupa ' - mi lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : ` Pe ' epe moto - ra , aga uma oa ' ra ' incai batua - na . Pehilo moto - ra , aga hewa to uma oa ' monoto rahiloi . Jadi ' , uma oa ' - ra nculii ' hi Alata ' ala , pai ' jeko ' - ra uma te ' ampungi . ' "

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane uma ni ' incai batua lolita rapa ' toe we ' i , beiwa kani ' inca - na batua lolita rapa ' to ntani ' - na ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Topohawu ' , hira ' - mi tauna to mpoparata Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Ria tauna to ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki hawua ' to monawu ' hi mata ohea . Ra ' epe moto Lolita Alata ' ala , aga Magau ' Anudaa ' mpohilingai ' nono - ra , alaa - na uma - pi rapoinono lolita toe .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: " Ria wo ' o tauna to ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki hawua ' to monawu ' hi tana ' to watua . Kara ' epe - na Lolita Alata ' ala , ncaliu goe ' nono - ra .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Aga uma morali ' mpu ' u Lolita Alata ' ala hi rala nono - ra , toe pai ' uma - ra ntaha mahae . Ane rabalinai ' - ra ba rapakasusa ' sabana pepangala ' - ra hi Lolita Alata ' ala , kamo ' ungkere ' - rami .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: " Ria wo ' o tauna to rarapai ' - ki hawua ' to monawu ' hi olo ' rui . Ra ' epe moto Lolita Alata ' ala ,

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: aga sese ' - ra ntora mpenonoi katuwu ' - ra hi rala dunia ' toi , doko ' - ra mporumpu rewa dunia ' - wadi , pai ' wori ' nyala kahinaa hi rala nono - ra . Hawe ' ea toe mposesei ' - ra , alaa - na uma ria po ' ohaa ' Lolita Alata ' ala hi rala nono - ra , pai ' uma ria kalaua - na lolita toe hi katuwu ' - ra .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: " Ria wo ' o tauna to rarapai ' - ki hawua ' to monawu ' hi tana ' to morudu ' . Mpo ' epe - ra Lolita Alata ' ala , kaliliu ratarima . Hi tauna toe - ramo Lolita Alata ' ala mowua ' mpu ' u . Ria to mowua ' hangkedi ' , ria to mowua ' wori ' , ria to mowua ' wori ' lia . "

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Ha ria - ta to mpokeni palita hi rala tomi pai ' tapopoi ' hante kura ba tatu ' u hi une ' poturua ? Tantu uma - hawo ria . Palita bate ratu ' u hi pontu ' ua - na bona nahinii hobo ' .

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Apa ' hawe ' ea to tewuni kana rapopehuwu , pai ' hawe ' ea to kalerua kana jadi ' kahiloa .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Hema - koi to tilingaa , pe ' epei lompe ' ! "

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Na ' uli ' tena Yesus : " Penotohi mpu ' u - koi napa to ni ' epe tohe ' i - e . Apa ' kawoo - woria ' Lolita Alata ' ala to nibagi - ki doo , kawoo - woria ' wo ' o to nanotohi - kokoi Alata ' ala - - ba melabi tena - pi ngkai ree .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata ' ala , ranotohi nono - ra bona kawoo - woria ' to ra ' inca . Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata ' ala , nau ' ria hangkedi ' to ra ' inca , ra ' alai ' lau - ra . "

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , kajadi ' - na hewa lolita rapa ' tohe ' i : Hadua tauna mpotujai ' bonea - na .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Hi bengi - na turu - i , hi eo - na memata - i . Kahae - na toe , tinuja ' - na tuwu ' kaboo - bohea . Aga beiwa tinuja ' - na tuwu ' pai ' jadi ' bohe , uma - hawo na ' incai .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Ngkai tana ' moto - hawo pehupaa ' wua ' - na . Lomo ' - na rau - na pai ' kaho - na to mehupa ' , ngkai ree huwu - mi , duu ' - na mo ' ihi .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Kataha ' - na pae , hilou - imi pue ' - na ngkeni are ' nasoe - ki , apa ' tempo - nami mepae . "

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , beiwa kajadi ' - na ? Kajadi ' - nale hewa lolita rapa ' tohe ' i :

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Ria tauna to mpohawu ' unto ' hawi hi tana ' .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Unto ' toe monete ' lia , meliu kakedi ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea unto ' to ria hi dunia ' . Aga ane rahawu ' - i - damo pai ' - i tuwu ' , meliu kabohe - na ngkai ngkojo to ntani ' - na . Ra ' a - na mopanga molanga , duu ' - na rapopetai danci pai ' rapengkamoui . "

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Wae - mi Yesus mpoparata Lolita Alata ' ala hi ntodea hante wori ' nyala lolita rapa ' , ntuku ' pakulea ' - ra mpopaha .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Uma ria to natudui ' - raka ane uma hante lolita rapa ' . Aga ane Hi ' a - damo pai ' ana ' guru - na , nanotohi - miraka omea .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Ncimonou ' toe wo ' o , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Hilou - tamo hi dipo rano . "

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' hi rala sakaya ami ' - imi Yesus , pe ' ongko ' - rami mpalahii ntodea to hi wiwi ' rano . Ria wo ' o sakaya ntani ' - na hi ree to mpotuku ' - ra .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Ko ' ia mahae , rata - mi ngolu ' bohe . Ntepu ' u - mi balumpa mporumpa ' sakaya - ra , alaa - na neo ' ponu ' - mi sakaya - ra hante ue .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Yesus leta ' moto - i molunai hi wuntu sakaya . Kahilou - rami ana ' guru - na mpolike - i , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Guru ! Napa - di pai ' nupelele ' moto - ta neo ' matala - tamoe ? "

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Pemata - nami Yesus pai ' - i mpotagi ngolu ' pai ' balumpa , na ' uli ' : " Mento ' o - ko ngolu ' ! Rodo - moko balumpa ! " Mento ' o mpu ' u - mi - hawo ngolu ' , pai ' muu - mule ' molino nculii ' - mi rano .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Na ' uli ' - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' me ' eka ' rahi - koie ? Ha uma ria pepangala ' - nie ? "

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Me ' eka ' lia - ramo ana ' guru - na , pai ' momepololitai - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Hema mpu ' u - idi - hana tau toii - e ? Ngolu ' pai ' rano molino - di - hana ntuku ' hawa ' - na ! "

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Ngkai ree , rata - ramo hi dipo rano , hi tana ' Gerasa .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Hi tana ' Gerasa toe , ria hadua tauna to nahawi ' anudaa ' . Hi daeo ' - wadi po ' ohaa ' - na . Uma - i tono rahoo ' nau ' hante rante , apa ' uma mowo karoho - na . Pontu - na witi ' - na pai ' pale - na rahoo ' , aga koloro pai ' rante ma ' ala oa ' nadupe ' . Ngkai kamoroho - na toe , pai ' uma ria haduaa to daho ' mpodongo - i . Hi eo - na hi bengi - na ntora dao ' - dao ' - na hi daeo ' pai ' hi bulu ' - na , pai ' kakakio ' - kio ' , pai ' - i mposerohi woto - na hante watu . Jadi ' , wae pana ' u - na Yesus ngkai rala sakaya , mehupa ' - mi tauna to kahawia ' toei ngkai daeo ' .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Kampohilo - na Yesus ngkai molaa , pokeno - nami hilou mperapai - i , pai ' - i mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa - na mponyompa - i .

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Yesus mpohubui anudaa ' malai , na ' uli ' : " Malai - moko ngkai tauna tetui ! " Mejeu ' tau toei na ' uli ' : " Ee Yesus Ana ' Alata ' ala to hi suruga ! Napa - di - kona pai ' tumai - koe ? Hante hanga ' Alata ' ala merapi ' - a bona neo ' - a - kuwo nusesa ' . "

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Yesus mpekune ' - i : " Hema hanga ' - nu ? " Na ' uli ' : " Hanga ' - ku Legion , apa ' wori ' - kai hampo ' emaa ' to mesua ' hi tau toii . " ( Hanga ' Legion tohe ' e , batua - na : moncobu . )

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Rajojo seta toera merapi ' hi Yesus bona neo ' - ra napopalai ngkai ngata toe .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Uma molaa ngkai ree , ria wori ' wawu mojume hi panapa bulu ' .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Anudaa ' toera merapi ' hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Hubui - kai mesua ' hi wawu toera mai . "

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Napiliu moto - ra Yesus . Ngkai ree , malai mpu ' u - ramo anudaa ' toera kaliliu mesua ' hi wawu . Pesua ' - ra hi wawu toe , mparampuli - ramo - rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala ' hi rano , mate bonga - ramo hi rala ue - - kawori ' - ra ria nte roncobu ma ' a .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Karahilo - na tauna to mpodoo wawu toera napa to jadi ' , pokeno - rami hilou hi rala ngata pai ' hi bonea to mohu ' mpoparata kajadia ' toe . Toe pai ' tumai - ramo pue ' ngata doko ' mpohilo napa to jadi ' .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Karata - ra hi Yesus , rahilo - rawo tauna to kahawia ' toei , mohura rodo - imi , moheai - i , pai ' monoto - mi nono - na . Mpohilo toe , me ' eka ' - ramo .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Tauna to mpohilo kajadia ' toe mpotutura napa to jadi ' hi tauna to kahawia ' , pai ' napa to jadi ' hi wawu - ra .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Ngkai ree , pue ' ngata merapi ' hi Yesus bona malai - i ngkai ngata - ra . Jadi ' , mohawi ' nculii ' - imi hi rala sakaya .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mohawi ' toe , tauna to kahawia ' - e ngone merapi ' bona ma ' ala - i hilou dohe - na .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Tapi ' uma - i napiliu , na ' uli ' - ki : " Nculii ' - moko hilou hi tomi - nu , uli ' - raka hingka ngata - nu napa to nababehi Pue ' Ala hi iko , pai ' ahi ' - na hi iko . "

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Hilou - imi - hawo hi tana ' Dekapolis ( batua - na : Hampulu ' Ngata ) , mpopalele napa to nababehi Yesus hi woto - na . Konce hawe ' ea tauna to mpo ' epe .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Nculii ' wo ' o - imi Yesus hilou hi dipo rano . Karata - na hi dipo - na , wori ' wo ' o - mi tauna mpotipuhi - i . Bula - na hi wiwi ' rano - pidi ,

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: rata hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa to Yahudi , hanga ' - na Yairus . Kampohilo - na Yesus , powingkotu ' - nami hi nyanyoa - na

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: mpopetulungi , na ' uli ' : " Neo ' mate lia - imi dei ' - ku hi tomi . Lou - ta hi tomi - ku , nujama - ka - kuwo bona mo ' uri ' - i , bona neo ' - i - hawo mate . "

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - imi Yesus dohe - na , pai ' mo ' iko wo ' o tauna ntuku ' - ra . Wori ' tauna mpo ' upi ' Yesus .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Hi olo ' ntodea , ria hadua tobine , hampulu ' rompae - imi moraa ' , uma ria kantotoa ' - na .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Mompae - mpae - imi mpopepokulii ' hi dokter , duu ' - na oti - mi ihi ' tomi - na napobalu ' bona ria napobayari - raka . Aga uma oa ' ria kamo ' uria ' - na , tedonihii lau - di haki ' - na .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Wori ' - mi to na ' epe to mpotompo ' wiwi Yesus . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' hi rala nono - na : " Nau ' baju - na - wadi kureo , mo ' uri ' - ale mpai ' ! " Jadi ' mengkahipi ' - imi - hawo hilou hi olo ' tauna to wori ' mpomohui ' Yesus ngkai tilingkuria - na , pai ' naganga mpu ' u - mi - hawo baju - na .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Wae kanaganga - na , hampinisi mata mentoda ' - mi poraa ' - na . Ncaliu na ' inca kamo ' uri ' - nami .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o - hawo , Yesus mpo ' inca karia - na baraka ' malai ngkai Hi ' a . Kame ' ili ' - nami hi tauna to wori ' , na ' uli ' : " Hema to mpoganga baju - kue ? "

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - na : " Guru , nuhilo moto - kowole kawori ' tauna to mpo ' upi ' - koe . Beiwa - kona pai ' nupekune ' hema to mpoganga - ko ? "

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Aga Yesus menaa ntololikia - na mpali ' tauna to mpoganga - i .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Na ' inca tobine toei napa to jadi ' hi woto - na . Kamoridi ' - nami - hawo me ' eka ' , pai ' tumai - i mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa Yesus mpangaku ' hawe ' ea - na .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki tobine toei : " Ana ' - ku , mo ' uri ' - moko sabana pepangala ' - nu hi Aku ' . Nculii ' - moko hante kalompea ' tuwu ' - nu . Mo ' uri ' - moko , uma - pi ria haki ' - nu . "

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Bula - na Yesus mololita - pidi , rata - mi ba hangkuja dua suro ngkai tomi Yairus mpo ' uli ' - ki Yairus : " Mate - imi - hana ana ' - nu . Neo ' - pi mposusai ' Guru . "

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Pe ' epe moto - i Yesus napa to ra ' uli ' suro toera . Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yairus : " Neo ' mere ' nono - nu ! Pangala ' moto - mi - hana ! "

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Kakaliliu - nami Yesus mako ' , aga uma napiliu tauna to wori ' mpodohei - i mesua ' hi rala tomi Yairus , muntu ' Petrus , Yakobus pai ' Yohanes ompi ' - na Yakobus - wadi .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Karata - na hi tomi Yairus , na ' epe - hawo merodo ' - ra - damo tauna , hangaa pogeo ' - ra - damo pai ' motantangi ' rahuduwukui .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Kamesua ' - na hi rala tomi , na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' merodo ' rahi - koi geo ' - e ! Uma - i - hawo - le mate - e . Leta ' - i - wadi . "

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe we ' i , rapotawai - i - wadi . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpohubui - ra omea malai ngkai rala tomi , pai ' - i mesua ' hi kamar poturua ana ' toei , hante tina pai ' tuama - na , pai ' ana ' guru - na to tolu .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Nakamu pale - na ana ' toei , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Memata - moko ana ' ! " Hi rala basa - ra to Yahudi , moni - na hewa toi : " Talita kum ! "

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Pemata - nami ana ' toei kaliliu momako ' . ( Umuru - na hampulu ' rompae . ) Uma mowo kakonce - ra tauna to mpohilo .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Aga Yesus mpotagi - ra , na ' uli ' : " Neo ' mpu ' u nilolita napa to lako ' jadi ' toi . " Pai ' na ' uli ' wo ' o : " Wai ' - imi ana ' tetui koni ' - na . "

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus me ' ongko ' ngkai ngata toe hilou hi ngata - na moto hante ana ' guru - na .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Hi eo pepuea ' , hilou - i hi tomi posampayaa mpotudui ' tauna . Wori ' tauna hi ree . Kampo ' epe - ra tudui ' Yesus , konce - ra ra ' uli ' : " Hema - di to mpotudui ' - i hawe ' ea toe - e ? Kapantea napa - di to ria hi Hi ' a - e ? Beiwa pai ' ma ' ala - i mpobabehi anu mekoncehi ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Bo topowangu tomi - i - wadi , ana ' Maria . Ompi ' - na , hira ' Yakobus , Yoses , Yudas pai ' Simon . Ompi ' - na tobine , ria moto wo ' o - ra dohe - ta hi rehe ' i . " Toe pai ' oja ' - ra mepangala ' hi Yesus .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Hadua nabi bate rabila ' hiapa kahilouaa - na . Aga hi ngata - na pai ' tomi - na , pai ' dohe ompi ' - na moto , uma lau - i rabila ' . "

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Jadi ' , Yesus mpokehele - ra apa ' uma - ra mepangala ' . Toe pai ' uma - i bisa mpobabehi wori ' anu mekoncehi hi ria . Sampale to nababehi , mpojama ba hangkuja dua topeda ' bona mo ' uri ' - ra .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Mpokio ' - i ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua , nasuro - ra rodua - rodua hampo ' emaa ' , pai ' nawai ' - ra kuasa mpopalai anudaa ' .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Kako ' ia - ra me ' ongko ' , natudui ' - ra hewa toi : " Neo ' - koi ngkeni napa - napa hi pomakoa ' - ni , muntu ' lua ' - wadi . Neo ' ngkeni pongkoni ' ba boku ba doi hi rala karepe ' .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Ma ' ala moto - koi mpake ' lihi witi ' , aga neo ' ngkeni rontonga ' baju . "

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi : " Ane rata - koi hi hameha ' ngata pai ' ratarima - koi hi tomi hantomi , mo ' oha ' hi ree - mokoi duu ' - ni kaliliu hilou mpai ' hi ngata ntani ' - na .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Ane ria pue ' ngata to uma dota mpotarima - koi , ane oja ' - ra mpo ' epe lolita to nikeni , wae kanipalahii - na ngata - ra , tonta awu to mentaka ' hi palanta ' witi ' - ni , tanda kanahuku ' - ra mpai ' Alata ' ala . "

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus mpotudui ' ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua toera , me ' ongko ' - ramo hilou mpotudui ' tauna bona medea - ra ngkai jeko ' - ra .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Wori ' seta to rapopalai . Pai ' wori ' wo ' o tauna to peda ' ragelai ' hante lana pai ' rapaka ' uri ' .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Magau ' Herodes Antipas mpo ' epe kareba napa to nababehi Yesus , apa ' hanga ' Yesus rapotompo ' wiwi hiapa - apa . Ria to mpo ' uli ' : " Yesus toei lou , Yohanes Topeniu ' - ile tuwu ' nculii ' ! Toe - hana pai ' ria baraka ' - na mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe - e . "

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Aga ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' : " Yesus toei , nabi Elia to owi - i . " Hiaa ' ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' : " Nabi mpu ' u - i , hewa nabi to owi . "

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Magau ' Herodes tohe ' e , na ' uli ' - mi : " Yohanes Topeniu ' mpu ' u - i - tano Yesus toei lou - e ! Kupehubui wengi rapata ' wuroko ' - na , aga tuwu ' nculii ' - imi . "

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Hewa toi tutura kamate - na Yohanes Topeniu ' . Magau ' Herodes mpo ' ago pai ' mpotobine Herodias , tobine ompi ' - na moto to rahanga ' Filipus . Wori ' ngkani Yohanes mpokamaro Herodes ngkai gau ' - na toe , na ' uli ' - ki : " Uma - ko ma ' ala mpotobine era - nu tetui ! Gau ' - nu tetu mpotiboki Atura Musa . " Ngkai ree , Herodes mpohubui tantara - na hilou mpohoko ' Yohanes . Rahoko ' mpu ' u - imi , rahoo ' pai ' - i ratarungku ' .

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Ane Herodias - e , mowuku - damo nono - na hi Yohanes , doko ' napatehi . Aga uma - i mologa mpopadupa ' roe - na toe ,

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: apa ' Herodes mpohubui tantara - na mpojaga - i hi rala tarungku ' . Me ' eka ' - i mpatehi Yohanes apa ' na ' inca , tauna to monoa ' - i pai ' moroli ' wo ' o - i . Ane Herodes mpo ' epe Yohanes mpololitai - i , mokarara ' nono - na , aga goe ' wo ' o - i mpo ' epe - i mololita .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Hi eo pompokiwoia kaputua Magau ' Herodes , ria - mi loga - na Herodias . Hi eo toe , Magau ' Herodes mpobabehi posusa ' mpokiwoi eo kaputua - na . Mpokio ' - i wori ' maradika , tadulako pai ' pangkeni to ngkai tana ' Galilea .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Bula posusa ' toe , ana ' - na Herodias tobine mesua ' pai ' modero ' . Goe ' lia - i Magau ' Herodes mpohilo podero ' toronaa toei , wae wo ' o torata - na . Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki toronaa toei : " Ane ria ba napa to nupokono , perapi ' - mi , bate kuwai ' - ko . "

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Mosumpa wo ' o - i , na ' uli ' : " Nau ' ba napa mpu ' u - mi to nuperapi ' , nau ' hantanga ' ngkai poparenta - ku , bate kuwai ' - ko ! "

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Palai - nami toronaa toei hilou mpekune ' tina - na , na ' uli ' : " Ina ' , napa to kuperapi ' - e ? " Na ' uli ' tina - na : " Perapi ' - mi woo ' - na Yohanes Topeniu ' ! "

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Kanculii ' - nami hilou hi Magau ' , kaliliu na ' uli ' : " Merapi ' - a woo ' - na Yohanes Topeniu ' wae lau , ratu ' u hi lolo dula . "

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Mpo ' epe pomperapia ' toe - di , soho ' lia - mi nono - na Magau ' . Aga uma - pi ma ' ala nadii ' nculii ' lolita - na hi toronaa toe , apa ' mpolia ' mosumpa - imi we ' i ra ' epe torata - na .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Kaliliu napahawa ' hadua tantara - na hilou mpo ' ala ' woo ' Yohanes Topeniu ' . Kahilou - nami - hawo tantara toe hi tarungku ' mpopata ' wuroko ' - na .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: Woo ' - na toe nakeni tumai natu ' u hi lolo dula pai ' natonu - ki toronaa toei , pai ' toronaa toei mpowai ' tina - na .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Kara ' epe - na topetuku ' - na Yohanes kamate - nami , hilou - ramo - rawo mpo ' ala ' woto - na , pai ' ratana .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Suro to nahubui Yesus mpopalele Lolita Alata ' ala wengi , nculii ' - ramo ngkai pomakoa ' - ra , pai ' ratutura - miki Yesus hawe ' ea to rababehi pai ' to ratudui ' - raka ntodea .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Nto ' u toe , wori ' lia tauna to hilou - tumai , alaa - na ntahawe ' ngkoni ' neo ' uma - pi ria loga - ra . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus hi topetuku ' - na : " Kita hilou hi kawaoa ' - na mpalahii tauna to wori ' , bona ma ' ala - ta mento ' o hampai ' . "

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Jadi ' , mohawi ' sakaya - ramo hilou hi kawaoa ' - na .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Ntaa ' pehilo moto - di - hana tauna pe ' ongko ' - rae , pai ' ra ' inca wo ' o toaa ' - ra . Jadi ' , wori ' tauna ngkai hawe ' ea ngata to mohu ' , pokeno - rami hilou hi wiwi ' rano , rata meri ' ulu lau - ra ngkai Yesus hante ana ' guru - na .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Pehompo - na Yesus ngkai sakaya , nahilo - hawo wori ' tauna mpopea - i . Metumu ' - mi ahi ' - na mpohilo - ra , apa ' hiloa - ra hewa bima to uma te ' ewu . Kanatudui ' - rami wori ' nyala .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Neo ' solo - mi eo , tumai - ramo ana ' guru - na mpomohui ' - i , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , wao ' - hana hi rehe ' i lau , pai ' neo ' limpa - mi eo .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Agina tahubui - ramo tauna toera lau hilou hi ngata pai ' tomi hi bonea to mohu ' bona mpo ' oli pongkoni ' - ra . "

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Koi ' - mi to mpopokoni ' - ra . " Hampetompoi ' ana ' guru - na : " Ei ' ! Ha napa - mi - kaina to kiwai ' - rakae ? Nau ' ro ' atu doi pera ' kipope ' oli - ki roti , uma - le hono ' mpopokoni ' tauna to hewa toe lau kadea - ra . "

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kamata pe ' , hangkuja meha ' roti to ria hi koi ' - e . " Ka ' oti - na rapehiloi , ra ' uli ' : " Ria - le , lima meha ' - wadi , pai ' rongkaju bau ' uru . "

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpohubui tauna to wori ' mohura omea mopantuda - ntuda hi kowo ' , apa ' wori ' kowo ' to mata ' nto ' u toe .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Pohura - rami pantuda - ntuda , butu ntuda - na ria nte ha ' atu , ria wo ' o to nte lima mpulu ' .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Oti toe , na ' ala ' - mi roti to lima meha ' pai ' uru to rongkaju , pai ' - i ngkongoa ' hi langi ' mosampaya . Oti toe , napihe - pihe - mi roti , pai ' nawai ' - raka ana ' guru - na bona rabagi hi ntodea . Pai ' uru to rongkaju , nabagi wo ' o - raka omea .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Ngkoni ' omea - ramo duu ' - ra bohu .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Ka ' oti - ra ngkoni ' , rarumpu - mi toro - na roti pai ' bau ' , hampulu ' roluncu - pi .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Kawori ' - ra to ngkoni ' roti toe , ba ria nte lima ncobu paka ' tomane .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpohubui ana ' guru - na mosakaya meri ' ulu hilou hi dipo rano hi ngata Betsaida , pai ' - i mpohubui tauna to wori ' nculii ' hilou hi tomi - ra .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Ponculi ' - ra ntodea , manake ' - imi hilou hi bulu ' - na lou mosampaya .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Mobengi - mi , hi laintongo ' rano - ramo ana ' guru - na . Hiaa ' Hi ' a , hi role - nai - pidi hadudua - na .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Nahilo - hawo kawuhe - ramo mowose , apa ' ngolu ' mewui mpotomu sakaya - ra . Parabaja - mi , momako ' - imi hilou hi lolo ue mpototoaka - ra , ntani ' naliu - ra .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Karahilo - na to momako ' hi lolo ue , pe ' au - rami me ' eka ' , ra ' uli ' : " Etu tope ' ekahi ! "

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Wilingkoroa omea - ramo mpohilo - i . Ncaliu na ' uli ' - raka Yesus : " Pakaroho nono - ni ! Neo ' me ' eka ' ! Aku ' - mile toi - e . "

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Kangkahe ' - nami hi rala sakaya dohe - ra , ngolu ' wo ' o haliu ora - mi . Uma mowo kakonce - ra , apa ' kuyu - ramo .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Apa ' nau ' ko ' ia - ra mahae mpohilo tanda mekoncehi to nababehi hante roti - e ngone , ko ' ia oa ' monoto hi rala nono - ra kahema - na mpu ' u - i Yesus . Morara ' oa ' - pidi nono - ra mepangala ' .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Karata - ra hi dipo rano , mencore - ramo hi tana ' to rahanga ' Genesaret .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Pehompo - ra ngkai sakaya , rahilo - rawo pue ' ngata Kayesus - na to rata hi ngata - ra .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Pokeno - rami hilou hi ngata - ngata to mohu ' , pai ' - ra tumai mpokowa ' doo - ra to peda ' . Hiapa - apa kara ' epea - na ria - i , hi ree wo ' o - mi tauna mpokeni doo - ra topeda ' .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Hiapa kahiloua - na Yesus hi rala ngata bohe ba ngata kedi ' , rakeni tumai doo - ra topeda ' pai ' rapopoturu hi wiwi ' karajaa , pai ' - ra merapi ' hi Yesus bona napiliu - ra mporeo nau ' kampa ' wuntu baju - na - wadi . Hawe ' ea to mporeo baju - na , haliu mo ' uri ' - ramo .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Hangkani ria - ra to Parisi pai ' guru agama Yahudi to ngkai Yerusalem mpohirua ' - ki Yesus .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Mpohilo - ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku ' Yesus ngkoni ' hante uma - ra mowano ncala ' ntuku ' ada agama Yahudi .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: Apa ' hawe ' ea to Yahudi , mo ' ipi lia - ra mpotuku ' ada totu ' a - ra , hangkedia ' - nami hira ' to mpotuku ' tudui ' - ra to Parisi . Ko ' ia - ra ngkoni ' ane ko ' ia - ra mowano ntuku ' ada .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Ane nculii ' - ra ngkai pomako ' - ra hi rala ngata , kana moniu ' - ra ulu ntuku ' ada kako ' ia - ra mpoganga pongkoni ' . Pai ' wori ' wo ' o - pi ada to ratarima ngkai totu ' a - ra to ratuku ' lia , hewa rapa ' - na ada mpobohoi ' sangkiri ' , kura pai ' rewa to rababehi ngkai ngkala .

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Toe pai ' to Parisi nte guru - guru agama toera we ' i mpokamaro Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Napa pai ' ana ' guru - nu , uma - ra mpotuku ' ada totu ' a - tae ? Ngkoni ' - ra , uma - ra mowano ncala ' . "

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Koi ' - le , hi mali - na - wadi petuku ' - ni hi Alata ' ala ! Makono mpu ' u lolita to na ' uki ' nabi Yesaya owi to mpolowa - koi , hewa toi moni - na : Na ' uli ' Alata ' ala : ` Tauna tohe ' era mpobila ' - a hi wiwi - ra - wadi , nono - ra molaa ngkai Aku ' .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: Uma ria kalaua - ra mpopue ' - a , apa ' tudui ' - ra tudui ' manusia ' - wadi , bela tudui ' ngkai Aku ' . '

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Jadi ' , hawa ' Alata ' ala nikalempei ' moto , hiaa ' moroho lia - damo pongkakamu - ni ada manusia ' . "

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' tena - raka Yesus : " Koi ' - le , pante lia - koi mpelelii ' hawa ' Alata ' ala bona mpotuku ' ada - ni moto .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Hi rala Atura Musa te ' uki ' hewa toi : ` Kana tabila ' tuama pai ' tina - ta . ' Pai ' ` hema to mpotipo ' tuama - na ba tina - na kana rapatehi . '

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: Hiaa ' koi ' metudui ' hewa toi : uma - pi mingki ' tabila ' tina pai ' tuama - ta , asala ta ' uli ' - raka hewa toi : ` Napa to masipato ' kuwai ' - kokoi totu ' a , oti - mi kupajadi ' pepue ' hi Alata ' ala . ' Tauna to mpo ' uli ' hewa toe , nibahaka - imi ngkai kinolo - na mpotulungi tina pai ' tuama - na .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Jadi ' , Lolita Alata ' ala uma nisaile ' , ada to nitarima ngkai totu ' a - ni , tetu lau - mi to nitudui ' - raka ntodea . Wori ' - pidi to hewa tohe ' i to nibabehi . "

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpokio ' wo ' o - mi tauna to wori ' bona mpomohui ' - i , na ' uli ' - raka : " Epe omea - koi bona ni ' inca :

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Nau ' ba napa - napa to takoni ' , uma - hawo toe to mpakada ' a - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala . Kehi to mehupa ' ngkai rala nono - ta , toe - die to mpakada ' a - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala - e . ( (

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Jadi ' , hema - koi to tilingaa , pe ' epei lompe ' ! ) ) "

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpalahii tauna to wori ' , pai ' - i mesua ' hi rala tomi . Ana ' guru - na mpekune ' - i ba napa patuju tudui ' - na toe we ' i .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ha uma wo ' o - koiwo nipaha - e ? Pongkoni ' to mesua ' hi rala nganga - ta ngkai mali - na , bela - hawo toe to mpakada ' a - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala .

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Apa ' pongkoni ' toe , uma mesua ' hi rala nono - ta . Mesua ' hi ta ' i - ta - wadi , pai ' ngkai ree kaliliu tatadi . " Hante lolita - na toe , Yesus mpakanoto ka ' uma - na ria pongkoni ' to rapalii ' .

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Na ' uli ' tena - raka : " Aga kehi pai ' gau ' - ta , toe - dile to mpakada ' a - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala - e , apa ' kehi pai ' gau ' - ta toe mehupa ' ngkai nono - ta .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Ngkai nono manusia ' mehupa ' pekiri to dada ' a , pai ' alaa - na ria to mogau ' sala ' hi tobine ba hi tomane , manako , mepatehi ,

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: mobualo ' , mebagiu , metipo ' , pai ' mpobabehi wori ' nyala to dada ' a . Mpokahina anu doo , mohingi ' , molangko nono , nakeni hina nono to dada ' a , uma tuduia ' .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Hawe ' ea gau ' dada ' a to hewa toe - mi lau mehupa ' ngkai nono manusia ' . Toe - mi to mpakada ' a tauna hi poncilo Alata ' ala - e . "

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Ngkai ree , hilou - imi Yesus hi tana ' to mohu ' hi ngata Tirus , pai ' - i mesua ' hi rala tomi . Patuju - na bona ke neo ' ra ' incai tauna karata - na . Aga karata - na uma ma ' ala wuniia ' .

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: Hi ngata toe , ria wo ' o hadua totina , ana ' - na tobine kahawia ' .
