Kana ' epe - na totina toei karia - na Yesus hi ngata , katumai - nami mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa - na mpopetulungi , na ' uli ' : " Popalai - ka - kuwo seta to mpohawi ' ana ' - ku ! " Hiaa ' tobine toei , bela - i to Yahudi , to Fenisia - i - hana ngkai tana ' Siria .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Aku ' , mpotulungi to Yahudi - a - kuna ulu . Uma lompe ' mpo ' ala ' koni ' ana ' , pai ' rarora - ki dike ' . "

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Na ' uli ' - mi - hawo tobine toei : " Makono moto - di Pue ' . Aga dike ' to hi une ' meja ' wo ' o - hawo - le , biasa - ra ngkoni ' koni ' ana ' to mohewu ' ngkai lolo meja ' . "

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus : " Kono wo ' o - kowo petompoi ' - nu ! Wae - pi , nculii ' - moko , malai - mi seta to mpesuai ' ana ' - nu . "

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Kanculii ' - nami totina toei . Rata hi tomi , nahilo ana ' - na rodo - imi hi poturua - na , apa ' malai mpu ' u - mi seta .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpalahii ngata Tirus mpokaliliu pomako ' - na ntara hi ngata Sidon , pai ' nculii ' wo ' o - imi hilou hi rano Galilea , rata hi tana ' Dekapolis .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Hi ree , ria to mpokeni hadua tauna to wongo pai ' to neo ' uma howa ' mololita . Merapi ' - ra bona najama - i - hawo .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Yesus mpokeni tauna toei ngkai laintongo ' ntodea . Ka ' oti - na napatani ' - i , nape ' uso karawe - na hi tilinga - na ntimalia , mpetiliku - i , pai ' - i mpojama jila ' - na tauna toei .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Oti toe , ngkongoa ' - imi hi langi ' mpo ' osu ' inoha ' - na pai ' mpo ' uli ' : " Mobea - mi ! " ( Hi rala basa - ra to Yahudi , moni - na hewa toi : " Efata ! " )

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Pe ' epe mpu ' u - imi - hawo , pai ' jila ' - na molengkue ' - mi . Lonto ' - mi - hawo pololita - na .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpotagi - ra tauna to wori ' bona neo ' ra ' uli ' hi hema - hema napa to jadi ' tohe ' e . Aga nau ' wae kanatagi - ra , hangkedi ' - na lau - mi karatolele - na .

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Uma mowo kakonce - ra ntodea , ntora ra ' uli ' - mi : " Hawe ' ea to nababehi , lompe ' . Tauna to wongo napaka ' uri ' , pe ' epe - ramo ! Tauna to uma howa ' mololita , howa ' - ramo mololita ! "

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Uma mahae ngkai ree , wori ' wo ' o - mi tauna morumpu dohe Yesus . Apa ' uma - hawo ria pongkoni ' - ra , nakio ' - ra ana ' guru - na pai ' na ' uli ' - raka :

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: " Tuna - kuna nono - ku mpohilo tauna to wori ' toera lau . Tolu eo - ramo dohe - ku , uma ria pongkoni ' - ra .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: Hiaa ' ane kuhubui - ra nculii ' hilou hi tomi - ra ntali oro ' - ra , meka ' molinga ' - ra mpai ' hi ohea . Apa ' ria - ra to ngkai kalaa - na . "

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - na : " Ngkaiapa - tana mpai ' tarata pongkoni ' tapokoni ' - raka , bo wao ' - hana hi rehe ' i lau ? "

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Napekune ' - ra : " Hangkuja roti to ria hi koi ' - e ? " Ra ' uli ' - ki : " Pitu meha ' . "

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Ngkai ree , nahubui - ramo tauna to wori ' mohura hi tana ' . Na ' ala ' - mi roti pai ' - i mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala . Oti toe , napihe - pihe - mi pai ' nawai ' - raka ana ' guru - na mpobagi - bagi - raka tauna to wori ' .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Ria wo ' o - raka bau ' uru to kedi ' ba hangkuja ma ' a . Naposampayai wo ' o pai ' nahubui ana ' guru - na mpobagi hi ntodea .

text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
text2: Ngkoni ' - ramo duu ' - ra bohu . Kawori ' - ra to ngkoni ' nto ' u toe , ba opo ' ncobu . Ka ' oti - ra ngkoni ' , rarumpu - mi toro - na , pitu luncu - pi . Oti toe , Yesus mpohubui - ra nculii ' hilou hi tomi - ra ,

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: pai ' Hi ' a hante ana ' guru - na mohawi ' sakaya hilou hi ngata Dalmanuta .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata hi Yesus , pai ' ratepu ' u - mi mpomehono ' - ki doko ' mposori - i . Ra ' uli ' - ki : " Babehi - mi anu mekoncehi bona monoto ki ' inca kangkai Alata ' ala - na mpu ' u - ko . "

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Yesus lolita - ra , na ' osu ' - mi inoha ' - na pai ' na ' uli ' : " Napa - di pai ' tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi merapi ' tanda mekoncehi - e ? Uma - a dota ! Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : uma - koi kupopohiloi tanda mekoncehi hewa to niperapi ' . "

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Kanapalahii - rami , mehawi ' - imi hi sakaya hilou hi dipo rano .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: Hi pomako ' - ra tohe ' e , ana ' guru - na Yesus uma mpokiwoi ngkeni boku , muntu ' hameha ' roti to ria hi rala sakaya .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: Yesus mpololitai - ra hante hanyala walatu , na ' uli ' : " Pelompehi - koi , mo ' inga ' - inga ' hi ragi - ra to Parisi pai ' ragi Magau ' Herodes ! "

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: Aga uma ra ' incai batua - na walatu toe , helee momepololitai moto - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Pai ' na ' uli ' hewa toe - le , apa ' uma ria roti - ta . "

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: Ntaa ' na ' inca - di Yesus napa to ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - nae , toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' ntora mpololita ka ' uma - na ria roti - nie ? Ko ' ia oa ' - tano nipaha - e ? Ha uma oa ' monoto nono - ni , jau - mi ni ' epe tudui ' - ku , jau nihilo kabaraka ' - ku ? Mataa pai ' tilingaa moto - koi , hiaa ' uma oa ' nipaha napa to nihilo pai ' to ni ' epe ? Ha uma nikiwoi ,

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: roti to lima meha ' kupihe - pihe kupokoni ' - raka tauna to lima ncobu ? Hangkuja luncu - pi toro - na to nirumpu ? " Ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - na : " Hampulu ' roluncu . "

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Napekune ' tena Yesus : " Pai ' roti to pitu meha ' kupokoni ' - raka to opo ' ncobu , hangkuja luncu wo ' o - pi toro - na to nirumpu ? " Ra ' uli ' : " Pitu luncu - pi . "

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: Na ' uli ' tena - raka : " Hiaa ' uma oa ' nipaha toe ? "

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: Ngkai ree , rata - ramo hi ngata Betsaida . Hi ngata toe , ria to ngkeni hadua towero hi Yesus . Merapi ' - ra bona najama - i - hawo .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Yesus mpokamu pale - na , pai ' natete ' - i hilou hi mali bola ' . Na ' uelikui mata - na pai ' naganga . Oti toe , napekune ' - i : " Ria to nuhilo ba napa - napa ? "

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Towero toe menaa - naa pai ' na ' uli ' : " Kuhilo tauna , mokao ' hewa kaju to mako ' hilou tumai . "

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Oti toe , naganga tena mata - na , pai ' nahubui - i menaa . Mo ' uri ' mpu ' u - miki mata - na . Hawe ' ea to nahilo , monoto - mi .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpohubui - i nculii ' hilou hi tomi - na , na ' uli ' - ki : " Nculii ' - moko hilou hi tomi - nu , aga neo ' - ko mesua ' hi rala ngata mpo ' uli ' - raka pue ' ngata napa to jadi ' toi . "

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Yesus hante ana ' guru - na hilou hi ngata to mohu ' Kaisarea Filipi . Hi lengko ohea , napekune ' - ra , na ' uli ' : " Ntuku ' ponguli ' ntodea , hema - a Aku ' toi - e ? "

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Ra ' uli ' - ki : " Ria to mpo ' uli ' Yohanes Topeniu ' - ko tuwu ' nculii ' . Ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' nabi Elia - ko . Ria wo ' o - ra to mpo ' uli ' Iko hadua nabi to owi tuwu ' nculii ' . "

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: Napekune ' tena - ra , na ' uli ' : " Hiaa ' koi ' - koiwo mpo ' uli ' hema - a Aku ' toi - e ? " Natompoi ' Petrus : " Iko - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' ! "

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' ulu ni ' uli ' hi hema - hema ka ' Aku ' - na Magau ' Topetolo ' . "

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Oti toe , natepu ' u - mi Yesus mpotudui ' ana ' guru - na napa to kana jadi ' hi woto - na . Na ' uli ' - raka : " Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' kana mporata wori ' kaparia . Rasapuaka - a mpai ' totu ' a ngata , imam pangkeni hante guru agama . Rapatehi - a mpai ' , aga tolu eo oti toe , tuwu ' nculii ' moto - a . "

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Hawe ' ea toe napolonto ' mpo ' uli ' - raka . Aga Petrus mpo ' ai ' - i hi ncori - na pai ' nakorai ' - i .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: Yesus me ' ili ' pai ' mponaa ana ' guru - na , pai ' - i ngkaroe Petrus , na ' uli ' - ki : " Palai - ko topesori ! Pekiri - nu tetu - le pekiri manusia ' , bela pekiri Alata ' ala . "

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpokio ' tauna to wori ' bona morumpu hangkaa - ngkania hante Hi ' a pai ' ana ' guru - na . Na ' uli ' - raka : " Hema to doko ' mpotuku ' - a kana mpobahaka konoa - na moto , pai ' kana napaha ' a kaju parika ' - na - - batua - na : kana natuku ' hawa ' - ku nau ' napomate - ki . Oti toe - di pai ' lako ' ma ' ala - i mpotuku ' - a .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Hema to mpentaei konoa - na moto , uma - i mpai ' mporatai katuwua ' to lompe ' . Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa - na moto sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' pai ' sabana Kareba Lompe ' , nau ' napomate - ki , hi ' a mpai ' to mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: Napa kalaua - na tarumpu hawe ' ea ka ' uaa ' dunia ' , ane uma taratai katuwua ' to lompe ' hi eo mpeno - na .

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Apa ' uma ria napa - napa to ma ' ala tasula ' - ki katuwua ' to lompe ' toe .

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: " Mo ' oha ' - koi hi laintongo ' tauna to dada ' a pai ' to uma mpotuku ' - a . Aga hema to me ' ea ' mpangaku ' petuku ' - na hi Aku ' pai ' mpoka ' ea ' tudui ' - ku , Aku ' wo ' o mpai ' me ' ea ' mpangaku ' kahi ' a - na topetuku ' - ku ane rata - apa mpai ' ngkai suruga . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' mana ' u tumai hante mala ' eka - mala ' eka to moroli ' , mehini - a hante baraka ' - na Tuama - ku . "

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Ngkai olo ' - ni koi ' toi , ria - koi mpai ' to ko ' ia mate kako ' ia - na nihilo Alata ' ala moparenta hante baraka ' - na . "

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Ono mengi ngkai ree , Yesus mpobawai tolu ana ' guru - na hilou dohe - na hi bulu ' to molangko . Ana ' guru to tolu toera : Petrus , Yakobus pai ' Yohanes . Muntu ' Yesus hante ana ' guru - na to tolu toera - wadi to hi ria . Bula - ra hi ria , mobali ' - mi lence - na .

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: Pohea - na hangaa mengea ' meringkila ' , uma ria haduaa hi rala dunia ' tohe ' i to ma ' ala mo ' uja ' duu ' - na mengea ' hewa toe .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Rahilo - rawo ana ' guru - nae , ria rodua nabi to owi mpololitai Yesus . Nabi toera , Elia pai ' Musa .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Ngkai ree Petrus mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , lompe ' lia - ta mo ' oha ' hi rehe ' i . Agina kibabehi - damo tolu bamaru ' : hameha ' bagia - nu Pue ' , hameha ' bagia - na Musa , pai ' hameha ' wo ' o bagia - na Elia . "

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: Kakono - na , uma - hawo na ' incai Petrus napa to na ' uli ' toe , apa ' nto ' u toe bula - ra me ' eka ' lia .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o , rata - mi limu ' mpokamoui - ra , pai ' ngkai rala limu ' ra ' epe topololita to mpo ' uli ' : " Hi ' a toi - mi Ana ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' . Pe ' epei lolita - na ! "

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Hampegoli we ' i , ranaa - rawo ntololikia - ra , uma - pi ria tau ntani ' - na dohe - ra , hadua Yesus - damo .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Pana ' u - ra ngkai lolo bulu ' toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' ulu nilolita hi hema - hema napa to nihilo we ' i , duu ' - na Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' memata ngkai kamatea . "

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Ratuku ' mpu ' u - miki hawa ' - na toe , uma mpu ' u - rawo ralolita kajadia ' toe hi hema - hema . Aga hi himpau hira ' moto bate ntora rapomepekunei ' ba napa patuju - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' kamemata - na mpai ' ngkai kamatea .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Mepekune ' - ramo hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Napa pai ' guru agama mpo ' uli ' nabi Elia ncala ' - di to ri ' ulu rata , pai ' lako ' rata - idi Magau ' Topetolo ' - e ? "

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Makono mpu ' u - di . Elia kana rata mperi ' ulu , apa ' hi ' a to mporodo hawe ' ea - na . Aga beiwa - ama Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' ? Napa pai ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' kamporata - ku wori ' kaparia pai ' - a raruge ' tauna ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Aga ane nabi Elia , ku ' uli ' - kokoi , mpolia ' rata - imile Elia - e , aga pangkeni ngata - ta mpo ' ewa - i ntuku ' konoa - ra , hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' . "

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na to tolu toera , mana ' u - ramo ngkai lolo bulu ' mpohirua ' - raka ana ' guru to ntani ' - na . Rata hi ria , rahilo - rawo wori ' tauna mpotipuhi ana ' guru - na , pai ' ba hangkuja dua guru agama bula - ra mpomehono ' - raka .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Pehilo - ra tauna to wori ' toera etu - mi tumai Yesus . Wae kampohilo - ra , konce - ramo . Pokeno - rami hilou mpohirua ' - ki .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Yesus mpekune ' - ra : " Napa to nipomepekunei ' hante guru agama toera ? "

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Hadua ngkai tauna to wori ' toera mpo ' uli ' : " Guru , oi - kuwo ana ' - ku , kukeni bona nupaka ' uri ' - i . Uma - i howa ' mololita apa ' napesuai ' anudaa ' - i .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Ane napesuai ' wo ' o - ipi anudaa ' - e , modungka - i hi tana ' , mowura ' nganga - na , kakakeji ' - keji ' ngihi ' - na , pai ' mokadu hudu woto - na . Kuperapi ' - ramo ana ' guru - nu mpopalai anudaa ' - na , aga uma rakulei ' . "

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma mowo - koie ' . Ko ' ia oa ' - tano mepangala ' - koie ! Ni ' uli ' - koina hangkuja tena - pi kahae - ku dohe - ni , hangkuja tena - pi kahae - na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala ' - nie ! Keni tumai ana ' tetui ! "

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Rakeni mpu ' u - mi ana ' toei hi Yesus . Wae pehilo - na anudaa ' toei mpohilo Yesus , napakako ' o wo ' o - mi woto ana ' toei duu ' - na modungka - i pai ' - i ngkawulela ' hi tana ' , nganga - na mowura ' .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Mepekune ' - i Yesus hi tuama - na ana ' toei , na ' uli ' : " Hangkuja - mi hae - na narata haki ' toi - e ? " Na ' uli ' tuama - na : " Ngkai kakedia ' - nami - hana .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Wori ' ngkani - mi anudaa ' mpodungka - i hi rala apu ba hi rala ue doko ' napatehi . Ane ma ' ala Guru , poka ' ahi ' pai ' tulungi - ka - kaiwo ! "

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa pai ' nu ' uli ' ` ane ma ' ala - e ? ' Hawe ' ea ma ' ala jadi ' hi tauna to mepangala ' . "

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Hampetompoi ' tuama - na ana ' toei napesukui : " Mepangala ' - ama Pue ' ! Tulungi - a - kuwo , apa ' aku ' toi kura ' rahi pepangala ' - ku . "

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Nahilo Yesus kawoo - woria ' tauna to mokeno tumai morumpu . Kanahawai ' - nami anudaa ' toe , na ' uli ' : " Ee anudaa ' to mepakawongo pai ' mepakawojo tetu - ko ! Petibo ' - ko ngkai ana ' tetui , pai ' neo ' - pi nupesuai ' nculii ' . "

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Pe ' au - nami ana ' toei , kakapadi - padi woto - na , pai ' malai - mi anudaa ' . Kamalai - na anudaa ' , uma - pi molengo ana ' toei , hewa tomate - imi , alaa - na wori ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Mate - imi ! "

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Aga Yesus mpokamu pale - na mpotulungi - i memata . Memata mpu ' u - imi - hawo ana ' toei .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Oti toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na malai ngkai ree mesua ' hi rala tomi . Pesua ' - ra hi rala tomi , mepekune ' - ramo hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Guru , napa pai ' uma kipakulei ' mpopalai anudaa ' toei - e we ' i ? "

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Anudaa ' to hewa tohe ' e uma - hana ma ' ala rapopalai hante inca napa - napa , muntu ' hante mosampaya . "

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na malai ngkai ree mpokaliliu pomako ' - ra ntara hi tana ' Galilea . Patuju - na Yesus bona neo ' ra ' incai ntodea kahiapa - na ,

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: apa ' nto ' u toe bula - na mpotudui ' ana ' guru - na . Na ' uli ' - raka : " Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ratonu - a mpai ' hi kuasa manusia ' . Rapatehi - a mpai ' , aga tolu eo oti toe , tuwu ' nculii ' - a . "

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Aga ana ' guru - na uma mpo ' incai patuju - na Yesus . Hiaa ' uma wo ' o - ra daho ' mpekune ' - i .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Rata - ramo hi ngata Kapernaum . Hi rala tomi - ramo , mepekune ' - i Yesus hi ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' : " Napa - die to ntora nilolita hi lengko ohea - e we ' i ? "

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Uma - ra winihi , apa ' to rapomehonoi ' hi lengko ohea we ' i , ba hema - ra to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - ra .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Jadi ' , mohura - imi Yesus pai ' - i mpokio ' ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua , na ' uli ' - raka : " Hema to doko ' meliu bohe tuwu ' - na , kana tuwu ' mengkadingki ' - i , meliu kadingki ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea doo - na , pai ' kana jadi ' pahawaa ' hi hawe ' ea doo - na . "

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Oti toe , na ' ala ' hadua ana ' to kedi ' , napopokore hi laintongo ' - ra . Nakupui ana ' toei pai ' na ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na :

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: " Hema to mpotarima hadua ana ' to kedi ' hewa ana ' toii sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' , batua - na Aku ' - mi to natarima . Pai ' hema to mpotarima - a , uma muntu ' Aku ' to natarima , mpotarima wo ' o - i Alata ' ala to mposuro - a . "

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yohanes mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , ria kihilo hadua tauna mpopalai seta hante hanga ' - nu , aga kitagi - i apa ' bela - i topetuku ' - ta . "

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Neo ' - i ratagi , apa ' tauna to mpobabehi anu mobaraka ' hante hanga ' - ku , uma - ra mpai ' kaliliu mporuge ' - a .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Tauna to uma mpo ' ewa - ta , batua - na hira ' - mi to tono ' hi kita ' .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ane ria to mpotulungi - koi apa ' topetuku ' Kristus - koi , bate mporata - i hiwili - na hi eo mpeno . Nau ' ue mara - wadi nawai ' - koi ni ' inu sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' , bate mporata - i mpai ' hiwili - na .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: " Aga hema to mpopanawu ' hadua ana ' to kedi ' hewa ana ' toii alaa - na uma - ipi mepangala ' hi Aku ' , bohe mpu ' u mpai ' pehuku ' - na Alata ' ala hi tauna tetui . Agina lau - pi hameha ' watu po ' ahaa ' to bohe ratoe hi wuroko ' - na pai ' - i ratene ' hi rala tahi ' .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: " Ane rapa ' - na pale - ta hamali mpakeni - ta mojeko ' , pua ' lau - imi . Agina hamali - damo pale - ta , asala mporata - ta katuwua ' to lompe ' dohe Alata ' ala . Agina lau - pi toe , ngkai palea ntimalia - ta , hiaa ' ka ' omea - na mesua ' naraka - tamo hi rala apu to jela ' ncuu . ( (

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Apa ' hi ria mpai ' , tauna nakoni ' ule ncuu pai ' rasesa ' hi rala apu . ) )

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ane rapa ' - na witi ' - ta hamali mpakeni - ta mojeko ' , pua ' lau - imi . Agina hamali - damo witi ' - ta , asala mporata - ta katuwua ' to lompe ' dohe Alata ' ala . Agina lau - pi toe , ngkai witia ' ntimalia - ta , hiaa ' ka ' omea - na ratadi - ta hi rala naraka . ( (

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Hi ria mpai ' , tauna nakoni ' ule ncuu pai ' rasesa ' hi rala apu . ) )

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Pai ' ane rapa ' - na mata - ta hamali mpakeni - ta mojeko ' , jungki ' lau - mi . Agina hamali - wadi mata - ta pai ' - ta jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Agina lau - pi toe , ngkai mataa ntimalia - ta , hiaa ' ka ' omea - na ratadi - ta hi rala apu naraka .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Hi ria mpai ' , tauna nakoni ' ule ncuu pai ' rasesa ' hi rala apu .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: Ntuku ' Atura Musa , hawe ' ea pongkoni ' to rapopepue ' hi Alata ' ala kana rapoii ' . Wae wo ' o butu dua tauna kana rapomoroli ' hante apu .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: " Poi ' wori ' kalaua - na . Aga ane mobali ' - mi kapoi ' - na alaa - na mononto , napa tena to ma ' ala mpakapoi ' - i ? Wae wo ' o , koi ' to mpotuku ' - a kana hewa poi ' : Neo ' nipelele ' pepangala ' - ni jadi ' lente . Kana tuwu ' hintuwu ' - koi . "

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Malai - imi Yesus ngkai ree hilou hi tana ' Yudea pai ' hi dipo ue Yordan . Wori ' wo ' o - mi tauna tumai mpotipuhi - i , pai ' hewa to lalaua natudui ' wo ' o - ramo .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata mpali ' kedo ' . Rapekune ' - i : " Ntuku ' atura agama - ta , ba ma ' ala moto - hawo tomane mpogaa ' - ki tobine - nae ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa parenta to nawai ' - kokoi nabi Musa ? "

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Ratompoi ' to Parisi : " Musa mpiliu tomane mpogaa ' - ki tobine - na , asala nababehi ncala ' sura mpogaa ' . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Musa mpo ' uki ' pai ' mpoparata - kokoi parenta toe - le , apa ' ngkai kamotu ' a maga - ni , uma tuduia ' .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Aga ngkai lomo ' kajadi ' dunia ' , nto ' u Alata ' ala mpajadi ' manusia ' , napajadi ' - ra hadua tomane pai ' hadua tobine .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: ` Toe pai ' tomane kana mpalahii tina pai ' tuama - na , pai ' kana tuwu ' hintuwu ' hante tobine - na ,

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: bona hira ' tau rodua toe jadi ' hewa hadua lau - ra - damo . ' Jadi ' , hi poncilo Alata ' ala , tau hancamoko uma - pi rodua , hadua lau - ramo .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ane ntoa ' Alata ' ala mpoposidai ' - ra , manusia ' uma ma ' ala mpogaa ' - ra . "

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na mesua ' hi rala tomi . Bula - ra hi rala tomi ana ' guru - na mpekune ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa mpu ' u - hawo gau ' pogaa ' tohe ' e we ' i - e ? "

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Hema to mpogaa ' - ki tobine - na pai ' - i ncamoko hante tobine to ntani ' - na , mobualo ' - i - hana , mpobualohi tobine - na to lomo ' - na .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Wae wo ' o tobine to mpogaa ' - ki tomane - na pai ' - i ncamoko hante tomane to ntani ' - na , mobualo ' wo ' o - i - wadi - hawo . "

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Hangkani , ria tauna to mpokeni ana ' - ra hi Yesus bona najama pai ' nagane ' - ra . Aga ana ' guru - na mpokaroe tauna toera .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Mpohilo toe - di , kamoroe - nami Yesus mpokaroe ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' - raka : " Pelele ' moto - ra ana ' tetura tumai hi Aku ' , neo ' - ra nitagi . Apa ' tauna to hewa toe - ramo to jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Ane uma - koi mengkoru hi Alata ' ala hewa ana ' , uma - koi mpai ' jadi ' ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . "

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Ka ' oti - na mpo ' uli ' toe , nakupui - ramo ana ' toera , najama - ra pai ' - ra nagane ' .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Neo ' me ' ongko ' wo ' o - imi Yesus mpokaliliu pomako ' - na , muu - mule ' mokeno tumai hadua tauna mperapai - i , kaliliu mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa - na , pai ' - i mepekune ' , na ' uli ' : " Guru to lompe ' , napa - kuwo to kana kubabehi bona mporata - a - kuwo katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na ? "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa pai ' nu ' uli ' tauna to lompe ' - a ? Uma ria ntani ' - na to lompe ' , hadua Alata ' ala - wadi .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Nu ' inca moto parenta to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Pue ' : ` Neo ' mepatehi , neo ' mobualo ' , neo ' manako , neo ' mosabi ' boa ' , neo ' mebagiu , pai ' kana tabila ' tina pai ' tuama - ta . ' "

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Na ' uli ' tauna toei : " Guru , hawe ' ea parenta tetu lau , kutuku ' omea - mi ngkai kakedia ' - ku . "

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Yesus mpomonaa - i hante ahi ' - na , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Hanyala - pi to kana nubabehi . Lou - moko ulu mpobalu ' rewa - nu , pai ' doi oli - na wai ' - raka tokabu . Ane nubabehi hewa toe , bohe mpai ' rasi ' to nurata hi rala suruga . Oti toe , pai ' tumai - moko mpotuku ' - a . "

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Kana ' epe - na lolita - na Yesus tohe ' e , peda ' - mi nono - na . Kamalai - nami ngkai ree hante susa ' nono - na , apa ' wori ' rewa - na .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Yesus mpomonaa ana ' guru - na to mokore ntololikia - na , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Mokoro rahi tauna to wori ' rewa - ra mengkoru hi Alata ' ala bona Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ra . "

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Rapokakonce ana ' guru - na mpo ' epe lolita - na tohe ' e . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' tena - raka : " Ana ' - ana ' - ku , mokoro mpu ' u manusia ' mengkoru hi Alata ' ala bona Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ra .

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Mojoli - pi hama ' a unta ntara hi wulou ' jaru , ngkai tauna to mo ' ua ' mengkoru hi Alata ' ala bona Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ra . "

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Mpo ' epe toe - di , hangkedi ' kakonce - ra ana ' guru - na , ra ' uli ' : " Ei ' , ane wae - di , hema lau - damo to ma ' ala mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - nae ! "

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Yesus mponaa - ra pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ane hante pakulea ' manusia ' - le , uma ami ' hema . Aga ane Alata ' ala , ma ' ala oa ' madupa ' , apa ' hi Alata ' ala uma ria to uma madupa ' . "

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' Petrus mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Hiaa ' kai ' , kipalahii omea - mi - kaina bona mpotuku ' - ko . "

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Hema - hema to mpalahii ompi ' - na , tina - na ba tuama - na , ana ' - na ba tomi - na ba bonea - na sabana mpotuku ' - a pai ' sabana Kareba Lompe ' ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: bate mporata - i mpai ' hiwili to bohe . Hi dunia ' toi mporata - i ha ' atu ngkani kawori ' tomi , ompi ' , tina , ana ' , bonea - - pai ' mporata wo ' o - i pebalinai ' . Pai ' hi eo mpeno - na mpai ' , mporata wo ' o - i katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Aga wori ' tauna to bohe tuwu ' - ra tempo toi jadi ' kedi ' tuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno . Pai ' wori ' wo ' o tauna to kedi ' tuwu ' - ra tempo toi jadi ' bohe tuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno . "

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Yesus hante ana ' guru - na mpokaliliu pomako ' - ra hilou hi Yerusalem . Yesus momako ' ri ' ulu , ana ' guru - na hi boko ' . Koro ' ana ' guru - na mpohilo - i , pai ' tauna to metuku ' hi boko ' wo ' o me ' eka ' omea - ramo . Toe pai ' nakio ' wo ' o - mi ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua mopahantani ' , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka napa to kana jadi ' mpai ' hi woto - na .

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Epe - koi ! Hilou - tamo tohe ' i - e mpotoa ' Yerusalem . Hi ria mpai ' , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' ratonu hi imam pangkeni pai ' guru agama , pai ' rabotuhi bona rapatehi - a . Oti toe ratonu - a hi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Rapopo ' ore ' - a , ra ' uelikui , raweba ' , pai ' rapatehi . Aga tolu eo oti toe tuwu ' nculii ' moto - a . "

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Oti toe , Yakobus pai ' Yohanes , ana ' - na Zebedeus , mpomohui ' Yesus , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , ria hanyala to doko ' kiperapi ' ngkai Iko . "

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa to niperapi ' kuwai ' - koi ? "

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Ra ' uli ' : " Ane nupopehuwu mpai ' baraka ' - nu pai ' - ko jadi ' Magau ' , piliu - kai mohura pai ' moparenta dohe - nu , hadua hi mali ka ' ana - nu , hadua hi mali ki ' ii - nu . "

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Uma ni ' incai napa to niperapi ' tetu . Ha nipakule ' mpai ' mpokolo kaparia to kana kukolo Aku ' - e ? Ha nipakule ' mpotodohaka to kutodohaka - e mpai ' ? "

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Ra ' uli ' : " Kipakule ' moto ! " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono , bate nikolo mpu ' u mpai ' kaparia hewa to kukolo , pai ' nitodohaka napa to kutodohaka .

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: Aga ane hema to mohura hi mali ka ' ana - ku ba hi mali ki ' ii - ku , bela Aku ' to mpakatantu tetu . Alata ' ala - hana to mpakatantu hema to mporata bagia tetu . "

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Kara ' epe - na ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' pomperapia ' Yakobus pai ' Yohanes toe , moroe - ramo .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Toe pai ' Yesus mpokio ' - ra omea , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ni ' inca moto kasoa - ra topoparenta to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala mpoparentai ntodea - ra . Tauna to bohe pangka ' - ra mpewuku ntodea - ra mpotuku ' hawa ' - ra .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Aga koi ' , neo ' hewa toe kehi - ni ! Hema - koi to doko ' bohe pangka ' - na kana jadi ' pahawaa ' .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Pai ' hema to doko ' bohe hanga ' - na kana jadi ' batua hi hawe ' ea doo - na .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Bangku ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' - e ' , patuju - ku tumai hi dunia ' , uma bona jadi ' topohawa ' . Pai ' - a tumai - le , bona jadi ' pahawaa ' , duu ' - na mpewai ' woto - ku rapatehi mpotolo ' sala ' tauna to wori ' . "

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na rata hi ngata Yerikho . Nto ' u - ra malai ngkai ngata , wori ' tauna mpotuku ' - ra . Hi wiwi ' ohea mohura hadua tauna to wero kakarapi ' - rapi ' . Hanga ' - na Bartimeus ( batua - na : ana ' Timeus ) .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Bartimeus Kayesus to Nazaret to liu , kamekio ' - nami na ' uli ' : " Yesus , muli Magau ' Daud ! Poka ' ahi ' - a - kuwo ! "

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Wori ' tauna mpokaroe - i , ra ' uli ' : " Ngkalino - ko ! " Aga hangkedi ' kanapesukui - na mekio ' : " Muli Magau ' Daud , poka ' ahi ' - a - kuwo ! "

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Mentoda ' - imi Yesus pai ' na ' uli ' : " Kio ' - i tumai ! " Karakio ' - nami towero toei , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Pakaroho nono - nu ! Mokore - moko , apa ' nakio ' - moko ! "

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Kamokore - nami towero toei , nabahaka abe ' - na hi ohea pai ' napesahui hilou hi Yesus .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Napa to nupokono kubabehi - koko ? " Natompoi ' towero toei : " Guru , bona pehilo - a - kuwo ! "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Hilou - moko . Kupaka ' uri ' - moko sabana pepangala ' - nu hi Aku ' . " Ncaliu pehilo - imi , pai ' - i mpotuku ' Yesus .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Kamohu ' - ra hi ngata Yerusalem , rata - ramo hi ngata Betfage pai ' Betania hi Bulu ' Zaitun . Hi ree , Yesus mpohubui rodua ana ' guru - na hilou meri ' ulu ,

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - mokoi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai . Wae pesua ' - ni mpai ' rala ngata , nihilo mpai ' hama ' a ana ' keledai tehoo ' , to ko ' ia hangkania rahawi ' . Bongka koloro - na pai ' keni - i tumai .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Ane ria to mpekune ' - koi napa pai ' nibongka - i , uli ' - raka hewa toi : ` Apa ' naparaluu Pue ' , napebolo ulu pai ' napoponculi ' moto mpai ' . ' "

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Kahilou - rami ana ' guru - na to rodua toera , rarata mpu ' u - mi hama ' a ana ' keledai tehoo ' hi wiwi ' ohea mohu ' wobo ' tomi . Karabongka - nami - rawo .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Tauna to mokore hi ree mpekune ' - ra : " Napa pai ' nibongka keledai tetu - e ? "

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Ratompoi ' hewa to na ' uli ' - raka Yesus we ' i . Mpo ' epe toe , rapelele ' wae - ramo mpokeni keledai toe .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Karata - ra nculii ' , ralampii - mi keledai toe hante baju - ra , pai ' mehawi ' - imi Yesus .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Hilou - ramo mpotoa ' Yerusalem . Wori ' tauna mpotuku ' - ra . Ria - ra to meri ' ulu , ria wo ' o - ra to hi boko ' . Wori ' - ra mpokodo pohea - ra hi mata ohea to natara Yesus , pai ' hantongo ' wo ' o - ra hilou mpo ' ala ' rau - rau kaju hi pampa pai ' rakodo hi mata ohea , bona mpobila ' - i . Tauna to wori ' toera , ntora mogora - ra mpo ' uli ' : Une ' - imi Pue ' Ala ! " Pue ' mpogane ' Magau ' to tumai mpokeni hanga ' - na ! "

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: " Pue ' mpogane ' poparenta - na . Moparenta - i mpai ' hewa ntu ' a - ta owi , Magau ' Daud . " Une ' - imi Pue ' Ala to hi rala suruga ! "

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Karata - na Yesus hi ngata Yerusalem , kaliliu mesua ' - i hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala . Napomonaa ntololikia - na mponaa omea . Oti toe , apa ' neo ' mobengi - mi , nculii ' wo ' o - imi hante ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua hilou turu hi ngata Betania .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Kamepulo - na , me ' ongko ' wo ' o - ramo ngkai Betania lou hi Yerusalem . Hi ohea , mo ' oro ' - i Yesus .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Molaa - pidi , nahilo - hawo hangkaju kaju ara to mobumu - damo rau - na - - hiaa ' ko ' ia tempo powuaa ' - na . Hilou - imi hi kaju toe , pai ' nanaa meka ' ba ria wua ' - na . Aga uma ria nau ' hantakua .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Toe pai ' natotowi kaju toe , na ' uli ' : " Ngkai eo toe lau , uma - pi ria mpai ' haduaa tauna to mpokoni ' wua ' ngkai kaju toi ! " Ana ' guru - na mpo ' epe lolita - na toe .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Rata wo ' o - ramo hi Yerusalem , hilou - imi Yesus hi berewe Tomi Alata ' ala . Hi ree - i mpopalai tauna to mobabalu ' . Nabilingko - raka meja ' - meja ' posulaa ' - ra doi , pai ' nabilingko wo ' o pohuraa topobabalu ' danci mangkebodo .

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Uma napiliu tauna mpokeni rewa ntara berewe Tomi Alata ' ala toe .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Natudui ' - ra , na ' uli ' : " Ha uma ni ' incai napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' ? Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Tomi - ku mpai ' jadi ' tomi posampayaa to rapake ' tauna humalili ' dunia ' . ' Hiaa ' koi ' - koina , niponcawa tomi toperampaki - di ! "

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Kara ' epe - na imam pangkeni pai ' guru agama napa to nababehi Yesus toe , rapali ' - mi akala - ra doko ' mpopatehi - i . Koro ' - ra , apa ' hawe ' ea tauna goe ' mpo ' epe tudui ' - na .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Neo ' mobengi - mi , Yesus hante ana ' guru - na malai ngkai ngata , lou turu hi Bulu ' Zaitun .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Kamepulo - na mepupulo ngkii - pidi , hilou wo ' o - ramo hi Yerusalem . Hi lengko ohea , rahilo - rawo kaju ara to natotowi Yesus wengi , mate - mi , bangi rata hi rali ' - na .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Nakiwoi - mi Petrus lolita - na Yesus . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru ! Hilo - dile kaju ara to nutotowi wengi - e , molaju - mi ! "

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mepangala ' - mokoi hi Alata ' ala !

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Ane rapa ' - na ria tauna to mpo ' uli ' - ki bulu ' tohe ' i : ` Te ' ongko ' - moko , mengkanawu ' hi rala tahi ' ! ' bate majadi ' , asala neo ' morara ' nono - na pai ' mepangala ' mpu ' u - i napa to na ' uli ' bate madupa ' .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Jadi ' , pe ' epei lolita - ku toi : Ane mosampaya - koi mperapi ' napa - napa , pangala ' - mi - hana kanawai ' - nimi Alata ' ala napa to niperapi ' , pai ' bate nitarima .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: " Pai ' ane mosampaya - koi , ane ria to nipodaa ' - ki doo - ni , ampungi - i ulu , bona Tuama - ni to hi suruga wo ' o mpo ' ampungi sala ' - ni . ( (

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Aga ane uma - di ni ' ampungi doo - ni , wae wo ' o Tuama - ni to hi suruga uma mpo ' ampungi sala ' - ni . ) ) "

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Rata wo ' o - ramo Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na hi Yerusalem . Nto ' u - ra momako ' - mako ' hi berewe Tomi Alata ' ala , rata - ra imam pangkeni , guru agama pai ' pangkeni to Yahudi to ntani ' - na .

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: Mepekune ' - ra hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Uli ' - kakai , ngkaiapa huraa - nu mpobabehi hawe ' ea tetu hi Tomi Alata ' ala ! Hema to mpowai ' - ko kuasa hewa tetu - e ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' wo ' o , ria pompekunea ' - ku hi koi ' . Tompoi ' - ka ulu , pai ' lako ' ku ' uli ' wo ' o - kuwo kangkaiapa kuasa - ku mpobabehi hawe ' ea toe lau .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Ngkaiapa kuasa - na Yohanes Topeniu ' mponiu ' tauna ? Ngkai Alata ' ala - di , ba ngkai manusia ' - di ? "

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Momepololitai - ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa - tale ' mpotompoi ' - ie ? Ane ta ' uli ' ngkai Alata ' ala kuasa - na , na ' uli ' - taka mpai ' : ` Ane wae , napa pai ' uma - i nipangala ' ? '

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Hiaa ' mokoro wo ' o ane ta ' uli ' ngkai manusia ' - wadi kuasa - na . " Pangkeni to Yahudi toera me ' eka ' mporuge ' Yohanes Topeniu ' , apa ' mpoka ' eka ' - ra ntodea , apa ' hawe ' ea ntodea mpo ' uli ' Yohanes toe hadua nabi mpu ' u .

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Jadi ' , ratompoi ' - i : " Uma ki ' incai . " Toe pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane wae , uma wo ' o - kuwo ku ' uli ' - kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa - ku mpobabehi toe lau . "

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpololitai pangkeni to Yahudi toera hante lolita rapa ' , na ' uli ' : " Ria hadua tauna to mpohu ' ai bonea - na hante anggur . Nawala ntololikia - na , nakae tana ' mpobabehi torobo ' pompeaa ' anggur , pai ' natunya ' pongko pompodooa . Oti toe , napewai ' bonea - na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna , pai ' hilou - imi hi ngata to molaa .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Rata - mi tempo pohopua ' wua ' anggur , napahawa ' hadua batua - na hilou mperapi ' bagia - na hi to mpodoo bonea - na toera .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Tapi ' to mpodoo bonea toera mpohoko ' batua - na , rapao ' pai ' rapopalai mara .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Oti toe , pue ' bonea mpahawa ' tena hadua batua - na . Rata ria , rapao ' wo ' o - i - wadi - hawo , weho woo ' - na , ralibui ' ntarurua ' pai ' - i rapopalai .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Ngkai ree , nahubui tena hadua batua - na . Rata ria , rapatehi lau - imi . Bate hewa toe - mi kehi - ra hi butu dua batua to napahawa ' : ria to raweba ' , ria to rapatehi .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: " Uma - pi hema to napahawa ' pue ' bonea toei , metoro hadua ana ' woto - na to nape ' ahi ' - damo . Ka ' omea - na napahawa ' ana ' - na toe hilou hi to mpodoo bonea - na , na ' uli ' : ` Bate rapengkorui - ile mpai ' . '

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: " Ntaa ' we ' i , to mpodoo bonea toera , mohawa ' - ramo ra ' uli ' : ` Etu - mi tumai ana ' - na , hi ' a mpai ' to jadi ' pue ' bonea toi - e . Kita tapatehi - i , bona bonea - na toi kita ' - mi pue ' - na . '

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Karahoko ' - nami ana ' toei , rapatehi pai ' ratadi hi mali bonea . "

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka pangkeni to Yahudi : " Jadi ' , napa - mi to nababehi pue ' bonea toei ? Bate tumai - ile mpopatehi - ra to mpodoo bonea - na , pai ' bonea - na nawai ' - raka tau ntani ' - na .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Tantu nibasa - mi lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpolowa pesapuaka - ni hi Aku ' , hewa toi moni - na : ` Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi , watu toe lau - mi to jadi ' poko parawatu .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Tohe ' e majadi ' ntuku ' konoa Pue ' Ala , uma mowo kalompe ' - na hi poncilo - ta . ' "

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Kara ' epe - na pangkeni to Yahudi lolita - na Yesus tohe ' e , doko ' rahoko ' - i apa ' ra ' inca kahira ' - na to natoa ' hante lolita rapa ' toe . Aga uma - ra daho ' mpohoko ' - i , apa ' mpoka ' eka ' - ra ntodea . Jadi ' , malai - ramo mpalahii - i .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Ngkai ree , pangkeni to Yahudi mpohubui ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai ' tauna to tono ' hi Magau ' Herodes hilou hi Yesus . Patuju - ra doko ' mpahala ' nawu ' - i hante pompekunea ' - ra .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Karata - ra hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , ki ' inca Guru tau monoa ' . Metudui ' - ko hante kalonto ' - lonto ' - na mpo ' uli ' napa konoa Alata ' ala hi manusia ' . Uma nupengkorui ba hema - hema , apa ' uma - ko mpelence tauna . Toe pai ' kipekune ' - ko : ntuku ' atura agama - ta , ba ma ' ala moto - ta mpobayari paja ' hi Kaisar , ba uma - di ? Kana tabayari , ba uma mingki ' tabayari ? "

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Na ' inca Yesus patuju nono - ra to tewunii ' . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' nipali ' kahala ' kedoa ' pololita - kue ? Keni pe ' tumai doi to biasa nibayari - ki paja ' , doko ' kuhilo . "

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Ngkai ree , ratonu - miki hampepa ' doi pera ' . Na ' uli ' : " Lence hema pai ' hanga ' hema to hi doi toi ? " Ra ' uli ' : " Lence pai ' hanga ' Kaisar . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Ane wae - di , wai ' - ki Kaisar napa to masipato ' rawai ' - ki Kaisar . Pai ' wai ' - ki Alata ' ala napa to masipato ' rawai ' - ki Alata ' ala . " Konce - ramo mpo ' epe tompoi ' - na toe .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Oti toe , ba hangkuja dua to Saduki rata hi Yesus . To Saduki toera , pangkeni agama Yahudi to mposapuaka tauna to mate tuwu ' nculii ' hi eo mpeno . Karata to Saduki toera , ra ' uli ' - ki Yesus :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Guru , nabi Musa mpo ' uki ' hi rala buku atura hewa toi : ane hadua tomane mate hiaa ' uma - ki ria ana ' - na , pudupuhe - na kana mpotobine balu - na bona ria - ki - hawo muli - na .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Jadi ' , ria pitu to ntali ompi ' paka ' tomane . To ulumua ' motobinei , mate - i uma ria ana ' - na .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Tu ' ai - na mpotobine balu - na . Mate wo ' o - i - wadi - hawo , hiaa ' ko ' ia - i mo ' anai ' . Wae wo ' o to majadi ' hi katolu - na ,

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: duu ' rata hi kapitu - na . Mate omea - ramo hante uma ria ana ' - ra . Ka ' omea - na , mate wo ' o - imi - hawo tobine toei .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Jadi ' , hi eo mpeno , ane tuwu ' nculii ' mpu ' u - di hawe ' ea tomate - e , hema - ramo mpai ' pue ' tobine toei , apa ' pitu - ramo to mpotobine - i . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Sala ' mpu ' u pekiri - ni tetu - e , apa ' uma nipaha ihi ' Buku Tomoroli ' , uma wo ' o ni ' incai baraka ' - na Alata ' ala .

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Apa ' ane tuwu ' nculii ' - ramo tauna to mate , katuwu ' - ra hewa katuwu ' mala ' eka hi rala suruga , uma - rapa motobinei ba motomanei .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Ha ko ' ia ria nibasa lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpakanoto katuwu ' - ra nculii ' tomate - e ? Hi rala buku Atura Musa , tabasa tutura - na beiwa Alata ' ala mpololitai nabi Musa ngkai rala julumpu to jela ' . Nto ' u toe , Abraham , Ishak pai ' Yakub mahae - ramo mate . Aga nau ' wae , Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' - ki Musa hewa toi : ` Aku ' toi - mi Alata ' ala to napue ' Abraham , Alata ' ala to napue ' Ishak , Alata ' ala to napue ' Yakub . '

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Jadi ' , ngkai lolita - na Alata ' ala toe , monoto - mi ta ' inca katuwu ' - ra moto Abraham , Ishak pai ' Yakub . Apa ' bela tauna to mate to mepue ' hi Alata ' ala , tauna to tuwu ' - hana to mpopue ' - i . Sala ' rahi - koina pekiri - ni tetu - e . "

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Nto ' u toe , hadua guru agama Yahudi rata hi Yesus . Na ' epe pomehono ' - ra to Saduki hante Yesus we ' i , pai ' na ' uli ' hi rala nono - na : " Lompe ' mpu ' u tompoi ' - na Yesus tetui ! " Toe pai ' mepekune ' wo ' o - imi - hawo hi Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Parenta to ' uma to poko - na ngkai hawe ' ea parenta ? "

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Toi - mi parenta to poko - na : ` Pe ' epei - koi to Israel ! Pue ' - ta Pue ' Alata ' ala hadua - na - wadi .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Kana tapoka ' ahi ' - i hante nono - ta mpu ' u , tatonu hawe ' ea katuwu ' - ta hi Hi ' a , tapoka ' ahi ' - i hudu inca - ta pai ' hudu pakulea ' - ta . '

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Pai ' tohe ' i - mi parenta karonyala - na : ` Kana tapoka ' ahi ' doo - ta hewa pompoka ' ahi ' - ta woto - ta moto . ' Uma ria parenta ntani ' - na to meliu kabohe - na ngkai to ronyala tohe ' i . "

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Na ' uli ' - mi guru agama toei hi Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u - di Guru ! Makono lia to nu ' uli ' tetu - e . Pue ' Ala bate hadua - na - wadi , uma ria ntani ' - na .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Pai ' kana tapoka ' ahi ' - i hante nono - ta mpu ' u , hante hawe ' ea pekiri - ta pai ' hudu pakulea ' - ta . Pai ' kana tapoka ' ahi ' doo - ta hewa woto - ta moto . Toe to meliu kalompe ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea porewua pai ' rewa ntani ' - na to tapopepue ' hi Alata ' ala . "

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Na ' epe Yesus kamonoto tompoi ' - na tauna toei . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Neo ' jadi ' ntodea hi rala Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - moko ! " Ngkai ree , uma - pi hema to daho ' mpekune ' ba napa - napa hi Yesus .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Nto ' u - na Yesus metudui ' hi Tomi Alata ' ala , na ' uli ' : " Napa pai ' guru agama mpo ' uli ' Magau ' Topetolo ' muli - na Magau ' Daud ?

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Hiaa ' bo Daud moto mpokahangai ' - i Pue ' - na . Hante petete ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' Daud mpotompo ' wiwi Magau ' Topetolo ' hewa toi : Pue ' Ala mpo ' uli ' - ki Pue ' - ku : ` Mohura - moko hi mali ngka ' ana - ku duu ' - na kupopengkoru hawe ' ea bali ' - nu hi Iko . '

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Nto ' u - na Yesus mpotudui ' ntodea , na ' uli ' - raka : " Pelompehi - koi , neo ' - koi mpenau ' kehi - ra guru agama . Goe ' - ra modao ' mpopake ' baju to moloe , pai ' goe ' - ra ane tauna hi wiwi ' karajaa motingkua ' mpotabe - ra .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Goe ' - ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa ' hi tomi posampayaa . Goe ' - ra ane rapopohura - ra hi pohuraa to lompe ' hi posusaa ' .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Mpobagiu - ra tobine tobalu , pai ' - ra mpohagoi tomi - ra . Rawunii ' kadada ' a gau ' - ra tohe ' e hante mosampaya rapomoloe - loe . Motomo lia mpai ' huku ' - ra . "

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Yesus mohura mohu ' peti ' pompunaa ' doi pepue ' , pai ' - i mponaa tauna to mpopuna ' doi pepue ' - ra hi rala - na . Wori ' tauna to mo ' ua ' mpopuna ' doi uma hangke - ngkedi ' .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Nto ' u toe , rata wo ' o - hawo hadua tobine tobalu to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - na , napuna ' wo ' o - hawo doi pepue ' - na . To napuna ' tohe ' e , rompepa ' doi ngkala , hangkedi ' lia oli - na .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Yesus mpokio ' ana ' guru - na pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : tobalu to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - na tohe ' e mai , meliu pewai ' - na ngkai pewai ' to rapuna ' hawe ' ea tau ntani ' - na .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Apa ' hira ' mewai ' ngkai labi ka ' uaa ' - ra . Tapi ' tobine toei , nau ' hewa apa - mi kampe ' ahii ' - na , napewai ' omea - mi to ria hi hi ' a , nau ' kakono - na to naparaluu - hawo hi katuwu ' - na eo - eo - na . "

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Oti toe , malai - imi Yesus ngkai rala Tomi Alata ' ala . Ria hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , hilo mpu ' u - konae ' tomi toe - e ! Hilo watu - na ! Uma mowo kancola - na ! "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Nuhilo wa tomi to bohe toe - e lau ? Uma mpai ' ria hamehaa ' watu to bate pomeduncu - na . Bate ragero omea mpai ' . "

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Oti toe , hilou - imi Yesus hi Bulu ' Zaitun pai ' - i mohura mposinyanyohi - ki Tomi Alata ' ala . Petrus , Yakobus , Yohanes pai ' Andreas tumai mpololitai - i nto ' u uma ria tau ntani ' - na .

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' : " Uli ' - kakai ba nto ' uma kadupa ' - na to nu ' uli ' toe - e we ' i , pai ' napa mpai ' to jadi ' tanda ane hawe ' ea toe neo ' madupa ' - pi . "

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Pelompehi , neo ' - koi ma ' ala rabagiu .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Apa ' wori ' mpai ' tauna to mehupa ' to mpo ' uli ' kahira ' - na Magau ' Topetolo ' , alaa - na wori ' mpai ' tauna to rabagiu .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Mpo ' epe - koi mpai ' kareba panga ' ea ngkai kalaa - na , ni ' epe wo ' o moni panga ' ea to mohu ' . Aga neo ' me ' eka ' , apa ' hawe ' ea toe kana jadi ' ulu , tapi ' kajadia ' toe uma mpobatuai karata - nami kahudua dunia ' .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , wori ' ngata mosipanga ' ei , magau ' hadua mpo ' ewa magau ' kahadua - na . Hiapa - apa ria linu pai ' oro ' . Aga hawe ' ea toe lau lako ' pontepu ' ua - na - pidi , hewa pontodohaka hadua tobine to neo ' mo ' ana ' .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: " Aga koi ' tohe ' i , mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi ! Apa ' koi ' mpai ' bate rahoko ' pai ' rakeni hi topohura agama . Raweba ' - koi hi rala tomi posampayaa . Rabua ' - koi hi topoparenta pai ' hi magau ' sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , ria loga - ni mpo ' uli ' - raka pepangala ' - ni hi Aku ' .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Pai ' Kareba Lompe ' kana raparata hi humalili ' dunia ' kako ' ia - na Eo Kiama .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ane rahoko ' - koi pai ' rakeni hi topohura , neo ' - koi me ' eka ' ba napa mpai ' petompoi ' - ni . Ane rata - damo tempo - ni mololita , uli ' - mi - hana napa to natu ' u Pue ' Ala hi rala nono - ni . Apa ' napa to ni ' uli ' nto ' u toe , bela ngkai pekiri - ni moto . Lolita - ni tetu mehupa ' ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: " Rata mpai ' tempo - na hawe ' ea tauna mpokahuku ' - koi sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' . Ria mpai ' tauna to mpewai ' ompi ' - ra ba ana ' - ra moto bona rapatehi sabana petuku ' - ra hi Aku ' . Ria wo ' o ana ' to mpo ' ewa totu ' a - ra pai ' mpopatehi - ra . Aga tauna to tida mepangala ' hi Aku ' duu ' hi ka ' omea - na , mporata - ra kalompea ' hi eo mpeno .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: " Owi nabi Daniel mpolowa karata - na to rahanga ' ` Topegerohi to dada ' a . ' ( Hema to mpobasa lolita pelowa toe , penotohi mpu ' u batua - na ! ) Jadi ' , ane nihilo to nalowa Daniel toe mokore hi pokorea to ratagi - ki , agina tauna to mo ' oha ' hi Yudea metibo ' hilou hi bulu ' - na .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Tauna to mohura hi parawa - na neo ' - pi leba ' mesua ' hi rala tomi - na mpo ' ala ' ba napa - napa .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Tauna to hi bonea , neo ' - pi nculii ' hi ngata mpo ' ala ' pohea - na . Kaliliu metibo ' !

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Mpe ' ahii ' - ra mpai ' tobine to nto ' u - ra motina ' i pai ' to mpentii ' ana ' - ra nto ' u toe , apa ' mokoro mpai ' petibo ' - ra .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Mekakae - koi hi Alata ' ala bona eo petiboa ' - ni toe neo ' nto ' u tempo lengi ' .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Apa ' nto ' u toe mpai ' rata pesesa ' to ko ' ia ria hangkania jadi ' ngkai lomo ' - na Alata ' ala mpajadi ' dunia ' rata tempo tohe ' i , pai ' uma wo ' o - pi - hawo mpai ' ria jadi ' hi eo boko ' - na .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Aga naredehi moto mpai ' Pue ' Ala tempo kaparia toe , apa ' ane uma naredehi tempo - na , bate uma ria haduaa to tuwu ' . Jadi ' , apa ' napoka ' ahi ' - ra tauna to napelihi pai ' to napobagia , toe pai ' naredehi mpai ' tempo kaparia toe .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: " Nto ' u toe mpai ' , ane ria to mpo ' uli ' - kokoi : ` Hilo , Magau ' Topetolo ' ohe ' i - imi , ' ba ` Hilo , ohe ' e - i mai Magau ' Topetolo ' , ' neo ' nipangalai ' .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Apa ' mehupa ' mpai ' wori ' tauna to boa ' to mpo ' uli ' kahira ' - na Magau ' Topetolo ' , ba to mpo ' uli ' kahira ' - na nabi . Mpobabehi - ra tanda mekoncehi pai ' tanda to mobaraka ' , bona mpobagiu - ra wori ' tauna . Ane ke ma ' ala , ntahawe ' tauna to napelihi Alata ' ala rabagiu wo ' o .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Aga koi ' tohe ' i , mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi ! Ku ' uli ' ami ' - mikokoi hawe ' ea tohe ' e kako ' ia - na jadi ' .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: " Jadi ' , nto ' u toe mpai ' , ane timpaliu - pi tempo kaparia toe , hawe ' ea anu to mobaraka ' hi langi ' ralengo . Eo mobali ' mobengi , wula uma - pi mehini , betue ' roda ' ngkai langi ' .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Nto ' u toe - damo mpai ' , hawe ' ea tauna mpohilo - a , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , mana ' u tumai hi rala limu ' . Uma mowo kabaraka ' - ku pai ' pehini - ku nto ' u toe .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Kuhubui mala ' eka - ku hilou mporumpu tauna to kupobagia ngkai humalili ' dunia ' , ngkai wuntu dunia ' pai ' ngkai wuntu langi ' .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: " Petonoi - koi napa to kutudui ' - kokoi hante lolita rapa ' kaju ara . Ane nihilo rau - na mela ' pai ' mohulu - i , ni ' inca - mi kaneo ' - na mara eo .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Wae wo ' o ane nihilo - damo kajadia ' toe we ' i lou , ni ' inca - mi neo ' madupa ' mpu ' u - mi to ku ' uli ' we ' i .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
