text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : hawe ' ea toe we ' i bate madupa ' kako ' ia - na mate omea tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Langi ' pai ' dunia ' mogero mpai ' , tapi ' lolita - ku bate - bate - na duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: " Aga ane eo pai ' jaa kadupa ' - na hawe ' ea toe , muntu ' Tuama - ku - wadi to mpo ' inca . Uma ria to ntani ' - na to mpo ' inca . Bangku ' mala ' eka to hi suruga - hawoe ' , uma wo ' o - rawo ra ' incai . Bangku ' Aku ' Ana ' - nae ' , uma wo ' o - kuwo ku ' incai .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Toe pai ' kana mo ' inga ' - inga ' pai ' mojaga - koi , apa ' uma ni ' incai tempo kadupa ' - na .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Ane rata nculii ' - apa mpai ' , kajadi ' - na hewa lolita rapa ' tohe ' i . Hadua pue ' tomi mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa . Kako ' ia - na me ' ongko ' , nahubui pahawaa ' - na mpewili ' tomi - na , hore - hore nawai ' - ra bago - ra . Hi tompodoo wobo ' na ' uli ' - ki : ` Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koe ' ! '

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Jadi ' , kana mo ' inga ' mpu ' u - ra , apa ' uma ra ' incai ba nto ' uma karata - na pue ' tomi , ba ncimonou ' - di ba ntongo ' bengi - di ba mepulo ngkii ba nto ' u eo mehupa ' . Nee - neo ' mpai ' rata ncorobaa - imi pai ' narata - ra bula - ra leta ' . Wae wo ' o kana mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi , apa ' uma ni ' incai nto ' uma - a rata .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Napa to ku ' uli ' - kokoi tohe ' i , ku ' uli ' wo ' o hi hawe ' ea tauna : Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - hawoe ' ! "

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Ro ' eo - damo rata - mi Eo Paskah pai ' Posusa ' Roti to uma Raragii . Imam pangkeni pai ' guru agama bula - ra mpali ' akala - ra mpolede Yesus bona rapatehi bongo - i .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Ra ' uli ' : " Aga neo ' ulu tababehi nto ' u eo bohe , nee - neo ' mpai ' bara ' ntodea . "

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Nto ' u Yesus hi ngata Betania , hilou - i hi tomi hadua tauna to rahanga ' Simon topohaki ' poko ' . Bula - na hi ree , rata hadua tobine ngkeni hameha ' butolo ' ihia ' lana honga to masuli ' lia oli - na , to rababehi ngkai rali ' kaju to mohonga . Bula - na Yesus ngkoni ' , tobine toei mpopengka butolo ' toe pai ' natua hi woo ' Yesus bona mpobila ' - i .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Ba hangkuja dua to hi ree , moroe - ra mpohilo napa to nababehi tobine toei . Momepololitai - ramo ra ' uli ' : " Napa - mi - hawo kalaua - na lana honga rakerei mara hewa toe !

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Ke agina lau - pi - hawo rapobalu ' nte oli tolu atu labi doi pera ' , pai ' doi oli - na rawai ' - raka tokabu . " Toe pai ' moroe - ra mpokaroe tobine toei .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Pelele ' moto - i - hana . Napa pai ' nipedahi nono - na ? To nababehi hi Aku ' toe - le , lompe ' .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Apa ' tokabu - hana , ria oa ' - ra dohe - ni . Ane dota - koi ntulungi - ra , ria oa ' loga - ni . Aga Aku ' , uma - a mpai ' ria oa ' dohe - ni .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Tobine toei mpobabehi napa to nakule ' mpobabehi . Natuai - a hante lana honga mporodo ami ' - mi woto - ku hi karatana - ku mpai ' , kako ' ia - na rata tempo - na .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : hi humalili ' dunia ' , hiapa - apa Kareba Lompe ' rapalele , napa to nababehi tobine toei bate ralolita , uma mpai ' ralipo ' - lipo ' . "

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Nto ' u toe , hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua , to rahanga ' Yudas Iskariot , hilou hi imam pangkeni , mpo ' uli ' - raka patuju - na mpobalu ' Yesus hi hira ' .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Goe ' - ramo mpo ' epe patuju - na toe , pai ' rajanci - ki rawai ' - i doi . Ngkai ree , Yudas mpopali ' loga to lompe ' mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - na .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Rata - mi eo to lomo ' - na hi Posusa ' Roti to Uma Raragii , nto ' u bima Paskah rasumale ' . Nto ' u toe , ana ' guru - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Hiapa - kai mporodo pongkoni ' Paskah to takoni ' - e mpai ' ? Hiapa konoa - nu ? "

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Yesus mpohubui rodua ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - mokoi hi rala ngata . Ria mpai ' to mpohirua ' - kokoi hadua tomane to ngkeni pontomua ' - na oti ntomu ' . Tuku ' - imi .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Ane mesua ' - i hi rala tomi , uli ' - ki pue ' tomi : ` Na ' uli ' Guru : Hiapa - kuwo pobabehia - ku Posusa ' Paskah hante ana ' guru - ku ? '

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Pue ' tomi toe mpai ' mpotudo ' - kokoi hameha ' kamar to hi lolo - na to bohe . Kamar toe teporodo ami ' - mi , hono ' - mi rewa - na . Hi retu - mokoi mpai ' mporodo - taka pongkoni ' Paskah - ta . "

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - ramo ana ' guru - na to rodua toera mesua ' rala ngata . Rarata mpu ' u - mi hewa to na ' uli ' - raka , pai ' - ra mporodo - mi pongkoni ' Paskah .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Mobengi - mi , rata - imi Yesus hante ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Bula - na mohura ngkoni ' , na ' uli ' - mi : " Pe ' epei - koi : Ria hadua ngkai koi ' , to ngkoni ' hante Aku ' toe lau , to mpobalu ' - a mpai ' hi bali ' - ku . "

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Mpo ' epe tohe ' e , kapeda ' - nami nono - ra ana ' guru - na , pai ' mepekune ' - ramo hadua bo hadua hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Bela - hawo aku ' to nutoa ' - e Pue ' ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " To mpobalu ' - ale , hadua ngkai koi ' to hampulu ' rodua tohe ' i - e , to mpodulu ' - ka .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Makono mpu ' u , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' bate mate hewa to ralowa hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' - e . Aga mpe ' ahii ' tauna to mpobalu ' - a tetui . Ke lompe ' lau - pi ane uma - i na ' ote tina - na . "

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Bula - ra ngkoni ' , na ' ala ' - mi Yesus roti pai ' naposampayai , mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala . Oti toe , napihe - pihe pai ' natonu - raka , na ' uli ' : " Ala ' - mi , koni ' - mi . Toi - mi woto - ku . "

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Oti toe na ' ala ' wo ' o sangkiri ' to ihia ' anggur , na ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala pai ' natonu - raka . Nginu omea - ramo ngkai sangkiri ' toe .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Toi - mi raa ' - ku to rabowo ane mate - a mpai ' bona mpotolo ' wori ' tauna . Raa ' - ku toi mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai ' Alata ' ala hante manusia ' .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ntepu ' u ngkai wae lau , uma - apa nginu anggur duu ' - na rata tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Nto ' u toe - damo mpai ' , pai ' lako ' ku ' inu anggur to bo ' u hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . "

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Oti toe , morona ' - ramo hanyala rona ' pe ' une ' . Kahudu - ra morona ' , malai - ramo ngkai ngata hilou hi Bulu ' Zaitun .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Hawe ' ea - ni mpai ' , molengo pepangala ' - ni hi Aku ' , apa ' ria te ' uki ' Lolita Alata ' ala to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Kupatehi topo ' ewu toei , alaa - na bima - na pagaa ' - gaa ' - ramo . '

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Aga ane tuwu ' nculii ' - apa mpai ' , meri ' ulu - a hilou hi tana ' Galilea , bona hirua ' hi ria - ta - damo mpai ' . "

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Nau ' hawe ' ea tauna molengo pepangala ' - ra hi Iko Pue ' , aku ' uma ! "

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - koko : Bengi toe mpai ' lau , kako ' ia - na turua ' manu ' karongkani - na , mpolia ' tolu ngkani - moko mposapu kanu ' inca - ku . "

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Aga hangkedi ' kanaperohoi - na Petrus lolita - na , na ' uli ' : " Nau ' - a mate hangkaa - ngkania dohe - nu , uma mpu ' u kusapu kaku ' inca - nu ! " Wae wo ' o - rawo lolita - ra ana ' guru - na to ntani ' - na .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Rata - ramo hi pampa to rahanga ' Getsemani . Hi ree na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Koi ' , mohura hi rei - mokoi mpopea - a , bula - ku hilou mosampaya . "

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Aga Petrus , Yakobus pai ' Yohanes nabawai hilou dohe - na . Nto ' u toe pepa - mi na ' epe pai ' mokaratu - mi nono - na .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Susa ' lia nono - ku , hewa to neo ' mate - ama ku ' epe . Rehe ' i - mokoi ulu mojaga . "

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Oti toe , hilou - imi molaa hangkedi ' , pai ' - i motumpa hi tana ' mosampaya . Rala posampaya - na merapi ' - i bona ane ma ' ala uma - i - hawo mporata kaparia toe .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Tuama - ku ! Uma ria to uma majadi ' ane Iko Mama mpo ' uli ' . Wi ' iha - ka - kuwo kaparia to neo ' mporumpa ' - a toi . Aga bela konoa - ku Aku ' to jadi ' , agina konoa - nu Iko moto . "

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' - imi hi ana ' guru - na to tolu , narata - ra bula - ra leta ' moto . Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Simon ! Ba leta ' - dako - konae ! Hajaa - wadi uma nudadahi mojaga ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Mojaga pai ' mosampaya - mokoi , bona neo ' - koi mporata pesori . Hi rala nono - ni dota moto - koi mpobabehi to makono , aga uma nidadahi apa ' manusia ' bate lente . "

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Ngkai ree , hilou wo ' o - imi mosampaya . Posampaya - na toe hibalia hante posampaya - na to lomo ' - na .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' wo ' o - imi mporata ana ' guru - na , leta ' wo ' o - ra - wadi apa ' mopoke ' rahi mata - ra . Nakehele - ra , aga uma - ra winihi apa ' uma ra ' incai ba napa to ra ' uli ' - ki .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Hilou wo ' o - imi mosampaya katolu ngkani - na , pai ' oti toe , nculii ' wo ' o - imi hi ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' - raka : " Turu pai ' leta ' oa ' - pada - koi ? Naporae ' - mi ! Rata - mi tempo - na Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' rapobalu ' pai ' ratonu hi tauna to dada ' a .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Memata - mokoi ! Hilo , etu - imi tumai to mpobalu ' - a . Kita - mi lou . "

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mololita - pidi , rata mpu ' u - imi Yudas , hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua . Pai ' dohe - na wori ' wo ' o tau ntani ' - na to ngkeni piho ' pai ' sumampu . Hira ' toe rapahawa ' imam pangkeni , guru agama pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Yudas mpo ' uli ' ami ' - miraka tanda bona ra ' inca kato ' uma - nai Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Hema mpai ' to ku ' eki , Hi ' a - mi . Hoko ' - imi , keni - i hilou , jaga lompe ' - i . "

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Jadi ' , karata - ra hi ree , kahilou - nami Yudas mpohirua ' - ki Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Guru ! " pai ' - i na ' eki ntuku ' ada - ra to Yahudi .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Katumai - rami tauna to wori ' mpohoko ' Yesus .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Ngkai ree , hadua tauna to mokore mohu ' Yesus mpowute ' piho ' - na natime - ki batua Imam Bohe , bela mpoholu tilinga - na .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka tauna to mpohoko ' - i : " Ha toperampaki - a toi - e , pai ' mingki ' tumai - koi ntali piho ' pai ' sumampu mpohoko ' - ae !

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Butu eo - na ria moto - a dohe - ni hi Tomi Alata ' ala metudui ' , napa pai ' uma - a nihoko ' nto ' u toe ? Aga tohe ' i kana jadi ' , bona madupa ' - mi to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' . "

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Ngkai ree , metibo ' - ramo hawe ' ea ana ' guru - na mpalahii - i .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Ria wo ' o hadua kabilasa mpotuku ' Yesus nto ' u toe , motapui ' - i - wadi hante abe ' to bula . Ria - ra to doko ' mpohoko ' - i ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: toe pai ' naroncu - mi abe ' - na , pai ' - i metibo ' molawa .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe . Hi ria , morumpu - ramo hawe ' ea imam pangkeni , guru agama pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi to ntani ' - na .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Petrus metuku ' ngkawao - wadi , duu ' - na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe . Hi ria mohura - i moneru dohe topojaga .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Nto ' u toe , imam pangkeni pai ' hawe ' ea topohura agama mpali ' sabi ' to mpakilu Yesus , bona ngalai ' rahuku ' mate - i . Aga uma raruai ' sala ' - na .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Wori ' moto sabi ' to mpopakilu - i , aga uma hibalia lolita - ra .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Ria ba hangkuja dua to mokore pai ' to mosabi ' boa ' , ra ' uli ' :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: " Tauna toii , ki ' epe - i - kaina mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Kugero Tomi Alata ' ala to nawangu manusia ' , pai ' rala - na tolu eo kuwangu to ntani ' - na , to bela manusia ' mpowangu . ' "

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Hiaa ' posabi ' - ra toe , uma wo ' o - wadi hibalia .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Kamokore - nami Imam Bohe hi nyanyoa hawe ' ea topohura , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Ha uma nutompoi ' - ra to mpakilu - ko toe - e ? "

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Aga Yesus , uma - i winihi , uma - i metompoi ' nau ' hamelaa . Hangkani - pi Imam Bohe mpekune ' - i : " Ha Iko mpu ' u - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' , Ana ' Alata ' ala to Moroli ' ? "

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' - mi , pai ' nihilo moto - a mpai ' , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , mohura pai ' moparenta hi mali ka ' ana Alata ' ala to Mobaraka ' , pai ' nihilo wo ' o - a mana ' u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu ' . "

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Mpo ' epe toe we ' i , Imam Bohe mpoheu ' baju - na ngkai kamoroe - na , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Uma - pi mingki ' ria sabi ' !

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Ni ' epe moto - mi - koiwo lolita - na mpokedi ' Alata ' ala . Beiwa - mi - koiwo kabotu ' - ni ? " Hibalia - mi kabotu ' - ra omea , ra ' uli ' : " Bate masala ' - imile , kana rahuku ' mate - i ! "

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Ngkai ree , ria - ra to mpo ' uelikui - i , ria wo ' o to mpopo ' ore ' - i : rakaramuai lio - na , raweba ' - i , pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki : " Ee nabi ! Pe ' uli ' pe ' ba hema to mpoweba ' - koe ! " Topojaga wo ' o - hawo , mehopo ' wo ' o - ramo - rawo .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Nto ' u toe , Petrus hi berewe - pidi . Bula - na hi berewe toe , tumai hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Kampohilo - na Petrus moneru , nanaa - i pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ba iko wo ' o - di hadua doo - na Yesus to Nazaret toei - e mai ? "

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Aga nasapu Petrus , na ' uli ' : " Uma ku ' incai - i , pai ' uma kupaha ba napa to nu ' uli ' ! " Ngkai ree moderu ' - imi hilou mohu ' hi wobo ' wala . Turua ' - mi manu ' .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Pehilo wo ' o - imi tobine toei , na ' uli ' - raka tauna to hi ree : " Hi ' a tetu wo ' o - di doo - na Yesus toei - e mai . "

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Aga nasapu mperii wo ' o - wadi Petrus . Uma mahae ngkai ree , tauna to mokore hi ree mpo ' uli ' wo ' o - miki : " Iko mpu ' u - di doo - nae ! Apa ' to Galilea wo ' o - ko - kowo . "

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Kamosumpa - nami Petrus mpotuna ' woto - na , na ' uli ' : " Uma mpu ' u ku ' incai tauna to ni ' uli ' tetui ! "

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Nto ' u toe , turua ' - mi manu ' karongkani - na . Nakiwoi - mi Petrus lolita - na Yesus ngone to mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Kako ' ia - na turua ' manu ' karongkani - na , mpolia ' tolu ngkani - moko mposapu kanu ' inca - ku . " Kageo ' - nami Petrus kaka ' utu - utu .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Mepupulo ngkii , hawe ' ea topohura agama nte imam pangkeni pai ' guru agama pai ' totu ' a to Yahudi to ntani ' - na , mohawa ' wo ' o - ramo . Rahoo ' - imi Yesus , rakeni hilou rabua ' hi Gubernur Pilatus .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Mepekune ' - i Pilatus : " Ha Iko mpu ' u - mi Magau ' to Yahudi - e ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Wae mpu ' u , hewa to nu ' uli ' tetu . "

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Wori ' nyala pepakilu to raparata imam pangkeni hi Pilatus .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Toe pai ' mepekune ' wo ' o - i - pidi : " Uma - ko dota metompoi ' - e ? Wori ' nyala - mi to raparata kehi - nu . "

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Aga Yesus bate uma - pi winihi , alaa - na napokakonce mpu ' u Pilatus .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Butu eo bohe Paskah , Pilatus biasa - na mpobahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku ' , ba hema to raperapi ' ntodea .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Hi mpae toe , ria hi rala tarungku ' hadua to me ' ewa hi topoparenta , to rahanga ' Barabas . Barabas pai ' doo - na , ria - ramo mpopatehi tauna rala pe ' ewa - ra hi topoparenta .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Jadi ' , morumpu - ramo ntodea , raperapi ' hi Pilatus bona nabahaka hadua to ratarungku ' hewa to biasa nababehi butu mpae - na .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Napekune ' - ra : " Beiwa , dota - koi ane kubahaka - kokoi Magau ' to Yahudi toii ? "

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Pilatus mpo ' uli ' hewa toe , apa ' na ' inca ka ' uma - na - hawo masala ' - i Yesus ; imam pangkeni mpotonu Yesus hi hi ' a ngkai kamohingi ' - ra - wadi .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Aga imam pangkeni mpo ' ukei ' ntodea , ra ' uli ' - raka : " Perapi ' - koi bona nabahaka - taka Barabas ! " Merapi ' Barabas mpu ' u - ramo .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Pilatus mpo ' uli ' - raka ntodea : " Ane rapa ' - na Barabas to kubahaka - kokoi , kupopai - imi tauna to ni ' uli ' magau ' - ni to Yahudi - e ? "

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Pejeu ' - rami ntodea , ra ' uli ' : " Parika ' - i ! "

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Napekune ' Pilatus : " Hiaa ' napa sala ' - na ? " Rapesukui lau - mi mejeu ' : " Parika ' - imi ! "

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Pilatus doko ' ngala ' nono ntodea , toe pai ' nabahaka - miraka Barabas . Oti toe , nahubui - mi tantara - na mpoweba ' Yesus pai ' natonu - miraka bona raparika ' .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Oti toe , tantara mpokeni Yesus hilou hi po ' ohaa ' - ra to hi rala tomi Gubernur , pai ' - ra mpokio ' hawe ' ea doo - ra tumai .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Ra ' uncoi ' - imi hante baju to mperelei to hewa baju magau ' . Rababehi hameha ' songko ngkai walaa to morui to hewa songko magau ' , pai ' rasongkoi - ki .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Oti toe , pai ' - i rapopo ' ore ' , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Wori ' tabe , Magau ' to Yahudi ! "

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Woo ' - na rapao ' hante lua ' , ra ' uelikui - i , pai ' motingkua ' - ra ntani ' hewa to mpobila ' - i .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Ka ' oti - na rapopo ' ore ' hewa toe , raroncu - mi baju to mperelei - e we ' i , pai ' ra ' uncoi ' nculii ' - imi pohea - na ami ' . Oti toe , rakeni - imi hilou hi mali ngata bona raparika ' .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Hi lengko ohea , hirua ' - ra hante hadua tauna to lako ' rata hi ngata , pai ' rapewuku - ki hi ' a - mi mpopaha ' a kaju parika ' - na Yesus . Hanga ' - na Simon to Kirene , tuama - ra hira ' Aleksander pai ' Rufus .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ko ' ia mahae , rata - ramo hi po ' ohaa ' to rahanga ' Golgota , batua - na Bulu ' Banga ' woo ' .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Hi ree , Yesus rapopo ' inui anggur to ragalo pokuli ' to rahanga ' mur , aga uma - i dota mpo ' inu .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Oti toe , tantara mpoparika ' - i , pai ' - ra mpobagi - bagi pohea - na hante mpotene ' undi hewa pompenoa ' - ra , ba hema - ra to mporata .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Nto ' u karaparika ' - na toe , jaa sio mepulo .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Hi kaju parika ' - na hi ntoto woo ' - na , ria ukia ' to mpo ' uli ' napa to rapakilu - ki , hewa toi moni - na : MAGAU ' TO YAHUDI .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Ria wo ' o rodua toperampaki raparika ' dohe - na , hadua mali ka ' ana - na hadua mali ki ' ii - na . ( (

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Jadi ' , napa to rababehi toe , madupa ' - mi lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Magau ' Topetolo ' rapohewa tauna to dada ' a . " ) )

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Tauna to liu hi ree , ngkololi - ra mpopo ' ore ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Hahi  Nu ' uli ' - kona mpogero - ko Tomi Alata ' ala pai ' nuwangu nculii ' rala - na tolu eo !

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: Ane wae - di , tulungi moto - mi woto - nu ! Mana ' u - moko ngkai kaju parika ' tetu ! "

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Wae wo ' o imam pangkeni hante guru agama ntora mpopo ' ore ' - i . Momepololitai - ramo ra ' uli ' : " Tau ntani ' - na natulungi - ramo . Woto - na moto - pi uma nakulei ' ntulungi .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Hiaa ' bo ra ' uli ' Hi ' a Magau ' Topetolo ' , Magau ' to Israel ! Ane tahilo mpu ' u - i mana ' u ngkai kaju parika ' - na toe mai , lako ' tapangala ' - idi . " Ntahawe ' tauna to raparika ' dohe - na , meruge ' wo ' o - ra - rawo .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Tebua ' - mi eo , muu - mule ' mobengi hobo ' hi ngata toe rala - na tolu jaa .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Jaa tolu ncimonou ' , mekio ' - imi Yesus napasimuku mpo ' uli ' : " Alata ' ala - ku , Alata ' ala - ku ! Napa pai ' nupalahii - a ? " Hi rala basa Yahudi hewa toi moni - na : " Eloi , Eloi , lama sabakhtani ? "

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Ba hangkuja dua to mokore mohu ' hi kaju parika ' - na mpo ' epe pe ' au - na toe , ra ' uli ' : " Epe - dile ! Mpokio ' nabi Elia - i . "

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Hadua mokeno hilou mpo ' ala ' hampu ' u wunga to hewa lomo ' , nabangkahi hi rala ue anggur to mo ' onco , natu ' u hi wuntu hompea pai ' napopoju ' ui - ki Yesus bona na ' inu . Na ' uli ' : " Popea , tahilo ba tumai mpu ' u - i Elia mpopana ' u - i ngkai kaju parika ' ! "

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Ngkai ree , kame ' au - nami Yesus napesukui , pai ' modupe ' - mi inoha ' - na .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Nto ' u toe , kain porini - olo ' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala mobika ' ntongo ' ngkai lolo - na rata hi une ' - na .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Tadulako tantara to mokore mponyanyohi kaju parika ' toe mpohilo beiwa kamate - na Yesus . Na ' uli ' : " Ana ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - i - tawo ' ! "

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Ria wo ' o hi ree ba hangkuja dua tobine to menaa ngkawao . Hanga ' - na to hadua , Maria Magdalena . To hadua wo ' o , Maria tina - ra Yakobus to tu ' ai pai ' Yoses . Pai ' hadua wo ' o , Salome .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Tobine toe - ramo to mpotuku ' pai ' mpotulungi Yesus bula - na hi tana ' Galilea . Pai ' wori ' wo ' o - pidi tobine to ntani ' - na to mpotuku ' Yesus tumai ngkai Galilea rata hi Yerusalem .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Eo karaparika ' - na Yesus toe , eo pomporodoa , batua - na , eo kako ' ia - na eo pepuea ' , pai ' ntuku ' ada to Yahudi ntepu ' u ncimonou ' toe , rapalii ' - mi mobago . Jadi ' , neo ' limpa - mi eo ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: tumai - mi hadua tauna to rahanga ' Yusuf to Arimatea . Yusuf toei , hadua topohura agama Yahudi to rabila ' , mahae moto - imi - hana mpopea tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Yusuf mpedahoi ' hilou hi Pilatus mperapi ' woto - na Yesus .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Konce - i Pilatus mpo ' epe kasohi ' - na mate Yesus . Toe pai ' nakio ' - mi tadulako tantara napompekunei ' ba mahae - imi Yesus mate .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Pilatus lolita tadulako tohe ' e , napiliu - imi Yusuf mpo ' ala ' woto Yesus .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Yusuf mpo ' oli kain to bula bona nahompui ' - ki . Napopana ' u - mi woto - na ngkai kaju parika ' pai ' naputu ' hante kain toe . Oti toe natu ' u hi rala daeo ' to ralonga ' hi panapa bulu ' watu , pai ' naluli ' hameha ' watu na ' unca - ki wobo ' daeo ' toe .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Maria Magdalena pai ' Maria tina - na Yoses mpetonoi kahiapa - na woto - na Yesus ratu ' u .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Katimpaliu - na eo pepuea ' , Maria Magdalena , Maria tina - na Yakobus , pai ' Salome , hilou - ra mpo ' oli anu mohonga . Patuju - ra , doko ' hilou mpolanai woto - na Yesus hante to mohonga toe .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Jadi ' , mepupulo ngkii eo Mingku , lako ' moweka ' , hilou - ramo hi daeo ' .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Hi lengko ohea momepololitai - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Hema - mi - tawo to mpotulungi - ta mpoderu ' watu po ' unca wobo ' daeo ' ? " Apa ' watu toe ria bohe lia . Ntaa ' we ' i , karata - ra hi daeo ' , rahilo - rawo tederu ' - mi watu .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Pesua ' - rami hi rala daeo ' , mpohilo - ra hadua kabilasa mohura tono ' mali ka ' ana - na , moheai hante pohea to bula . Konce tobine toera mpohilo - i .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Na ' uli ' kabilasa toei : " Neo ' - koi konce ! Mpali ' Yesus to Nazaret - koi , to mate raparika ' . Tuwu ' nculii ' - imi ! Uma - ipi ria hi rehe ' i . Hilo karatu ' ua - na wengi .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Wae - e lau , hilou - mokoi , uli ' - raka Petrus pai ' ana ' guru - na to ntani ' - na katuwu ' - na nculii ' - mi . Uli ' - raka hewa toi : Hilou meri ' ulu - i hi tana ' Galilea . Hi ria - damo mpai ' , pai ' - i nihilo , hewa to oti na ' uli ' - kokoi wengi . "

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Pehupa ' - ra tobine toera ngkai rala daeo ' , pokeno - rami metibo ' , apa ' wulunga pai ' moridi ' - ramo . Uma - ra ulu mpololitai hema - hema , apa ' ngkai kame ' eka ' - ra .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Pemata - na Yesus ngkai kamatea mepupulo ngkii hi eo Mingku , lomo ' - na mpopehuwu - i woto - na hi Maria Magdalena . Maria tohe ' ei , ria - i Yesus mpopalai pitu seta to mpohawi ' - i .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Hilou - imi Maria hi topetuku ' - na Yesus , narata - ra bula - ra geo ' pai ' peda ' nono - ra . Na ' uli ' - raka : " Tuwu ' nculii ' - imi - hana Pue ' , kuhilo - imi we ' i ! " Aga uma raparasaya hawe ' ea to najarita Maria toe .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpopehuwu wo ' o - mi woto - na hi rodua topetuku ' - na bula - ra mako ' hilou hi mali ngata . Nto ' u toe , lence - na mobali ' , alaa - na uma ra ' incai Kayesus - na .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Ponculi ' - rami to rodua toera mpo ' uli ' - raka doo - ra kampohilo - ra Yesus . Aga uma wo ' o raparasaya .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Ngkai ree , mehupa ' wo ' o - imi hi ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' hadua bula - ra ngkoni ' . Nakamaro - ra apa ' kura ' pepangala ' - ra pai ' motu ' a nono - ra . Nau ' ria - mi tauna to mpohilo - i , uma oa ' - ra dota mparasaya katuwu ' - na nculii ' mpu ' u - imi .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - mokoi hi humalili ' dunia ' , mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' hi hawe ' ea tauna .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Hema to mepangala ' pai ' raniu ' , tehore - ra ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra . Aga hema to uma mepangala ' bate rahuku ' .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Pai ' hema to mepangala ' , kuwai ' - ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda - tanda to hewa toi : Hante hanga ' - ku mpopalai - ra seta . Mololita - ra hante basa to uma ra ' incai ngkai baraka ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Ria - ra to ngkamu ule , ba paia - na nginu rasu , aga uma moto - ra moapa . Mpojama - ra tauna to peda ' , bona mo ' uri ' - ra topeda ' . "

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Pue ' Yesus mpololitai - ra , te ' ongko ' - imi hilou hi suruga , pai ' - i mohura hi mali ka ' ana Alata ' ala .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Ngkai ree , topetuku ' - na hilou mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' hiapa - apa . Pue ' mobago hangkaa - ngkania dohe - ra , pai ' nawai ' - ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona mporohoi kamakono - na Kareba to rakeni .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Teofilus to rabila ' : Wori ' - mi tauna mperao mpo ' uki ' dala ngkatuwu ' - na Yesus , hewa to jadi ' ba hangkuja mpae to liu hi laintongo ' - ta .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: To ra ' uki ' tohe ' e , hibalia hante tutura to raparata - taka tauna to mpohilo mata moto - mi hawe ' ea to jadi ' toe ngkai lomo ' - na pai ' to jadi ' pangkeni Lolita Pue ' .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Jadi ' , ka ' oti - ku mpewulihi ' hawe ' ea - na ngkai tawu - na hante kanoto - noto - na , ku ' uli ' agina aku ' wo ' o - kuwo mpo ' uki ' tutura - na ntuku ' pomeduncu - na .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Patuju - ku , bona nu ' inca kamakono - na mpu ' u napa to oti - mi ratudui ' - koko .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Nto ' u Magau ' Herodes moparenta hi tana ' Yudea , ria hadua imam to rahanga ' Zakharia . Zakharia toei , ngkai posantina imam muli Abia . Hanga ' tobine - na , Elisabet , muli imam wo ' o - i - hawo .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Tau hancamoko toera , monoa ' ingku - ra hi poncilo Alata ' ala , apa ' ratuku ' hawe ' ea parenta pai ' atura Pue ' hante uma ria kasalaia ' - na .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Aga uma - ra mo ' anai ' , apa ' Elisabet lalo , pai ' tu ' a - ramo roduaa - ra .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Hangkani , megoli - mi tempo - na imam - imam muli Abia to mpokamu bago Alata ' ala , pai ' Zakharia mpobago bago imam hi Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Ntuku ' ada - ra , mpenoa ' - ra ba hema - ra to rapelihi mesua ' hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala mpotunu dupa ' . Zakharia - mi to mpela pompenoa ' - ra .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Jadi ' , bula ntodea mosampaya hi mali - na , Zakharia mesua ' hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala mpotunu dupa ' .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Nto ' u toe , mehupa ' - mi hadua mala ' eka Pue ' hi mali ngka ' ana meja ' pontunua dupa ' .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Kanahilo - na Zakharia mala ' eka toei , konce pai ' me ' eka ' lia - imi .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Na ' uli ' mala ' eka toei : " Zakharia , neo ' - ko me ' eka ' , apa ' Pue ' Ala mpo ' epe pomperapia ' - nu . Elisabet tobine - nu mo ' ana ' mpai ' , hadua ana ' tomane . Ana ' tetui kana nuhanga ' Yohanes .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Uma mpai ' mowo kagoe ' - nu mpokagoe ' ana ' - nu tetui . Wori ' tauna mpokagoe ' kaputu - na .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Hi ' a jadi ' tau bohe hi poncilo Pue ' . Uma - i ma ' ala nginu anggur ba napa - napa to melanguhi , pai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpokuasai - i ngkai lomo ' kaputu - na .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Wori ' muli Israel natete ' nculii ' bona mepangala ' - ra hi Alata ' ala to rapue ' ntu ' a - ra owi .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Ana ' - nu tetui mpai ' jadi ' suro to mako ' meri ' ulu ngkai Pue ' hante kuasa pai ' kabaraka ' - na nabi Elia owi . Napopohintuwu ' ana ' - ana ' hante tuama - ra . Pai ' tauna to uma mpotuku ' Pue ' natete ' nculii ' hi ohea to monoa ' bona monoto nono - ra . Hawe ' ea toe nababehi bona mporodo nono ntodea , bona sadia - ramo mpotarima Pue ' . "

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Na ' uli ' Zakharia mpo ' uli ' - ki mala ' eka : " Hiaa ' , beiwa kaku ' inca - na kamakono - na to nu ' uli ' tetu - e ? Apa ' tu ' a - amadie , pai ' tobine - ku tu ' a wo ' o - imi - hawo . "

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Natompoi ' mala ' eka toei : " Aku ' toi Gabriel , pahawaa ' Alata ' ala to ngkai suruga . Alata ' ala mposuro - a tumai mpoparata - koko kareba toe .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Napa to ku ' uli ' - koko toe we ' i , bate madupa ' ane rata - pi mpai ' tempo - na . Aga iko - kona , apa ' uma nuparasaya lolita - kue , wae - pi ngkai wae lau , uma - poko howa ' mololita duu ' - na madupa ' mpu ' u lolita - ku . "

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Bula - na Zakharia hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , kapea - pea - ramo ntodea hi mali - na . Ingu ' - ra apa ' mahae rahi - i .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Pehupa ' - na hi mali - na , uma - ipi howa ' mpololitai - ra . Muntu ' mohuka ' - i - damo pai ' bate uma - i howa ' mololita . Toe pai ' ra ' inca - mi ntodea karia - na to nahilo hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Hudu - mi pobago - na Zakharia hi Tomi Alata ' ala , nculii ' - imi hilou hi tomi - na .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Ko ' ia mahae ngkai ree , motina ' i mpu ' u - imi Elisabet . Lima mula kahae - na Elisabet uma mehupa ' - hupa ' ngkai rala tomi - na , pai ' na ' uli ' :

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: " Tohe ' i - e ahi ' - na Pue ' hi aku ' . Natulungi - a mo ' anai ' , bona uma - apa me ' ea ' sabana kalalo - ku . "

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Kahono ' - na ono mula Elisabet motina ' i , Alata ' ala mpohubui mala ' eka Gabriel hilou hi tana ' Galilea , hi ngata to rahanga ' Nazaret ,

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: bona mpohirua ' - ki hadua toronaa to rahanga ' Maria . Toronaa toei , bula - na mokamae ' hante hadua kabilasa to rahanga ' Yusuf , muli Magau ' Daud owi .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Karata - na mala ' eka hi ria , na ' uli ' - ki Maria : " Wori ' tabe ! Pue ' mpogane ' - ko pai ' mpodohei - ko ! "

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Konce - i Maria mpo ' epe lolita mala ' eka toei , pai ' - i mopekiri ba napa batua petabe - na toe .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi mala ' eka : " Neo ' - ko me ' eka ' Maria , apa ' iko - mi to napokono Alata ' ala bona mporata pegane ' - na .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Motina ' i - ko mpai ' , pai ' - ko mo ' ana ' , hadua ana ' tomane . Ana ' tetu mpai ' kana nuhanga ' Yesus .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Hi ' a mpai ' jadi ' tauna to bohe tuwu ' - na , pai ' - i rahanga ' Ana ' Alata ' ala to hi suruga . Pai ' Pue ' Alata ' ala mpo ' ongko ' - i jadi ' Magau ' , hewa Magau ' Daud , ntu ' a - na owi .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Hi ' a jadi ' magau ' to mpoparentai hawe ' ea muli Yakub duu ' kahae - hae - na , pai ' poparenta - na uma ria kahudua - na . "

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Maria mpo ' uli ' - ki mala ' eka : " Beiwa - hawo kajadi ' - na to nu ' uli ' tetu - e ? Apa ' ko ' ia - a - kuwo motomanei . "

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Na ' uli ' mala ' eka : " Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpai ' mana ' u hi iko , pai ' kabaraka ' Alata ' ala to hi suruga ngkamoui - ko . Toe pai ' ana ' to putu toe mpai ' rahanga ' moroli ' , Ana ' Alata ' ala .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Epe - dile : ompi ' - nu Elisabet - ele , to tu ' a lia - imi pai ' to ra ' uli ' doo lalo - ie , motina ' i ono mula - imi - hawo ! Mo ' ana ' - i mpai ' , hadua ana ' tomane .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Apa ' napa - napa to na ' uli ' Alata ' ala bate kana madupa ' . "

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Na ' uli ' Maria : " Aku ' toi batua - na Pue ' , mengkoru - ama hi hawa ' - na , bona napadupa ' patuju - na hi aku ' , hewa to nu ' uli ' - ka tetu . " Oti toe , malai - imi mala ' eka mpalahii Maria .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Ngkai ree , pe ' ongko ' - nami Maria hilou hi ngata to hi bulu ' - na hi tana ' Yudea .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Karata - na hi tomi Zakharia , pesua ' - nami pai ' - i mpotabe Elisabet .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Kana ' epe - na Elisabet petabe - na Maria toe , pongkale - nami ana ' to hi rala puanaka - na , pai ' Elisabet , nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' - imi .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Mekio ' - imi napesukui mpo ' uli ' - ki Maria : " Iko - mi - kona to nagane ' Alata ' ala meliu ngkai hawe ' ea tobine ntani ' - na , pai ' Alata ' ala mpogane ' ana ' to nupotina ' i - ki tetu .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Ha hema - a - kuwo aku ' toi - e , pai ' iko tina - na Pue ' - ku tumai mpokinomo - a !

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Wae kaku ' epe - na petabe - nu , ana ' to hi rala - ku ncaliu mongkale nakeni kagoe ' - na .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Morasi ' mpu ' u - ko , apa ' nupangala ' lolita Pue ' , apa ' napa to na ' uli ' - koko bate madupa ' . "

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Na ' uli ' Maria : Mpo ' une ' - a Pue ' hante nono - ku mpu ' u .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Goe ' lia - a , apa ' Alata ' ala Magau ' Tompohore - a ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ku .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Nakiwoi - awa - kuwo , aku ' batua - na to mpe ' ahii ' . Ngkai wae lau , hawe ' ea tauna mpo ' uli ' ka ' aku ' - na tobine to nagane ' Alata ' ala .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Apa ' Alata ' ala to mokuasa mpopehuwu kabaraka ' - na hi aku ' . Moroli ' hanga ' - na !

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Ma ' ahi ' - i hi hawe ' ea tauna to mengkoru hi Hi ' a , duu ' rata hi muli - muli - ra .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Nababehi anu mobaraka ' hante kuasa - na : Tauna to molangko nono - ra nagaro ' bona uma oko patuju - ra .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Magau ' - magau ' napohu ngkai pangka ' - ra . Tauna to dingki ' tuwu ' - ra napomolangko .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Tauna to mo ' oro ' nabohui hante pongkoni ' to lompe ' . Tauna topo ' ua ' napopalai hante ngkeni woto mara .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Napopohiloi ahi ' - na hi kita ' muli Israel , batua - na owi . Natulungi - ta hewa to najanci hi ntu ' a - ta owi . Uma nalipo ' pojanci - na hi Abraham pai ' hi muli - na duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Ba tolu mula kahae - na Maria mo ' oha ' hante Elisabet , pai ' lako ' nculii ' - idi hilou hi tomi - na .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Rata - mi tempo - na Elisabet mo ' ana ' . Mo ' ana ' mpu ' u - imi , hadua ana ' tomane .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Tongki - ra pai ' ompi ' - ra mpo ' epe beiwa Pue ' mpopohiloi ahi ' - na hi Elisabet hi kanawai ' - na ana ' - na toe , toe pai ' goe ' wo ' o - ramo - rawo hangkaa - ngkania hante Elisabet .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Ntuku ' ada - ra to Yahudi , kahono ' - na walu eo umuru - na ana ' toei , tumai - ramo tongki pai ' ompi ' - ra mpotini ' - i ntuku ' ada - ra to Yahudi . Patuju - ra doko ' mpohanga ' - i Zakharia , mpongkona ' - ki tuama - na moto , ntuku ' ada - ra .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Tapi ' na ' uli ' Elisabet mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' waetu ! Bate Yohanes hanga ' - na . "

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Hampetompoi ' - ra : " Hiaa ' bo uma - hanale ria ompi ' - ni to rahanga ' tetu - e ! "

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Ngkai ree , rahuka ' - ki Zakharia rapompekunei ' ba napa to doko ' nahanga ' - ki ana ' - na .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Zakharia mperapi ' hameha ' po ' ukia ' pai ' na ' uki ' : " Hanga ' - na Yohanes . " Konce omea - ramo .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Nto ' u toe , muu - mule ' howa ' nculii ' - imi mololita , pai ' - i mpo ' une ' - une ' Alata ' ala .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Me ' eka ' omea - ramo tongki - ra , pai ' kareba toe molele hobo ' hi bulu ' - na Yudea .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Hawe ' ea to mpo ' epe kareba toe mokanono , ra ' uli ' : " Ha jadi ' napa - i mpai ' ana ' toei ? " Apa ' Pue ' mpodohei - i hante baraka ' - na .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Ane Zakharia , tuama ana ' toei , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpokuasai - i , pai ' - i mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala , na ' uli ' :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: " Mai - tamo kita ' muli Israel , mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala Pue ' - ta ! Apa ' hompo - imi tumai mpotulungi - ta kita ' ntodea - na . Tumai - i mpobahaka - ta ngkai bali ' - ta .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Nawai ' - tamo Tadulako to mobaraka ' to mpokeni kalompea ' . Tadulako toei , muli Magau ' Daud , batua - na owi .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Ngkai owi hante wiwi nabi - nabi to moroli ' , Pue ' mpojanci

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: kanabahaka - ta mpai ' ngkai bali ' - ta , nabahaka - ta ngkai kuasa - ra to mpokahuku ' - ta .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Napopohiloi mpu ' u - mi ahi ' - na hi ntu ' a - ta owi . Napadupa ' - mi janci - na to moroli ' .

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: Mojanci pai ' mosumpa - i hi Abraham ntu ' a - ta owi , kanabahaka - ta ngkai kuasa bali ' - ta , bona ma ' ala - ta mpopue ' - i hante uma ria ka ' ekaa ' - ta ,

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: bona kita ' jadi ' topetuku ' - na to moroli ' pai ' to monoa ' hi poncilo - na , duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Hiaa ' ane iko , ana ' - ku , iko mpai ' rahanga ' nabi Pue ' Ala to hi suruga . Apa ' iko - mi mpai ' to mako ' meri ' ulu ngkai Pue ' , bona mporodo ohea - na .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Iko mpai ' to mpopo ' incai ntodea - na ohea bona Alata ' ala mpowai ' - ra kalompea ' pai ' mpo ' ampungi jeko ' - ra .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Apa ' ma ' ahi ' lia Alata ' ala Pue ' - ta . Toe pai ' hompo - imi tumai mpotulungi - ta . Tumai - i ngkai suruga hewa eo mebere ' .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Tumai - i mpobajahi nono tauna to hi rala kabengia - na pai ' to me ' eka ' mpoka ' eka ' kamatea . Natete ' - ta hi ohea to mpotoa ' kalompea ' tuwu ' . "

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Ana ' Zakharia toei , kaboo - bohea kamonoo - notoa nono - na . Mo ' oha ' - i hi papada to wao ' , duu ' - na rata tempo - na natepu ' u - mi mpokeni Lolita Pue ' hi muli Israel .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Nto ' u toe , rata hawa ' ngkai Kaisar Agustus , mpohawai ' bona hawe ' ea tauna hi humalili ' kamagaua ' Roma ra ' uki ' hanga ' - ra bona ra ' inca kadea - ra .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Pobilaa ' tauna to lomo ' - na tohe ' i rababehi nto ' u - na Kirenius jadi ' gubernur hi tana ' Siria .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna hilou mpope ' uki ' hanga ' - ra , hore - hore hi ngata totu ' a - ra .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Wae wo ' o Yusuf me ' ongko ' ngkai ngata Nazaret , mpo ' ema ' Maria kamae ' - na to bula - na motina ' i - mi . Me ' ongko ' - ramo ngkai tana ' Galilea , manake ' hilou hi tana ' Yudea , mpotoa ' ngata Betlehem , ngata kaputua Magau ' Daud owi . Yusuf kana mpope ' uki ' hanga ' - na hi ria , apa ' hi ' a muli Magau ' Daud .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Nto ' u - ra hi Betlehem toe , rata - mi tempo - na Maria mo ' ana ' .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Mo ' ana ' mpu ' u - imi , hadua ana ' tomane , ana ' ulumua ' - na . Ana ' - na toei naputu ' pai ' napopoturu hi rala paiwa ' , apa ' ihia ' - mi tomi torata .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Hi mali ngata Betlehem , ria ba hangkuja dua topo ' ewu . Bula - ra mpodoo bima - ra hi papada ngkabengia toe ,

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: muu - mule ' mehupa ' - mi hadua mala ' eka Pue ' mpohirua ' - raka , pai ' kabaraka ' Pue ' mehini mpohinii - ra , alaa - na me ' eka ' lia - ramo .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Na ' uli ' mala ' eka toei mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' - koi me ' eka ' , apa ' katumai - ku toi mpokeni kareba lompe ' hi koi ' , kareba to mpakagoe ' lia hawe ' ea tauna .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Eo toe lau hi ngata Magau ' Daud , putu - mi Magau ' Tompohore - koi ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ni , Hi ' a - mi Kristus , Pue ' .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Toi - mi pompetonoi - na bona ni ' inca kamakono - na lolita - ku : mporua ' - koi mpai ' hadua ana ' lei raputu ' pai ' rapopoturu hi rala paiwa ' . "

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Hampinisi mata mehupa ' wo ' o - mi wori ' mala ' eka to ngkai suruga dohe mala ' eka to lomo ' - na we ' i . Mpo ' une ' - ra Alata ' ala , ra ' uli ' :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: " Mai - tamo mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala to hi suruga ! Pai ' hi dunia ' , tauna to napokono mporata kalompea ' tuwu ' . "

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Ngkai ree , nculii ' - ramo mala ' eka hilou hi suruga , pai ' mohawa ' - ramo topo ' ewu toera , ra ' uli ' : " Kita - mi hilou hi Betlehem mpohilo kajadia ' to na ' uli ' - taka Pue ' . "

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Kahilou - rami , pai ' rarua ' mpu ' u - mi Maria pai ' Yusuf , hante ana ' lei - ra to turu hi rala paiwa ' .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Karahilo - na ana ' toei , ralolita - mi napa to na ' uli ' - raka mala ' eka mpotompo ' wiwi - i .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Konce omea tauna to mpo ' epe lolita topo ' ewu toera .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Aga Maria mpotimamahi hawe ' ea to jadi ' toe hi rala nono - na , pai ' ntora napenonoi .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Nculii ' - ramo topo ' ewu toera , pai ' halengko ohea mpo ' une ' pai ' mpobila ' Alata ' ala - ramo , apa ' hawe ' ea to ra ' epe pai ' to rahilo , bate hewa to na ' uli ' - raka mala ' eka .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Ntuku ' ada - ra to Yahudi , kahono ' - na walu eo umuru - na , Ana ' toei ratini ' pai ' rahanga ' - i Yesus , hanga ' to nahanga ' - ki mala ' eka kako ' ia - na napotina ' i - ki tina - na .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Oti toe , rata - mi tempo - na Yusuf pai ' Maria kana mpobabehi ada ka ' oti - na mo ' ana ' , ntuku ' Atura Pue ' to na ' uki ' Musa . Nto ' u toe , ana ' lei - ra toe rakeni hilou hi Yerusalem bona ratonu hi Pue ' ,

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Atura Pue ' : " Butu dua ana ' tomane to ulumua ' kana ratonu hi Pue ' bona jadi ' bagia - na . "

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Rakeni wo ' o pepue ' - ra , ntuku ' hawa ' to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Atura Pue ' : hamoko korokou ba roma ' a ana ' mangkebodo .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Hi Yerusalem nto ' u toe , ria hadua tauna to rahanga ' Simeon . Simeon toei , tau monoa ' to mengkoru hi Alata ' ala . Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpodohei - i , pai ' - i ncarumaka kaneo ' - na rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala mpotulungi muli Israel .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Hangkani , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki hewa toi : " Ko ' ia - ko mate ane ko ' ia nuhiloi Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Pue ' Ala . "

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Jadi ' , nto ' u - na Yusuf pai ' Maria mpokeni Yesus ana ' lei - ra hi Tomi Alata ' ala bona ratonu hi Alata ' ala ntuku ' Atura Musa , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpopakeni Simeon mesua ' hi Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Kana ' ala ' - nami ana ' lei toei , napanawi pai ' - i mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala , na ' uli ' :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: " O Pue ' , nau ' mate - ama , uma - pi beiwa . Oha - mi nono - ku , apa ' madupa ' - mi janci - nu .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Hante mata - ku moto - mi mpohilo Topetolo ' to ngkai Iko Pue ' ,

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: to nuporodo hi hawe ' ea manusia ' .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Topetolo ' toei , hewa baja to mponotohi nono tauna to bela - ra muli Israel . Pai ' - i mpokeni karabilaa ' hi kai ' muli Israel to nupobagia . "

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Tina pai ' tuama ana ' toei konce mpo ' epe lolita Simeon mpotompo ' wiwi ana ' - ra .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Simeon mpogane ' - ra , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki Maria : " Ngkai Ana ' - nu toii , wori ' mpai ' muli Israel monawu ' mporata silaka , aga wori ' wo ' o to tehore bona mporata kalompea ' . Hi ' a - mi to napelihi pai ' nasuro tumai Pue ' Ala , aga wori ' tauna mposapuaka - i mpai ' ,

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: alaa - na telohu - mi ihi ' nono - ra . Hiaa ' iko Maria , narumpa ' - ko - hana mpai ' kasusaa ' nono , hewa to rajalo piho ' . "

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: Nto ' u karata - ra Yusuf pai ' Maria hi Tomi Alata ' ala toe , ria wo ' o - hawo hi ree hadua nabi tobine to tu ' a lia - mi . Hanga ' - na Hana , ana ' Fanuel , ngkai posantina - na Asyer . Nto ' u toe , umuru - na walu mpulu ' opo ' mpae . Pitu mpae - i - wadi motomanei . Ngkai ree , balu - imi pai ' uma - ipi motomanei . Tida oa ' - i hi Tomi Alata ' ala , hi eo - na hi bengi - na ntora mosampaya pai ' mopuasa ' - i mepue ' hi Pue ' Ala .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Jadi ' , nto ' u Yusuf pai ' Maria hi Tomi Alata ' ala toe , rata wo ' o - imi - hawo Hana , mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala , pai ' ntora mpotompo ' wiwi Ana ' toei hi hawe ' ea tauna to mpopea tempo - na Alata ' ala mpobahaka to Yerusalem ngkai bali ' - ra .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Ka ' oti - ra Yusuf pai ' Maria mpobabehi hawe ' ea to ratuntu ' hi rala Buku Atura Pue ' , nculii ' - ramo hilou hi ngata Nazaret hi tana ' Galilea .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Ana ' - ra toei , kaboo - bohea pai ' karoo - rohoa . Monoto lia nono - na , pai ' Alata ' ala mpogane ' - i .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Butu mpae - na , tina pai ' tuama - na Yesus hilou hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga ' Eo Paskah .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Hono ' - mi hampulu ' rompae umuru - na Yesus , hilou wo ' o - ramo ngkaralai eo bohe toe hewa kabiasaa - ra .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Katimpaliu - na eo bohe toe , nculii ' - ramo hilou mpotoa ' ngata - ra . Aga Yesus - hana , uma - i mpotuku ' - ra . Hi ria - i - pidi hi Yerusalem , aga uma ra ' incai totu ' a - na .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Ra ' uli ' - rawo , metuku ' moto - i dohe doo hampomakoa ' - ra . Ha ' eo - ramo momako ' , lako ' rapali ' - idi hi doo - ra pai ' ompi ' - ra .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Aga uma - i raruai ' . Toe pai ' nculii ' - ra hi Yerusalem mpopali ' - i .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Tolu eo - ramo mepali ' , lako ' rarua ' - idi hi Tomi Alata ' ala . Mohura - i hi laintongo ' guru agama , mpe ' epei pai ' mepekune ' .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna to mpo ' epe - i mpo ' uli ' : " Uma mowo kapante - nae ' ! Uma mowo kamonoto tompoi ' - na ! "

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Konce tina pai ' tuama - na mpohilo - i . Na ' uli ' tina - na : " Uto ' , napa - di - kona pai ' nupohewa toe - kaie ! Kai ' tuama - nu , sese ' - kai mpopali ' - ko ! "

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Ha napa pai ' nipali ' - a ? Ha uma ni ' incai kana hi rala tomi Tuama - kua ? "

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Tapi ' uma rapaha batua lolita - na .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Oti toe , hidohea - ramo nculii ' hilou hi Nazaret , pai ' bate mengkoru - i hi hawa ' tina pai ' tuama - na . Tina - na mpotimamahi hawe ' ea to jadi ' toe hi rala nono - na .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Yesus kaboo - bohea pai ' kamonoo - notoa nono - na . Alata ' ala mpokono - i , wae wo ' o manusia ' .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Hi kahampulu ' lima mpae - na poparenta Kaisar Tiberius hi ngata Roma , Pontius Pilatus jadi ' gubernur hi tana ' Yudea pai ' Herodes Antipas to moparenta hi Galilea . Filipus ompi ' - na Herodes moparenta hi Iturea pai ' hi Trakhonitis , pai ' Lisanias moparenta hi Abilene .

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: To jadi ' Imam Bohe nto ' u toe , Hanas pai ' Kayafas . Hi mpae tohe ' e , Alata ' ala mpoparata lolita - na hi Yohanes ana ' Zakharia hi papada to wao ' .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Jadi ' , momako ' - imi Yohanes mure ' - nca ' u ue Yordan mpoparata Lolita Alata ' ala hi ntodea , na ' uli ' : " Medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , pai ' kana tumai - koi kuniu ' , bona Alata ' ala mpo ' ampungi jeko ' - ni . "

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Yohanes toei mpopadupa ' napa to te ' uki ' hi rala sura nabi Yesaya owi , moni - na hewa toi : Ria tauna to mekio ' hi papada to wao ' , na ' uli ' : ` Neo ' rata - imi Pue ' ! Porodo ami ' - miki ohea - na ! Nipakalempe ami ' - mi ohea to natara mpai ' !

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: To lobu ' - na kana ra ' ihii ' , to molangko pai ' to pabulu ' - bulu ' kana rapohimpaya ' . To pahiku - hiku rapomonoa ' , pai ' to moloke ' - loke ' rapokalempe .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Oti toe , hawe ' ea manusia ' mpohilo Alata ' ala mpohore ntodea - na ngkai jeko ' - ra . ' "

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Wori ' tauna tumai mpopeniu ' hi Yohanes . Na ' uli ' Yohanes mpo ' uli ' - raka : " He koi ' to bengku ' gau ' - ni ! Napa pai ' tumai - koie ? Ba ni ' uli ' - koina , ma ' ala mpai ' nipasalewa roe Pue ' Ala to neo ' mporumpa ' - koi ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Ane bongko medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , babehi - mokoi gau ' to lompe ' . Pai ' neo ' nipoperaha kamuli - na Abraham - koi ! Bona ni ' inca : muli Abraham bisa napajadi ' Alata ' ala ngkai watu - watu toe lau .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Neo ' rata - mi pehuku ' Alata ' ala ! Pehuku ' - na hewa pati to rodo ami ' - mi hi tawu kaju . Butu ngkaju - na to uma lompe ' wua ' - na , bate ratoki pai ' ratene ' hi rala apu . "

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Ntodea mpekune ' Yohanes , ra ' uli ' : " Ane wae , napa - kaiwo to kana kibabehi ? "

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yohanes : " Hema - koi to rontonga ' baju - ni , hantonga ' wai ' - raka - rawo to uma nakariai . Pai ' tauna to ria pongkoni ' - ra , bagii - ra - rawo to uma ria pongkoni ' - ra . "

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Rata wo ' o - ra - rawo topesingara ' paja ' mpopeniu ' hi Yohanes . Mepekune ' - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Guru , napa - kaiwo to kana kibabehi - e ? "

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Natompoi ' - ra : " Neo ' - koi mesingara ' melabi ngkai to rapakatantu topoparenta . "

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Rata wo ' o - ra - rawo tantara mpekune ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Hiaa ' beiwa wo ' o - ka - kaiwo kai ' ! Napa - kaiwo to kana kibabehi - e ? " Na ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' - koi mporampaki rewa doo , pai ' neo ' mpo ' ekahi ntodea bona rawai ' - koi doi . Hangkuja - mi - hawo gaji ' - ni , tarima - mi hante kagoea ' nono . "
