text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: Nto ' u toe , ntodea ntora mpopea karata - na Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Alata ' ala . Hawe ' ea - ra mepekune ' hi rala nono - ra , meka ' ba lue ' Yohanes lau - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' to rapopea toe .

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Toe pai ' Yohanes mpo ' uli ' - raka omea : " Ane aku ' - le , mponiu ' - koi hante ue - wadi , tanda kamedea - ni ngkai jeko ' - ni . Tapi ' tumai - i mpai ' to meliu kuasa - na ngkai aku ' . Bangku ' jadi ' pahawaa ' - na to mpobongka koloro sapatu ' - na , uma - a - kuwo natao . Hi ' a mpai ' to mponiu ' - koi hante Inoha ' Tomoroli ' pai ' hante apu .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Hi ' a ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki tauna to mpowiri ' pae . Nagaa ' pae to mo ' ihi ngkai to lopa ' - na duu ' - na me ' itu ' . Pae to mo ' ihi napuna ' hi rala wilulu - na , pai ' to lopa ' - na nasuwe hi rala apu to jela ' ncuu duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Hewa toei Yohanes mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi ntodea , pai ' naparesai ' - ra nte wori ' nyala tudui ' - na .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Pai ' nakamaro wo ' o kasalaa ' - na Herodes Antipas , topoparenta hi tana ' Galilea , apa ' Herodes mpo ' ago pai ' mpotobine Herodias , tobine ompi ' - na moto . Yohanes mpokamaro - i sabana gau ' - na toe , pai ' sabana hawe ' ea gau ' - na to dada ' a ntani ' - na .

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: Jadi ' , kana ' epe - na Herodes pekamaro Yohanes toe , uma - di nabalii ' gau ' - na to dada ' a , nadonihii lau - di : nahoko ' lau - imi Yohanes pai ' - i natarungku ' .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Kako ' ia - na Yohanes ratarungku ' , bula - na meniu ' - pidi mponiu ' ntodea , Yesus wo ' o - hawo tumai mpopeniu ' . Ka ' oti - nai raniu ' , bula - na mosampaya , muu - mule ' tebea - mi langi ' ,

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: pai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mana ' u tumai dungku hi Yesus , lence - na hewa danci mangkebodo . Pai ' Alata ' ala mololita ngkai suruga mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Iko toi - mi Ana ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' . Iko - mi to mpakagoe ' nono - ku . "

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Nto ' u umuru Yesus kira - kira tolu mpulu ' mpae , natepu ' u - mi pobago - na . Ntuku ' pomporataa tauna , Yesus ana ' Yusuf , Yusuf ana ' Eli ,

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: Eli ana ' Matat , Matat ana ' Lewi , Lewi ana ' Malkhi , Malkhi ana ' Yanai , Yanai ana ' Yusuf ,

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: Yusuf ana ' Matica , Matica ana ' Amos , Amos ana ' Nahum , Nahum ana ' Hesli , Hesli ana ' Nagai ,

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Nagai ana ' Maat , Maat ana ' Matica , Matica ana ' Simei , Simei ana ' Yosekh , Yosekh ana ' Yoda ,

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: Yoda ana ' Yohanan , Yohanan ana ' Resa , Resa ana ' Zerubabel , Zerubabel ana ' Sealtiel , Sealtiel ana ' Neri ,

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: Neri ana ' Malkhi , Malkhi ana ' Adi , Adi ana ' Kosam , Kosam ana ' Elmadam , Elmadam ana ' Er ,

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: Er ana ' Yesua , Yesua ana ' Eliezer , Eliezer ana ' Yorim , Yorim ana ' Matat , Matat ana ' Lewi ,

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: Lewi ana ' Simeon , Simeon ana ' Yehuda , Yehuda ana ' Yusuf , Yusuf ana ' Yonam , Yonam ana ' Elyakim ,

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: Elyakim ana ' Melea , Melea ana ' Mina , Mina ana ' Matata , Matata ana ' Natan , Natan ana ' Daud ,

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: Daud ana ' Isai , Isai ana ' Obed , Obed ana ' Boas , Boas ana ' Salmon , Salmon ana ' Nahason ,

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Nahason ana ' Aminadab , Aminadab ana ' Admin , Admin ana ' Arni , Arni ana ' Hezron , Hezron ana ' Peres , Peres ana ' Yehuda ,

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: Yehuda ana ' Yakub , Yakub ana ' Ishak , Ishak ana ' Abraham , Abraham ana ' Terah , Terah ana ' Nahor ,

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: Nahor ana ' Serug , Serug ana ' Rehu , Rehu ana ' Peleg , Peleg ana ' Eber , Eber ana ' Salmon ,

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: Salmon ana ' Kenan , Kenan ana ' Arpakhsad , Arpakhsad ana ' Sem , Sem ana ' Nuh , Nuh ana ' Lamekh ,

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: Lamekh ana ' Metusalah , Metusalah ana ' Henokh , Henokh ana ' Yared , Yared ana ' Mahalaleel , Mahalaleel ana ' Kenan ,

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: Kenan ana ' Enos , Enos ana ' Set , Set ana ' Adam , Adam ana ' Alata ' ala .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: Pe ' ongko ' - na Yesus ngkai ue Yordan , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpokuasai - i pai ' mpakeni - i hilou hi papada to wao ' .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Mo ' oha ' - i hi ria opo ' mpulu ' bengi , pai ' - i nasori Magau ' Anudaa ' . Kahae - na toe , uma ria hanyalaa to nakoni ' . Timpaliu opo ' mpulu ' bengi toe , mo ' oro ' - imi .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Na ' uli ' Magau ' Anudaa ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Ane Ana ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - ko , wae - pi hubui watu toe mewali pongkoni ' ! "

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : ` Manusia ' uma tuwu ' ngkai pongkoni ' - wadi . ' "

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Oti toe , Magau ' Anudaa ' mpokeni - i hilou hi kalangkoa - na . Hampinisi mata - wadi napopohiloi - i hawe ' ea kamagaua ' hi dunia ' ,

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Kuasa mpoparentai hawe ' ea kamagaua ' toera lau pai ' hawe ' ea ka ' uaa ' - na , kuwai ' - koko Iko omea - mi mpai ' , apa ' aku ' omea pue ' - na , pai ' ma ' ala kupewai ' hi hema konoa - ku .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Jadi ' , ane mepue ' - ko hi aku ' , kuwai ' - koko Iko omea - mi toe lau . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : ` Kana mepue ' - ta hi Pue ' - ta , Pue ' Ala . Muntu ' Hi ' a - wadi to natao tapengkorui . ' "

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Oti toe , Magau ' Anudaa ' mpopakeni - i hilou hi Yerusalem , napopokore - i hi lolo wumu Tomi Alata ' ala , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ane Ana ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - ko , mengkanawu ' - ko pe ' ngkai rei !

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: Uma - ko mpai ' moapa , apa ' ria te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' : ` Pue ' Ala mpohubui mala ' eka - na mpetalawai ' - ko , bona neo ' - ko silaka .

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Rahorongko - ko , bona witi ' - nu uma dungku hi watu . ' "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Te ' uki ' wo ' o hewa toi : ` Neo ' tasori Pue ' - ta , Pue ' Ala . ' "

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Magau ' Anudaa ' mposori Yesus hante hawe ' ea pesori toe , malai - imi mpopea loga to lompe ' .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' - i nculii ' hilou hi tana ' Galilea . Hi humalili ' Galilea , molele - mi kareba to mpo ' uli ' napa to nababehi .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Metudui ' - i hi tomi - tomi posampayaa to Yahudi , pai ' hawe ' ea tauna mpo ' une ' - i .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Hilou - imi Yesus hi Nazaret , ngata kabohea - na . Pai ' hewa kabiasaa - na , mesua ' - imi hi tomi posampayaa hi Eo Sabat , eo pepuea ' - ra to Yahudi . Mokore - imi bona mpobasa Buku Tomoroli ' .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Ratonu - ki sura nabi Yesaya . Napali ' duu ' - na mporua ' lolita tohe ' i :

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: " Inoha ' Pue ' Ala hompo hi Aku ' , apa ' nawati ' - ama mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi tauna to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra . Nasuro - a mpo ' uli ' - raka to ratawani : ` Tebahaka - mokoi ! ' Nasuro - a mpo ' uli ' - raka towero : ` Pehilo - mokoi ! ' Nahubui - a mpobahaka - ra to rapobatua .

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: Nahubui - a mpopalele kareba - na , karata - nami tempo - na Pue ' mpopohiloi ahi ' - na hi ntodea - na . "

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Ka ' oti - na nabasa toe we ' i , nalulu nculii ' - mi sura toe , natonu - ki pue ' bago , pai ' - i mohura bona metudui ' . Hawe ' ea tauna to hi rala tomi posampayaa toe mpodulu mponaa - i doko ' mpo ' epe lolita - na .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Na ' uli ' - miraka : " Eo toe lau , madupa ' - mi lolita Buku Tomoroli ' toe , nto ' u kani ' epe - na kubasa we ' i . "

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Konce omea - ramo to mpo ' epe - i , ra ' uli ' : " Lompe ' lia pololita - na ! Uma mowo kanoto - na ! Hiaa ' bo ana ' Yusuf - i - wadi - hawo . "

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Bate ria - koi mpai ' to mpo ' uli ' - ka walatu tohe ' i : ` Ee dokter , paka ' uri ' moto - mi - kowo woto - nu ! Ane bongko nabi mpu ' u - ko , anu mekoncehi to ki ' epe nubabehi hi Kapernaum , babehi wo ' o hi rehe ' i hi ngata - nu moto . ' "

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Na ' uli ' tena - raka Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi , uma ria nabi to rabila ' hi ngata - na moto .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : napa to jadi ' tempo toi , bate hewa to jadi ' hi tempo - na nabi Elia owi . Nto ' u toe , tolu mpae ono mula hangaa mara eo , alaa - na rata oro ' bohe hi hawe ' ea ngata . Wori ' moto tobine tobalu hi tana ' Israel to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra nto ' u toe .

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Tapi ' Pue ' Ala uma mpohubui Elia mpotulungi haduaa ngkai tobalu toera . To nahubui - ki hilou hi ngata Sarfat , mpotulungi hadua tobine tobalu to Sidon , bela - i - hana to Israel .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Wae wo ' o nto ' u nabi Elisa owi , wori ' moto topohaki ' poko ' hi tana ' Israel . Aga uma - ra haduaa to napaka ' uri ' nabi Elisa . Muntu ' Naaman , tauna to Siria . "

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Mpo ' epe lolita - na Yesus toe we ' i , moroe lia - ramo hawe ' ea tauna to hi rala tomi posampayaa .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Pokore - rami mpopalai - i hilou hi mali ngata , pai ' rakeni hilou hi bingke - na , apa ' ngata - ra hi lolo bulu ' . Patuju - ra ke mpotulaka - i hi bingke - na bona mate - i .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Ntaa ' we ' i , Yesus mako ' mpe ' olo ' tauna to wori ' , pai ' nculi ' palai - nami .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus hilou hi ngata Kapernaum hi tana ' Galilea . Karata - na hi ree , metudui ' wo ' o - i hi tomi posampayaa hi Eo Sabat .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Konce - ramo tauna to mpo ' epe tudui ' - na , apa ' mololita - i hewa tauna to mokuasa .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Ria wo ' o hi ree hadua tauna to napesuai ' seta to dada ' a lia . Mejeu ' - imi na ' uli ' :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: " Ee Yesus to Nazaret  Doko ' nupopai - dakaie ? Ba doko ' nuropuhi - dakaie ? Ku ' inca moto - kole , ka ' Iko - na Suro to moroli ' ngkai Alata ' ala - e . "

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki seta toei : " Ngkaba ' i - ko ! Palai - ko ngkai tauna tetui ! " Seta to mpesuai ' tau toei mpodungka - i hi laintongo ' ntodea , pai ' - i malai , aga uma - i napopai - pai .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Konce omea - ramo tauna to mpohilo , pai ' momepololitai - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Uma mowo kabaraka ' lolita - nae ' ! Napake ' kuasa - na mpopalai anudaa ' , malai mpu ' u - ramo - rana . "

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Ngkai ree , molele - mi kareba hiapa - apa hi tana ' Galilea , to mpo ' uli ' napa to nababehi Yesus .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Oti toe , malai - imi Yesus ngkai rala tomi posampayaa , hilou hi tomi Simon . Nto ' u toe , piniana - na Simon tobine ngkelengi ' gaga . Jadi ' merapi ' - ra hi Yesus bona natulungi - i - hawo .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Lou - imi Yesus mokore hi ncori poturua - na , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Palai - ko haki ' ! " Ncaliu mo ' uri ' - imi , pai ' memata - i mpolayani - ra .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Limpa - mi eo , wori ' tauna tumai hi Yesus , mpokeni hawe ' ea ompi ' - ra to peda ' hante wori ' nyala haki ' - ra . Naganga - ra butu dua - na pai ' napaka ' uri ' - ra .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Pai ' wori ' wo ' o seta napopalai ngkai tauna to rapesuai ' . Seta to napopalai toera , kaka ' au - au - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Iko - mi Ana ' Alata ' ala ! " Aga natagi mpu ' u - ra bona neo ' - ra mololita , apa ' ra ' inca Kahi ' a - na Magau ' Topetolo ' .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Kamepulo - na , malai - imi Yesus ngkai ngata toe , hilou hi kawaoa ' - na . Wori ' tauna mpali ' - i , duu ' - na rarua ' - i . Merapi ' - ra bona neo ' - ipi mpalahii - ra .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Tapi ' na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Kana hilou wo ' o - a hi ngata - ngata ntani ' - na , mpoparata - raka kareba lompe ' to mpo ' uli ' neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Apa ' toe - mi patuju - na Alata ' ala mposuro - a tumai . "

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus hilou mpokeni Lolita Pue ' hi tomi posampayaa hobo ' hi tana ' Yudea .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Hangkani , bula - na Yesus mokore hi wiwi ' rano Genesaret , wori ' tauna mome ' upi ' doko ' mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Mpohilo - i romeha ' sakaya hi wiwi ' rano . Nto ' u toe , topebau ' mencore ngkai sakaya - ra hilou hi role - na mpobohoi ' jala ' - ra .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Hilou - imi Yesus mpohawi ' sakaya to hameha ' , sakaya - na Simon , pai ' naperapi ' bona Simon mpotoko sakaya ngkai wiwi ' rano hangkedi ' . Oti toe , pai ' mohura - imi hi rala sakaya mpotudui ' ntodea .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Kahudu - na metudui ' , na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Simon : " Toko tena hilou hi kanalaa - na , pai ' tene ' jala ' - ni bona mporata - koi bau ' . "

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Na ' uli ' Simon : " Guru , hamengia - makai ngone mobago , aga uma hama ' aa ihi ' jala ' - kai . Aga nau ' wae , kutene ' moto , lawi ' nuhubui - kai . "

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Ngkai ree , karatene ' - na jala ' - ra , wori ' mpu ' u - mi bau ' to mesua ' hi rala - na , alaa - na ntepu ' u morenta - mi jala ' - ra .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Mekawe - ra hi doo - ra to hi rala sakaya kahameha ' - na bona tumai mengawa ' . Tumai mpu ' u - ramo - rawo pai ' ra ' ihii ' - mi sakaya romehaa ' , duu ' - na neo ' matala nakeni katomo - na .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Kanahilo - na Simon Petrus kabaraka ' - na Yesus toe , powingkotu ' - nami hi nyanyoa - na , na ' uli ' : " Neo ' - apa numohui ' , Pue ' ! Apa ' aku ' toi tauna topojeko ' . "

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Simon mololita hewa toe , apa ' hi ' a pai ' hawe ' ea doo - na wilingkoroa mpohilo kawori ' bau ' to nawoko ' jala ' - ra .

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Wilingkoroa wo ' o - ra - rawo Yakobus pai ' Yohanes , rodua ana ' Zebedeus to mobago dohe Simon . Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki Simon : " Neo ' me ' eka ' . Ntepu ' u wae lau , uma - poko mebau ' . Kuwai ' - moko pobago to bo ' u : mpotudui ' tauna jadi ' topetuku ' - ku . "

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Oti toe , radii ' sakaya - ra hi role - na , rapalahii omea - mi , pai ' mpotuku ' Yesus - ramo .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Hangkani , bula - na Yesus hi rala ngata , rata hadua tauna to mohaki ' poko ' hobo ' woto - na . Kampohilo - na Yesus , powingkotu ' - nami , lio - na dungku hi tana ' . Merapi ' - i hi Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Pue ' , ane ma ' ala , paka ' uri ' - a - kuwo ! "

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Yesus mpojama - i pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ma ' ala moto . Kupaka ' uri ' - moko ! " Hampinisi mata , mo ' uri ' - imi .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpotagi - i , na ' uli ' : " Neo ' nulolita to jadi ' tohe ' i hi hema - hema . Hilou - moko ulu mpopehuwu woto - nu hi imam , bona nahilo kamo ' uri ' - numi , pai ' keni pepue ' - nu ntuku ' parenta to na ' uki ' Musa , bona monoa ' hi hawe ' ea tauna kamo ' uri ' - nu mpu ' u - mi . "

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Ntaa ' molele lau - midi kareba - na hiapa - apa - e , alaa - na mo ' iko tauna mpotuku ' Yesus doko ' mpo ' epe lolita - na pai ' mpopepaka ' uri ' .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Tapi ' Yesus biasa hilou hi kawaoa ' - na pai ' mosampaya .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo nto ' u Yesus metudui ' , ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai ' guru agama mohura hi ree . Ria - ra ngkai ngata - ngata hi tana ' Galilea , Yudea , pai ' ngkai ngata Yerusalem wo ' o . Baraka ' ngkai Pue ' Ala ria hi Yesus bona mepaka ' uri ' .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Nto ' u toe , tumai - ra ba hangkuja tauna mpokowa ' hadua topungku to turu hi rala pokowaa ' . Rapali ' ohea - ra mesua ' hi tomi doko ' mpokeni doo - ra hi Yesus .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Aga uma - ra teliu mesua ' , apa ' bihi ' rahi tauna . Toe pai ' ngkahe ' tuka ' - ramo mpokeni doo - ra hilou hi lolo tomi , rahungka ' ata ' pai ' ra ' ulu - i ntali pokowaa ' - na hilou hi nyanyoa Yesus hi laintongo ' ntodea .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Kanahilo - na Yesus kabohe pepangala ' - ra , na ' uli ' - mi hi topungku toei : " Ompi ' , te ' ampungi - mi jeko ' - nu . "

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Mololita - ramo guru agama pai ' to Parisi toera hi rala nono - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Hema rahi - idi tauna toei mai , pai ' daho ' - i mpo ' uli ' hibalia tuwu ' - na hante Alata ' ala - e ? Uma ria haduaa to ma ' ala mpo ' ampungi jeko ' , muntu ' Alata ' ala - wadi . "

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Na ' inca moto Yesus napa to hi rala nono - ra . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' nipekiri hewa tetu - e ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ria mpu ' u kuasa - ku hi dunia ' mpo ' ampungi jeko ' . Tapi ' ane ku ' uli ' - ki topungku toei mai : ` Te ' ampungi - mi jeko ' - nu , ' uma ni ' incai ba te ' ampungi mpu ' u - di jeko ' - nae ba uma - di . Aga ane ku ' uli ' : ` Memata pai ' mako ' - moko , ' nihilo mpai ' kadupa ' - na ba ka ' uma - na .

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Jadi ' , kupopohiloi - koi karia - na kuasa - ku mpo ' ampungi jeko ' . " Ngkai ree , kamewili ' - na hi topungku toei , na ' uli ' - ki : " Ku ' uli ' - koko , memata - moko , ongko ' - mi pokowaa ' - nu , pai ' nculii ' - moko . "

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Pemata - na mpu ' u - mi topungku toei , rasabii ' tauna to wori ' , na ' ongko ' poturua - na , pai ' - i nculii ' hilou hi tomi - na . Pai ' hi lengko ohea ntora mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala - imi .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Konce lia hawe ' ea tauna mpohilo tohe ' e , pai ' - ra mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala . Hante mogalo me ' eka ' wo ' o - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Uma mowo kajadia ' to tahilo eo toe we ' i lau ! "

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Oti toe , malai - imi Yesus , pai ' hi lengko ohea mpohilo - i hadua topesingara ' paja ' bula - na mohura hi kantoro ' - na , hanga ' - na Lewi . Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Tuku ' - ama . "

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Pokore - nami mpalahii omea , pai ' - i mpotuku ' Yesus .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Lewi mpobabehi karamea bohe hi tomi - na , mpotorata Yesus . Wori ' wo ' o topesingara ' paja ' pai ' tau ntani ' - na rakio ' ngkoni ' dohe - ra .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Mpohilo toe , ba hangkuja dua pangkeni agama pai ' guru agama to mpotuku ' tudui ' Parisi , ntora ngkunuti . Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na Yesus : " Napa pai ' ngkoni ' pai ' nginu - ko - koina hangkaa - ngkania hante topesingara ' paja ' pai ' topojeko ' - e ? "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Tauna to uma peda ' , uma mingki ' rapokulii ' . Tauna to peda ' - wadi - hawo to paraluu rapokulii ' .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Uma - a tumai mpokio ' - ra to monoa ' ingku - ra . Katumai - ku toi - le , mpokio ' topojeko ' - a bona medea - ra ngkai jeko ' - ra . "

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Nto ' u toe , ria to mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Topetuku ' - na Yohanes Topeniu ' , jau - ra - hana mopuasa ' pai ' mosampaya . Wae wo ' o topetuku ' - ra to Parisi . Hiaa ' topetuku ' - nu Iko - kona , ngkoni ' pai ' nginu oa ' - ra - wadi . Napa pai ' uma - ra mopuasa ' - e ? "

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Yesus mpotompoi ' - ra hante lolita rapa ' toi , na ' uli ' : " Tauna hi posusaa ' poncamokoa , ha mopuasa ' - ra - rana bula - ra mpo ' emai ' topemua ' ? Uma - hawo .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Tapi ' rata mpai ' tempo - na , topemua ' ra ' ala ' ngkai laintongo ' - ra . Nto ' u toe - damo , pai ' lako ' mopuasa ' - rada . "

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' lolita rapa ' toi , na ' uli ' - raka : " Uma ria tauna to mpotai ' hanceu ' pontaia ' ngkai baju to bo ' u pai ' natelepei - ki baju to hae . Apa ' ane wae , narenta lau - mi baju to bo ' u . Pai ' uma wo ' o mpai ' lompe ' lence - na pontaia ' to bo ' u toe hi baju to hae .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Wae wo ' o , uma ria tauna to mpotua anggur to bo ' u hi rala pontu ' ua to hae . Apa ' ane dede ' - i mpai ' , mopengka lau - mi pontu ' ua to hae toe , alaa - na mobowo anggur , pai ' mpadaa ' wo ' o - mi pontu ' ua - na .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Anggur to bo ' u bate kana ra ' ihii ' hi pontu ' ua to bo ' u wo ' o - wadi - hawo .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: " Uma ria tauna to dota nginu anggur to bo ' u ane oti - i - damo mpo ' inu to hae . Apa ' na ' uli ' mpai ' : ` Anggur to hae to motomo ' . ' "

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Hangkani Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na ntara rala bonea nto ' u Eo Sabat , eo pepuea ' - ra to Yahudi . Bula - ra mpotara bonea toe , ana ' guru - na mpotepo ' wua ' gandum , raporo bona molepa ' kuluma - na , pai ' raru ' a .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: To Parisi to hi ree mpokamaro - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Napa pai ' nitiboki atura agama - ta ? Mobago - dako - koina hi eo pepuea ' ! "

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka Yesus : " Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Magau ' Daud pai ' doo - doo - na owi nto ' u - ra mo ' oro ' - e ?

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: Mesua ' - i hi rala tomi pepuea ' , pai ' nakoni ' roti to rapopepue ' hi Alata ' ala , pai ' nabagi wo ' o - raka doo - na . Ntuku ' ada agama - ta , imam - wadi - hana to ma ' ala mpokoni ' roti toe . Aga nau ' wae , gau ' - na Daud toe uma - hawo naposala ' . "

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ria kuasa - ku mpo ' uli ' napa to ma ' ala rababehi hi eo pepuea ' . "

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Hangkani wo ' o nto ' u Eo Sabat , hilou - i metudui ' hi tomi posampayaa . Hi tomi posampayaa toe , ria hadua tauna to mate pale ka ' ana - na .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai ' guru agama to hi ree mpolelemata - i Yesus , meka ' ba mepaka ' uri ' - i mpai ' hi Eo Sabat . Patuju - ra , mpali ' kedo ' bona rapakilu - i mobago hi Eo Sabat .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Aga na ' inca moto Yesus anu hi nono - ra . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki tauna to mate pale - na hamali toei : " Mai - moko mokore hi laintongo ' rei ! " Hilou mpu ' u - imi - hawo mokore hi ree .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Kupekune ' - koi ulu . Ntuku ' atura agama - ta , to ' uma to ma ' ala tababehi hi Eo Sabat : mpobabehi to lompe ' - di ba to dada ' a ? Mpotulungi doo ba mpatehi doo ? "

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Mogolili Yesus mponaa - ra omea , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki topeda ' toei : " Tanoa pale - nu ! " Kanatanoa - na pale - na , mo ' uri ' - imi .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Ngkai ree , uma mowo karoe - ra guru agama pai ' to Parisi . Toe pai ' mohawa ' - ramo mpali ' reke - ra , ba rapopai - i Yesus .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Yesus hilou hi bulu ' - na , pai ' mosampaya - i hamengia hi Alata ' ala .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Kabaja - na , nakio ' - ramo topetuku ' - na pai ' napelihi hampulu ' rodua ngkai laintongo ' - ra . To hampulu ' rodua toera , nahanga ' suro - na .

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: Hanga ' - ra : Simon ( Yesus mpohanga ' - i Petrus ) ; pai ' Andreas ompi ' - na Simon ; Yakobus ; Yohanes ; Filipus ; Bartolomeus ; Matius ; Tomas ; Yakobus ana ' Alfeus ; Simon to rahanga ' to Zelot ; Yudas ana ' Yakobus ; pai ' Yudas Iskariot , to mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - nae mpai ' .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Oti toe , mana ' u - imi Yesus ngkai lolo bulu ' hante ana ' guru - na , pai ' - ra mento ' o hi lempe - na . Hi ree , wori ' - mi topetuku ' - na mpopea - i , pai ' wori ' lia tauna morumpu . Tauna toera ngkai humalili ' tana ' Yudea , ngkai ngata Yerusalem pai ' ngkai ngata Tirus pai ' Sidon to hi wiwi ' tahi ' .

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: Patuju - ra tumai , doko ' mpo ' epe lolita Yesus pai ' mpopepaka ' uri ' . To napesuai ' seta tumai wo ' o pai ' napaka ' uri ' - ra .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: Wori ' tauna mpali ' ohea doko ' mpoganga Yesus , apa ' ria baraka ' to mehupa ' ngkai woto - na to mpaka ' uri ' - ra omea .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesus mponaa topetuku ' - na pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : Morasi ' - koi tokabu , apa ' koi ' to jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala , pai ' Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ni .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: Morasi ' - koi to mo ' oro ' tempo toi , apa ' rabohui moto - koi mpai ' . Morasi ' - koi to geo ' tempo toi , apa ' goe ' moto - koi mpai ' .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: " Morasi ' - koi ane rapokahuku ' - koi , rapopalai - koi , raruge ' pai ' rapomohoa hanga ' - ni sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' .

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: Apa ' wae wo ' o gau ' ntu ' a - ra mpobalinai ' nabi - nabi to owi . Jadi ' , ane rapohewa toe - koi , mohajo - koi pai ' pakagoe ' moto nono - ni , apa ' bohe mpai ' rasi ' to nirata hi rala suruga .

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: " Aga silaka - koi topo ' ua ' tempo toi , apa ' mpolia ' nirata - mi - koina kagoea ' - ni .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: Silaka - koi to bohu tempo toi , apa ' mo ' oro ' - koi mpai ' . Silaka - koi to goe ' tempo toi , apa ' susa ' pai ' geo ' - koi mpai ' .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: Silaka - koi ane hawe ' ea tauna mpo ' une ' - koi , apa ' wae wo ' o ntu ' a - ra owi mpo ' une ' nabi - nabi to boa ' .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: " Aga hi koi ' to mpo ' epe lolita - ku wae - e lau , ohe ' i hawa ' - ku : Kana tapoka ' ahi ' bali ' - ta , mo ' ingku lompe ' hi tauna to mpokahuku ' - ta .

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: Gane ' - ra to mpokamo - ta , posampayai - ra to dada ' a hi kita ' .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Ane ria tauna to mpohopo ' kulimpi - ta hamali , neo ' rapehawai . Tonu lau wo ' o - ki to hamali . Ane ria to mpo ' agoi - ta abe ' - ta , wai ' wo ' o lau - i baju - ta .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: Ane ria to mperapii ' - ta , wai ' - ra - rawo . Ane ria to mpo ' agoi ba napa - napa rewa - ta , neo ' raperapi ' nculii ' .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Napa po ' ingku to tapokono rababehi doo hi kita ' , toe wo ' o to kana tababehi hi doo .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: " Ane tapoka ' ahi ' muntu ' tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' - ta - wadi , uma mpai ' nagane ' - ta Alata ' ala . Bangku ' tauna to dada ' a gau ' - ra , ma ' ahi ' moto - ra hi tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' - ra .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Ane lompe ' po ' ingku - ta muntu ' hi tauna to lompe ' po ' ingku - ra hi kita ' , uma mpai ' nagane ' - ta Alata ' ala . Bangku ' tauna to dada ' a , bate lompe ' po ' ingku - ra hi tauna to lompe ' po ' ingku - ra hi hira ' .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Ane kita ' mpewai ' doi - ta rahenta muntu ' hi tauna to ta ' inca bisa mpoponculi ' - taka , uma mpai ' nagane ' - ta Alata ' ala . Bangku ' tauna to dada ' a , dota wo ' o - ra - rawo rapohentai doi hingka todada ' a - ra , apa ' ncarumaka - ra rapoponculi ' moto - raka mpai ' .

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: " Neo ' hewa tetu ! Kana tapoka ' ahi ' bali ' - ta , mo ' ingku lompe ' hi hira ' . Wai ' - ra hema to doko ' mpohentai - ta , pai ' neo ' ncarumaka ponculia ' - na . Ane wae po ' ingku - ta , bohe mpai ' rasi ' to tarata hi eo mpeno , pai ' tatuku ' - mi po ' ingku Pue ' Ala to hi suruga . Apa ' manara - i Pue ' hi tauna to uma mpo ' incai mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi pai ' hi tauna to dada ' a .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: Kana ma ' ahi ' - ta , hewa kama ' ahi ' - na Pue ' Ala Tuama - ta .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: " Neo ' - ta mpotudo ' sala ' doo , bona uma wo ' o mpai ' Pue ' Ala mpotudo ' sala ' - ta . Neo ' mpo ' uli ' tauna to masala ' kana rahuku ' , bona uma wo ' o mpai ' Pue ' Ala mpohuku ' - ta . Ampungi sala ' doo , Pue ' Ala wo ' o mpai ' mpo ' ampungi sala ' - ta .

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Kana tawai ' doo - ta , Pue ' Ala wo ' o mpowai ' - ta . Nawai ' - ta pewai ' to lompe ' lia , to oti - mi ralengo pai ' ra ' oo ' , duu ' - na moloju ' . Apa ' pohuka ' to tapake ' hi doo , tetu wo ' o - hawo mpai ' to rapopohuka ' - taka . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: Pai ' na ' uli ' wo ' o Yesus lolita rapa ' tohe ' i : " Ane towero mpotete ' hingka towero - na , bate moluli ' - ra mpai ' hi rala kinali .

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Pai ' uma ria ana ' sikola to meliu karabila ' - na ngkai guru - na . Ane hudu - miki posikola - na , pai ' lako ' hibalia - idi hante guru - na .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: " Napa pai ' mponaa - ta gege ' hi mata doo , hiaa ' wince ' kaju to hi mata - ta moto uma ta ' incai karia - na !

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Beiwa - ta ma ' ala mpo ' uli ' - ki doo : ` Ompi ' , mai kulali gege ' - nu , ' bo uma moto tahiloi wince ' kaju to hi mata - ta . Neo ' mpetolompei ' kehi ! Kana talali ulu wince ' kaju to hi mata - ta , bona monoto mata - ta mpolali gege ' doo .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: " Uma ria kaju to lompe ' mowua ' to dada ' a . Wae wo ' o uma ria kaju to dada ' a mowua ' to lompe ' .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Butu nyala kaju ra ' inca kalompe ' - na hi powua ' - na . Wua ' ara uma rahopu ' ngkai walaa to morui . Wua ' anggur uma rahopu ' ngkai jilata .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Wae wo ' o manusia ' . Tauna to lompe ' , bate mpohowa ' lolita to lompe ' - ra , apa ' lawi ' nono - ra ihia ' to lompe ' . Tauna to dada ' a , dada ' a wo ' o lolita - ra , apa ' nono - ra ihia ' to dada ' a . Apa ' napa ihi ' nono - ta , toe wo ' o - mi to howa ' hi wiwi - ta .

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: " Napa pai ' nikio ' - a ` Pue ' ! Pue ' ! ' bo uma - di nituku ' hawa ' - kue !

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Tauna to tumai hi Aku ' mpo ' epe pai ' mpotuku ' tudui ' - ku , hira ' hewa tauna hi rala lolita rapa ' tohe ' i :

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Hadua tauna mpowangu tomi , nakae tana ' napomonala pai ' nahu ' a parawatu to moroho . Rata uda bohe pai ' ue mowo ' mporumpa ' tomi toe , aga uma - i molengo apa ' moroho parawatu - na .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: Aga tauna to mpo ' epe lolita - ku pai ' uma ratuku ' , hira ' hewa hadua tauna to mpowangu tomi hi lolo tana ' - wadi hante uma ria parawatu - na . Rata ue mowo ' mporumpa ' tomi toe , kamodungka - nami , pai ' gaga kagero - na . "

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Kahudu - na Yesus mpotudui ' ntodea hawe ' ea toe , hilou - imi hi ngata Kapernaum .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Hi ngata toe , ria hadua tadulako tantara to Roma , ria - ki batua - na to napoka ' ahi ' lia . Batua - na toei peda ' danca , neo ' mate .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Kana ' epe - na tadulako toei karia - na Yesus hi ngata - na , nahubui ba hangkuja dua pangkeni to Yahudi hilou mpopetulungi hi Yesus , bona tumai - i mpaka ' uri ' batua - na .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Karata - ra hi Yesus , merapi ' mpu ' u - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Tadulako toei ria , natao lia nutulungi ,

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: apa ' napoka ' ahi ' - ta kita ' to Yahudi , pai ' ria - i mpowai ' - kai doi mpowangu tomi posampayaa - kai . "

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Ngkai ree , hilou mpu ' u - imi Yesus dohe - ra . Kamohu ' - na Yesus hi tomi - na , tadulako toei mpohubui wo ' o - ramo ba hangkuja dua doo - na hilou mpohirua ' - ki Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki hewa toi : " Tuama , uma - ko mingki ' tumai hi tomi - ku , apa ' aku ' toi bela - a to Yahudi , uma - a natao nupencuai ' .

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Toe pai ' uma - a daho ' tilou hi Iko Tuama , apa ' uma - a natao mpohirua ' - koko . Nau ' lolita hamela - wadi nu ' uli ' , bate mo ' uri ' - i mpai ' batua - ku .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Apa ' aku ' toi - e , pahawaa ' wo ' o - a - wadi - kuwo , pai ' ria wo ' o - ra - kuwo to kuhawai ' . Ane rapa ' - na ria hawa ' - ku hi hadua tantara mpo ' uli ' - ki : ` Hilou - ko ! ' bate hilou - i . Ane mekio ' - a hi tantara kahadua - na : ` Mai - ko ! ' bate tumai - i . Ane ku ' uli ' - raka batua - ku : ` Babehi toe ! ' bate rababehi . Wae wo ' o - kowo Iko Tuama , napa to nu ' uli ' hi retu , bate madupa ' hi rei . "

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Konce - i Yesus mpo ' epe lolita ngkai tadulako toei . Toe pai ' me ' ili ' - imi hi ntodea to mpotuku ' - i , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Uma mowo pepangala ' - na tau toei ria ! Nau ' hi to Yahudi muli Israel , ko ' ia ria haduaa kurata to bohe pepangala ' - na hewa tauna toei ria . "

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' - ramo suro toera hi tomi tadulako . Karata - ra hi ria , mpolia ' mo ' uri ' - imi batua - na .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: Uma mahae ngkai toe , hilou - imi Yesus hi ngata to rahanga ' Nain , hante ana ' guru - na pai ' wori ' tau ntani ' - na dohe - ra .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Mohu ' - ramo hi wobo ' wuntu ngata , rahilo - rawo wori ' tauna mehupa ' ngkai rala ngata , mpokowa ' tomate . Tomate toei , hadua kabilasa , ana ' hadudua , tina - na balu - mi . Wori ' pue ' ngata mpodohei tina - na hilou hi daeo ' .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Kanahilo - na Pue ' Yesus tobine toei , metumu ' - mi ahi ' - na pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Neo ' - pi - hawo geo ' ! "

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Hilou - imi mpoganga pokowa ' , mentoda ' - ramo to mokowa ' . Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kabilasa ! Kuhubui - ko memata ! "

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: Kabilasa to mate toei we ' i , kaliliu mohura - imi pai ' - i mololita . Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki tina - na : " Oi - mi ana ' - nu , totina . "

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Tauna to mpohilo kajadia ' toe , me ' eka ' omea - ramo , pai ' - ra mpobila ' Alata ' ala , ra ' uli ' : " Hadua nabi to mobaraka ' mehuwu - mi hi laintongo ' - ta ! Hompo mpu ' u - imi Alata ' ala tumai mpotulungi ntodea - na ! "

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Kareba toe molele hobo ' hi tana ' Yudea pai ' ntololikia - na .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Ana ' guru - na Yohanes Topeniu ' mpoparata - ki hawe ' ea to nababehi Yesus toe . Toe pai ' mpokio ' - i rodua ana ' guru - na ,

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: pai ' nahubui - ra hilou hi Pue ' Yesus , na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - mokoi hi Yesus pai ' uli ' - ki retu : ` Ba Iko - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Alata ' ala , ba ria - pidi to ntani ' - na to kipopea ? ' "

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - ramo suro to rodua toera , pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Pai ' - kai tumai Guru , nahubui - kai Yohanes mpekune ' - ta , ba kita ' - midi Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Pue ' Ala , ba ria - pidi to ntani ' - na to kipopea . "

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o - hawo , Yesus mpaka ' uri ' wori ' topeda ' ngkai haki ' - ra , napopalai anudaa ' ngkai tauna to rahawi ' , pai ' napaka ' uri ' towero bona pehilo - ra .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Na ' uli ' - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka suro Yohanes toera hewa toi : " Nculii ' - mokoi , uli ' - ki Yohanes hi retu napa to nihilo pai ' to ni ' epe : towero pehilo - mi , tokejo momako ' monoa ' - mi , topohaki ' poko ' mo ' uri ' , towongo pe ' epe , tomate kupotuwu ' nculii ' , pai ' Kareba Lompe ' kuparata - raka to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Marasi ' - ra tauna to uma morara ' nono - ra hi Aku ' . "

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Palai - ra suro Yohanes toera , mololita - imi Yesus hi ntodea , mpotompo ' wiwi Yohanes . Na ' uli ' : " Napa patuju - ni hilou mpohirua ' - ki Yohanes Topeniu ' hi tana ' to wao ' ? Ba doko ' - koi mpohilo tauna to morara ' nono - na , to hewa pimpi to molue nawui ngolu ' hilou tumai ? Uma - hawoe ' .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Jadi ' , hilou doko ' mpohilo napa - dikoie ? Ba doko ' mpohilo tauna to ncola pohea - na ? Uma wo ' o , apa ' po ' ohaa ' tauna to ncola pohea - ra pai ' to mo ' ua ' katuwu ' - ra , hi tomi magau ' - ra - wadi - hana .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Jadi ' , hilou doko ' mpohilo napa - dikoie ? Ba doko ' mpohilo nabi - dikoi ? Ane tetu , makono lia . Apa ' Yohanes tetui meliu ngkai nabi to ntani ' - na .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Apa ' hi ' a tetu - mi to mporodo nono - ra ntodea mpotarima - a , hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' owi . Na ' uli ' Alata ' ala : ` Hi ' a toi - mi suro - ku , kuhubui - i meri ' ulu ngkai Iko , bona mporodo ohea - nu . ' "

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Pe ' epei lompe ' : ngkai hawe ' ea tauna to putu hi rala dunia ' toi , uma ria haduaa to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - na ngkai Yohanes . Aga ngkai wae lau , marasi ' mpu ' u - ra tauna to jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Nau ' to kedi ' lia tuwu ' - ra , meliu kamarasi ' - ra ngkai Yohanes . "

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna , nte to mpesingarai ' paja ' , mpo ' epe lolita Yesus toe mpotompo ' wiwi Yohanes . Mpo ' epe toe , ratarima - mi Lolita Alata ' ala , apa ' oti - ramo mpopeniu ' hi Yohanes .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Hiaa ' to Parisi pai ' guru agama - rana , oja ' - ra mpotarima patuju Alata ' ala hi tuwu ' - ra , bo oja ' - ra mpopeniu ' hi Yohanes .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o Yesus : " Uma mowo tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi ! Toi - mi lolita rapa ' - ku to kurapai ' - raka :

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Hira ' hewa ana ' to mohura hi wiwi ' karajaa , to ntora momekio ' hi doo - ra , ra ' uli ' : ` Kibawai - koi molalowe , uma - koi dota goe ' dohe - kai . Kibawai - koi motantangi ' , uma wo ' o - koi dota geo ' dohe - kai . '

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Batua - na : Yohanes Topeniu ' uma nipokonoi , Aku ' wo ' o uma nipokonoi . Katumai - na Yohanes , mopuasa ' - i pai ' uma - i nginu to melanguhi . Nipoka ' oja ' - i , ni ' uli ' : ` Kahawia ' - i - hanale ! ' Hiaa ' katumai - ku Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , nginu - a , ngkoni ' - a . Nipoka ' oja ' wo ' o - a - wadi , ni ' uli ' : ` Hilo - i ! Tojampa , topalangu - langu , bale - ra topesingara ' paja ' pai ' doo - ra topojeko ' ! '

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , ta ' inca kamonoto - na patuju Alata ' ala ane tanaa gau ' hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na . "

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: Ria hadua to Parisi , hanga ' - na Simon , mpohinta ' Yesus ngkoni ' hi tomi - na . Hilou mpu ' u - imi Yesus hi tomi - na , mohura pai ' - ra ngkoni ' .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: Hi rala ngata toe , ria hadua tobine topojeko ' , uma tumotoa gau ' - na . Kana ' epe - na karia Yesus ngkoni ' hi tomi to Parisi toei , tumai - i ngkeni hameha ' butolo ' ihia ' lana honga .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Tumai - imi mpomohui ' witi ' Yesus , pai ' - i geo ' . Nasiii ' witi ' - na Yesus hante ue mata - na . Oti toe nabongka wuluwoo ' - na , napomporihi - ki witi ' - na , na ' eki pai ' natuai hante lana honga .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Nahilo to Parisi babehia tobine toei . Mololita bongo - imi hi rala nono - na , na ' uli ' : " Ane bongko nabi mpu ' u - i tau toei , ke na ' inca kahema - na tobine to mpoganga - i toe , ka ' uma - na tumotoa gau ' - na . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki to Parisi toei : " Simon , ria to doko ' ku ' uli ' - koko . " Na ' uli ' Simon : " Uli ' - mile Guru . "

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ria rodua tauna to mo ' inta hi tauna to ma ' ala rapohentai doi . Hadua mpohenta lima atu doi pera ' , to hadua lima mpulu ' - wadi .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Ngkai ka ' uma - napi rakulei ' mpobayari inta - ra , na ' uli ' - mi tauna to rapohentai toei : ` Uma - pi mingki ' nibayari inta - ni . ' Jadi ' , hema ngkai hira ' to rodua toera to meliu ahi ' - ra hi popa ' intaa - ra ? "

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Natompoi ' Simon : " Ba tauna to wori ' inta - na tu ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono tompoi ' - nu . "

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Oti toe , pai ' me ' ili ' - imi hi tobine toei pai ' na ' uli ' - ki Simon : " Ha nuhilo tobine toei - e ? Karata - ku hi tomi - nu we ' i , uma nuporodo ue pobohoi ' witi ' - ku , ntuku ' ada - ta hi torata . Hiaa ' tobine toei , nabohoi ' - hana witi ' - ku hante ue mata - na pai ' naporihi hante wuluwoo ' - na .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Iko , uma - a nutabe hante pe ' eki ntuku ' ada - ta . Hiaa ' tobine toei , uma nabahakai mpo ' eki witi ' - ku ngkai lomo ' - ku rata duu ' toe lau .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Iko , uma nulanai woo ' - ku ntuku ' ada - ta hi torata . Hiaa ' tobine toei mpobowohi witi ' - ku hante lana honga to masuli ' oli - na .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Jadi ' , bo ma ' ahi ' lia - ie , toe pai ' monoa ' - mi kata ' inca - na , jeko ' - na to wori ' te ' ampungi - mi . Aga tauna to hangkedi ' - wadi te ' ampungi jeko ' - na , hangkedi ' wo ' o - wadi - hawo ahi ' - na . "

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Oti toe na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki tobine toei : " Te ' ampungi - mi jeko ' - nu . "

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Mpo ' epe toe , momepololitai - ramo tauna to mpohimpongkoni ' - raka , ra ' uli ' : " Hema - idie tau tetui - e , pai ' daho ' - i mpo ' ampungi jeko ' - e ? "

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus hi tobine toei : " Tebahaka - moko ngkai huku ' jeko ' - nu sabana pepangala ' - nu hi Aku ' . Hilou - moko hante kalompea ' tuwu ' - nu . "

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpodaoi ' wori ' ngata mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' , na ' uli ' : " Neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . " Ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua mpodohei - i .

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: Ria wo ' o ba hangkuja dua tobine to mpodohei - ra . Tobine toera , tobine to napaka ' uri ' Yesus ngkai haki ' - ra ba ngkai anudaa ' to mpohawi ' - ra . To hadua , Maria to biasa - na rahanga ' Magdalena . Ria - i hangkani Yesus mpopalai pitu anudaa ' ngkai Maria toei .

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: To hadua wo ' o , Yohana tobine - na Khuza , topohawa ' hi rala tomi Magau ' Herodes . Ria wo ' o Susana , pai ' wori ' - pidi tobine ntani ' - na . Tobine toera mpake ' doi - ra moto mpotulungi Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: Uma ria kaputua tauna ngkai ngata ntani ' - na tumai hi Yesus . Wori ' - mi tauna to morumpu , Yesus mpololitai - ra hante lolita rapa ' toi , na ' uli ' :

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: " Ria hadua topohawu ' hilou mohawu ' . Rala mpohawu ' - na toe , ria hawua ' - na monawu ' hi mata ohea , alaa - na rapopongko tauna pai ' natilo ' danci .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Ria wo ' o to monawu ' hi tana ' to watua . Tuwu ' moto hinawu ' toe , aga kaliliu molaju apa ' bangi tana ' - na .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Ria wo ' o to monawu ' hi laintongo ' rui . Tuwu ' rui hangkaa - ngkania hante hinawu ' , alaa - na rui mpo ' upi ' hinawu ' duu ' - na mate .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ria wo ' o hawua ' to monawu ' hi tana ' to morudu ' . Tuwu ' hinawu ' toe , morudu ' lia , wua ' - na ha ' atu ngkani ngkai hinawu ' - na . " Oti lolita rapa ' - na toe , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus : " Hema - koi to tilingaa , pe ' epei lompe ' ! "

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Ana ' guru - na mpekune ' Yesus ba napa - i batua lolita rapa ' toe .

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Owi , Alata ' ala ko ' ia mpopo ' incai manusia ' beiwa - i mpai ' jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Aga hewa toe lau , napopo ' incai - mokoi tudui ' toe . Aga ane ntodea - hana , kutudui ' - ra hante lolita rapa ' , bona madupa ' lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : ` Pe ' epe moto - ra , aga uma oa ' ra ' incai batua - na . Pehilo moto - ra , aga hewa to uma oa ' monoto rahilo . '

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: " Tohe ' i - mi batua lolita rapa ' - ku we ' i : Hawua ' to rahawu ' , tetu - mi Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Hawua ' to monawu ' hi mata ohea mpobatuai tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala , aga Magau ' Anudaa ' mpohilingai ' nono - ra , alaa - na uma - ra mepangala ' , pai ' uma - ra tebahaka ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: " Hawua ' to monawu ' hi watu mpobatuai tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala pai ' ratarima hante goe ' nono - ra . Mepangala ' moto - ra , aga pepangala ' - ra tetu uma moroho , hewa hinu ' a to uma morali ' . Toe pai ' ane rata - damo pesori , mo ' ungkere ' - ramo , uma - rapa mepangala ' .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: " Hawua ' to monawu ' hi laintongo ' rui mpobatuai tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala , aga ntora mpenonoi katuwu ' - ra hi rala dunia ' , doko ' mo ' ua ' pai ' doko ' mporata kagoea ' . Hawe ' ea toe mposesei ' - ra , alaa - na uma - ra kaliliu mpotuku ' Lolita Alata ' ala , pai ' uma ria kalaua - na hi katuwu ' - ra .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: " Hawua ' to monawu ' hi tana ' to morudu ' mpobatuai tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala , pai ' lolita toe rakakamu hante kanoa ' pai ' karoli ' nono - ra . Ntaha - ra mpotuku ' Lolita Alata ' ala , duu ' - na ria kalaua - na hi katuwu ' - ra .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: " Uma ria tauna to mposuwe palita pai ' napopoi ' ba natu ' u hi une ' poturua . Palita bate natu ' u hi pontu ' ua - na bona hini - na rahilo tauna to mesua ' .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Apa ' hawe ' ea to tewuni kana rapopehuwu . Pai ' hawe ' ea to kalerua kana rahungke pai ' jadi ' kahiloa .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: " Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' , pelompehi - koie ' beiwa - koi mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala . Apa ' tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata ' ala , ranotohi nono - ra bona kawoo - woria ' to ra ' inca . Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata ' ala , nau ' ria hangkedi ' to ra ' inca , ra ' alai ' lau - ra . "

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Hangkani , tina pai ' ompi ' - na Yesus tumai doko ' mpohirua ' - ki , aga uma - ra teliu apa ' wori ' rahi tauna .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Ria hadua to mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , tina - nu pai ' ompi ' - nu , oe - ra ria hi mali - na , doko ' mpohirua ' - koko . "

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Tapi ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane to kupotina pai ' to kupo ' ompi ' - le , tauna to mpo ' epe pai ' mpotuku ' Lolita Alata ' ala . "

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , Yesus hante ana ' guru - na mohawi ' sakaya . Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - tamo hi dipo rano . " Me ' ongko ' - ramo .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Bula - ra mosakaya , leta ' - imi Yesus . Muu - mule ' rata - mi ngolu ' bohe hi rano mporumpa ' - ra . Sakaya - ra napesua ' ue , alaa - na neo ' matala - ramo .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Ana ' guru - na hilou hi Yesus mpolike - i , ra ' uli ' : " Guru ! Guru ! Mate - ta toi - e ! " Pemata - nami Yesus pai ' - i mpotagi ngolu ' pai ' balumpa to mekoroi ' toe . Mento ' o - mi ngolu ' , pai ' rano molino nculii ' . Rodo omea - mi .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus hi ana ' guru - na : " Napa pai ' uma - a nipangala ' - e ? " Konce pai ' me ' eka ' - ramo , pai ' momepololitai - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Hema mpu ' u - idi tau toii - e ? Bangku ' ngolu ' pai ' balumpa nahawai ' , ratuku ' mpu ' u - diki - hana hawa ' - nae ! "

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Kaliliu - ramo mosakaya , duu ' - na rata hi tana ' Gerasa to hi dipo rano ngkai tana ' Galilea .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Ria hi ree hadua pue ' ngata to rapesuai ' seta to wori ' . Mahae - imi tauna toei uma moheai pai ' uma - i mo ' oha ' hi tomi . Hi daeo ' - wadi po ' ohaa ' - na . Jau - i kahawia ' . Nau ' rahilu ' - i hante koloro pai ' rante pai ' radongo ncuu , ma ' ala oa ' nadupe ' pohilu ' - na pai ' metibo ' hilou hi kawaoa ' - na , apa ' nakeni karoho seta to mpohawi ' - i . Nto ' u Yesus mehompo ngkai sakaya hilou hi role - na , tumai - imi tauna to kahawia ' toei mpohirua ' - ki . Kampohilo - na Yesus , pe ' au - nami pai ' - i mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa - na . Yesus mpohubui seta toera malai . Na ' uli ' tau toei mpesukui : " Ee Yesus , Ana ' Alata ' ala to hi suruga ! Napa - di - kona pai ' tumai - koe ? Kuperapi ' bona neo ' - a - kuwo nusesa ' ! "

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Yesus mpekune ' - i : " Hema hanga ' - nu ? " Natompoi ' : " Legion . " ( " Legion " tohe ' e , batua - na " moncobu , " apa ' wori ' seta to mpohawi ' - i . )

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Raperapi ' mpu ' u seta toera bona neo ' - ra nawuso hilou hi rala wulou ' laa to uma tepetudu kanala - na .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Uma molaa ngkai ree , ria wori ' wawu mojume hi panapa bulu ' . Seta toera merapi ' hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Piliu - ka - kaiwo mesua ' hi wawu toera mai . " Napiliu moto - ra .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Malai mpu ' u - ramo seta ngkai rala tauna toei , kaliliu mesua ' hi wawu . Pesua ' - ra hi wawu toe , mparampuli - ramo - rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala ' hi rano , mate bonga - ramo hi rala ue .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Karahilo - na to mpodoo wawu kajadia ' toe , mokeno - ramo hilou hi ngata pai ' bonea to mohu ' mpoparata kajadia ' toe .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Toe pai ' tumai - ramo pue ' ngata doko ' mpohilo napa to jadi ' . Karata - ra hi Yesus , rahilo - rawo tauna to biasa - na napesuai ' seta , mohura rodo - imi hi ncori Yesus . Moheai - i pai ' monoto - mi nono - na . Me ' eka ' - ramo .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Tauna to mpohilo kajadia ' toe mpotutura beiwa Yesus mpaka ' uri ' tauna to kahawia ' .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Ngkai ree , hawe ' ea tauna hi tana ' Gerasa toe merapi ' hi Yesus bona malai - imi ngkai ngata - ra , apa ' me ' eka ' lia - ra . Jadi ' mohawi ' sakaya - imi nculii ' hilou hi dipo - na .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Ane tauna to napaka ' uri ' Yesus , merapi ' - i bona ma ' ala - i hilou dohe - na . Tapi ' uma - i napiliu , na ' uli ' - ki :

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: " Nculii ' - moko hilou hi tomi - nu pai ' uli ' - raka retu napa to nababehi Alata ' ala hi iko . " Hilou mpu ' u - imi mpopalele hi rala ngata napa to nababehi Yesus hi woto - na .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Karata - na Yesus nculii ' hi dipo rano , goe ' - ramo tauna to wori ' mpotomu - i , apa ' hawe ' ea - ra ntora mpopea - i .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Nto ' u toe , rata hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa hi ngata toe , hanga ' - na Yairus . Mowingkotu ' - i hi nyanyoa Yesus , naperapi ' bona hilou - i hi tomi - na .

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: Apa ' ria ana ' - na tobine hadudua - wadi , umuru - na hampulu ' rompae , peda ' neo ' mate . Hilou mpu ' u - i Yesus dohe - na . Bula - ra momako ' hilou hi tomi - na Yairus , mome ' upi ' - damo tauna to wori ' mpo ' upi ' Yesus .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Hi olo ' ntodea , ria hadua tobine , hampulu ' rompae - imi ntora moraa ' , pai ' uma ria katontoa ' - na , nau ' wori ' - mi to mpokulii ' - i .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Tumai - imi tobine toei mpomohui ' Yesus ngkai tilingkuria - na pai ' naganga wuntu baju - na . Hampinisi mata mentoda ' - mi poraa ' - na .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Mepekune ' - imi Yesus : " Hema to mpoganga - ae ? " Mancapu omea - ra . Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Guru , apa ' wori ' rahi tauna mpotipuhi - ta , mome ' iho ' - ra - damo mpo ' upi ' - ko . "

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Bate ria - di to mpoganga - ae ! Ku ' inca - le , apa ' ria kabaraka ' to malai ngkai woto - ku . "
