text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Na ' inca tobine toei ka ' uma - na tewunii ' babehia - na . Jadi ' moridi ' - i tumai mowingkotu ' hi nyanyoa Yesus . Napangaku ' hi ntodea kahi ' a - na to mpoganga baju Yesus pai ' kamo ' uri ' - nami ngkai haki ' - na .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Ana ' - ku , mo ' uri ' - moko sabana pepangala ' - nu hi Aku ' . Nculii ' - moko hante kalompea ' tuwu ' - nu . "

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mololita - pidi , rata - mi suro ngkai tomi Yairus to mpo ' uli ' - ki Yairus : " Mate - mi ana ' - nu . Neo ' - pi mposusai ' Guru . "

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Yesus lolita toe , na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yairus : " Neo ' mere ' nono - nu . Pangala ' - mi - hana , mo ' uri ' moto - i mpai ' ana ' - nu . "

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Karata - ra hi tomi Yairus , Yesus uma mpiliu kabua ' - bua ' tauna mesua ' dohe - na . Muntu ' Petrus , Yohanes , Yakobus hante tina pai ' tuama ana ' toei - wadi to ma ' ala mesua ' .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna to morumpu hi tomi Yairus geo ' pai ' motantangi ' , mpotantangii ' ana ' to mate toei . Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Neo ' - pi - hawo geo ' . Uma - ile mate - e , leta ' - i - wadi - hawo . "

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe , rapotawai - i - wadi , apa ' ra ' inca kamate - na mpu ' u - mi .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpokamu pale - na ana ' toei pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Memata - moko ana ' ! "

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Mo ' inoha ' nculii ' - imi ana ' toei , pai ' kaliliu memata - imi . Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Wai ' - i pongkoni ' . "

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Konce mpu ' u - ramo totu ' a - na . Aga Yesus mpotagi - ra , bona neo ' ra ' uli ' hi hema - hema napa to jadi ' toe .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Yesus mpokio ' ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua morumpu , pai ' nawai ' - ra kuasa pai ' kabaraka ' mpopalai hawe ' ea seta pai ' mpaka ' uri ' topohaki ' .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Napahawa ' - ra hilou mpaka ' uri ' topeda ' pai ' mpopalele kareba - na : " Neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . "

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Kako ' ia - ra me ' ongko ' , na ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' - koi ngkeni napa - napa hi pomakoa ' - ni . Neo ' ngkeni boku ba pongkoni ' ba doi . Neo ' ngkeni rontonga ' baju ba lua ' .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Ane ratarima - koi hi rala tomi hantomi , mo ' oha ' hi ree - mokoi duu ' - ni kaliliu hilou hi ngata ntani ' - na .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Ane rata - koi hi ngata pai ' uma - koi ratarima , wae kanipalahii - na ngata tetu , tonta awu to mentaka ' hi palanta ' witi ' - ni , tanda kanahuku ' - ra mpai ' Alata ' ala . "

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus mpotudui ' - ra , me ' ongko ' - ramo hilou hi ngata - ngata . Hiapa pomakoa ' - ra , mpokeni - ra Kareba Lompe ' pai ' mpaka ' uri ' topeda ' .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Nto ' u toe , topoparenta hi Galilea , Herodes Antipas . Kana ' epe - na Herodes hawe ' ea to nababehi Yesus toe , napoka ' ingu ' lau - mi . Apa ' ria to mpo ' uli ' : " Yesus toei lou , Yohanes Topeniu ' tuwu ' nculii ' - imi . "

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' Yesus toei nabi Elia owi mehupa ' nculii ' . Ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' Yesus toei hadua nabi to owi memata nculii ' .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Na ' uli ' Herodes : " Ane Yohanes Topeniu ' , kuhubui - mi wengi tauna mpopata ' wuroko ' - na . Hiaa ' Yesus toe - e lou , hema mpu ' u - i - hawo ? Wori ' - mi ku ' epe to mpotompo ' wiwi - i . " Toe pai ' Herodes doko ' mpohirua ' - ki Yesus .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Rata nculii ' - ramo suro Yesus to hampulu ' rodua toera , pai ' ratutura - ki Yesus hawe ' ea to rababehi . Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' ema ' - ra hilou hi kawaoa ' - na mohu ' hi ngata Betsaida .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Ntaa ' ra ' inca - di ntodea kahilou - rae . Toe pai ' metuku ' - ramo mpotuku ' Yesus . Karata - ra hi Yesus , natarima moto - ra pai ' natudui ' - ra tudui ' to mpotompo ' wiwi Kamagaua ' - na Alata ' ala . Pai ' hema - hema to mohaki ' napaka ' uri ' .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Neo ' limpa - mi eo , rata - ramo ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , agina tahubui - ramo ntodea toera lau hilou mpali ' pongkoni ' - ra pai ' poturua - ra hi ngata pai ' bonea to mohu ' . Apa ' wao ' - hana hi rehe ' i lau . "

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Koi ' - mi to mpopokoni ' - ra . " Ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - na : " Beiwa - mi - kaina ! Apa ' muntu ' lima meha ' roti pai ' rongkaju bau ' uru - wadi to ria hi kai ' - e . Ha kana hilou - kai mpo ' oli pongkoni ' to rapokoni ' - raka tauna to wori ' toera lau ? "

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: ( Kawori ' - ra kira - kira lima ncobu paka ' tomane - pidi . ) Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Hubui - ra mohura mopantuda - ntuda , nte lima mpulu ' tauna hantuda . "

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Ratuku ' - mi ana ' guru - na napa to nahubui - raka Yesus .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Mohura - ra omea , na ' ala ' - mi Yesus roti to lima meha ' pai ' uru to rongkaju , pai ' - i ngkongoa ' hi langi ' mosampaya . Oti toe napihe - pihe - mi roti pai ' nabibe ' - bibe ' bau ' , pai ' nawai ' - raka ana ' guru - na bona rabagi hi ntodea .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Ngkoni ' omea - ramo duu ' - ra bohu . Ka ' oti - ra ngkoni ' , ana ' guru - na mporumpu toro koni ' . Metoro - pi hampulu ' roluncu .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , Yesus mosampaya hadudua - na , pai ' rata ana ' guru - na dohe - na . Napekune ' - ra , na ' uli ' : " Ntuku ' ponguli ' ntodea , hema - a Aku ' toi - e ? "

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Ratompoi ' : " Ria to mpo ' uli ' Yohanes Topeniu ' - ko tuwu ' nculii ' . Aga ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' nabi Elia - ko . Ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' Iko hadua nabi to owi tuwu ' nculii ' . "

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Napekune ' tena - ra : " Hiaa ' koi ' - koiwo mpo ' uli ' , hema - a Aku ' toi - e ? " Natompoi ' Petrus : " Iko - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Alata ' ala ! "

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpotagi mpu ' u - ra , na ' uli ' : " Neo ' ulu ni ' uli ' hi hema - hema ka ' Aku ' - na Magau ' Topetolo ' . "

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi : " Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' kana mporata wori ' kaparia . Rasapuaka - a mpai ' totu ' a ngata , imam pangkeni hante guru agama . Rapatehi - a mpai ' , aga hi eo katolu - na tuwu ' nculii ' moto - a . "

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpololitai hawe ' ea tauna , na ' uli ' : " Hema to doko ' mpotuku ' - a kana mpobahaka konoa - na moto , pai ' kana napaha ' a kaju parika ' - na butu eo - na - - batua - na : kana natuku ' hawa ' - ku nau ' napopate - ki . Oti toe - di pai ' lako ' ma ' ala - i mpotuku ' - a .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Hema to mpentaei konoa - na moto , uma - i mpai ' mporatai katuwua ' to lompe ' . Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa - na moto sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' , nau ' napopate - ki , hi ' a - mi mpai ' to mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Napa kalaua - na tarumpu hawe ' ea ka ' uaa ' dunia ' , tapi ' kao ' - ta moto morugi apa ' uma taratai katuwua ' to lompe ' hi eo mpeno - na .

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: " Hema to me ' ea ' mpangaku ' petuku ' - na hi Aku ' pai ' mpoka ' ea ' tudui ' - ku , Aku ' wo ' o mpai ' me ' ea ' mpangaku ' kahi ' a - na topetuku ' - ku ane rata - apa mpai ' ngkai suruga . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' mana ' u tumai hante mala ' eka - mala ' eka to moroli ' , mehini - a hante baraka ' - ku pai ' hante baraka ' - na Tuama - ku .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Pe ' epei to ku ' uli ' - kokoi tohe ' i : ria - koi mpai ' hi rehe ' i to ko ' ia mate kako ' ia - na nihilo Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' . "

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Kira - kira hamingku ngkai pololita - na toe , Yesus mpobawai Petrus , Yohanes pai ' Yakobus manake ' hilou hi lolo bulu ' , lou mosampaya .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mosampaya , mobali ' - mi lence - na , pai ' pohea - na mewali mengea ' meringkila ' .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Muu - mule ' ria rodua tauna to mpololitai - i , hira ' nabi Musa pai ' Elia .

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Mehini pai ' ncola wo ' o - ra - rawo to rodua toera . Mololita - ra , mpotompo ' wiwi kamate - na Yesus to napadupa ' mpai ' hi ngata Yerusalem .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Petrus pai ' doo - na leta ' luru ' . Kamolike - ra , rahilo - rawo Yesus mehini ncola hante tauna to rodua to dohe - na .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Kaneo ' - ra me ' ongko ' - mi to rodua toera , na ' uli ' Petrus : " Guru , lompe ' lia - ta mo ' oha ' hi rehe ' i ! Agina kibabehi - damo tolu bamaru ' hi rehe ' i . Hameha ' bagia - nu Guru , hameha ' bagia - na Musa , pai ' hameha ' wo ' o bagia - na Elia . " ( Aga uma - hawo na ' incai kahompoa lolita - na . )

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Bula - na mololita - pidi Petrus , rata - mi limu ' mpokamoui - ra . Me ' eka ' - ramo mpohilo limu ' to mpoputu ' - ra .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Mpo ' epe - ra topololita ngkai rala limu ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Hi ' a toi - mi Ana ' - ku to kupelihi . Pe ' epei - mi lolita - na ! "

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Kamolino - na topololita , rahilo - rawo ana ' guru - na , hadudua - na Yesus - damo . Pana ' u - ra ngkai bulu ' toe , ana ' guru - na to tolu toera mengkalino - wadi , uma - ra ulu mpololita hi hema - hema napa to rahilo hi lolo bulu ' toe .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Kamepulo - na mana ' u - ramo ngkai lolo bulu ' , pai ' wori ' tauna mpohirua ' - ki Yesus .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Ria hadua tomane hi laintongo ' tauna to wori ' to mekio ' , na ' uli ' : " Guru ! Tulungi - a ! Pehiloi - ka - kuwo ana ' - ku . Hadudua hi ' a - wadi - ka - kuwo ana ' - ku .

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Ane napesuai ' anudaa ' - i , kaka ' au - au - i pai ' kakapadi - padi - i , duu ' - na mowura ' nganga - na . Neo ' uma ria palaia - na anudaa ' toe mpopedahi - i .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Kuperapi ' - ramo ana ' guru - nu mpopalai anudaa ' toe , aga uma rakulei ' . "

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma mowo - koie ' ! Ko ' ia oa ' - tano mepangala ' - koie ! Mesapuaka oa ' - pidi - koi mposapuaka konoa Alata ' ala ! Ni ' uli ' - koina hangkuja tena - pi kahae - ku dohe - ni , hangkuja tena - pi kahae - na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala ' - nie ! Keni tumai ana ' - nu ! "

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Bula - na ana ' toei momako ' hilou hi Yesus , modungka - imi napakeni seta to mpohawi ' - i , pai ' kakapadi - padi woto - na . Yesus mpopetibo ' anudaa ' , pai ' mpaka ' uri ' ana ' toei . Oti toe na ' uli ' - ki tuama - na : " Ala ' - mi ana ' - nu . Mo ' uri ' - imi . "

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Konce omea - ramo tauna mpohilo baraka ' Alata ' ala to bohe tohe ' e .

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: " Penonoi lompe ' - e ' lolita - ku toi : Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' bate ratonu mpai ' hi kuasa manusia ' . "

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Aga ana ' guru - na uma mpo ' incai patuju - na , apa ' tewunii ' - raka batua - na , alaa - na uma rapaha . Hiaa ' uma wo ' o - ra daho ' mpekune ' - i ba napa batua lolita - na toe .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Ana ' guru - na Yesus momehono ' , ba hema - ra to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - ra .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Na ' inca Yesus napa to hi rala nono - ra . Toe pai ' na ' ala ' hadua ana ' to kedi ' napopokore hi ncori - na ,

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Hema to mpotarima ana ' to kedi ' toi sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' , batua - na Aku ' - mi to natarima . Pai ' hema to mpotarima - a , mpotarima wo ' o - imi Pue ' Ala to mposuro - a . Hema - koi to tuwu ' mengkadingki ' , hi ' a - mi to bohe mpu ' u tuwu ' - na . "

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yohanes : " Guru , ria kihilo hadua tauna mpopalai seta hante hanga ' - nu , aga kitagi - i apa ' bela - i topetuku ' - ta . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Neo ' - i ratagi , apa ' tauna to uma mpo ' ewa - ta , batua - na hira ' - mi to tono ' hi kita ' . "

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Mohu ' - mi tempo - na Yesus me ' ongko ' hilou hi suruga , napomonoa ' - mi bate mpotoa ' - i Yerusalem .

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Nahubui ba hangkuja dua topetuku ' - na meri ' ulu ngkai Hi ' a . Mesua ' - ra to rahubui toera hi ngata to Samaria bona mporodo hawe ' ea - na kako ' ia - na Yesus rata .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Aga pue ' ngata toera , oja ' - ra mpotarima Yesus , apa ' ra ' inca kampotoa ' - na Yerusalem .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Yakobus pai ' Yohanes mpo ' epe karapoka ' oja ' - ra pue ' ngata toera . Toe pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Pue ' , ane nupokono , kiperapi ' apu ngkai langi ' mpomampuhi pue ' ngata toera lau ! "

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Tapi ' Yesus mpe ' ili ' - ra pai ' mpotagi - ra .

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Oti toe , kaliliu - ramo hilou hi ngata ntani ' - na .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Hi pomakoa ' - ra toe , ria hadua tauna to mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Hiapa kahiloua - nu Pue ' , doko ' kutuku ' - ko . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Yesus mpotompoi ' - i , na ' uli ' : " Bangko ' ria pulo ' u - ra , pai ' danci ria peta - ra , aga Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' uma - kuna ria tomi - ku kupoturui . "

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Oti toe , pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus hi kahadua - na : " Tuku ' - a . " Aga natompoi ' tau toei : " Pue ' , piliu - a - kuwo ulu nculii ' hi tomi - ku . Ane mate - damo tuama - ku pai ' - i ratana , bo kutuku ' - moko . "

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesus mpotompoi ' - i hante walatu toi , na ' uli ' : " Pelele ' moto - ramo tomate mpotana hingka tomate - ra . Aga iko - kona , hilou - moko mpopalele kareba Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala . "

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Ria wo ' o kahadua - na mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Pue ' , dota moto - a mpotuku ' - ko . Aga piliu - a ulu nculii ' mpalakana hi ompi ' - ku . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Tauna to ntepu ' u - mi mopajeko ' , uma - hawo lompe ' ane kaka ' ili ' - ili ' - i . Tauna to hewa toe kehi - ra , uma - ra natao jadi ' topobago hi rala Kamagaua ' - na Alata ' ala . "

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Oti toe , Pue ' Yesus mpelihi wo ' o - mi pitu mpulu ' topetuku ' to ntani ' - na pai ' nahubui - ra momako ' rodua - rodua meri ' ulu ngkai Hi ' a hilou hi butu - butu ngata to natara mpai ' .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Tauna to doko ' mpo ' epe Kareba Lompe ' ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki pae to taha ' . Wori ' pae to kana rapepae , aga topepae uma - ra wori ' . Toe pai ' kana mekakae - koi hi pue ' bonea , niperapi ' bona nahubui tauna hilou mepae hi bonea - na .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: " Hilou - mokoi , aga pelompehi , apa ' kuhubui - koi hilou hi olo ' tauna to dada ' a . Koi ' mpai ' hewa bima hi olo ' serigala .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Neo ' ngkeni karepe ' doi ba boku ba sapatu ' ropasa . Neo ' mengkahae mpololitai tauna hi lengko ohea .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: " Ane mesua ' - koi hi rala tomi hantomi , ncaliu ni ' uli ' : ` Kalompea ' ngkai Pue ' rata hi koi ' pue ' tomi ! '

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Ane lompe ' nono - ra pue ' tomi mpotarima - koi , bate nagane ' mpu ' u - ra mpai ' Pue ' Ala . Aga ane uma - rada dota mpotarima - koi , uma - ra mpai ' mporata rasi ' ngkai pegane ' - ni tetu .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Hantomi lau - wadi po ' ohaa ' - ni , neo ' - koi pantoli - ntoli hi kahantomi - na bula - ni mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi ngata tetu . Pongkoni ' napa to rawai ' - kokoi , koni ' - mi - hana , apa ' topobago masipato ' mpotarima gaji ' - na .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: " Ane mesua ' - koi hi rala ngata pai ' - koi ratarima , koni ' - mi - hana napa to ratonu - kokoi .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Paka ' uri ' topeda ' to hi rala ngata , pai ' uli ' - raka pue ' ngata : ` Rata - mi tempo - na , Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi laintongo ' - ni . '

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Aga ane mesua ' - koi hi rala ngata pai ' uma - koi ratarima , hilou - mokoi hi karajaa pai ' mpo ' uli ' :

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: ` Nau ' awu ngata - ni to mentaka ' hi palanta ' witi ' - kai , kitonta bona nihilo . Aga kiwoi - koie ' : neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' ! ' "

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus hi topetuku ' - na : " Ku ' uli ' - kokoi , hi Eo Kiama , meliu pehuku ' - na Alata ' ala mpohuku ' pue ' ngata toera ngkai pehuku ' - na hi pue ' ngata Sodom owi .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: " Silaka - koi to Yahudi to mo ' oha ' hi ngata Korazim pai ' hi Betsaida ! Wori ' moto - mi tanda mekoncehi kubabehi hi ngata - ni , aga uma oa ' - koi medea ngkai jeko ' - ni . Ane rapa ' - na tanda mekoncehi toe rababehi hi rala ngata Tirus pai ' Sidon , ke mahae - ramo - rana medea ngkai jeko ' - ra , nau ' bela - ra to Yahudi . Ke mpo ' ala ' karu ' - ramo rapohea , pai ' mohura - ra mpohawui ' woto - ra hante awu , tanda kasoho ' nono - ra .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Jadi ' , hi Eo Kiama mpai ' , meliu - pi pehuku ' - na Alata ' ala hi koi ' ngkai pehuku ' - na hi to Tirus pai ' to Sidon .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: " Pai ' koi ' wo ' o to Kapernaum ! Ha ni ' uli ' - koina na ' ongko ' napomolangko - koi mpai ' Alata ' ala - e ? Uma - e ' ! Natadi pai ' nahuku ' lau - dakoi mpai ' . "

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mololita tena hi topetuku ' - na , na ' uli ' : " Tauna to mpotarima lolita - ni , batua - na lolita - ku Aku ' to ratarima . Tauna to mposapuaka - koi , batua - na Aku ' to rasapuaka . Pai ' tauna to mposapuaka - a , mposapuaka wo ' o - ra Pue ' Ala to mposuro - a . "

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Ba hangkuja kahae - na ngkai toe , nculii ' - ramo topetuku ' to pitu mpulu ' toera . Goe ' mpu ' u - mi nono - ra , ra ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Pue ' , bangku ' seta wo ' o mengkoru hi kai ' pai ' metibo ' - ra , ane kipopalai - ra hante hanga ' - nu . "

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kuhilo - di Magau ' Anudaa ' - e monawu ' ngkai langi ' hewa kila ' !

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca : kuwai ' - mokoi kuasa , bona ma ' ala - koi mpolisa ule ba lipa pai ' mpodagi hawe ' ea karohoa bali ' - ta . Uma hema to mposerohi - koi .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , neo ' nipokagoe ' kamengkoru - ra seta hi koi ' . Agina mpokagoe ' - koi kate ' uki ' - nami hanga ' - ni hi rala suruga . "

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Nto ' u toe Yesus nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' - i mololita ngkai kagoe ' nono - na , na ' uli ' : " O Mama , Pue ' langi ' pai ' dunia ' ! Mpo ' uli ' - a tarima kasi , apa ' hawe ' ea toe lau nupopohiloi - raka tauna to uma pe ' incai , tapi ' nuwunii ' - raka tauna to nginca pai ' tauna to pante . Apa ' wae - mi konoa - nu Mama .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: " Hawe ' ea - na natonu - maka Tuama - ku . Uma ria haduaa to mpo ' inca kahema - ku Aku ' Ana ' Alata ' ala , muntu ' Tuama - ku to mpo ' inca - a . Wae wo ' o uma ria to mpo ' incai hema - i Tuama - ku , muntu ' Aku ' Ana ' - na to mpo ' inca - i , pai ' hema - hema to kupopo ' incai kahema - nai Tuama - ku . "

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Ngkai ree , bona neo ' ra ' epe doo , me ' ili ' - imi hi ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' - raka : " Morasi ' mpu ' u - koi , apa ' nihilo - mi - koina hawe ' ea tohe ' i .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Apa ' wori ' moto nabi pai ' magau ' owi to doko ' mpohilo napa to nihilo koi ' toi , aga uma - rana rahiloi . Doko ' lia - ra mpo ' epe napa to ni ' epe - mi koi ' , aga uma - rana ra ' epei . "

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Ria hadua guru agama Yahudi to doko ' mpemai - mai kasala ' petompoi ' Yesus . Napekune ' - i : " Guru , napa - hawo to kana kubabehi bona mporata - a katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na ? "

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Pue ' ? Beiwa to nubasa ? "

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Natompoi ' guru agama toei : ` Kana tapoka ' ahi ' Pue ' - ta Pue ' Alata ' ala hante nono - ta mpu ' u , tatonu hawe ' ea katuwu ' - ta hi Hi ' a , tapoka ' ahi ' - i hudu pakulea ' - ta , pai ' hudu inca - ta . ' Pai ' ` Kana tapoka ' ahi ' doo - ta hewa pompoka ' ahi ' - ta woto - ta moto . ' "

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kono - mi petompoi ' - nu . Babehi - mi hewa tetu , mporata moto - ko mpai ' katuwua ' to lompe ' . "

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Aga guru agama toei uma dota radagi , mpoperaha - i kamonoa ' po ' ingku - na . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' : " Hiaa ' hema doo - ku to kana kupoka ' ahi ' - e ? "

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Natompoi ' Yesus : " Ria hadua tomane to mako ' ngkai Yerusalem mana ' u hilou hi ngata Yerikho . Hi lengko ohea - i mpohirua ' - ki toperampaki . Ra ' agoi - i rewa - na pai ' pohea - na , pai ' - i rapao ' duu ' - na neo ' mate , pai ' rapalahii moto - imi hi ohea .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Ko ' ia mahae ngkai ree , ria wo ' o - hawo hadua imam ntara hi ohea toe . Kanahilo - na tauna to weho toei , napelelii ' pai ' kaliliu moto - i .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Wae wo ' o , hadua topobago hi Tomi Alata ' ala liu hi ree . Kanahilo - na tauna to weho toei , napelelii ' wo ' o - i - wadi - hawo pai ' - i kaliliu .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: " Uma mahae ngkai ree , liu wo ' o - hawo hadua to Samaria to bula - na hi pomakoa ' - na . Kanahilo - na tauna to weho toei , metumu ' - mi ahi ' - na .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Kahilou - nami mpomohui ' - i , nabohoi ' weho - na hante lana pai ' anggur pai ' nawewe . Oti toe napopehawi ' - i hi keledai - na pai ' nakeni - i hilou hi tomi torata , pai ' napodoo - i hi ree .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Kamepulo - na na ' ala ' rompepa ' doi pera ' , nawai ' - ki pue ' tomi pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : ` Pewili ' - i - hawo ulu tauna toei hi rehe ' i . Nculii ' moto - a mpai ' pai ' kubayari omea ongkoso ' - nu ane ria pelabia - na ngkai tetu . ' "

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Hudu - mi jarita - na toe , napekune ' Yesus hi guru agama toei , na ' uli ' : " Ntuku ' pomporataa - nu , ngkai to tolu toera , hema - ra to ma ' ahi ' hi doo to rarampaki toei ? "

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Natompoi ' guru agama toei : " Tauna to mpotulungi - i . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Koi ' - moko , babehi wo ' o - kowo hewa tetu . "

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Rala pomakoa ' - ra toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na mehani hi ngata . Hi rala ngata toe , ria hadua tobine to rahanga ' Marta to mpotorata Yesus .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Ria wo ' o ompi ' - na Marta , tobine wo ' o - wadi , hanga ' - na Maria . Maria toei mohura mohu ' hi witi ' - na Yesus ntora mpe ' epei lolita - na .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Hiaa ' Marta - hana , sese ' - i - damo mpo ' urusi torata . Kahilou - nami Marta hi Yesus pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , ha nupokono ompi ' - ku tetui mpelele ' - a mobago hadudua - ku ! Uli ' - ki pe ' mpongawa ' - ae . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Na ' uli ' Pue ' Yesus : " Ee ' Marta ! Sese ' pai ' kawuhe rahi - ko mpenonoi to wori ' nyala .

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: Hiaa ' kakono - na , to paraluu nubabehi hanyala lau - wadi , toe - mi mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala . Ane Maria , napelihi - mi bagia to lompe ' , pai ' bagia toe uma mpai ' ra ' alai ' ngkai hi ' a . "

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Hangkani Yesus mosampaya . Kahudu - na mosampaya , hadua ana ' guru - na mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , tudui ' wo ' o - ka - kaiwo mosampaya , hewa Yohanes Topeniu ' mpotudui ' ana ' guru - na . "

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane mosampaya - koi , uli ' hewa tohe ' i : Mama , pomperapia ' - kai bona hawe ' ea tauna mpobila ' hanga ' - nu to moroli ' , bona Iko jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Wai ' - kai pongkoni ' to kiparaluu eo - eo - na .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Ampungi jeko ' - kai , apa ' kai ' wo ' o mpo ' ampungi hawe ' ea tauna to masala ' hi kai ' . Pai ' neo ' - kai nupelele ' rasori . "

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Rapa ' - na hilou - ta hi doo - ta mentongo ' bengi pai ' ta ' uli ' - ki : ` Bale , wai ' - a - kuwo pongkoni ' tolu mputu ' .

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: Apa ' ria bale - ku to lako ' rata , hiaa ' uma - kuna ria napa - napa to kuwai ' - ki . '

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: " Ha natompoi ' - ta mpai ' hewa tohe ' i : ` Neo ' - a nusaleroi . Wobo ' tehohoki - mi . Ana ' - ku leta ' omea - ramo dohe - ku . Uma - a bisa memata mpowai ' - ko ba napa - napa . '

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Uma mpai ' hewa toe tompoi ' - na . Nau ' bale - ta uma dota memata pai ' mpowai ' - ta napa - napa , aga apa ' uma tabahakai pai ' uma - ta me ' ea ' mperapii ' - i , memata oa ' - i mpowai ' - ta napa to taparaluu .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: " Jadi ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Perapi ' - mi hi Alata ' ala , nawai ' moto - ta mpai ' . Pali ' kaparaluua - ta hi Alata ' ala , tarata moto mpai ' . Neo ' tabahakai mpopebea wobo ' , Alata ' ala mpobea moto - taka mpai ' wobo ' - na .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Apa ' hema to merapi ' bate rawai ' . Hema to mpali ' bate mporata . Hema to mpopebea wobo ' , bate rabea - ki wobo ' .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: Ha ria - koi to mpowai ' ule hi ana ' - ni ane merapi ' - i bau ' ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Ba mpowai ' - i pehede ' ane merapi ' - i ntolumanu ' ? Tantu uma .

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Nau ' hewa apa - mi kadada ' a - nie , ni ' inca moto mpowai ' to lompe ' hi ana ' - ni . Peliu - liu - nami Tuama - ni to ria hi rala suruga ! Bate nawai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hi tauna to merapi ' hi Hi ' a . "

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , Yesus mpopalai seta ngkai hadua tauna to uma howa ' mololita . Wae kanawuso - na seta toe , howa ' - imi tauna toei mololita . Konce - ramo ntodea .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Aga ria wo ' o - ra to mpo ' uli ' : " Kuasa - na tetu - le ngkai Beelzebul , magau ' hawe ' ea seta . Toe - hawo pai ' ria baraka ' - na mpopalai seta - e . "

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Ria wo ' o - ra hantongo ' to doko ' mposori Yesus . Merapi ' - ra hi Yesus bona napopohiloi - ra anu mekoncehi bona monoa ' ra ' inca kangkai Alata ' ala - na mpu ' u - i .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Ntaa ' na ' inca - di Yesus napa to hi rala nono - rae . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ane rapa ' - na ria hadua magau ' , pai ' ntodea hi rala kamagaua ' - na ntora mome ' ewa , bate mogero mpai ' kamagaua ' - na toe . Wae wo ' o tau hantomi to ntora motuda ' , bate pagaa ' - gaa ' - ra mpai ' .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Wae wo ' o hi kamagaua ' - na seta . Ane seta mpo ' ewa hingka seta - na , bate mogero mpai ' kamagaua ' - na seta . Hiaa ' ni ' uli ' - koina , mpopalai - a seta hante baraka ' Beelzebul , magau ' seta .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Aga ria wo ' o doo - ni moto to mpopalai seta . Hante kuasa napa doo - ni tetu mpopalai seta ? Tantu hante kuasa Alata ' ala . Jadi ' , ngkai pobabehi doo - ni moto , monoto - mi kamasala ' pebalihi - ni tetu .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Tapi ' Aku ' , mpopalai - a seta hante baraka ' Alata ' ala . Ngkai toe , monoa ' - mi ni ' inca karata - nami tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi laintongo ' - ni .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: " Seta ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki tauna to parimuku . Ane tauna to parimuku mpodongo tomi - na hante rewa panga ' e - na , uma moapa ihi ' tomi - na .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Aga ane tumai hadua to meliu karoho - na mpo ' ewa - i pai ' mpodagi - i , nahagoi - i hawe ' ea rewa panga ' e - na to nasarumaka pai ' nabagi - bagi ihi ' tomi - na hi doo - doo - na . Jadi ' , ane Aku ' mpopalai seta , batua - na meliu kuasa - ku ngkai seta .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: " Hema to uma tono ' hi Aku ' , kakono - na bali ' - ku - imi . Hema to uma mpotulungi - a mobago , hi ' a to mpobalinai ' bago - ku .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: " Rapa ' - na ria anudaa ' to mpohawi ' tauna . Malai - imi anudaa ' toei , pai ' - i modao ' - dao ' hi kawaoa ' - na mpali ' po ' ohaa ' - na . Apa ' uma ria naruai ' , na ' uli ' - mi : ` Agina nculii ' lau - ama hi po ' ohaa ' to kupalahii - mi toe wengi ria . '

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Ponculi ' - na hilou hi tauna to napalahii - e wengi , nahilo - hawo uma ria to mpo ' ohai ' - i . Tauna toei hewa tomi to molela ' tepehaii , hinapa ' hiloa - na .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Toe pai ' hilou ncala ' - i mpokio ' pitu hingka anudaa ' - na to meliu kadada ' a - ra ngkai hi ' a . Tumai - ramo mesua ' hi tauna to napalahii toe - e wengi , pai ' mo ' oha ' - ramo hi ree . Ka ' omea - na tampai kampe ' ahii ' tauna toei ngkai lomo ' - na . "

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mololita , hadua tobine hi laintongo ' ntodea mpo ' uli ' mpesukui : " Morasi ' mpu ' u - i - hana tobine to mpo ' ote pai ' to mpentii ' - ko ! "

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aga to morasi ' mpu ' u - le , tauna to mpo ' epe pai ' mpotuku ' Lolita Alata ' ala . "

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Nto ' u tauna to wori ' mpotipuhi Yesus , napokaliliu lolita - na , na ' uli ' : " Dada ' a lia tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi . Merapi ' - ra bona kupopohiloi - ra tanda mekoncehi . Aga uma hanyalaa tanda mekoncehi to rapopohiloi - raka . Sampale to rapopohiloi - raka mpai ' , tanda hewa to jadi ' hi nabi Yunus owi .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Hewa Yunus jadi ' tanda to rapokakonce pue ' ngata Niniwe owi , wae wo ' o Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' jadi ' tanda to rapokakonce tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Hi Eo Kiama mpai ' , raja bine ngkai Selatan rapotuwu ' nculii ' hangkaa - ngkania hante koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi , pai ' - i mpotudo ' sala ' - ni . Apa ' momako ' - i tumai ngkai ngata to molaa lia , doko ' mpu ' u - i mpo ' epe lolita Magau ' Salomo to pante lia . Hiaa ' ria - mi hi laintongo ' - ni to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - na ngkai Salomo , aga uma oa ' nipangalai ' lolita - na .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Wae wo ' o hi Eo Kiama mpai ' , pue ' ngata Niniwe rapotuwu ' nculii ' hangkaa - ngkania hante koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi , pai ' - ra mpotudo ' sala ' - ni . Apa ' hira ' , medea - ramo - rana ngkai jeko ' - ra kampo ' epe - ra pololita nabi Yunus . Hiaa ' ria - mi hi laintongo ' - ni to meliu kabohe tuwu ' - na ngkai Yunus , aga uma oa ' nipangalai ' lolita - na .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: " Uma ria tauna mposuwe palita pai ' nawuni ba napopoi ' hante kura . Palita bate ratu ' u hi pontu ' ua - na bona hini - na rahilo tauna to mesua ' .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Mata - ta ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki hulu ' . Ane lompe ' mata - ta , monoto pehilo - ta . Aga ane mogawu mata - ta , hewa mobengi pehilo - ta .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Wae wo ' o - hawo hante nono - ta . Kana tapelompehi mpu ' u : ane Pue ' mpobajahi nono - ta , neo ' tapomobengi nculii ' .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Ane Pue ' mpobajahi nono - ta duu ' - na uma - pi ria kabengia - na , mobaja mpu ' u katuwu ' - ta omea , hewa tomi to nabajahi palita . "

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Hudu - mi Yesus mololita , ria hadua to Parisi mpokio ' - i lou ngkoni ' hi tomi - na . Hilou mpu ' u - imi ngkoni ' .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Konce to Parisi toei mpohilo Yesus ngkoni ' , apa ' uma - i leba ' mowano ntuku ' ada agama - ra .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Toe pai ' Pue ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Koi ' to Parisi - le hewa tauna to mpobohoi ' sangkiri ' pai ' piri hi mali - na - wadi , hiaa ' hi rala - na babo ' moto . Ada agama to kahiloa hi mali - na nituku ' lia , hiaa ' hi rala nono - ni , dada ' a - koi pai ' mpokahina anu doo - koi .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Wojo mpu ' u - koi ! Ha woto - ta - wadi to napajadi ' Pue ' ? Ha uma napajadi ' wo ' o nono - ta ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: Napa to hi rala sangkiri ' pai ' piri - ni wai ' - raka to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra . Ane hewa toe - mi po ' ingku - ni , hawe ' ea jadi ' moroli ' hi koi ' .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: " Silaka - koi to Parisi ! Ntahawe ' hinu ' a to kedi ' hewa tarangkada ' pai ' kula ' pai ' hinu ' a ntani ' - na nipopepue ' hampobagiahampulu ' hi Alata ' ala . Hiaa ' parenta to bohe , hewa po ' ingku to monoa ' hi doo - ni pai ' ahi ' hi Pue ' Ala , uma nisaile ' . Kakoo - kono - na , ke parenta to bohe toe - hanale to kana nituku ' - e , pai ' neo ' wo ' o nilipo ' mpotuku ' parenta to kedi ' .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: " Silaka - koi to Parisi ! Apa ' goe ' - koi mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa ' hi tomi posampayaa , pai ' goe ' - koi ane tauna hi wiwi ' karajaa motingkua ' mpotabe - koi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: Silaka - koi , apa ' koi ' hewa daeo ' to uma ka ' incanaa , to uma ria pompetonoi - na . Tauna mpolisa daeo ' toe , aga uma ra ' incai karia - na anu pope hi rala - na . Lompe ' - koi hi mali - na , tapi ' dada ' a hi rala nono - ni . "

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Hadua guru agama Yahudi mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , hante lolita - nu tetu , kai ' wo ' o to nusalai ' ! "

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Mehono ' Yesus : " Silaka wo ' o - dakoi guru agama ! Apa ' nipopokoloi ntodea hante parenta pai ' ada to motomo . Hiaa ' uma - koi dota mpotulungi - ra ngkolo kinolo toe . Nau ' hangkaju karawe - ni uma nihuko - raka .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: Silaka - koi ! Nipenasa - damo mpakalompe ' daeo ' - ra nabi to owi , hiaa ' ntu ' a - ni moto - mi to mpatehi nabi toera .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Hante pobabehi - ni tetu , nipangaku ' moto - mi kanipokono - na kehi ntu ' a - ni tetu . Hira ' mpatehi nabi to owi , pai ' koi ' mpakalompe ' daeo ' - ra .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Aga monoto lia patuju - na Alata ' ala , na ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Kupahawa ' mpai ' nabi - ku pai ' suro - ku hilou hi tauna toera . Hantongo ' - ra mpai ' rapatehi , hantongo ' - ra rasesa ' . '

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Ka ' omea - na mpai ' , koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi rahuku ' sabana hawe ' ea nabi to rapatehi ngkai lomo ' kajadi ' dunia ' ,

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: ntepu ' u ngkai karapatehi - na Habel owi , rata - rata hi karapatehi - na nabi Zakharia , to rapatehi hi berewe Tomi Alata ' ala hi olo ' meja ' pontunua pepue ' pai ' tomi to moroli ' . Wae mpu ' u - di ! Koi ' to tuwu ' tempo toi bate rahuku ' sabana hawe ' ea kasalaa ' totu ' a - ni toe .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: " Silaka - koi guru agama ! Kakoo - kono - na , ke koi ' - di to mpotudui ' ntodea ohea bona mpo ' inca Alata ' ala . Ntaa ' koi ' moto uma dota mpotuku ' ohea toe , pai ' nilawa ' lau wo ' o - di tauna to doko ' mpotuku ' - e . "

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Malai - imi Yesus ngkai ree . Pai ' ntepu ' u tempo toe , gigi mpu ' u - mi nono - ra guru agama pai ' to Parisi . Toe pai ' rapemai - mai - i hante wori ' nyala pompekunea ' - ra ,

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: pai ' ralelemata ncuu - i , mpali ' kasalaa ' hi pololita - na .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Ngkai kamoncobu - ncobu - ra tauna to morumpu doko ' mpohilo Yesus , mome ' upi ' - ra alaa - na momepopongko ngkawiti ' . Nto ' u toe , Yesus mpololitai ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' : " Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi hi ragi - ra to Parisi . Batua - na , neo ' nituku ' kehi - ra . Apa ' hira ' toe lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi dada ' a moto hi rala nono - ra .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Tapi ' hawe ' ea kehi - ra to tewunii ' bate kahiloa mpai ' . Pai ' hawe ' ea to hi rala nono - ra bate telohu mpai ' .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Jadi ' , napa to ni ' uli ' hi bengi - na bate ralohu hi eo - na . Pai ' napa to niwara ' - ki doo hi rala tomi to tehohoki , bate ratolele hobo ' hi rala ngata .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: " Ompi ' - ompi ' , pe ' epei lompe ' lolita - ku : neo ' - koi mpoka ' eka ' manusia ' to doko ' mpopatehi - koi , apa ' hudu ree - wadi pakulea ' - ra .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: Sampale - di to kana nipoka ' eka ' , Alata ' ala . Apa ' mokuasa - i mpatehi - koi , pai ' mokuasa wo ' o - i mpotadi - koi hi rala naraka . Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi , Hi ' a - mi to kana nipoka ' eka ' .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: " Lima ma ' a rone biasa - na rapobalu ' nte rompepa ' doi see - wadi . Aga nau ' wae , uma ria hama ' aa to uma nakiwoi Pue ' Ala .

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Peliu - liu - nami koi ' . Bangku ' kawori ' wuluwoo ' - ni nabila ' pai ' na ' inca omea . Jadi ' neo ' - koi me ' eka ' . Meliu - pi pompewili ' - na Alata ' ala hi koi ' ngkai pompewili ' - na rone to wori ' .

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: " Pe ' epei lompe ' lolita - ku : hema to mpangaku ' hi doo kahi ' a - na topetuku ' - ku , hi ' a wo ' o mpai ' kupangaku ' hi nyanyoa hawe ' ea mala ' eka Alata ' ala , ku ' uli ' : ` Tau toei topetuku ' - ku . '

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: Aga hema to mposapu - a hi doo , hi ' a wo ' o mpai ' kusapu hi nyanyoa mala ' eka Alata ' ala , ku ' uli ' : ` Bela - i topetuku ' - ku . '

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: " Tauna to ncapuaka - a , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ma ' ala - pidi te ' ampungi sala ' - na . Aga tauna to mporuge ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , uma - pi ma ' ala ampungia sala ' - na .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: " Ane rakeni - koi hi tomi posampayaa pai ' rapakilu - koi hi topohura agama ba topoparenta sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' , neo ' - koi me ' eka ' ba beiwa mpai ' tompoi ' - ni ba napa mpai ' to kana ni ' uli ' .

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Apa ' hinto ' u toe mpai ' , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' moto mpotudui ' - koi napa to kana ni ' uli ' . "

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Ria hadua ngkai laintongo ' ntodea mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , uli ' - ki ompi ' - ku bona nawai ' - a - kuwo bagia - ku ngkai sosora totu ' a - kai . "

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ompi ' , hema to mpo ' ongko ' - a jadi ' topohura to mpobagi - kokoi sosora totu ' a - ni ? "

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Oti toe na ' uli ' - raka tauna to wori ' : " Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi pai ' pelompehi , bona neo ' - koi mpokahina ba apa - apa rewa dunia ' . Apa ' nau ' wori ' rewa - ta , uma ngkai rewa toe pai ' lompe ' tuwu ' - ta . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpololitai - ra hante hanyala lolita rapa ' , na ' uli ' : " Ria hadua topo ' ua ' to tebua ' lompe ' - ki polia ' - na .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Na ' uli ' - mi hi rala nono - na : ` Napa - le ' to kubabehi - e ? Uma - pi liu poropo ' - ku kupontimamahii wua ' polia ' - ku .

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Aa , kurata reke ! Kukero lau - di poropo ' - ku , pai ' kuwangu to meliu kabohe - na , bona hi retu - mi mpai ' pontimamahia hawe ' ea pae - ku pai ' rewa - ku .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Oti toe mpai ' , uma - apa mobago , apa ' wori ' - mi timamahia - ku , hono ' nte ba hangkuja mpae kupake ' . Wae - pi , ntora - ama , ngkoni ' , nginu , pai ' ntora goe ' - a - damo ! '

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: " Ntaa ' we ' i Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' - ki tauna toei : ` He towojo ! Bengi toe mpai ' lau , ra ' alai ' - moko inoha ' - nu . Jadi ' , hawe ' ea to nurumpu tetu , hema - mi mpai ' pue ' - na ? '

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: " Wae - mi katuwu ' tauna to doko ' mporumpu ka ' uaa ' hi dunia ' , tapi ' mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra hi poncilo Alata ' ala . "

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi , neo ' - koi sese ' mpopekiri tuwu ' - ni . Neo ' ni ' uli ' : ` Napa - le ' to takoni ' - e ? Napa - le ' to tapohea - e ? '

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Apa ' katuwu ' - ni meliu ngkai pongkoni ' pai ' pohea .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Penonoi - dile danci kaa ' - e . Uma - ra molia ' , uma - ra mepae , uma ria poropo ' - ra ba wilulu - ra . Aga nau ' wae , Alata ' ala mpowai ' moto - ra pongkoni ' . Peliu - liu - nami koi ' , apa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala meliu tuwu ' - ni ngkai katuwu ' danci , pai ' meliu pompewili ' - na hi koi ' ngkai pompewili ' - na hi danci .

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Napa wo ' o kalaua - na wori ' rahi pekiri - ni ? Apa ' nau ' sese ' ncuu - ta mpopekiri , uma - ta bisa mpodonihii umuru - ta nau ' kampa ' hamengi .

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Jadi ' , ane to kedi ' toe uma nipakulei ' mpobabehi , napa pai ' wori ' rahi pekiri - ni ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Penonoi - dile katuwu ' wunga - e . Uma - ra mobago , uma - ra mpobabehi pohea - ra . Tapi ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi , bangku ' Magau ' Salomo - hawoe ' hante hawe ' ea ka ' uaa ' - na , pohea - na uma hewa kancola wunga toera lau .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Kowo ' hi papada tuwu ' eo toe lau , mepulo rasuwe oti . Aga nau ' wae , Alata ' ala mpakancola moto kowo ' toe . Peliu - liu - nami koi ' ! Meliu pompewili ' Alata ' ala hi koi ' . Jadi ' , napa pai ' uma nipangala ' pompewili ' - nae ?

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: Jadi ' neo ' - koi sese ' rahi mpenonoi napa to nikoni ' ba napa to ni ' inu . Neo ' - koi me ' eka ' .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Hawe ' ea tetu lau to ntora rapali ' tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala . Hiaa ' Tuama - ni hi suruga mpo ' inca kaparaluua - ni .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Kana mengkoru - ta hi Alata ' ala bona Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ta . Ane toe tababehi , to ntani ' - ntani ' - na nawai ' moto - ta mpai ' .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: " Koi ' to mpotuku ' - a , uma - koi hangkuja - na . Aga nau ' wae , neo ' - koi me ' eka ' . Apa ' Alata ' ala Tuama - ni mpopelihi - mokoi ngkai kabula rala - na , napajadi ' - koi ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' , pobalu ' - mi rewa - ni , pai ' oli - na wai ' - raka tokabu . Babehi - mokoi karepe ' to uma bisa moheu ' . Batua - na , babehi kehi to lompe ' . Apa ' kehi to lompe ' toe ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki rewa to nitimamahi hi suruga , to uma ria karontoa - na , apa ' uma ria to mpanako pai ' uma ria anutuwu ' to mposerohi .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Apa ' hiapa pontimamahia rewa - ta , retu wo ' o nono - ta .

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: " Neo ' - koi lempe ' , mo ' inga ' - inga ' oa ' - koi mpopea karata - ku . Agina - koi hewa batua to mpopea karata - na maradika - ra ngkai posusaa ' poncamokoa . Batua toera , sadia - mi pohea - ra , pai ' palita - ra rapobaa ncuu , bona ane rata - ipi mpai ' maradika - ra pai ' - i mpopebea wobo ' , kaliliu rabea - ki .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Morasi ' batua to narata maradika - ra bula - ra mojaga pai ' mpopea karata - na . Apa ' maradika toei mpai ' mpehoo ' abe ' hi hope ' - na , napopohura - ra pai ' natonui - ra .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Morasi ' mpu ' u - ra batua to narata maradika - ra rodo moto - ra mpopea - i , nau ' mentongo ' bengi ba paia - na liu mentongo ' bengi .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: " Poinono lolita rapa ' - ku toi : Ane na ' inca ami ' - mi pue ' tomi jaa hangkuja topanako rata , bate mojaga - i bona neo ' - ra mesua ' .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Hewa toe wo ' o kana rodo ami ' - mokoi mpopea - a , apa ' uma ni ' incai tempo karata - ku Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' . "

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Napekune ' Petrus hi Yesus : " Pue ' , ba hi kai ' - wadi lolita rapa ' tetu - e , ba hi ntodea wo ' o - di ? "

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Pue ' : " Rapa ' - na ria hadua batua to monoto nono - na pai ' to tida mpobago bago maradika - na . Batua toei na ' ongko ' maradika - na jadi ' topohawa ' to mpohawai ' batua ntani ' - na pai ' mpobagi - raka pongkoni ' - ra butu eo - na .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Uma mowo kamorasi ' - na ane maradika - na rata nculii ' ngkai pomakoa ' - na pai ' mporata - i bula - na mpobago bago - na .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi , maradika - na mpo ' ongko ' - i pai ' mpowai ' - i kuasa mpewili ' hawe ' ea ka ' uaa ' - na .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Aga silaka mpai ' batua to mpo ' uli ' : ` Uma - ile sohi ' rata maradika - e . ' Natepu ' u - mi mpoweba ' hingka batua - na ba tobine ba tomane , pai ' - i ntora ngkoni ' pai ' nginu duu ' - na palangu - langu .

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: Ntaa ' we ' i , bula - na lempe ' moto hewa toe , muu - mule ' rata - mi maradika - na hi eo pai ' hi jaa to uma na ' incai . Batua toei raweba ' ntarurua ' pai ' rapetadi hi mali - na , raponcawa tauna to uma mepangala ' hi Alata ' ala .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: " Batua to mpo ' inca moto konoa maradika - na , tapi ' uma - i mo ' inga ' - inga ' pai ' uma nababehi konoa maradika - na , batua toei bate raweba ' mperegea .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Aga batua to uma - hawo mpo ' incai konoa maradika - na , pai ' - i mpobabehi to natao raweba ' - ki , raweba ' moto - i , aga huka ' - na - wadi . Apa ' hema to rawai ' wori ' , wori ' wo ' o to ratuntu ' ngkai hi ' a . Hema to ratonui wori ' , rapomperapii ' wori ' wo ' o - i .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: " Katumai - ku toi , tumai mpobaa apu hi dunia ' . Pai ' konoa - ku bona apu toe sohi ' rapobaa - mi .

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Ria - pidi pontodohakaa to kana kutodohaka , pai ' uma oa ' rodo nono - ku ane pontodohakaa toe ko ' ia madupa ' .

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: Ha ni ' uli ' - koina katumai - ku toi , tumai mpopohintuwu ' tauna ? Uma - e ' ! Katumai - ku toi , tumai mpoposisala tauna .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Ntepu ' u ngkai tempo toi , tau hantina to nte lima rala - na hantomi mosisala : tolu hamali , rodua hamali .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: To tuama mpo ' ewa ana ' - na tomane , ana ' tomane mpo ' ewa tuama - na . To tina mpo ' ewa ana ' - na tobine , pai ' ana ' tobine mpo ' ewa tina - na . To piniana mpo ' ewa minia - na , pai ' to minia mpo ' ewa piniana - na . "

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus hi tauna to wori ' : " Ane nihilo limu ' mehupa ' tono ' hi kasoloa , ni ' uli ' udaa mpai ' . Udaa mpu ' u .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Ane mewui ngolu ' ngkai tono ' selatan , ni ' uli ' mara eo mpai ' , pai ' bate wae mpu ' u .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: He koi ' to lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi ! Ni ' inca lia mpelence tanda hi langi ' pai ' hi dunia ' . Napa - di pai ' uma ni ' incai mpelence napa to nababehi Pue ' Ala tempo toi !

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: " Napa pai ' uma oa ' nipakanoto nono - ni pai ' mpangaku ' napa to monoa ' !

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na ria to doko ' mpakilu - ta hi totu ' a ngata , agina tahuduwukui mpo ' oti kara - kara - ta bula - ta hi lengko ohea - pidi . Nee - neo ' mpai ' nakeni mpu ' u - ta hi topohura , pai ' topohura mpai ' mpotonu - ta hi polisi , pai ' polisi mpopesua ' - ta hi rala tarungku ' .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' : uma - tapa tebahaka ngkai rala tarungku ' ane da koo - ko ' ia oti tabayari waya ' - ta . "

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o - hawo , ria tauna mpololitai Yesus , mpololita ba hangkuja dua to Galilea to rapatehi ntuku ' hawa ' Pilatus bula - ra mpotonu pepue ' - ra hi Pue ' Ala .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Mpotompoi ' lolita toe , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus : " Ba ni ' uli ' - koina wae , pai ' hewa toe rahi kamate - ra to Galilea toera , apa ' meliu jeko ' - ra ngkai hawe ' ea to Galilea to ntani ' - na ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Uma - e ' waetu ! Ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ane uma - koi medea ngkai jeko ' - ni , bate rahuku ' wo ' o - koiwo mpai ' omea .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Wae wo ' o to hampulu ' walu to mate nadungkahi tomi to molangko hi Siloam . Apa ' oo - raka kamate - rae , meka ' ba lue ' ni ' uli ' melabi - rana sala ' - ra ngkai hawe ' ea to Yerusalem ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Uma - e ' waetu ! Ku ' uli ' - kokoi : ane uma - koi medea ngkai jeko ' - ni , bate rahuku ' wo ' o - koiwo mpai ' omea . "

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka lolita rapa ' toi . Na ' uli ' : " Ria hadua tauna to mpohu ' a kaju ara hi pampa - na . Hangkani hilou - imi mpongoa ' - ngoa ' ba ria wua ' - na . Ntaa ' uma - di ria hamehaa ' - e .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki tompodoo pampa - na : ` Hilo , tolu mpae - mi ntora tumai - a mpehiloi kaju toei ba ria wua ' - na , uma oa ' ria . Toki lau - mi ! Napa kalaua - na tuwu ' hi rehe ' i mpe ' oti mara rudu ' tana ' . '

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: " Na ' uli ' tompodoo pampa toei : ` Pelele ' - mi ulu tuwu ' hampae toi - pi Maradika . Kukawahi - damo , pai ' kutaui ' tana ' to morudu ' ngkai mali - na .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Meka ' ba lue ' mowua ' - i - hawo mpai ' mpae boko ' . Ane uma oa ' - i mowua ' , tatoki - imi . ' "

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Hangkani , Yesus metudui ' hi tomi posampayaa nto ' u Eo Sabat , eo pepuea ' - ra to Yahudi .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Hi ree , ria hadua tobine , hampulu ' walu mpae - imi peda ' , apa ' napesuai ' seta - i . Tobine toei bungku ' , uma nakulei ' mokore monoa ' .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Kanahilo - na Yesus tobine toei , nakio ' - i pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ina ' , mo ' uri ' - moko , uma - pi ria haki ' to mpohoo ' - ko . "

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Oti toe najama tobine toei , kaliliu mokore monoa ' - imi , pai ' - i mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Ngkai ree , kamoroe - nami pangkeni tomi posampayaa toei , apa ' Yesus mpaka ' uri ' tauna hi Eo Sabat . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka tauna to wori ' : " Ono eo , eo pobagoa - ta . Hi eo toe , ma ' ala - koi tumai mpopepaka ' uri ' , neo ' hi Eo Sabat ! "

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Pue ' Yesus : " He koi ' to lompe ' hi mali - na - wadi ! Hi Eo Sabat , hema - ta to uma mpobahaka japi ba jara ' - ta , takeni hilou hi mali gimpu pai ' tapoponginu ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Hiaa ' hi rehe ' i , ria hadua tobine muli Abraham , hampulu ' walu mpae - imi nahoo ' Magau ' Anudaa ' . Ha uma - hana ma ' ala tabahaka - i ngkai pohoo ' - na hi Eo Sabat ? "

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Lolita - na Yesus tohe ' e mpo ' eai ' bali ' - na . Tapi ' ane ntodea , goe ' - ra - rana mpohilo hawe ' ea anu mekoncehi to nababehi .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , beiwa kajadi ' - na ? Kajadi ' - nale , hewa lolita rapa ' tohe ' i :

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Ria hadua tauna ngala ' unto ' hawi , lou nahawu ' hi pampa - na . Unto ' toe tuwu ' kaboo - bohea , duu ' - na jadi ' hangkaju kaju , pai ' danci mpobabehi peta - ra hi ra ' a - na . "

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi : " Ane Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' , kajadi ' - na hewa lolita rapa ' tohe ' i :

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Hadua tobine mpo ' ala ' ragi hangkedi ' , nagalo hante lunu to wori ' . Mahae - hae , woke ' - mi omea . "

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Rala pomakoa ' - na hilou hi Yerusalem , Yesus mpotara ngata to bohe pai ' ngata to kedi ' , mpotudui ' tauna .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Ria hadua tauna mpekune ' - i : " Pue ' , ba hangkedi ' - wadi tauna to mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - nae ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ntodea :

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: " Mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' - le , ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki tauna to mesua ' ntara hi wobo ' to jopi ' . Pari - pari - koi mesua ' ntara wobo ' to jopi ' toe . Apa ' wori ' - hana mpai ' to mpali ' ohea - ra mesua ' , aga uma - rapa ma ' ala mesua ' .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Apa ' rata mpai ' tempo - na , mokore - imi pue ' tomi toe hilou mpo ' unca wobo ' . Ane rapa ' - na mokore hi mali - na - pidi - koi nto ' u toe , mpopebea wobo ' - koi , ni ' uli ' : ` Pue ' , bea - kaka - kaiwo ! ' " Natompoi ' - koi mpai ' : ` Uma - koi ku ' incai , ba to ngkaiapa - koi . '

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: " Ni ' uli ' - ki : ` Ei ' ! Ngkoni ' pai ' nginu - madakaie dohe - nue Pue ' ! Ria - moko metudui ' hi rala ngata - kai ! '

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
