text2: " Na ' uli ' - kokoi mpai ' : ` Uma - koi ku ' incai ba to ngkaiapa - koi . Palai - koi ngkai rei , koi ' paka ' to mo ' ingku dada ' a . '

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: " Nto ' u toe mpai ' , geo ' pai ' ntodohaka - mokoi , apa ' nihilo Abraham , Ishak pai ' Yakub hante hawe ' ea nabi , mohura goe ' - goe ' - ra hi rala Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala , hiaa ' koi ' ra ' uncahi hi mali - na .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Wori ' wo ' o mpai ' tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi to jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Tumai - ra ngkai tono ' mata ' eo pai ' ngkai kasoloa pai ' ngkai humalili ' dunia ' , mohura goe ' - goe ' omea - ra mpai ' mpokaralai posusaa ' hi rala Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Ka ' omea - na mpai ' , wori ' tauna to kedi ' tuwu ' - ra tempo toi jadi ' bohe tuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno . Pai ' wori ' tauna to bohe tuwu ' - ra tempo toi jadi ' kedi ' tuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno . "

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o , ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata hi Yesus pai ' mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Malai - moko ngkai rei , apa ' Magau ' Herodes doko ' mpopatehi - ko . "

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Koi ' , uli ' - ki tope ' akalai tetui hewa tohe ' i : Eo toe lau pai ' mepulo , mobago - a - pidi , mpopalai seta pai ' mpaka ' uri ' topeda ' . Pai ' hi eo katolu - na , kupohudu - mi pobago - ku .

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Aga eo toe mpai ' lau , mepulo pai ' romengi mpai ' , bate kana kaliliu - ama mpotoa ' Yerusalem . Apa ' uma - hawo masipato ' hadua nabi rapatehi hi ngata ntani ' - na , kana hi ngata Yerusalem .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: " Ee to Yerusalem ! to Yerusalem ! Nipatehi - ra - koina nabi - nabi , pai ' nipana ' watu - ra - koina tauna to nasuro - kokoi Alata ' ala . Wori ' ngkani - mi kupehuka ' ngkupui - koi , hewa hama ' a manu ' tina mpo ' urui ana ' - na hi une ' pani ' - na , aga uma - koi dota .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca : Tomi pepuea ' - ni napalahii - kokoi mpai ' Pue ' Ala . Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi , uma - apa nihiloi , duu ' - na rata tempo - na ni ' uli ' : ` Une ' - imi to rata mpokeni hanga ' Pue ' Ala ! ' "

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Hangkani nto ' u Eo Sabat , Yesus hilou ngkoni ' hi tomi hadua pangkeni to Parisi . Bula - na hi ree , ralelemata - i mpopali ' sala ' - na .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Muu - mule ' rata hadua tauna to mohaki ' ngkumowu , mowoto witi ' pai ' pale - na .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Yesus mpekune ' - ra guru agama pai ' to Parisi , na ' uli ' : " Ntuku ' atura agama - ta , ma ' ala - ta mpaka ' uri ' topeda ' hi Eo Sabat , ba uma - di ? "

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Guru agama pai ' to Parisi toera , oja ' - ra mpotompoi ' - i . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpojama topeda ' toei , napaka ' uri ' pai ' nahubui - i hilou .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Oti toe na ' uli ' - raka : " Ane rapa ' - na ria ana ' - ta ba japi - ta monawu ' hi rala buwu hi Eo Sabat , ha uma sahu ta ' ore ' - i tumai , nau ' hi eo pepuea ' - e ? "

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Aga uma hema to daho ' mpohono ' - i .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Hi tomi to Parisi toe , Yesus mpohilo ria torata to doko ' mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa ' . Toe pai ' natudui ' - ra hante lolita rapa ' toi .

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Ane rakio ' - ko hilou hi posusaa ' poncamokoa , neo ' mohura hi pohuraa karabilaa ' . Meka ' ba ria - di mpai ' to rakio ' to meliu karabila ' - na ngkai iko .

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: Tumai mpai ' pue ' tomi mpo ' uli ' - koko hewa toi : ` Wai ' - ki hi ' a - hana pohuraa tetu ! ' Me ' ea ' - ko mpai ' hilou mohura hi kadingkia ' - na .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: Jadi ' , ane rakio ' - ko hilou hi posusaa ' , agina mohura - ko hi kadingkia ' - na , bona pue ' tomi mpai ' mpo ' uli ' - koko : ` Bale , mai - ta mohura hi pohuraa to lompe ' toe mai . ' Ane hewa toe , rabila ' lau - moko hi mata ntodea .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Hawe ' ea to mpomolangko nono - ra , Pue ' Ala mpodingkihi - ra , pai ' hawe ' ea to mpakadingki ' nono - ra , Pue ' Ala mpomolangko - ra . "

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Oti toe , mololita wo ' o - imi Yesus mpololitai pue ' tomi . Na ' uli ' : " Ane takio ' tauna ngkaralai posusa ' - ta , ba ngkoni ' mpo ' eo ba ngkabengia , neo ' mpokio ' bale - ta , ompi ' - ta , ba topo ' ua ' rala ngata . Apa ' bate rakio ' wo ' o - ta mpai ' , alaa - na tehiwili - mi kehi - ta .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: Jadi ' ane tababehi posusa ' , kio ' tauna tokabu , tokeru , topungku pai ' towero .

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Ane wae pobabehi - ta , Pue ' Ala mpogane ' - ta mpai ' , apa ' tauna to hewa toe uma mpokulei ' mpohiwili kehi - ta . Kehi - ta tetu nahiwili moto mpai ' Pue ' Ala hi Eo Kiama , nto ' u kanapotuwu ' - ra nculii ' tauna to monoa ' hi poncilo - na . "

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Bula - ra ngkoni ' toe , hadua torata mpo ' epe lolita - na Yesus , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Marasi ' tauna to mpokaralai posusa ' hi rala Kamagaua ' - na Alata ' ala . "

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki tauna toei : " Hangkani ria hadua tauna to mpobabehi susa ' bohe , pai ' mpokio ' wori ' tauna .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Sadia - mi omea , nahubui pahawaa ' - na hilou mpo ' uli ' - raka to rakio ' : ` Mai - tamo hilou hi posusaa ' , apa ' sadia - mi omea . '

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Aga tauna to rakio ' toera , motance omea - ra . To lomo ' - na mpo ' uli ' : ` Lako ' me ' oli tana ' - a , pai ' kana hilou ulu kupehiloi . Merapi ' ampu - a , uma - a tilou . '

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: To hadua - na mpo ' uli ' : ` Lako ' mpo ' oli japi - a lima moko , hilou kuperao mpake ' - ra mopajeko ' . Merapi ' ampu - a , uma - a tilou ! '

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: To ntani ' - na wo ' o mpo ' uli ' : ` Aku ' lako ' oti ncamoko - a . Uma - a bisa tilou . '

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: " Pahawaa ' toei nculii ' hilou hi pue ' susa ' mpowoli ' lolita - ra toe . Uma - pi mowo kamoroe - na pue ' susa ' , na ' uli ' - ki pahawaa ' - na : ` Pesahui hilou hi karajaa pai ' hi porompengaa ohea hi rala ngata . Bawai - ramo tumai tokabu , tokeru , towero , pai ' topungku . ' Hilou mpu ' u - imi - hawo pahawaa ' toei mpotuku ' hawa ' pue ' susa ' .

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: " Karata - na nculii ' , na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki pue ' susa ' : ` Tuama , hawa ' - nu kupopomako ' - mi , aga ko ' ia ihia ' tomi - nu , ria - pidi pohuraa . '

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: " Na ' uli ' pue ' susa ' : ` Hilou tena - ko hi ohea bohe pai ' ohea to kedi ' hi mali ngata , pewuku - ra tauna tumai , bona tomi - ku ihia ' hobo ' .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' , ngkai hawe ' ea tauna to kukio ' toera lou , uma haduaa - ra to mpokoni ' ba apa - apa hi posusa ' - ku . ' "

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Wori ' tauna mpotuku ' Yesus rala pomakoa ' - na . Yesus mewili ' hi tauna toera pai ' na ' uli ' - raka :

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: " Tauna to doko ' mpotuku ' - a , aga uma meliu pe ' ahi ' - na hi Aku ' ngkai pe ' ahi ' - na hi tina - na , tuama - na , tobine - na , ana ' - na , ompi ' - na , ba paiana woto - na moto - mi , uma - i ma ' ala jadi ' topetuku ' - ku .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Tauna to jadi ' topetuku ' - ku kana mpopaha ' a kaju parika ' - na - - batua - na kana sadia - i mporata kaparia ba paiana rapatehi sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' . Jadi ' , tauna to uma dota mpopaha ' a kaju parika ' - na pai ' mpotuku ' - a , uma - i ma ' ala jadi ' topetuku ' - ku .

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: " Ane ria to doko ' mpowangu tomi bohe , napohura - ki ulu mporeke ongkoso ' pompowangu - na , ba hono ' mpai ' doi - na ba uma - di .

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: Apa ' ane mpolia ' natu ' u - mi parawatu - na pai ' uma hudu nawangu apa ' naka ' otii doi - na , hawe ' ea tauna to mpohilo mpotawai - i ,

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: ra ' uli ' : ` Ii , ni ' anu - di doko ' mpowangu tomi bohe , ntaa ' uma - di hono ' doi - nae ! '

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: " Wae wo ' o , ane hadua magau ' to ria tantara - na hampulu ' ncobu manga ' e hante hadua magau ' to ria tantara - na rompulu ' ncobu , kana napekiri ncala ' , ba rakule ' mpo ' ewa - ra ba uma - di .

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Ane na ' inca ka ' uma - na mpai ' hompe tantara - na , molaa - pidi bali ' - na , nahubui - mi suro hilou mpali ' kahintuwuaa ' . "

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Yesus mpokaliliu lolita - na , na ' uli ' : " Wae wo ' o koi ' , ane uma - koi mpobahaka hawe ' ea to ria hi koi ' , uma - koi ma ' ala jadi ' topetuku ' - ku .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: " Poi ' , wori ' kalaua - na . Aga ane mobali ' - mi kapoi ' - na alaa - na uma - pi mopoi ' , napa tena to ma ' ala mpakapoi ' - i ?

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Uma ntoto - pi ria tuju - na , ba raruduhi - ki hinu ' a ba rapopai - pai . Agina ratadi lau - imi . Hema - koi to tilingaa , pe ' epei lompe ' ! "

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , wori ' topesingara ' paja ' pai ' tau ntani ' - na to ra ' uli ' ntodea dada ' a kehi - ra rata mpo ' epe lolita Yesus .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: To Parisi pai ' guru agama mporuge ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Ii , tau toe - idi mai mpobale - raka topojeko ' , pai ' ngkoni ' dohe - rae . "

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Toe pai ' Yesus mpololitai - ra hante lolita rapa ' toi .

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Rapa ' - na ria doo - ta to ria - ki bima - na ha ' atu ma ' a . Ane moronto hama ' a , napa to nababehi ? Bate napalahii bima - na to sio mpulu ' sio hi papada , pai ' - i hilou mpali ' bima - na to moronto duu ' - na narua ' .

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Ane narua ' - pi , uma mowo kagoe ' - na . Ngkai kagoe ' - na napololopongko ' bima - na toei , pai ' nakeni nculii ' hilou hi tomi - na .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Oti toe , pai ' - i mpokio ' bale - na pai ' tongki - na , na ' uli ' - raka : ` Mai - mokoi goe ' dohe - ku . Apa ' bima - ku to moronto kurua ' nculii ' - imi . '

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: Wae wo ' o , ane hadua topojeko ' medea ngkai jeko ' - na , meliu kagoe ' - ra ihi ' suruga mpokagoe ' - i ngkai kagoe ' - ra mpokagoe ' sio mpulu ' sio tauna to monoa ' po ' ingku - ra , to uma - ra - rana mingki ' medea .

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: " Rapa ' - na ria hadua tobine to ria - ki hampulu ' mpepa ' doi pera ' - na . Ane moronto hampepa ' , napa to nababehi ? Mposuwe palita - i pai ' - i mpehaii tomi - na , pai ' napali ' hiapa - apa karontoa - na , duu ' - na narua ' .

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Wae kanarua ' - na , nakio ' - ramo bale - na pai ' tongki - na , na ' uli ' - raka : ` Mai - mokoi goe ' dohe - ku . Apa ' kurua ' nculii ' - mi doi - ku to moronto . '

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Wae wo ' o - ra mala ' eka Alata ' ala mpokagoe ' hadua tauna topojeko ' to medea ngkai jeko ' - na . "

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: Na ' uli ' tena Yesus : " Ria hadua tuama to ria - ki rodua ana ' - na tomane .

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: Tokahudu mpo ' uli ' - ki tuama - ra : ` Mama , wai ' ami ' - ama - kuna bagia - ku ngkai rewa - nu . ' Jadi ' , nabagi mpu ' u - mi rewa - na hi ana ' - na to rodua toera .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: " Ba hangkuja eo olo ' - na ngkai ree , ana ' - na tokahudu mpobalu ' bagia - na , pai ' - i hilou hi ngata to molaa . Hi ria - i mpo ' oti mara doi - na hante kehi to uma tumotoa .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Ka ' oti doi - na omea , ria - mi oro ' hi ngata toe , duu ' - na mpe ' ahii ' - mi tuwu ' - na .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Hilou - imi hi pue ' ngata doko ' ngkoni ' gaji ' . Pue ' ngata toei mpohubui - i mpodoo wawu - na .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Ngkai kamo ' oro ' - na , mehina - imi - hawo doko ' mpokoni ' kano wawu . Hiaa ' uma hema to mpowai ' - i pongkoni ' .

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: " Ka ' omea - na , mokanono - imi , na ' uli ' : ` Topobago hi tomi tuama - kule , melabi lia pongkoni ' - ra . Hiaa ' aku ' - mi - kuna hi rehe ' i , neo ' mate modupu ' - ama .

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Wae - pi , nculii ' - ama hilou hi tuama - ku , ku ' uli ' - damo - ki : Mama , masala ' - ama hi Pue ' Ala pai ' hi Mama wo ' o .

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Uma - apa natao nukio ' ana ' - nu Mama . Agina nuponcawa batua - nua - damo . '

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: Kame ' ongko ' - nami hilou hi tuama - na . " Molaa - i - pidi ngkai tomi - na , pehilo - mi tuama - na . Ngkai kama ' ahi ' - na , pokeno - nami hilou mpohirua ' - ki ana ' - na , nakupui pai ' na ' eki .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: Na ' uli ' - mi to ana ' : ` Mama , masala ' - ama hi Pue ' Ala pai ' hi Mama wo ' o . Uma - apa natao nukio ' ana ' - nu . . . . '

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: " Aga tuama - na mpokio ' topobago - na , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : ` Pesahui , ala ' pohea to lompe ' lia , pai ' heai - i . Uncoi ' karawe - na hante hinci , pai ' sapatui ' wo ' o - i .

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Oti toe , hilou - koi mpohoko ' ana ' japi to morudu ' pai ' nisumale ' . Ngkoni ' - ta goe ' - goe ' !

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Apa ' ana ' - ku tohe ' ii , ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' mate - imi , aga tuwu ' nculii ' - imi . Moronto - i , aga kurua ' nculii ' - imi . ' Kamosusa ' - rami .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: " Nto ' u toe , lingku ' ana ' - na to ulumua ' hi bonea . Ponculi ' - na ngkai bonea , mohu ' - mi hi tomi , na ' epe - hawo to molalowe pai ' moni karamea .

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: Nakio ' hadua topobago - ra , napompekunei ' ba moapa - ra hi tomi .

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: Na ' uli ' topobago toei : ` Tu ' ai - nule , rata nculii ' - imi - hawo ! Tuama - nu mpehubui mposumale ' ana ' japi to morudu ' , apa ' ana ' - na to moronto narua ' nculii ' - mi hante kalompea ' - na . '

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: " Kamoroe - nami ana ' to ulumua ' toei , oja ' - i mesua ' hi rala tomi . Tuama - na hilou mpobawai - i mesua ' .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Tapi ' na ' uli ' to ana ' : ` Mompae - mpae - ama mobago huduwuku - ku mpobago - koko Mama . Uma - kuna hangkania - a mposapuaka hawa ' - nu . Hiaa ' ntahawe ' hama ' a kebe ' - kuwo , ko ' ia - kuna ria nuwai ' - a bona kubabehi - kuwo kagoea ' hante bale - ku .

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Hiaa ' ana ' - nu tetui to mpe ' oti hinyai ' rewa - nu hante tobine to ele ' , wae kanculii ' - na nusumale ' lau - ki japi to morudu ' ! '

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: " Na ' uli ' tuama - na : ` Ana ' , iko - le tida dohe - ku oa ' - ko - kona . Ihi ' tomi - kule , iko wo ' o pue ' - na .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Hiaa ' toto - na lia - ta mosusa ' goe ' - goe ' , apa ' tu ' ai - nu to mate - imi - hana , tuwu ' nculii ' - imi . Moronto - imi , tapi ' tarua ' nculii ' - imi - hawo . ' "

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Ria hadua topo ' ua ' , pai ' ria - ki hadua topobago - na to ngkakamu doi - na . Ria to mpakilu topobago toei hi topo ' ua ' , ra ' uli ' : ` Ntora napewai ' mara - hana doi - nu ! '

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Toe pai ' topo ' ua ' toei mpokio ' topobago - na , na ' uli ' - ki : ` Napa - di to ku ' epe to rapakilu - koko toi - e ? Wae lau , popehuwu - ka hawe ' ea buku popa ' intaa . Ngkai eo toe lau , uma - pi iko to ngkakamu ka ' uaa ' - ku ! '

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: " Mokanono - imi topobago toei , na ' uli ' : ` Napa - le ' to kubabehi - e ? Naleso ' - ama mpai ' sepu ' - ku ngkai bago - ku . Momangki uma kukulei ' . Kakarapi ' - rapi ' , me ' ea ' - a . '

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Ngkai ree na ' uli ' : ` Aa , ria akala - ku ! Apa ' neo ' raleso ' - ama ngkai bago - kue , agina mpali ' ncala ' - a bale - ku wori ' - wori ' , bona hira ' mpai ' mpotarima - a hi tomi - ra . '

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: " Jadi ' ngkai ree , nakio ' - mi butu dua tauna to mo ' inta hi sepu ' - na . Hi to lomo ' - na na ' uli ' : ` Hangkuja inta - nu hi sepu ' - ku ? '

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: " Metompoi ' tauna toei : ` Tolu ncobu lite lana . ' " Na ' uli ' topobago toei : ` Oi sura popa ' intaa - nu . Mohura - moko , uki ' pesahui , hancobu lima atu lite - wadi ! '

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: " Oti toe , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki karodua - na : ` Hiaa ' iko , hangkuja - kowo inta - nu ? ' " Natompoi ' - hawo : ` Hancobu karu ' pae . ' " Na ' uli ' topobago toei : ` Ohe ' i sura inta - nu , uki ' - mi walu atu karu ' - wadi . '

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: " Kana ' epe - na topo ' ua ' napa to nababehi topobago - na to bengku ' gau ' - na tetui , na ' une ' lau - imi , apa ' pante - i - hana mpali ' akala - na bona lompe ' katuwu ' - na . Apa ' tauna to uma mpo ' incai Pue ' Ala , meliu kapante - ra mpo ' urusi katuwu ' - ra hante hingka doo - ra , ngkai kapante - ra tauna to hi rala kabajaa - na Pue ' Ala mpo ' urusi katuwu ' - ra hi eo mpeno .

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: " Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Kana tapake ' ka ' uaa ' hi dunia ' tohe ' i mpotulungi doo , bona ane uma - pi mpai ' mokalaua ka ' uaa ' dunia ' toi , ratarima lompe ' - ta hi po ' ohaa ' to tida duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: Tauna to ma ' ala rasarumaka hante rewa to hangkedi ' , ma ' ala wo ' o - i rasarumaka hante rewa to wori ' . Tauna to uma monoa ' kehi - na hante rewa to hangkedi ' , uma wo ' o mpai ' monoa ' kehi - na hante rewa to wori ' .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Jadi ' , ane uma lompe ' pompewili ' - ta hi ka ' uaa ' dunia ' tohe ' i , hema to mposarumaka - ta hi poko ka ' uaa ' to hi suruga ?

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Ane uma lompe ' pompewili ' - ta hi rewa to rasarumaka - taka hi dunia ' toi , hema mpai ' to mpowai ' - ta rewa to jadi ' anu - ta moto hi suruga ?

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: " Uma - hawo ria hadua topobago mobago hi rodua tua . Apa ' hadua mpai ' nape ' ahi ' , hadua napokahuku ' . Hadua natuku ' - ki hawa ' - na , hadua nasapuaka . Wae wo ' o koi ' , uma - koi bisa mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala , pai ' hamali - koi ntora mporumpu rewa dunia ' . "

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: To Parisi mpo ' epe hawe ' ea lolita Yesus toe . Rapotawai lau - i - wadi , apa ' hira ' toe - mi to mpokahina doi .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Koi ' tetu - mi mpemanoa ' po ' ingku - ni hi poncilo manusia ' . Aga Alata ' ala mpo ' inca ihi ' nono - ni . Apa ' napa to rabila ' manusia ' , napokahuku ' Alata ' ala .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: " Napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Musa pai ' sura nabi bate - na rapake ' - pidi duu ' rata hi tempo Yohanes Topeniu ' . Ngkai tempo toe , rapalele - mi Kareba Lompe ' to mpo ' uli ' Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Pai ' wori ' tauna mpohuduwukui doko ' jadi ' ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na toe .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: Tapi ' butu mela to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Pue ' bate kana madupa ' . Mojoli - pi langi ' pai ' dunia ' mokero , ngkai hamela lolita hi rala Atura Pue ' uma madupa ' .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: " Hema to mpogaa ' - ki tobine - na pai ' ncamoko hante tobine ntani ' - na , mobualo ' - i - hana . Pai ' tauna to mpotobine kabulisa doo , mobualo ' wo ' o - i - hawo .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: " Ria hadua topo ' ua ' . Pohea - na hewa pohea magau ' , paka ' to masuli ' oli - na . Tuwu ' - na butu eo - na hewa toposusa ' - damo .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Hi wobo ' - na ratu ' u hadua tauna to kabu , hanga ' - na Lazarus . Woto - na hobo ' paka ' waka ' .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Doko ' - i - hawo ngkoni ' rupu ' to mohewu ' ngkai meja ' topo ' ua ' toei . Wae - mi - hawo kampe ' ahii ' - na , rata wo ' o - pi dike ' mpojilai ' waka ' - na .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: " Rala - na ha ' eo , mate - imi tokabu toei , pai ' mala ' eka mpokeni - i hilou hi pohuraa to lompe ' hi ncori Abraham . Topo ' ua ' toei , mate wo ' o - imi - hawo , pai ' - i ratana .

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: Hi po ' ohaa ' tomate , ntora ntodohaka - i . Hampengoa ' - na ngkai ree , nahilo - hawo molaa lia , oe - imi mai Abraham , hante Lazarus mohura hi ncori - na .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: Pekio ' - nami topo ' ua ' toei , na ' uli ' : ` Mama Abraham ! Poka ' ahi ' - a - kuwo ! Hubui - i Lazarus mpotubu ' karawe - na hi rala ue pai ' tumai natudohi - ka - kuwo jila ' - ku . Pepa rahi - mi ku ' epe rala apu tohe ' i ! '

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: " Na ' uli ' Abraham : ` Kiwoi - dile ana ' : Bula - nu tuwu ' - pidi hi rala dunia ' , iko mporata hawe ' ea to lompe ' , hiaa ' Lazarus - hana mporata - i paka ' to dada ' a . Tempo toi , tetanta ' u - imi hi rehe ' i , pai ' iko - kowo , mporata pepa - moko .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Hiaa ' etu , hi olo ' - ta ria tumata to bohe lia . Tauna ngkai rehe ' i uma bisa tilou hi retu , pai ' tauna ngkai retu uma bisa tumai hi rehe ' i . '

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: " Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o topo ' ua ' toei : ` Ane wae - di Mama , kuperapi ' bona nuhubui - i Lazarus hilou hi tomi tuama - ku .

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: Apa ' ria - ra - pidi lima ompi ' - ku . Hubui - i Lazarus mpopo ' ingai ' - ra bona neo ' - ra mpai ' tumai hi po ' ohaa ' pontodohakaa toi . '

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: " Na ' uli ' Abraham : ` Ria - miraka sura to na ' uki ' Musa pai ' nabi - nabi ntani ' - na . Mpotuku ' napa to te ' uki ' hi rala sura toe - ra - damo - rawo . '

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: " Na ' uli ' topo ' ua ' toei : ` Ane muntu ' toe - wadi , uma hono ' ! Kana ria tomate tuwu ' nculii ' hilou mpololitai - ra , pai ' lako ' medea - rada ngkai jeko ' - ra ! '

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: " Na ' uli ' Abraham : ` Ane lolita nabi Musa pai ' nabi ntani ' - na uma rapangalai ' , uma oa ' - ra mpai ' mepangala ' , nau ' gati ria mpu ' u tomate tuwu ' nculii ' . ' "

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Yesus mpololitai ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' : " Bate ria to mpopanawu ' tauna alaa - ra mojeko ' . Aga silaka - ra tauna to mepanawu ' toera !

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Agina lau - pi hameha ' watu po ' ahaa ' ratoe hi wuroko ' - ra , pai ' - ra ratene ' hi rala tahi ' , ngkai mpopanawu ' - ra nau ' hadua tauna to hangkedi ' pepangala ' - na duu ' - na mpobabehi jeko ' .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Toe pai ' kana mo ' inga ' - inga ' - ta ! " Ane ompi ' - ta mpobabehi to sala ' hi kita ' , tudui ' - i . Ane soho ' - pi nono - na , ampungi - i .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Nau ' pitu ngkani rala - na ha ' eo - i masala ' hi kita ' , pai ' butu ngkani - na tumai - i merapi ' ampu , ampungi - i - hawo . "

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Ra ' uli ' suro Pue ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , pakaroho - kaka - kaiwo pepangala ' - kai ! "

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Na ' uli ' Pue ' Yesus : " Ane rii - ria - mi pepangala ' - ni nau ' hangkutuno ' - wadi , ma ' ala ni ' uli ' - ki kaju to bohe tohe ' i : ` Mowuka - moko ngkai rei , mentoli - ko ree mai hi rala tahi ' ! ' bate mentoli mpu ' u - i ntuku ' hawa ' - ni .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: " Rapa ' - na ria batua - ta to molia ' ba to mpodoo porewua . Ane nculii ' - i ngkai pehompoa - na , napa to ta ' uli ' - ki ? Ba ta ' uli ' wae : ` Sahu tumai ngkoni ' ' ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Uma - hawo . Tantu ta ' uli ' - ki hewa tohe ' i : ` Porodo - mi pongkoni ' - ku ! Moheai - ko to uma babo ' . Peka ' au - a bula - ku nginu pai ' ngkoni ' . Oti - a - damo ngkoni ' , pai ' lako ' ngkoni ' - dako - kowo . '

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Uma - hawo mingki ' ta ' uli ' tarima kasi hi batua - ta , apa ' muntu ' mpotuku ' hawa ' - i - wadi .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Wae wo ' o koi ' . Ane oti - mi nituku ' hawe ' ea to napahawa ' - kokoi Alata ' ala , uli ' - mi - hana : ` Kai ' - kaiwo - le , batua biasa - wadi - ka - kaiwo . To kibabehi - le , muntu ' to rapahawa ' - kakai . ' "

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Rala pomakoa ' - na hilou hi Yerusalem , Yesus ntara hi sipa ' tana ' to Samaria pai ' to Galilea .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Kamesua ' - na hi rala ngata , rata - mi hampulu ' topohaki ' poko ' mpohirua ' - ki . Ngkai molaa - ra - wadi mekio ' ,

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: ra ' uli ' : " Yesus ! Guru ! Poka ' ahi ' - ka - kaiwo ! "

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Kanahilo - ra Yesus , na ' uli ' - miraka : " Hilou - mokoi mpopehuwu woto - ni hi imam . " Hilou mpu ' u - ramo . Bula - ra momako ' , mo ' uri ' - ramo .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Kanahilo - na to hadua mo ' uri ' - imi , kanculii ' - nami hilou hi Yesus , mpo ' une ' - une ' Alata ' ala napesukui .

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Karata - na hi Yesus , motingkua ' - imi mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi . Hi ' a toei to Samaria .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ha uma hampulu ' to kupaka ' uri ' - e ? Hiapa - ramo to sio ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: Beiwa pai ' muntu ' hadua toei - wadi to nculii ' mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala - e ? Hiaa ' bela - i he ' e to Yahudi ! "

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi mpo ' uli ' - ki tauna toei : " Mokore - moko , pai ' - ko hilou - mi . Mo ' uri ' - moko sabana pepangala ' - nu hi Aku ' . "

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi mpekune ' Yesus , nto ' uma Alata ' ala tumai jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala - le uma ntepu ' u hante tanda - tanda to kahiloa .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Uma mpai ' ria to mpo ' uli ' : ` Hilo , ohe ' i - mi Kamagaua ' - na Alata ' ala , ' ba ` Etu - mi mai Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala , ' apa ' Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi laintongo ' - ni . "

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpololitai ana ' guru - na . Na ' uli ' : " Rata mpai ' tempo - na , doko ' lia - koi mpohilo - a nau ' kampa ' ha ' eo , aga uma - apa nihiloi .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , ria to mpo ' uli ' - kokoi : ` Magau ' Topetolo ' oe - imi ria ! ' Ba ria to mpo ' uli ' : ` Ohe ' i - imi ! ' Aga neo ' - koi hilou mpotuku ' - ra !

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Apa ' ane rata nculii ' mpu ' u - apa mpai ' , karata - ku incana hobo ' hi dunia ' . Hewa kila ' mpohinii raoa ngkai wuntu - na hamali rata hi wuntu - na hamali , hewa toe wo ' o mpai ' hi eo karataa - ku , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Aga lomo ' - lomo ' - na , kana rasesa ' - a pai ' rasapuaka tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: " Hewa to majadi ' hi tempo nabi Nuh owi , hewa toe wo ' o mpai ' to jadi ' hi eo karata - ku Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Hi tempo nabi Nuh , tauna ntora ngkoni ' , nginu , rapoponcamoko pai ' mepoponcamoko , kawae - kawae - na duu ' - na nabi Nuh mesua ' hi rala sakaya bohe pai ' ue mowo ' mpopatehi - ra omea .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Wae wo ' o kalempe ' tauna owi hi ngata Sodom nto ' u Lot mo ' oha ' hi ria . Tauna ntora ngkoni ' , nginu , mobabalu ' , molia ' pai ' mpowangu tomi .

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: Ntaa ' palai - na Lot ngkai Sodom , hompo - mi apu pai ' watu to morea ' ngkai langi ' mpopatehi - ra omea .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Wae wo ' o mpai ' kalempe ' - ra manusia ' hi eo karata - ku nculii ' hi dunia ' mpopehuwu kabaraka ' - ku .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: " Hi eo toe mpai ' , sohi ' metibo ' - koi ! Tauna to mohura hi parawa , neo ' - pi leba ' mesua ' hi rala tomi mpo ' ala ' rewa - na . Wae wo ' o tauna to hi bonea , neo ' - pi leba ' nculii ' mpo ' ala ' napa - napa hi rala ngata .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Kiwoi - dile napa to jadi ' hi tobine - na Lot - e !

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: Hema to mpentaei konoa - na moto , uma - i mpai ' mporatai katuwua ' to lompe ' . Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa - na sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' , nau ' napopate - ki , hi ' a lau - mi mpai ' to mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Hi eo ponculia ' - ku mpai ' , tauna rodua to more ' eli turu ngkabengia , hadua ra ' ala ' , to hadua rapalahii .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Rodua tobine to motongke ' momanyu , hadua ra ' ala ' , to hadua rapalahii . ( (

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Rodua tauna mo ' ema ' mobago hi bonea , hadua ra ' ala ' , to hadua rapalahii . ) ) "

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Hudu lolita Yesus toe , ana ' guru - na mpekune ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Hiapa mpai ' kajadia ' tetu - e , Pue ' ? " Yesus mpotompoi ' - ra hante walatu toi : " Ane ria anu mate , incana moto apa ' wori ' danci morumpu mpokoni ' . Wae wo ' o mpai ' karata - ku nculii ' : uma - a tumai ngkawuni , incana moto mpai ' . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' hanyala lolita rapa ' , mpotudui ' ana ' guru - na bona tida - ra mosampaya pai ' neo ' mere ' nono - ra .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Rala ngata hamola ' , ria hadua topobotuhi to uma mengkoru hi Alata ' ala pai ' uma wo ' o - i mposaile ' ba hema - hema .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Hi ngata toe wo ' o , ria hadua tobine tobalu . Wori ' ngkani - imi hilou mponyanyo topobotuhi toei ngkeni kara - kara - na , na ' uli ' : ` Tulungi - a - kuwo mposinyanyo - ki bali ' - ku . '

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: " Lomo ' - lomo ' - na , topobotuhi toei uma dota mpotulungi - i . Aga ka ' oo - omea - na na ' uli ' hi rala nono - na : ` Nau ' uma - a mengkoru hi Alata ' ala pai ' uma wo ' o - a mposaile ' ba hema - hema ,

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: agina kutulungi lau - imi tobalu toei , apa ' najojo rahi tumai mposaleroi - a . Apa ' ane uma kutulungi - i , uma oa ' mpai ' nabahakai tumai , alaa - na kupo ' oha lau wo ' o - kuwo mpai ' . ' "

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' Pue ' Yesus : " Pe ' epei - koi napa to na ' uli ' topobotuhi toei . Nau ' uma monoa ' nono - na , dota moto - i mpotulungi tobalu to ntora mperapii ' - i .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: Peliu - liu - nami Alata ' ala doko ' mpotulungi topetuku ' - na to mekakae ncuu hi eo - na pai ' hi bengi - na . Ba ni ' uli ' - koina , napeka ' au ncala ' pai ' lako ' natulungi - rae ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Uma - hawoe ' ! Bate napesahui moto - hawo mpotulungi - ra . Aga ane rata nculii ' - apa mpai ' , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ha ria - ra - pidi kurua ' tauna to mepangala ' hi rala dunia ' toi ? "

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' hanyala - pi lolita rapa ' . Lolita rapa ' toi mpotoa ' tauna to mpo ' uli ' hira ' - wadi to monoa ' , pai ' - ra mporuge ' doo .

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Rodua tauna hilou hi Tomi Alata ' ala , lou mosampaya . To hadua to Parisi , to hadua topesingara ' paja ' .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: To Parisi toei mokore pai ' mosampaya hi rala nono - na , na ' uli ' : ` Oo Alata ' ala , mpo ' uli ' - a tarima kasi , apa ' uma - a hewa tau ntani ' - na - - toperampaki , to bengku ' nono - ra , topobualo ' , ba hewa topesingara ' paja ' toei mai .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Aku ' , mopuasa ' - a rongkani rala - na hamingku . Pai ' hampobagiahampulu ' ngkai hawe ' ea pomporataa - ku kuwai ' - koko Pue ' . '

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: " Hiaa ' topesingara ' paja ' toei - hawo , mokore ngkawao - i - wadi , pai ' uma - i daho ' ngkongoa ' hi langi ' . Ntora mporera ' hunamu - nai , pai ' na ' uli ' : ` Oo Alata ' ala ! Poka ' ahi ' - a - kuwo , tauna topojeko ' toi - a ! ' "

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ngkai ree , napohudui Yesus lolita - na , na ' uli ' : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : kanculii ' - ra hi tomi , topesingara ' paja ' toe - imi to jadi ' monoa ' hi poncilo - na Alata ' ala , bela to Parisi toei . Apa ' hawe ' ea to mpomolangko nono - ra , Pue ' Ala mpodingkihi - ra . Pai ' hawe ' ea to mpakadingki ' nono - ra , Pue ' Ala mpomolangko - ra . "

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Hangkani , ria tauna to mpokeni ana ' lei - ra hi Yesus bona najama pai ' nagane ' - ra . Mpohilo toe we ' i , moroe - ramo ana ' guru - na , mpokaroe - ra to mpokeni ana ' - ra toe .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Aga Yesus mpokio ' ana ' toera pai ' na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Pelele ' moto - ra ana ' tetura tumai hi Aku ' , neo ' - ra nitagi . Apa ' tauna to hewa toe - ramo to jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Ane uma - koi mengkoru hi Alata ' ala hewa ana ' , uma - koi mpai ' jadi ' ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . "

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Hangkani , hadua pangkeni to Yahudi mpekune ' Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Guru to lompe ' , napa to kana kubabehi bona mporata - a - kuwo katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - nae ? "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa pai ' nu ' uli ' tauna to lompe ' - a ? Uma ria ntani ' - na to lompe ' , hadua Alata ' ala - wadi .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Nu ' inca moto parenta to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Pue ' : ` Neo ' mobualo ' , neo ' mepatehi , neo ' manako , neo ' mosabi ' boa ' , pai ' kana tabila ' tina pai ' tuama - ta . ' "

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Na ' uli ' tau toei : " Hawe ' ea parenta tetu lau , kutuku ' omea - mi ngkai kakedia ' - ku . "

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus : " Hanyala - pi to kana nubabehi . Pobalu ' - mi hawe ' ea rewa - nu pai ' doi oli - na bagi - raka tokabu . Ane nubabehi hewa toe , bohe mpai ' rasi ' to nurata hi rala suruga . Oti toe , pai ' tumai - moko mpotuku ' - a . "

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Kana ' epe - na lolita tohe ' e , peda ' - mi nono - na , apa ' mo ' ua ' lia - i .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Nahilo - mi Yesus kapeda ' nono - na . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' : " Mokoro rahi tauna to wori ' rewa - ra mengkoru hi Alata ' ala bona Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ra .

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Mojoli - pi hama ' a unta ntara hi wulou ' jaru ngkai tauna to mo ' ua ' mengkoru hi Alata ' ala bona Hi ' a jadi ' Magau ' - ra . "

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Konce - ramo tauna to mpo ' epe lolita Yesus tohe ' e , ra ' uli ' : " Ane wae - di , hema lau - damo to ma ' ala mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - nae ? "

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane hante pakulea ' manusia ' - le , uma ami ' hema . Aga nakule ' moto Alata ' ala mpobabehi to meliu ngkai pakulea ' manusia ' . "

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' Petrus : " Hiaa ' kai ' , kipalahii - mi - kaina rewa - kai , pai ' kituku ' - ko . "

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : hema - hema to mpalahii tomi - na , tobine - na , ompi ' - na , totu ' a - na ba ana ' - na apa ' mpotuku ' hawa ' Alata ' ala Magau ' - na ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: tauna toe - mi to mporata wori ' ngkani hiwili - na hi dunia ' toi . Pai ' hi eo mpeno mporata wo ' o - i katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Yesus mpokio ' ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua mopahantani ' pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Epe - koi ! Hilou - tamo tohe ' i - e mpotoa ' Yerusalem . Hi ria mpai ' hawe ' ea to ra ' uki ' nabi - nabi owi to mpolowa Ana ' Manusia ' kana madupa ' hi Aku ' .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Ratonu - a mpai ' hi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi . Rapopo ' ore ' - a , raruge ' , ra ' uelikui ,

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: raweba ' , pai ' - a rapatehi . Aga hi eo katolu - na , tuwu ' nculii ' moto - a . "

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Aga hawe ' ea to na ' uli ' toe , bate uma rapaha ana ' guru - na . Apa ' batua - na tewunii ' - raka , uma ra ' incai kahompoa lolita - na .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Mohu ' - mi Yesus hi ngata Yerikho , ria hadua tauna to wero mohura hi wiwi ' ohea karapi ' - rapi ' .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Kampo ' epe - na wori ' tauna liu , napekune ' : " Napa - die ? "

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Ra ' uli ' - ki : " Yesus to Nazaret - le liu oe - e lou ! "

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe we ' i , pekio ' - nami towero toei , na ' uli ' : " Yesus , muli Magau ' Daud ! Poka ' ahi ' - a - kuwo ! "

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Tauna to momako ' ri ' ulu ngkai Yesus mpokaroe - i , ra ' uli ' : " Ngkalino - ko ! " Aga hangkedi ' kanapesukui - na mekio ' , na ' uli ' : " Muli Magau ' Daud , poka ' ahi ' - a - kuwo ! "

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Ngkai ree , mentoda ' - imi Yesus pai ' na ' uli ' : " Keni tumai towero toei mai ! " Rakeni mpu ' u - miki . Karata - na hi ree , Yesus mpekune ' - i , na ' uli ' : " Napa to nupokono kubabehi - koko ? "

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: Natompoi ' towero toei : " Pue ' , bona pehilo - a - kuwo ! "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane wae , pehilo - moko ! Kupaka ' uri ' - ko sabana pepangala ' - nu hi Aku ' . "

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Ncaliu pehilo mpu ' u - imi . Ngkai ree , ntora mpotuku ' Yesus - imi , pai ' mpo ' uli ' wori ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala . Hawe ' ea tauna to mpohilo kajadia ' toe , mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala - ramo .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Nto ' u karata - na Yesus hi ngata Yerikho , momako ' ncuu - i ntara rala ngata toe .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Hi ngata toe , ria hadua topo ' ua ' to mpokapalai ' topesingara ' paja ' , hanga ' - na Zakheus .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Doko ' - i - hawo mpohilo beiwa lence - na Yesus . Aga uma - i bisa mpohilo apa ' wori ' rahi tauna , bo hi ' a he ' e tauna to dingki ' .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Jadi ' , pokeno - nami mpori ' uluhi ntodea , pai ' - i ngkahe ' kaju ara bona ma ' ala - i - hawo mpopanto ' Yesus ane liu - ipi hi ree .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Kaliu - na Yesus hi ree , pengoa ' - nami pai ' na ' uli ' : " Zakheus , pesahui mana ' u ! Apa ' eo toe lau , kana mehani - a hi tomi - nu . "

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Napesahui mpu ' u - mi - hawo Zakheus mana ' u , pai ' goe ' - i mpotarima Yesus hi tomi - na .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Kapehilo - ra ntodea hilou - i Yesus hi tomi Zakheus , ngkunuti - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Ii , napa - di pai ' mencua ' hi tomi topojeko ' - i - hanae ! "

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Bula - na Pue ' Yesus hi tomi Zakheus , mokore - imi Zakheus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , bagi ntongo ' ngkai rewa - ku kuwai ' - raka tokabu , pai ' hema - hema to kubagiu , kupoponculi ' opo ' ngkani ngkai to kubagiu - raka . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Hi eo toe lau , tauna hi tomi toi tebahaka ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra , apa ' Zakheus toii , muli Abraham wo ' o - i - hawo .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Apa ' toe - mile pai ' tumai - ae , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' . Tumai - a mpopali ' tauna to molaa ngkai Alata ' ala , pai ' mpohore - ra ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra . "

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Neo ' rata - imi Yesus hi Yerusalem , toe pai ' wori ' tauna mpo ' uli ' neo ' rata mpu ' u - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Jadi ' , bula ntodea mpe ' epei lolita - na , na ' umpui ' wo ' o - mi lolita - na hante hanyala lolita rapa ' .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Ria hadua maradika mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa , lou ralanti ' jadi ' magau ' pai ' nculii ' .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Jadi ' , kako ' ia - na me ' ongko ' , mpokio ' - i hampulu ' pahawaa ' - na pai ' nawai ' - ra hore - hore hampepa ' doi bulawa . Na ' uli ' maradika toei : ` Mobabalu ' - koi hante doi to kuwai ' - kokoi tetu lingku ' - ku hilou . '

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Aga hi ngata maradika toe , ria wo ' o - rawo tauna to mpokahuku ' - i . Pe ' ongko ' - na maradika tohe ' e , rapahawa ' suro hilou mpotuku ' - i pai ' mpo ' uli ' : ` Oja ' - ka - kaina maradika tetu jadi ' magau ' - kai ! '

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: " Aga ra ' ongko ' moto - i jadi ' magau ' , pai ' nculii ' - imi hilou hi ngata - na . Karata - na hi ngata , nakio ' - ramo pahawaa ' - na mpohirua ' - ki , napongincai kahangkuja - nami rasi ' to rarata .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: To lomo ' - na rata pai ' na ' uli ' : ` Magau ' , doi bulawa to hampepa ' to nuwai ' - ka , ria - mi ana ' - na hampulu ' . '

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: " Na ' uli ' magau ' toei : ` Lompe ' - mi , iko pahawaa ' to lompe ' . Wae - pi , apa ' monoa ' - ko hi to hangkedi ' , ku ' ongko ' - moko jadi ' topohawa ' to mpohawai ' hampulu ' ngata . '

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: " Pahawaa ' karodua - na rata wo ' o pai ' mpo ' uli ' : ` Magau ' , doi bulawa to hampepa ' to nuwai ' - ka , jadi ' lima mpepa ' - mi . '

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: " Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi magau ' hi karodua - na tohe ' ei : ` Iko wo ' o ku ' ongko ' jadi ' topohawa ' hi lima ngata . '

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: " Ngkai ree , rata wo ' o - imi - hawo pahawaa ' kahadua - na . Na ' uli ' : ` Oi - mi doi - nu Magau ' . Kutimamahi lompe ' , kuputu ' hante lenco .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Me ' eka ' - a hi Magau ' , apa ' ku ' inca kasoa - nu . Nupepae to bela - kowo hinu ' a - nu , nu ' ala ' to uma nukarokoi . '

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: " Na ' uli ' magau ' mpo ' uli ' - ki : ` Iko pahawaa ' to dada ' a ! Ane nu ' inca kasoa - ku , ane nu ' inca kampepae - ku to bela hinu ' a - ku , pai ' kampo ' ala ' - ku to uma kukarokoi ,

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: napa pai ' doi - ku uma nupopesua ' hi bank , bona ane rata - apa , ku ' ala ' hante ana ' - na ! '

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi hi tauna to mokore hi ncori - na : ` Ala ' doi to hi tauna tetui , pai ' wai ' - ki to ria - ki hampulu ' . '

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: " Ingu ' - ramo to napahawa ' toera , ra ' uli ' : ` Napa pai ' hewa tetu , Magau ' ? Apa ' ria - miki - hana hampulu ' mpepa ' ! '

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: " Na ' uli ' magau ' : ` Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Tauna to ma ' ala rasarumaka hante anu to rawai ' - ki , rawai ' tena - i - pidi . Tapi ' tauna to uma rasarumaka , anu hangkedi ' to ria hi hi ' a , ra ' alai ' lau - i .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Pai ' wae lau , keni - ramo tumai bali ' - ku to mpoka ' oja ' - a jadi ' magau ' - ra . Patehi - ramo hi rehe ' i bona kuhilo ! ' "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' hawe ' ea toe , pomako ' - nami meri ' ulu ngkai doo - na hilou hi Yerusalem .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Mohu ' - ramo hi ngata Betfage pai ' Betania hi bulu ' Zaitun , nahubui rodua ana ' guru - na mako ' meri ' ulu .

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - mokoi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai . Ane mesua ' - pokoi hi rala ngata , nihilo mpai ' hama ' a ana ' keledai to tehoo ' . Keledai toe ko ' ia hangkania rahawi ' . Bongka koloro - na pai ' keni - i tumai .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ane ria tauna mpekune ' - koi napa pai ' nibongka - i , uli ' : ` Apa ' Pue ' mparaluu - i . ' "

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - ramo ana ' guru - na to rodua tohe ' era , pai ' rarata bate hewa to na ' uli ' - raka Yesus .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Bula - ra mpobongka keledai toe , mepekune ' - mi pue ' - na : " Napa pai ' nibongka keledai tetu - e ? "

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ratompoi ' : " Apa ' Pue ' mparaluu - i . "

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Karakeni - nami hilou hi Yesus , ralampii hante baju - ra , pai ' rapopehawi ' - i Yesus .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Kaliu - na Yesus mpohawi ' keledai tohe ' e , tauna mpokodo baju - ra hi mata ohea , tanda pebila ' - ra .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Mohu ' - mi hi ngata Yerusalem , hi pana ' ua - na hi bulu ' Zaitun , hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na to wori ' toe ntepu ' u mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala . Mogora - ra - damo nakeni kagoe ' nono - ra sabana hawe ' ea anu mekoncehi to rahilo .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: Ra ' uli ' hi rala pe ' une ' - ra : Pue ' Ala mpogane ' Magau ' to tumai mpokeni hanga ' - na ! " Une ' - imi Pue ' Ala to hi suruga , apa ' nawai ' - tamo kalompea ' . "

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Ngkai ree , ba hangkuja dua to Parisi to hi olo ' tauna to wori ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , tagi - ramo ana ' guru - nu bona neo ' - ra mpo ' uli ' hewa tetu ! "

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma - e ' ! Apa ' ane mengkalino - ra ana ' guru - ku , watu toe lau - ramo mpai ' to mogora mpo ' une ' - a . "

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Kamoo - mohua ' - imi Yesus hi Yerusalem , duu ' - na mpohilo - i ngata toe . Kageo ' - nami mpokageoi ' ngata toe .

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Mpe ' ahii ' - koi to Yerusalem ! Uma mowo kalompe ' - na ane ke ni ' inca napa to ngkeni - kokoi kalompea ' tuwu ' hi eo toe lau . Aga hawe ' ea toe teleru ngkai mata - ni .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Rata mpai ' tempo - na , bali ' - ni mpanga ' ei ngata - ni , ratipuhi ntololikia hante wala , duu ' - na uma - pi ria ohea metibo ' .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Raropuhi mpai ' ngata - ni hante hawe ' ea ihi ' - na , duu ' - na uma - pi ria watu to bate pomeduncu - na . Apa ' uma - koina nisaile ' karata - na Pue ' Ala doko ' mpotulungi - koi . "

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mesua ' hi berewe Tomi Alata ' ala pai ' - i mpopalai tauna to mobabalu ' hi ree .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' , Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Tomi - ku , tomi posampayaa . ' Hiaa ' koi ' - koina , niponcawa tomi toperampaki - di ! "

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Butu eo - na Yesus metudui ' hi Tomi Alata ' ala . Imam pangkeni hante guru agama pai ' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani ' - na mpali ' akala - ra doko ' mpatehi - i ,

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: aga uma ria ohea - ra mpobabehi anu hi nono - ra , apa ' lutu - ramo ntodea mpe ' epei lolita - na .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo Yesus metudui ' pai ' mparata Kareba Lompe ' hi wori ' tauna hi Tomi Alata ' ala . Muu - mule ' rata - ramo imam pangkeni hante guru agama pai ' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani ' - na . Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus :

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: " Uli ' - kakai pe ' ngkaiapa huraa - nu mpobabehi hawe ' ea tetu hi Tomi Alata ' ala ! Hema to mpowai ' - ko kuasa tetu - e ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' , ria wo ' o - kuwo pompekunea ' - ku hi koi ' .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Uli ' - ka pe ' , ngkaiapa kuasa - na Yohanes Topeniu ' mponiu ' tauna ? Ngkai Alata ' ala - di , ba ngkai manusia ' - di ? "

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Momepololitai - ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa - tale ' mpotompoi ' - ie ? Ane ta ' uli ' ngkai Alata ' ala kuasa - na , na ' uli ' mpai ' : ` Ane wae , napa pai ' uma - i nipangala ' ? '

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Hiaa ' ane ta ' uli ' ngkai manusia ' - wadi kuasa - na , rawatuhi - ta mpai ' ntodea toera lau , apa ' hawe ' ea - ra mpo ' uli ' Yohanes hadua nabi . "

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Toe pai ' ratompoi ' : " Uma ki ' incai kangkaiapa kuasa - na . "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane wae , uma wo ' o - kuwo ku ' uli ' - kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa - ku mpobabehi toe lau ! "

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpololitai ntodea , mpo ' uli ' - raka lolita rapa ' tohe ' i : " Ria tau hadua mpohu ' ai bonea - na hante anggur , oti toe napewai ' bonea - na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna , pai ' hilou - imi hi ngata to molaa , pai ' mahae - i tida hi ria .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Rata - mi tempo mpohopu ' wua ' anggur , napahawa ' hadua batua - na hilou mperapi ' bagia - na hi tompodoo bonea - na toera . Tapi ' tompodoo bonea - na toera mpopao ' suro tetu pai ' - i rapopalai mara .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Oti toe , pue ' bonea toei mpopahawa ' tena wo ' o - pi hadua batua . Aga rapao ' wo ' o - i - wadi - hawo , ralibui ' pai ' rapopalai mara .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Oti toe wo ' o , nahubui tena batua katolu - na . Aga raserohi wo ' o - i - wadi pai ' rapetadi hi mali bonea .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: " Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' - mi pue ' bonea toei : ` Napa - le ' to kubabehi - e ? Agina ana ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' moto lau - mi kupahawa ' hilou , apa ' bate rapengkorui - ile mpai ' . '

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: " Ntaa ' we ' i , karahilo - na tompodoo bonea toera ana ' pue ' bonea tohe ' ei , mohawa ' - ramo , ra ' uli ' : ` Etu - mi tumai ana ' - na ! Hi ' a mpai ' to jadi ' pue ' bonea tohe ' i - e . Kita tapatehi - i bona bonea - na toi kita ' - mi pue ' - na . '

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Ngkai ree , radii ' - imi hilou hi mali bonea pai ' - i rapatehi . " Jadi ' , napa mpai ' to nababehi pue ' bonea toei hi tauna to mpodoo bonea - na ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Bate tumai - ile mpopatehi - ra , pai ' nawai ' bonea - na hi tau ntani ' - na . " Kara ' epe - na ntodea lolita rapa ' tohe ' e , ra ' uli ' - mi : " Neo ' mpu ' u - kona jadi ' hewa tetu - e ' ! "

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Yesus mponaa - ra pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Hiaa ' toe - mile batua - na walatu to hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : ` Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi , watu toe lau - mi to jadi ' poko parawatu . '

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Hewa kura to monawu ' hi watu mopengka , hewa kura to napitihi watu moreja ' , hewa toe wo ' o mpai ' tauna to mposapuaka - a . "

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Guru agama pai ' imam pangkeni mpo ' inca kahira ' - na to natoa ' Yesus hante lolita rapa ' - na toe we ' i . Toe pai ' ria - mi nono - ra doko ' mpohoko ' - i hi jaa toe wo ' o . Aga uma - ra daho ' , apa ' mpoka ' eka ' - ra ntodea .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Jadi ' rapali ' loga to lompe ' . Mpopahawa ' - ra tauna hilou mpolelemata - i . Tauna toera , ntani ' hewa tauna to monoa ' nono - ra , tapi ' patuju - ra mpo ' opa kasala ' lolita - na , bona rapakilu - i hi gubernur .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Karata - ra hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' - mi to rapahawa ' toera : " Guru , ki ' inca hawe ' ea lolita - nu pai ' tudui ' - nu makono omea . Metudui ' - ko hante kalonto ' - lonto ' - na mpo ' uli ' napa konoa Pue ' Ala hi manusia ' , pai ' uma - ko mpelence tauna .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Jadi ' , toe pai ' kiperapi ' bona nu ' uli ' - kakai Guru : ntuku ' atura agama - ta , ba ma ' ala moto - ta mpobayari paja ' hi Kaisar , ba uma - di ? "

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Yesus mpo ' inca pepanawu ' - ra . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka :

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: " Popohiloi - a ulu doi hampepa ' ! Lence hema pai ' hanga ' hema to hi doi tetu - e ? " Ratompoi ' : " Lence pai ' hanga ' Kaisar . "

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane wae - di , wai ' - ki Kaisar napa to kasipato ' - na rawai ' - ki Kaisar , pai ' wai ' - ki Alata ' ala napa to kasipato ' - na rawai ' - ki Alata ' ala . "

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Ka ' omea - na madagi - ramo bali ' Yesus toera . Uma raruai ' nau ' hanyalaa sala ' lolita - na hi nyanyoa ntodea . Konce - ra mpo ' epe tompoi ' - na , toe pai ' ngkalino - ramo .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Ba hangkuja dua tauna to mpotuku ' tudui ' to Saduki rata hi Yesus . To Saduki toera , pangkeni agama Yahudi to ncapuaka tauna to mate tuwu ' nculii ' hi eo mpeno . Karata to Saduki toera , ra ' uli ' - ki Yesus :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Guru , nabi Musa mpo ' uki ' hi rala buku atura hewa toi : ane hadua tomane mate hiaa ' uma - ki ria ana ' - na , pudupuhe - na kana mpotobine balu - na , bona ria - ki - hawo muli tomate toei .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Jadi ' , ria pitu ntali ompi ' , paka ' tomane . To ulumua ' motobinei , mate - i hante uma ria ana ' - na .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Tu ' ai - na mpotobine balu - na , aga mate wo ' o - i - wadi , ko ' ia napoka ' alai mo ' anai ' .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Wae oa ' - mi to jadi ' hi katolu - na duu ' - na hi kapitu - na . Mate omea - ra hante uma ria ana ' - ra .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Ka ' omea - na mate wo ' o - imi - hawo tobine toei .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Jadi ' , hi eo mpeno , ane tuwu ' nculii ' mpu ' u - di hawe ' ea tomate - e , hema - ramo mpai ' pue ' tobine toei , apa ' pitu - ramo mpotobine - i . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Tauna hi dunia ' toi motobinei pai ' motomanei .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Aga tauna to napotuwu ' nculii ' Pue ' Ala pai ' to masipato ' mporata bagia hi dunia ' to bo ' u mpai ' , uma - rapa - hana motobinei ba motomanei .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
