text2: Apa ' tuwu ' - ra hewa tuwu ' mala ' eka , uma - rapa mate . Ana ' Alata ' ala - ramo , apa ' napotuwu ' nculii ' - ramo Alata ' ala .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: " Ane katuwu ' - ra nculii ' tomate - e , nabi Musa moto to mpakanoto katuwu ' - ra nculii ' . Hi rala jarita julumpu to jela ' , Musa mpokahangai ' Pue ' Ala hewa toi : ` Alata ' ala to napue ' Abraham , to napue ' Ishak , pai ' to napue ' Yakub . '

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Jadi ' , ngkai lolita - na nabi Musa toe , monoto - mi ta ' inca katuwu ' - ra moto Abraham , Ishak pai ' Yakub . Apa ' bela tauna to mate to mepue ' hi Alata ' ala , tauna to tuwu ' - hana to mpopue ' - i . Apa ' hi Alata ' ala hawe ' ea tauna tuwu ' . "

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Oti toe , ba hangkuja dua guru agama mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Lompe ' lia petompoi ' - nu Guru . "

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Ngkai ree , uma - rapa daho ' mepekune ' ba napa - napa hi Yesus .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Ngkai ree , mepekune ' wo ' o - imi - hawo Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka guru agama toera : " Beiwa pai ' ra ' uli ' Magau ' Topetolo ' muli - na Magau ' Daud ?

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Hiaa ' bo Daud moto - hawo mpokahangai ' - i Pue ' - na . Hi rala Buku Rona ' na ' uli ' : Pue ' Ala mpo ' uli ' - ki Pue ' - ku : ` Mohura - moko hi mali ngka ' ana - ku duu ' - na kupopengkoru hawe ' ea bali ' - nu hi Iko . '

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Bula tauna mpe ' epei lolita - na Yesus toe we ' i , napololitai ana ' guru - na , na ' uli ' :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: " Pelompehi - koi , neo ' - koi mpenau ' kehi - ra guru agama . Apa ' goe ' - ra modao ' mpopake ' baju to moloe , goe ' - ra ane tauna hi wiwi ' karajaa motingkua ' mpotabe - ra . Goe ' - ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa ' hi tomi posampayaa , goe ' - ra ane rapopohura - ra hi pohuraa to lompe ' hi posusaa ' .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Mpobagiu - ra tobine tobalu pai ' rahagoi tomi - ra . Pai ' - ra mpowunii ' kadada ' a gau ' - ra tohe ' e hante mosampaya rapomoloe - loe . Huku ' - ra motomo lia mpai ' . "

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , Yesus mpohilo topo ' ua ' mpopuna ' doi hi rala peti ' pompunaa ' doi pepue ' .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Mpohilo wo ' o - i hadua tobalu to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - na mpopuna ' rompepa ' doi ngkala .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : tobalu to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - na tohe ' e mai , meliu pewai ' - na ngkai pewai ' hawe ' ea tauna toera lau .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Apa ' hira ' mewai ' ngkai labi ka ' uaa ' - ra . Tapi ' tobine toei , nau ' hewa apa - mi kampe ' ahii ' - na , napewai ' omea - mi - hana to ria hi hi ' a , to naparaluu - hawo hi katuwu ' - na . "

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Nto ' u toe , ria tauna mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Lompe ' lia Tomi Alata ' ala toi , apa ' rawangu hante watu to ncola pai ' rarampai hante rewa to rapopepue ' hi Pue ' Ala . " Toe pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: " Rata mpai ' tempo - na hawe ' ea to nihilo toe lau ragero , uma - pi mpai ' ria hamehaa ' watu to bate pomeduncu - na . "

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Ngkai ree , mepekune ' - ra ana ' guru - na mpekune ' - i : " Guru , nto ' uma mpai ' kadupa ' - na to nu ' uli ' toe - e we ' i ? Pai ' napa mpai ' to jadi ' tanda ane neo ' madupa ' - pi ? "

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Pelompehi , neo ' - koi ma ' ala rabagiu . Apa ' wori ' mpai ' tauna to mehupa ' to mpo ' uli ' kahira ' - na Magau ' Topetolo ' . Ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' karata - na mpu ' u Eo Kiama . Aga neo ' nituku ' - ra .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Neo ' wo ' o - koi me ' eka ' mpo ' epe kareba to mpo ' uli ' wori ' tauna manga ' e pai ' mpo ' ewa topoparenta . Apa ' hawe ' ea tohe ' e kana jadi ' mperi ' ulu . Tapi ' ko ' ia - hawo rata mpu ' u - mi kahudua dunia ' . "

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpokaliliu lolita - na , na ' uli ' : " Hi eo toe mpai ' , wori ' ngata mosipanga ' ei , magau ' hadua mpo ' ewa magau ' kahadua - na .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Ria mpai ' linu bohe , pai ' hiapa - apa ria haki ' ropu ' pai ' oro ' . Pai ' hi langi ' ria tanda bohe to mewulungahi .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Aga kako ' ia - na hawe ' ea toe jadi ' , koi ' mpai ' rahoko ' pai ' rabalinai ' . Rapakilu - koi hi rala tomi posampayaa , pai ' - koi ratarungku ' . Rabua ' - koi hi magau ' pai ' hi topoparenta sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , ria loga - ni mpo ' uli ' - raka pepangala ' - ni hi Aku ' .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Pakaroho ami ' - mi nono - ni , neo ' - koi mingki ' mpekiri ncala ' ba beiwa mpai ' tompoi ' - ni .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Aku ' moto - damo mpai ' to mpowai ' - koi petompoi ' to monoto , alaa - na uma ria haduaa ngkai bali ' - ni to mpokule ' mpobaro ba mposapuaka napa to ni ' uli ' .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , hawe ' ea tauna mpokahuku ' - koi sabana petuku ' - ni hi Aku ' . Ntahawe ' totu ' a - ni , ompi ' - ni , posantina - ni , pai ' ema ' - ni mpewai ' - koi hi bali ' - ni . Hantongo ' - koi mpai ' rapatehi .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Aga kakoo - kono - na uma moto - koi moapa . Nau ' hangkaho wuluwoo ' - ni uma mpai ' ria to moronto .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Ane uma mogego ' pepangala ' - ni hi Aku ' , bate mporata - koi katuwua ' to lompe ' .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: " Ane nihilo - damo ngata Yerusalem toi ratipuhi tantara bali ' , ni ' inca - mi ka ' uma - napi mahae Yerusalem ragero .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , tauna to mo ' oha ' hi Yudea , agina metibo ' - ra hilou hi bulu ' - na . Tauna to hi rala ngata agina metibo ' ngkai rala ngata . Pai ' tauna to hi mali ngata neo ' - pi leba ' mesua ' hi rala ngata .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Apa ' tempo toe mpai ' , tempo pehukua ' Alata ' ala , bona madupa ' - mi hawe ' ea to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Mpe ' ahii ' - ra mpai ' tobine to nto ' u - ra motina ' i pai ' to mpentii ' ana ' - ra hi tempo toe , apa ' mokoro petibo ' - ra . Apa ' ngata toi narumpa ' silaka bohe , pai ' Pue ' Ala mpohuku ' pue ' ngata .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Ria - ra mpai ' to jadi ' konia ' piho ' . Ria - ra to ratawani pai ' rapatau ' hi humalili ' dunia ' . Pai ' ngata Yerusalem toi ralisa tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi , duu ' - na hudu tempo to napakatantu - raka Pue ' Ala .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: " Nto ' u toe mpai ' , ria tanda hi eo , hi wula pai ' hi betue ' . Hawe ' ea manusia ' mokaratu nono - ra pai ' ingu ' mpo ' epe pomoni pai ' pojago tahi ' .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Ria mpai ' tauna to mate ngkokore nakeni kawulunga - ra , mpohilo to jadi ' hi humalili ' dunia ' . Apa ' hawe ' ea anu to mobaraka ' hi langi ' ralengo .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Nto ' u toe - damo mpai ' , hawe ' ea tauna mpohilo - a , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , mana ' u tumai hi rala limu ' . Uma mowo pehini - ku pai ' kabaraka ' - ku nto ' u toe .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Ane hawe ' ea toe ntepu ' u majadi ' , pakaroho - mi nono - ni pai ' mengoa ' - mokoi , apa ' neo ' rata - mi tempo - na rabahaka - koi ngkai kaparia - ni . "

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Yesus mpololitai ana ' guru - na hante lolita rapa ' tohe ' i , na ' uli ' : " Petonoi - koi kaju ara pai ' kaju - kaju ntani ' - na wo ' o .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Ane nihilo - damo mela ' - mi rau - na , ni ' inca - mi ka ' uma - napi mahae mara eo .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Wae wo ' o ane nihilo - damo kajadia ' toe we ' i lou , ni ' inca - mi ka ' uma - napi mahae Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' mpu ' u - mi hi dunia ' .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - kokoi : hawe ' ea toe we ' i bate madupa ' kako ' ia - na mate omea tauna to tuwu ' tempo toi .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Langi ' pai ' dunia ' mogero moto mpai ' . Tapi ' lolita - ku bate - bate - na duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: " Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi , neo ' - koi sese ' ntora mosusa ' pai ' nginu palangu - langu , ba ntora mpenonoi katuwu ' - ni hi dunia ' , alaa - na lempe ' moto - koi hi eo karata - ku . Apa ' rata ncorobaa - a mpai ' .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Karata - ku mpai ' mporumpa ' hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' hewa tewo ' mpowoko ' wulehu ' .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi pai ' tida mekakae hi Pue ' Ala , bona moroho - koi ntaha hawe ' ea kaparia to neo ' jadi ' toe , duu ' - na mpohirua ' - ka Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' . "

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Hi eo - na , Yesus metudui ' hi Tomi Alata ' ala . Hi bengi - na , hilou - i hi mali ngata Yerusalem , pai ' - i turu hi Bulu ' Zaitun .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Butu mepulo - na ntodea morumpu hi Tomi Alata ' ala doko ' mpo ' epe tudui ' - na .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Mohu ' - mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga ' Posusa ' Roti to Uma Raragii , to rahanga ' wo ' o Eo Paskah .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Nto ' u toe , imam pangkeni pai ' guru agama mpali ' ohea - ra ke mpatehi bongo Yesus , apa ' me ' eka ' - ra mpoka ' eka ' ntodea .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Ngkai ree , Magau ' Anudaa ' mesua ' hi rala nono Yudas , to rahanga ' wo ' o Iskariot , hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na Yesus to hampulu ' rodua .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Toe pai ' hilou - imi mpololitai imam pangkeni hante kapala ' polisi Tomi Alata ' ala , ba beiwa akala - na mpobalu ' Yesus hi hira ' .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Goe ' - ramo mpo ' epe lolita Yudas toe , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Ane nutonu Yesus hi kai ' , kiwai ' - ko doi . "

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Na ' io ' - mi Yudas , pai ' ngkai ree napali ' loga to lompe ' mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - na hante uma ra ' incai ntodea .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Rata - mi tempo - na Posusa ' Roti to Uma Raragii . Pai ' eo to lomo ' - na hi rala posusa ' tohe ' e , eo posumalea ' bima to rakoni ' hi Eo Paskah .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Yesus mpohubui Petrus pai ' Yohanes , na ' uli ' - raka : " Hilou - mokoi mporodo - taka pongkoni ' Paskah - ta . "

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Rapekune ' - i : " Hiapa Pue ' nupokono kipomporodoi - e ? "

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Ane mesua ' - koi mpai ' hi rala ngata , hirua ' - koi hante hadua tomane to ngkeni pontomua ' oti ntomu ' . Tuku ' - i rata hi tomi pesuaa ' - na .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Rata hi tomi pesuaa ' - na , uli ' - ki pue ' tomi hewa toi : ` Na ' uli ' Guru : Hiapa - kuwo pobabehia - ku Posusa ' Paskah hante ana ' guru - ku ? '

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Pue ' tomi toei mpai ' mpotudo ' - kokoi hameha ' kamar to bohe hi lolo - na . Kamar toe teporodo ami ' - mi , hono ' - mi rewa - na . Hi retu - mi mpai ' niporodo pongkoni ' Paskah - ta . "

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - ramo Petrus pai ' Yohanes , pai ' rarata mpu ' u - mi hewa to na ' uli ' - raka Yesus , pai ' - ra mporodo - mi pongkoni ' Paskah .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Karata - na mpu ' u - mi tempo ngkoni ' pongkoni ' Paskah tohe ' e , mohura - imi Yesus hante suro - na hi tomi toe .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Doko ' lia - a ngkoni ' dohe - ni hi Eo Paskah toi , kako ' ia - ku mporata kaparia .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Apa ' bona ni ' inca : uma - apa ngkoni ' pongkoni ' Paskah to hewa toi , duu ' - na madupa ' mpu ' u - mi batua - na posusa ' toi nto ' u Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . "

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' ala ' sangkiri ' to ihia ' anggur , na ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Ala ' - mi tohe ' i pai ' nibagi - bagi .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Apa ' bona ni ' inca : ntepu ' u ngkai wae lau , uma - apa nginu anggur duu ' - na rata mpu ' u - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . "

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Oti toe , na ' ala ' - mi roti , pai ' ka ' oti - nai mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Pue ' Ala , napihe - pihe pai ' natonu - miraka , na ' uli ' : " Roti to kutonu - kokoi toi , toi - mi woto - ku ( ( to kutonu mpotolo ' - koi . Babehi - mokoi ada toi bona mpokiwoi - a . "

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Wae wo ' o , ka ' oti - ra ngkoni ' , na ' ala ' sangkiri ' to ihia ' anggur pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ihi ' sangkiri ' toi mpobatuai pojanci Alata ' ala to bo ' u , to mpoposidai ' Alata ' ala pai ' manusia ' . Pojanci toe , rapadupa ' hante raa ' - ku , to rabowo mpai ' ane mate - a mpotolo ' - koi . ) )

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: " Aga hilo pe ' , tauna to mpobalu ' - a mpai ' , ria - imi hi rehe ' i lau , ngkoni ' dohe - ku toi - e !

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' bate kana mate hewa to napakatantu Alata ' ala . Aga mpe ' ahii ' tauna to mpobalu ' - a tetui ! "

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Kara ' epe - na ana ' guru - na toe , momepekune ' - ramo ba hema - ra mpai ' to mpobabehi hewa toe .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Ngkai ree , momehono ' - ramo ana ' guru - na Yesus , ba hema - ra to meliu kabohe pangka ' - ra .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Toe pai ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ane hi tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala , uma mowo kasoa - na magau ' mpohawai ' ntodea . Pai ' tauna to bohe pangka ' - ra doko ' rahanga ' ` to mpotiroi ntodea . '

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Aga koi ' , neo ' hewa tetu ! Timali - na lau - di . Hema - koi to meliu kabohe pangka ' - na kana mo ' ingku hewa to kedi ' lia tuwu ' - na . Pai ' tauna to mehawai ' kana mo ' ingku hewa hadua pahawaa ' .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Kupekune ' - koi ulu : hema to meliu kabohe pangka ' - na ? To mohura ngkoni ' - di , ba to metonui - di ? Tantu tauna to mohura . Hiaa ' ohe ' i - a hi laintongo ' - ni hewa tauna to mpotonui - koi .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: " Koi ' tohe ' i - e lau , ria oa ' - koi dohe - ku hi rala hawe ' ea kasusaa ' - ku .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Jadi ' , hewa Tuama - ku mpowai ' - a kuasa moparenta , wae wo ' o Aku ' mpowai ' - koi kuasa moparenta .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Toe pai ' goe ' wo ' o - ko - koiwo mpai ' ngkoni ' pai ' nginu dohe - ku hi rala Kamagaua ' - ku ane jadi ' Magau ' - apa mpai ' . Pai ' mohura moto - koi mpai ' hi pohuraa to hampulu ' romeha ' , mpoparentai to Israel to hampulu ' rontina . "

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Oti toe , Pue ' Yesus mpololitai Simon Petrus , na ' uli ' : " Ee ' , Simon ! Epe : Magau ' Anudaa ' rawai ' loga mposori - koi omea . Hewa pae to ratapi , hewa toe wo ' o mpai ' kagaga - na pesori to mporumpa ' - koi .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Aga kuposampayai ami ' - moko Simon , bona neo ' lelu ' pepangala ' - nu . Jadi ' , ane monoto nculii ' mpai ' nono - nu , iko kana mporohoi nono doo - nu . "

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Pue ' , nau ' ratarungku ' - a mpai ' ba paiana rapatehi - a dohe - nu , sadia moto - a mpotuku ' - ko ! "

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Petrus , bona nu ' inca : kako ' ia - na turua ' manu ' bengi toe mpai ' lau , mpolia ' tolu ngkani - moko mposapu kanu ' inca - ku . "

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Oti toe Yesus mpololitai - ra , na ' uli ' : " Nto ' u kakuhubui - ni wengi hilou ngkeni Kareba Lompe ' , uma - koi kupiliu mpokeni karepe ' doi ba boku ba sapatu ' . Ha ria - mokoi nakakurai ' ba napa - napa - e ? "

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Ratompoi ' : " Uma - hawo . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aga hewa toe lau , hema - koi to ria doi - ni ba boku - ni kana nikeni . Pai ' hema - koi to uma ria piho ' - ni , pobalu ' baju - ni nipope ' oli piho ' .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Apa ' ria lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : ` Magau ' Topetolo ' mpai ' rapohewa tauna to dada ' a . ' Pai ' napa to te ' uki ' toe kana madupa ' hi Aku ' . Apa ' napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' to mpolowa - a , neo ' madupa ' mpu ' u - mi wae lau . "

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - na : " Pue ' , ohe ' i moto piho ' romata . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Wae - mi . "

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Oti toe , malai - imi Yesus ngkai rala ngata , pai ' hewa kabiasaa - na hilou - imi hi Bulu ' Zaitun , pai ' ana ' guru - na hilou wo ' o dohe - na .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Karata - ra hi ria , na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Mosampaya - mokoi bona neo ' - koi mporata pesori . "

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Oti toe , pai ' hilou - i molaa hala ' ngkai hira ' , pai ' - i mowilingkudu mosampaya .

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Tuama - ku , ane dota - ko , wi ' iha - ka - kuwo kaparia to neo ' mporumpa ' - a tohe ' i . Aga bela konoa - ku Aku ' to jadi ' , agina konoa - nu Iko moto . " ( (

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Ngkai ree , mehupa ' - mi hadua mala ' eka ngkai suruga mporohoi - i .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Hangkedi ' kanahuduwukui - na mosampaya , apa ' pepa mpu ' u na ' epe . Ini ' - na tudo ' hi tana ' hewa raa ' . ) )

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Oti mosampaya , mokore - imi hilou nculii ' hi ana ' guru - na . Narata - ra bula - ra leta ' , nakeni kasusa ' nono - ra .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Napa - di pai ' leta ' - koie ! Memata - mokoi pai ' mosampaya bona neo ' - koi mporata pesori . "

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Bula - na Yesus mololita - pidi , muu - mule ' rata - mi tauna hampodooa . Yudas , hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua , hi ' a - mi to mpakeni - ra . Karata - ra hi ree , hilou - imi Yudas mpomohui ' Yesus , doko ' natabe - i hante me ' eki ntuku ' ada - ra to Yahudi .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Aga Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Ee ' Yudas , ha hante petabe - nu tetu - tanoe nupobalu ' - a , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' - e ! "

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Karahilo - na ana ' guru - na napa to neo ' jadi ' , ra ' uli ' : " Pue ' , ki ' ewa - ramo hante piho ' ! "

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Ngkai ree , hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na mpotime batua Imam Bohe , bela mpoholu tilinga ka ' ana - na .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Neo ' - pi ! " Pai ' najama tilinga - na napaka ' uri ' - ki .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpololitai - ra imam pangkeni pai ' polisi Tomi Alata ' ala hante pangkeni to Yahudi to tumai mpohoko ' - i . Na ' uli ' - raka : " Ha toperampaki - a toi - e , pai ' mingki ' tumai - koi ntali piho ' pai ' sumampu - e !

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Butu eo - na ria lalau - a dohe - ni hi Tomi Alata ' ala , tapi ' uma - koi hema to dungku pale - ni hi Aku ' nto ' u toe . Tempo mobengi - damo pai ' lako ' daho ' - koi mpohoko ' - a . Toi - mi tempo - ni koi ' , pai ' tempo - na magau ' kabengia ! "

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Ngkai ree , rahoko ' mpu ' u - imi , pai ' - i rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe . Petrus metuku ' ngkawao - wadi .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Hi laintongo ' berewe , rapobaa apu raponerui , pai ' Petrus hilou wo ' o - hawo mohura dohe - ra mpotololiki apu .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe mpohilo Petrus bula - na moneru . Napelence pai ' na ' uli ' : " Tau tetui , hadua doo - na Yesus ! "

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Nasapu Petrus , na ' uli ' : " Uma - kuna ku ' incai - i ! "

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Uma mahae ngkai ree , kahadua - na mpohilo Petrus pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Iko wo ' o - mi hadua doo - ra ngone ! " Na ' uli ' wo ' o Petrus : " Uma ! Bela aku ' . "

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Ba ria hajaa ngkai ree , hadua wo ' o - mi mpo ' uli ' : " Bate hi ' a mpu ' u - di doo - nae , apa ' to Galilea wo ' o - i - hawo ! "

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Napa to nu ' uli ' tetu , uma - kuna ku ' incai ! " Bula - na Petrus mololita - pidi , turua ' - mi manu ' ,

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: pai ' Pue ' me ' ili ' mponaa - i . Ngkai ree , nakiwoi - mi lolita - na Pue ' to mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Kako ' ia - na turua ' manu ' bengi mpai ' , mpolia ' tolu ngkani - moko mposapu kanu ' inca - ku . "

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Palai - nami Petrus hilou hi mali - na , pai ' - i geo ' ngkai kapeda ' nono - na .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Tauna to mpodongo Yesus mpopo ' ore ' - i pai ' mpohopo ' - i .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Raputu ' lio - na bona neo ' - i pehilo , pai ' - i rapekune ' : " Ee nabi ! Pe ' uli ' pe ' ba hema to mpohopo ' - koe ! "

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Wori ' wo ' o - pidi lolita peruge ' - ra mporuge ' - i .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Kamobaja - na , hawe ' ea imam pangkeni pai ' guru agama hante pangkeni to Yahudi ntani ' - na moromu , pai ' Yesus rakeni hi nyanyoa - ra .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Ra ' uli ' topohura toera mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Uli ' - kakai hi rehe ' i , ha Iko mpu ' u - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' - e ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Nau ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi , bate uma - le nipangalai ' - e .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Pai ' ane Aku ' mepekune ' hi koi ' , bate uma - le nitompoi ' - ae .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Aga ngkai wae - e lau , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' mohura pai ' moparenta hi mali ngka ' ana Alata ' ala to Mobaraka ' . "

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Ra ' uli ' wo ' o - mi topohura toera : " Ane wae - di , Ana ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - ko ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Wae mpu ' u - di , hewa to ni ' uli ' tetu - e . "

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Ngkai ree , ra ' uli ' - mi : " Uma - pi mingki ' ria sabi ' ! Ta ' epe moto - mi ngkai wiwi - na kasalaa ' - na ! "

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Oti toe , mokore - ramo hawe ' ea topohura toera pai ' Yesus rakeni hilou hi Gubernur Pilatus .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Karata - ra hi ria , rapakilu - imi , ra ' uli ' : " Tau toii kirata bula - na mpopanawu ' ntodea ! Na ' uli ' - raka neo ' mpobayari paja ' hi Kaisar . Pai ' na ' uli ' wo ' o , Hi ' a - mi Kristus , hadua magau ' . "

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Jadi ' , mepekune ' Pilatus hi Yesus : " Ha Iko mpu ' u - mi Magau ' to Yahudi - e ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Wae mpu ' u , hewa to nu ' uli ' tetu - e . "

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' Pilatus hi imam pangkeni pai ' hi ntodea : " Uma - kuna kuruai ' sala ' - na tau toii . "

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Tapi ' rajojo lau - mi mpo ' uli ' : " Na ' ukei ' ntodea hante tudui ' - na , hobo ' hi tana ' to Yahudi . Lomo ' - na hi Galilea - i , hiaa ' wae lau rata - imi hi rehe ' i . "

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Pilatus tohe ' e , mepekune ' - i : " Ha to Galilea - i ? "

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Ratompoi ' : " Io ' , to Galilea - i - hawo . " Mpo ' epe toe , Pilatus mpohubui tauna mpokeni Yesus hilou hi Magau ' Herodes , apa ' Herodes toei topoparenta hi tana ' Galilea . Pai ' nto ' u toe , hi Yerusalem wo ' o - i - hawo Herodes .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Goe ' lia - imi Herodes mpohilo Yesus , apa ' mahae - imi mpo ' epe tauna mpotompo ' wiwi - i , pai ' doko ' nahilo - i . Nasarumaka , Yesus mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona nahilo .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Toe pai ' wori ' pompekunea ' - na hi Yesus , aga Yesus uma winihi .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Imam pangkeni pai ' guru agama ria wo ' o - ra hi ree , karapo ' - damo lolita - ra mpopakilu Yesus hi Herodes .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Oti toe , Herodes hante tantara - na mpopo ' ore ' pai ' mporuge ' Yesus . Raheai - i hante pohea magau ' , pai ' rakeni nculii ' - i hilou hi Pilatus .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Hi eo tohe ' e momekalompei ' - ramo Herodes pai ' Pilatus , hiaa ' ri ' ulu mosisala - ra .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Ngkai ree , Pilatus mporumpu hawe ' ea imam pangkeni pai ' totu ' a ngata hante ntodea ,

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Tau toii nikeni tumai , ni ' uli ' mpopanawu ' - i ntodea . Kuparesa ' - imi hi nyanyoa - ni omea , aga uma ria kuruai ' hanyalaa gau ' - na to dada ' a hewa to nipakilu - ki .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Wae wo ' o - hawo pomporata - na Herodes , apa ' napoponculi ' - imi hi aku ' . Tau toii , uma - i mpobabehi ba napa - napa to masipato ' rahuku ' mate - ki .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Jadi ' , kuweba ' - i - wadi pai ' kubahaka - i . " ( (

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Pilatus mpo ' uli ' hewa toe , apa ' biasa - na butu Eo Paskah kana nabahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku ' , bona mpo ' ala ' nono ntodea . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' : " Kuweba ' - i - wadi pai ' kubahaka - i . " ) )

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Mpo ' epe toe , mogora - ramo ntodea mpo ' uli ' : " Patehi - imi ! Bahaka - kakai Barabas ! "

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Barabas toe ratarungku ' sabana pe ' ewa - na hi topoparenta hi rala ngata pai ' topepatehi wo ' o - i .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' Pilatus doko ' mpobahaka Yesus , toe pai ' mololita tena - i hi ntodea .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Aga rajojo lau - mi mogora , ra ' uli ' : " Parika ' - i ! Parika ' - i ! "

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Nakatolu - ngkanii Pilatus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Hiaa ' napa - mile sala ' - nae ? Uma ria kuruai ' nau ' hanyalaa sala ' - na to masipato ' rahuku ' mate - ki . Kuweba ' - i - wadi pai ' kubahaka . "

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Aga rahudukulei ' lau - mi merapi ' bona Yesus raparika ' . Ka ' omea - na medagi mpu ' u - ramo .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Napomonoa ' - mi Pilatus bona Yesus rahuku ' mate , ntuku ' pomperapia ' - ra .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Pai ' napomonoa ' wo ' o mpobahaka - raka tauna to raperapi ' , to ratarungku ' sabana pe ' ewa - na pai ' pepatehi - na . Yesus ratonu hi tantara to Roma bona rapatehi ntuku ' konoa - ra to Yahudi .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Ngkai ree , rakeni - imi Yesus hilou hi mali ngata , pai ' hi lengko ohea hirua ' - ra hante hadua tauna to rahanga ' Simon to Kirene . Hi ' a tohe ' ei , lako ' rata hi ngata . Tantara to Roma mpentoe Simon , rapewuku - i mpaha ' a kaju parika ' hilou dohe - ra mpotuku ' Yesus .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Bula - na Yesus rakeni hilou hi mali ngata , wori ' tauna to metuku ' . Ria wo ' o - ra ba hangkuja dua tobine to metuku ' . Tobine toera mpokageoi ' pai ' mpotantangii ' - i .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Yesus mpewili ' - ra pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ee tobine to Yerusalem , neo ' - a nikageoi ' . Agina woto - ni moto pai ' ana ' - ni nikageoi ' .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Apa ' rata mpai ' tempo - na tauna mpo ' uli ' : ` Marasi ' lau - ramo tobine to lalo , to uma hangkania mo ' ana ' , pai ' to uma hangkania mpentii ' ana ' ! '

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , tauna mpololitai bulu ' hewa toi : ` Duruhi - makai bulu ' ! Lulihi - makai watu ! '

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Apa ' ane Aku ' , to uma ria sala ' - ku , rapohewa toe , peliu - liu - nami mpai ' koi ' . "

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Nto ' u Yesus rakeni hilou raparika ' toe , ria wo ' o rodua tau ntani ' - na to rakeni hilou dohe - na bona rapatehi . To rodua toe , paka ' to dada ' a gau ' - ra .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Karata - ra hi po ' ohaa ' to rahanga ' Bulu ' Banga ' woo ' , raparika ' - imi Yesus . Pai ' to rodua to dada ' a gau ' - ra toera , raparika ' wo ' o - ramo - rawo , hadua hi mali ka ' ana - na hadua mali ki ' ii - na .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Yesus mosampaya , na ' uli ' : " Tuama - ku , ampungi - ra - rawo , apa ' uma ra ' incai napa to rababehi . " Tantara to mpoparika ' Yesus mpotene ' undi hewa pompenoa ' - ra , ba hema - ra to mporata pohea - na .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Wori ' tauna tumai mokore hilau merono . Wae wo ' o pangkeni to Yahudi mpopo ' ore ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Tau ntani ' - na natulungi - ramo . Agina woto - na moto - pi natulungi , ane makono Kahi ' a - na Magau ' Topetolo ' to napelihi Alata ' ala - e ! "

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Tantara - tantara wo ' o mpopo ' ore ' - i . Ramohui ' - i pai ' rapopo ' inui - i anggur to mo ' onco ,

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: pai ' ra ' uli ' : " Ane Magau ' to Yahudi mpu ' u - ko , wae - pi tulungi moto - mi - kowo woto - nu ! "

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Hi kaju parika ' - na Yesus hi ntoto woo ' - na ria ukia ' hewa toi : TOI - MI MAGAU ' TO YAHUDI .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Hadua todada ' a to raparika ' dohe - na Yesus , mpolibui ' Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Nu ' uli ' - kona Iko Magau ' Topetolo ' - e ! Ane bongko wae , tulungi - mi woto - nu pai ' kai ' wo ' o - kaiwo ! "

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Aga to hadua - i - hana mpotanee ' doo - na , na ' uli ' - ki : " Ha uma - ko me ' eka ' - e ? Uma - ko mengkoru hi Alata ' ala - e ? Rahuku ' mate omea - ta toi - e .

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Aga huku ' - ta kita ' rodua , toto - na - tana ntuku ' kadada ' a gau ' - ta . Hiaa ' Hi ' a - hana , uma ria sala ' - na . "

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Oti toe , pai ' - i mpololitai Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Yesus , kiwoi - a - kuwo , ane rata - poko mpai ' jadi ' Magau ' ! "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Mpu ' u ku ' uli ' - koko : eo toe mpai ' lau , ria - ko dohe - ku hi Firdaus . "

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Tebua ' - mi eo , muu - mule ' uma - pi mehini eo . Hangaa mobengi - mi hobo ' hi ngata toe , duu ' rata jaa tolu .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Kain porini - olo ' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , mobika ' ntongo ' jadi ' rontau .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Oti toe , me ' au - imi Yesus napesukui mpo ' uli ' : " Tuama - ku , hi rala pale - nu kutonu - mi kao ' - ku ! " Ka ' oti - na mololita hewa toe , modupe ' - mi inoha ' - na .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Kanahilo - na tadulako tantara napa to jadi ' toe , mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala - imi , na ' uli ' : " Makono mpu ' u - tawo ! Hi ' a he ' e tauna to monoa ' ! "

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna to morumpu merono , karahilo - na napa to jadi ' toe , nculii ' - ramo hilou hi tomi - ra , pai ' halengko ohea mporera ' - rera ' hunamu - ra .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Ane hawe ' ea pome ' inca - na Yesus hante tobine - tobine to mpotuku ' - i ngkai Galilea , mokore molaa - ra mpohilo hawe ' ea to jadi ' toe .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Ria hadua tomane to rahanga ' Yusuf to ngkai ngata Arimatea hi tana ' Yudea . Yusuf toei , tauna to lompe ' pai ' monoa ' ingku - na , pai ' to mpopea wo ' o tempo - na Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' hi dunia ' . Nau ' - i hadua topohura hi Polibua ' Bohe Agama to Yahudi , aga uma napokonoi hawa ' pai ' kabotu ' - ra to mpo ' uli ' Yesus kana rapatehi .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Yusuf toei hilou hi Gubernur Pilatus mperapi ' woto - na Yesus .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Napopana ' u - mi woto Yesus ngkai kaju parika ' - na , naputu ' hante kain to bula , pai ' napopoturu hi rala daeo ' to ralonga ' hi panapa bulu ' . Daeo ' toe bo ' u - pidi , ko ' ia hangkania rapotanai .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Eo toe , eo pomporodoa , pai ' ntuku ' ada to Yahudi ntepu ' u ncimonou ' toe rapalii ' mobago , apa ' ntepu ' u - mi eo pepuea ' .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Toe pai ' tobine to mpodohei Yesus ngkai Galilea mpotuku ' Yusuf hilou hi daeo ' toe . Rahilo beiwa woto Yesus ratu ' u hi rala daeo ' .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' - ramo hilou hi ngata , mporodo rampa - rampa hante lana honga bona ragelai ' - ki woto Yesus . Oti toe , hi eo pepuea ' rapento ' oi - mi mobago ntuku ' Atura Musa .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Eo Mingku mepupulo ngkii , tobine toera hilou hi daeo ' mpokeni anu mohonga to oti - mi raporodo .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Rata hi ria , rahilo - rawo watu po ' unca - na tederu ' - mi .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Pesua ' - rami hi rala daeo ' , aga uma raruai ' woto - na Pue ' Yesus .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Bula - ra mokore nakeni ka ' ingu ' - ra , muu - mule ' mehupa ' rodua tomane to moheai meringkila ' mokore hi ncori - ra .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Wulunga - ramo tobine toera , pai ' - ra motumpa hi tana ' . Ra ' uli ' to rodua toera mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' nipali ' tauna to tuwu ' hi olo ' tomate ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Uma - ipi ria hi rehe ' i . Tuwu ' nculii ' - imi ! Kiwoi - dile napa to na ' uli ' - kokoi wengi hi Galilea - e .

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Na ' uli ' : Ana ' Manusia ' kana ratonu hi tauna to dada ' a bona raparika ' , aga hi eo katolu - na tuwu ' nculii ' - i . "

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Ngkai ree , rakiwoi mpu ' u - mi lolita Yesus .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Ponculi ' - rami ngkai daeo ' , pai ' ratutura hawe ' ea to jadi ' toe hi ana ' guru Yesus to hampulu ' hadua pai ' hi hawe ' ea topetuku ' ntani ' - na .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Tobine toera , hira ' Maria Magdalena , Yohana , pai ' Maria tina Yakobus , pai ' tobine ntani ' - na to dohe - ra . Ratutura hawe ' ea to jadi ' toe hi suro Yesus .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Aga suro toera uma mpangalai ' lolita - ra , ra ' uli ' lolita to ratamangko - wadi .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Hiaa ' Petrus - hana , pokeno - nami hilou hi daeo ' . Pengkabungku ' - nami mpelongi ' hi rala - na , nahilo muntu ' hompu ' - na - damo to hi ree . Oti toe , nculii ' - imi hilou hi tomi - na , pai ' ntora mokanono mpenonoi napa to jadi ' tohe ' e .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Hi eo toe wo ' o , rodua topetuku ' Yesus mako ' hilou hi ngata Emaus , kalaa - na kira - kira hampulu ' hakilo ngkai Yerusalem .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Bula - ra momako ' toe , ntora mololita - ra , mpololita hawe ' ea to lako ' jadi ' .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Bula - ra mololita pai ' momepekune ' , muu - mule ' rata - imi Yesus mpomohui ' - ra pai ' mako ' dohe - ra .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Pehilo moto - ra , aga ria anu to mpohilingai ' - ra , alaa - na uma ra ' incai Kayesus - na .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Napa - die to ntora nilolita ngkalako ' - e ? " Mentoda ' - ra hante lence to monto ' .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: To hadua , to rahanga ' Kleopas , mpekune ' Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Ha lako ' rata - ko - tanoe hi Yerusalem - e , pai ' uma - di nu ' incai napa to jadi ' ba hangkuja eo to liu toi - e ? "

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa - die ? " Hampetompoi ' - ra : " To jadi ' hi Yesus to Nazaret - le ! Hi ' a nabi to mobaraka ' hi pobago - na pai ' pololita - na , lompe ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala pai ' hi poncilo ntodea .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Imam pangkeni pai ' totu ' a ngata - ta mpotonu - i hi topoparenta bona rahuku ' mate . Oti toe , raparika ' mpu ' u - i .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Hiaa ' haru ' - mi - kaina nono - kai , apa ' ki ' uli ' Hi ' a - mi mpai ' to mpobahaka - ta to Israel ngkai bali ' - ta . Eo toe lau , eo katolu - nami ngkai karapatehia - na .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Hiaa ' toe - e , ba hangkuja dua tobine doo - kai mpolahoi ta ' i - kai , apa ' hilou - ra hi daeo ' - na mepupulo ngone ,

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: tapi ' woto - na uma - pi raruai ' . Nculii ' - ramo ra ' uli ' - kakai kampohilo - ra mala ' eka to mpo ' uli ' tuwu ' nculii ' - imi .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Ngkai ree , ba hangkuja dua doo - kai hilou hi daeo ' . Rata hi ria , rahilo bate hewa to ra ' uli ' tobine toera . Aga Yesus uma rahiloi . "

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Wojo mpu ' u - koi ! Uma oa ' - tanoe niparasaya hawe ' ea to ra ' uli ' nabi owi - e !

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Magau ' Topetolo ' , bate kana mporata kaparia ncala ' - i , pai ' lako ' mporata - i kabohe tuwu ' - na . "

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpakanoto - raka hawe ' ea to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' to mpolowa woto - na , ntepu ' u ngkai sura to na ' uki ' nabi Musa duu ' rata hi hawe ' ea sura nabi .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Mohu ' - mi ngata to ratoa ' , Yesus ntani ' kaliliu - i .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Ntaa ' ratagi - idi , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Mehani - tamo ulu hi rehe ' i ! Ncimonou ' - mi , neo ' mobengi - mi . " Jadi ' mehani mpu ' u - imi Yesus dohe - ra .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Mohura - ramo hangkaa - ngkania bona ngkoni ' . Yesus mpo ' ala ' roti , naposampayai , napihe - pihe pai ' natonu - miraka .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Nto ' u toe , lako ' monoto - rada , pai ' ra ' inca Kayesus - na . Ngkai ree , hangaa mengkaronto - imi , uma - ipi rahiloi .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Momepololitai - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Toe - tawo ' pai ' tuna nono - ta hi ohea - e we ' i , bula - na mpololitai - ta pai ' mpakanoto - taka ihi ' Buku Tomoroli ' - e ! "

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Pe ' ongko ' - ra wo ' o - mi nculii ' hilou hi Yerusalem , mpohirua ' - raka ana ' guru Yesus to hampulu ' hadua , to bula - ra morumpu hante doo - ra .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Ra ' uli ' to morumpu toera : " Makono mpu ' u - di , katuwu ' - na nculii ' Pue ' - e ! Mehupa ' - imi hi Simon ! "

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Jadi ' , to rodua to lako ' rata toera mpotutura wo ' o - mi - rawo napa to jadi ' hi lengko ohea we ' i , pai ' kara ' inca - na Yesus nto ' u kampopihe - pihe - na roti .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Bula - ra mololita - pidi , muu - mule ' mokore wo ' o - imi Yesus hi laintongo ' - ra , pai ' - i mpotabe - ra , na ' uli ' : " Kalompea ' rata hi koi ' . "

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Hakene - radile me ' eka ' , apa ' ra ' uli ' - rana mpohilo - ra kiu .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Napa pai ' me ' eka ' - koi pai ' morara ' nono - nie ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Hilo - dile rari ' to hi pale - ku pai ' to hi witi ' - kue . Aku ' - mile toi - e ! Ganga - a pai ' petonoi , apa ' ane rate - hana , uma - hawo ihia pai ' wukua hewa to nihilo hi Aku ' toi - e . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Oti toe , pai ' napopohiloi - ramo pale pai ' witi ' - na .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Ncaruku ' raparasaya Kahi ' a - na mpu ' u - mi . Wule ' mokanganga - ramo nakeni kagoe ' nono - ra mogalo ingu ' . Toe pai ' Yesus mpekune ' - ra , na ' uli ' : " Ha ria koni ' - ni ? "

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Ratonu - miki bau ' uru to ratunu .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Nadoa - mi pai ' nakoni ' , bona rahilo kabela - na - hawo kiu .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' - miraka : " Toe - mile to ku ' uli ' - kokoie bula - ku dohe - ni - pidi . Butu nyala - na to mpolowa woto - ku to te ' uki ' hi rala sura to na ' uki ' nabi Musa pai ' sura nabi - nabi pai ' Buku Rona ' Daud , hawe ' ea - na kana madupa ' . "

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Oti toe , nanotohi nono - ra bona rapaha ihi ' Buku Tomoroli ' .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Na ' uli ' : " Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' : Aku ' Magau ' Topetolo ' kana mporata kaparia pai ' kana rapatehi , pai ' hi eo katolu - na tuwu ' nculii ' .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Pai ' hi rala hanga ' - ku Kareba Lompe ' kana rapalele hi hawe ' ea tauna , bona medea - ra ngkai jeko ' - ra pai ' Alata ' ala mpo ' ampungi - ra . Kareba toe kana rapalele hi humalili ' dunia ' , ntepu ' u ngkai Yerusalem .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Koi ' - mile to jadi ' sabi ' ngkai hawe ' ea tohe ' e - e lau .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: " Pe ' epei lompe ' : kupakatu moto mpai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' tumai hi koi ' , hewa to najanci Tuama - ku . Aga kana nipopea ulu hi rala ngata toi , duu ' - na baraka ' ngkai Alata ' ala mana ' u tumai mporohoi - koi . "

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpo ' ema ' - ra hilou hi mali ngata Yerusalem , mohu ' hi ngata Betania . Na ' ongko ' pale - na pai ' nagane ' - ramo .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Bula - na mpogane ' - ra toe , kate ' oo - ongkoa ' - imi mpogaa ' - raka pai ' hilou - imi hi suruga .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Mowilingkudu - ramo mponyompa - i , pai ' goe ' lia nono - ra nculii ' hilou hi Yerusalem .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Eo - eo - na tida - ra hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala mpo ' une ' - une ' Alata ' ala .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Lomo ' - na , kako ' ia - na dunia ' rapajadi ' , mpolia ' ria - imi - hana Lolita . Lolita toei , dohe Alata ' ala - i , pai ' Lolita toei , Hi ' a moto - mi Alata ' ala .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Ngkai lomo ' - na - imi dohe Alata ' ala - e .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Hi ' a - mi to napopale Alata ' ala mpopajadi ' hawe ' ea to rapajadi ' . Uma ria hanyalaa to jadi ' ane uma Hi ' a .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Hi ' a - mi pehupaa ' katuwua ' , pai ' Hi ' a - mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia ' .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Baja toe mehini ncuu hi rala kabengia - na , pai ' kabengia uma mpakulei ' mpopatehi - i .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Rata hadua tauna to nasuro Alata ' ala , hanga ' - na Yohanes Topeniu ' .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Karata - na Yohanes toe , hi ' a - mi jadi ' sabi ' to mpopalele baja toe hi hawe ' ea tauna , bona hawe ' ea - ra mpo ' epe posabi ' - na pai ' mepangala ' hi baja toei .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Yohanes , bela - hawo hi ' a baja toe - e . Pai ' - i tumai , mpopalele baja toe hi hawe ' ea tauna .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Lolita toei , Hi ' a - mi poko baja to mpobajahi nono hawe ' ea tauna , rata - i hi rala dunia ' .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Hi ' a - mi to napopale Alata ' ala mpopajadi ' dunia ' toi . Tapi ' karata - na hi dunia ' , tauna hi dunia ' uma mpo ' incai - i .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Rata - i hi ngata - na moto , tapi ' hingka ngata - na uma dota mpotarima - i .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Tapi ' hema - hema to mpotarima - i pai ' mepangala ' hi Hi ' a , nawai ' - ra huraa jadi ' ana ' Alata ' ala .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Uma - ra mewali ana ' Alata ' ala sabana totu ' a - ra , bela wo ' o ngkai kuasa manusia ' , ba ngkai poncamoko . Alata ' ala moto to mpopajadi ' - ra ana ' - na .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Lolita toei , mewali manusia ' - imi , pai ' - i mo ' oha ' hi laintongo ' - ta . Kai ' , kihilo - mi - kaina kabaraka ' - na . Kabaraka ' - na toe narata ngkai Tuama - na , apa ' Hi ' a - mi Ana ' - na to Hadudua . Ngkai Hi ' a toe - mi pai ' alaa - na ta ' inca Alata ' ala pai ' kabula rala - na hi kita ' .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Yohanes Topeniu ' mpopo ' incai ntodea kahema - na Lolita toei . Mekio ' - i napesukui na ' uli ' : " Hi ' a toi - mile to ku ' uli ' - e wengi ! Ku ' uli ' : ria mpai ' to tumai ngkabokoa ' ngkai aku ' , aga meliu kabaraka ' - na ngkai aku ' . Apa ' kako ' ia - ku putu , mpolia ' ria - imi - hana . "

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Uma ria ka ' otia ahi ' - na , pai ' ngkai ahi ' - na toe nagane ' - tamo omea , uma ria kaputua - na rasi ' to tarata ngkai Hi ' a .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Ngkai nabi Musa tatarima Atura Pue ' Ala . Tapi ' ngkai Yesus Kristus toe - mi pai ' ta ' inca mpu ' u - i Alata ' ala , pai ' kabula rala - na hi kita ' .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Uma ria haduaa to mpohilo Alata ' ala . Tapi ' Ana ' - na to Hadudua toei , to tida oa ' hi ncori - na , Hi ' a - mi to mpakanoto Alata ' ala hi kita ' .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Hewa toi posabi ' - na Yohanes Topeniu ' mpo ' uli ' kahema - nai Yesus . Topoparenta to Yahudi hi Yerusalem mposuro ba hangkuja dua imam pai ' to Lewi hilou hi Yohanes . Karata - ra hi Yohanes , mepekune ' - ra : " Pai ' - kai tumai toi - e , tumai mpekune ' - ko ba hema - ko . Ba iko mpu ' u - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' - e ? "

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Yohanes mpotompoi ' - ra hante kalonto ' - lonto ' - na , na ' uli ' - raka : " Bela - kuwo aku ' Magau ' Topetolo ' . "

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Mepekune ' tena - ra : " Ane wae , hema - ko ? Ba nabi Elia - dako ? " Na ' uli ' Yohanes : " Bela wo ' o . " Mepekune ' tena - ra : " Ba iko lau - midi nabi bohe to rajanci owi , to ra ' uli ' tumai mpai ' hi rala dunia ' - e ? " Na ' uli ' Yohanes : " Bela wo ' o . "

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Ngkai ree , ra ' uli ' tena : " Ane wae , uli ' - kakai ba hema mpu ' u - ko , bona ria woli ' - na kiparata - raka to mposuro - kai . Beiwa petompoi ' - nu kahema - na mpu ' u - ko . "

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Yohanes mpotompoi ' - ra hante lolita nabi Yesaya owi , na ' uli ' : " Aku ' toi - le , Tauna to mekio ' hi papada to wao ' : ' Neo ' rata - imi Pue ' . Porodo ami ' - miki ohea - na ! ' "

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' wo ' o - mi suro to Parisi toera : " Ane bela - ko Magau ' Topetolo ' , bela - ko nabi Elia , bela wo ' o - ko nabi to rajanci , napa - di pai ' mponiu ' - ko tauna - e ? "

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yohanes : " Aku ' - le mponiu ' tauna hante ue - wadi . Tapi ' rata mpai ' hadua tauna ngkabokoa ' ngkai aku ' . Ria moto - imile hi laintongo ' - ni tempo toi - e , tapi ' uma - i ni ' incai . Bangku ' jadi ' pahawaa ' - na mpobongka koloro sapatu ' - na , uma - a - kuwo natao . "

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Hawe ' ea toe jadi ' hi ngata Betania , hi peniua ' - na Yohanes hi dipo ue Yordan .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Kampeneo - na , Yohanes mpohilo Yesus rata mpotoa ' - i . Na ' uli ' - mi hi ntodea : " Hilo ! Etu - imi tumai Ana ' Bima to naporodo Alata ' ala . Hi ' a - mi to jadi ' tolo ' woto to mpolali jeko ' manusia ' .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Hi ' a - mi to ku ' uli ' - e wengi . Ku ' uli ' rata - i ngkabokoa ' ngkai aku ' , aga meliu kabaraka ' - na ngkai aku ' . Apa ' kako ' ia - ku putu , mpolia ' ria - imi - hana .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Lomo ' - na wengi , ko ' ia wo ' o - kuwo ku ' incai Kahi ' a - nami Magau ' Topetolo ' . Hiaa ' katumai - ku toi - e , bona mponiu ' - ra to Israel hante ue pai ' mpotudo ' - raka kahema - na Magau ' Topetolo ' toe - e . "

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Ria wo ' o - mi posabi ' - na Yohanes toi . Na ' uli ' : " Lomo ' - na uma ku ' incai Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' . Tapi ' Alata ' ala mpohubui - a mponiu ' tauna hante ue , pai ' na ' uli ' - ka hewa toi : ' Ane nampa ' nuhilo mpai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mana ' u pai ' rodo hi hadua tauna , Hi ' a - mi mpai ' to mponiu ' tauna hante Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . ' Jadi ' , kuhilo mpu ' u - mi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mana ' u ngkai suruga molence danci mangkebodo , mehompo pai ' mengkarodo hi Yesus . Toe pai ' toi - ka lolita - ku : Yesus , Hi ' a - mi Ana ' Alata ' ala . "

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Kampeneo - na , ria wo ' o - i Yohanes hi ree hante ana ' guru - na rodua .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Kanahilo - na Yesus liu , na ' uli ' : " Hilo , etu - imi tumai Ana ' Bima Alata ' ala ! "

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Kara ' epe - na ana ' guru - na lolita toe , kahilou - rami mpotuku ' Yesus .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Yesus mewili ' , nahilo - ra mpotuku ' - i . Napekune ' - ra : " Napa to nipali ' - e ? " Ra ' uli ' - ki : " Hiapa po ' ohaa ' - nu Guru ? "

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mai - mokoi , nihilo moto mpai ' . " Hilou mpu ' u - ramo mpotuku ' - i rata hi po ' ohaa ' - na . Pai ' hi ree - ramo dohe - na ngkai jaa opo ' duu ' mobengi .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Ana ' guru - na Yohanes toera mpotuku ' Yesus , apa ' mpo ' epe - ra lolita - na Yohanes Topeniu ' we ' i . Hadua ngkai to rodua toera , hanga ' - na Andreas , ompi ' - na Simon Petrus .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Kaliliu hilou - imi Andreas mpopali ' Simon , na ' uli ' - ki : " Kirua ' - imi - kaina Mesias ! " ( batua - na : Magau ' Topetolo ' ) .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Pai ' napo ' ema ' - imi hilou hi Yesus . Yesus mponaa Simon , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Iko Simon ana ' - na Yohanes . Aga ntepu ' u tempo toi , rahanga ' Kefas - moko . " ( Hanga ' " Kefas " hi rala basa - ra to Yahudi , hibalia hante hanga ' " Petrus " hi rala basa Yunani . Batua - na : watu . )

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Kampeneo - na , Yesus mopatuju hilou hi tana ' Galilea . Kako ' ia - na me ' ongko ' , hilou - imi mpohirua ' - ki Filipus pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Tuku ' - ama ! "

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Filipus toei , ngkai ngata Betsaida , ngata - ra hira ' Andreas pai ' Petrus .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Ngkai ree , hilou wo ' o - imi - hawo Filipus mpohirua ' - ki doo - na to rahanga ' Natanael , na ' uli ' - ki : " Kirua ' - imi - kaina Magau ' Topetolo ' - e , hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Atura Musa pai ' sura nabi owi ! Hanga ' - na Yesus ngkai Nazaret , ana ' - na Yusuf . "

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Hampetompoi ' Natanael : " Ha ria wo ' o - hawo to lompe ' to mehuwu ngkai Nazaret - e ? " Na ' uli ' Filipus : " Mai - moko , nuhilo moto - i mpai ' ! " Hilou - ramo hi Yesus .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Yesus mpohilo Natanael tumai mpohirua ' - ki , na ' uli ' : " Etu - i tumai hadua to Yahudi to mpo ' uhi mpu ' u kehi - na Israel ntu ' a - na owi , bela - i topebagiu ! "

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Na ' uli ' Natanael : " Ngkaiapa kanu ' incaa - ku Guru ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kako ' ia - na nakio ' - ko Filipus , kuhilo - mokole , hi tawu kaju ara toe - e ria . "

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Na ' uli ' Natanael : " Ana ' Alata ' ala mpu ' u - ko - tawo ' , Guru ! Iko mpu ' u - mi Magau ' to Israel ! "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Nupangala ' apa ' ku ' uli ' kakuhilo - nu hi tawu kaju ara - e ? Nuhilo tena - pi mpai ' to meliu kabohe - na ngkai tetu . "

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : nihilo mpai ' langi ' tebea pai ' mala ' eka Alata ' ala ngkahe ' pai ' mana ' u tumai hi Aku ' , Ana ' Manusia ' . "

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Timpaliu ro ' eo ngkai toe , ria susa ' poncamokoa hi ngata Kana hi tana ' Galilea . Tina - na Yesus mpokaralai susa ' toe .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Pai ' Yesus hante ana ' guru - na , rakio ' wo ' o - ra - rawo ngkaralai susa ' toe .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Bula - ra mosusa ' toe , naka ' otii - ramo ue anggur . Tina - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Naka ' otii - ra ue anggur . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa pai ' nu ' uli ' - ka hewa tetu - e , Ina ' ? Ko ' ia rata tempo - na kupopo ' incai - ra kahema - ku . "

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' tina - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka topobago : " Napa - napa mpai ' to nahubui - kokoi Yesus , nibabehi - e ' ! "

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Hi tomi toe , ria ono meha ' pontu ' ua ue to rababehi ngkai watu . Pontu ' ua ue toe rapake ' rapontu ' ui ue pobohoi ' witi ' pai ' pale , ntuku ' ada - ra to Yahudi . Kawori ' ihi ' - na , nte ha ' atu lite butu meha ' - na .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka topobago toera : " Ihii ' pontu ' ua ue tetu lau hante ue . " Ra ' ihii ' mpu ' u - mi rapoponu ' .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' wo ' o - miraka : " Tolou ' hangkedi ' , keni hilou hi tompohawai ' susa ' . " Ratolou ' mpu ' u - mi pai ' rakeni hilou hi topohawa ' .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Topohawa ' toei mpemita ue to rakeni - ki . Bela - pi ue nonto , mobali ' - mi mewali ue anggur . Aga uma - hawo na ' incai kangkaiapa - na , muntu ' topobago - wadi to mpo ' inca . Ka ' oti - na mpemita ue anggur toe , mekio ' - i mpokio ' topemua ' ,

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Kabiasaa - ta - hawo , anggur to motomo ' - di - hawo to ri ' ulu ratua - raka torata . Ane oha - ra - damo nginu , pai ' lako ' ratua to uma ncako motomo ' . Hiaa ' iko - kona mpotalaa anggur to motomo ' , pai ' lako ' tempo toi - di nupewai ' ratua ! "

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Yesus mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe hi ngata Kana hi tana ' Galilea . Toe - mi tanda mekoncehi to lomo ' - na to nababehi . Hante tanda toe napopohiloi kabaraka ' - na , pai ' ana ' guru - na mepangala ' hi Hi ' a .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Hudu susa ' toe , hilou - imi hi ngata Kapernaum hante tina - na , ompi ' - na pai ' ana ' guru - na . Mo ' oha ' hi ree - ramo ba hangkuja mengi .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Neo ' rata - mi tempo - na eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga ' Eo Paskah . Jadi ' , hilou - imi Yesus hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe toe .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Hi berewe Tomi Alata ' ala , mpohilo - i tauna to mpobalu ' japi , bima pai ' danci mangkebodo . Ria wo ' o tauna to mposula ' doi mohura hi ree .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Yesus mpobabehi poweba ' ngkai koloro , pai ' nawuso omea - ra ngkai berewe Tomi Alata ' ala , hante bima pai ' japi - ra . Meja ' - ra toposula ' doi nabilingko , alaa - na pahawu ' - hawu ' - mi doi - ra .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka topobabalu ' danci mangkebodo : " Koi ' , keni omea tetu lau hilou hi mali - na ! Tomi Tuama - ku neo ' niponcawa tomi pobabalua ' ! "

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Ana ' guru - na mpokiwoi lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' hewa tohe ' i : " Dede ' nono - ku , apa ' kupe ' ahi ' Tomi - nu Pue ' . "

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Ngkai ree , topoparenta to Yahudi mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Napa ntoto - kowo huraa - nu mpobabehi tetu - e ? Ane ria mpu ' u huraa - nu , popohiloi - kai tanda mekoncehi ! "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Gero - mi - hana Tomi Alata ' ala toi , nihilo moto mpai ' kadupa ' - na rala - na tolu eo kuwangu nculii ' . "

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Konce - ra topoparenta to Yahudi , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa ! ? Tomi Alata ' ala toi rawangu rala - na opo ' mpulu ' ono mpae , hiaa ' nu ' uli ' - kona nuwangu nculii ' rala - na tolu eo - wadi ? "

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
