text2: Api ' woto - nadi to nawalatu Yesus , mpokahangai ' Tomi Alata ' ala - e .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Ngkabokoa ' - na ngkai toe , katuwu ' - na nculii ' mpu ' u - mi Yesus , ana ' guru - na mpokiwoi lolita - na toe - e . Ngkai ree rapangala ' - mi napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' pai ' napa to na ' uli ' Yesus .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Bula - na Yesus hi Yerusalem mpokaralai Eo Paskah toe , wori ' tauna to mepangala ' hi Hi ' a , apa ' rahilo tanda - tanda mekoncehi to nababehi .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Aga Yesus uma mpangala ' - ra , apa ' na ' inca nono hawe ' ea tauna .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Uma mingki ' kahadua - na to mpo ' uli ' - ki kabeiwa - na manusia ' , apa ' na ' inca ami ' napa to hi rala nono manusia ' .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Ria hadua tauna to rahanga ' Nikodemus . Nikodemus toei , to Parisi pai ' pangkeni agama Yahudi .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Rala - na hamengi , rata - i mpohirua ' - ki Yesus , na ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , to ki ' inca , Iko hadua guru to nasuro Alata ' ala , apa ' uma ria tauna to bisa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi hewa to nubabehi , ane uma - i nadohei Alata ' ala . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Ane tauna uma putu nculii ' , uma - i mpai ' jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . "

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Nikodemus : " Ha beiwa - hawo tauna to motu ' a - mi putu nculii ' - e ? Ha bisa - i mempuna ' hi rala puanaka tina - na , pai ' - i putu karongkani - nae ? "

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Ane tauna uma putu hante ue pai ' hante baraka ' Inoha ' Alata ' ala , uma - i jadi ' ntodea Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Manusia ' tuwu ' hi rala dunia ' toi , apa ' putu ngkai totu ' a - na . Tapi ' katuwua ' kao ' - na to bo ' u narata ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Jadi ' , neo ' nupokakonce lolita - ku tohe ' i to mpo ' uli ' : koi ' omea kana putu nculii ' .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Rapa ' - na ngolu ' , mewui hiapa kalaua - na . Wule ' sere - na ta ' epe , uma ta ' incai kangkaiapa - na ba hilou hiapa - i . Wae wo ' o hante tauna to putu ngkai baraka ' Inoha ' Alata ' ala . "

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Nikodemus : " Beiwa wo ' o - hawo kawali - na tetu - e ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Iko - le hadua guru to Israel to rabila ' , hiaa ' uma - di - kona nu ' incai batua - na lolita - ku toi - e !

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Kai ' mpo ' uli ' napa to ki ' inca , kilolita napa to kihilo . Hiaa ' uma - di nipangalai ' lolita - kai .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Ane kututura - kokoi napa to jadi ' hi dunia ' , uma nipangala ' . Peliu - liu - nami mpai ' ane kututura - kokoi napa to jadi ' hi suruga .

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Uma ria haduaa tauna hi dunia ' to manake ' hilou hi suruga . Muntu ' Aku ' - wadi to mpo ' inca napa to jadi ' hi suruga , apa ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' to mo ' oha ' hi suruga ngkai owi pai ' to mana ' u tumai ngkai suruga .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: " Owi hi papada to wao ' , nabi Musa mpobabehi lence ule ngkai ngkala , pai ' natu ' u hi doe hampole kaju pai ' natunya ' napopokore . Hema - hema to natilo ' ule , ane rangoa ' lence ule ngkala toe , tuwu ' moto - ra . Jadi ' , hewa ule ngkala toe rapokalangko owi , wae wo ' o mpai ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' kana rapokalangko ,

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: bona hema - hema to mepangala ' hi Aku ' mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Hewa toi - mi Alata ' ala mpoka ' ahi ' hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' , alaa - na napewai ' Ana ' - na to Hadudua , bona hema - hema to mepangala ' hi Ana ' - na toe , uma - ra mporata huku ' , tapi ' mporata - ra katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Bela patuju - na Alata ' ala mposuro Ana ' - na tumai hi dunia ' bona mpohuku ' manusia ' . Patuju - na mposuro Ana ' - na tumai - le , bona mpohore manusia ' ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Tauna to mepangala ' hi Ana ' Alata ' ala , uma - ra rahuku ' . Aga tauna to uma mepangala ' , monoa ' - mi kanahuku ' - ra Alata ' ala , apa ' uma - ra dota mepangala ' hi Ana ' Alata ' ala to Hadudua toei .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Rata - imi hi dunia ' mpokeni baja hi hawe ' ea tauna . Tapi ' manusia ' mpokono - pi bengi ngkai baja , apa ' dada ' a kehi - ra . Toe pai ' Alata ' ala mpohuku ' - ra .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna to mpobabehi kehi to dada ' a , mpokahuku ' baja . Uma - ra dota rata hi kabajaa - na , bona neo ' mpai ' kahiloa kehi - ra to dada ' a .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Tauna to monoa ' kehi - ra rata hi kabajaa - na , bona kahiloa po ' ingku - ra pai ' bona monoto - mi kampotuku ' - ra konoa Alata ' ala .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na hilou hi tana ' Yudea . Bula - ra hi ree , meniu ' - ra mponiu ' tauna to doko ' jadi ' topetuku ' - na .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Yohanes Topeniu ' ko ' ia - i ratarungku ' . Meniu ' - i hi ngata Ainon , uma molaa ngkai ngata Salim , apa ' hi ree wori ' ue . Butu eo - na tauna hilou mpopeniu ' hi Yohanes .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , ba hangkuja dua ana ' guru Yohanes momehono ' hante to Yahudi mpomehonoi ' ada peniu ' rala agama .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Hilou - ramo hi Yohanes ra ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , nukiwoi - pidi wengi tauna to dohe - ta hi dipo ue Yordan , to nutudo ' - kakaie ? Oe - imi ria , meniu ' wo ' o - i - hawo , pai ' kawoo - woria ' tauna lou hi Hi ' a ! "

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yohanes : " Kita ' manusia ' uma mporata napa - napa ane uma pewai ' - na Alata ' ala .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Ni ' epe moto - mi wengi lolita - ku . Ku ' uli ' : aku ' bela Magau ' Topetolo ' . Pai ' - a tumai - kuwo - le , tumai meri ' ulu ngkai Hi ' a mporodo - ki ohea - na .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: " Ane rapa ' - na hi susa ' poncamokoa , topemua ' - di - hana to jadi ' poko - na , apa ' hi ' a - mi pue ' tobine to rapemuai ' . Ane bale - na topemua ' - hawo - le , mokore - i mpopanene ' - wadi - ki - hawo pai ' mpe ' epei hawa ' - na . Pai ' goe ' - i mpo ' epe libu ' topemua ' . Wae - mi - kuwo aku ' - e , aku ' hewa bale - na topemua ' . Goe ' - a , pai ' gana kagoea ' - ku , apa ' kawoo - woria ' tauna mpotuku ' - i Yesus .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Hi ' a - mi to kana tepaiwongko tuwu ' - na , pai ' aku ' kana tepai ' ara ' tuwu ' - ku . "

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Yesus , Hi ' a - mi to tumai ngkai suruga , pai ' meliu tuwu ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea . Tauna to ngkai dunia ' , bate manusia ' biasa , pai ' lolita - na mpololita napa - napa to jadi ' hi dunia ' . Aga Yesus , ngkai suruga - i - hana , pai ' meliu tuwu ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Lolita - na mpololita napa to nahilo pai ' to na ' epe , tapi ' uma ria to mpangala ' lolita - na .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Aga hema to mpangala ' lolita - na mpo ' uli ' : " Bate makono - hanale lolita Alata ' ala - e . "

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Apa ' Hi ' a - mi to nasuro Alata ' ala mpohowa ' lolita - na , pai ' Alata ' ala mpowai ' - i Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hante uma ria huka ' - na .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Alata ' ala to Tuama mpoka ' ahi ' Ana ' - na , pai ' nawai ' - imi hawe ' ea kuasa - na .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Tauna to mepangala ' hi Ana ' - na toei , mporata - ramo katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . Tauna to uma mengkoru hi Ana ' - na toei , uma - ra mporata katuwua ' . Mporata roe Alata ' ala lau - rada duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: To Parisi mpo ' epe kawoo - woria ' tauna to hilou mpopeniu ' hi Yesus jadi ' topetuku ' - na , alaa - na meliu - pi kawori ' - na topetuku ' - na Yesus ngkai topetuku ' - na Yohanes Topeniu ' .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: ( Kakoo - kono - na , bela - hawo Yesus to meniu ' , ana ' guru - na to meniu ' . )

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Jadi ' , kana ' inca - na Yesus kara ' epe - nami to Parisi kareba toe , malai - imi ngkai tana ' Yudea hilou nculii ' hi tana ' Galilea .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Rala pomako ' - na tohe ' e , kana mpotara tana ' Samaria - i .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Neo ' tebua ' - mi eo - na , rata - imi hi ngata to Samaria to rahanga ' Sikar , uma molaa ngkai tana ' to napewai ' Yakub owi hi Yusuf ana ' - na . Hi mali ngata toe , ria hameha ' buwu to rahanga ' buwu Yakub . Mohura - imi Yesus hi wiwi ' buwu toe , apa ' lenge ' - imi momako ' .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Ana ' guru - na kaliliu hilou hi ngata me ' oli pongkoni ' . Ko ' ia mahae , rata hadua tobine to Samaria tumai ntomu ' . Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Totina , wai ' - a - kuwo ue ku ' inu . "

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Konce tobine toei , apa ' biasa - na to Yahudi morungku mposigalo - raka to Samaria . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' : " Iko to Yahudi , aku ' to Samaria - a . Napa pai ' daho ' - ko mperapii ' - a ue ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane ke nu ' inca kabohe rasi ' to nawai ' Alata ' ala , pai ' ane nu ' inca - a kahema - ku Aku ' to mperapii ' - ko ue , tantu merapi ' wo ' o - ko - kowo hi Aku ' , pai ' kuwai ' - ko ue to tuwu ' . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Na ' uli ' tobine toei : " Ngkaiapa - kona ue to tuwu ' to nu ' uli ' tetu - e , bo uma - di ria potolou ' - nue , hiaa ' buwu toi monala - hana .

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Buwu toi sosora ngkai Yakub , ntu ' a - kai owi . Hi ' a nginu ue ngkai rei moto - i - hawo , wae wo ' o ana ' - na pai ' porewua - na . Ha nu ' uli ' - kona meliu kabohe tuwu ' - nu ngkai Yakub , pai ' ma ' ala - ko mpewai ' ue to meliu kalompe ' - na ngkai ue buwu toi - e ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Hawe ' ea tauna to nginu ue ngkai buwu toi , ngkamara nculii ' - ra - pidi mpai ' .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Tapi ' hema to mpo ' inu ue to kuwai ' - raka , uma - rapa ngkamara duu ' kahae - hae - na . Apa ' ue to kuwai ' - raka toe , jadi ' ue tuwu ' to mo ' ili ncuu hi rala nono - ra - - batua - na , mporata - ra katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Na ' uli ' tobine toei : " Ane wae , wai ' - ama - kuna ue tetu , bona uma - apa ngkamara oa ' , pai ' uma - apa mingki ' tumai ntomu ' butu eo - na hi rehe ' i . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Koi ' ulu , kio ' tomane - nu , pai ' - ko nculii ' tumai . "

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Na ' uli ' tobine toei : " Uma - kuna motomanei - a . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono - di ,

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: apa ' lima ngkani - mokole motomanei - e , pai ' tomane - nu tetu - e lou , bela tomane - nu moto . Jadi ' , makono lia lolita - nu we ' i - e . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Na ' uli ' tobine toei : " Ei ' , nabi - ko - tawo ' !

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Kai ' to Samaria , mepue ' hi bulu ' tohe ' i moto - ka - kaiwo , hi bulu ' pepuea ' ntu ' a - kai . Hiaa ' koi ' to Yahudi mpo ' uli ' , kana hi Yerusalem - wadi pepuea ' to makono . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Pangala ' - mi lolita - ku toi : Rata mpai ' tempo - na , uma - pi wule ' hi Yerusalem - wadi tauna mpopue ' Alata ' ala , uma wo ' o hi bulu ' toi - wadi .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Koi ' to Samaria , uma ni ' incai kahema - na to nipue ' . Kai ' to Yahudi , ki ' inca kahema - na to kipue ' , apa ' ria pojanci Alata ' ala to mpo ' uli ' kalompea ' manusia ' mehuwu ngkai laintongo ' to Yahudi .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Tapi ' rata mpai ' tempo - na - - pai ' toi - mi tempo - na - - tauna to mepue ' mpu ' u - mpu ' u hi Alata ' ala to Tuama , kana mpopue ' - i hante kuasa Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' ntuku ' ohea to makono . Pepue ' to hewa toe - mi to napokono Alata ' ala to Tuama .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Alata ' ala , Hi ' a - mi Inoha ' . Jadi ' , tauna to mpopue ' - i , kana mepue ' hante kuasa Inoha ' Tomoroli ' pai ' ntuku ' ohea to makono . "

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Na ' uli ' tobine toei : " Io ' , to ku ' inca - na , rata mpai ' Magau ' Topetolo ' , to rahanga ' Kristus . Ane rata - ipi mpai ' , Hi ' a to mpakanoto omea hi kita ' . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' - mile toi - e , to mpololitai - ko wae - e lau . "

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Bula - ra mololita , rata - ramo ana ' guru - na ngkai ngata . Konce - ra mpohilo Yesus mpololitai hadua tobine . Aga uma haduaa to daho ' mpopekune ' tobine toei ba napa paraluu - na . Uma wo ' o - ra daho ' mpekune ' Yesus ba napa pai ' napololitai - i .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Ngkai ree , tobine toei mpalahii - mi pontomua ' - na hi ree , ncaliu hilou hi ngata mpo ' uli ' - raka hingka ngata - na :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: " Kita hilou mpohilo tauna to mpolohu - ka hawe ' ea gau ' - ku . Meka ' ba lue ' Hi ' a mpu ' u - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' - e ! "

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Toe pai ' hilou - ramo hi mali ngata doko ' mpohirua ' - ki Yesus .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Lingku ' - na tobine toe hilou hi rala ngata , ana ' guru - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Guru , mai - tamo ngkoni ' . "

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Aga na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ria - ka - kuna koni ' - ku to uma ni ' incai . "

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Momepekune ' - ramo ana ' guru - na ra ' uli ' : " Hema - die to mpowai ' - i pongkoni ' - e ? "

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Toe pai ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Pongkoni ' - kule , mpotuku ' konoa Pue ' Ala to mposuro - a , pai ' mposipolea pobago to nawai ' - ka .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Koi ' biasa mpo ' uli ' lolita bulawa toi : Opo ' mula - damo pai ' lako ' mepae - ta . Aga Aku ' mpo ' uli ' - kokoi : Naa - dile , oe lau bonea to mperenene - damo pae - na pai ' to hangaa rapepae - damo .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Tauna to mepae bate mporata gaji ' - ra , alaa - na topepae pai ' to ntuja ' goe ' hangkaa - ngkania . Wua ' to rapepae , batua - na , tauna to mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Jadi ' , makono lolita bulawa to mpo ' uli ' : ' Kahadua - na to ntuja ' , kahadua - na to mpepae . '

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Kuhubui - koi mpepae to bela tinuja ' - ni . Tau ntani ' - na to mpotuja ' , koi ' to mpepae wua ' pobago - ra . "

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Hi ngata to Samaria toe , wori ' tauna to mepangala ' hi Yesus , apa ' ra ' epe lolita tobine toe we ' i to mpo ' uli ' : " Nalohu - maka hawe ' ea gau ' - ku . "

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Jadi ' , kahilou - rami mpohirua ' - ki Yesus , pai ' raperapi ' bona mehani - i hi ngata - ra . Mehani mpu ' u - imi hi ree romengia .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Ngkai ree , kawoo - woria ' tena pue ' ngata to mepangala ' hi Yesus , apa ' ra ' epe moto - mi lolita - na .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki tobine toei : " Wae lau kipangala ' mpu ' u - mi , uma muntu ' ngkai lolita - nu iko - wadi . Apa ' ki ' epe ntilinga moto - mi lolita - na , pai ' ki ' inca Kahi ' a - na mpu ' u - mi Magau ' Tompohore manusia ' ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra . "

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Timpaliu romengia hi Samaria , Yesus mpokaliliu pomako ' - na hilou hi tana ' Galilea .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Ria hangkani Yesus mpo ' uli ' : " Hadua nabi uma biasa rabila ' hi ngata - na moto . "

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Jadi ' , karata - na hi Galilea , tauna mpotarima - i hante kagoe ' nono - ra , apa ' ria - ra wengi hi Yerusalem mpokaralai eo bohe Paskah , pai ' mpohilo hante mata - ra moto - mi hawe ' ea anu mekoncehi to nababehi hi ria nto ' u toe .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Rata wo ' o - imi Yesus hi ngata Kana hi Galilea , hi ngata pompobalia ' - na ue jadi ' anggur . Uma molaa ngkai Kana toe , ria hadua topohawa ' hi ngata Kapernaum , to mobago hi tomi raja , peda ' gaga ana ' - na .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Kana ' epe - na topohawa ' toei karata - na Yesus hi Galilea ngkai Yudea , hilou - imi hi ngata Kana mpohirua ' - ki , na ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , hilou - ta hi Kapernaum , nupaka ' uri ' - ka - kuwo ana ' - ku , apa ' neo ' mate - imi . "

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Ane uma - koi mpohilo tanda mekoncehi pai ' anu mobaraka ' , uma oa ' - koi mepangala ' ! "

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Na ' uli ' topohawa ' toei : " Pue ' , hilou - tamo sohi ' , mate mpai ' ana ' - ku ! "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Nculii ' - moko , mo ' uri ' - imi ana ' - nu . " Napangala ' mpu ' u - mi topohawa ' toei lolita Yesus , pai ' nculii ' mpu ' u - imi - hawo .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Hi lengko ohea - i - pidi , ba hangkuja dua batua - na mpotomu - i , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Mo ' uri ' - imile ana ' - nue ! "

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Napekune ' - ramo : " Jaa hangkuja - i mo ' uri ' - e ? " Ra ' uli ' : " Wengi , ba jaa satu mpo ' eo tu , uma - ipi ngkelengi ' . "

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Nakiwoi - mi topohawa ' , nto ' u - na toe mpu ' u - mi wengi Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Mo ' uri ' - imi ana ' - nu . " Ngkai ree , topohawa ' toei pai ' hira ' hantomia , mepangala ' - ramo hi Yesus .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Toe - mi tanda mekoncehi karongkani - na to nababehi Yesus hi Galilea karata - na ngkai Yudea .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' - imi Yesus hilou hi Yerusalem bona mpokaralai - i eo bohe to Yahudi hi ria .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Hi Yerusalem , mohu ' hi wobo ' wala to rahanga ' Wobo ' Bima , ria wuhu ' , hi rala basa Yahudi hanga ' - na Betesda . Ntololikia wuhu ' toe , ria lima meha ' pengkawinaraa .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Hi retu , wori ' tauna to peda ' . Ria towero , ria tokejo , ria topungku , ntora turu hi pengkawinaraa , ( ( mpopea kamojago - na ue wuhu ' .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Apa ' pontu - na ria mala ' eka Pue ' mana ' u tumai hi wuhu ' toe mpojago ue - na . Pai ' hema to ri ' ulu mehompo hi rala wuhu ' nto ' u ue - na mojago , mo ' uri ' - i ngkai haki ' to natodohaka . ) )

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Ria hi ree hadua tomane , tolu mpulu ' walu mpae - imi peda ' .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Yesus mpohilo - i turu hi ree , pai ' na ' inca kamahae - nami peda ' . Napekune ' - i : " Dota - ko mo ' uri ' ? "

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Na ' uli ' topeda ' toei : " Pue ' , apa ' uma - kuwo hema to mpokeni - a hilou rala wuhu ' nto ' u mojago ue - na . Ke lako ' hilou - a - kuwo , to ntani ' - na wo ' o - mi to mpori ' uluhi - a . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Memata - moko , lulu - mi ali ' - nu , pai ' mako ' - moko . "

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Kamo ' uri ' - nami tau toei , nalulu - mi ali ' - na , pai ' - i momako ' - mi . Tohe ' e jadi ' hi Eo Sabat , eo pepuea ' - ra to Yahudi .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Toe pai ' topoparenta to Yahudi mpokamaro tauna to lako ' mo ' uri ' toei , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Eo Sabat - hanale toe - e lau ! Uma - ko ma ' ala ngkeni ali ' - nu . "

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Na ' uli ' tauna toei : " Apa ' nahubui - a - kuwo tauna to mpaka ' uri ' - a we ' i , na ' uli ' - ka : ' Lulu - mi ali ' - nu pai ' mako ' - moko . ' "

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Rapekune ' - i : " Hema - i to mpohubui - ko ngkeni ali ' - nue ? "

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Tapi ' uma na ' incai kahema - na to mpaka ' uri ' - i , apa ' Yesus uma - pi ria hi ree , mpolia ' hilou - imi hi olo ' tauna to wori ' .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Uma mahae ngkai ree , Yesus mpohirua ' - ki tauna toei hi Tomi Alata ' ala , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Mo ' uri ' - moko , neo ' - pi - hawo mpobabehi jeko ' , bona neo ' mpai ' narumpa ' - ko ba napa - napa to meliu kada ' a - na . "

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Ngkai ree , hilou - imi tauna toei mpohirua ' - raka topoparenta to Yahudi , na ' uli ' - raka Kayesus - na to mpaka ' uri ' - i .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Toe pai ' topoparenta to Yahudi ntepu ' u mpobalinai ' Yesus , apa ' mepaka ' uri ' - i - hana hi Eo Sabat .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Tuama - ku mobago duu ' eo toi , pai ' Aku ' wo ' o kana mobago . "

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Ngkai ree , rahuduwukui - mi topoparenta to Yahudi mpali ' ohea - ra mpopatehi - i . Apa ' uma wule ' kampotiboki - na ada hi Eo Sabat , tapi ' na ' uli ' wo ' o - hana ka ' Alata ' ala - na Tuama - na ; jadi ' , napopohibalia - hana woto - na hante Alata ' ala .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Aku ' Ana ' Alata ' ala , uma - a bisa mobago ntuku ' konoa - ku moto . Muntu ' to kuhilo ngkai Tuama - ku , toe - mi to kupobago . Napa - napa bago Tuama - ku , tetu wo ' o - kuwo bago - ku .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Apa ' Tuama - ku mpoka ' ahi ' - a , pai ' napopohiloi - a hawe ' ea to napobago . Kakupaka ' uri ' - na topeda ' toe ngone ria , pai ' kubabehi wo ' o mpai ' pobago to meliu kabohe - na ngkai toe , alaa - na konce mpu ' u - mokoi mpai ' .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Hewa Tuama - ku mpopemata tomate pai ' mpowai ' - ra katuwua ' , wae wo ' o Aku ' mpowai ' katuwua ' hi hema - hema to kupelihi .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Tuama - ku moto uma mpobotuhi kara - kara manusia ' . Hawe ' ea kuasa pompobotuhi natonu - mi hi Aku ' Ana ' - na .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Nababehi toe , bona hawe ' ea tauna mpobila ' - a hewa pompobila ' - ra Tuama - ku . Hema to uma mpobila ' - a , uma wo ' o - ra mpobila ' Tuama - ku to mposuro - a .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Hema to mpo ' epe lolita - ku pai ' - ra mepangala ' hi Pue ' Ala to mposuro - a , bate mporata - ra katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . Uma - ra mpai ' rahuku ' sabana jeko ' - ra . Tebahaka - ramo ngkai kamatea , mporata - ramo katuwua ' .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Rata mpai ' tempo - na - - pai ' toi - mi tempo - na - - tauna tomate mpo ' epe libu ' Ana ' Alata ' ala , pai ' hira ' to mpo ' epe mporata katuwua ' to bo ' u .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Apa ' hewa Tuama - ku mobaraka ' mpowai ' katuwua ' , wae wo ' o nawai ' - a baraka ' mpowai ' katuwua ' .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Nawai ' wo ' o - a kuasa mpobotuhi kara - kara manusia ' , apa ' Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: " Neo ' nipokakonce lolita - ku toi , apa ' rata mpai ' tempo - na hawe ' ea tauna to hi rala daeo ' mpo ' epe libu ' - ku ,

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: pai ' - ra memata ngkai daeo ' - ra . To mpobabehi gau ' to lompe ' rapopemata bona mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' . To mpobabehi gau ' to dada ' a rapopemata bona rahuku ' .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: " Aku ' , uma - a bisa mpobabehi napa - napa ntuku ' konoa - ku moto . Kubotuhi ntuku ' to nahawai ' - ka Alata ' ala . Pobotuhi - ku monoa ' , apa ' uma - a mpotuku ' dota - ku moto , mpotuku ' - a kadota - na Pue ' Ala to mposuro - a .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: " Ane ke Aku ' moto - wadi to mpo ' uli ' ka ' Aku ' - na suro Alata ' ala , pai ' uma ria tau ntani ' - na to mposabii ' - a , uma ni ' incai ba makono lolita - ku ba uma - di .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Tapi ' ria moto kahadua - na to mposabii ' - a , pai ' ku ' inca kamakono - na posabi ' - na toe .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Koi ' mpohubui doo - ni hilou hi Yohanes Topeniu ' wengi , pai ' na ' uli ' - miraka posabi ' - na . Napa to na ' uli ' toe , bate makono omea .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Aga kakoo - kono - na uma kuparaluu posabi ' ngkai manusia ' . Kupopokiwoii - koi lolita - na Yohanes toe - e , bona mporata - koi kalompea ' .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Yohanes toei hewa lampu to mehini pai ' ngkeni kabajaa - na hi koi ' . Pai ' koi ' , goe ' lia moto - koi mpo ' epe lolita - na . Aga kagoe ' - ni tetu hampai ' - wadi .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: " Aga Aku ' , ria - ka - kuna sabi ' to mpakanoto kahema - ku , pai ' sabi ' toei meliu ngkai posabi ' - na Yohanes . Ane ninaa lompe ' pobago - ku , toe - mile to mposabii ' kahema - kue . Napa to kupobago hewa toe lau , pobago to nahawai ' - ka Tuama - ku bona kuposipolea . Pobago - ku toi - mi to mpakanoto ka ' Aku ' - na suro Tuama - ku .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Pai ' meliu ngkai toe , Tuama - ku to mposuro - a , Hi ' a moto - mi jadi ' sabi ' - ku mpo ' uli ' kahema - ku . Tapi ' koi ' , ko ' ia hangkania ni ' epei libu ' - na , ko ' ia nihiloi lence - na .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Lolita - na uma nitimamahi hi rala nono - ni , apa ' uma - koi mepangala ' hi Aku ' to nasuro .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Koi ' mpewulihi ' ihi ' Buku Tomoroli ' , apa ' ni ' uli ' mporata - koi katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na ngkai Buku Tomoroli ' toe . Hiaa ' Buku Tomoroli ' moto wo ' o - mi to mpotompo ' wiwi - a .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , uma oa ' - koi dota tumai hi Aku ' , bona mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' toe .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: " Uma - a mpopebila ' hi manusia ' .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Apa ' ku ' inca moto - koi , ka ' uma - na ria ahi ' - ni hi Alata ' ala .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Katumai - ku toi , mpokeni - a hanga ' - na Tuama - ku , aga uma - koi dota mpotarima - a . Ane ria to tumai mpokeni hanga ' - ra moto - wadi , nitarima lau - ra .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Beiwa kamepangala ' - ni hi Aku ' - e , apa ' doko ' rabila ' doo - wadi - koi , uma - koi mpali ' pebila ' to ngkai Alata ' ala to Hadudua .

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Aga neo ' ni ' uli ' wae , Aku ' mpai ' to mpakilu - koi hi Tuama - ku . Nabi Musa moto - mi to mpakilu - koi . Ni ' uli ' - koina ngkai petuku ' - ni hi hawa ' Musa pai ' - koi mporata kalompea ' .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Tapi ' ane bongko nipangala ' mpu ' u - i Musa , tantu nipangala ' wo ' o - a Aku ' - e , apa ' napa to na ' uki ' Musa , Aku ' - mi kadungkua - na .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Bangku ' to na ' uki ' Musa uma nipangala ' , peliu - liu - nami ka ' uma - na nipangala ' lolita - ku . "

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Oti toe , hilou - imi Yesus hi dipo Rano Galilea , to rahanga ' wo ' o Rano Tiberias .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Wori ' lia tauna mpotuku ' - i , apa ' rahilo hawe ' ea tanda mekoncehi to nababehi , mpaka ' uri ' topeda ' .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Manake ' - i lou hi panapa bulu ' hante ana ' guru - na , pai ' mohura - imi hi ree .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Nto ' u toe , neo ' rata - mi eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga ' Eo Paskah .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Yesus mponaa ntololikia - na , nahilo - hawo , mo ' iko - ra - damo tauna tumai mpomohui ' - i . Na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Filipus : " Hiapa - ta me ' oli pongkoni ' , tapokoni ' - raka tauna to wori ' toera lau ? "

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: ( Kakoo - kono - na , na ' inca ami ' moto - mi napa mpai ' to nababehi . Napekune ' hewa toe hi Filipus , apa ' doko ' naponciloi pepangala ' - na . )

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Na ' uli ' Filipus : " Nau ' ro ' atu doi pera ' tapope ' oli - ki pongkoni ' pai ' butu dua - ra tawai ' hore hangkedi ' - wadi , uma oa ' hono ' . "

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Ngkai ree , hadua ana ' guru - na to rahanga ' Andreas , ompi ' - na Simon Petrus , mpo ' uli ' :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: " Ohe ' i hadua ana ' to mobokui lima meha ' roti pai ' tinapa uru roma ' a , aga napa - mile kalaua - na hi tauna to wori ' hewa toe - e lau ? "

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Hubui - ramo mohura ! " Jadi ' mohura - ramo hi kowo ' raponcawa ali ' , apa ' wori ' kowo ' hi ree . Hi olo ' ntodea toe , ria ba lima ncobu paka ' tomane .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' ala ' - mi roti , na ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala , pai ' nabagi - bagi hi tauna to wori ' to mohura . Hewa toe wo ' o pompobabehi - na hante bau ' uru . Ngkoni ' - ramo omea duu ' - ra bohu .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Bohu - ramo omea , na ' uli ' Yesus hi ana ' guru - na : " Rumpu - koi toro - na , bona neo ' ria to rakerei . "

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Rarumpu mpu ' u - mi , hampulu ' roluncu - pi toro - na ngkai lima meha ' roti to rakoni ' tauna to wori ' we ' i .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Karahilo - na ntodea tanda mekoncehi tohe ' e , momepololitai - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Hi ' a mpu ' u - mi - tawo ' nabi to rajanci owi - e , to ra ' uli ' rata mpai ' hi dunia ' toi - e ! "

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Jadi ' , ria patuju - ra doko ' mpewuku - i jadi ' magau ' - ra . Kana ' inca - na Yesus patuju - ra toe , malai - imi ngkai ree hilou hi bulu ' - na .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Ncimonou ' tohe ' e , mana ' u - ramo ana ' guru - na hilou hi rano mpopea - i .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Rapopea duu ' mobengi , ko ' ia oa ' - i rata . Jadi ' , mosakaya moto - ramo hilou mpotoa ' ngata Kapernaum .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Bula - ra mosakaya toe , rata ngolu ' bohe mporumpa ' - ra , alaa - na bohe balumpa hi rano .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Lima ba ono kilo - ramo ngkai talinti , rahilo - rawo , etu - imi tumai Yesus momako ' hi lolo ue mpototopa - ra . Aga uma ra ' incai Kayesus - na . Me ' eka ' lia - ramo .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Neo ' me ' eka ' ! Aku ' - mile toi - e . "

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe - di , goe ' - ramo mpodoa Yesus hi rala sakaya . Pesua ' - na Yesus hi rala sakaya , rata - ramo hi wiwi ' talinti to ratoa ' .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Kampeneo - na , wori ' tauna hi dipo rano mpopali ' Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Hiapa - imidie ? Uma - idi mohawi ' sakaya dohe ana ' guru - nae ngone . Hiaa ' uma ria sakaya ntani ' - na hi rei ngone , muntu ' sakaya to rahawi ' ana ' guru - na - wadi . "

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Ngkai ree , rata wo ' o tauna ngkai ngata Tiberias hi rala sakaya - ra , pai ' - ra mencore mohu ' hi pongkonia ' - ra ntodea wengi , to mpokoni ' roti to nagane ' Pue ' Yesus .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Kara ' inca - na ntodea ka ' uma - napi ria Yesus hi ree , ntahawe ' ana ' guru - na uma wo ' o - pi ria , mosakaya wo ' o - ramo - rawo hilou hi Kapernaum mpopali ' - i .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Karata - ra ntodea hi dipo rano mpohirua ' - ki Yesus , rapekune ' - i : " Nto ' uma - ko rata hi rehe ' i - e , Guru ? "

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Ku ' inca moto - le patuju - ni mpali ' - ae . Uma ba kani ' inca - na batua - na tanda mekoncehi to kubabehi . Nipali ' - ale apa ' bohu - mokoi kupokoni ' .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Neo ' - koi mobago mpali ' pongkoni ' to sohi ' oti pai ' waha ' . Mobago - koi mpali ' pongkoni ' to uma ria kawahaa ' - na pai ' to mpowai ' katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' to mpowai ' - koi pongkoni ' tohe ' e , apa ' Alata ' ala to Tuama mpotudo ' ka ' Aku ' - nami to napelihi pai ' to napokono . "

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Mepekune ' - ra ntodea : " Napa to kana kipobago bona pobago - kai ntuku ' konoa Alata ' ala ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Toi - mile pobago to napokono Alata ' ala - e : mepangala ' hi Aku ' to nasuro . "

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' wo ' o - mi ntodea : " Ane wae , tanda napa to nupopohiloi - kakai , bona kipangala ' - ko kangkai Alata ' ala - na mpu ' u - ko ? Napa to nubabehi ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Wai ' - ka - kaiwo pongkoni ' , hewa to rakoni ' ntu ' a - ta owi . Bula - ra hi papada to wao ' , ngkoni ' - ra pongkoni ' to rahanga ' manna , hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' : ' Nawai ' - ra pongkoni ' ngkai suruga . ' "

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Bela nabi Musa owi to mpowai ' pongkoni ' ngkai suruga . Tempo toi - e , Tuama - ku - hana to mpowai ' - koi pongkoni ' to mpu ' u - mpu ' u ngkai suruga .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Pongkoni ' to nawai ' Alata ' ala , batua - na , to mana ' u tumai ngkai suruga pai ' to mpowai ' katuwua ' hi manusia ' . "

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Ra ' uli ' - ki ntodea : " Ane wae , wai ' - ka - kaiwo pongkoni ' tetu butu - butu eo - na ! "

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' toi - mi pongkoni ' to mpowai ' katuwua ' . Hema to tumai hi Aku ' uma - rapa mo ' oro ' , pai ' hema to mepangala ' hi Aku ' uma - rapa ngkamara , duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Aga hewa to ku ' uli ' we ' i , nau ' nihilo - ama , uma oa ' - a nipangala ' .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna to nawai ' - maka Tuama - ku , bate tumai hi Aku ' . Pai ' hema - hema to tumai hi Aku ' , bate kutarima - i pai ' uma - i kupopalai .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Apa ' tumai - a ngkai suruga , uma mpobabehi konoa - ku moto . Tumai - a mpobabehi konoa - na Alata ' ala to mposuro - a .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Toi - mi konoa - na : bona ngkai hawe ' ea tauna to nawai ' - ka , neo ' mpai ' ria haduaa to moronto , bate kupopemata - ra omea hi Eo Kiama .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Toi - mi konoa Tuama - ku : bona hawe ' ea to mpohilo pai ' to mepangala ' hi Aku ' Ana ' - na mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na , pai ' kupopemata - ra hi Eo Kiama . "

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Ngkai ree , mparangkunutia - ramo to Yahudi , apa ' na ' uli ' - hana Yesus , Hi ' a - mi pongkoni ' to mana ' u tumai ngkai suruga .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Momepololitai - ramo ra ' uli ' : " Ah , Hi ' a toe - le Yesus , ana ' Yusuf . Ta ' inca moto tina - na pai ' tuama - na . Napa - di - hana pai ' na ' uli ' ngkai suruga - ie ? "

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' - koi ngkunuti .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Uma ria haduaa to ma ' ala tumai hi Aku ' , ane uma - ra nakeni Tuama - ku to mposuro - a . Pai ' kupopemata - ra omea hi Eo Kiama .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Hi rala sura nabi - nabi owi te ' uki ' hewa toi : ' Alata ' ala mpotudui ' hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na . ' Jadi ' , hawe ' ea tauna to mpo ' epe pai ' mpotarima tudui ' - na Tuama - ku , bate tumai - ra hi Aku ' .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Aga neo ' ni ' uli ' wae , ria mpu ' u - ramo to mpohilo Tuama - ku . Muntu ' Aku ' - wadi to mpohilo - i , apa ' Aku ' ngkai Alata ' ala - a - kuna .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : hema to mepangala ' hi Aku ' , mporata - ramo katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Aku ' - mi pongkoni ' to mpowai ' katuwua ' .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: " Pongkoni ' to rahanga ' manna to rakoni ' ntu ' a - ni owi hi papada to wao ' uma mpowai ' katuwua ' , apa ' mate omea moto - ra .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Aga uma hewa toe ane pongkoni ' to mana ' u tumai ngkai suruga . Hema - hema to ngkoni ' pongkoni ' toi , uma - ra mate .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Aku ' toi - mi pongkoni ' to mana ' u tumai ngkai suruga , pongkoni ' to tuwu ' . Tauna to ngkoni ' pongkoni ' toi tuwu ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . Pongkoni ' to tuwu ' tohe ' i , batua - na woto - ku to kupewai ' bona manusia ' mporata katuwua ' . "

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Kara ' epe - na to Yahudi lolita - na Yesus toe , momehono ' - ramo himpau hira ' , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa - i ma ' ala mpewai ' woto - na hi kita ' bona takoni ' - e ? "

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Ane uma nikoni ' woto - ku , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , pai ' uma ni ' inu raa ' - ku , uma - koi mporata katuwua ' kao ' - ni .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Tauna to ngkoni ' woto - ku pai ' nginu raa ' - ku , mporata - ramo katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na , pai ' kupopemata - ra hi Eo Kiama .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Apa ' woto - ku pongkoni ' mpu ' u , pai ' raa ' - ku ininu mpu ' u .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Tauna to ngkoni ' woto - ku pai ' nginu raa ' - ku , tida - ra hintuwu ' hante Aku ' , pai ' Aku ' hante hira ' .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: " Tuama - ku to mposuro - a , Hi ' a - mi pehupaa ' katuwua ' , pai ' Aku ' tuwu ' ngkai Hi ' a . Wae wo ' o tauna to ngkoni ' woto - ku , mporata - ra katuwua ' ngkai Aku ' .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Toi mpu ' u - mile pongkoni ' to mana ' u ngkai suruga - e , uma hewa manna to rakoni ' ntu ' a - ni owi . Nau ' - ra ngkoni ' manna toe , bate mate oa ' - ra . Tapi ' tauna to ngkoni ' pongkoni ' toi - e , tuwu ' - ra duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Yesus mpololita hawe ' ea toe nto ' u petudui ' - na hi tomi posampayaa hi Kapernaum .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Kampo ' epe - ra lolita Yesus toe we ' i , wori ' topetuku ' - na mpo ' uli ' : " Ah ! Mokoro rahi tudui ' toe - e . Hema mpai ' to mpokule ' mpotuku ' ! "

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Ntaa ' na ' inca moto - di Yesus kangkunuti - ra topetuku ' - nae . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ha nipokedi ' nono mpo ' epe tudui ' - ku we ' i ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Ane wae - di , beiwa mpai ' ane nihilo - apa , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , ngkahe ' nculii ' hilou hi po ' ohaa ' - ku ami ' ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Inoha ' Alata ' ala - hana to mpowai ' katuwua ' . Kuasa manusia ' uma ria kalaua - na . Lolita to kupohowa ' - kokoi mehuwu ngkai Inoha ' Alata ' ala pai ' mpowai ' katuwua ' .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , ria moto - koi hantongo ' to uma mepangala ' . " Yesus mpo ' uli ' hewa toe apa ' na ' inca ami ' - mi ngkai lomo ' - na kahema - ra to uma mepangala ' hi Hi ' a , pai ' na ' inca wo ' o kahema - na mpai ' to mpobalu ' - i hi bali ' - na .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - mi we ' i , uma haduaa to ma ' ala tumai hi Aku ' ane uma - ra napiliu Tuama - ku . "

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Ntepu ' u ngkai tempo toe , wori ' topetuku ' - na Yesus mpalahii - i . Uma - rapa dota mpotuku ' - i .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Jadi ' , mepekune ' wo ' o - imi hi ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua , na ' uli ' : " Ha malai wo ' o - koi mpai ' koi ' - e ? "

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Na ' uli ' Simon Petrus : " Ha hilou hi hema - makai mpai ' Pue ' ? Iko - wadi to mpohowa ' lolita to mpowai ' katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Kipangala ' - mi pai ' ki ' inca ka ' Iko - na Suro to moroli ' ngkai Alata ' ala . "

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' moto - mile to mpelihi - koi to hampulu ' rodua toi - e . Nau ' wae , hadua ngkai koi ' mewali seta mpai ' . "

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: To natoa ' Yesus , Yudas ana ' Simon Iskariot . Apa ' nau ' Yudas hadua ngkai ana ' guru - na to hampulu ' rodua , hi ' a mpai ' to mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - na .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus modao ' hi tana ' Galilea . Uma - ipi dota hilou hi tana ' Yudea , apa ' topoparenta to Yahudi hi ria doko ' mpopatehi - i .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Nto ' u toe , neo ' rata - mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga ' Posusa ' Pobamaru ' .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Jadi ' , ompi ' - na Yesus mpobawai - i hilou hi Yudea mpokaralai eo bohe toe , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Neo ' - hawo ntora hi rehe ' i ! Hilou - tamo hi Yudea , bona topetuku ' - nu mpohilo anu mekoncehi to nubabehi .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Uma - ko mpai ' jadi ' tau bohe ane ntora hi rehe ' i - wadi - ko . Ane mpobabehi anu mekoncehi mpu ' u - ko , popohiloi hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' ! "

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Hewa toe - mi lolita - ra ompi ' - na Yesus , apa ' uma wo ' o - ra - rawo mepangala ' hi Hi ' a .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ko ' ia rata tempo - na kupopehuwu woto - ku . Ane koi ' - koina , uma beiwa ba nto ' uma - koi hilou hi Yerusalem ,

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: apa ' uma ria tauna to mpokahuku ' - koi . Aku ' - e , rapokahuku ' - a - kuna tauna to dada ' a hi dunia ' toi , apa ' ntora ku ' uli ' - raka kadada ' a kehi - ra .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Meri ' ulu - mokoi hilou hi posusaa ' toe ria . Aku ' , ko ' ia - a - kuna hilou , apa ' ko ' ia rata tempo - ku . "

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Wae - mi lolita Yesus hi ompi ' - na , pai ' tida moto - imi hi Galilea .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - ramo ompi ' - na Yesus hi Yerusalem bona mpokaralai Posusa ' Pobamaru ' hi ria . Ntaa ' metuku ' bongo moto - idi - hawo Yesus - e , aga hadudua - na bona neo ' ra ' incai ntodea .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Hi posusaa ' toe , topoparenta to Yahudi ntora mpopali ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Hiapa - imidi Yesus - e ? "

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Pai ' ntodea wo ' o , mparanusi - ramo mpotompo ' wiwi - i . Ria - ra to mpo ' uli ' : " Tauna to lompe ' moto - i - hawo . " Hantongo ' wo ' o mpo ' uli ' : " Uma - di ! Topebagiu - i - hana ! "

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Tapi ' uma haduaa to daho ' mpolonto ' , apa ' me ' eka ' wo ' o - ra wa hi topoparenta to Yahudi .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Pentongoa ' posusa ' tohe ' e , Yesus mesua ' hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , pai ' natepu ' u - mi metudui ' .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Konce - ra topoparenta to Yahudi mpo ' epe tudui ' - na , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa pai ' na ' inca ihi ' Buku Tomoroli ' , bo uma - i - hawo mosikola - e ? "

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " To kutudui ' - kokoile , tudui ' ngkai Alata ' ala to mposuro - a , bela tudui ' - ku moto .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Hema to doko ' mpobabehi konoa Alata ' ala , ra ' inca mpai ' kangkaiapa - na tudui ' - ku toi , ba ngkai Alata ' ala mpu ' u - di ba lolita - ku moto - wadi .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Tauna to mpokeni lolita - na moto , mpope ' une ' - i - wadi . Tapi ' tauna to mpali ' karabilaa ' - na Alata ' ala to mposuro - i , tauna to monoa ' - i , uma ria pebagiua - na .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Nabi Musa owi mpowai ' - koi Atura Pue ' . Tapi ' uma - koi ria haduaa to mpotuku ' Atura toe . Napa pai ' doko ' nipatehi - a ? "

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' ntodea : " Wuli - ko ! Hema to doko ' mpopatehi - ko ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mekehele - koi , apa ' mpaka ' uri ' - a tauna hi Eo Sabat .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Hiaa ' koi ' wo ' o mobago moto hi Eo Sabat ane mpobabehi - koi ada petini ' . Nabi Musa owi mpohubui - koi mpotini ' ana ' - ni . ( Tapi ' kakoo - kono - na ada petini ' toe ngkai ntu ' a - ta owi to meri ' ulu ngkai Musa , bela ngkai Musa moto . ) Ane ria ana ' - ni to kana ratini ' hi Eo Sabat , bate nitini ' moto - i .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Jadi ' , ane metini ' - koi hi Eo Sabat bona neo ' ntiboki Atura Musa , napa pai ' nikaroe - a apa ' mpaka ' uri ' - a tauna hi Eo Sabat bona hobo ' woto - na lompe ' ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Neo ' ranaa to kahiloa hi mali - na - wadi . Pakanoa ' powile - ni bona nihilo napa to makono . "

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Kara ' epe - na pue ' ngata Yerusalem lolita - na Yesus toe , ingu ' - ramo . Ria - ra to mpo ' uli ' : " Ha bela tauna toe - imi mai to rapali ' pangkeni - ta , doko ' rapatehi - e ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Hiaa ' he ' e - imi mai metudui ' hante uma ria kakoo - koroa ' - na , pai ' uma hema to mpokamaro - i . Ba lue ' ra ' inca lau - mi pangkeni - ta Kahi ' a - na Magau ' Topetolo ' - e ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Aga uma - hawo masipato ' Kahi ' a - na Magau ' Topetolo ' , apa ' ta ' inca kangkaiapa - na . Ane rata mpu ' u mpai ' Magau ' Topetolo ' to rajanci owi - e , uma mpai ' hema to mpo ' incai kangkaiapa - na . "

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Jadi ' , bula - na Yesus metudui ' hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , mekio ' - i napesukui , na ' uli ' : " Ni ' uli ' ni ' inca moto kahema - ku pai ' kangkaiapa - ku . Tumai - a , uma ntuku ' konoa - ku moto . Tumai - a mpotuku ' konoa - na Alata ' ala to mposuro - a . Hi ' a - mi to masipato ' rapangala ' . Tapi ' koi ' uma mpo ' incai - i .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Aku ' , ku ' inca - i apa ' ngkai Hi ' a pehupaa ' - ku , pai ' Hi ' a to mposuro - a . "

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Nto ' u toe , ria - ra to doko ' mpohoko ' - i , aga uma hema to dungku pale - ra hi Hi ' a , apa ' ko ' ia rata tempo - na .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Wori ' hi olo ' tau ntodea to mepangala ' hi Hi ' a , ra ' uli ' : " Magau ' Topetolo ' mpu ' u - i - tawo ' , baa ' wori ' - di tanda mekoncehi to nababehi - e . "

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Ria - ra to Parisi to mpo ' epe kamparanusi - ra ntodea mpotompo ' wiwi Yesus . Toe pai ' to Parisi hante imam pangkeni mpohubui ba hangkuja dua topojaga Tomi Alata ' ala hilou mpohoko ' - i .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Yesus mpololitai ntodea , na ' uli ' - raka : " Hampai ' - a - damo dohe - ni . Nculii ' - a mpai ' hilou hi Hi ' a to mposuro - a .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Nipali ' - a mpai ' , aga uma - apa niruai ' . Pai ' hi kahilouaa - ku uma - koi bisa hilou . "

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Ingu ' - ramo topoparenta to Yahudi mpo ' epe lolita - na , pai ' momepekune ' - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Hilou hiapa - ile ' , pai ' na ' uli ' uma - i mpai ' taruai ' - e ? Meka ' ba hilou - i mo ' oha ' dohe to Yahudi to mposowo ' - ra to Yunani , pai ' - i mpotudui ' - ra to Yunani .

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Pai ' napa batua lolita - na to mpo ' uli ' , tapali ' - i aga uma - i taruai ' , pai ' uma - ta bisa hilou hi kahilouaa - na ? "

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Eo ka ' omea - na susa ' tohe ' e , eo to meliu karapomobohe - na . Hi eo toe , mokore - imi Yesus hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , pai ' - i mekio ' : " Hema - koi to ngkamara , tumai - mokoi hi Aku ' pai ' nginu !

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' : hema to mepangala ' hi Aku ' , ngkai nono - ra mo ' ili wori ' ue to tuwu ' . "

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Lolita - na Yesus toe mpowalatu Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , to mehompo mpai ' hi tauna to mepangala ' hi Hi ' a . Nto ' u pololita - na Yesus toe , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' ko ' ia mehompo hi topetuku ' - na , apa ' Yesus ko ' ia rapomobohe .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Wori ' tauna mpo ' epe lolita Yesus toe , pai ' ria - ra hantongo ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Bate Hi ' a - mile nabi to najanci Alata ' ala owi - e . "

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Hantongo ' wo ' o - ra mpo ' uli ' : " Magau ' Topetolo ' mpu ' u - idi ! " Aga ria wo ' o - ra to mpo ' uli ' : " Ah , to Galilea - i - hanale ! Uma masipato ' Magau ' Topetolo ' mehupa ' ngkai Galilea .

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' : Magau ' Topetolo ' muli Magau ' Daud , pai ' mehupa ' ngkai ngata Betlehem , ngata kaputua Daud . "

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Alaa - na momehono ' lau - ramo ntodea : hantongo ' - ra mepangala ' hi Yesus , hantongo ' uma .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Ria - ra to doko ' mpohoko ' - i , aga uma hema to dungku pale - ra .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Topojaga Tomi Alata ' ala to rahubui mpohoko ' Yesus , nculii ' - ramo hilou hi to Parisi pai ' imam pangkeni . Uma - ra oko mpohoko ' - i . Ra ' uli ' pangkeni toera : " Napa - di pai ' uma - i nihoko ' pai ' nikeni tumai - e ? "

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Ratompoi ' : " Apa ' ko ' ia ria ki ' epei tauna to mololita hewa Hi ' a ! "

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Mehono ' to Parisi toera : " Ei ' - e ! Ha nabagiu wo ' o - moko - koiwo koi ' - e ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Hilo , uma ria hadua pangkeni ba to Parisi to mepangala ' hi Yesus .

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Muntu ' ntodea to mpangala ' - i , apa ' uma ra ' incai Atura Musa . Harala - rada ! "

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Ngkai ree , mololita wo ' o - mi - hawo hadua to Parisi to rahanga ' Nikodemus . Nikodemus toei , ria - imi hangkani mpencuai ' Yesus . Na ' uli ' Nikodemus mpo ' uli ' - raka doo - na :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: " Ntuku ' atura - ta - hawo , uma - ta ma ' ala mpohuku ' tauna ane ko ' ia - hawo ra ' epe noa ' - na pai ' raparesa ' gau ' - na . "

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Hampetompoi ' doo - na : " Ha ngkai Galilea wo ' o - ko - kowo iko - e ! Wile - dile pai ' kamata rala Buku Tomoroli ' - e . Uma ria nabi to mehupa ' ngkai Galilea . "

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' - ramo , hore - hore hilou hi tomi - ra .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Tapi ' Yesus hilou hi Bulu ' Zaitun .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Kampeneo - na mepupulo ngkii , hilou wo ' o - imi hi Tomi Alata ' ala . Tumai - ramo ntodea mpomohui ' - i , pai ' mohura - imi mpotudui ' - ra .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Bula - na metudui ' toe , rata - ramo guru agama hante to Parisi , mpokeni hadua tobine to rarata bula - na mobualo ' , rapopokore - i hi laintongo ' ntodea .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Guru , tobine tetui rarata kongko bula - na mobualo ' !

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Hi rala Atura Musa , ria parenta to mpo ' uli ' : tobine to mogau ' hewa toe kana rapana ' watu duu ' - na mate . Jadi ' Iko , beiwa - kowo pobotuhi - nu ? "

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Patuju pompekunea ' - ra toe , mpali ' kedo ' , bona ma ' ala - ra mposalai ' Yesus . Tapi ' Yesus , uma - i winihi . Motungka ' - i - wadi mo ' uki ' hi tana ' hante karawe - na .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Ka ' omea - na , apa ' rajojo mpekune ' - i , mebago ' - imi pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Hema - koi to uma ria jeko ' - ni , hi ' a - mi to lomo ' - na mpopana ' tobine toei ! "

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Oti toe , motungka ' wo ' o - imi , pai ' - i mo ' uki ' tena hi tana ' hante karawe - na .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Kara ' epe - na pangkeni to Yahudi lolita Yesus tohe ' e , pengkawusili - rami hadua hadua , ntepu ' u ngkai totu ' a duu ' rata hi to mongura . Ka ' omea - na , malai omea - ramo , muntu ' Yesus - damo to hi ree hante tobine toei hi laintongo ' ntodea .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Ngkai ree , mebago ' - imi Yesus pai ' mpo ' uli ' - ki tobine toei : " Hiapa - ramo we ' i to mpakilu - koe ? Ha uma - rapa ria to doko ' mpohuku ' - koe ? "

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Natompoi ' tobine toei : " Uma - pi hema , Pue ' . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' wo ' o uma mpohuku ' - ko . Wae - pi , hilou - moko , pai ' nubahakai - mi mpobabehi jeko ' . " ) )

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Oti toe , mololita wo ' o - imi Yesus hi to Yahudi , na ' uli ' : " Aku ' toi - mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia ' . Tauna to mpotuku ' - a , uma - ra momako ' hi rala kabengia - na . Mporata - ra baja to mpowai ' katuwua ' . "

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Ra ' uli ' to Parisi : " Uma - le makono lolita - nue , apa ' mpo ' une ' woto - nu moto - moko - kona . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Nau ' mpotompo ' wiwi woto - ku moto - ale , makono oa ' lolita - ku , apa ' ku ' inca kangkaiapa - ku , pai ' ku ' inca hiapa kahilouaa - ku . Aga koi ' , uma ni ' incai .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Koi ' mpohurai kara - kara ntuku ' pekiri manusia ' . Aku ' , uma - a mpohurai kara - kara hema - hema .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na mpohurai - a kara - kara tauna , pobotuhi - ku bate monoa ' , apa ' uma hadudua - ku . Tuama - ku to mposuro - a , Hi ' a - mi doo - ku .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: " Hi rala Buku Atura - ni moto te ' uki ' hewa tohe ' i : ' Ane ria nte rodua sabi ' to hibalia lolita - ra , posabi ' - ra toe ma ' ala rapangala ' . '

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Ria - mi rodua sabi ' - ku : Aku ' moto - mi hadua , pai ' karodua - na Tuama - ku to mposuro - a . "

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Ra ' uli ' to Parisi : " Ha hiapa - i tuama - nue ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Apa ' uma ni ' incai - a , toe pai ' uma wo ' o ni ' incai Tuama - ku . Ane ke ni ' inca mpu ' u - a , tantu ni ' inca wo ' o - i Tuama - ku . "

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Hawe ' ea toe na ' uli ' Yesus bula - na metudui ' hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , mohu ' peti ' pompunaa ' doi pepue ' . Ko ' ia oa ' - i rahoko ' , apa ' ko ' ia rata tempo - na .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus hi topoparenta to Yahudi : " Hilou - a mpai ' , pai ' nipali ' - a , aga mate - koi mpai ' ntali jeko ' - ni - pidi . Hi kahilouaa - ku uma - koi bisa hilou . "

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe , momepololitai - ramo topoparenta to Yahudi , ra ' uli ' : " Napa batua - na lolita - na toe - e we ' i ? Ba doko ' mengkahunca ' - idi , pai ' na ' uli ' uma - ta bisa hilou hi kahilouaa - nae . "

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Koi ' - le ngkai kadingkia ' - na , Aku ' ngkai kalangkoa - na . Koi ' ngkai dunia ' toi , Aku ' uma - a ngkai dunia ' toi .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi , mate - koi mpai ' ntali jeko ' - ni . Apa ' ane uma nipangala ' lolita - ku to mpo ' uli ' kahema - ku , bate mate mpu ' u - koi ntali jeko ' - ni . "

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
