text2: Rapekune ' - i : " Ha hema mpu ' u - ko - kowo Iko - e ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Napa - pi kalaua - na mpololitai - koi !

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Wori ' - pidile ke to ku ' uli ' mposalai ' - koie . Tapi ' Hi ' a to mposuro - a , masipato ' lia - i rapangala ' , pai ' napa to ku ' epe ngkai Hi ' a , toe - mi to kuparata hi koi ' to hi dunia ' . "

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: To na ' uli ' Yesus tohe ' e , mpotompo ' wiwi Tuama - na , tapi ' uma ra ' incai batua - na .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' tena - raka : " Ane nipokalangko - apa mpai ' , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' , lako ' ni ' inca - di ka ' Aku ' - nami . Uma ria hanyalaa to kubabehi ntuku ' konoa - ku moto . Muntu ' mpo ' uli ' - a napa to natudui ' - ka Tuama - ku .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Hi ' a - mi to mposuro - a , pai ' nadohei oa ' - a . Uma - a napelele ' hadudua - ku , apa ' kubabehi oa ' napa to mpakagoe ' nono - na . "

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' hawe ' ea toe , wori ' tauna mepangala ' hi Hi ' a .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka to Yahudi to mepangala ' hi Hi ' a : " Ane tida - koi mpotuku ' tudui ' - ku , koi ' jadi ' topetuku ' - ku mpu ' u .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Pai ' ane topetuku ' - ku mpu ' u - mokoi , ni ' inca mpu ' u mpai ' tudui ' to makono , alaa - na tebahaka - mokoi . "

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Hampetompoi ' - ra : " Kai ' toi - le , muli Abraham ! Uma - ka - kaina ria rapobatua . Napa - di pai ' nu ' uli ' tebahaka - kai mpai ' ? "

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : hawe ' ea tauna to mpobabehi jeko ' , napobatua jeko ' - ramo .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Ane batua , uma monoa ' katida - na hi tomi maradika - na . Aga ane ana ' maradika moto - hana , monoa ' katida - na hi tomi tuama - na .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Jadi ' , ane Aku ' mpobahaka - koi ngkai jeko ' - ni , tebahaka mpu ' u - mokoi , apa ' Aku ' Ana ' Alata ' ala - a .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Ku ' inca moto - le kamuli - na Abraham - koie . Aga ria - koi to doko ' mpatehi - a , apa ' uma nipoinono lolita - ku .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Napa to kuhilo hi Tuama - ku , tetu - mi to ku ' uli ' - kokoi . Hiaa ' koi ' - koina mpobabehi napa to natudui ' - kokoi tuama - ni . "

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Ra ' uli ' to Yahudi : " Tuama - kaile , Abraham ! " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane muli Abraham mpu ' u - koi , tantu nituku ' po ' ingku - na .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Kuparata - kokoi tudui ' to makono to kutarima ngkai Alata ' ala , hiaa ' doko ' nipatehi lau - ada ! Uma hewa po ' ingku - ni tetu po ' ingku - na Abraham .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Po ' ingku - ni tetu bate mpotuku ' po ' ingku tuama - ni ! " Hampetompoi ' to Yahudi : " Aga kai ' - le , bela - kai ana ' una ! Tuama - kai hadua lau - wadi , Hi ' a - mi Alata ' ala . "

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane bongko Alata ' ala mpu ' u Tuama - ni , ke nipoka ' ahi ' - a , apa ' Aku ' ngkai Alata ' ala - a , pai ' ohe ' i - ama naposuro . Uma - a tumai ntuku ' konoa - ku moto . Tumai - a ntuku ' konoa - na Alata ' ala , apa ' Hi ' a to mposuro - a .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Uma ami ' ni ' incai batua - na lolita - ku , apa ' uma - koi ntaha mpo ' epe tudui ' - ku .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Magau ' Anudaa ' - hanale tuama - nie ! Pai ' doko ' oa ' - koi mpotuku ' konoa tuama - ni tetu . Ngkai lomo ' - na , topepatehi ami ' - imi . Uma - i ria mpo ' uli ' napa to makono , apa ' uma ria napa - napa to makono hi hi ' a . Ane moboa ' - i , gati - nami - hana , apa ' topoboa ' ami ' - i , pai ' hawe ' ea tauna to moboa ' mpo ' uhi kehi - na .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Jadi ' , toe pai ' uma - a nipangala ' , apa ' mpo ' uli ' to makono - a - kuna .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Hema - koi to ma ' ala mpotudo ' karia jeko ' - ku ? Ane mpo ' uli ' - a anu makono , napa - di pai ' uma - a nipangala ' - e ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Tauna to napo ' ana ' Alata ' ala doko ' mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala . Tapi ' koi ' , uma - koi dota mpo ' epe lolita - ku , apa ' bela - koi ana ' Alata ' ala . "

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: To Yahudi mporuge ' - i Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " To Samaria - ko ! Wuli - ko , hewa to ki ' uli ' ami ' - mi ! "

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Uma - a wuli . Aku ' mpobila ' Tuama - ku . Hiaa ' koi ' , uma nibila ' - a .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Uma - a mpope ' une ' . Alata ' ala - damo to mpobila ' - a , pai ' Hi ' a to mpobotuhi kamakono - ku ba ka ' uma - na .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Hema to mpotuku ' lolita - ku , uma - ra mate , tuwu ' - ra duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Ra ' uli ' to Yahudi : " Wae lau ki ' inca mpu ' u - mi kawuli - nu ! Bangku ' Abraham - hawoe ' , mate moto - i . Wae wo ' o hawe ' ea nabi owi , mate moto - ra . Hiaa ' nu ' uli ' - kona , hema to mpotuku ' lolita - nu uma - ra mate .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Ha nu ' uli ' - kona meliu tuwu ' - nu ngkai ntu ' a - ta Abraham , to mahae - imi mate ? Ha meliu tuwu ' - nu ngkai hawe ' ea nabi to mate - ramo ? Nu ' uli ' hema rahi - dakoe ? "

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane rapa ' - na mpakalangko woto - ku moto - a , uma ntoto ria kalaua - na . Tapi ' Tuama - kumi to mpakalangko - a . Ni ' uli ' - koina Kahi ' a - na Alata ' ala to nipue ' .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Tapi ' kakoo - kono - na uma - i ni ' incai . Ane Aku ' , ku ' inca - i . Ane rapa ' - na ku ' uli ' uma - i ku ' incai , boa ' - ama hewa koi ' . Apa ' ku ' inca mpu ' u - i , pai ' kutuku ' lolita - na .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Ane ntu ' a - ni Abraham , goe ' - i apa ' na ' inca kanahilo - na mpai ' eo karataa - ku . Jadi ' hewa toe lau , nahilo - mi karataa - ku pai ' goe ' lia - imi . "

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' to Yahudi : " Umuru - nule , ko ' ia hono ' lima mpulu ' mpae . Ha pasi ' nuhilo - imi - kona Abraham - e ? "

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Kako ' ia - na putu Abraham , Aku ' toi , mpolia ' ria - ama ! "

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Kara ' epe - na to Yahudi toe we ' i , ntima ' watu - ramo doko ' rawatuhi - ki bona mate - imi . Ntaa ' we ' i , mengkawusili - imi Yesus ngkai Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Bula - na Yesus momako ' , mpohilo - i hadua tauna to wero ngkai lomo ' kaputu - na .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Ana ' guru - na mpekune ' - i : " Guru , napa pai ' wero ami ' - i ngkai kaputu - nae ? Ba jeko ' - na moto - di , ba jeko ' totu ' a - nadi ? "

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Bela jeko ' - na moto , pai ' bela wo ' o jeko ' totu ' a - na . Toi jadi ' bona tauna mpohilo baraka ' Alata ' ala to madupa ' hi woto - na .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Bula - na mobaja - pidi , kana tapobago bago - na Alata ' ala to mposuro - a . Apa ' neo ' rata - mi bengi - na , pai ' uma - pi hema to mobago .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Bula - ku hi dunia ' - pidi , Aku ' toi - mi baja to mpobajahi nono manusia ' . "

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Ka ' oti - na mololita hewa toe , na ' uelikui - mi tana ' , nagalo hante tana ' hangkedi ' bona morege ' , nagelai ' - ki mata - na towero toei ,

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Hilou - ko monoku hi wuhu ' Siloam . " ( Hanga ' " Siloam " toe , batua - na " Rasuro . " ) Kahilou - nami monoku . Ponculii ' - na , pehilo - imi - hawo .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Ngkai ree , tongki - na pai ' tauna to biasa mpohilo - i kakarapi ' - rapi ' , momepekune ' - ramo ra ' uli ' : " Hema - idi toe - e mai ? Ha bela hi ' a - mi towero to biasa mohura kakarapi ' - rapi ' - e ? "

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Ria to mpo ' uli ' : " Hi ' a - midi ! " Aga ria wo ' o mpo ' uli ' : " Bela - e ' . Kahibalia lence - ra - wadi - hawo . " Hiaa ' hi ' a moto - mi - hawo mpo ' uli ' : " Aku ' - midi ! "

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Jadi ' , rapekune ' - i : " Ha beiwa pai ' alaa - na pehilo - ko ? "

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Tauna to rahanga ' Yesus mpobabehi rege ' , nagelai ' - ki mata - ku , na ' uli ' - ka : ' Hilou - ko monoku hi wuhu ' Siloam . ' Hilou mpu ' u - ama monoku , ngkai ree pehilo - ama - kuwo ! "

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Rapekune ' - i : " Hiaa ' hiapa - imi we ' i ? " Na ' uli ' - raka : " Uma - kuwo ku ' incai . "

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Yesus mpogalo ueliku - na hante tana ' pai ' mpaka ' uri ' towero toe we ' i nto ' u Eo Sabat , eo pepuea ' - ra to Yahudi . Jadi ' , towero to pehilo - mi toei rakeni hilou hi to Parisi .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: To Parisi wo ' o - mi - rawo mpekune ' - i , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa pai ' alaa - na pehilo - koe ? " Na ' uli ' - raka : " Nagelai ' mata - ku hante rege ' , pai ' kamonoku - ku , pehilo - ama . "

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Ba hangkuja dua ngkai to Parisi toera mpo ' uli ' : " Tauna to mpobabehi tetu , uma - i ngkai Alata ' ala , bo uma - i mpotuku ' palia - ta hi Eo Sabat . " Tapi ' to hantongo ' mpo ' uli ' : " Hiaa ' ane topojeko ' - i , ngkaiapa - di baraka ' - na mpobabehi wori ' tanda mekoncehi hewa tohe ' i - e ? " Alaa - na , ria lau - mi pomehonoa ' hi himpau hira ' .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Ngkai ree , mepekune ' tena - ra to Parisi hi towero toei , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa - kowo iko , napa to nu ' uli ' , apa ' napaka ' uri ' - koko mata - nue . " Na ' uli ' towero toei : " Tantu Hi ' a hadua nabi . "

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Tapi ' topoparenta to Yahudi , uma - ra mparasaya kahi ' a - na mpu ' u - mi towero - e ngone , pai ' muu - mule ' pehilo - imi . Toe pai ' rakio ' tina pai ' tuama - na bona mpohirua ' - raka ,

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: pai ' rapompekunei ' : " Ha makono mpu ' u tauna toii ana ' - ni , to ni ' uli ' wero ngkai lomo ' kaputu - nae ? Hiaa ' beiwa pai ' alaa - na pehilo - i ? "

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Ra ' uli ' - rawo tina pai ' tuama - na : " To ki ' inca - le , bate ana ' - kai mpu ' u - i - hawo , pai ' wero mpu ' u - i ngkai lomo ' kaputu - na .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Aga beiwa pai ' alaa - na pehilo - i , uma - kaiwo ki ' incai . Pai ' hema to mpaka ' uri ' - i , uma wo ' o - kaiwo ki ' incai . Kama - imi - hawo , pekune ' - ki hi ' a moto - mi - koiwo . Ma ' ala - imi metompoi ' moto . "

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Tina pai ' tuama - na mpo ' uli ' hewa toe , apa ' me ' eka ' - ra hi topoparenta to Yahudi . Apa ' hibalia - mi pohawa ' - ra : hema - hema to mpo ' uli ' Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' rapopalai ngkai tomi posampayaa .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Toe pai ' totu ' a - na mpo ' uli ' : " Kama - imi - hawo , pekune ' - ki hi ' a moto - mi - koiwo . "

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Oti toe , rakio ' tena - i tauna to wero toei we ' i , pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki : " Alata ' ala mpotiroi - ta ! Jadi ' , uli ' mpu ' u - e ' napa to makono ! Ki ' inca moto - i Yesus tetui tauna topojeko ' . "

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Aku ' - le , uma ku ' incai ba topojeko ' - i ba uma . Sampale to ku ' inca , wero - a wengi , tempo toi pehilo - ama . "

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Ngkai ree , rapekune ' tena - i : " Napa to nababehi - koko ? Beiwa - i mpaka ' uri ' - ko ? "

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Natompoi ' - ra : " Oti - mi kututura - kokoi we ' i , ha uma ni ' epei ? Napa pai ' nipengeei oa ' - e ? Ba doko ' jadi ' ana ' guru - na lau - dakoie ? "

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Ngkai ree , ralibui ' - imi pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki : " Iko - le ana ' guru - na tau tetu - e ! Kai ' ana ' guru - na nabi Musa - ka - kaina !

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Monoa ' ki ' inca Alata ' ala mpoparata lolita - na hi Musa owi . Tapi ' Yesus tetui , uma ki ' incai kangkaiapa - na . "

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Mehono ' - i towero toei : " Me ' ingui ' lia - koi ! Ni ' uli ' uma ni ' incai kangkaiapa - na , hiaa ' napaka ' uri ' mata - ku !

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Ta ' inca moto Alata ' ala uma mpotompoi ' pomperapia ' tauna topojeko ' . Sampale - di mpobini ' - i tilinga - na hi hema - hema to mengkoru hi Hi ' a pai ' to mpotuku ' hawa ' - na .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Ngkai lomo ' kajadi ' dunia ' , ko ' ia ria ta ' epei tutura - na tauna towero ngkai lomo ' kaputu - na ma ' ala rapaka ' uri ' .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Ane Yesus uma - i ngkai Alata ' ala , tantu uma - i bisa mpobabehi napa - napa . "

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Hampetompoi ' - ra : " Iko tetu to ponu ' jeko ' ngkai kaputu - nu , nta ' ena ' metudui ' ! " Ngkai ree , rapopalai - imi ngkai tomi posampayaa .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Yesus mpo ' epe karapopalai - na ngkai tomi posampayaa . Jadi ' hilou - imi mpohirua ' - ki , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ha mepangala ' - ko hi Ana ' Manusia ' - e ? "

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Na ' uli ' tauna toei : " Uli ' - ka - kuwo kahema - nai , bona kupangala ' - i . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Nuhilo - imile ! Hi ' a - mile to mpololitai - koe . "

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Na ' uli ' tauna toei : " Kupangala ' , Pue ' ! " pai ' mowilingkudu - imi mponyompa - i .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Katumai - ku hi dunia ' toi , tumai mpobotuhi kara - kara manusia ' , bona tauna to wero ma ' ala pehilo , pai ' tauna to mpo ' uli ' pehilo moto - ra , wero lau - ra . "

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi to hi ree mpo ' epe lolita - na Yesus . Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Ha nu ' uli ' - kona wero wo ' o - kai kai ' - e ? "

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane rapa ' - na hewa towero mpu ' u - koi apa ' uma ni ' incai napa to makono , ke uma - koi masala ' . Tapi ' , apa ' ni ' uli ' - koina pehilo moto - koie , bate masala ' - koi - hawo . "

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : ane ria tauna to mesua ' hi rala gimpu ngkahe ' wala , pai ' uma - i ntara hi wobo ' , topanako pai ' toperampaki - i - hana .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Ane topo ' ewu , mesua ' ntara hi wobo ' moto - i .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Topodongo wobo ' mpobea - ki wobo ' , pai ' bima - na mpetonoi libu ' - na ane nakio ' hanga ' - ra butu - butu ma ' a - na , pai ' nakeni - ra hilou hi mali - na .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Kanakeni - ra hilou hi mali - na omea , mako ' meri ' ulu - i ngkai bima - na , pai ' bima - na mpotuku ' - i , apa ' ra ' inca mpetonoi libu ' - na .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Uma - ra mpotuku ' tau ntani ' - na . Ane ria tauna to bela topo ' ewu - ra to mpokio ' - ra , rapetiboi ' - i , apa ' uma ra ' incai mpetonoi libu ' - na . "

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' walatu toe hi to Parisi , aga uma ra ' incai patuju - na .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Aku ' toi - mi wobo ' to natara bima mesua ' hi rala gimpu .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna to rata meri ' ulu ngkai Aku ' , topanako pai ' toperampaki - ra - hana . Aga bima - ku uma mposaile ' pekio ' - ra .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Aku ' toi - mi wobo ' . Hema to mesua ' ntara hi Aku ' , mporata - ra kalompea ' . Hira ' hewa bima to mesua ' hi rala gimpu pai ' mehupa ' hilou hi mali - na mporata kowo ' to morudu ' .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Patuju - na topanako - le , tumai doko ' manako , mepatehi pai ' megerohi . Tapi ' Aku ' tumai bona manusia ' mporata katuwua ' to uma mowo kalompe ' - na .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: " Aku ' toi - mi topo ' ewu to lompe ' . Kupewai ' tuwu ' - ku bona bima - ku tuwu ' .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Ane tauna to baha ragaji ' , uma lompe ' pompo ' ewu - na , apa ' bela hi ' a pue ' bima . Ane mpohilo - i serigala tumai , metibo ' - i mpalahii bima ewua - na . Jadi ' bima toe nadapa ' pai ' nahungongo ' serigala , alaa - na pagaa ' - gaa ' - ramo .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Tauna to ragaji ' toei metibo ' , apa ' mobago baha ragaji ' - wadi . Uma - i mposaile ' ewua - na .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: " Aku ' toi - mi topo ' ewu to lompe ' . Hewa Tuama - ku mpo ' inca - a , pai ' Aku ' mpo ' inca Tuama - ku , wae wo ' o Aku ' mpo ' inca bima - ku , pai ' bima - ku mpo ' inca - a . Kupewai ' tuwu ' - ku bona bima - ku tuwu ' .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: " Ria wo ' o - pidi bima - ku to ntani ' - na , to uma hi rala gimpu toi . Hira ' wo ' o mpai ' kana kukeni tumai . Rapetonoi mpai ' libu ' - ku , bona hawe ' ea bima - ku jadi ' mopahantuda lau , pai ' hadua - ku - wadi to mpo ' ewu - ra omea .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: " Tuama - ku mpoka ' ahi ' - a , apa ' kupewai ' tuwu ' - ku bona kurua ' nculii ' tuwu ' - ku .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Uma ria haduaa to mpatehi - a ane uma konoa - ku . Ku ' agi mate hante karoli ' - roli ' nono - ku . Ria kuasa - ku mpewai ' tuwu ' - ku bona rapatehi , pai ' ria wo ' o kuasa - ku tuwu ' nculii ' . Toe - mi hawa ' to kutarima ngkai Tuama - ku . "

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Kara ' epe - na to Yahudi pololita - na Yesus toe , momehono ' wo ' o - ramo .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Wori ' - ra to mpo ' uli ' : " Kahawia ' - ile ! Wuli - i ! Napa - pi kalaua - na tape ' epei lolita - na . "

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Aga ria wo ' o to mpo ' uli ' : " Uma - di ! Tauna to napesuai ' seta - le uma - hawo mololita hewa toei . Ha bisa wo ' o - hawo seta mpaka ' uri ' tauna to wero - e ? "

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Hi Yerusalem nto ' u toe , tauna mpobabehi karamea mpokiwoi eo bohe pompowatia ' Tomi Alata ' ala owi . Nto ' u toe , tempo lengi ' .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Yesus momako ' hi berewe Tomi Alata ' ala , hi pengkawinaraa to rahanga ' Pengkawinaraa Salomo .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Topoparenta to Yahudi mpotipuhi Yesus pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki : " Napa pai ' nupelele ' oa ' - kai ingu ' , uma oa ' nupakalonto ' kahema - nue ? Ane bongko Magau ' Topetolo ' mpu ' u - kole , uli ' pakalonto ' lau - mi . "

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Oti - mi ku ' uli ' - kokoie , aga uma - koi dota mpangala ' . Anu mekoncehi to kubabehi hante kuasa Tuama - ku , toe - mi to mpakanoto kahema - ku .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Tapi ' uma oa ' nipangala ' , apa ' bela - koi bima - ku .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Bima - ku mpetonoi libu ' - ku . Ku ' inca moto - ra , pai ' - ra mpotuku ' - a .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Kuwai ' - ra katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na , pai ' monoa ' - mi ka ' uma - ra mpai ' rahuku ' hi naraka . Uma ria haduaa to ma ' ala mpo ' agoi - a bima - ku .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Tuama - ku meliu kabaraka ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea , pai ' Hi ' a - mi to mpowai ' - a bima - ku . Uma ria haduaa to ma ' ala mpo ' ago - ra ngkai Tuama - ku .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Aku ' pai ' Tuama - ku , hadua lau - wada - kai . "

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Ngkai ree , to Yahudi mpotima ' watu doko ' rapana ' - ki Yesus bona mate - i .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Nihilo moto - a mpobabehi bago to lompe ' ntuku ' hawa ' Tuama - ku . Ngkai bago - ku tohe ' e , to ' uma to masipato ' nipatehi - ka ? "

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Ra ' uli ' to Yahudi : " Bela ngkai pobago - nu to lompe ' , pai ' doko ' kipatehi - ko . Pai ' doko ' kipatehi - kole apa ' mpokedi ' Alata ' ala - ko - kona ! Api ' manusia ' biasa - wadi - ko , nu ' uli ' - kona Alata ' ala - ko ! "

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Hi rala Buku Atura - ni ria te ' uki ' Lolita Alata ' ala hi pangkeni to Yahudi owi , hewa toi moni - na : ' Koi ' , raponcawa Alata ' ala - koi . '

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' tetu , uma ria balia ' - na . Jadi ' , ane Buku Tomoroli ' mpo ' uli ' ' Alata ' ala - koi ' hi tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata ' ala owi , peliu - liu - nami Aku ' .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Apa ' Aku ' toi - e , to nawati ' Tuama - ku , napowiwi napowiti ' tumai hi dunia ' . Jadi ' , napa pai ' ni ' uli ' - ka mpokedi ' - a Alata ' ala apa ' ku ' uli ' ka ' Aku ' - na Ana ' - na ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: " Ane rapa ' - na uma kubabehi bago to ngkai Tuama - ku , neo ' - a nipangala ' .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Tapi ' ane kubabehi moto - mi bago to ngkai Tuama - kue , kana nipangala ' - a sabana pobago - ku toe . Nau ' Aku ' moto uma nipangalai ' , kana nipangala ' kangkai Alata ' ala - na pobago - ku . Ane mepangala ' - koi hi pobago - ku toe , ni ' inca mpai ' pai ' monoto mpu ' u hi nono - ni kahintuwu ' - ku hante Tuama - ku , pai ' Tuama - ku hintuwu ' hante Aku ' . "

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Mpo ' epe toe - di , to Yahudi doko ' wo ' o - ramo mpohoko ' - i , aga tepetibo ' moto - i .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Ngkai ree , malai wo ' o - imi Yesus hilou hi dipo ue Yordan , hi peniua ' - na Yohanes ri ' ulu , pai ' - i mo ' oha ' hi ria .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Wori ' tauna hilou mpohirua ' - ki , ra ' uli ' : " Yohanes uma mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi . Aga hawe ' ea to na ' uli ' mpotompo ' wiwi Yesus , makono omea . "

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Toe pai ' wori ' tauna hi ree mepangala ' hi Yesus .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Hadua tomane to rahanga ' Lazarus mo ' oha ' hi ngata Betania hante ompi ' bine - na Maria pai ' Marta . ( Maria toe - mi mpai ' to mpolanai witi ' Yesus hante lana honga pai ' naporihi hante wuluwoo ' - na . ) Hangkani , peda ' - i Lazarus .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Ompi ' bine - na to rodua toera mposuro tauna hilou hi Yesus , mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , bale - nu to nupe ' ahi ' , peda ' - i . "

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Yesus kareba toe , na ' uli ' : " Haki ' - na tetu - e ria , uma napomate - ki . Toe jadi ' bona Alata ' ala rapomobohe , pai ' bona Aku ' wo ' o , Ana ' - na , rapomobohe . "

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Yesus mpoka ' ahi ' Marta , Maria , pai ' Lazarus .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Aga kana ' epe - na kapeda ' - na Lazarus , uma - i ulu hilou , bate hi po ' ohaa ' - na moto - i ro ' eo - pi kahae - na .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Timpaliu ro ' eo toe - di , pai ' lako ' na ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Kita - mi hilou nculii ' hi tana ' Yudea . "

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - na : " Guru , ko ' ia mahae to Yahudi hi ria doko ' mpopatehi - ko . Napa wo ' o - mi pai ' doko ' hilou hi ria - koe ? "

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ha uma hampulu ' rojaa to mobaja rala - na ha ' eo ? Tauna to momako ' hi eo - na , uma - ra tewinci ' , apa ' mpohilo - ra pehini eo to mpobajahi dunia ' toi .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Aga tauna to momako ' hi bengi - na , bate tewinci ' - ra , apa ' uma ria to mpobajahi - ra . "

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Hewa toe - mi lolita Yesus , pai ' oti toe na ' uli ' tena : " Bale - ta Lazarus , leta ' - i . Hilou - a mpolike - i . "

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Kakoo - kono - na , lolita - na Yesus toe mpowalatu kamate - na Lazarus . Tapi ' ana ' guru - na uma mpopaha walatu toe , ra ' uli ' leta ' mpu ' u - i Lazarus . Toe pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Pue ' , ane leta ' - i , mo ' uri ' moto - i mpai ' . "

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Jadi ' , nalohu lau - miraka batua walatu - na , na ' uli ' : " Mate - imi Lazarus .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Pai ' goe ' - a apa ' uma kukaralai nto ' u toe . Apa ' napa to jadi ' toe mpai ' ria , mpokeni kalompea ' hi koi ' , bona mepangala ' - koi hi Aku ' . Hilou - tamo hi Lazarus . "

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Tomas , to ra ' atu Ntomoropa ' , mpo ' uli ' - raka hingka ana ' guru - na : " Kita - mi hilou mpotuku ' - i , bona mate - ta hangkaa - ngkania hante Hi ' a . " Jadi ' hilou mpu ' u - ramo hi tana ' Yudea .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Karata - ra hi ngata Betania , mpolia ' opo ' mengi - imi Lazarus ratana .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betania tohe ' e mohu ' Yerusalem , kira - kira tolu kilo kalaa - na .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Jadi ' , wori ' - ra to Yahudi to tumai mpotanta ' u Marta pai ' Maria hi kamate ompi ' - ra toe .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Marta mpo ' epe kaneo ' - na rata - mi Yesus , kahilou - nami mpotomu - i . Tapi ' Maria , hi tomi moto - i - hana .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Na ' uli ' Marta hi Yesus : " Pue ' , ane ke hi rehe ' i - ko wengi , ke uma - i mate ompi ' - ku .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , ku ' inca moto : napa - napa to nuperapi ' hi Alata ' ala tempo toi , bate nawai ' - ko . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Memata moto - ile mpai ' ompi ' - nue . "

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Na ' uli ' Marta : " Io ' , to ku ' inca - le , memata moto mpu ' u - i mpai ' hi Eo Kiama , nto ' u hawe ' ea tomate rapopemata . "

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' toi - mi to mpopemata tomate , pai ' to mpowai ' katuwua ' . Tauna to mepangala ' hi Aku ' , nau ' mate - ra , tuwu ' moto - ra mpai ' .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Pai ' hawe ' ea tauna to tuwu ' pai ' mepangala ' hi Aku ' , bate uma - ra mate , duu ' kahae - hae - na . Ha nupangala ' to ku ' uli ' toe - e ? "

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Na ' uli ' Marta : " Io ' Pue ' , kupangala ' ka ' Iko - na Ana ' Alata ' ala , Magau ' Topetolo ' to najanci Alata ' ala owi to tumai hi dunia ' . "

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Marta mpo ' uli ' toe , hilou - imi hi tomi mpokio ' Maria , pai ' mpowara ' - i na ' uli ' - ki : " Oe - imi ria Guru , doko ' napohirua ' - koko ! "

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Mpo ' epe tohe ' e , napesahui Maria hilou mpohirua ' - ki Yesus .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Yesus ko ' ia mesua ' hi rala ngata , hi mali ngata - i - pidi , hi kahiruaa ' - na hante Marta we ' i .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: To Yahudi to mpodoo eo mpohilo kasosa - na Maria malai ngkai tomi . Ra ' uli ' : " Hilou hi daeo ' - i tu , hilou motantangi ' hi ria ! " Jadi ' , hilou wo ' o - ra - rawo mpotuku ' - i .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Karata Maria hi pento ' oa - na Yesus we ' i , pai ' kampohilo - na Yesus , powingkotu ' - nami hi nyanyoa - na , pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Pue ' , ane ke hi rehe ' i - ko , ke uma - i mate ompi ' - ku . "

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Kanahilo - na Yesus Maria motantangi ' hante tauna to dohe - na , susa ' pai ' tuna - mi nono - na .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Napekune ' - ra : " Ratana hiapa - i ? " Ra ' uli ' : " Mai - moko Pue ' , kipo ' ema ' - ko hilou bona nuhilo . "

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Mo ' ili - mi ue mata - na Yesus .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Ra ' uli ' to Yahudi : " Hilo ! Uma mpu ' u mowo kama ' ahi ' - na hi Lazarus ! "

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Aga ria wo ' o - ra to mpo ' uli ' : " Tauna towero napaka ' uri ' . Ha uma - i bisa mpaka ' uri ' Lazarus bona ke uma - i - hawo mate - e ? "

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Ngkai ree , peda ' wo ' o - mi nono - na Yesus , pai ' - i hilou hi daeo ' . Daeo ' toe , wulou ' to ratowi hi panapa bulu ' , pai ' ra ' unca hante watu to bohe .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Deru ' watu tetu ! " Na ' uli ' Marta , ompi ' - na tomate : " Neo ' - pi rabea , Pue ' . Mohoa - imi , apa ' opo ' mengi - imi ratana . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki Marta : " Ha uma ku ' uli ' - mikoko we ' i , ane mepangala ' - ko , nuhilo moto mpai ' kabohe baraka ' - na Alata ' ala . "

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Oti toe , raderu ' mpu ' u - mi watu po ' unca daeo ' . Yesus ngkongoa ' hi langi ' , na ' uli ' : " Tuama - ku , mpo ' uli ' - a tarima kasi , apa ' nu ' epe pomperapia ' - ku tohe ' i .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Ku ' inca , bate nu ' epe oa ' lolita - ku . Aga tohe ' i kupesukui mpo ' uli ' , bona ra ' epe tauna to wori ' to hi rehe ' i lau , bona rapangala ' ka ' Iko - na mpu ' u to mposuro - a . "

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Oti toe , napesukui mekio ' : " Lazarus ! Tumai - moko ! "

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Mehupa ' - imi tauna to mate toei ngkai rala daeo ' - na . Pale - na pai ' witi ' - na teputu ' - pidi hante hompu ' - na , pai ' woo ' - na tehoo ' hante lenco . Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Bongka pomputu ' - na bona lompe ' pomako ' - na . "

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Wori ' to Yahudi to mpokinomo Maria nto ' u toe , pai ' rahilo napa to nababehi Yesus . Pai ' wori ' - ramo to mepangala ' hi Hi ' a .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Aga ria wo ' o - ra hantongo ' hilou hi to Parisi mpoparata napa to nababehi Yesus toe .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Toe pai ' to Parisi hante imam pangkeni mpobabehi porumpua bohe hante topohura agama to ntani ' - na . Ra ' uli ' : " Napa - koiwo to kana tababehi ? Apa ' wori ' mpu ' u tanda mekoncehi to nababehi - e .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Ane tapelele ' oa ' - i , hawe ' ea tauna mpai ' mepangala ' hi Hi ' a omea - ramo . Ka ' omea - na mpai ' , tantara to Roma tumai mpogero ngata - ta hante Tomi Alata ' ala . "

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Ngkai ree , hadua ngkai laintongo ' - ra to rahanga ' Kayafas , Imam Bohe hi mpae toe , mpo ' uli ' : " Uma ni ' incai napa - napa !

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Uma ni ' incai kalompea ' ntodea . Agina lau - pi tau hadua mate mposampei ntodea , bona neo ' mpai ' ragero ngata - ta omea . "

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Patuju - na Kayafas mpo ' uli ' hewa toe : Yesus kana rapatehi . Tapi ' ria wo ' o batua to kahanyala - na , to uma - hawo natungkai ' . Apa ' lawi ' hi ' a - mi Imam Bohe hi mpae toe - e , lolita - na mpolowa kamate - na mpai ' Yesus mpotolo ' to Yahudi .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Pai ' uma muntu ' to Yahudi - wadi . Ngkai kamate - na Yesus toe mpai ' , hawe ' ea ana ' Alata ' ala to pahawu ' - hawu ' hi humalili ' dunia ' rarumpu pai ' rapahantuda lau .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Ntepu ' u eo toe , hahawa ' lau - ramo topoparenta to Yahudi mpopatehi Yesus .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Jadi ' , toe pai ' uma - ipi modao ' hi rala tana ' - ra to Yahudi , bona neo ' - ipi rahiloi ntodea . Malai - imi ngkai ree hilou hi ngata to rahanga ' Efraim hi wiwi ' papada to wao ' , pai ' mo ' oha ' hi ree - imi hante ana ' guru - na .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Nto ' u toe , neo ' rata - mi eo bohe agama Yahudi to rahanga ' Eo Paskah . Kako ' ia rata eo bohe toe , wori ' tauna ngkai ngata ntani ' - na hilou hi Yerusalem , bona mpobohoi ' woto - ra ntuku ' ada agama - ra .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Tauna to morumpu hi Yerusalem toe ntora mpopali ' Yesus . Bula - ra moromu hi Tomi Alata ' ala , momepololitai - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Beiwa - koiwo pomporataa - ni ? Meka ' uma - i mpai ' tumai mpokaralai posusa ' ? "

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Ane imam pangkeni pai ' to Parisi , ria ami ' parenta - ra hi ntodea to mpo ' uli ' : " Hema - hema - koi to mpo ' inca kahiapa - na Yesus , ncaliu ni ' uli ' - kakai , bona rahoko ' - i . "

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Ono eo kako ' ia - na Eo Paskah , hilou - imi Yesus hi Betania , ngata katidaa - na Lazarus , to napotuwu ' nculii ' - e wengi .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Mpobabehi - ra karamea , apa ' goe ' - ra mpotarima Yesus hi ngata - ra . Marta moruhe , Lazarus mpohimpohura - ki Yesus pai ' torata ntani ' - na .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Bula - ra ngkoni ' , tumai - i Maria ngkeni hantanga ' lite lana honga . Lana toe rababehi ngkai rali ' kaju to mohonga , masuli ' lia oli - na . Natua lana toe hi witi ' - na Yesus pai ' naporihi hante wuluwoo ' - na . Mohonga - damo hobo ' hi rala tomi .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Hadua ana ' guru - na Yesus to rahanga ' Yudas Iskariot - - to mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - nae mpai ' - - mpo ' uli ' :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: " Masuli ' lia oli - na lana tetu , nte tolu atu doi pera ' . Napa - di - hana pai ' uma rapobalu ' lau , pai ' doi - na rawai ' - raka tokabu ! "

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Kakoo - kono - na , Yudas uma kamposaile ' - na mpu ' u tokabu . Api ' katomanako - nadi ! Apa ' hi ' a to ntimamahi doi - ra , pai ' pontu - na na ' ala ' bongo .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Pelele ' moto - i - hawo ! Napa to nababehi toi , mpenonoi eo karatana - ku mpai ' .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Ane tokabu , ria - pidi loga - ni mpotulungi - ra . Tapi ' Aku ' , neo ' uma - pi ria loga - ni mpotulungi - a , apa ' uma - apa mahae dohe - ni . "

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Wori ' to Yahudi mpo ' epe karia - na Yesus hi Betania , toe pai ' mo ' iko - ra hilou doko ' mpohilo - i . Pai ' doko ' wo ' o - ra mpohilo Lazarus , to napotuwu ' nculii ' Yesus - e wengi .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Jadi ' , mohawa ' wo ' o - ramo imam pangkeni doko ' mpopatehi Lazarus .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Apa ' ngkai hi ' a pai ' alaa - na wori ' to Yahudi mpalahii - ra pai ' mepangala ' hi Yesus .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Kamepulo - na , wori ' tauna hi Yerusalem mpo ' epe kahilou - na Yesus mpotoa ' ngata - ra . Nto ' u toe , wori ' lia tauna morumpu hi Yerusalem apa ' neo ' rata - mi Eo Paskah .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Mpo ' ala ' - ra palampa , pai ' hilou - ra mpotomu - i . Ntora mekio ' - ra : Une ' - imi Pue ' Ala ! " Pue ' mpogane ' Magau ' to tumai mpokeni hanga ' - na ! " Pue ' mpogane ' Magau ' to Israel ! "

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Yesus mpo ' ala ' hama ' a keledai to mongura , pai ' nahawi ' . Pehawi ' - na tohe ' e mpopadupa ' lolita nabi owi to mpo ' uli ' :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: " Neo ' - koi me ' eka ' , pue ' ngata Sion . Hilo ! Etu - i tumai Magau ' - ni . Mpohawi ' - i hama ' a ana ' keledai . "

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Nto ' u toe , ko ' ia rapaha ana ' guru - na napa batua - na to jadi ' toe . Aga ka ' oti - na Yesus rapatehi pai ' rapomobohe , rakiwoi - mi napa to jadi ' hi Yesus toe , hewa to telowa ami ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Hi Yerusalem nto ' u toe , ria wo ' o wori ' tauna to dohe Yesus wengi nto ' u kanakio ' - na Lazarus ngkai rala daeo ' pai ' mpotuwu ' - i nculii ' . Tauna toera ntora mpojarita kajadia ' toe .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Ngkai toe - mi pai ' alaa - na wori ' rahi tauna hilou mpotomu - i Yesus , apa ' ra ' epe Kahi ' a - na to mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Momepololitai - ramo to Parisi , ra ' uli ' : " Madagi - tamo toi - e ! Hilo - dile , hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' mpotuku ' - i . "

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Ngkai kawori ' tauna to hilou hi Yerusalem mepue ' nto ' u Eo Paskah toe , ria wo ' o ba hangkuja dua to Yunani .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: To Yunani toera hilou hi Filipus , ra ' uli ' - ki : " Doko ' - ka - kaiwo mpohirua ' - ki Yesus . " ( Filipus tohe ' e ngkai ngata Betsaida hi tana ' Galilea . )

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Filipus hilou mpo ' uli ' - ki Andreas , pai ' hira ' roduaa hilou mparata - ki Yesus .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Rata - mi tempo - na , Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' rapomobohe .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Aku ' ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki pae . Ane pae toe uma ratuja ' hi tana ' pai ' ra ' urihi hewa tomate , bate - na oa ' - i . Tapi ' ane ratuja ' - i - damo , wori ' - mi mpai ' wua ' - na .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Tauna to mpentaei konoa - na moto , moronto - ki mpai ' katuwu ' - na hi eo mpeno - na . Aga tauna to mpobahaka konoa - na hi dunia ' toi , mporata - i mpai ' katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Hema - koi to doko ' jadi ' topobago - ku , kana mpotuku ' - a , bona hiapa kahiloua - ku , retu wo ' o - koi . Tuama - ku mpai ' mpobila ' - koi to jadi ' topobago - ku .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: " Susa ' nono - ku toi - e . Uma ku ' incai napa to kana ku ' uli ' . Ria hi rala nono - ku doko ' mekakae : ' Mama , bahaka - a - kuwo ngkai kaparia to neo ' mporumpa ' - a toi - e ! ' Aga bo toe - mi pai ' tumai - a hi rala dunia ' , bona mpotodohaka kaparia toe .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Ku ' uli ' hewa toi : Mama , pomobohe - mi hanga ' - nu ! " Ngkai ree , ria to mololita ngkai langi ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Yesus : " Oti - mile kupomobohe hanga ' - kue , pai ' kupomobohe tena - pi mpai ' . "

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Ntodea to mpo ' epe lolita ngkai langi ' toe , mpo ' uli ' : " Toe lou moni kuna ! " Aga hantongo ' mpo ' uli ' : " Bela - hawo kuna . Ria - hana mala ' eka mpololitai - i . "

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Lolita to ni ' epe toe we ' i , rapohowa ' uma bona mpotulungi Aku ' . Rapohowa ' bona mpotulungi koi ' - hana .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala kana mpohurai hawe ' ea kasalaa ' manusia ' hi dunia ' . Pai ' rata wo ' o tempo - na Magau ' Anudaa ' to mpokuasai dunia ' toi kana rapopalai .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Aga Aku ' , ane rapokalangko - apa mpai ' hi wongko dunia ' , kukeni hawe ' ea tauna tumai hi Aku ' . "

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Lolita - na Yesus toe , mpowalatu beiwa mpai ' karapatehi - na .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Ra ' uli ' ntodea : " Hi rala Atura Pue ' kibasa : Magau ' Topetolo ' tuwu ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . Napa - kona pai ' nu ' uli ' Ana ' Manusia ' kana rapokalangko hi wongko dunia ' ? Ana ' Manusia ' to ' uma wo ' o - pi to nu ' uli ' tetu - e ? "

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Hampai ' - damo , pai ' baja to mpobajahi - koi tempo toi - e , uma - pi ria dohe - ni . Kaliliu - mokoi mako ' bula - na mobaja - pidi , bona neo ' - koi narata bengi . Tauna to mako ' hi rala kabengia - na , uma ra ' incai hiapa kahiloua - ra .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Mepangala ' - mokoi hi Aku ' bula - ku ria - pidi dohe - ni mpobajahi - koi , bona mobaja nono - ni . " Ka ' oti - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' hawe ' ea toe , malai - imi ngkai ree , pai ' uma - ipi mpopehuwu woto - na hi ntodea .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Nau ' wori ' tanda mekoncehi to nababehi Yesus hi mata to Yahudi , uma oa ' - ra mepangala ' hi Hi ' a .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Jadi ' , madupa ' - mi lolita nabi Yesaya owi to mpo ' uli ' : Pue ' , uma hema to mpangala ' kareba to kikeni . Nau ' nupopohiloi - ra kabaraka ' - nu , uma oa ' rapangalai ' . "

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Jadi ' , uma - ra bisa mepangala ' , apa ' ria wo ' o Lolita Alata ' ala to na ' uki ' nabi Yesaya owi , to mpo ' uli ' :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: " Na ' uli ' Pue ' Ala : ' Tungkai ' kupakawero - ra , bona uma - ra pehilo . Kupakako ' o nono - ra , bona nono - ra uma monoto . Ka ' omea - na mpai ' uma - ra nculii ' hi Aku ' , toe pai ' uma - ra kuwai ' kalompea ' . ' "

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Lolita toe na ' uki ' nabi Yesaya owi , apa ' nahilo ami ' - mi kabaraka ' - na Yesus , pai ' nalowa - i .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Aga nau ' wae , wori ' moto pangkeni to Yahudi to mepangala ' hi Yesus . Aga mepangala ' bongo - ra - wadi , apa ' me ' eka ' - ra nee - neo ' mpai ' to Parisi mpopalai - ra ngkai tomi posampayaa .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Apa ' konoa - ra doko ' ra ' une ' hingka doo - ra , uma rasaile ' pe ' une ' to ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Yesus mpesukui mekio ' , na ' uli ' : " Tauna to mepangala ' hi Aku ' , uma muntu ' Aku ' to rapangala ' . Mepangala ' wo ' o - ramo hi Pue ' Ala to mposuro - a .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Tauna to mpohilo - a , mpohilo Pue ' Ala wo ' o - ra to mposuro - a .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Tumai - a hi dunia ' toi jadi ' baja , bona hawe ' ea tauna to mepangala ' hi Aku ' uma - pi mo ' oha ' hi rala kabengia - na .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: " Tauna to mpo ' epe lolita - ku pai ' uma ratuku ' , bela Aku ' to mpohuku ' - ra . Apa ' bela patuju - ku tumai hi dunia ' toi bona mpohuku ' manusia ' . Tumai - ale , bona mpobahaka - ra ngkai huku ' - ra .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Tauna to mposapuaka - a pai ' uma mpotarima lolita - ku , ria - mi mpai ' to mpohuku ' - ra . Lolita - ku to kupohowa ' , toe - mi mpai ' to mpohuku ' - ra hi Eo Kiama .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Apa ' mololita - a uma ngkai konoa - ku moto . Ku ' uli ' pai ' kulolita napa to napahawa ' - ka Tuama - ku , apa ' Hi ' a - mi to mposuro - a tumai .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Pai ' ku ' inca : hawa ' - na toe mpowai ' katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . Jadi ' , napa to ku ' uli ' toi - e , bate lolita to na ' uli ' ami ' - maka Tuama - ku . "

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Neo ' rata - mi eo bohe Paskah . Na ' inca Yesus , neo ' rata - mi tempo - na mpalahii dunia ' pai ' hilou nculii ' hi Tuama - na . Nape ' ahi ' - ra to jadi ' bagia - na hi dunia ' toi , pai ' bate napoka ' ahi ' - ra duu ' hi ka ' omea - na .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na ngkoni ' - ra ngkabengia . Magau ' Anudaa ' mpowara ' Yudas ana ' Simon Iskariot , mpo ' usoki - i mpobalu ' Yesus hi bali ' - na .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Na ' inca Yesus , Tuama - na mpowai ' - i hawe ' ea kuasa - na . Na ' inca wo ' o kangkai Alata ' ala - nai , pai ' nculii ' hilou hi Alata ' ala wo ' o - i mpai ' .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Toe pai ' pokore - nami , naroncu baju - na , pai ' na ' ala ' abe ' napehoo ' hi hope ' - na .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Oti toe , na ' ala ' ue natua hi batili , natepu ' u - mi mpobohoi ' witi ' ana ' guru - na , pai ' naporihi hante abe ' to hi hope ' - na .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Katelili - na hi Simon Petrus , na ' uli ' Petrus : " Pue ' , ncako Iko rahi - di mpobohoi ' witi ' - kue ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Tempo toi , ko ' ia nu ' incai napa to kubabehi toi . Mpeno - damo , pai ' lako ' nu ' inca . "

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Neo ' , Pue ' ! Neo ' mpu ' u nubohoi ' witi ' - ku ! " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane uma - ko kubohoi ' , uma ria posidaia ' - nu hante Aku ' . "

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Na ' uli ' Simon Petrus : " Ane wae - di Pue ' , neo ' muntu ' witi ' - ku - wadi ! Hante pale pai ' woo ' - ku wo ' o . "

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Tauna to lako ' oti moniu ' , uma - pi babo ' , me ' itu ' - mi hobo ' woto - na , uma - pi mingki ' rabohoi ' tena . Muntu ' witi ' - na - damo to kana rabohoi ' . Koi ' , tebohoi ' - mokoi , aga uma hawe ' ea - ni . "

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Yesus mololita hewa toe , apa ' na ' inca ami ' kahema - na mpai ' to mpobalu ' - i hi bali ' - na . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' : " Tebohoi ' - mokoi , aga uma hawe ' ea - ni . "

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus mpobohoi ' witi ' - ra , na ' unco ' nculii ' - mi baju - na , pai ' - i mohura , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ha ni ' inca wa napa to lako ' kubabehi - kokoie ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Aku ' , nikio ' - a Guru - ni pai ' Pue ' - ni , pai ' bate wae mpu ' u .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Aku ' Pue ' pai ' Guru - ni mobago hewa hadua batua mpobohoi ' witi ' - ni . Jadi ' , koi ' wo ' o kana momebohoi ' ngkawiti ' .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Kupopohiloi - koi tonco toe we ' i , bona nipenau ' kehi - ku : hewa Aku ' mpotulungi - koi , koi ' wo ' o kana mpotulungi doo .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : hadua batua uma meliu tuwu ' - na ngkai maradika - na . Hadua suro uma meliu tuwu ' - na ngkai to mposuro - i .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Ane ni ' inca - damo tudui ' toi , marasi ' - koi ane nituku ' .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: " Napa to ku ' uli ' - e we ' i , uma mpobelahi - koi omea . Ku ' inca ami ' hema to kupelihi . Tapi ' kana madupa ' lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : ' Tauna to mpodulu ' - ka , hi ' a - mi mpai ' to jadi ' bali ' - ku . '

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Tohe ' i ku ' uli ' ami ' - mikokoi kako ' ia - na jadi ' , bona ane madupa ' - pi mpai ' , nipangala ' - mi lolita - ku to mpo ' uli ' kahema - ku .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : hema to mpotarima suro - ku , hewa Aku ' moto - mi to natarima . Wae wo ' o , hema to mpotarima - a , hewa Tuama - ku moto - mi to natarima , apa ' Hi ' a - mi to mposuro - a . "

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus mololita hewa toe , susa ' - mi nono - na , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Hadua ngkai olo ' - ni mpai ' mpobalu ' - a hi bali ' - ku . "

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Momenaa - ramo ana ' guru - na nakeni ka ' ingu ' - ra , apa ' uma ra ' incai kahema - na to natoa ' .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Hadua ana ' guru - na to nape ' ahi ' , mohura hi ncori - na .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Simon Petrus mpokini ' mata ana ' guru to hadua toei , na ' uli ' - ki : " Ee , pekune ' - i pe ' Guru - e , ba hema to natoa ' - e . "

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Toe pai ' ana ' guru toei mpomohui ' Yesus , pai ' mpekune ' - i : " Hema - i , Pue ' ? "

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Tauna to kuwai ' roti to oti kulolo ' hi rala nede ' , hi ' a - mi mpai ' . " Kana ' ala ' - nami hampui ' roti , nalolo ' hi rala nede ' , pai ' nawai ' - ki Yudas , ana ' Simon Iskariot .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Kanadoa - na Yudas roti toe , Magau ' Anudaa ' mesua ' - mi hi rala nono - na . Oti toe , na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Napa to doko ' nubabehi , babehi - mi sohi ' . "

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Ane doo - ra to ngkoni ' dohe - ra , uma ra ' incai napa pai ' Yesus mololita hewa toe hi Yudas .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Hantongo ' - ra mpo ' uli ' meka ' Yesus mpohubui Yudas mpo ' oli ba napa - napa to raparaluu hi posusa ' - ra , ba mpowai ' doi hi tokabu . Apa ' Yudas to ntimamahi doi - ra .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Kanadoa - na Yudas roti toe , palai - nami hilou hi mali - na . Nto ' u toe , mobengi - mi .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Palai - na Yudas ngkai ree , na ' uli ' - mi Yesus : " Wae lau Aku ' Ana ' Manusia ' rapomobohe . Pai ' napa to jadi ' hi Aku ' mpai ' mpomobohe wo ' o Alata ' ala .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Ane napa to jadi ' hi Aku ' mpomobohe Alata ' ala , Alata ' ala wo ' o mpai ' mpomobohe - a hante baraka ' - na . Pai ' sohi ' kadupa ' - na .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Ana ' - ana ' - ku , uma - apa mahae dohe - ni . Nipali ' - a mpai ' , aga hewa to oti ku ' uli ' - raka topoparenta to Yahudi wengi , wae wo ' o ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Hi kahilouaa - ku uma - koi bisa hilou .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: " Kuwai ' - koi hawa ' to bo ' u : Momepoka ' ahi ' - mokoi . Hewa Aku ' mpoka ' ahi ' - koi , wae wo ' o koi ' kana momepoka ' ahi ' hadua bo hadua .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Ane momepoka ' ahi ' - koi , hawe ' ea tauna mpo ' inca kakoi ' - na mpu ' u - mi topetuku ' - ku . "

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Napekune ' Simon Petrus hi Yesus : " Hilou hiapa - ko , Pue ' ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Hi kahilouaa - ku , ko ' ia - ko bisa hilou . Mpeno - damo , nutuku ' - a . "

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Na ' uli ' tena Petrus : " Ha napa pai ' uma - a ma ' ala mpotuku ' - ko wae - e lau Pue ' ? Ku ' agi mate sabana petuku ' - ku hi Iko ! "

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ha nu ' agi mpu ' u mate sabana Aku ' ? Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Kako ' ia - na manu ' turua ' mpai ' , mpolia ' tolu ngkani - moko mposapu kanu ' inca - ku . "

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Neo ' susa ' nono - ni ! Mepangala ' - mokoi hi Alata ' ala , pai ' mepangala ' wo ' o - koi hi Aku ' .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Hi tomi Tuama - ku , wori ' po ' ohaa ' . Hilou - a mporodo - kokoi po ' ohaa ' - ni . Ane ke uma hewa toe , ke uma - hawo ku ' uli ' - kokoi .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Ane hudu - a - damo mporodo po ' ohaa ' - ni , nculii ' moto - a mpai ' tumai mpo ' ala ' - koi , kukeni - koi hilou hi po ' ohaa ' - ku , bona hiapa po ' ohaa ' - ku , hi ree wo ' o - koi dohe - ku .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Ni ' inca moto ohea hilou hi po ' ohaa ' - ku . "

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Tomas : " Uma - kaiwo ki ' incai hiapa kahilouaa - nu Pue ' . Beiwa - kaina kaki ' inca - na ohea - nae ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' toi - mi ohea , Aku ' to makono , pai ' to mpowai ' katuwua ' . Uma haduaa to rata hi Tuama - ku , ane uma ntara hi Aku ' .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Ane ntoa ' ni ' inca - ama Aku ' - e , tantu ni ' inca wo ' o - imi Tuama - ku . Ngkai wae - e lau , ni ' inca - imi pai ' nihilo - imi . "

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Na ' uli ' Filipus : " Pue ' , popohiloi - ka - kaiwo Tuama - nu , bona oha nono - kai . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ko ' ia oa ' - tano nu ' incai - ae , Filipus ! Hiaa ' bo mahae - ama dohe - ni ! Hema to mpohilo - a , mpohilo wo ' o - ramo Tuama - ku . Jadi ' , napa - di pai ' nuperapi ' bona kupopohiloi - koi Tuama - kue ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Ha uma oa ' nuparasaya ka ' Aku ' - na hintuwu ' hante Tuama - ku pai ' Tuama - ku hintuwu ' hante Aku ' ? Napa to ku ' uli ' - kokoi toe , uma ku ' uli ' ntuku ' konoa - ku moto . Tuama - ku to tida hintuwu ' hante Aku ' , Hi ' a - mi pue ' bago .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Pangala ' - ama - hana , ka ' Aku ' - na hintuwu ' hante Tuama - ku pai ' Tuama - ku hintuwu ' hante Aku ' . Nau ' uma nipangalai ' lolita - ku , pangala ' - mi apa ' nihilo - mi hawe ' ea to kubabehi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: " Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Tauna to mepangala ' hi Aku ' , ma ' ala - ra mpobabehi hewa to kubabehi - - ba melabi tena - pi ngkai to kubabehi - - apa ' hilou - a mpai ' mo ' oha ' dohe Tuama - ku .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Jadi ' , napa - napa to niperapi ' hante hanga ' - ku , bate kuwai ' - koi , bona to kubabehi toe mpobila ' Tuama - ku .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Ba napa - napa to niperapi ' hante hanga ' - ku , kuwai ' - koi .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: " Ane nipoka ' ahi ' - a , nituku ' - mi hawa ' - ku .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Kuperapi ' hi Tuama - ku , bona nawai ' - koi hadua Topetulungi to ntani ' - na , bona Hi ' a - damo mpodohei - koi duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Topetulungi toei , Hi ' a - mi Inoha ' Alata ' ala , to mpotete ' - koi hi tudui ' to makono . Tauna to uma mepangala ' uma bisa mpotarima - i , apa ' uma - i rahiloi pai ' uma wo ' o - i ra ' incai . Aga koi ' , ni ' inca - imi , apa ' nadohei - mokoi wae lau , pai ' mo ' oha ' - i mpai ' hi rala nono - ni .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: " Uma - koi kupalahii jadi ' ilu . Nculii ' moto - a mpai ' tumai hi koi ' .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Hampai ' lia - damo , tauna to hi dunia ' uma - pi mpohiloi - a . Aga koi ' , nihilo moto - a . Tuwu ' moto - koi mpai ' , apa ' Aku ' tuwu ' - a .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Ane rata - pi mpai ' tempo toe , ni ' inca - mi ka ' Aku ' - na hintuwu ' hante Tuama - ku , pai ' koi ' hintuwu ' hante Aku ' , pai ' Aku ' hintuwu ' hante koi ' .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: " Tauna to mpotarima pai ' mpotuku ' hawa ' - ku , hira ' - mi to mpoka ' ahi ' - a . Tuama - ku mpoka ' ahi ' tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' - a , pai ' Aku ' wo ' o mpoka ' ahi ' - ra , pai ' kupopohiloi - ra woto - ku . "

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Yudas ( aga bela Yudas Iskariot ) mpekune ' Yesus : " Pue ' , napa pai ' nupopehuwu woto - nu hi kai ' - wadi , uma hi hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kupopehuwu woto - ku hi tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' - a pai ' to mpotuku ' lolita - ku . Tuama - ku mpoka ' ahi ' tauna to hewa toe . Tuama - ku pai ' Aku ' hilou hi tauna toera , pai ' mo ' oha ' - makai dohe - ra .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Tauna to uma mpoka ' ahi ' - a , uma - ra mpotuku ' lolita - ku . Lolita to ni ' epe ngkai Aku ' , uma ngkai Aku ' moto . Ngkai Tuama - ku to mposuro - a .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: " Hawe ' ea toe we ' i lau ku ' uli ' - kokoi nampa ' hi ria - a - pidi dohe - ni .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Tapi ' ane rata - ipi mpai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , Hi ' a - mi to mpotudui ' - koi butu nyala - na , pai ' napopokiwoii - koi hawe ' ea to oti - mi ku ' uli ' - kokoi , apa ' Hi ' a - mi Topetulungi to nahubui tumai Tuama - ku jadi ' sulewata - ku .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: " Kalompea ' kutu ' u - kokoi . Kalompea ' to ngkai Aku ' moto - mi to kuwai ' - kokoi . To kuwai ' - kokoi toi - e , uma hewa to nirata ngkai dunia ' toi . Neo ' susa ' nono - ni , pai ' neo ' me ' eka ' .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Ni ' epe lolita - ku we ' i to mpo ' uli ' : Hilou - a , aga nculii ' moto - a mpai ' tumai hi koi ' . Ane nipoka ' ahi ' mpu ' u - a , nipokagoe ' moto kahilou - ku toi hi Tuama - ku , apa ' Tuama - ku meliu kabohe - na ngkai Aku ' .
