text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Toe - e ku ' uli ' ami ' - mikokoi kako ' ia - na jadi ' , bona ane madupa ' - pi mpai ' , nipangala ' - mi .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: " Uma - pi wori ' loga - ku mpololitai - koi , apa ' neo ' rata - mi Magau ' Anudaa ' . Hi ' a - mi to mpokuasai dunia ' tohe ' i , aga uma ria kuasa - na hi Aku ' .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Aga toi kana jadi ' , bona hawe ' ea tauna mpo ' inca kakupoka ' ahi ' - na Tuama - ku pai ' kutuku ' oa ' hawe ' ea to nahawai ' - ka . Mokore - mi , pai ' hilou - tamo . "

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' toi - mi woto kaju to makono , pai ' Tuama - ku pue ' bonea .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Hawe ' ea ra ' a to mentaka ' hi Aku ' to uma mowua ' , nalali . Pai ' hawe ' ea ra ' a to mentaka ' hi Aku ' pai ' to mowua ' , napeholui pai ' napegalihi , bona kawoo - woria ' wua ' - na .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Koi ' , tepegalihi - mokoi - - batua - na , moroli ' - mokoi napakaroli ' lolita to ku ' uli ' - kokoi .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: " Tida - mokoi hintuwu ' hante Aku ' , pai ' Aku ' wo ' o hante koi ' . Ra ' a to mohepi ' ngkai woto kaju , uma - i mowua ' . Ra ' a bate kana mentaka ' hi woto - na bona mowua ' - i . Wae wo ' o koi ' : Sampale - koi mowua ' ane tida - koi hintuwu ' hante Aku ' .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: " Aku ' toi - mi woto kaju , pai ' koi ' - mi ra ' a - na . Tauna to tida hintuwu ' hante Aku ' pai ' Aku ' hante hira ' , wori ' powua ' - ra . Aga ane mogaa ' - koi ngkai Aku ' , uma - koi bisa mpobabehi napa - napa .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Hema to uma tida hintuwu ' hante Aku ' bate ratadi , hewa karatadi - na ra ' a to mohepi ' duu ' - na jadi ' bangi . Ra ' a to hewa toe , rarumpu pai ' ratene ' hi rala apu .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Ane tida - koi hintuwu ' hante Aku ' pai ' lolita - ku tida hi rala nono - ni , perapi ' - mi - hana hi Alata ' ala ba napa - napa konoa - ni , bate nawai ' - koile .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Ane mowua ' wori ' - koi , Tuama - ku rapomobohe . Ane hewa toe - mi po ' ingku - ni , topetuku ' - ku mpu ' u - mokoi .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Hewa Tuama - ku mpoka ' ahi ' - a , wae wo ' o Aku ' mpoka ' ahi ' - koi . Tida - mokoi mohu ' hi Aku ' bona nirasai ahi ' - ku .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Ane nituku ' - mi hawa ' - ku , tida mpu ' u - koi mohu ' hi Aku ' pai ' nirasai mpu ' u ahi ' - ku , hewa Aku ' wo ' o mpotuku ' hawa ' Tuama - ku pai ' - a tida mohu ' hi Hi ' a pai ' mporasai ahi ' - na .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: " Hawe ' ea tohe ' i ku ' uli ' - kokoi , bona goe ' nono - ni hante kagoea ' to ngkai Aku ' , pai ' bona gana kagoea ' - ni .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: " Toi - mi hawa ' - ku : Momepoka ' ahi ' - mokoi , hewa Aku ' wo ' o mpoka ' ahi ' - koi .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Ane ria tauna to mpewai ' tuwu ' - na bona doo - na tuwu ' , bohe mpu ' u ahi ' - na toe . Uma ria ahi ' to meliu ngkai ahi ' tauna to mpewai ' tuwu ' - na bona mpotulungi doo - na .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Doo - ku omea - mokoi , ane nituku ' hawa ' - ku .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Uma - pokoi kukahangai ' batua - ku , apa ' batua uma mpo ' incai napa to hi rala nono pue ' - na . Wae - e lau , doo - ku mpu ' u - mokoi , apa ' ku ' uli ' - mikokoi hawe ' ea to na ' uli ' - ka Tuama - ku .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Bela koi ' to mpopelihi - a . Aku ' - dile to mpelihi - koie . Kuwai ' - koi bago hilou hi rala dunia ' bona mowua ' wori ' . Pai ' powua ' - ni toe uma mpai ' moronto , ria kalaua - na duu ' kahae - hae - na . Jadi ' , napa to niperapi ' hi Tuama - ku hante hanga ' - ku , bate nawai ' - koi .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Toi - mi hawa ' - ku hi koi ' : Momepoka ' ahi ' - mokoi !

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: " Ane tauna to uma mepangala ' hi Aku ' mpokahuku ' - koi , kiwoi : Aku ' - mi - hana to ri ' ulu rapokahuku ' - e .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na hampodooa - koi hante tauna to uma mepangala ' , bate rapoka ' ahi ' - koi , apa ' lawi ' doo - rakoi . Tapi ' kupelihi - mokoi pai ' kupatani ' - koi ngkai laintongo ' - ra , alaa - na uma - pokoi doo - ra . Toe pai ' rapokahuku ' - koi .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Kiwoi napa to ku ' uli ' - kokoi we ' i : Hadua batua uma meliu tuwu ' - na ngkai maradika - na . Ane ntoa ' Aku ' rabalinai ' , koi ' wo ' o mpai ' rabalinai ' . Ane ria to mpotuku ' lolita - ku , bate ratuku ' wo ' o mpai ' lolita - ni .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Hawe ' ea tohe ' e rababehi hi koi ' apa ' topetuku ' - ku - koi . Hawe ' ea tohe ' e rababehi hi koi ' , apa ' uma - i ra ' incai Alata ' ala to mposuro - a .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Ane ke uma - a tumai mpololitai - ra , ke uma - ra - hawo masala ' . Tapi ' , apa ' tumai mpu ' u - ama mpololitai - rae , toe pai ' uma ria wuniia ' - na sala ' - ra .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Tauna to mpokahuku ' - a , mpokahuku ' wo ' o - ra Tuama - ku .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: " Hi laintongo ' ntodea kubabehi anu mekoncehi , to ko ' ia ria rababehi tau ntani ' - na . Ane ke uma kubabehi hewa toe , ke uma - ra masala ' . Tapi ' rahilo moto - mi napa to kubabehi , pai ' rapokahuku ' oa ' - a , pai ' rapokahuku ' wo ' o - i Tuama - ku .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Aga bate kana hewa toe , bona madupa ' lolita to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Atura - ra to mpo ' uli ' : ' Rapokahuku ' - a nau ' uma ria sabana . '

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: " Tumai - i mpai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , batua - na , Inoha ' to mehuwu ngkai Alata ' ala pai ' to mpotete ' - koi hi tudui ' to makono . Hi ' a - mi mpai ' Topetulungi to kuhubui tumai hi koi ' ngkai Tuama - ku . Ane tumai - ipi mpai ' , Hi ' a - mi to jadi ' sabi ' - ku .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Pai ' koi ' wo ' o jadi ' sabi ' - ku , apa ' koi ' - mi to dohe - ku ngkai pontepu ' ua bago - ku hi dunia ' .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: " Hawe ' ea tohe ' i ku ' uli ' - kokoi , bona neo ' mere ' nono - ni duu ' - na nibahakai mepangala ' hi Aku ' .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Rapopalai - koi mpai ' ngkai tomi posampayaa . Uma muntu ' toe , rata mpai ' tempo - na ria tauna to doko ' mpopatehi - koi , apa ' ra ' uli ' - rana , toe - mi konoa Alata ' ala .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Hawe ' ea toe rababehi hi koi ' , apa ' uma ra ' incai Tuama - ku , pai ' Aku ' wo ' o , uma - a ra ' incai .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Ku ' uli ' - kokoi tohe ' i , bona ane madupa ' - pi mpai ' , nikiwoi - mi ka ' oti - nami ku ' uli ' - kokoi .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Aga wae - e lau , neo ' hilou - ama hi Tuama - ku to mposuro - a , pai ' uma - koi haduaa to mpekune ' - a ba hiapa kahiloua - ku .

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Wule ' susa ' nono - ni - wadi mpo ' epe lolita - ku we ' i to mpo ' uli ' neo ' hilou - ama .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Aga kakoo - kono - na , rasi ' - nidi ane hilou - ae ! Apa ' ane uma - a hilou , uma - i mpai ' tumai Topetulungi . Aga ane hilou - apa mpai ' , kuhubui moto - i tumai hi koi ' .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: " Ane tumai - i mpai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , Hi ' a - damo to mpakanoto hi manusia ' kamojeko ' - ra . Napakanoto wo ' o kamonoa ' - ku pai ' pehuku ' Alata ' ala .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Napakanoto kamojeko ' - ra apa ' uma - ra mepangala ' hi Aku ' .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Napakanoto wo ' o kamonoa ' - ku , apa ' hilou - ama mpai ' hi Tuama - ku , pai ' uma - apa nihiloi .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Napakanoto wo ' o kanahuku ' - ra mpai ' Alata ' ala tauna to mojeko ' , apa ' nahuku ' - imi Magau ' Anudaa ' to mpokuasai dunia ' tohe ' i .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: " Wori ' - pidi to doko ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi , aga ko ' ia nikulei ' mpotarima omea tempo toi .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Ane tumai - i mpai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , Hi ' a - damo to mpotete ' - koi pai ' mpopo ' incai - koi hawe ' ea tudui ' to makono . Uma - i mololita ntuku ' konoa - na moto . Napa to na ' epe ngkai Tuama - ku , toe - mi to nalolita . Pai ' naparata - kokoi napa to jadi ' hi eo mpeno .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Hi ' a mpai ' to mpomobohe - a , apa ' lolita to natarima ngkai Aku ' , toe - mi to naparata - kokoi .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Hawe ' ea to ria hi Tuama - ku , bagia - ku omea - mi . Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' : napa to natarima Inoha ' Tomoroli ' ngkai Aku ' , toe - mi to naparata - kokoi . "

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Hampai ' - damo pai ' uma - apa nihiloi . Hampai ' wo ' o - damo , nihilo wo ' o - ama . "

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Ingu ' - ramo ana ' guru - na , pai ' ria - ra to momepekune ' , ra ' uli ' : " Napa - die pai ' na ' uli ' - taka : ' Hampai ' - damo pai ' uma - apa nihiloi . Hampai ' wo ' o - damo , nihilo wo ' o - ama ' ? Napa wo ' o pai ' na ' uli ' : ' Hilou - a hi Tuama - ku ' ? "

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Momepekune ' ncuu - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Napa pai ' na ' uli ' oa ' ' Hampai ' - damo ' ? Uma ta ' incai batua - na . "

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Na ' inca Yesus kadoko ' - ra mpekune ' - i . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ntora momepekune ' - koi ba napa batua - na lolita - ku we ' i to mpo ' uli ' : ' Hampai ' - damo pai ' uma - apa nihiloi . Hampai ' wo ' o - damo , nihilo wo ' o - ama . '

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : geo ' pai ' motantangi ' - koi mpai ' , tapi ' tauna to uma mepangala ' hi Aku ' , goe ' moto - ra . Susa ' mpai ' nono - ni , tapi ' kasusaa ' - ni mobali ' jadi ' kagoea ' .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Kagoea ' - ni toe , hewa kagoea ' to narata hadua tobine to neo ' mo ' ana ' . Lomo ' - na ntodohaka - i , apa ' gati tempo - nami mo ' ana ' . Tapi ' ane putu - damo ana ' - na , uma - pi napenonoi pontodohakaa - na , goe ' - imi apa ' putu - mi ana ' lei hi rala dunia ' .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Wae wo ' o mpai ' koi ' . Tempo toi susa ' nono - ni . Tapi ' kupohirua ' moto - kokoi mpai ' . Nto ' u toe , goe ' nculii ' - mokoi , pai ' uma hema to mpo ' alai ' - koi kagoea ' - ni tetu .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: " Nto ' u toe mpai ' , uma - pi mingki ' nipekune ' - a ba napa - napa . Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : napa - napa to niperapi ' hi Tuama - ku hante hanga ' - ku , bate nawai ' - koi .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Duu ' hewa toe lau , ko ' ia - koi ria merapi ' napa - napa hante hanga ' - ku . Wule ' perapi ' - mi - hana , nirata moto mpai ' , bona gana mpu ' u kagoea ' - ni . "

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: " Hawe ' ea tohe ' i ku ' uli ' - kokoi hante walatu . Tapi ' rata mpai ' tempo - na , uma - apa mowalatu . Kupololitai - koi hante kalonto ' - na mpotompo ' wiwi Tuama - ku .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , merapi ' - koi hi Tuama - ku hante hanga ' - ku . Uma mingki ' Aku ' to mperapi ' - kokoi hi Tuama - ku ,

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: apa ' napoka ' ahi ' - koi . Napoka ' ahi ' - koi , apa ' nipoka ' ahi ' - a , pai ' nipangala ' ka ' Aku ' - na to ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Ngkai Tuama - ku mpu ' u - ada , pai ' tumai - ama hi dunia ' toi . Wae - e lau , kupalahii - mi dunia ' toi , nculii ' - ama hilou hi Tuama - ku . "

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Ra ' uli ' ana ' guru - na : " Tempo toi , lonto ' - mi lolita - nu Pue ' , uma - poko mowalatu .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Monoto mpu ' u - mi hi kai ' : Pue ' to mpo ' inca omea . Uma - pi mingki ' ria to mpekune ' ba napa - napa hi Iko . Toe pai ' kipangala ' ka ' Iko - na to ngkai Alata ' ala . "

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ha mepangala ' mpu ' u - mokoi wae lau ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Kiwoi ! Rata mpai ' tempo - na - - pai ' toi - mi tempo - na - - koi ' mpai ' pagaa ' - gaa ' hore - hore nculii ' hi tomi - ni , pai ' Aku ' nipalahii hadudua - ku . Aga uma hadudua - ku mpu ' u , apa ' Tuama - ku mpodohei - a .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Hawe ' ea toi ku ' uli ' - kokoi , bona mporata - koi kalompea ' tuwu ' ngkai posidaia ' - ni hante Aku ' . Bula - ni hi rala dunia ' toi - pidi , bate rabalinai ' - koi . Aga pakaroho nono - ni , apa ' kudagi - mi dunia ' toi . "

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Ka ' oti - na Yesus mpo ' uli ' hawe ' ea toe , mengoa ' - imi hi langi ' pai ' - i mosampaya , na ' uli ' : " Tuama - ku , rata - mi tempo - na ! Pomobohe - ama Aku ' Ana ' - nu , bona Aku ' wo ' o mpomobohe - ko Mama .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Nuwai ' - ama kuasa hi hawe ' ea manusia ' , bona tauna to nuwai ' - maka , kuwai ' - ra katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Ane ra ' inca - ko Mama , ka ' Iko - na Alata ' ala to makono to uma ria karodua - na , pai ' ane ra ' inca Yesus Kristus suro - nu , toe - mi ohea - ra mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Hi rala dunia ' toi kupopehuwu - mi kabohe tuwu ' - nu Mama , kuposipolea - mi bago to nuwai ' - ka .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Toe pai ' kuperapi ' bona nupopehuwu kabohe tuwu ' - ku dohe - nu Mama , hewa kabohe tuwu ' - ta hangkaa - ngkania kako ' ia - na dunia ' tohe ' i rapajadi ' .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: " Ane doo - ku tohe ' ira lau , to nuwai ' - maka ngkai rala dunia ' toi - e , kupopo ' incai - ramo kahema - nu Mama . Bagia - nu ami ' - ramo , nutonu - ra hi Aku ' , pai ' ratuku ' - mi lolita - nu .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Wae lau , ra ' inca - mi : hawe ' ea to nuwai ' - ka , bate ngkai Iko Mama .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Kuparata - miraka hawe ' ea lolita to nuparata - ka . Ratarima - mi , pai ' ra ' inca - mi Aku ' toi ngkai Mama mpu ' u - a , pai ' rapangala ' - mi ka ' Iko - na to mposuro - a .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: " Kuposampayai - ra doo - ku tohe ' i - ra lau . Uma kuposampayai hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' . To kuposampayai toi - e , muntu ' tauna to nuwai ' - maka Mama , apa ' lawi ' hira ' - mi bagia - nu .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna to kupobagia , bagia - nu Mama . Pai ' hawe ' ea tauna to nupobagia , bagia - ku . Hira ' - mi to mpopehuwu kabohe tuwu ' - ku .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: " Neo ' tilou - ama Mama , uma - apa mahae hi dunia ' toi . Aga ane ana ' guru - ku toira lau , hi dunia ' toi - ra - pidi . O Tuama - ku to moroli ' , pewili ' - ramo hante kabaraka ' hanga ' - nu - - hante hanga ' to nuwai ' - ka . Pewili ' - ramo bona hanono lau - ra , hewa Mama pai ' Aku ' hanono lau - ta .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Bula - ku dohe - ra - pidi , Aku ' to mpewili ' - ra hante kabaraka ' hanga ' - nu - - hante hanga ' to nuwai ' - ka . Kujaga - ra pai ' uma - ra ria to mporata silaka , ntani ' - na ngkai to hadua . Hi ' a kana silaka , bona madupa ' lolita to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: " Wae - e lau , tilou - ama Mama . Hawe ' ea tohe ' i ku ' uli ' bula - ku dohe - ra - pidi hi dunia ' toi , bona gana mpu ' u kagoea ' - ra hante kagoea ' to ngkai Aku ' .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Kuparata - miraka lolita - nu , alaa - na tauna to uma mepangala ' mpokahuku ' - ra , apa ' bela - ra doo - ra , hewa Aku ' wo ' o bela - a doo - ra to uma mepangala ' .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Uma kuperapi ' bona nu ' ala ' - ra ngkai dunia ' tohe ' i . Pomperapia ' - ku , bona nupetalawai ' - ra ngkai anudaa ' .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Hewa Aku ' bela - a doo - ra to uma mepangala ' , wae wo ' o ana ' guru - ku bela doo - ra .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Pakaroli ' - ramo , pajadi ' - ra bagia - nu hante tudui ' to makono . Lolita - nu Mama , tetu - mi to makono .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Hewa Mama mposuro - a tumai hi dunia ' , wae wo ' o Aku ' mposuro - ra hilou hi tau ntani ' - na hi dunia ' .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Mama , kutonu katuwu ' - ku hi Iko jadi ' bagia - nu , bona ana ' guru - ku toira mporata kalompea ' , pai ' bona hira ' jadi ' bagia - nu hi kampotuku ' - ra tudui ' to makono .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: " Uma muntu ' ana ' guru - ku tohe ' i - wadi to kuposampayai . Kuposampayai wo ' o tauna to mepangala ' mpai ' hi Aku ' ngkai posabi ' - ra .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Pomperapia ' - ku , bona hawe ' ea - ra hanono lau . Hewa Mama hintuwu ' hante Aku ' , pai ' Aku ' hante Mama , kuperapi ' bona hira ' wo ' o hintuwu ' hante Kita ' . Bona hawe ' ea tauna mpangala ' ka ' Iko - na to mposuro - a .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: " Kuwai ' - ramo kabaraka ' to nuwai ' - ka Mama , bona jadi ' hanono lau - ramo , hewa Kita ' wo ' o hanono lau .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Aku ' hintuwu ' hante hira ' , pai ' Mama hintuwu ' hante Aku ' , bona hira ' mpai ' jadi ' hanono lau hante karoli ' - roli ' - na . Ane hewa toe - damo , hawe ' ea tauna mpo ' inca kanusuro - ku , pai ' kanupoka ' ahi ' - ra hewa kanupoka ' ahi ' - ku .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: " Mama , konoa - ku bona hira ' to nuwai ' - ka toi mo ' oha ' dohe - ku hi po ' ohaa ' - ku mpai ' , bona rahilo kabaraka ' - ku . Kabaraka ' - ku toi nuwai ' - maka , apa ' nupoka ' ahi ' - a ngkai kako ' ia - na dunia ' rapajadi ' .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: O Tuama - ku to monoa ' , tauna hi dunia ' toi uma mpo ' incai - ko . Aga Aku ' , ku ' inca - ko . Pai ' doo - ku tohe ' ira lau mpo ' inca ka ' Iko - na to mposuro - a .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Kupopo ' incai - ramo kahema - nu , pai ' bate kupohewa toe oa ' mpai ' , bona hira ' mporasai ahi ' - nu hi rala nono - ra , hewa Aku ' mporasai ahi ' - nu , pai ' bona Aku ' mo ' oha ' hi rala nono - ra . "

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Kahudu - na Yesus mosampaya , me ' ongko ' - imi hante ana ' guru - na hilou hi mali ngata . Mpodongka ' - ra ue Kidron , pai ' - ra hilou hi pampa to hi dipo - na .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Yudas , to mpobalu ' Yesus toei , mpo ' inca kahiapa - na pampa toe , apa ' Yesus pai ' ana ' guru - na jau - ra morumpu hi ria .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Jadi ' , imam pangkeni pai ' to Parisi mpohubui hampodooa tantara to Roma pai ' topojaga Tomi Alata ' ala mpo ' ema ' Yudas hilou hi pampa toe . Mpokeni - ra rewa mpanga ' e , lampu pai ' hulu ' .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Yesus mpo ' inca omea napa to kana jadi ' hi woto - na . Toe pai ' hilou - imi mpotomu tauna toera , pai ' napekune ' : " Hema to nipali ' ? "

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Ra ' uli ' : " Yesus to Nazaret . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Aku ' - mile toi - e . " Yudas to mpobalu ' - i mokore hi ree dohe tantara pai ' topojaga toera .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Nto ' u kana ' uli ' - na - raka Yesus : " Aku ' - mile toi - e , " ngkala ' ura - ramo pai ' modungka - ra hi tana ' .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Napekune ' wo ' o - mi Yesus : " Hema to nipali ' - e ? " Ra ' uli ' : " Yesus to Nazaret . "

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ku ' uu - uli ' - mi we ' i ka ' Aku ' - nami toi - e . Jadi ' , ane Aku ' mpu ' u to nipali ' , pelele ' - ramo doo - ku tohe ' i hilou . "

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: ( Hante lolita - na Yesus toe , madupa ' - mi napa to na ' uli ' hi rala posampaya - na we ' i : " Ngkai hawe ' ea tauna to nuwai ' - ka , uma ria haduaa to mporata silaka . " )

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Ngkai ree , Simon Petrus mpowute ' piho ' - na , natime - ki hadua batua Imam Bohe , bela mpoholu tilinga ka ' ana - na . Hanga ' - na batua toei , Malkus .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus hi Petrus : " Unco ' nculii ' piho ' - nu ! Ha nu ' uli ' - kona kupetiboi ' kaparia to naponoa ' ami ' - maka Tuama - kue ? "

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Ngkai ree , tantara to Roma hante tadulako - ra , pai ' topojaga to Yahudi mpohoko ' Yesus , rahoo ' ,

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: pai ' - i rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe . Lomo ' - na rakeni - i hilou hi Hanas , piniana - na Kayafas . Kayafas toei Imam Bohe hi mpae toe .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Kayafas toe - mi to mpo ' uli ' - raka topoparenta to Yahudi wengi : " Agina - pi tau hadua mate mposampei ntodea . "

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Simon Petrus pai ' hadua ana ' guru ntani ' - na mpotuku ' Yesus . Ana ' guru to hadua toei , pome ' inca - na Imam Bohe . Jadi ' , mesua ' - imi dohe Yesus hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Petrus mepopea hi mali - na , hi wobo ' wala . Ngkai ree we ' i , ana ' guru to hadua toei , lou nculii ' hi mali - na mpololitai tobine to mpojaga wobo ' , bona Petrus rapiliu mesua ' dohe - na , pai ' napo ' ema ' - i Petrus mesua ' hi rala - na .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Tobine topojaga wobo ' toei mpo ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Ha bela iko wo ' o ana ' guru - na tauna toei - e lou ? " Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Bela ! "

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Nto ' u toe , tempo lengi ' . Jadi ' , ba hangkuja dua batua pai ' topojaga mpobaa apu hi berewe hante wuri to morea ' , pai ' - ra mokore ntololikia - na moneru . Petrus wo ' o mokore pai ' moneru dohe - ra .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Hi rala tomi , Imam Bohe mpopekune ' Yesus na ' uli ' - ki : " Hema omea - ra ana ' guru - nue ? Napa to nutudui ' - raka ? "

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kabiasaa - ku , mololita hante kalonto ' - lonto ' - na hi hawe ' ea tauna . Metudui ' - a hi tomi posampayaa pai ' hi Tomi Alata ' ala , hi kabiasaa - ta kita ' to Yahudi morumpu . Uma ria to kuwunii ' - na .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Jadi ' , napa pai ' nupekune ' - ae ? Pekune ' moto - ra - kowo to mpo ' epe - a metudui ' . Ra ' inca moto mpai ' napa to ku ' uli ' . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Kana ' uli ' - na Yesus toe , hadua topojaga to mokore hi ncori - na mpohopo ' - i , na ' uli ' : " Daho ' mpu ' u - ko - kona mololita hewa tetu hi Imam Bohe - e ! "

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane uma makono to ku ' uli ' , uli ' lau - mi hi rehe ' i napa sala ' - ku . Tapi ' ane makono lolita - ku , napa pai ' nuhopo ' - a ? "

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Ngkai ree , Hanas mpohubui topojaga mpokeni Yesus hilou hi Imam Bohe Kayafas . Nto ' u toe , pale - na Yesus tehoo ' oa ' - pidi .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Simon Petrus , ria - i - pidi mokore pai ' moneru ngkokore dohe topojaga . Ria tauna to mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Ha bela iko wo ' o hadua ana ' guru - nae ? " Nasapu Petrus , na ' uli ' : " Bela - kuwo aku ' ! "

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Ria wo ' o hi ree hadua batua Imam Bohe . Batua toei , ompi ' tauna to naholu Petrus tilinga - na . Na ' uli ' batua toei mpo ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Ha bela iko to kuhilo - e ngone hi pampa toe ria dohe Yesus - e ? "

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Nasapu wo ' o - mi Petrus , na ' uli ' : " Bela ! " Nto ' u toe , turua ' - mi manu ' .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Mepupulo ngkii , Yesus rakeni ngkai tomi Kayafas hilou hi tomi gubernur . Topoparenta to Yahudi moto , uma - ra mesua ' hi rala tomi gubernur , apa ' gubernur toe , bela - i to Yahudi , pai ' ane mesua ' - ra hi rala tomi to bela tomi to Yahudi , jadi ' babo ' - ra ntuku ' atura agama - ra , pai ' uma - ra ma ' ala ngkoni ' pongkoni ' Paskah .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Jadi ' , Gubernur Pilatus hilou hi mali - na mpohirua ' - raka pai ' napekune ' - ra : " Napa to nipangadu ' - ki tauna toii - e ? "

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Ra ' uli ' : " Ane ke bela - i tauna to dada ' a , ke uma - i kibua ' hi Tuama Gubernur . "

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Na ' uli ' Pilatus : " Keni hilou nculii ' , nipohurai - miki sala ' - na ntuku ' ada agama - ni moto - koiwo ! " Ra ' uli ' to Yahudi toera : " Kai ' - le , uma - kai rapiliu mpohuku ' mate tauna . "

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: ( Toi majadi ' bona madupa ' napa to na ' uli ' Yesus mpolowa beiwa mpai ' kamate - na . )

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ngkai ree , Pilatus mesua ' nculii ' hi rala tomi , napehubui bona Yesus rakeni hi nyanyoa - na , pai ' napekune ' - i : " Ha Iko mpu ' u - mi Magau ' to Yahudi - e ? "

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Pompekunea ' tetu ngkai Gubernur moto , ba pololita tau ntani ' - nadi ? "

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Pilatus : " Kawe ' to Yahudi - a ! Hingka to Yahudi - nu moto - kowo hante imam pangkeni to mpokeni - ko hi aku ' - e . Napa - di sala ' to nubabehi - e ? "

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Kamagaua ' - ku bela ngkai dunia ' toi . Ane rapa ' - na magau ' hi dunia ' toi mpu ' u - a , tauna to mpotuku ' - a bate me ' ewa bona neo ' - a rahoko ' pai ' rapewai ' hi topoparenta to Yahudi . Tapi ' Kamagaua ' - ku bela ngkai dunia ' toi . "

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Pilatus : " Ane wae - di , magau ' mpu ' u - ko ? " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Iko moto to mpo ' uli ' Aku ' toi magau ' . Pai ' - a putu hi dunia ' toi , bona mpo ' uli ' napa to makono . Tauna to mpokono napa to makono , bate mpangala ' lolita - ku . "

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Hampetompoi ' Pilatus : " Ah ! Napa - i to nu ' uli ' makono tetu - e ? "

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Aga , ane ntuku ' - ki ada - ni lalau , butu mpae - na hi Eo Paskah , kubahaka - kokoi hadua to ratarungku ' , ba hema konoa - ni . Jadi ' , beiwa : dota - koi ane kubahaka - kokoi Magau ' to Yahudi toii - e ? "

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Mejeu ' - ra ra ' uli ' : " Neo ' , neo ' Hi ' a ! Agina Barabas ! " ( Barabas toe , hadua toperampaki . )

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Oti toe , Pilatus mpohubui tantara - na mpoweba ' Yesus .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Tantara toera mpobabehi hameha ' songko ngkai walaa to morui , to hewa songko magau ' , pai ' rasongkoi - ki Yesus . Oti toe , raheai - i hante baju to mperelei hewa baju magau ' , rapotingkuai ' - i pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki : " Wori ' tabe , Magau ' to Yahudi ! " Pai ' - i rahopo ' .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Oti toe , mehupa ' wo ' o - imi Pilatus lou hi mali - na , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka to Yahudi : " Hilo , kukeni - imi tumai hi koi ' , bona ni ' inca ka ' uma - na kuruai ' nau ' hanyalaa kasalaa ' - na . "

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Ngkai ree , rakeni mpu ' u - imi Yesus hi mali - na , mosongkoi rui pai ' mobajui hante baju to hewa baju magau ' . Na ' uli ' Pilatus : " Hilo , etu - imi ! "

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Nto ' u imam pangkeni pai ' topojaga mpohilo Yesus , kamejeu ' - rami ra ' uli ' : " Parika ' - imi ! Parika ' - imi ! " Na ' uli ' Pilatus : " Ane doko ' niparika ' - i , ala ' - imi , niparika ' moto - imi - koiwo , apa ' aku ' , uma - kuna kuruai ' kasalaa ' - na . "

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Ra ' uli ' to Yahudi : " Ane kai ' - le , ntuku ' - ki atura agama - kai , kana rahuku ' mate - i , apa ' na ' uli ' - hana Hi ' a Ana ' Alata ' ala . "

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Kana ' epe - na Pilatus toe , hangkedi ' kame ' eka ' - na .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Mesua ' nculii ' - imi hi rala tomi , pai ' mpekune ' tena Yesus : " Ha to apa mpu ' u - ko - kowo Iko - e ? " Tapi ' Yesus , uma - i winihi .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Pilatus : " Oja ' - ko mpotompoi ' - ae ? Ha uma nu ' incai , aku ' toi , ria kuasa - ku mpobahaka - ko ba mpoparika ' - ko ! "

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane Alata ' ala uma mpowai ' - ko kuasa tetu , uma ria hangkedia ' kuasa - nu hi Aku ' . Jadi ' , tauna to mpotonu - a hi iko , meliu kabohe jeko ' - ra ngkai iko . "

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Pilatus lolita toe , napali ' ohea - na bona mpobahaka Yesus . Aga mejeu ' wo ' o - ramo to Yahudi , ra ' uli ' : " Ane nubahaka - i - kona , bela - ko ema ' - na Kaisar ! Yesus tetui mpo ' uli ' Kahi ' a - na magau ' . Jadi ' , mpo ' ewa Kaisar - i - hana ! "

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Pilatus lolita - ra toe , nakeni - imi Yesus hi mali - na , pai ' - i mohura hi pohuraa pobotuhia to rahanga ' Ila ' Watu . ( Hi rala basa Yahudi hanga ' - na Gabata . )

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Nto ' u toe , neo ' tebua ' - mi eo - na , eo pomporodoa nto ' u posusa ' Paskah . Pilatus mpo ' uli ' - raka to Yahudi : " Etu - imi magau ' - ni ! "

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Mogora - ramo mejeu ' , ra ' uli ' : " Patehi - i ! Patehi - i ! Parika ' - i ! " Na ' uli ' Pilatus : " Beiwa ? Niperapi ' kuparika ' magau ' - nie ? " Hampetompoi ' imam pangkeni : " Kaisar - wadi - kaina magau ' - kai . "

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Ka ' omea - na Pilatus mpotonu Yesus hi hira ' bona raparika ' .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Yesus mpaha ' a parika ' - na hilou hi mali ngata , pai ' - i rakeni hilou hi po ' ohaa ' to rahanga ' Bulu ' Banga ' woo ' . ( Hi rala basa Yahudi hanga ' - na Golgota . )

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Hi rehe ' e - imi raparika ' . Ria wo ' o rodua tau ntani ' - na to raparika ' dohe - na . Hadua hi mali ngki ' ii - na , hadua hi mali ngka ' ana - na , pai ' Yesus hi laintongo ' .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Pilatus mpohubui tantara - na mpotaka ' hameha ' papan hi parika ' - na Yesus . Hi papan toe te ' uki ' : YESUS TO NAZARET , MAGAU ' TO YAHUDI .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Ukia ' toe ra ' uki ' hi rala tolu nyala basa : basa Yahudi , basa Latin , pai ' basa Yunani . Wori ' to Yahudi mpobasa ukia ' toe , apa ' poparikaa ' - na Yesus mohu ' ngata .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Jadi ' , imam pangkeni mpo ' uli ' - ki Pilatus : " Neo ' ra ' uki ' : Magau ' to Yahudi ! Agina ra ' uki ' : ' Tauna toi mpo ' uli ' Kahi ' a - na magau ' to Yahudi . ' "

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Na ' uli ' Pilatus : " Napa to ku ' uki ' , bate - nami ! "

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Kahudu - na tantara mpoparika ' Yesus , ra ' ala ' - mi pohea - na pai ' rabagi opo ' bagia , hore - hore habagia - ra . Aga baju - na - hawo , uma ria daua - na , apa ' ratanu ' hantau lau .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Toe pai ' mohawa ' - ramo tantara , ra ' uli ' : " Neo ' raheu ' baju toi . Agina ntene ' undi - ta , ba hema - ta to mporata . " Tohe ' i majadi ' bona madupa ' napa to te ' uki ' owi hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' , to mpo ' uli ' : Ra ' ala ' pohea - ku rabagi - bagi , pai ' baju - ku rapompenoai ' . "

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Mohu ' kaju parika ' Yesus , mokore tina - na pai ' hadua ompi ' tina - na , tobine wo ' o - wadi . Ria wo ' o Maria tobine - na Klopas , pai ' Maria Magdalena .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Kanahilo - na Yesus tina - na mokore hi ree hi ncori ana ' guru - na to nape ' ahi ' , na ' uli ' - miki tina - na : " Ina ' , etu - imi mai ana ' - nu . "

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Pai ' na ' uli ' wo ' o - miki ana ' guru - na toei : " Etu - imi tina - nu . " Ngkai ree , ana ' guru toei mpewili ' tina - na Yesus hi rala tomi - na .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Na ' inca Yesus hudu - mi omea . Jadi ' , bona madupa ' napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' , na ' uli ' : " Ngkamara - a . "

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Hi ree , ria hamanga ' ue anggur to mo ' onco . Ra ' ala ' hampuhu ' wunga to hewa lomo ' , ralolo ' hi rala anggur toe , ratu ' u hi wuntu ra ' a kaju hisop , pai ' rapopoju ' ui - ki wiwi Yesus bona na ' inu .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Kanapemita - na Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Hudu - mi ! " Oti toe , ntungka ' - imi , pai ' modupe ' - mi inoha ' - na .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Eo karaparika ' - na Yesus toe , eo pomporodoa ( batua - na , eo kako ' ia - na Eo Sabat ) , pai ' ntuku ' palia to Yahudi uma ma ' ala ria tomate tetoe hi kaju parika ' nto ' u Eo Sabat . Peliu - liu - nami apa ' Eo Sabat tohe ' e meliu kabohe - na ngkai to lalau . Toe pai ' topoparenta to Yahudi merapi ' hi Pilatus bona tauna to raparika ' toera rapui ' witi ' - ra , bona sohi ' - ra mate pai ' woto - ra rapopana ' u .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Jadi ' , hilou mpu ' u - ramo tantara mpopui ' witi ' - ra to rodua to raparika ' dohe Yesus .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Aga karata - ra hi Yesus , rahilo - rawo mpolia ' mate - imi . Uma - pi oko rapui ' witi ' - na .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Aga hadua tantara mpojalo lumpeha - na hante ponci ' - na . Karajalo - na tohe ' e , mo ' ili - mi tumai raa ' pai ' ue .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Tauna to mpohilo kajadia ' toe , hi ' a - mi to mpo ' uli ' napa to nahilo , bona mepangala ' wo ' o - moko - koiwo . Makono lolita - na , pai ' na ' inca mpu ' u kamakono - na .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Tohe ' i jadi ' bona madupa ' napa to te ' uki ' owi hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Uma mpai ' hamehaa ' wuku - na to rapui ' . "

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Ria wo ' o lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Hira ' mpongoa ' - i mpai ' to rajalo owi . "

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Oti toe , ria hadua tauna to rahanga ' Yusuf , ngkai ngata Arimatea . Mepangala ' bongo - i hi Yesus , apa ' mpoka ' eka ' - i topoparenta to Yahudi . Kamate - na Yesus toe , Yusuf hilou hi Pilatus , pai ' - i mperapi ' woto - na bona ratana . Pilatus mpiliu moto - i . Jadi ' , hilou mpu ' u - imi Yusuf mpo ' ala ' woto - na Yesus .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Dohe Yusuf , ria wo ' o Nikodemus , to ria - imi hangkani mpencuai ' Yesus ngkabengia . Nikodemus toei ngkeni anu mohonga to rahanga ' mur pai ' gaharu , kira - kira tolu mpulu ' kilo katomo - na .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: To rodua toera mpo ' ala ' woto Yesus , raputu ' hante kain to bula , pai ' ragelai ' hante anu mohonga toe , ntuku ' ada popatana to Yahudi .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Mohu ' poparikaa ' - na Yesus , ria pampa , pai ' hi rala pampa toe , ria wulou ' hi panapa bulu ' to raporodo hewa daeo ' . Daeo ' toe bo ' u - pidi , ko ' ia rapotanai .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' daeo ' toe mohu ' , pai ' neo ' ntepu ' u wo ' o - mi eo pepuea ' , toe pai ' rapesahui - mi mpotu ' u woto Yesus hi rala daeo ' toe .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Hi eo Mingku mepupulo ngkii , mobee - bengi - pidi , Maria Magdalena hilou hi daeo ' . Rata hi ria , nahilo - hawo , watu po ' unca - nae tederu ' - mi ngkai wobo ' daeo ' .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Pokeno - nami hilou hi Simon Petrus pai ' ana ' guru to hadua to nape ' ahi ' Yesus , na ' uli ' - raka : " Ra ' ala ' - mi - hana woto Pue ' ngkai daeo ' , pai ' uma ki ' incai hiapa karatu ' ua - na ! "

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Hilou - ramo Petrus hante ana ' guru to hadua toei hi daeo ' .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Roduaa - ra mokeno , aga meliu kagasi - na ana ' guru to hadua ngkai Petrus , toe pai ' ri ' ulu - i - hana rata hi daeo ' .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Mengkabungku ' - i mpelongi ' hi rala - na , aga uma - i ulu mesua ' . Nahilo - hawo kain to rahompui ' - ki Yesus bate - na moto hi ree .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Simon Petrus rata ngkabokoa ' , kaliliu mesua ' . Nahilo wo ' o - hawo kain hompu ' - na hi ree .

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: Aga kain to rapopohoo ' - ki woo ' - na Yesus , telulu pai ' tetu ' u ntani ' .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Ngkai ree , ana ' guru to hadua , to ri ' ulu rata hi daeo ' we ' i , mesua ' wo ' o - imi - hawo mpohilo , pai ' napangala ' - mi .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Duu ' rata hi eo toe , ko ' ia oa ' rapaha napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' owi to mpo ' uli ' : Yesus kana tuwu ' nculii ' .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Oti toe , nculii ' - ramo ana ' guru to rodua toera hilou hi tomi - ra .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Aga Maria Magdalena mokore hi mali daeo ' , ntora geo ' . Bula - na geo ' , mengkabungku ' - i melongi ' hi rala daeo ' .

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: Nahilo - hawo rodua mala ' eka , moheai to bula , mohura - ra hi karatu ' ua woto - na Yesus wengi , hadua tono ' hi woo ' - na , to hadua tono ' hi witi ' - na .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Mepekune ' mala ' eka toera hi Maria ra ' uli ' : " Napa pai ' geo ' - ko ? " Na ' uli ' Maria : " Apa ' ra ' ala ' - imi Pue ' - ku ngkai rei , pai ' uma ku ' incai hiapa karatu ' ua - na . "

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Ngkai ree , me ' ili ' - i Maria , nahilo - hawo hadua tauna mokore hi tilingkuria - na . Ntaa ' Yesus - midi - hana , aga uma na ' incai Kayesus - na .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Mepekune ' Yesus hi Maria : " Napa pai ' geo ' - ko totina ? Hema to nupali ' ? " Na ' uli ' - hawo we ' i Maria , pue ' pampa moto to nahilo toe - e . Toe pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Ane Iko Tuama to mpo ' ala ' woto - nae , tudo ' - ka - kuwo hiapa pontu ' ua - nu , bona ku ' ala ' - i . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Maria . " Pe ' ili ' - nami Maria hi Yesus , pai ' na ' uli ' hi rala basa Yahudi : " Rabuni ! " ( batua - na : " Guru " ) .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki Maria : " Neo ' - a ulu nukamu , apa ' ko ' ia - a mengkahe ' hilou hi Tuama - ku . Hilou - ko hi ompi ' - ku , uli ' - raka kahilou - ku hi Tuama - ku bo Tuama - ni , Alata ' ala - ku bo Alata ' ala - ni . "

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Kahilou - nami Maria Magdalena mpohirua ' - raka ana ' guru - na Yesus pai ' na ' uli ' : " Kuhilo - imi - kuna Pue ' ! " Pai ' naparata - raka hawe ' ea to na ' uli ' Yesus .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Ngkabengia eo Mingku toe , ana ' guru - na Yesus morumpu hi tomi to tehohoki wobo ' - na , apa ' mpoka ' eka ' - ra topoparenta to Yahudi . Muu - mule ' rata - imi Yesus mokore hi laintongo ' - ra , pai ' natabe - ra , na ' uli ' : " Kalompea ' rata hi koi ' . "

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Oti toe , natudo ' - miraka pale pai ' lumpeha - na . Uma - pi mowo kagoe ' - ra mpohilo Pue ' - ra .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Na ' uli ' tena Yesus : " Kalompea ' rata hi koi ' . Hewa Tuama - ku mposuro - a , wae wo ' o Aku ' mposuro - koi . "

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Oti toe , natuwui ' - ramo hante inoha ' - na pai ' na ' uli ' : " Doa - mokoi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Hema - hema to ni ' ampungi jeko ' - ra , Alata ' ala to mpo ' ampungi - ra . Ane uma ni ' ampungi jeko ' - ra , Alata ' ala uma mpo ' ampungi - ra . "

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Tomas , hadua ngkai to hampulu ' rodua ana ' guru Yesus , to ra ' atu Ntomoropa ' , uma - i - hana ria hante doo - na nto ' u karata - na Yesus toe .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Toe pai ' doo - na ntora mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Kihilo - imi - kaina Pue ' ! " Na ' uli ' Tomas : " Ane ko ' ia kuhiloi pakua ' to hi pale - na pai ' ku ' unco ' karawe - ku hi pakua ' toe , pai ' ane ko ' ia ku ' unco ' pale - ku hi jaloa to hi lumpeha - na , bate uma kupangala ' . "

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Eo Mingku boko ' , morumpu wo ' o - ramo ana ' guru - na hi rala tomi . Nto ' u toe , Tomas , ria wo ' o - imi - hawo dohe - ra . Tehohoki omea wobo ' , aga nau ' wae , muu - mule ' rata - imi Yesus mokore hi laintongo ' - ra , na ' uli ' - raka : " Kalompea ' rata hi koi ' . "

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Oti toe , na ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Tomas : " Tu ' u - mi karawe - nu hi rei , pai ' hilo pakua ' to hi pale - ku . Mai pale - nu , nupe ' unco ' hi rala jaloa to hi lumpeha - ku . Neo ' - pi morara ' nono - nu . Pangala ' - mi ! "

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Tomas : " Pue ' - ku ! Alata ' ala - ku ! "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Mepangala ' - ko apa ' nuhilo - ama . Marasi ' - ra tauna to mepangala ' hi Aku ' , nau ' ko ' ia - a rahiloi . "

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Wori ' - pidi tanda mekoncehi to nababehi Yesus pai ' to rasabii ' ana ' guru - na , aga uma te ' uki ' omea hi rala sura toi .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Aga napa to ku ' uki ' hi rehe ' i , ku ' uki ' bona nipangala ' Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' , Ana ' Alata ' ala , pai ' bona mporata - koi katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na ngkai pepangala ' - ni hi Hi ' a .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpopehuwu woto - na hangkani - pi hi ana ' guru - na , hi wiwi ' Rano Tiberias . Hewa toi tutura - na :

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Ba hangkuja dua ana ' guru - na morumpu hi ria . Simon Petrus , Tomas to ra ' atu Ntomoropa ' , Natanael ngkai Kana hi Galilea , to rodua ana ' Zebedeus , pai ' rodua ana ' guru ntani ' - na .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Na ' uli ' Simon Petrus hi doo - na : " Hilou - a - kuna mebau ' . " Ra ' uli ' doo - na : " Hilou wo ' o - ka - kaiwo . " Hilou mpu ' u - ramo mohawi ' sakaya pai ' - ra mojala ' hi rano . Aga hamengia toe , uma ria hama ' aa woko ' jala ' - ra .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Parabaja - mi , Yesus mokore hi talinti , aga uma ra ' incai Kayesus - na .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Ana ' - ku , ria wa bau ' - nie ? " Ra ' uli ' : " Uma - di ria - e . "

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Na ' uli ' - raka : " Tene ' hi mali ngka ' ana sakaya jala ' - ni , bate morasi ' - koi mpai ' . " Ratene ' mpu ' u - mi jala ' - ra , pai ' uma - pi rakulei ' mpodii ' , apa ' uma mowo kawori ' - na uru to hi rala - na .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Ngkai ree , ana ' guru to nape ' ahi ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Pue ' - hana toe - e mai ! " Mpo ' epe toe - di Petrus , kana ' unco ' - nami baju - na ( apa ' uma - i mobajui ) , nahoo ' hi hope ' - na , pai ' mengkalitowo ' - imi hilou hi rala ue , monangu hilou hi role - na .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Ana ' guru to ntani ' - na , bate hi rala sakaya moto - ra , mpodii ' jala ' to ponu ' uru hilou hi wiwi ' rano . Uma - ra molaa rahi ngkai role - na , kira - kira ha ' atu mete - wadi .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Kamana ' u - ra hi role - na , rahilo - rawo ria - mi apu to rapobaa hi ree hante wuri to morea ' , pai ' hi lolo apu ria uru pai ' ria wo ' o roti .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Keni - mi tumai ba hangkuja ma ' a uru woko ' jala ' - nie . "

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Simon Petrus ngkahe ' hi sakaya pai ' nadii ' jala ' - na tumai hi role - na . Jala ' toe bihi ' hante uru to bohe : ha ' atu lima mpulu ' tolu ma ' a kadea - ra . Aga nau ' wae kawori ' - na , uma moto morenta jala ' toe .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Mai - tamo moduhu . " Uma ria haduaa ana ' guru to daho ' mpekune ' - i : " Hema - ko ? " apa ' monoto - mi hi nono - ra Kahi ' a - na mpu ' u - mi Pue ' .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Hilou - imi Yesus mpo ' ala ' roti pai ' nawai ' - raka . Napohewa toe wo ' o hante bau ' uru .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Tohe ' i katolu ngkani - nami Yesus mpopehuwu woto - na hi ana ' guru - na ngkai katuwu ' - na nculii ' .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Ka ' oti - ra ngkoni ' , na ' uli ' Yesus mpo ' uli ' - ki Simon Petrus : " Simon ana ' Yohanes , ha nupe ' ahi ' - a meliu ngkai doo - nu toera lau mpe ' ahi ' - a ? " Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Io ' , nu ' inca moto Pue ' , kakupoka ' ahi ' - nue . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane wae , podoo ana ' bima - ku . "

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Oti toe , Yesus mpekune ' Petrus karongkani - na : " Simon , ana ' Yohanes , ha nupe ' ahi ' - a ? " Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Io ' , nu ' inca moto Pue ' , kakupoka ' ahi ' - nue . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane wae , ewu - ra bima - ku . "

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ngkai ree , Yesus mpekune ' - i katolu ngkani - na : " Simon , ana ' Yohanes , ha nupoka ' ahi ' mpu ' u - a ? " Peda ' - mi nono - na Petrus , apa ' Yesus mpekune ' - i tolu ngkani ba napoka ' ahi ' mpu ' u - i . Jadi ' , na ' uli ' Petrus : " Pue ' , nu ' inca hawe ' ea - na . Nu ' inca kakupoka ' ahi ' - nu . " Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane wae , podoo bima - ku .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita - ku toi : Bula - nu mongura - pidi , iko moto mpehoo ' abe ' hi hope ' - nu , pai ' - ko hilou hiapa konoa - nu . Aga ane motu ' a - poko mpai ' , nutonu pale - nu rahoo ' tau ntani ' - na , pai ' - ko rakeni hilou hi ka ' umaa - na nupokonoi . "

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Hante walatu toe , Yesus mpolowa beiwa Petrus rapatehi mpai ' , bona mpobila ' Alata ' ala . Oti toe , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Yesus , mpo ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Tuku ' - ama ! "

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Ngkai ree , kame ' ili ' - nami Petrus , mpohilo - i ana ' guru to nape ' ahi ' Yesus mpotuku ' - ra . ( Ana ' guru toe - mi to mohura ncori Yesus bula - ra ngkoni ' ngkabengia pai ' mpekune ' - i : " Pue ' , hema - idi mpai ' to mpobalu ' - koe ? " )

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Kanahilo - na Petrus ana ' guru toe , napekune ' hi Yesus : " Pue ' , beiwa - i - hawo mpai ' doo - ku toii - e ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Ane konoa - ku tuwu ' ncuu - i duu ' - ku rata nculii ' mpai ' , uma mingki ' nu ' inca iko ! Wule ' tuku ' - ama - hana . "

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Ngkai ree , molele - mi kareba hi topetuku ' Yesus , to mpo ' uli ' ka ' uma - na mpai ' mate ana ' guru toei . Ntaa ' bela - di - hawo toe to na ' uli ' Yesus - e . Api ' wae - di - hawo : " Ane konoa - ku tuwu ' ncuu - i duu ' - ku rata nculii ' , uma mingki ' nu ' inca iko . "

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Ana ' guru toe - imi to mpohilo hawe ' ea to jadi ' toe , pai ' to mpo ' uli ' posabi ' - na . Hi ' a - mile to mpo ' uki ' sura toi - e . Pai ' ta ' inca kamakono - na lolita - na toi .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Wori ' - pidi to ntani ' - ntani ' - na to nababehi Yesus . Ane rapa ' - na butu nyala - na to nababehi toe ra ' uki ' hi rala buku , kupekiri nau ' humalili ' dunia ' toi rapontimamahii - ki , ba kana uma - i liu apa ' wori ' lia buku .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Teofilus to rabila ' : Hi rala sura - ku to lomo ' - na , oti - mi ku ' uki ' hawe ' ea to nababehi pai ' to napetudui ' Yesus , ntepu ' u ngkai lomo ' pobago - na ,

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: duu ' rata hi eo kara ' ongkoa ' - na hilou hi suruga . Ka ' oti - na rapatehi pai ' rapotuwu ' nculii ' , wori ' ngkani - i mpopehuwu woto - na hi suro - na , bona monoa ' - mi ra ' inca katuwu ' - na nculii ' . Rala - na opo ' mpulu ' eo , rahilo moto - i , pai ' - i mpotudui ' - ra beiwa patuju - na Alata ' ala mpohore manusia ' ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra pai ' mpopajadi ' - ra ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Kako ' ia - na me ' ongko ' hilou hi suruga , hante kuasa Inoha ' Tomoroli ' natu ' u hawa ' - na hi suro - na to napelihi - ramo toe .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Rala - na hangkani , bula - na morumpu dohe - ra , nawai ' - ra hawa ' toi . Na ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' ulu nipalahii ngata Yerusalem . Popea ulu hi rei duu ' - na Tuama - ku mpowai ' - koi to najanci - mi , to ku ' uli ' - mikokoi mperi ' ulu .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Apa ' Yohanes meniu ' hante ue . Tapi ' ba hangkuja eo - damo , raniu ' - koi hante Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . "

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Hangkani wo ' o , nto ' u suro - na morumpu hangkaa - ngkania hante Yesus , mepekune ' - ra hi Yesus , ra ' uli ' : " Pue ' , ba tempo toi - mi nubahaka - ta ngkai bali ' - ta pai ' - ko jadi ' Magau ' to Israel ? "

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Na ' uli ' Yesus : " Tuama - ku moto to mponoa ' ba nto ' uma kadupa ' - na hawe ' ea patuju to napakatantu - mi hante kuasa - na . Uma mingki ' ni ' inca koi ' .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Sampale - di , mporata - koi mpai ' baraka ' ane hompo - ipi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hi koi ' . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , koi ' jadi ' sabi ' - ku hi Yerusalem , hi tana ' Yudea pai ' Samaria , duu ' rata hi humalili ' dunia ' . "

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Ka ' oti - na mololita hewa toe , kate ' oo - ongkoa ' - imi hilou hi langi ' . Mengoa ' - ramo mpongoa ' - i , duu ' - na uma - ipi rahiloi apa ' naleru limu ' - imi .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Bula - ra mengoa ' - pidi hi langi ' mponaa pe ' ongko ' - na , ria ncorobaa rodua tomane moheai pohea to mengea ' mokore hi ncori - ra .

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: Ra ' uli ' to rodua toera : " Ee to Galilea ! Napa pai ' ntora mengoa ' - koi hi langi ' ? Yesus to nihilo te ' ongko ' hilou hi suruga toei lou , wae wo ' o - i mpai ' nculii ' tumai ngkai suruga hewa to nihilo - e we ' i . "

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Ngkai ree , nculii ' - ramo suro - na ngkai Bulu ' Zaitun hilou hi Yerusalem . Bulu ' Zaitun toe , ba hakilo kalaa - na ngkai Yerusalem .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Karata - ra hi ngata , hilou - ramo hi tomi po ' ohaa ' - ra ngkahe ' hilou hi kamar to hi lolo - na . Hanga ' suro Pue ' Yesus toera : Petrus , Yohanes , Yakobus pai ' Andreas , Filipus pai ' Tomas , Bartolomeus pai ' Matius , Yakobus ana ' Alfeus , Simon to Zelot , pai ' Yudas ana ' Yakobus .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Hawe ' ea - ra morumpu hangkaa - ngkania , pai ' tida - ra mosampaya . Dohe - ra , ria wo ' o ba hangkuja dua tobine , hante Maria tina - na Yesus pai ' ompi ' - ompi ' - na Yesus .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , ria ba ha ' atu rompulu ' - ra morumpu . Nto ' u toe , mokore - imi Petrus hi laintongo ' ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - na toera , pai ' - i mololita , na ' uli ' :

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: " Ompi ' - ompi ' , napa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' kana madupa ' . Owi hante wiwi Magau ' Daud , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpolowa ami ' - mi Yudas , to mpakeni tauna to mpohoko ' Yesus .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Yudas toei , doo - ta moto - i , pai ' napo ' ana ' guru moto - i Pue ' Yesus , hibalia hante kita ' . "

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: ( Yudas toei mpo ' oli tana ' hante doi to narata ngkai gau ' - na to dada ' a . Hi tana ' to na ' oli tohe ' e , mate monawu ' - i , mobenta ta ' i tina - na , alaa - na ihi ' rala - na malali omea .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Hawe ' ea pue ' ngata Yerusalem mpo ' inca omea to jadi ' tohe ' e . Toe pai ' tana ' tohe ' e rahanga ' hi rala basa - ra moto Hakal - Dama . Batua - na , Tana ' Raa ' . )

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Petrus : " Hi rala Buku Rona ' Daud , ria lolita to mpolowa Yudas . Hewa toi moni - na : ` Pelele ' moto - miki - hawo po ' ohaa ' - na wao ' . Neo ' ria ba haduaa to mpo ' ohai ' . ' ` Agina huraa - nae na ' ala ' kahadua - na . ' "

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: Ngkai ree , napokaliliu Petrus lolita - na , na ' uli ' : " Ompi ' - ompi ' , toe pai ' kana ria hadua ngkai olo ' - ta tapelihi jadi ' sabi ' mpodohei - kai mposabii ' katuwu ' - na nculii ' - mi Pue ' Yesus . Tauna to tapelihi toe , kana hadua to biasa ami ' - mi dohe - ta nto ' u - na Pue ' Yesus mako ' hilou hiapa - apa hante kita ' , ntepu ' u ngkai pobago - na Yohanes Topeniu ' duu ' rata hi kara ' ongko ' - nami Pue ' - ta ngkai laintongo ' - ta . "

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Ngkai ree , rodua tomane to ratudo ' . Hanga ' - na to hadua , Yusuf Barsabas , pai ' to hadua Matias . ( Yusuf toei , ria wo ' o to mpohanga ' - i Yustus . )

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: Oti toe , mosampaya - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Pue ' , nu ' inca omea nono tauna . Yudas , monawu ' - imi - hana ngkai bago - na jadi ' suro - nu , pai ' - i rahuku ' ntuku ' - ki gau ' - na . Toe pai ' kiperapi ' Pue ' , tudo ' - kakai hema ngkai hira ' to rodua tohe ' ira to nupelihi - mi jadi ' sampei - na . "

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Oti - ramo mosampaya , ratene ' - mi undi hewa pompenoa ' - ra . To natudo ' pompenoa ' - ra toe , Matias . Jadi ' , ra ' ongko ' mpu ' u - imi jadi ' suro Pue ' Yesus , bona hono ' hampulu ' rodua - ra hewa to lomo ' - na .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Rata mpu ' u - mi eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga ' Eo Pentakosta , hawe ' ea topetuku ' Yesus morumpu mopahantuda .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Muu - mule ' ra ' epe to moni ngkai langi ' , hewa pewui ngolu ' to bohe . Moni tohe ' e ka ' epea hobo ' hi rala tomi porumpua - ra .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
