text2: Pai ' rahilo - rawo anu to hewa apu to molence mpojila ' , ngkenele pai ' dungku hi butu - butu dua - ra .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Ngkai ree , nakuasai omea - ramo Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' ntepu ' u - ramo mololita hante basa - basa to ko ' ia ra ' incai , ntuku ' to napopolibu ' - raka Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o - hawo , ria hi Yerusalem wori ' to Yahudi ngkai ngata humalili ' dunia ' . Tauna tohe ' era paka ' to mengkoru hi Pue ' Ala .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Kampo ' epe - ra moni to hewa ngolu ' we ' i , mo ' iko - ramo tumai morumpu . Ingu ' - ra , apa ' hore - hore mpo ' epe basa - ra moto to rapake ' suro Pue ' Yesus toera .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Uma mowo kakonce - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Napa - koiwo to jadi ' tohe ' i - e ? Bo paka ' to Galilea moto - ra to mololita toera .

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: Hiaa ' napa - di pai ' ta ' epe - ra mololita hi rala basa - ta moto ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Kita ' toi , wori ' nyala basa - ta . Ria - ta ngkai tana ' Partia , Media , Elam , ngkai Mesopotamia , Yudea pai ' Kapadokia . Ria - ta to ngkai tana ' Pontus pai ' Asia ,

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: ngkai Frigia pai ' Pamfilia , ngkai Mesir pai ' ngkai tana ' Libia to mohu ' ngata Kirene . Ria - ta to rata ngkai ngata Roma .

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: Hantongo ' - ta to Yahudi , pai ' ria wo ' o tau ntani ' - na to mesua ' - mi hi agama Yahudi . Ria to tumai ngkai tana ' Kreta pai ' tana ' Arab . Hawe ' ea - ta himpau mpo ' epe - ra mololita hi rala basa - ta moto , mpololita kajadia ' bohe to nababehi Alata ' ala . "

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Konce pai ' ingu ' omea - ramo , pai ' momepekune ' - ra hadua pai ' hadua , ra ' uli ' : " Napa mpu ' u - koiwo batua - na to hewa toi - e ? "

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Aga ria wo ' o - ra hantongo ' to mepopo ' ore ' , ra ' uli ' : " Malangu - ra - hanale ! "

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: Ngkai ree , mokore - imi Petrus hante doo - na to hampulu ' hadua , pai ' - i mpololitai tauna to wori ' . Mololita - i napesukui , na ' uli ' : " Ompi ' - ompi ' to Yahudi , pai ' koi ' omea to mo ' oha ' hi Yerusalem ! Pe ' epei lompe ' - koi , apa ' napa to majadi ' tohe ' i kupakanoto - kokoi .

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Kai ' tohe ' i - e , uma - kai malangu hewa to ni ' uli ' , apa ' ko ' ia - hawo tempo ponginua . Lako ' jaa sio mepulo .

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: To jadi ' tohe ' i - e , kadupa ' - na to nalowa ami ' - mi Pue ' Ala owi hante wiwi nabi Yoel , hewa toi moni - na :

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: Na ' uli ' Alata ' ala : ` Nto ' u kahudua dunia ' mpai ' , Aku ' mpewai ' Inoha ' - ku hi manusia ' omea . Ana ' - ni tomane pai ' ana ' - ni tobine mpohowa ' mpai ' lolita - ku . Kabilasa - ni mpohilo pangila to kupopohiloi - raka . Totu ' a - ni mo ' ompo ' napa to kupopo ' ompoi ' - raka .

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: Rata - rata hi batua - ku , tomane ba tobine , kuwai ' - ra Inoha ' - ku hi eo toe mpai ' , pai ' - ra mpohowa ' lolita - ku .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Kupopohiloi - koi anu mekoncehi hi langi ' , pai ' tanda mekoncehi hi wongko dunia ' wo ' o . Ria mpai ' raa ' pai ' apu pai ' rangahu to bue ' .

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: Mobengi mpai ' eo , wula molei hewa raa ' , kako ' ia - na rata Eo Pue ' , eo to bohe pai ' to mobaraka ' lia .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Nto ' u toe mpai ' , hema - hema to mekakae hi Pue ' bate rahore ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra . ' "

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: Oti toe , na ' umpui ' Petrus lolita - na , na ' uli ' : " Ompi ' - ompi ' - ku to Israel ! Pe ' epei to ku ' uli ' - kokoi tohe ' i . Yesus to Nazaret , Hi ' a - mi to napelihi pai ' napakatantu Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' Topetolo ' . Alata ' ala mpopo ' incai - koi Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' , apa ' nawai ' - i kuasa mpobabehi wori ' tanda mekoncehi pai ' anu mobaraka ' pai ' kajadia ' bohe . Nihilo moto - mi hawe ' ea toe ompi ' , pai ' ni ' inca kamakono - na .

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Yesus toe ratonu hi koi ' , pai ' - i nipatehi , nitonu hi tauna to dada ' a bona raparika ' . Ntaa ' to jadi ' toe , bate ntuku ' hawa ' to napakatantu ami ' - mi Alata ' ala , apa ' na ' inca ami ' napa to kana majadi ' .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: Koi ' mpopatehi Yesus , aga Alata ' ala mpotuwu ' nculii ' - i , nabahaka - i ngkai kuasa kamatea , apa ' bate uma - i ma ' ala mate oa ' .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: Apa ' wae to na ' uli ' Magau ' Daud owi mpolowa Yesus , hewa tohe ' i : ` Kuhilo , bate Pue ' oa ' to mpodoo - a . Uma kupoka ' eka ' ba apa - apa , apa ' Pue ' to mpotulungi - a .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Toe pai ' goe ' lia nono - ku , pai ' ntora ku ' une ' - ko Pue ' . Rodo moto - a mpopea - ko .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Apa ' uma nupelele ' kao ' - ku tida hi po ' ohaa ' tomate , woto - ku uma nupelele ' hi rala daeo ' duu ' - na pope , apa ' Aku ' batua - nu to nupelihi .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: Nutudo ' - maka ohea mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' . Hono ' lia mpai ' kagoea ' - ku , ane ria - apa mpai ' dohe - nu . ' "

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Petrus : " Ompi ' - ompi ' - ku , ma ' ala ta ' uli ' hante kanoto - noto - na , bela woto - na moto to natoa ' lolita Daud toe we ' i . Apa ' tuama - ta Daud , mate moto - i - hawo pai ' - i ratana . Daeo ' - na ria hi ngata - ta duu ' tempo toi .

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Daud hadua nabi , pai ' na ' inca ami ' napa to nababehi Alata ' ala hi eo mpeno . Alata ' ala mpobabehi janci - na hi Daud hante mosumpa , na ' uli ' : hadua mpai ' ngkai muli Daud na ' ongko ' jadi ' magau ' hewa Daud moto . Jadi ' , toe pai ' Daud mpolowa ami ' - mi katuwu ' - na nculii ' Magau ' Topetolo ' , na ' uli ' : uma - i rapelele ' hi po ' ohaa ' tomate , pai ' woto - na uma rapelele ' hi rala daeo ' duu ' - na pope .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: " Yesus toe - mile to natoa ' lolita Daud - e we ' i . Apa ' Hi ' a - mi to napotuwu ' nculii ' Alata ' ala - e . Kai ' toi - mi to jadi ' sabi ' - na .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: Alata ' ala to Tuama mpo ' ongko ' - imi , napopohura - i hi huraa karabilaa ' hi mali ngka ' ana - na , pai ' nawai ' - imi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Ngkai ree , Yesus mpohubui Inoha ' Tomoroli ' tumai hi kai ' , ntuku ' janci - na Alata ' ala . Jadi ' , napa to nihilo pai ' to ni ' epe - mi toe we ' i lau , majadi ' sabana kuasa Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: " Ompi ' - ompi ' , bela - hawo Daud to ngkahe ' hilou hi suruga . Tapi ' ria lolita - na Daud to mpolowa kangkahe ' - na Yesus hilou hi suruga , hewa toi moni - na : Pue ' Ala mpo ' uli ' - ki Pue ' - ku : ` Mohura - moko hi mali ngka ' ana - ku ,

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: duu ' - na kupopengkoru hawe ' ea bali ' - nu hi Iko . '

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: Jadi ' , toe pai ' hawe ' ea to Israel kana mpo ' inca mpu ' u - mpu ' u : Yesus to niparika ' - e , Hi ' a toe - mi to napelihi Alata ' ala jadi ' Pue ' pai ' Magau ' Topetolo ' . "

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Kara ' epe - na ntodea lolita Petrus toe , soho ' - mi nono - ra , pai ' mepekune ' - ra hi Petrus pai ' hi suro Pue ' Yesus ntani ' - na , ra ' uli ' : " Ane wae , napa - mi - kaiwo to kana kibabehi ? "

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , pai ' - koi raniu ' butu - butu dua - ni jadi ' topetuku ' Yesus Kristus . Ngkai ree mpai ' , Alata ' ala mpo ' ampungi jeko ' - ni , pai ' nawai ' - koi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Apa ' Alata ' ala mojanci kanawai ' - nata Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' hi muli - muli - ta , duu ' rata hi tauna to molaa . Pojanci Alata ' ala toe , bate bagia hawe ' ea tauna to nakio ' Pue ' - ta Pue ' Ala jadi ' topetuku ' - na . "

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Wori ' nyala - pi lolita - na Petrus hi ntodea , naparesai ' - ra pai ' napopo ' ingai ' - ra , na ' uli ' : " Medea - mokoi ! Neo ' - pi nituku ' tauna to dada ' a to tuwu ' tempo toi , bona neo ' - koi narata pehuku ' Alata ' ala to mporumpa ' - ra mpai ' ! "

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: Wori ' - mi tauna to mpopangala ' lolita Petrus , pai ' - ra raniu ' jadi ' topetuku ' Yesus . Hi eo toe , kawori ' tauna to mepangala ' hi Yesus , tetampai - mi kira - kira tolu ncobu .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Topetuku ' Yesus to bo ' u toera ntora mpopetudui ' hi suro Pue ' Yesus , pai ' tida - ra morumpu hangkaa - ngkania . Ngkoni ' - ra hangkaa - ngkania , mpopihe - pihe roti mpokiwoi kamate - na Pue ' Yesus , pai ' mosampaya wo ' o - ra hangkaa - ngkania .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Wori ' anu mobaraka ' pai ' tanda mekoncehi to rababehi suro Pue ' Yesus . Toe pai ' me ' eka ' lia - ramo ntodea .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Hintuwu ' - ramo hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Yesus . Rewa - ra raporewa hangkaa - ngkania .

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: Ria - ra to mpobalu ' ihi ' tomi - ra , pai ' doi oli - na rabagi - bagi hi doo - ra to nakakurai ' .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Butu eo - na morumpu - ra hi Tomi Alata ' ala . Mpopihe - pihe - ra roti mpokiwoi kamate - na Pue ' Yesus , pai ' ngkoni ' - ra hangkaa - ngkania hi rala tomi - ra hante goe ' pai ' karoli ' - roli ' nono - ra .

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: Ntora mpo ' une ' - ra Alata ' ala , pai ' hawe ' ea ntodea mpokagoe ' - ra . Butu eo - na Pue ' mpodonihii kawori ' - ra ; batua - na , butu eo - na kawoo - woria ' tauna to mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus duu ' - na tehore ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , Petrus pai ' Yohanes hilou hi Tomi Alata ' ala hi tempo posampaya to Yahudi , jaa tolu ncimonou ' .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Hi wobo ' to rahanga ' Wobo ' Ncola , ria hadua tomane to pungku ngkai kaputu - na . Butu eo - na rakeni oa ' - i - hawo hi wobo ' toe bona ma ' ala - i merapi ' - rapi ' hi tauna to hilou hi Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Kampohilo - na Petrus pai ' Yohanes mesua ' , kaliliu naperapii ' - ra .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Petrus pai ' Yohanes mponaa topungku toei . Na ' uli ' Petrus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Penoto ' - kai ! "

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Nanaa mpu ' u - ramo , apa ' nasarumaka mporata - i doi ngkai hira ' .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Petrus : " Uma mpu ' u ria doi - ku . Aga napa to ria hi aku ' , toe to kuwai ' - koko : Hante kuasa Yesus Kristus to Nazaret ku ' uli ' , mako ' - moko ! "

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Ngkai ree , Petrus mpokamu pale ka ' ana topungku toei bona mokore - i . Hangaa moroho - mi witi ' - na .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Hangkore - i - dile mokore - e , pai ' - i momako ' hilou tumai . Ngkai ree , mesua ' - imi hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala dohe Petrus pai ' Yohanes , momako ' pai ' mohajo - hajo mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Wori ' tauna mpohilo - i momako ' pai ' mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala ,

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: pai ' ra ' inca kahi ' a - nami topungku to ntora merapi ' hi Wobo ' Ncola butu eo - na . Uma mowo kakonce - ra pai ' ka ' ingu ' - ra mpohilo to jadi ' toe - e .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Jadi ' , topungku to lako ' rapaka ' uri ' toei mpotuku ' oa ' - ra Petrus pai ' Yohanes . Karata - ra hi pengkawinaraa to rahanga ' Pengkawinaraa Salomo , wori ' tauna tumai morumpu ngkarumangkai - ra , apa ' konce - ra .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Kanahilo - na Petrus tauna to wori ' toera , na ' uli ' - raka : " Ompi ' - ompi ' - ku to Israel ! Napa pai ' konce - koi mpohilo to jadi ' tohe ' i - e ? Napa to ntora nikamata - kakai ? Ba ni ' uli ' - koina , pai ' - i momako ' tauna toei - e , apa ' ria baraka ' - kai , ba ngkai kamoroli ' nono - kai ? Uma - hawoe ' !

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Alata ' ala to rapue ' ntu ' a - ta owi , to napue ' Abraham , Ishak pai ' Yakub , Alata ' ala toe - imi to mpomobohe Batua - na , Hi ' a - mi Yesus . Yesus toei to nitonu hi topoparenta - e , pai ' to nisapuaka hi Pilatus , nto ' u Pilatus ke mpobahaka - i .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Moroli ' pai ' monoa ' - i - hana , hiaa ' nisapuaka - i , pai ' niperapi ' hi Pilatus bona nabahaka - kokoi hadua topepatehi .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Nipatehi mpu ' u - imi Yesus . Tapi ' Alata ' ala mpotuwu ' - i nculii ' , apa ' lawi ' Yesus - mi to mpowai ' katuwua ' to lompe ' . Kai ' toi - mi sabi ' - na , apa ' kihilo mata - mi - kaina katuwu ' - na nculii ' .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Baraka ' ngkai hanga ' Yesus toe - mi to mpakaroho witi ' - na topungku toei - e . Jadi ' , tauna to nihilo pai ' to ni ' inca toi , jadi ' mo ' uri ' sabana pepangala ' - na hi Yesus . Ngkai pepangala ' hi Yesus , toe pai ' mo ' uri ' - imi hewa to nihilo moto - mi .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: " Ompi ' - ompi ' , koi ' moto - mi hante pangkeni - ta to mpopatehi Yesus - e . Aga ku ' inca moto , napa to nibabehi tetu , nibabehi ngkai ka ' uma - na - hawo ni ' incai kalaua - na .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , ngkai napa to nibabehi tetu , madupa ' - mi napa to na ' uli ' Alata ' ala owi hante wiwi hawe ' ea nabi , to mpo ' uli ' : Magau ' Topetolo ' kana mporata kaparia .

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' - ompi ' , medea - mokoi ngkai jeko ' - ni , pai ' - koi mengkoru hi Pue ' Ala , bona na ' ampungi jeko ' - ni . Ngkai ree mpai ' , Pue ' Ala mporohoi nono - ni , pai ' nahubui tumai Yesus hi kita ' . Apa ' Hi ' a - mi to napakatantu ami ' Alata ' ala jadi ' Magau ' Topetolo ' - ta .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Tempo toi , Yesus mo ' oha ' hi suruga , pai ' bate tida - i hi ria , duu ' - na rata mpai ' tempo - na Alata ' ala mpobo ' ui omea , hewa to na ' uli ' hante wiwi nabi - nabi - na to moroli ' owi .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: " Ompi ' - ompi ' , ria lolita nabi Musa owi to mpolowa Pue ' Yesus , hewa toi moni - na : ` Pue ' Ala mpai ' mpo ' ongko ' hadua ngkai ompi ' - ni moto jadi ' nabi , hewa aku ' toi . Koi ' kana mpotuku ' napa to na ' uli ' - kokoi nabi toei .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Hema to uma mpotuku ' napa to na ' uli ' nabi toei , uma - i rapohibilai ' ntodea Alata ' ala , kana rahuku ' mate - i . '

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: Nabi - nabi to mpokeni Lolita Pue ' owi , ntepu ' u ngkai nabi Samuel duu ' rata hi nabi - nabi to rata ngkabokoa ' ngkai Samuel , hawe ' ea - ra mpolowa to jadi ' tempo toi .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Koi ' - mile ompi ' to mporata rasi ' to najanci Alata ' ala owi hante wiwi nabi - nabi toe - e . Koi ' - mi to mporata rasi ' ngkai pojanci Alata ' ala hi ntu ' a - ta owi . Apa ' owi Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' - ki Abraham hewa toi : ` Ngkai muli - nu mpai ' , kugane ' hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' . ' Hi koi ' - mile ompi ' kadupaa ' - na pojanci toe - e !

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , toe pai ' Alata ' ala mpotuwu ' nculii ' Yesus Batua - na , pai ' nahubui - i tumai lomo ' - lomo ' - na hi kita ' to Yahudi , bona mpogane ' - ta . Pompogane ' - na toe , mpomedea - ta ngkai kehi - ta to dada ' a . "

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: Bula - ra Petrus pai ' Yohanes mololita - pidi mpololitai ntodea hi Tomi Alata ' ala , rata ba hangkuja dua imam pai ' to Saduki hante kapala ' polisi Tomi Alata ' ala , tumai mpohirua ' - raka .

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: To Saduki , uma - rana raparasaya katuwu ' - ra nculii ' mpai ' tauna to mate . Toe pai ' moroe lia - ra mpo ' epe Petrus pai ' Yohanes mpotudui ' ntodea katuwu ' - na nculii ' Yesus . Apa ' tudui ' - ra toe mpakanoto katuwu ' - ra nculii ' tauna tomate .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Toe pai ' rahoko ' - ramo suro to rodua toera , pai ' rapopesua ' hi rala tarungku ' . Apa ' neo ' mobengi - mi , toe pai ' rapotuhu hi ree - ramo ulu , duu ' kamepulo - na .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Aga tauna to mpo ' epe lolita - ra Petrus pai ' Yohanes hi Tomi Alata ' ala we ' i , wori ' - ramo to mepangala ' hi Yesus , alaa - na katedoo - donihia lau - mi kawori ' topetuku ' - na Yesus , duu ' - na lima ncobu - ramo .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: Kamepulo - na , topohura agama , pangkeni to Yahudi pai ' guru agama , morumpu omea - ra hi Yerusalem .

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: Porumpu - ra toe , hante Imam Bohe Hanas , pai ' hante Kayafas , Yohanes , Aleksander pai ' hante ompi ' - ompi ' Imam Bohe ntani ' - na .

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Ria - ramo omea , rapehubui - mi bona Petrus pai ' Yohanes rakeni mponyanyo - ra . Karata - ra hi ree , mepekune ' - ramo topohura toera mpekune ' Petrus pai ' Yohanes , ra ' uli ' : " Ngkaiapa kuasa - ni mpaka ' uri ' topungku tetui ? Hema to mpowai ' - koi kuasa tetu ? "

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Nto ' u toe , Petrus nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' - i mololita , na ' uli ' : " Tuama - tuama pangkeni ntodea pai ' topohura agama !

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: Hewa toe lau niparesa ' - kai , apa ' mpotulungi - kai tauna to pungku toi - e , doko ' ni ' inca beiwa - kai mpaka ' uri ' - i .

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca pai ' bona hawe ' ea to Israel mpo ' inca , tau toii mo ' uri ' pai ' mokore hi rehe ' i ngkai kuasa Yesus Kristus to Nazaret . Yesus toei niparika ' , tapi ' Alata ' ala mpotuwu ' - i nculii ' .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Hi ' a toe - imi to natoa ' lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Watu to nitadi koi ' topowangu tomi , watu toe lau - mi to jadi ' poko parawatu . '

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Uma ria ohea ntani ' - na mporata kalompea ' ngkai Alata ' ala , muntu ' Yesus - wadi . Apa ' hi humalili ' dunia ' , uma ria haduaa tau ntani ' - na , muntu ' Yesus - wadi to naparia Alata ' ala hi manusia ' , Hi ' a - wadi to mokuasa mpohore - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta . "

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Konce topohura toera mpo ' epe Petrus pai ' Yohanes mololita hante uma ria kakoo - koroa ' - ra , apa ' Petrus pai ' Yohanes toera , tau biasa - ra - wadi to uma mosikola molangko . Pai ' rapelence - ra , kahira ' - nami wengi tauna to mpotuku ' Yesus .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Aga topohura toera , uma - ra daho ' mebaro . Apa ' topungku to rapaka ' uri ' toei , ria wo ' o - i - hawo hi ree mokore dohe - ra Petrus pai ' Yohanes .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Toe pai ' rapopalai - ra ulu suro Pue ' Yesus toera ngkai porumpua - ra , pai ' - ra mohawa ' ,

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: ra ' uli ' : " Tapopai - ramo to rodua toera ? Apa ' hawe ' ea tauna hi Yerusalem mpo ' inca kahira ' - na to mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi to bohe toe . Hiaa ' uma wo ' o ma ' ala tasapu .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Aga bona neo ' hobo ' tauna mpo ' epe tudui ' - ra , agina ta ' ekahi - ra pai ' tatagi - ra bona neo ' - pi rajojo mpotudui ' hema - hema mpokahangai ' Yesus . "

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Jadi ' oti toe , rakio ' nculii ' wo ' o - ramo Petrus pai ' Yohanes mesua ' , pai ' ra ' uli ' - raka : " Kitagi mpu ' u - koie ' , neo ' - pi metudui ' ba mpokahangai ' hanga ' Yesus ! "

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Ra ' uli ' Petrus pai ' Yohanes : " Pekiri moto - koi , to ' uma to napokono Alata ' ala : mpotuku ' hawa ' - ni koi ' , ba mpotuku ' hawa ' Alata ' ala - di .

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Ane kai ' - kaina , uma ma ' ala kipento ' oi mpololita napa to kihilo pai ' to ki ' epe - mi . "

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Ngkai ree , hangkedi ' kamoroe - ra topohura toera mpokaroe Petrus pai ' Yohanes . Tapi ' ka ' omea - na rabahaka moto - ra , apa ' uma ria ohea mpohuku ' - ra . Apa ' hawe ' ea ntodea mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala sabana tanda mekoncehi to rababehi toe .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: Apa ' tauna to rapaka ' uri ' toei , umuru - na opo ' mpulu ' mpae labi - mi .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: Ka ' oti - na Petrus pai ' Yohanes rabahaka , hilou - ramo mpohirua ' - raka doo - ra , pai ' ralolita napa to ra ' uli ' - raka imam pangkeni pai ' pangkeni to Yahudi ntani ' - na .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Kara ' epe - na doo - ra lolita tohe ' e , mekakae - ramo hangkaa - ngkania hi Alata ' ala , ra ' uli ' : " Pue ' , Iko to mpajadi ' langi ' , dunia ' pai ' tahi ' hante hawe ' ea ihi ' - na .

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: Iko to mpopolibu ' ntu ' a - kai owi , Magau ' Daud . Apa ' Daud batua - nu , pai ' bula - na nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , lolita - na mpolowa ami ' - mi pe ' ewa hawe ' ea tauna mpo ' ewa Pue ' Yesus . Na ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Napa - di pai ' moroe rahi - ra tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi - e ? Pai ' napa wo ' o - di pai ' ntodea mohawa ' doko ' mpo ' ewa Pue ' Ala ? Uma ria tuju - na hawa ' - ra toe .

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Magau ' - magau ' hi dunia ' , ngasa ' - ramo . Pai ' hawe ' ea topohawa ' , hintuwu ' - ra doko ' mpo ' ewa Pue ' Ala pai ' Magau ' Topetolo ' to napelihi - mi . '

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: O Pue ' , lolita Daud tohe ' e madupa ' mpu ' u - mi . Apa ' hi rala ngata toi wengi , hintuwu ' mpu ' u - ramo Magau ' Herodes Antipas pai ' Pontius Pilatus , hante ntodea to Yahudi pai ' tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi wo ' o . Kahintuwua ' - ra toe , doko ' mpo ' ewa Yesus , Batua - nu to Moroli ' to nupelihi jadi ' Magau ' Topetolo ' .

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: Mohawa ' - ra toe , mpopatehi Yesus . Ntaa ' to rababehi toe mpopadupa ' napa to oti nupakatantu ami ' - midi ! Hawe ' ea tohe ' e madupa ' - mi ntuku ' kuasa pai ' konoa - nu moto Pue ' .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: " Wae lau Pue ' , epe - mi libu ' - ra mpongasai ' - kai ! Toe pai ' merapi ' - makai hi Pue ' , kai ' batua - nu tohe ' i , wai ' - kai karohoa bona daho ' - kai mpohowa ' Lolita - nu .

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: Popohiloi - ra kuasa - nu Pue ' , bona tauna to mohaki ' ma ' ala kipaka ' uri ' , pai ' tanda mekoncehi pai ' anu mobaraka ' ma ' ala kibabehi hante kuasa Yesus , Batua - nu to Moroli ' . "

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Ka ' oti - ra mosampaya hewa toe , kamoduja - nami tomi porumpua - ra , pai ' hawe ' ea - ra nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Ngkai ree , daho ' mpu ' u - ramo mpoparata Lolita Alata ' ala hi ntodea .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Yesus , tuwu ' hintuwu ' pai ' hanono lau - ra - damo . Uma ria haduaa to mpo ' uli ' : " Tohe ' i anu - ku moto - kuwo . " Hawe ' ea to ria hi hira ' rapodulua hangkaa - ngkania .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Suro Pue ' Yesus ntora mpo ' uli ' posabi ' - ra katuwu ' - na nculii ' Pue ' Yesus , pai ' uma mowo kamobaraka ' - na lolita - ra . Pai ' Alata ' ala mpogane ' - ra omea hante pegane ' to bohe lia .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Uma ria haduaa topetuku ' Yesus to nakakurai ' . Apa ' pontu - na , ria - ra to mpobalu ' tana ' - ra ba tomi - ra ,

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: pai ' doi oli - na rakeni hilou ratonu hi suro Pue ' Yesus . Doi tohe ' e rabagi hi hema - hema to ria kaparaluua - na .

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Wae wo ' o - hawo to nababehi Yusuf . Napobalu ' tana ' - na , pai ' doi oli tana ' - na natonu - raka suro Pue ' Yesus . Yusuf toei hadua to Lewi ngkai tana ' Siprus . Suro Pue ' Yesus mpohanga ' wo ' o - i Barnabas . Batua - na : to mporohoi nono .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Ria wo ' o hadua tomane , hanga ' - na Ananias , hante tobine - na to rahanga ' Safira . Ananias toei , mpobalu ' wo ' o - i - hawo tana ' - na .

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Hantongo ' doi oli tana ' - na toe natonu hi suro Pue ' Yesus , na ' uli ' : " Oi - mi omea doi oli tana ' - ku . " Ntaa ' natimamahi moto - di - hana hantongo ' - e . Babehia - na toe , kahibaliaa - ra hira ' hancamoko .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus mpo ' uli ' - ki Ananias : " Napa - di - kona pai ' nupelele ' Magau ' Anudaa ' mpokuasai nono - nue , doko ' mpakawa ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' - e ? Nu ' uli ' doi oli tana ' - nu nutonu omea - mi , ntaa ' nutimamahi moto - di - kona hantongo ' - e !

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Kako ' ia - na nupobalu ' tana ' tetu , iko moto - kowo pue ' - na . Pai ' ka ' oti - na wo ' o nupobalu ' , oli - na bate - na iko moto - kowo pue ' - na . Jadi ' , napa - di pai ' ria patuju nono - nu mpobabehi hewa tetu - e ? Bela kai ' toi to nupakawa ' . Alata ' ala - hana to nupakawa ' ! "

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Ananias lolita Petrus toe , modungka ncorobaa - imi kaliliu mate . Hawe ' ea tauna to mpo ' epe to jadi ' toe , uma mowo eka ' - ra .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Ngkai ree , ba hangkuja dua tomane mpoputu ' woto - na Ananias , pai ' rakeni hilou ratana .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Ba ria nte tolu jaa ngkai ree , rata wo ' o - imi - hawo tobine - na Ananias hi Petrus . Aga uma - hawo na ' incai napa to jadi ' we ' i .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Uli ' - ka pe ' , tana ' - ni to nipobalu ' - e , ba tohe ' i omea mpu ' u - mi oli - nae ? " Na ' uli ' Safira : " Io ' , tetu mpu ' u - mi omea . "

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Napa pai ' hibalia nono - ni koi ' hancamoko , doko ' mpemai - mai roe - na Inoha ' Pue ' ? Hilo - dile ! Tauna to lako ' oti mpotana tomane - nuele , etu - ramo hi wobo ' . Iko wo ' o mpai ' rakeni hilou ratana . "

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Kana ' epe - na lolita Petrus toe , kamodungka - na wo ' o - mi - hawo kaliliu mate . Karata - ra tauna to muli ' mpotana Ananias , rahilo - rawo mate wo ' o - imi - hawo tobine - na . Kara ' ongko ' - na wo ' o - mi - hawo hilou ratana ncori daeo ' tomane - na .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Ngkai ree , hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus to mo ' oha ' hi ree pai ' tau ntani ' - na wo ' o , me ' eka ' lia - ramo mpo ' epe to jadi ' toe .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Wori ' tanda mekoncehi pai ' anu mobaraka ' to rababehi suro Pue ' Yesus hi mata ntodea . Hawe ' ea tauna to mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus , hanono lau - ra - damo morumpu hi Pengkawinaraa Salomo to hi Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Tauna to uma mepangala ' hi Yesus , uma - ra daho ' morumpu dohe - ra . Aga nau ' wae , hawe ' ea topepangala ' rabila ' ntodea .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Kahaa - haea kawoo - woria ' tauna to mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus , lompe ' tomane lompe ' tobine .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Wori ' tanda mekoncehi to rababehi suro Pue ' Yesus , alaa - na wori ' topeda ' rakeni ntali ali ' - ra , rapopoturu hi wiwi ' ohea . Apa ' rasarumaka ane liu - ipi mpai ' Petrus hi ree , nau ' ba kampa ' kao ' - na bela hi woto - ra , mo ' uri ' - ra .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Jadi ' , mo ' iko - ra - damo tauna ngkai ngata - ngata to mohu ' , hilou hi ngata Yerusalem mpokeni ompi ' - ra to peda ' pai ' tauna to napesuai ' seta . Hawe ' ea - ra rapaka ' uri ' .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Nto ' u toe , Imam Bohe hante doo - doo - na to mpotuku ' tudui ' to Saduki , mohingi ' - ramo hi suro Pue ' Yesus . Toe pai ' ratepu ' u - mi mpobalinai ' - ra .

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Suro Pue ' Yesus toera rahoko ' pai ' rapotuhu hi rala tarungku ' ngata .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Ngkabengia toe , hadua mala ' eka Pue ' mpobea wobo ' tarungku ' pai ' nakeni - ra hilou hi mali - na . Na ' uli ' mala ' eka toei mpo ' uli ' - raka :

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: " Hilou - mokoi mokore hi Tomi Alata ' ala , mpoparata hi ntodea hawe ' ea lolita to mpowai ' katuwua ' to bo ' u tetu . "

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Jadi ' , mepupulo ngkii , hilou mpu ' u - ramo hi Tomi Alata ' ala pai ' - ra mpotudui ' ntodea . Nto ' u toe wo ' o , Imam Bohe pai ' doo - na mpokio ' hawe ' ea pangkeni to Yahudi morumpu mpobabehi porumpua bohe agama Yahudi . Ria - ramo omea , ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka topobago - ra : " Hilou - mokoi hi tarungku ' mpo ' ala ' suro Pue ' Yesus toera ria , pai ' keni - ra tumai . "

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - ramo to rapahawa ' toera . Ntaa ' karata - ra hi tarungku ' , uma - rapa ria raratai . Nculii ' - ramo hilou hi topohura , ra ' uli ' :

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: " Kihilo - kaiwo wobo ' tarungku ' bate - na moto tehohoki piri . Pai ' polisi topojaga bate - ra moto mpojaga wobo ' . Kibea - kaiwo wobo ' , uma ria haduaa tauna kiratai hi rala - na ! "

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Kara ' epe - na toe , ingu ' - ramo kapala ' polisi Tomi Alata ' ala hante imam pangkeni , ba napa to jadi ' hi suro toera . Pai ' koro ' wo ' o - ra , ba napa - di mpai ' to jadi ' .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Ngkai ree , rata hadua tauna mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Epe - koi pe ' ! Tauna to nitarungku ' - ele ngone , oe moto - ra - hana ria , mpotudui ' ntodea hi Tomi Alata ' ala ! "

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Kahilou - rami kapala ' polisi hante doo - na hi Tomi Alata ' ala , mpo ' ala ' - ra suro toera . Aga uma - ra raweba ' , rapelompehi mpu ' u mpobawai - ra , apa ' me ' eka ' - ra hi ntodea , nee - neo ' mpai ' hira ' lau to rakahurui , alaa - na ntodea mpopana ' - ra hante watu .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Jadi ' , rakeni - ramo suro toera hilou pai ' - ra rabua ' hi topohura . Imam Bohe mpoparesa ' - ra , na ' uli ' :

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: " Kitaa - tagi - mokoi wengi , neo ' - pi metudui ' mpokahangai ' hanga ' - na Yesus . Hilo pe ' to nibabehi - e ! Hobo ' lau - mi ihi ' ngata Yerusalem mpo ' epe tudui ' - ni tetu ! Ba kai ' lau - mi to nirai ' to masala ' hi karapatehi - na tau tetui . "

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Ratompoi ' Petrus hante suro Pue ' Yesus ntani ' - na , ra ' uli ' : " Kai ' bate - na mpotuku ' hawa ' Alata ' ala , bela hawa ' manusia ' .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Yesus toe - e nipatehi - i - koina , nipaku ' hi kaju parika ' . Aga Alata ' ala to rapue ' ntu ' a - ta owi mpotuwu ' nculii ' - imi

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: pai ' na ' ongko ' - imi napopohura hi mali ngka ' ana - na , pai ' napajadi ' - i Pangkeni pai ' Magau ' Tompohore - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta , bona kita ' to Israel medea ngkai jeko ' - ta pai ' mporata ampu .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Kai ' toi - mi to mposabii ' hawe ' ea toe , kai ' hante Inoha ' Tomoroli ' wo ' o to napewai ' Alata ' ala hi hema - hema to mengkoru hi hawa ' - na . "

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Kara ' epe - na topohura lolita - ra toe , gigi - mi nono - ra , pai ' doko ' rapatehi - ra .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Tapi ' ria hadua ngkai olo ' - ra to rahanga ' Gamaliel . Gamaliel toei , hadua to Parisi pai ' guru agama to rabila ' hawe ' ea tauna . Mokore - imi mpohubui tauna ngkeni - ra suro toera hilou hi mali - na hampai ' .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Oti toe , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka topohura : " Ompi ' - ompi ' - ku to Israel ! Penonoi lompe ' - koi , ba napa to doko ' nibabehi hi tauna tohe ' i - era .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Apa ' ba hangkuja mpae to liu , ria hadua tomane to rahanga ' Teudas . Mpo ' uli ' - i , hi ' a tauna to mobaraka ' . Wori ' tauna mpotuku ' - i , ba ria - ra nte opo ' atu . Tapi ' ka ' omea - na mate rapatehi moto - i , pai ' topetuku ' - na pagaa ' - gaa ' - ramo , alaa - na uma - pi kaliliu patuju - ra .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Hangkani wo ' o , nto ' u sensus , ria wo ' o hadua to Galilea , hanga ' - na Yudas . Hi ' a wo ' o mpakeni wori ' tauna mpo ' ewa topoparenta . Aga rapatehi wo ' o - i - hawo , pai ' topetuku ' - na pagaa ' - gaa ' wo ' o - wadi .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , toi - ka lolita - ku : neo ' tapopai - pai topetuku ' Yesus toera lou . Pelele ' moto - ra - rawo . Apa ' ane ngkai manusia ' wadi - hawo tudui ' pai ' patuju - ra , mogero moto - hawo mpai ' .

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Tapi ' ane ngkai Alata ' ala mpu ' u - di tudui ' - rae , uma - rale ma ' ala tadagi - e . Apa ' ane hewa toe - ko - koina , lence - na mpo ' ewa Alata ' ala lau - tamo . " Jadi ' , lolita Gamaliel toe ratarima mpu ' u - mi topohura .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Ngkai ree , rakio ' nculii ' - ramo suro Pue ' Yesus , pai ' - ra raweba ' . Ra ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' - pi nitudui ' tauna mpokahangai ' hanga ' Yesus ! " Pai ' oti toe , rabahaka - ramo .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Malai - ramo suro toera ngkai porumpua . Goe ' - ra , ra ' uli ' : " Marasi ' - ta apa ' Alata ' ala mpopelihi - ta bona rabalinai ' pai ' raruge ' sabana petuku ' - ta hi Yesus . "

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Butu eo - na hi Tomi Alata ' ala ba hi tomi ntani ' - na , uma ria kaputua - ra mpotudui ' tauna Kareba Lompe ' , Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Kahaa - haea kawoo - woria ' - mi tauna to mpotuku ' Yesus . Lomo ' - lomo ' - na , topetuku ' Yesus paka ' to Yahudi . Aga to hantongo ' - ra mobasa Yunani , pai ' to hantongo ' wo ' o mobasa Yahudi moto - ra . Nto ' u toe , ngkunuti - ramo topetuku ' Yesus to mobasa Yunani , mpongkunutii doo - ra to mobasa Yahudi , ra ' uli ' : " Tobine - kai to balu , uma raratai bagia to rabagi butu eo - na hi to mpe ' ahii ' . "

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Toe pai ' suro Pue ' Yesus to hampulu ' rodua mpokio ' hawe ' ea topetuku ' Yesus bona morumpu , pai ' ra ' uli ' - raka : " Uma - hawo lompe ' ane kai ' mpo ' urusi pompobagi koni ' , apa ' uma mpai ' hono ' loga - kai mpokeni Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , agina tapelihi ngkai laintongo ' - ta tau pitu to lompe ' po ' ingku - ra , to nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' pai ' to monoto nono - ra , bona hira ' - mi to kiwai ' bago mpo ' urusi kara - kara pongkoni ' toe .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Apa ' pobago - kai kai ' to poko - na mpu ' u , mosampaya pai ' mpokeni Lolita Alata ' ala . "

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Lolita suro toera rapo ' io ' - mi omea . Toe pai ' mpopelihi - ramo Stefanus , to mepangala ' mpu ' u hi Pue ' Yesus pai ' to nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Rapelihi wo ' o : Filipus , Prokhorus , Nikanor , Timon , Parmenas pai ' Nikolaus to Antiokhia . Nikolaus toei , bela - i to Yahudi , aga mesua ' - imi hi agama Yahudi .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: To pitu toera rakeni hilou hi suro Pue ' Yesus , pai ' suro toera mpojama woo ' - ra pai ' mosampaya merapi ' bona Pue ' mpogane ' - ra .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Jadi ' , ngkai toe - mi pai ' kawoo - woria ' tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala . Pai ' katedoo - donihia - mi kawori ' topetuku ' Yesus hi Yerusalem . Imam - imam moto wo ' o , wori ' - ramo to mepangala ' pai ' mengkoru hi Pue ' Yesus .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Ane Stefanus , Alata ' ala mpogane ' mpu ' u - i , nawai ' - i kuasa mpobabehi wori ' tanda mekoncehi to mpopohiloi kabaraka ' - na Alata ' ala hi ntodea .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Aga ria wo ' o - ra to mposapuaka . Tomesapuaka toera , anggota tomi posampayaa to rahanga ' Tomi Libertini ( batua - na : tomi tauna to rabahaka ngkai karapobatuaa - ra ) . Anggota tomi posampayaa toe , to Yahudi to ngkai ngata Kirene pai ' Aleksandria . Hira ' toe hante to Yahudi ngkai tana ' Kilikia pai ' Asia mpomehono ' - ki Stefanus .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Aga uma - ra hompe mpotompoi ' lolita Stefanus , apa ' Inoha ' Pue ' Ala mpowai ' - i kanotoa nono mololita .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Toe pai ' ba hangkuja dua tauna rawai ' doi , bona hira ' mpobabehi lolita boa ' mpobalihi Stefanus , ra ' uli ' : " Ki ' epe - i - kaina mporuge ' Atura Musa pai ' mpokedi ' Alata ' ala ! "

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Ngkai ree , mpo ' ukei ' - ra ntodea hante pangkeni to Yahudi pai ' guru agama , bona moroe - ra hi Stefanus . Kahilou - rami mpohoko ' - i pai ' rakeni hi topohura agama .

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Karata - ra hi ree , rapope ' onga wo ' o - ramo - rawo to tungkai ' mosabi ' boa ' . Ra ' uli ' sabi ' boa ' toera : " Tau tohe ' ii ntora mporuge ' Tomi Alata ' ala pai ' mporuge ' Atura Musa !

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Ki ' epe - i mololita mpo ' uli ' : Yesus to Nazaret toe mpogero mpai ' Tomi Alata ' ala pai ' mpobalii ' hawe ' ea ada to tapososora ngkai nabi Musa . "

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Mpo ' epe toe , hawe ' ea topohura mponaa Stefanus . Rahilo - rawo , lio - na hewa lio mala ' eka .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Mepekune ' Imam Bohe hi Stefanus , na ' uli ' : " Makono mpu ' u hewa to ra ' uli ' bali ' - nu toera - e ? "

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Na ' uli ' Stefanus : " Ompi ' - ompi ' , tuama - tuama ! Pe ' epei - ka - kuwo ulu lolita - ku ! Owi , nto ' u ntu ' a - ta Abraham hi tana ' Mesopotamia - pidi , kako ' ia - na mentoli tumai hi ngata Haran , Alata ' ala to bohe kabaraka ' - na mehupa ' hi ntu ' a - ta toei ,

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: na ' uli ' - ki : ` Palahii ngata - nu pai ' ompi ' - nu . Hilou - ko hi ngata to kutudo ' - koko mpai ' . '

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Toe pai ' napalahii mpu ' u - mi tana ' - ra to Kasdim tumai hi ngata Haran . Hi ngata Haran toe , tuama - na Abraham mate - mi . Pai ' oti toe , Alata ' ala mpopentoli wo ' o - imi Abraham tumai hi tana ' tohe ' i , to tapo ' ohai ' - mi tempo toi - e .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Nto ' u toe , Alata ' ala uma mpowai ' tana ' toi hi Abraham , nau ' hampotomia . Sampale - di , Alata ' ala mojanci hi Abraham , na ' uli ' : ` Tana ' tohe ' i mpai ' kuwai ' - koko , duu ' rata hi muli - muli - nu . ' Hiaa ' nto ' u toe , ko ' ia - hawo ria ana ' - na .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Aga Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' - ki Abraham hewa toi : ` Muli - nu mpai ' mesowo ' hi ngata doo . Pue ' ngata toera mpai ' mpobatua - ra pai ' mpobalinai ' - ra hante makanca rala - na opo ' atu mpae .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Tapi ' oti toe , Aku ' moto mpohuku ' pue ' ngata to mpobatua muli - nu toera , pai ' lako ' malai - rada ngkai tana ' tetu , tumai mpopue ' - a hi tana ' tohe ' i . ' Wae - mi lolita - na Alata ' ala hi Abraham .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Oti toe , Alata ' ala mpobabehi pojanci posidaia ' - na hante Abraham , pai ' nahubui bona Abraham pai ' hawe ' ea muli - na ratini ' . Ada petini ' toe jadi ' tanda pojanci - na Alata ' ala hante muli Abraham . Jadi ' , putu mpu ' u - mi ana ' Abraham to rahanga ' Ishak , natini ' - imi hi eo kawalu - na . Oti toe wo ' o - hawo , Ishak mpotini ' Yakub ana ' - na . Pai ' Yakub mpotini ' ana ' - na to hampulu ' rodua . Pai ' hira ' toe - mi to jadi ' ntu ' a - ta kita ' to Yahudi .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: " Ntu ' a - ta toera mohingi ' hi Yusuf ompi ' - ra , alaa - na rapobalu ' - i pai ' - i rapobatua hi tana ' Mesir . Aga Alata ' ala mpodohei - i ,

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: pai ' ka ' omea - na nabahaka - imi ngkai hawe ' ea kaparia - na . Nawai ' - i kapantea to mpokagoe ' nono Firaun , magau ' hi tana ' Mesir , alaa - na Firaun mpo ' ongko ' - i jadi ' gubernur tana ' Mesir pai ' jadi ' topohawa ' hi rala tomi - na .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: Ngkai ree , rata - mi oro ' bohe hobo ' hi tana ' Mesir pai ' tana ' Kanaan . Rata - mi oro ' bohe toe , wori ' tauna to ntodohaka , pai ' ntu ' a - ta wo ' o uma - pi ria pongkoni ' - ra .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' epe Yakub , ria - hana pae rapobalu ' hi Mesir . Toe pai ' nahubui - ramo ana ' - ana ' - na , ntu ' a - ta toera - e , hilou hi Mesir . Tohe ' e pomako ' - ra to lomo ' - na hilou hi Mesir .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Kahilou - ra karongkani - na , nalohu - miraka Yusuf kahi ' a - nami ompi ' - ra . Nto ' u toe lako ' na ' inca - di Firaun kahema - ra ompi ' - na Yusuf .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Oti toe , Yusuf mpakatu kareba hilou hi Yakub tuama - na , mpo ' uli ' - ki bona hira ' hantinaa mentoli hilou hi tana ' Mesir . Kawori ' tauna to mentoli hilou hi Mesir toe , pitu mpulu ' lima .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Jadi ' , mentoli mpu ' u - imi Yakub hi tana ' Mesir , pai ' tida hi ria duu ' - na mate . Wae wo ' o hawe ' ea ana ' - na .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Aga wuku - ra rakeni nculii ' moto tumai hi ngata Sikhem pai ' ratana hi rala daeo ' to na ' oli Abraham ngkai muli Hemor hante doi pera ' .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: " Mahaa - hae ngkai ree , neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala mpopadupa ' pojanci - na hi Abraham . Momuli - muli - ramo ntu ' a - ta hi tana ' Mesir , duu ' - na wori ' lia - ramo .

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: Ka ' omea - na , ria magau ' to moparenta hi Mesir , to uma mpokiwoi kahema - na Yusuf .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Magau ' toei mposapai ntu ' a - ta owi pai ' nabalinai ' - ra . Nahubui - ra mpotadi ana ' lei - ra bona mate .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: Nto ' u toe , putu - imi - hawo Musa . Musa toei , hadua ana ' to subo ' lia . Tolu mula - i - wadi rapodoo rala tomi totu ' a - na , pai ' - i ratadi .

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: Hi karatadi - na toe , ana ' toronaa Firaun mpotima ' - i , pai ' napodoo naponcawa ana ' - na moto - mi .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Jadi ' , Musa rapoposikola hi hawe ' ea kapantea to Mesir , pai ' alaa - na mokuasa mpu ' u - i hi pololita - na pai ' hi pongkale - na .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: " Kahono ' - na opo ' mpulu ' mpae - mi umuru - na Musa , ria patuju - na doko ' mpencuai ' hingka ompi ' - na muli Israel .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Karata - na hi ria , mpohilo - i hadua to Israel naweba ' hadua to Mesir . Kahilou - nami mpehawa - ki ompi ' - na , mpopatehi to Mesir toei .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Na ' ulia ' - hana Musa , ra ' inca moto ompi ' - na kahi ' a - nami to napopale Alata ' ala mpobahaka - ra ngkai karapobatuaa - ra . Ntaa ' uma - di ra ' incai .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: " Kamepulo - na , nahilo wo ' o rodua to motuda ' , paka ' to Israel . Jadi ' , apa ' doko ' napopohintuwu ' - ra , toe pai ' na ' uli ' - miraka : ` Napa pai ' motuda ' moto - mokoi , koi ' ntali ompi ' ? '

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Tapi ' to hadua to mpoweba ' - mi doo - na mpotulaka Musa pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : ` Hema to mpo ' ongko ' - ko jadi ' pangkeni to mpobotuhi kara - kara - kai ?

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: Ba doko ' mpopatehi aku ' wo ' o - moko , hewa kampopatehi - nu to Mesir wengi - e ? '

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Kana ' epe - na Musa telohu - mi kehi - na toe , metibo ' - imi ngkai tana ' Mesir hilou tida hi tana ' Midian . Hi ria - i motobinei , pai ' - i mo ' anai ' rodua .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: " Opo ' mpulu ' mpae ngkai ree , mehupa ' hadua mala ' eka mpohirua ' - ki Musa hi tana ' to wao ' mohu ' Bulu ' Sinai . Mala ' eka toe mehupa ' hi rala julumpu to jela ' .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Konce - i Musa mpohilo toe , toe pai ' hilou namohui ' doko ' na ' inca ba napa - i - hawo . Nto ' u toe , na ' epe lolita Pue ' to mpo ' uli ' :

text: Saying , I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abrham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . Then Moses trembled , and durst not behold .
text2: ` Aku ' - mi Alata ' ala to rapue ' ntu ' a - nu . Aku ' - mi Alata ' ala to napue ' Abraham , Ishak pai ' Yakub . ' Mpo ' epe toe , moridi ' - imi Musa nakeni eka ' - na , pai ' uma - ipi daho ' mponaa julumpu to jela ' toe .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Pue ' mpo ' uli ' - ki : ` Roncu sapatu ' - nu , apa ' tana ' to nupokorei tetu - e , tana ' to moroli ' .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Kuhilo mpu ' u - mi kapai ' tuwu ' - ra ntodea - ku to Israel hi Mesir . Ku ' epe - mi pontodohaka - ra . Toe pai ' hompo - ama tumai doko ' mpobahaka - ra . Jadi ' , tumai - ko , kuhubui - ko hilou hi tana ' Mesir , bona mpobahaka - ra to Israel . ' Toe - mi lolita - na Pue ' Alata ' ala hi Musa .

text: This Moses whom they refused , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge ? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush .
text2: " Jadi ' , Musa to rasapuaka to Israel wengi , hi ' a lau - mi to nahubui Alata ' ala hilou mpobahaka - ra . Lomo ' - na rasapuaka - i , ra ' uli ' : ` Hema to mpo ' ongko ' - ko jadi ' pangkeni to mpobotuhi kara - kara - kai ? ' Hiaa ' hi ' a mpu ' u - mi to nakio ' Alata ' ala hante wiwi mala ' eka to mpololitai - i ngkai rala julumpu . Hi ' a mpu ' u - mi to na ' ongko ' Alata ' ala jadi ' pangkeni to mpobahaka - ra .

text: He brought them out , after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt , and in the Red sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
text2: Musa toe - mile to mpakeni - ra malai ngkai tana ' Mesir . Hi ' a - mi to mpobabehi anu mobaraka ' pai ' tanda mekoncehi hi Mesir , hi Tahi ' Molei pai ' hi tana ' to wao ' rala - na opo ' mpulu ' mpae .

text: This is that Moses , which said unto the children of Israel , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear .
text2: Musa toe wo ' o - mi to mpo ' uli ' - raka to Israel owi hewa toi : ` Alata ' ala mpai ' mpo ' ongko ' hadua ngkai ompi ' - ni jadi ' nabi hewa aku ' toi . '

text: This is he , that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina , and with our fathers : who received the lively oracles to give unto us :
text2: Musa toe - mile to mpodoo - ra ntodea to Israel hi tana ' to wao ' - e . Hi ' a - mi to mpo ' epe lolita mala ' eka to mpololitai - i hi lolo Bulu ' Sinai , pai ' - i jadi ' tauntongo ' to mpoparata lolita toe hi ntu ' a - ta owi . Hi ' a to mpotarima ngkai Pue ' Ala lolita to tuwu ' to raparata - taka duu ' tempo toi - e .

text: To whom our fathers would not obey , but thrust him from them , and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt ,
text2: " Aga ntu ' a - ta owi , uma - ra - rana dota mengkoru hi Musa . Rasapuaka - i jadi ' pangkeni - ra . Doko ' nculii ' lau - ramo hilou hi tana ' Mesir .

text: Saying unto Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : for as for this Moses , which brought us out of the land of Egypt , we wot not what is become of him .
text2: Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Harun : ` Babehi - taka pinotau to ma ' ala tapue ' , bona pinotau tetu - damo to mpokeni - ta . Apa ' uma - pi ki ' incai napa to jadi ' hi Musa tetui to mpakeni - ta malai ngkai Mesir . '

text: And they made a calf in those days , and offered sacrifice unto the idol , and rejoiced in the works of their own hands .
text2: Ngkai ree , rababehi mpu ' u - mi lence ana ' japi ngkai bulawa . Rapue ' - mi lence to rababehi tetu , rasumale ' - ki porewua , pai ' mosusa ' - ramo mpo ' une ' babehia pale - ra moto .

text: Then God turned , and gave them up to worship the host of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , O ye house of Israel , have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness ?
text2: Toe pai ' Alata ' ala mpalahii - ra , napelele ' - ra mpopue ' betue ' hi langi ' . Apa ' ria Lolita Pue ' Ala to te ' uki ' hi rala sura nabi - nabi , hewa toi moni - na : ` Ee to Israel ! Bula - ni hi tana ' to wao ' rala - na opo ' mpulu ' mpae , mposumale ' - koi porewua jadi ' pepue ' - ni . Aga bela hi Aku ' pepue ' - ni tetu .

text: Yea , ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch , and the star of your god Remphan , figures which ye made to worship them : and I will carry you away beyond Babylon .
text2: Mepue ' - koi hi pue ' to rahanga ' Molokh , pai ' tomi - na nikeni - keni oa ' dohe - ni . Mepue ' wo ' o - koi hi pinotau to molence betue ' Refan . Lence - lence toe - mi to nibabehi bona nipue ' . Toe pai ' kupelele ' moto - koi mpai ' ratawani , pai ' rakeni hilou duu ' rata hi mali ria ngata Babel . '

text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness , as he had appointed , speaking unto Moses , that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen .
text2: " Bula - ra ntu ' a - ta owi hi tana ' to wao ' , Pue ' Ala mpohubui Musa mpobabehi kemah jadi ' tomi pepuea ' - ra . Kemah toe jadi ' tanda karia - na Alata ' ala hi laintongo ' to Yahudi , pai ' rababehi ntuku ' lence to napopohiloi Pue ' Ala hi Musa . Jadi ' , kemah pepuea ' toe rakeni oa ' ntu ' a - ta owi bula - ra hi tana ' to wao ' .

text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles , whom God drave out before the face of our fathers , unto the days of David ;
text2: Mahaa - hae ngkai ree , mate - ramo ntu ' a - ta hi tana ' to wao ' toe . Pai ' ana ' - ra mpokeni kemah pepuea ' - ra toe mesua ' hi tana ' Kanaan toi . Nto ' u toe , Alata ' ala mpopalai pue ' ngata Kanaan , pai ' Yosua mpakeni - ra to Israel mpema ' ala tana ' to tapo ' ohai ' - mi toi - e . Jadi ' kemah pepuea ' toe , ria - pidi hi laintongo ' to Israel owi , duu ' rata hi tempo - na Magau ' Daud .

text: Who found favour before God , and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob .
text2: Daud tohe ' e mpakagoe ' nono Pue ' Ala . Mekakae - i hi Pue ' Ala , na ' uli ' : ` O Alata ' ala to napue ' Yakub owi , kuperapi ' bona nupiliu - a mpowangu tomi po ' ohaa ' - nu . '

text: But Solomon built him an house .
text2: Aga uma napiliu - i . Ana ' - na - damo mpai ' to rahanga ' Salomo to mpowangu Tomi Alata ' ala .

text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands ; as saith the prophet ,
text2: " Tapi ' kakoo - kono - na , Alata ' ala uma - i - hana mo ' oha ' hi tomi to nababehi manusia ' . Apa ' meliu kabaraka ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea to rapue ' . Ria hadua nabi owi to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi :

text: Heaven is my throne , and earth is my footstool : what house will ye build me ? saith the Lord : or what is the place of my rest ?
text2: Na ' uli ' Pue ' Ala : ` Langi ' pohuraa - ku , pai ' dunia ' pentodua - ku . Ha tomi napa - i mpai ' to doko ' niwangu - kae ? Hiapa mpai ' to natao jadi ' tomi katidaa - kue ?

text: Hath not my hand made all these things ?
text2: Hiaa ' bo Aku ' - di to mpajadi ' hawe ' ea - nae ! ' Wae - mi Lolita Pue ' . "

text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears , ye do always resist the Holy Ghost : as your fathers did , so do ye .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi Stefanus mpo ' uli ' - raka totu ' a to Yahudi : " Uma mowo katu ' a maga - ni ompi ' ! Uma mowo kamengkabatu - ni ! Uma mowo kamengkawongo - ni mpe ' epei Lolita Pue ' Ala ! Bate hibalia hante ntu ' a - ta owi - koi , mposapuaka oa ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted ? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One ; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers :
text2: Uma ria haduaa nabi to uma rabalinai ' ntu ' a - ni owi . Rapatehi - ra suro - suro Alata ' ala owi to mpo ' uli ' karia - na mpai ' Batua Alata ' ala to monoa ' , Hi ' a - mi Yesus . Hiaa ' hewa toe lau , koi ' - mi to mpobalu ' Batua Alata ' ala toei hi bali ' - na . Koi ' to mpopatehi - i !

text: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels , and have not kept it .
text2: Koi ' to mpotarima Atura Pue ' Ala to raparata mala ' eka hi ntu ' a - ta , aga uma nituku ' . "

text: When they heard these things , they were cut to the heart , and they gnashed on him with their teeth .
text2: Kara ' epe - na topohura toera lolita Stefanus , gigi - mi nono - ra , pai ' ngkuku ' maga - ramo .

text: But he , being full of the Holy Ghost , looked up stedfastly into heaven , and saw the glory of God , and Jesus standing on the right hand of God ,
text2: Ngkai ree , Stefanus nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' - i mengoa ' hi langi ' . Nahilo - mi baraka ' - na Alata ' ala , pai ' nahilo wo ' o Yesus mokore hi mali ngka ' ana Alata ' ala .

text: And said , Behold , I see the heavens opened , and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Stefanus : " Hilo - dile ! Kuhilo langi ' mobea pai ' Ana ' Manusia ' mokore hi mali ngka ' ana Alata ' ala ! "

text: Then they cried out with a loud voice , and stopped their ears , and ran upon him with one accord ,
text2: Ngkai ree , topohura agama toera mpo ' ompo tilinga - ra , pai ' - ra mejeu ' mpesukui bona neo ' - pi ra ' epei lolita Stefanus . Karaperapai - nami , rahoko ' - i ,

text: And cast him out of the city , and stoned him : and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man ' s feet , whose name was Saul .
text2: pai ' - i radii ' hilou hi mali ngata bona rapatehi - i rapana ' hante watu . Sabi ' boa ' to mpobalihi Stefanus mporoncu baju - ra bona lompe ' pepana ' - ra . Baju - ra toe rawai ' - ki hadua tomane to rahanga ' Saulus bona nadongo - raka .

text: And they stoned Stephen , calling upon God , and saying , Lord Jesus , receive my spirit .
text2: Bula - na Stefanus rapana ' , mekakae - imi , na ' uli ' : " Pue ' Yesus , doa - mi kao ' - ku ! "

text: And he kneeled down , and cried with a loud voice , Lord , lay not this sin to their charge . And when he had said this , he fell asleep .
text2: Oti toe , mowingkotu ' - i pai ' na ' uli ' napesukui : " Pue ' , neo ' - ra nuhuku ' ngkai jeko ' - ra toi . " Ka ' oti - na mololita hewa toe , mate - imi .

text: And Saul was consenting unto his death . And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem ; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria , except the apostles .
text2: Saulus wo ' o - hawo mpokagoe ' karapatehi - na Stefanus toe .

text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial , and made great lamentation over him .
text2: Tauna to mengkoru hi Alata ' ala mpo ' ala ' woto - na Stefanus , rapotantangii ' hante nono mpu ' u , pai ' - i ratana .

text: As for Saul , he made havock of the church , entering into every house , and haling men and women committed them to prison .
text2: Hiaa ' Saulus - hana , ngasa ' mpu ' u - i mpobalinai ' tauna to mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus . Butu - butu ntomi - na napesua ' , pai ' hema - hema to mepangala ' hi Yesus , lompe ' tomane lompe ' tobine , nahoko ' nadii ' hilou hi mali - na pai ' natonu hi topoparenta bona ratarungku ' .

text: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word .
text2: Jadi ' , topetuku ' Yesus to metibo ' ngkai Yerusalem toera , hiapa kahiloua - ra raparata oa ' Lolita Pue ' .

text: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria , and preached Christ unto them .
text2: Wae wo ' o - hawo Filipus hilou hi ngata hi tana ' Samaria , mpoparata - raka Kareba Lompe ' Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' .

text: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake , hearing and seeing the miracles which he did .
text2: Nababehi wo ' o tanda mekoncehi hi ria . Wae kara ' epe - na to Samaria lolita Filipus toe , pai ' karahilo - na tanda mekoncehi to nababehi , ratarima - mi kareba to nakeni hante nono - ra mpu ' u .

text: For unclean spirits , crying with loud voice , came out of many that were possessed with them : and many taken with palsies , and that were lame , were healed .
text2: Apa ' napopalai seta ngkai wori ' tauna to rapesuai ' , alaa - na me ' au - au - ramo tauna toera pai ' malai mpu ' u - mi seta to mpesuai ' - ra . Pai ' napaka ' uri ' wo ' o wori ' tauna topungku pai ' tokejo .

text: And there was great joy in that city .
text2: Toe pai ' goe ' lia - ramo to Samaria toera mpotarima Filipus .

text: But there was a certain man , called Simon , which beforetime in the same city used sorcery , and bewitched the people of Samaria , giving out that himself was some great one :
text2: Hi rala ngata toe , ria hadua tomane to rahanga ' Simon . Simon toei hadua topobali ' mata . Mahae - imi mpopehuwu pake ' - na to rapokakonce to Samaria . Mpo ' uli ' - i , hi ' a tauna to bohe baraka ' - na .

text: To whom they all gave heed , from the least to the greatest , saying , This man is the great power of God .
text2: Hi hi ' a - damo nono hawe ' ea ihi ' ngata , lompe ' maradika lompe ' ntodea , ra ' uli ' : " Simon toei , ria - ki - hana baraka ' - na ngkai Alata ' ala to rahanga ' Kabaraka ' Bohe . "

text: And to him they had regard , because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries .
text2: Mahae - imi mpakakonce - ra hante pake ' - na , duu ' - na hawe ' ea pue ' ngata toe mpotuku ' - i pai ' mpe ' epei hawa ' - na .

text: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God , and the name of Jesus Christ , they were baptized , both men and women .
text2: Aga karata - na Filipus hi ngata - ra , natudui ' - ra Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' , pai ' natudui ' - ra mepangala ' hi Yesus bona jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . Jadi ' , wori ' - ramo pue ' ngata mepangala ' hi Yesus pai ' mpopeniu ' jadi ' topetuku ' Yesus , lompe ' tomane lompe ' tobine .

text: Then Simon himself believed also : and when he was baptized , he continued with Philip , and wondered , beholding the miracles and signs which were done .
text2: Ngkai ree , Simon wo ' o - hawo mepangala ' , pai ' - i raniu ' . Oti - i raniu ' , metuku ' oa ' - imi hi Filipus , apa ' konce - i mpohilo tanda to mekoncehi pai ' tanda baraka ' to jadi ' .

text: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God , they sent unto them Peter and John :
text2: Suro Pue ' Yesus to hi Yerusalem mpo ' epe napa to jadi ' hi Samaria , apa ' ria to mpo ' uli ' - raka : " To Samaria toera ria , mpotarima Lolita Alata ' ala wo ' o - ramo - rawo . " Toe pai ' mohawa ' - ra mpahawa ' Petrus pai ' Yohanes hilou hi ria .

text: Who , when they were come down , prayed for them , that they might receive the Holy Ghost :
text2: Karata - ra Petrus pai ' Yohanes hi ria , mosampaya - ramo mpekakae - raka to Samaria to mepangala ' - mi hi Pue ' Yesus , bona Pue ' mpowai ' - ra Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: ( For as yet he was fallen upon none of them : only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
text2: Apa ' ko ' ia - ra nakahompoi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Muntu ' raniu ' - ra mpokahangai ' hanga ' Pue ' Yesus .

text: Then laid they their hands on them , and they received the Holy Ghost .
text2: Yohanes pai ' Petrus mosampaya pai ' - ra mpojama to Samaria toera . Jadi ' , mporata mpu ' u - ramo Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles ' hands the Holy Ghost was given , he offered them money ,
text2: Nahilo - hawo Simon , hema - hema to rajama suro Pue ' Yesus toera , mporata mpu ' u - ramo Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Toe pai ' Simon mpokeni doi - na hilou hi Petrus pai ' Yohanes ,

text: Saying , Give me also this power , that on whomsoever I lay hands , he may receive the Holy Ghost .
text2: pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Wai ' - a - kuwo kuasa - ni tetu , bona hema - hema wo ' o - kuwo to kujama , mporata - ra Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . "

text: But Peter said unto him , Thy money perish with thee , because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Harala ratadi - dako hi rala naraka , ntali doi - nu wo ' o ! Ha nu ' uli ' - kona , pewai ' Alata ' ala ma ' ala ra ' oli hante doi ?
