text: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter : for thy heart is not right in the sight of God .
text2: Uma ria huraa - nu mobago dohe - kai , apa ' uma monoa ' nono - nu hi poncilo Alata ' ala .

text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness , and pray God , if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee .
text2: Medea - moko ngkai jeko ' - nu tetu - e , pai ' merapi ' hi Pue ' bona na ' ampungi patuju nono - nu to dada ' a .

text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness , and in the bond of iniquity .
text2: Apa ' ku ' inca mohingi ' lia - ko , pai ' napobatua jeko ' - moko . "

text: Then answered Simon , and said , Pray ye to the Lord for me , that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me .
text2: Na ' uli ' Simon mpo ' uli ' - raka Petrus pai ' Yohanes : " Perapi ' - ka - kuwo hi Pue ' bona neo ' - a mpai ' narumpa ' silaka to ni ' uli ' tetu - e we ' i ! "

text: And they , when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord , returned to Jerusalem , and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans .
text2: Jadi ' , kahudu - rami Petrus pai ' Yohanes mpoparata Lolita Pue ' pai ' mporohoi nono - ra to Samaria , nculii ' - ramo hilou hi Yerusalem . Hi pomakoa ' - ra toe , raparata wo ' o Lolita Pue ' hi rala wori ' ngata hi tana ' Samaria .

text: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip , saying , Arise , and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza , which is desert .
text2: Rala - na hangkani , hadua mala ' eka Pue ' mpololitai Filipus , na ' uli ' : " Hilou - moko tono ' hi selatan , hi ohea to ngkai Yerusalem rata hi Gaza . " ( Ohea tohe ' e uma - pi jau ratara . )

text: Was returning , and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet .
text2: Hilou mpu ' u - imi Filipus . Nto ' u toe , ria wo ' o - hawo hadua to Etiopia to ntara ohea toe nculii ' hilou hi ngata - na . To Etiopia toei , tauna to mopangka ' bohe , to mpokakamu hawe ' ea ihi ' tomi raja bine tana ' Etiopia to rahanga ' Kandake . Ka ' oti - na mepue ' hi Alata ' ala hi Yerusalem , nculii ' - imi hi ngata - na mpohawi ' kereta to nadii ' jara ' . Bula - na mohura hi rala kereta - na , mpobasa - i sura nabi Yesaya .

text: Then the Spirit said unto Philip , Go near , and join thyself to this chariot .
text2: Inoha ' Pue ' Ala mpololitai Filipus , na ' uli ' : " Hilou - ko mpomohui ' kereta toe mai . "

text: And Philip ran thither to him , and heard him read the prophet Esaias , and said , Understandest thou what thou readest ?
text2: Pokeno - nami Filipus hilou mpomohui ' kereta toe . Na ' epe - hawo , tauna toei mpobasa sura nabi Yesaya . Filipus mpekune ' - i , na ' uli ' : " Nu ' inca wa batua - na to nubasa tetu - e ? "

text: And he said , How can I , except some man should guide me ? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him .
text2: Na ' uli ' tau toei : " Beiwa - kona kaku ' inca - na , apa ' uma ria tauna to mponotohi - ka . " Ngkai ree , nabawai Filipus ngkahe ' hi rala kereta - na pai ' mohura hi ncori - na .

text: The place of the scripture which he read was this , He was led as a sheep to the slaughter ; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer , so opened he not his mouth :
text2: Lolita to nabasa hi rala sura nabi Yesaya , hewa toi moni - na : Hi ' a hewa hama ' a bima to radii ' hilou rasumale ' . Hewa ana ' bima to uma mobee ' ane ragunci wulu - na , wae wo ' o uma - i mololita nau ' hamelaa .

text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away : and who shall declare his generation ? for his life is taken from the earth .
text2: Raruge ' - i pai ' rahuku ' , hiaa ' uma ria sala ' - na . Uma ria haduaa tauna to mpotutura karia muli - na apa ' rapatehi - i - hana . "

text: And the eunuch answered Philip , and said , I pray thee , of whom speaketh the prophet this ? of himself , or of some other man ?
text2: Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' - mi to Etiopia toei hi Filipus : " Uli ' - ka ba hema - i to natoa ' nabi toei , ba woto - na moto - di ba tau ntani ' - nadi . "

text: Then Philip opened his mouth , and began at the same scripture , and preached unto him Jesus .
text2: Jadi ' , ntepu ' u ngkai pobasa - na toe we ' i , Filipus mpakanoto - ki Kareba Lompe ' Yesus .

text: And as they went on their way , they came unto a certain water : and the eunuch said , See , here is water ; what doth hinder me to be baptized ?
text2: Bula - ra mokereta toe , mpohilo - ra ue hi wiwi ' ohea . Na ' uli ' to Etiopia toei mpo ' uli ' - ki Filipus : " Hilo , ohe ' e mai ue . Niu ' - ama - kuwo jadi ' topetuku ' Yesus . " ( (

text: And Philip said , If thou believest with all thine heart , thou mayest . And he answered and said , I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God .
text2: Na ' uli ' Filipus : " Ane nupangala ' mpu ' u - imi , ma ' ala moto - ko kuniu ' . " Na ' uli ' to Etiopia toei : " Kupangala ' Yesus Kristus , Hi ' a - mi Ana ' Alata ' ala . " ) )

text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still : and they went down both into the water , both Philip and the eunuch ; and he baptized him .
text2: Ngkai ree , napopento ' o - mi kereta - na , pai ' - ra mehompo hilou hi rala ue , pai ' Filipus mponiu ' - i .

text: And when they were come up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip , that the eunuch saw him no more : and he went on his way rejoicing .
text2: Pencore - ra ngkai rala ue , muu - mule ' Inoha ' Pue ' Ala mpo ' ala ' Filipus ngkai ree , alaa - na to Etiopia toei uma - pi mpohiloi - i ba hiapa - imi . Napokaliliu pomako ' - na hante nono to goe ' .

text: But Philip was found at Azotus : and passing through he preached in all the cities , till he came to Caesarea .
text2: Ane Filipus - hawo , muu - mule ' mehupa ' - imi hi ngata Asdod . Me ' ongko ' - imi hilou hi ngata Kaisarea , pai ' halengko ohea mpoparata - i Kareba Lompe ' hi butu - butu ngata to natara .

text: And Saul , yet breathing out threatenings and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord , went unto the high priest ,
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o , ngasa ' oa ' - imi Saulus mpongasai ' pai ' mpopatehi topetuku ' Pue ' Yesus . Hilou - i hi Imam Bohe ,

text: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues , that if he found any of this way , whether they were men or women , he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem .
text2: pai ' - i mperapi ' sura kuasa nakeni hilou hi pangkeni tomi posampayaa hi ngata Damsyik , bona ane ria - ra narata to mpotuku ' Tudui ' Yesus , nahoko ' pai ' nakeni - ra nculii ' hi Yerusalem , ba tomane ba tobine .

text: And as he journeyed , he came near Damascus : and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven :
text2: Jadi ' , pomako ' - na hilou hi Damsyik tohe ' e , mohu ' - imi hi ngata , muu - mule ' mehini ncorobaa baja ngkai langi ' mpotipuhi - i .

text: And he fell to the earth , and heard a voice saying unto him , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Kamodungka - nami pai ' na ' epe - hawo topololita to mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Saulus ! Saulus ! Napa pai ' nubalinai ' - a ? "

text: And he said , Who art thou , Lord ? And the Lord said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest : it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Na ' uli ' Saulus : " Ha hema - ko Pue ' ? " Na ' uli ' topololita toei : " Aku ' - mile Yesus , to nubalinai ' - e !

text: And he trembling and astonished said , Lord , what wilt thou have me to do ? And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the city , and it shall be told thee what thou must do .
text2: Wae - pi , memata - moko , mesua ' hi rala ngata . Hi ria - damo mpai ' ra ' uli ' - koko napa to kana nubabehi . "

text: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless , hearing a voice , but seeing no man .
text2: Ane doo - doo Saulus toera , uma - rapa tepololita , kuyu - ramo nakeni eka ' - ra . Apa ' ra ' epe moto wo ' o - rawo topololita toe , aga uma rahiloi hema - i to mololita .

text: And Saul arose from the earth ; and when his eyes were opened , he saw no man : but they led him by the hand , and brought him into Damascus .
text2: Ngkai ree , mokore - imi Saulus mpobini ' mata - na , aga uma - ipi pehilo . Jadi ' , ratete ' - i - damo hilou hi rala ngata Damsyik .

text: And he was three days without sight , and neither did eat nor drink .
text2: Tolu eo kahae - na bate uma - i pehilo , pai ' uma wo ' o - i ngkoni ' ba nginu .

text: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus , named Ananias ; and to him said the Lord in a vision , Ananias . And he said , Behold , I am here , Lord .
text2: Hi ngata Damsyik toe , ria hadua topetuku ' Yesus , Ananias hanga ' - na . Nto ' u toe , mopangila - i . Hi rala pangila - na toe , Pue ' Yesus mpokio ' - i , na ' uli ' : " Ananias ! " Na ' uli ' Ananias : " Oi - a Pue ' . "

text: And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the street which is called Straight , and inquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul , of Tarsus : for , behold , he prayeth ,
text2: Na ' uli ' Pue ' : " Me ' ongko ' - moko hilou hi ohea to rahanga ' Ohea Monoa ' , hi tomi - na Yudas . Pekune ' hi pue ' tomi ba ria to Tarsus to rahanga ' Saulus . Saulus toei bula - na mosampaya ,

text: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in , and putting his hand on him , that he might receive his sight .
text2: pai ' hi rala pangila - na nahilo - ko , Ananias . Nahilo - ko hilou mpohirua ' - ki pai ' mpojama - i bona pehilo nculii ' - imi . "

text: Then Ananias answered , Lord , I have heard by many of this man , how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem :
text2: Na ' uli ' Ananias : " Pue ' , wori ' tauna to mpotompo ' wiwi Saulus tetui . Wori ' pebalinai ' - na hi topetuku ' - nu to hi Yerusalem .

text: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name .
text2: Hiaa ' tumai wo ' o - imi hi rehe ' i , hante kuasa ngkai imam pangkeni , bona mpohoko ' hawe ' ea tauna to mekakae hi Iko Pue ' . "

text: But the Lord said unto him , Go thy way : for he is a chosen vessel unto me , to bear my name before the Gentiles , and kings , and the children of Israel :
text2: Na ' uli ' Pue ' mpo ' uli ' - ki Ananias : " Bate hilou - ko ! Apa ' Saulus toei ria , tungkai ' kupelihi jadi ' topobago - ku . Hi ' a mpai ' to mpoparata hanga ' - ku hi to Yahudi pai ' hi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi , duu ' hi magau ' wo ' o .

text: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name ' s sake .
text2: Ku ' uli ' moto - ki mpai ' kaparia to kana natodohaka sabana petuku ' - na hi Aku ' . "

text: And Ananias went his way , and entered into the house ; and putting his hands on him said , Brother Saul , the Lord , even Jesus , that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest , hath sent me , that thou mightest receive thy sight , and be filled with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Jadi ' , hilou mpu ' u - imi Ananias hi tomi to na ' uli ' Pue ' we ' i . Karata - na hi ria , najama - i Saulus , na ' uli ' - ki : " Ompi ' - ku Saulus ! Pue ' Yesus to nuhilo hi lengko ohea katumai - nu toi - e , Hi ' a - mi to mpohubui - a tumai mpokinomo - ko . Nahubui - a tumai bona pehilo nculii ' - moko , pai ' - ko nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . "

text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales : and he received sight forthwith , and arose , and was baptized .
text2: Nto ' u toe , ria to hewa ruke uru molepa ' ngkai mata Saulus , pai ' pehilo mpu ' u - imi . Pokore - nami Saulus , pai ' - i raniu ' jadi ' topetuku ' Pue ' Yesus .

text: And when he had received meat , he was strengthened . Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus .
text2: Oti toe , ngkoni ' - imi pai ' moroho nculii ' - imi .

text: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues , that he is the Son of God .
text2: Bula - na hi Damsyik toe , hilou oa ' - i hi tomi - tomi posampayaa to Yahudi hi Damsyik , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Yesus , Hi ' a - mi Ana ' Alata ' ala . "

text: But all that heard him were amazed , and said ; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem , and came hither for that intent , that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests ?
text2: Konce omea - ra to mpo ' epe lolita - na , ra ' uli ' : " Ha beiwa - mi - koiwo tohe ' i - e ? Apa ' hi ' a toe - mi wengi to mpopatehi tauna to mepue ' hi Yesus hi Yerusalem . Pai ' patuju - na tumai tetu - e , bona mpohoko ' wo ' o - ra to hi rehe ' i pai ' mpokeni - ra hi imam pangkeni hi Yerusalem bona rahuku ' . "

text: But Saul increased the more in strength , and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus , proving that this is very Christ .
text2: Aga kaboo - bohea baraka ' - na Saulus metudui ' , napakanoto Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' . Jadi ' , to Yahudi hi Damsyik , uma - pi rakulei ' mpobaro - i .

text: And after that many days were fulfilled , the Jews took counsel to kill him :
text2: Ba hangkuja kahae - na ngkai ree , mohawa ' - ramo to Yahudi mpopatehi Saulus .

text: But their laying await was known of Saul . And they watched the gates day and night to kill him .
text2: Pohawa ' - ra toe , mpodongo hawe ' ea wobo ' wala ngata , lompe ' hi eo - na lompe ' hi bengi - na , bona ane liu - ipi mpai ' , rapatehi - imi . Ntaa ' na ' inca - di Saulus patuju - ra tohe ' e - e .

text: Then the disciples took him by night , and let him down by the wall in a basket .
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' hawe ' ea wobo ' radongo , Saulus kana mpali ' akala - na bona ma ' ala - i metibo ' ngkai ngata . Toe pai ' rala - na hamengi , ba hangkuja dua ana ' guru - na Saulus mpokeni - i hilou hi wala tana ' to mpotololiki ngata Damsyik , rapopohura - i hi rala karanci , pai ' - i ra ' ulu hi rala karanci toe ngkai lolo wala tana ' hilou hi mali ngata , pai ' kaliliu metibo ' - imi .

text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem , he assayed to join himself to the disciples : but they were all afraid of him , and believed not that he was a disciple .
text2: Nculii ' - imi Saulus hilou hi Yerusalem . Karata - na hi ria , doko ' napobale - miraka topetuku ' Yesus , aga rapoka ' eka ' - i , apa ' ko ' ia rapangalai ' kametuku ' - na mpu ' u - mi hi Yesus .

text: But Barnabas took him , and brought him to the apostles , and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way , and that he had spoken to him , and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus .
text2: Aga Barnabas - hana , hilou - i mpobale - ki Saulus , pai ' napo ' ema ' - imi hilou hi suro Pue ' Yesus . Natutura - raka beiwa Saulus mpohilo Pue ' Yesus hi lengko ohea kahilou - na hi Damsyik , pai ' beiwa Pue ' mpololitai - i . Nalolita wo ' o - raka kabia ' - na Saulus mpokarebai kareba Pue ' Yesus hi Damsyik .

text: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem .
text2: Ngkai ree , hampodooa - ramo Saulus hante topetuku ' Yesus hi Yerusalem , pai ' modao ' - i hobo ' ngata mpoparata kareba Pue ' Yesus hante uma ria kakoroa ' - na .

text: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus , and disputed against the Grecians : but they went about to slay him .
text2: Biasa wo ' o - i momewai ' ngkalolita pai ' momehono ' hante to Yahudi to mobasa Yunani . Toe pai ' to Yahudi toera doko ' mpopatehi - i .

text: Which when the brethren knew , they brought him down to Caesarea , and sent him forth to Tarsus .
text2: Jadi ' , kara ' inca - na ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - na karia - ra to doko ' mpopatehi - i , rabawa - imi hilou hi ngata Kaisarea . Ngkai Kaisarea toe , rapope ' ongko ' - imi hilou hi ngata Tarsus .

text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria , and were edified ; and walking in the fear of the Lord , and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost , were multiplied .
text2: Jadi ' , nto ' u toe uma - pi ria kakoroa ' - ra hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus to hi tana ' Yudea , Galilea pai ' Samaria . Kawoo - woria ' tauna to mepangala ' hi Yesus pai ' kamoroo - rohoa pepangala ' - ra . Apa ' mengkoru mpu ' u - ra hi Pue ' Ala , pai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' moto to mporohoi nono - ra .

text: And it came to pass , as Peter passed throughout all quarters , he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda .
text2: Petrus modao ' mpencuai ' topepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus hiapa - apa . Rala - na ha ' eo , rata - i hi ngata Lida .

text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas , which had kept his bed eight years , and was sick of the palsy .
text2: Hi ngata Lida toe , mpohirua ' - ki hadua tomane , hanga ' - na Eneas . Eneas toei walu mpae - imi pungku , uma - i tepemata ngkai poturua - na .

text: And Peter said unto him , Aeneas , Jesus Christ maketh thee whole : arise , and make thy bed . And he arose immediately .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Eneas , Yesus Kristus mpaka ' uri ' - ko ! Mokore - moko , pai ' lulu - mi ali ' - nu . " Hinto ' u toe mpu ' u , mokore - imi Eneas .

text: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him , and turned to the Lord .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna hi ngata Lida pai ' hi Saron mpohilo kamo ' uri ' - nami , pai ' mepangala ' - ramo hi Pue ' Yesus .

text: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha , which by interpretation is called Dorcas : this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did .
text2: Uma molaa ngkai Lida toe , ria wo ' o ngata to rahanga ' Yope . Hi Yope toe , ria hadua tobine to mepangala ' hi Yesus , Tabita hanga ' - na . Hi rala basa Yunani hanga ' - na Dorkas ( batua - na : ruha ) . Lompe ' po ' ingku - na , pai ' wori ' petulungia - na hi tauna to mpe ' ahii ' .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that she was sick , and died : whom when they had washed , they laid her in an upper chamber .
text2: Nto ' u Petrus hi Lida , peda ' danca Dorkas toei , kaliliu mate . Ka ' oti - na raniu ' , ratu ' u - i hi kamar to hi lolo - na .

text: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa , and the disciples had heard that Peter was there , they sent unto him two men , desiring him that he would not delay to come to them .
text2: Topetuku ' Yesus hi Yope mpo ' epe karia - na Petrus hi Lida , apa ' ngata Yope toe mohu ' - wadi hi Lida . Toe pai ' rahubui rodua tauna hilou hi Petrus , merapi ' bona napesahui tumai hi Yope .

text: Then Peter arose and went with them . When he was come , they brought him into the upper chamber : and all the widows stood by him weeping , and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made , while she was with them .
text2: Metuku ' mpu ' u - imi Petrus hilou dohe - ra . Karata - ra hi Yope , kaliliu rapo ' ema ' - i hilou hi powataa tomate . Hawe ' ea tobine tobalu mpotipuhi Petrus . Geo ' - ra pai ' rapopohiloi - i baju pai ' pohea to nadau - raka Dorkas bula - na tuwu ' - pidi .

text: But Peter put them all forth , and kneeled down , and prayed ; and turning him to the body said , Tabitha , arise . And she opened her eyes : and when she saw Peter , she sat up .
text2: Ngkai ree , Petrus mpohubui - ra omea mpalahii kamar toe , pai ' powilingkudu - nami mosampaya . Ka ' oti - na mosampaya , pai ' - i mponyanyohi tomate , na ' uli ' - ki : " Tabita , memata - moko ! " Hangaa mobini ' mpu ' u - mi mata - na mponaa Petrus , pai ' kaliliu mohura - imi .

text: And he gave her his hand , and lifted her up , and when he had called the saints and widows , presented her alive .
text2: Petrus mpokakamu pale - na pai ' mpo ' ore ' - i duu ' - na mokore . Oti toe , nakio ' nculii ' - ramo topetuku ' Yesus pai ' tobalu to nahubui malai - e we ' i , pai ' na ' uli ' - raka : " Ohe ' i - imi bale - ni , tuwu ' nculii ' - imi . "

text: And it was known throughout all Joppa ; and many believed in the Lord .
text2: Kajadia ' toe rajarita hobo ' hi ngata Yope , alaa - na wori ' tauna mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus .

text: And it came to pass , that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner .
text2: Oti toe , Petrus tida hi Yope ba hangkuja mengi - pidi kahae - na , mo ' oha ' hi tomi hadua topobago rewa kuliba to rahanga ' Simon .

text: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius , a centurion of the band called the Italian band ,
text2: Hi ngata Kaisarea , ria hadua tomane , hanga ' - na Kornelius . Kornelius tohe ' ei , pangka ' - na kapitee to mpohawai ' ha ' atu tantara to Roma hi rala hampo ' emaa ' to rahanga ' " Tantara Italia . "

text: A devout man , and one that feared God with all his house , which gave much alms to the people , and prayed to God alway .
text2: Bela - i to Yahudi , aga mengkoru mpu ' u - i hi Pue ' Ala , pai ' hira ' hantinaa - ra mepue ' hi Alata ' ala . Wori ' doi nawai ' - raka to Yahudi to kabu , pai ' tida - i mosampaya hi Alata ' ala .

text: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him , and saying unto him , Cornelius .
text2: Rala - na ha ' eo , ba jaa tolu libe eo wae , mopangila - i Kornelius . Hi rala pangila - na toe , monoto lia nahilo hadua mala ' eka Pue ' mehupa ' pai ' mpokio ' - i , na ' uli ' : " Kornelius ! "

text: And when he looked on him , he was afraid , and said , What is it , Lord ? And he said unto him , Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God .
text2: Me ' eka ' - i Kornelius mponaa mala ' eka toei . Metompoi ' - i : " Napa - die Pue ' ? " Na ' uli ' mala ' eka toei : " Goe ' - i Alata ' ala mpo ' epe posampaya - nu , pai ' na ' inca kamanara - nu mpotulungi tokabu .

text: And now send men to Joppa , and call for one Simon , whose surname is Peter :
text2: Wae - pi , hubui tauna hilou hi Yope mpali ' hadua tauna to rahanga ' Simon Petrus , pai ' kio ' - i tumai .

text: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner , whose house is by the sea side : he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do .
text2: Po ' ohaa ' - na mohu ' hi wiwi ' tahi ' , hi tomi hadua topobago rewa kuliba , Simon wo ' o hanga ' - na . "

text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed , he called two of his household servants , and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually ;
text2: Kamalai - na mala ' eka to mpololitai - i toe , Kornelius mpokio ' rodua pahawaa ' - na pai ' hadua tantara sarumakaa - na . Tantara sarumakaa - na toe , to mengkoru wo ' o - i - hawo hi Pue ' Ala .

text: And when he had declared all these things unto them , he sent them to Joppa .
text2: Kornelius mpo ' uli ' - raka napa to lako ' nahilo we ' i hi rala pangila - na , pai ' nahubui - ra hilou hi Yope mpopali ' Petrus .

text: On the morrow , as they went on their journey , and drew nigh unto the city , Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour :
text2: Kamepulo - na , bula - ra hi lengko ohea - pidi to rahubui toera , kamohu ' - ra hi Yope , Petrus wo ' o - hawo ngkahe ' hilou hi pengkawinaraa to hi lolo tomi to molempe ata ' - na , hilou mosampaya .

text: And he became very hungry , and would have eaten : but while they made ready , he fell into a trance ,
text2: Neo ' tebua ' - mi eo - na , mo ' oro ' - imi doko ' ngkoni ' . Jadi ' , bula - na mpeka ' au kataha ' koni ' , muu - mule ' ria pangila - na .

text: And saw heaven opened , and a certain vessel descending unto him , as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners , and let down to the earth :
text2: Hi rala pangila - na toe , mpohilo - i langi ' tebea pai ' ria to hewa kumu ' to mowela ' ratoe hi opo ' huno - na pai ' ra ' ulu tumai hi tana ' .

text: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Hi rala kumu ' to ra ' ulu toe , mparanyalaa binata , ria omea : to opo ' witi ' - na , to menyolo , hante danci wo ' o .

text: And there came a voice to him , Rise , Peter ; kill , and eat .
text2: Oti toe , na ' epe Petrus ria to mpololitai - i , na ' uli ' - ki : " Ee Petrus ! Mai - moko , sumale ' - ramo binata toera lau , pai ' nukoni ' . "

text: But Peter said , Not so , Lord ; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Uma - e ' Pue ' ! Ko ' ia ria kukoni ' to rapalii ' ba to ra ' uli ' babo ' ntuku ' ada agama - kai . "

text: And the voice spake unto him again the second time , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Na ' uli ' tena topololita toei mpo ' uli ' - ki Petrus : " Napa to na ' uli ' Alata ' ala lompe ' , neo ' nu ' uli ' iko babo ' . "

text: This was done thrice : and the vessel was received up again into heaven .
text2: Pangila toe tolu ngkani nahilo , pai ' oti toe , te ' ore ' nculii ' - mi kumu ' toe hilou hi langi ' .

text: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean , behold , the men which were sent from Cornelius had made inquiry for Simon ' s house , and stood before the gate ,
text2: Ngkai ree , ingu ' - imi Petrus mpopekiri ba napa batua - na pangila to lako ' nahilo toe . Bula - na mopekiri - pidi , rata - ramo suro Kornelius hi ngata Yope . Mepekune ' - ra hi pue ' ngata kahiapa - na tomi Simon . Ratudo ' - raka tomi to rapali ' pai ' hilou - ramo mokore hi wobo ' wala ,

text: And called , and asked whether Simon , which was surnamed Peter , were lodged there .
text2: pai ' - ra mepekune ' , ra ' uli ' : " Ba ria hi rehe ' i hadua torata to rahanga ' Simon Petrus ? "

text: While Peter thought on the vision , the Spirit said unto him , Behold , three men seek thee .
text2: Bula - na mopekiri - pidi Petrus , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpo ' uli ' - ki hewa toi : " Epe pe ' ! Ria tolu tauna tumai mpali ' - ko .

text: Arise therefore , and get thee down , and go with them , doubting nothing : for I have sent them .
text2: Pesahui mana ' u . Neo ' morara ' nono - nu mpotuku ' - ra , apa ' Aku ' - hana to mpohubui - ra . "

text: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius ; and said , Behold , I am he whom ye seek : what is the cause wherefore ye are come ?
text2: Jadi ' , pana ' u - nami Petrus ngkai tomi pai ' na ' uli ' - raka to lako ' rata toera : " Aku ' - mile to nipali ' - e . Napa - di to nipali ' - kae ? "

text: And they said , Cornelius the centurion , a just man , and one that feareth God , and of good report among all the nation of the Jews , was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house , and to hear words of thee .
text2: Ratompoi ' : " Kai ' tohe ' i , napowiwi Kapitee Kornelius . Hi ' a toe , tauna to monoa ' ingku - na . Mengkoru - i hi Alata ' ala , pai ' - i rabila ' hawe ' ea to Yahudi . Hadua mala ' eka Pue ' mpohubui - i mpokio ' - ko hilou hi tomi - na , bona na ' epe ba napa to nu ' uli ' - ki . "

text: Then called he them in , and lodged them . And on the morrow Peter went away with them , and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him .
text2: Petrus mpo ' uli ' - raka suro Kornelius toera : " Turu rei - tamo ulu hamengi . " Turu mpu ' u - ramo hamengi hi ree . Kamepulo - na , me ' ongko ' mpu ' u - imi Petrus mpotuku ' - ra hilou hi ngata Kaisarea . Pai ' ria wo ' o ba hangkuja dua ompi ' hampepangalaa ' ngkai Yope hilou dohe - ra .

text: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea . And Cornelius waited for them , and had called together his kinsmen and near friends .
text2: Hamengi - ra hi lengko ohea pai ' lako ' rata - rada hi Kaisarea . Karata - ra hi ria , mpolia ' morumpu - ramo Kornelius hante posantina - na mpopea Petrus . Ria wo ' o tongki - na pai ' bale - na to nakio ' morumpu hi tomi - na .

text: And as Peter was coming in , Cornelius met him , and fell down at his feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Jadi ' , karata - na Petrus hi tomi Kornelius , mehompo - imi Kornelius ngkai tomi hilou mpotomu - i . Motingkua ' - i hi nyanyoa Petrus mponyompa - i .

text: But Peter took him up , saying , Stand up ; I myself also am a man .
text2: Aga Petrus mpotagi - i , na ' ore ' - i nculii ' pai ' na ' uli ' - ki : " Neo ' - hawo wae ! Mokore - moko . Aku ' manusia ' wo ' o - a - wadi - kuwo , hewa iko . "

text: And as he talked with him , he went in , and found many that were come together .
text2: Bula - na Petrus mpololitai - i , mesua ' - ramo hi rala tomi . Nahilo - hawo Petrus , wori ' - mi tauna himuhu .

text: And he said unto them , Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company , or come unto one of another nation ; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean .
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Ni ' inca moto - le , ntuku ' atura agama - kai , kai ' to Yahudi uma ma ' ala mposigalo - kokoi tauna to bela - koi to Yahudi ba mesua ' hi rala tomi - ni . Aga Alata ' ala mpakanoto - ka hi rala pangila - ku wengi , ka ' uma - na ria manusia ' to babo ' ntuku ' ada agama ba to rapalii ' mposigalo - raka .

text: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying , as soon as I was sent for : I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me ?
text2: Toe pai ' kanikio ' - ku tumai , uma - a leba ' motance . Jadi ' , hewa toe lau , doko ' ku ' inca ba napa pai ' nikio ' - a tumai . "

text: And Cornelius said , Four days ago I was fasting until this hour ; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house , and , behold , a man stood before me in bright clothing ,
text2: Na ' uli ' Kornelius : " Tolu mengi to liu , ba hewa jaa toe - mi lau , bula - ku mosampaya hi tomi - ku jaa tolu libe eo , ria ncorobaa hadua tomane mokore hi nyanyoa - ku . Pohea - na meringkila ' - damo .

text: And said , Cornelius , thy prayer is heard , and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God .
text2: Na ' uli ' tauna toei mpo ' uli ' - ka : ` Kornelius , Alata ' ala mpo ' epe posampaya - nu pai ' na ' inca kamanara - nu .

text: Send therefore to Joppa , and call hither Simon , whose surname is Peter ; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side : who , when he cometh , shall speak unto thee .
text2: Wae - pi , hubui tauna hilou hi ngata Yope mpokio ' tauna to rahanga ' Simon Petrus . Po ' ohaa ' - na mohu ' hi wiwi ' tahi ' , hi tomi Simon topobago rewa kuliba . '

text: Immediately therefore I sent to thee ; and thou hast well done that thou art come . Now therefore are we all here present before God , to hear all things that are commanded thee of God .
text2: Toe pai ' kupesahui mpotuma tauna tilou mpokio ' - ko . Hiaa ' lompe ' mpu ' u nono - nu , baa ' he ' i - madakoe . Jadi ' hewa toe lau , morumpu - makai hi rehe ' i natiroi Alata ' ala , doko ' mpo ' epe hawe ' ea to nahubui - koko Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' - kakai . "

text: Then Peter opened his mouth , and said , Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons :
text2: Na ' uli ' Petrus : " Wae lau monoto mpu ' u - mi ku ' inca , Alata ' ala uma mpelence tauna .

text: But in every nation he that feareth him , and worketh righteousness , is accepted with him .
text2: Hema - hema to mengkoru hi Hi ' a pai ' to monoa ' kehi - ra , bate natarima - ra , pai ' uma napoposisala ba to ' apa - ra .

text: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel , preaching peace by Jesus Christ : ( he is Lord of all : )
text2: Toi - mi kareba to naparata Alata ' ala hi kai ' to Yahudi , kareba to mpakanoto ohea - na bona posidaia ' Alata ' ala hante manusia ' ma ' ala jadi ' lompe ' nculii ' hante petolo ' - na Yesus Kristus . Yesus toei , Pue ' hawe ' ea manusia ' .

text: That word , I say , ye know , which was published throughout all Judaea , and began from Galilee , after the baptism which John preached ;
text2: Tantu ni ' inca moto - mi kajadia ' to jadi ' hobo ' hi tana ' to Yahudi . Pontepu ' ua - na hi Galilea ka ' oti - na Yohanes mponiu ' tauna to medea ngkai jeko ' - ra .

text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power : who went about doing good , and healing all that were oppressed of the devil ; for God was with him .
text2: Ni ' inca wo ' o tutura Yesus to Nazaret . Alata ' ala mpopelihi - i pai ' mpowai ' - i Inoha ' Tomoroli ' pai ' baraka ' . Hiapa pomakoa ' - na hi tana ' to Yahudi , nababehi to lompe ' , pai ' napaka ' uri ' hawe ' ea tauna to nakuasai Magau ' Anudaa ' , apa ' Alata ' ala mpodohei - i .

text: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews , and in Jerusalem ; whom they slew and hanged on a tree :
text2: Kai ' tohe ' i - mi to mpohilo hawe ' ea to nababehi hi tana ' to Yahudi duu ' rata hi ngata Yerusalem . Ka ' omea - na , rapatehi - i , rapaku ' hi kaju parika ' .

text: Him God raised up the third day , and shewed him openly ;
text2: Aga hi eo katolu - na , Alata ' ala mpotuwu ' - i nculii ' pai ' mpopohiloi - i hi manusia ' .

text: Not to all the people , but unto witnesses chosen before of God , even to us , who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead .
text2: Aga uma hi hawe ' ea tauna , muntu ' hi kai ' to napelihi ami ' - mi Alata ' ala jadi ' sabi ' - na . Ka ' oti - na Yesus tuwu ' nculii ' , nginu pai ' ngkoni ' moto - kai dohe - na .

text: And he commanded us to preach unto the people , and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead .
text2: Nahubui - kai mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi hawe ' ea tauna , pai ' mposabii ' Kahi ' a - na mpu ' u - mi to napelihi Alata ' ala jadi ' Topobotuhi hi hawe ' ea manusia ' , lompe ' to tuwu ' - pidi lompe ' to mate - mi .

text: To him give all the prophets witness , that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins .
text2: Hawe ' ea nabi owi mpotompo ' wiwi - i , ra ' uli ' : hema - hema to mepangala ' hi Yesus , jeko ' - ra ra ' ampungi sabana petolo ' - na . "

text: While Peter yet spake these words , the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word .
text2: Bula - na mololita - pidi Petrus , hompo - mi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpokahompoi hawe ' ea tauna to mpo ' epe lolita - na .

text: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished , as many as came with Peter , because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Konce omea - ramo to Yahudi topepangala ' hi Yesus to mpodohei Petrus ngkai Yope , apa ' tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi mporata Inoha ' Tomoroli ' wo ' o - ramo - rawo .

text: For they heard them speak with tongues , and magnify God . Then answered Peter ,
text2: Monoto - mi kamporata - ra Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , apa ' mololita - ra hante basa to nawai ' - raka Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , mpo ' une ' - une ' Alata ' ala . Ngkai ree , na ' uli ' - mi Petrus :

text: Can any man forbid water , that these should not be baptized , which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we ?
text2: " Hilo pe ' . Tauna toera lau , mporata - ramo Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hibalia hewa to jadi ' hi kita ' . Jadi ' , hema - koi to daho ' mpotagi - ra ? Bate kana raniu ' wo ' o - ramo - rawo jadi ' topetuku ' Yesus ! "

text: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord . Then prayed they him to tarry certain days .
text2: Toe pai ' Petrus mpohubui - ra hira ' Kornelius bona raniu ' mpokahangai ' hanga ' Yesus Kristus . Oti toe , Kornelius pai ' doo - na merapi ' hi Petrus bona mo ' oha ' - i ulu dohe - ra ba hangkuja mengi .

text: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God .
text2: Ngkai ree , suro Pue ' Yesus hante ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' to hi tana ' Yudea mpo ' epe karia - ra to bela - ra to Yahudi mpotarima wo ' o - ramo - rawo Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem , they that were of the circumcision contended with him ,
text2: Toe pai ' karata - na Petrus hi Yerusalem , ba hangkuja dua to Yahudi topepangala ' hi Yesus mposalai ' - i ,

text: Saying , Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised , and didst eat with them .
text2: ra ' uli ' - ki : " Napa pai ' mesua ' - ko - kona hi tomi tauna to babo ' ntuku ' ada agama - ta , pai ' ngkoni ' wo ' o - ko - kona dohe - rae ? "

text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning , and expounded it by order unto them , saying ,
text2: Ngkai ree , Petrus mpotutura - raka hawe ' ea to jadi ' ngkai lomo ' - na , na ' uli ' :

text: I was in the city of Joppa praying : and in a trance I saw a vision , A certain vessel descend , as it had been a great sheet , let down from heaven by four corners ; and it came even to me :
text2: " Bula - ku mosampaya hi ngata Yope , muu - mule ' molinga ' - a pai ' ria pangila - ku . Hi rala pangila - ku toe , kuhilo kumu ' to mowela ' , ratoe hi opo ' huno - na pai ' ra ' ulu tumai ngkai langi ' hompo hi ncori - ku .

text: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes , I considered , and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Kukamata ihi ' - na , kuhilo - kuwo wori ' nyala binata to opo ' witi ' - na , binata to me ' ila , binata to menyolo , pai ' nte danci wo ' o .

text: And I heard a voice saying unto me , Arise , Peter ; slay and eat .
text2: Ngkai ree , ku ' epe to mpololitai - a , na ' uli ' - ka : ` Petrus , mokore - moko , sumale ' - ramo pai ' nukoni ' . '

text: But I said , Not so , Lord : for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth .
text2: " Kutompoi ' : ` Uma - e ' Pue ' ! Ko ' ia ria hangkania kukoni ' binata to rapalii ' ba to babo ' ntuku ' ada agama - kai . '

text: But the voice answered me again from heaven , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: " Ku ' epe tena lolita tohe ' e mpo ' uli ' - ka : ` Napa to na ' uli ' Alata ' ala lompe ' , neo ' nu ' uli ' iko babo ' . '

text: And this was done three times : and all were drawn up again into heaven .
text2: Tohe ' e kuhilo tolu ngkani , pai ' te ' ore ' nculii ' - mi hilou hi langi ' .

text: And , behold , immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was , sent from Caesarea unto me .
text2: " Nto ' u toe wo ' o - hawo , rata - mi tolu tauna hi tomi po ' ohaa ' - ku . To tolu toera , tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi to rahubui ngkai ngata Kaisarea hilou hi Yope mpopali ' - a .

text: And the spirit bade me go with them , nothing doubting . Moreover these six brethren accompanied me , and we entered into the man ' s house :
text2: Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpo ' uli ' - ka : ` Petrus , neo ' morara ' nono - nu mpotuku ' tauna toera . ' Jadi ' , hilou mpu ' u - ama dohe - ra . Pai ' ria moto sabi ' - ku hi rehe ' i , apa ' ompi ' - ta to ono toera mai mpodohei - a hilou hi Kaisarea . Karata - kai hi tomi Kornelius , mesua ' - makai hi rala - na .

text: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house , which stood and said unto him , Send men to Joppa , and call for Simon , whose surname is Peter ;
text2: Kornelius mpotutura - kakai kampohilo - na hadua mala ' eka mehupa ' hi tomi - na to mpo ' uli ' - ki : ` Hubui tauna hilou hi Yope mpopali ' hadua tomane to rahanga ' Simon Petrus bona tumai - i .

text: Who shall tell thee words , whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved .
text2: Hi ' a mpai ' to mpoparata - koko kareba to mpokeni kalompea ' hi iko , duu ' - na hi hawe ' ea tauna ihi ' tomi - nu . '

text: And as I began to speak , the Holy Ghost fell on them , as on us at the beginning .
text2: " Jadi ' , bula - ku mpololitai - ra - pidi , hompo - mi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpokuasai - ra , hibalia hewa to jadi ' hi kita ' to Yahudi lomo ' - na .

text: Then remembered I the word of the Lord , how that he said , John indeed baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ngkai ree , kukiwoi - mi lolita Pue ' to mpo ' uli ' : ` Yohanes meniu ' hante ue , aga koi ' mpai ' raniu ' hante Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . '

text: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us , who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ ; what was I , that I could withstand God ?
text2: Jadi ' , ompi ' - ompi ' , monoto - mi Alata ' ala mpowai ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hi hira ' to bela - ra to Yahudi , hibalia hewa to nawai ' - taka kita ' , sabana pepangala ' - ta hi Pue ' Yesus Kristus . Jadi ' , hema rahi - a aku ' toi - e , pai ' daho ' - a mpolawa ' patuju Alata ' ala ? "

text: When they heard these things , they held their peace , and glorified God , saying , Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life .
text2: Kara ' epe - na toporumpu toera lolita Petrus , rabahakai - mi mposalai ' - i . Mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala lau - ramo , ra ' uli ' : " Ane wae - tano , natarima moto - ra - rawo Alata ' ala tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi , napalogai - ra medea ngkai jeko ' - ra duu ' - na mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice , and Cyprus , and Antioch , preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only .
text2: Jadi ' , ntepu ' u ngkai karapatehi - na Stefanus , topetuku ' Yesus hi Yerusalem rabalinai ' , pai ' wori ' - ramo to metibo ' hilou hi ngata doo , alaa - na pahawu ' - hawu ' - ramo . Ria - ra to rata hi tana ' Fenisia , ria wo ' o - ra to loha hi tana ' Siprus pai ' hi ngata Antiokhia . Hiapa kahilouaa - ra , mpoparata - ra Lolita Pue ' Ala , aga muntu ' hi to Yahudi - wadi .

text: And some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene , which , when they were come to Antioch , spake unto the Grecians , preaching the Lord Jesus .
text2: Jadi ' ngkai ree , ria wo ' o - ra - rawo to mepangala ' hi Yesus to ngkai tana ' Siprus pai ' Kirene . Ngkai hira ' toe , ria to hilou hi ngata Antiokhia mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi , mpo ' uli ' - raka Kayesus - na Pue ' .

text: And the hand of the Lord was with them : and a great number believed , and turned unto the Lord .
text2: Baraka ' Pue ' ria dohe - ra , pai ' alaa - na wori ' - ramo to Antiokhia mepangala ' pai ' mpotonu katuwu ' - ra hi Pue ' .

text: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem : and they sent forth Barnabas , that he should go as far as Antioch .
text2: Jadi ' , topetuku ' Yesus to hi Yerusalem , mpo ' epe wo ' o - ra napa to jadi ' hi Antiokhia toe . Toe pai ' Barnabas rahubui hilou hi Antiokhia .

text: Who , when he came , and had seen the grace of God , was glad , and exhorted them all , that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord .
text2: Karata - na Barnabas hi ria , goe ' lia - mi nono - na , apa ' nahilo kabohe pegane ' Alata ' ala mpogane ' tauna to mepangala ' hi Yesus toera . Jadi ' , Barnabas mporohoi nono - ra pai ' na ' uli ' - raka bona tida - ra mpotuku ' Pue ' Yesus hante nono mpu ' u .

text: For he was a good man , and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith : and much people was added unto the Lord .
text2: Barnabas toei , tauna to lompe ' nono - na . Nakuasai - i Inoha ' Tomoroli ' pai ' moroho pepangala ' - na . Toe pai ' wori ' tena to Antiokhia mepangala ' hi Pue ' .

text: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus , for to seek Saul :
text2: Oti toe , hilou - imi Barnabas hi ngata Tarsus mpopali ' Saulus .

text: And when he had found him , he brought him unto Antioch . And it came to pass , that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church , and taught much people . And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch .
text2: Wae kanarua ' - na , napo ' ema ' - imi hilou hi Antiokhia . Barnabas pai ' Saulus , tida - ra hi Antiokhia hampae kahae - na , morumpu ncuu - ra hante topepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus to hi ria , pai ' - ra mpotudui ' wori ' tauna . Hi Antiokhia toe - mi lomo ' - na topetuku ' Yesus rahanga ' to Kristen .

text: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch .
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o , ba hangkuja dua to Kristen ngkai Yerusalem rata hi Antiokhia . To Kristen toera , paka ' nabi apa ' ria pakulea ' - ra mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala .

text: And there stood up one of them named Agabus , and signified by the spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world : which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar .
text2: Hadua ngkai tauna toera , hanga ' - na Agabus . Mokore - i pai ' hante petete ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' nalowa ami ' - mi karia - na mpai ' oro ' bohe hi humalili ' Kamagaua ' Roma . ( Oro ' toe madupa ' mpu ' u - mi nto ' u poparenta - na Magau ' Klaudius hi Roma . )

text: Then the disciples , every man according to his ability , determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea :
text2: Mpo ' epe toe , mohawa ' - ramo topetuku ' Yesus hi Antiokhia doko ' mpotulungi ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ra to hi tana ' Yudea . Jadi ' , butu - butu dua - ra mpowai ' doi ntuku ' pakulea ' - ra ,

text: Which also they did , and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul .
text2: pai ' doi tohe ' e rarumpu . Oti toe , Barnabas pai ' Saulus rasarumaka mpokeni doi toe hilou hi pangkeni topetuku ' Yesus hi Yerusalem .

text: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church .
text2: Nto ' u toe wo ' o , Magau ' Herodes Agripa ntepu ' u mpobalinai ' ba hangkuja dua topepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus .

text: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword .
text2: Ngkai hawa ' - na toe , Yakobus ompi ' - na Yohanes rasumale ' .

text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews , he proceeded further to take Peter also . ( Then were the days of unleavened bread . )
text2: Kanahilo - na Herodes to Yahudi mpokono babehia - na toe , natampai tena : nahubui tauna mpohoko ' Petrus . Tohe ' e jadi ' nto ' u eo bohe to Yahudi to rahanga ' Posusa ' Roti to Uma Raragii .

text: And when he had apprehended him , he put him in prison , and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him ; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people .
text2: Rahoko ' mpu ' u - imi Petrus , pai ' - i ratarungku ' . Opo ' ntuda tantara rapahawa ' mpodongo - i , butu ntuda , opo ' - ra hampo ' emaa ' . Patuju - na Herodes , bona ane timpaliu - damo posusa ' Paskah , rapohurai kara - kara - na Petrus hi mata ntodea pai ' - i rahuku ' mate .

text: Peter therefore was kept in prison : but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him .
text2: Jadi ' , Petrus rapotuhu hi rala tarungku ' , aga topepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus tida mosampaya hi Alata ' ala , mposampayai - i .

text: And when Herod would have brought him forth , the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers , bound with two chains : and the keepers before the door kept the prison .
text2: Rala - na hamengi , turu - imi Petrus hi olo ' rodua tantara , pai ' rahoo ' ntimalia pale - na hante rante . Ria wo ' o tantara to mpodongo wobo ' tarungku ' . Patuju - na Herodes , bona mepulo mpai ' rapohurai kara - kara - na hi mata ntodea .

text: And , behold , the angel of the Lord came upon him , and a light shined in the prison : and he smote Peter on the side , and raised him up , saying , Arise up quickly . And his chains fell off from his hands .
text2: Ntaa ' we ' i , hi bengi toe muu - mule ' mehupa ' - mi mala ' eka Pue ' hi rala tarungku ' , mokore hi ncori Petrus , pai ' ria to mehini hi rala tarungku ' toe . Mala ' eka toei mpolengo - lengo Petrus mpolike - i , na ' uli ' - ki : " Ee , pesahui memata ! " Nto ' u toe , hangaa mobongka moto - mi rante pohoo ' pale - na Petrus .

text: And the angel said unto him , Gird thyself , and bind on thy sandals . And so he did . And he saith unto him , Cast thy garment about thee , and follow me .
text2: Na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi mala ' eka toei mpo ' uli ' - ki : " Ala ' - mi pohea - nu , pai ' unco ' - mi sapatu ' - nu ! " Natuku ' mpu ' u - mi Petrus hawa ' - na . Oti toe , na ' uli ' wo ' o - mi mala ' eka : " Mobajui - moko , pai ' tuku ' - ama . "

text: And he went out , and followed him ; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel ; but thought he saw a vision .
text2: Metuku ' mpu ' u - imi Petrus . Aga ko ' ia monoto mpu ' u hi rala nono - na napa to nababehi mala ' eka toei . Na ' uli ' mpohilo pangila - i - wadi .

text: When they were past the first and the second ward , they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city ; which opened to them of his own accord : and they went out , and passed on through one street ; and forthwith the angel departed from him .
text2: Jadi ' , mako ' - ramo hilou mpoliu tantara to mpodongo wobo ' to lomo ' - na pai ' tantara to mpodongo wobo ' karomeha ' - na , pai ' rata - ramo hi wobo ' ahe ' ohea hilou hi ngata . Wobo ' ahe ' toe mobea moto - imi - hawo . Kaliliu - ramo mpotara wobo ' toe hilou hi rala ngata . Ko ' ia - ra mahae momako ' , moronto ncorobaa - imi mala ' eka mpalahii Petrus .

text: And when Peter was come to himself , he said , Now I know of a surety , that the Lord hath sent his angel , and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod , and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews .
text2: Lako ' toe - di monoto - mi hi Petrus , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Makono mpu ' u - mi - tano ! Pue ' mpohubui mala ' eka - na tumai mpobahaka - a ngkai pale Herodes pai ' ngkai hawe ' ea to doko ' rababehi to Yahudi hi aku ' - e . "

text: And when he had considered the thing , he came to the house of Mary the mother of John , whose surname was Mark ; where many were gathered together praying .
text2: Ka ' oti - na mokanono hewa toe , hilou - imi hi tomi Maria , tina - na Yohanes Markus . Hi tomi toe , wori ' tauna morumpu mosampaya .

text: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate , a damsel came to hearken , named Rhoda .
text2: Jadi ' , Petrus mpokado ' wobo ' hi mali tomi toe . Hadua tobine topobago hi tomi toe , hanga ' - na Rode , tumai ke mpobea wobo ' .

text: And when she knew Peter ' s voice , she opened not the gate for gladness , but ran in , and told how Peter stood before the gate .
text2: Na ' epe - hawo libu ' Petrus - di to hi mali wobo ' - e . Nakeni kagoe ' - na , uma - idi kaliliu mpobea wobo ' , lala ' lau - idi nculii ' hilou hi rala tomi mpo ' uli ' - raka doo - na : " Petrus - hanale to hi wobo ' toe - e ria ! "

text: And they said unto her , Thou art mad . But she constantly affirmed that it was even so . Then said they , It is his angel .
text2: Ra ' uli ' - ki : " Wuli - ko ! " Aga najojo lau - mi mpo ' uli ' kahi ' a - na mpu ' u - mi . Toe pai ' ra ' uli ' - ki : " Bela - le Petrus tetu - e . Mala ' eka - na tetu - e . "

text: But Peter continued knocking : and when they had opened the door , and saw him , they were astonished .
text2: Jadi ' , lingku ' - na Rode hilou hi rala tomi , Petrus ntora mpokado ' wobo ' . Rabea mpu ' u - mi wobo ' , rahilo mpu ' u - rawo , etu - imi Petrus . Konce lia - ra .

text: But he , beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace , declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison . And he said , Go shew these things unto James , and to the brethren . And he departed , and went into another place .
text2: Ngkai ree , Petrus mpohuka ' - raka bona mengkalino - ra , pai ' nalolita - raka beiwa Pue ' mpokeni - i malai ngkai rala tarungku ' . Pai ' na ' uli ' wo ' o - raka : " Napa to jadi ' tohe ' i , uli ' - ki Yakobus pai ' hi ompi ' - ompi ' ntani ' - na . " Oti toe , malai - imi Petrus hilou hi po ' ohaa ' ntani ' - na .

text: Now as soon as it was day , there was no small stir among the soldiers , what was become of Peter .
text2: Kamepulo - na mpu ' u - mi , sese ' - ramo tantara topojaga . Ingu ' - ra ba napa to jadi ' hi Petrus .

text: And when Herod had sought for him , and found him not , he examined the keepers , and commanded that they should be put to death . And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea , and there abode .
text2: Herodes mpohubui tauna mpopali ' Petrus , aga uma - i raruai ' . Toe pai ' Herodes mpehubui bona tantara to mpodongo Petrus toe - e ngone raparesa ' pai ' rapatehi . Oti toe Herodes malai ngkai tana ' Yudea hilou mo ' oha ' hi ngata Kaisarea .

text: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon : but they came with one accord to him , and , having made Blastus the king ' s chamberlain their friend , desired peace ; because their country was nourished by the king ' s country .
text2: Hangkani tempo , moroe lia - i Magau ' Herodes mpokaroe pue ' ngata Tirus pai ' Sidon . Toe pai ' mohawa ' - ramo to Tirus pai ' to Sidon hante hanono lau mposuro tauna hilou hi ngata Kaisarea doko ' mpali ' kahintuwuaa ' hante magau ' . Apa ' to Tirus pai ' to Sidon toera mporata pongkoni ' - ra ngkai tana ' to naparentai Herodes . Lomo ' - na , kako ' ia - ra mponyanyo magau ' , ra ' oluhi hadua pahawaa ' - na to mpo ' urusi tomi magau ' , hanga ' - na Blastus , bona tono ' hi hira ' - i , pai ' lako ' hilou - ra mponyanyo magau ' mpali ' kahintuwuaa ' .

text: And upon a set day Herod , arrayed in royal apparel , sat upon his throne , and made an oration unto them .
text2: Jadi ' , hi eo to rapakatantu , Herodes mpo ' unco ' pohea kamagaua ' - na pai ' mohura hi pohuraa kamagaua ' - na , pai ' - i mololita hi ntodea .

text: And the people gave a shout , saying , It is the voice of a god , and not of a man .
text2: Mogora - ramo ntodea mpo ' une ' Herodes , ra ' uli ' : " Tohe ' i - e bela - pi lolita manusia ' . Hewa pololita tauna to mobaraka ' to ngkai langi ' ! "

text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him , because he gave not God the glory : and he was eaten of worms , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Hinto ' u toe , mala ' eka Pue ' mpohuku ' ncorobaa Herodes hante haki ' , apa ' molangko rahi nono - na , pai ' uma - i dota mpobila ' Alata ' ala . Bula - na tuwu ' - pidi , ulea ami ' - imi , alaa - na napomate - ki .

text: But the word of God grew and multiplied .
text2: Jadi ' kahaa - haea kawoo - woria ' tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Pue ' , pai ' kawoo - woria ' - mi to mepangala ' hi Yesus .

text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem , when they had fulfilled their ministry , and took with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Ane Barnabas pai ' Saulus , kahudu - na bago - ra hi Yerusalem , nculii ' - ramo hilou hi Antiokhia , pai ' mpokeni wo ' o - ra Yohanes Markus dohe - ra .

text: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers ; as Barnabas , and Simeon that was called Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaen , which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch , and Saul .
text2: Hi olo ' topetuku ' Yesus to hi Antiokhia , ria ba hangkuja dua nabi pai ' guru to mpokeni Lolita Pue ' , hanga ' - ra : Barnabas ; Simeon to ra ' atu Nto ' eta ; Lukius to ngkai ngata Kirene ; Menahem to rapokakama dohe Magau ' Herodes Antipas ; pai ' Saulus .

text: As they ministered to the Lord , and fasted , the Holy Ghost said , Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them .
text2: Hangkani , bula - ra mepue ' hi Pue ' Ala pai ' mopuasa ' , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpololitai - ra hewa tohe ' i : " Barnabas pai ' Saulus toe , kupelihi - ra jadi ' topobago - ku . Jadi ' , patani ' - ramo , bona hilou - ra mpobabehi bago to kupopokoloi - raka . "

text: And when they had fasted and prayed , and laid their hands on them , they sent them away .
text2: Jadi ' , ka ' oti - ra mopuasa ' pai ' mosampaya , rajama - ramo Barnabas pai ' Saulus , pai ' raposampayai . Oti toe , rapope ' ongko ' mpu ' u - ramo hilou mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' .

text: So they , being sent forth by the Holy Ghost , departed unto Seleucia ; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus .
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpahawa ' - ra mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' , mako ' - ramo hilou hi ngata Seleukia to hi wiwi ' tahi ' . Ngkai ree , mpohawi ' kapal - ramo hilou hi lewuto ' Siprus .

text: And when they were at Salamis , they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews : and they had also John to their minister .
text2: Karata - ra hi ree hi ngata Salamis , raparata - mi Lolita Alata ' ala hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi . Yohanes Markus mpongawa ' - ra hi rala bago - ra toe .

text: But Elymas the sorcerer ( for so is his name by interpretation ) withstood them , seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith .
text2: Modao ' - ra hobo ' hi lewuto ' toe , duu ' - ra rata hi ngata Pafos . Hi ria - ra mpohirua ' - ki hadua to Yahudi , hanga ' - na Baryesus . Hi rala basa Yunani hanga ' - na Elimas . Elimas toei , hadua topobali ' mata to wori ' inca - na , pai ' na ' uli ' wo ' o kahi ' a - na nabi Alata ' ala . Hi ' a toei bale - na gubernur to hi lewuto ' toe , Sergius Paulus hanga ' - na . Gubernur toei , tauna to pante . Nakio ' - ra Barnabas pai ' Saulus tumai mpohirua ' - ki , apa ' doko ' na ' epe - hawo Lolita Alata ' ala . Aga Elimas topobali ' mata toei , mpobaro lolita - ra , apa ' doko ' nalawa ' bona neo ' mpai ' gubernur mepangala ' hi Yesus .

text: Then Saul , ( who also is called Paul , ) filled with the Holy Ghost , set his eyes on him ,
text2: Tapi ' Saulus - - to rahanga ' wo ' o Paulus - - nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' - i . Mpomonaa - i Elimas , na ' uli ' - ki :

text: And said , O full of all subtilty and all mischief , thou child of the devil , thou enemy of all righteousness , wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord ?
text2: " Ee topebagiu ngkaraka ' ! Iko bali ' hawe ' ea to monoa ' ! Hewa Magau ' Anudaa ' - hana kehi - nu tetu - e ! Napa pai ' uma nubahakai oa ' mpohala ' weo tudui ' Pue ' to monoa ' ?

text: And now , behold , the hand of the Lord is upon thee , and thou shalt be blind , not seeing the sun for a season . And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness ; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand .
text2: Wae lau , hilo pe ' ! Pue ' mpohuku ' - ko ! Ngkai wae lau wero - ko , uma - poko pehilo ba hangkuja eo kahae - na ! " Hinto ' u toe , Elimas mporasai ria to mo ' eta hewa rangahu mpoleru mata - na , alaa - na mogao ' - gao ' - i - damo mpopali ' tauna mpotete ' - i .

text: Then the deputy , when he saw what was done , believed , being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord .
text2: Kanahilo - na Gubernur napa to jadi ' tohe ' e , mepangala ' - imi hi Pue ' Yesus , apa ' konce - i mpo ' epe tudui ' Pue ' .

text: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos , they came to Perga in Pamphylia : and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem .
text2: Ngkai Pafos , Paulus pai ' doo - na mpohawi ' kapal hilou hi ngata Perga hi tana ' Pamfilia . Hi ngata toe , Yohanes Markus mpalahii - ra pai ' nculii ' hilou hi Yerusalem .

text: But when they departed from Perga , they came to Antioch in Pisidia , and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and sat down .
text2: Ngkai Perga , rapokaliliu pomako ' - ra rata hi ngata Antiokhia hi tana ' Pisidia . Hi Eo Sabat ( eo pepuea ' - ra to Yahudi ) , hilou - ramo mohura hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi .

text: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them , saying , Ye men and brethren , if ye have any word of exhortation for the people , say on .
text2: Hi porumpua toe , ria to mpobasa Atura Musa pai ' sura nabi - nabi . Oti toe , pangkeni tomi posampayaa toe mpohubui tauna hilou mepekune ' hi Paulus pai ' Barnabas , ra ' uli ' - raka : " Ompi ' , ane ria lolita - ni doko ' mpotudui ' - kai , hewa toe lau kipalogai - koi mololita . "

text: Then Paul stood up , and beckoning with his hand said , Men of Israel , and ye that fear God , give audience .
text2: Kamokore - nami Paulus , mohuka ' bona molino - ra , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Ompi ' - ompi ' - ku to Israel , pai ' koi ' wo ' o to bela - koi to Israel aga to mepue ' - mokoi hi Alata ' ala : Epe - ka - kuwo lolita - ku .

text: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers , and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt , and with an high arm brought he them out of it .
text2: Alata ' ala to tapue ' kita ' to Israel mpopelihi - mi ntu ' a - ta owi , pai ' napopomuli - ra alaa - na wori ' lia - ramo bula - ra mesowo ' hi tana ' Mesir . Ngkai ree , napopohiloi - ra kuasa - na to bohe nto ' u kanatete ' - ra malai ngkai Mesir .

text: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness .
text2: Oti toe , opo ' mpulu ' mpae kahae - na , napengkatarii mpohilo pesapuaka - ra bula - ra hi tana ' to wao ' .

text: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan , he divided their land to them by lot .
text2: Pitu magau ' hante ntodea - ra hi tana ' Kanaan nadagi bona tana ' - ra nabagi - bagi - raka to Israel bona hira ' - mi pue ' - na .

text: And after that he gave unto them judges about the space of four hundred and fifty years , until Samuel the prophet .
text2: Kajadia ' hawe ' ea tohe ' i we ' i , kira - kira opo ' atu lima mpulu ' mpae kahae - na . " Oti toe , Pue ' Ala mpowai ' - ra tadulako - tadulako to jadi ' pangkeni - ra , duu ' rata hi nabi Samuel .

text: And afterward they desired a king : and God gave unto them Saul the son of Cis , a man of the tribe of Benjamin , by the space of forty years .
text2: Nto ' u toe , merapi ' - ra bona Pue ' Ala mpowai ' - ra magau ' . Jadi ' , Alata ' ala mpowai ' - ra magau ' , Saul hanga ' - na , ana ' - na Kis muli Benyamin . Saul toe - mi to jadi ' magau ' to Israel opo ' mpulu ' mpae kahae - na .

text: And when he had removed him , he raised up unto them David to be their king ; to whom also he gave testimony , and said , I have found David the son of Jesse , a man after mine own heart , which shall fulfil all my will .
text2: Aga ka ' omea - na Pue ' Ala mpopohu - i ngkai huraa - na , pai ' - i mpo ' ongko ' Daud jadi ' magau ' to Israel . Toi - mi to na ' uli ' Alata ' ala mpotompo ' wiwi Daud : ` Daud ana ' Isai toei , tauna to mpokagoe ' nono - ku pai ' to mpobabehi konoa - ku . '

text: Of this man ' s seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour , Jesus :
text2: " Ompi ' - ompi ' , ngkai muli Daud toe - mi , Alata ' ala mpo ' ongko ' - taka kita ' to Israel hadua Magau ' Tompohore - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta , ntuku ' pojanci - na owi . Magau ' toei , Yesus hanga ' - na .

text: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel .
text2: Kako ' ia - na Yesus mpotepu ' u bago - na , Yohanes Topeniu ' mpo ' uli ' - raka hawe ' ea to Israel bona medea - ra ngkai jeko ' - ra pai ' - ra raniu ' .

text: And as John fulfilled his course , he said , Whom think ye that I am ? I am not he . But , behold , there cometh one after me , whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose .
text2: Neo ' hudu - mi pobago - na Yohanes , na ' uli ' - raka ntodea : ` Ntuku ' pomporataa - ni , hema - a aku ' toi - e ? Bela - kuwo aku ' Magau ' to nipopea . Rata moto - i mpai ' ane oti - pi bago - ku . Bangku ' jadi ' pahawaa ' - na to mpobongka koloro sapatu ' - na , uma - a - kuwo natao . '

text: Men and brethren , children of the stock of Abraham , and whosoever among you feareth God , to you is the word of this salvation sent .
text2: " Ompi ' - ompi ' - ku muli Abraham , pai ' koi ' wo ' o to bela - koi to Yahudi aga to mepue ' - mi hi Alata ' ala : Hi kita ' toi - mi raparata kareba toe , to mpo ' uli ' ohea bona tebahaka - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta .

text: For they that dwell at Jerusalem , and their rulers , because they knew him not , nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day , they have fulfilled them in condemning him .
text2: Ompi ' - ta to mo ' oha ' hi Yerusalem hante pangkeni - ra , uma ra ' incai Kayesus - na Magau ' Topetolo ' toei . Uma ra ' incai batua - na lolita nabi to rabasa butu Eo Sabat . Toe pai ' rahuku ' mate - i - hana Yesus . Ntaa ' hante babehia - ra tohe ' e , te ' ihii ' lau - mi to ralowa nabi owi .

text: And though they found no cause of death in him , yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain .
text2: Nau ' uma raratai to toto - na rahuku ' mate - ki , aga raperapi ' oa ' hi Pilatus bona rapatehi - i .

text: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him , they took him down from the tree , and laid him in a sepulchre .
text2: Hudu - mi rababehi hawe ' ea to te ' uki ' owi to mpolowa - i , rapopana ' u woto - na ngkai kaju parika ' - na pai ' - i ratana .

text: But God raised him from the dead :
text2: Aga Alata ' ala mpotuwu ' - i nculii ' .

text: And he was seen many days of them which came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem , who are his witnesses unto the people .
text2: Oti toe , wori ' mengi - i - pidi mpopehuwu woto - na hi tauna to mpotuku ' - i ngkai Galilea hilou hi Yerusalem . Hira ' toe - mi to jadi ' sabi ' - na hi kita ' to Yahudi , Kahi ' a - na mpu ' u - mi Magau ' Topetolo ' .

text: God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children , in that he hath raised up Jesus again ; as it is also written in the second psalm , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee .
text2: " Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , hewa toe lau , kai ' - mi to mparata - kokoi Kareba Lompe ' tohe ' i . Napa to najanci Alata ' ala owi hi ntu ' a - ta , napadupa ' hi kita ' muli - ra tempo toi - e hi kanapotuwu ' - na nculii ' Yesus ngkai kamatea . Hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Rona ' Daud karomeha ' - na : ` Iko - mi Ana ' - ku . Eo toe lau kupo ' Ana ' - moko . '

text: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead , now no more to return to corruption , he said on this wise , I will give you the sure mercies of David .
text2: Yesus tohe ' e , napotuwu ' mpu ' u - imi Alata ' ala , pai ' bate uma - ipi mate nculii ' ba jadi ' pope hi rala daeo ' . Toe - mile batua lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi - e : ` Napa to kujanci - ki Magau ' Daud owi , bate moroli ' pai ' monoa ' kadupa ' - na . Napa to kujanci toe , bate kupadupa ' hi koi ' . '

text: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm , Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: " Toe wo ' o - mi batua lolita Daud hi rala posampaya - na , na ' uli ' hewa toi : ` Woto - ku uma nupelele ' hi rala daeo ' duu ' - na pope , apa ' Aku ' batua - nu to nupelihi . '

text: For David , after he had served his own generation by the will of God , fell on sleep , and was laid unto his fathers , and saw corruption :
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , bela woto - na Daud moto to natoa ' lolita toe we ' i . Apa ' Daud mpobabehi hawe ' ea to nahubui - ki Alata ' ala , pai ' kahudu tuwu ' - na hi dunia ' toi , mate - imi . Woto - na ratana hi ncori daeo ' ntu ' a - na pai ' bate jadi ' pope - mi .

text: But he , whom God raised again , saw no corruption .
text2: Aga Yesus , to napotuwu ' nculii ' Alata ' ala - e , uma - i - hana jadi ' pope hi rala daeo ' .

text: Be it known unto you therefore , men and brethren , that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Jadi ' , ompi ' - ompi ' , toe pai ' kuparata - kokoi kareba toi : hante napa to jadi ' hi Yesus toe , jeko ' - ni ma ' ala ra ' ampungi .

text: And by him all that believe are justified from all things , from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses .
text2: Uma - ta bisa tebahaka ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta hi kampotuku ' - ta Atura Musa . Aga hema - hema to mepangala ' hi Yesus , tebahaka mpu ' u - ra ngkai hawe ' ea jeko ' - ra , duu ' - na jadi ' monoa ' mpu ' u - ramo hi poncilo Alata ' ala .

text: Beware therefore , lest that come upon you , which is spoken of in the prophets ;
text2: " Aga kana tapelompehi , bona neo ' mpai ' jadi ' hi kita ' hewa to na ' uli ' Alata ' ala hante wiwi nabi owi . Na ' uli ' :

text: Behold , ye despisers , and wonder , and perish : for I work a work in your days , a work which ye shall in no wise believe , though a man declare it unto you .
text2: ` Pelompehi - e ' , koi ' to meruge ' . Konce - koi mpai ' mpohilo babehia - ku , ka ' omea - na rahuku ' mate - koi . Apa ' tempo toi kubabehi anu to mobaraka ' lia . Hiaa ' oja ' - ko - koina mpopangala ' , nau ' ria to mponotohi - kokoi . ' "

text: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue , the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath .
text2: Kamalai - ra Paulus pai ' Barnabas ngkai tomi posampayaa toe , tauna to morumpu hi ree mpo ' uli ' - raka : " Kiperapi ' bona Eo Sabat to rata , tumai wo ' o - koi mpai ' mpakanoto tena - kakai tudui ' toe - e we ' i . "

text: Now when the congregation was broken up , many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas : who , speaking to them , persuaded them to continue in the grace of God .
text2: Oti toe , pagaa ' - gaa ' - ramo ngkai tomi posampayaa toe . Wori ' to Yahudi mpotuku ' Paulus pai ' Barnabas . Pai ' wori ' wo ' o tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi aga to mesua ' - mi hi agama Yahudi , metuku ' wo ' o - ra - rawo mpotuku ' Paulus pai ' Barnabas . Suro Pue ' Yesus toera mpo ' apui nono - ra bona tida - ra mepangala ' hi Alata ' ala to mpowai ' - ta kalompea ' ngkai kabula rala - na .

text: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God .
text2: Jadi ' , mingku boko ' hi Eo Sabat wo ' o - mi , neo ' hawe ' ea pue ' ngata morumpu doko ' mpo ' epe Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: But when the Jews saw the multitudes , they were filled with envy , and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul , contradicting and blaspheming .
text2: Tapi ' karahilo - na to Yahudi kawori ' tauna to morumpu , mohingi ' - ramo . Toe pai ' raruge ' - i Paulus pai ' rabaro hawe ' ea to na ' uli ' .

text: Then Paul and Barnabas waxed bold , and said , It was necessary that the word of God should first have been spoken to you : but seeing ye put it from you , and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life , lo , we turn to the Gentiles .
text2: Tapi ' hangkedi ' kabia ' - ra Paulus pai ' Barnabas mololita . Ra ' uli ' mpo ' uli ' - raka to Yahudi : " Taoa - na , Lolita Alata ' ala kana raparata mperi ' ulu hi koi ' to Yahudi . Tapi ' , bo uma - ko - koina dota ntarima , koi ' moto - mi - koiwo to mpakanoa ' ka ' uma - nakoi natao mporata katuwua ' to duu ' kahae - hae - na . Wae - pi , kipalahii - mokoi , hilou mpokeni Lolita Alata ' ala hi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi !

text: For so hath the Lord commanded us , saying , I have set thee to be a light of the Gentiles , that thou shouldest be for salvation unto the ends of the earth .
text2: Apa ' toi - mi hawa ' Pue ' Ala hi kai ' . Na ' uli ' : ` Kupelihi - moko jadi ' baja to mpobajahi nono tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi , bona Iko mpoparata kalompea ' hi tauna humalili ' dunia ' . ' "

text: And when the Gentiles heard this , they were glad , and glorified the word of the Lord : and as many as were ordained to eternal life believed .
text2: Kara ' epe - na - rawo tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi lolita toe , goe ' - ramo , pai ' - ra mpo ' une ' Lolita Pue ' . Pai ' hema - hema to napelihi ami ' - mi Alata ' ala bona mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na , mepangala ' - ramo hi Pue ' Yesus .

text: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region .
text2: Jadi ' , Lolita Pue ' molele hobo ' hi tana ' toe .

text: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women , and the chief men of the city , and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas , and expelled them out of their coasts .
text2: Tapi ' to Yahudi mpo ' ukei ' totu ' a - totu ' a ngata pai ' tobine - tobine to mo ' ua ' to mengkoru hi Alata ' ala , alaa - na Paulus pai ' Barnabas rabalinai ' pai ' rapopalai ngkai ngata Antiokhia .

text: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them , and came unto Iconium .
text2: Toe pai ' Paulus hante Barnabas mpotonta awu to hi witi ' - ra , tanda kabela - napi - rawo hira ' to mpotangku ane Alata ' ala mpohuku ' pue ' ngata toe . Oti toe hilou - ramo hi ngata Ikonium .

text: And the disciples were filled with joy , and with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Topetuku ' Pue ' Yesus hi Antiokhia , nakuasai - ramo Inoha ' Tomoroli ' pai ' goe ' lia nono - ra .

text: And it came to pass in Iconium , that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews , and so spake , that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed .
text2: Napa to jadi ' hi ngata Antiokhia wengi , toe wo ' o to jadi ' hi Ikonium . Paulus pai ' Barnabas hilou hi tomi posampayaa to Yahudi , pai ' - ra mpoparata Kareba Lompe ' hi tauna to morumpu hi ria , alaa - na wori ' to Yahudi pai ' to bela - ra to Yahudi mepangala ' hi Yesus .

text: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles , and made their minds evil affected against the brethren .
text2: Tapi ' to Yahudi to uma dota mepangala ' mpo ' ukei ' ntodea to bela - ra to Yahudi , bona mpokahuku ' - ra topepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus .

text: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord , which gave testimony unto the word of his grace , and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands .
text2: Paulus pai ' Barnabas , mahae - ra mobago hi ngata toe . Mpoparata - ra Kareba Pue ' hante uma ria eka ' - ra . Pai ' Pue ' moto - mi mpotulungi - ra , apa ' nawai ' - ra baraka ' mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi , bona monoto - mi hi hawe ' ea tauna kamakono - na lolita to rakeni . Lolita toe mpo ' uli ' kabula rala Alata ' ala mpowai ' kalompea ' hi manusia ' .

text: But the multitude of the city was divided : and part held with the Jews , and part with the apostles .
text2: Tapi ' ihi ' ngata toera uma - ra hintuwu ' . Ria - ra to tono ' hi to Yahudi , ria wo ' o - ra to tono ' hi suro Pue ' Yesus .

text: And when there was an assault made both of the Gentiles , and also of the Jews with their rulers , to use them despitefully , and to stone them ,
text2: Ka ' omea - na tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi pai ' tauna to Yahudi hante pangkeni - ra wo ' o , mohawa ' - ramo doko ' mpobalinai ' pai ' mpowatuhi - ra Paulus pai ' Barnabas .

text: They were ware of it , and fled unto Lystra and Derbe , cities of Lycaonia , and unto the region that lieth round about :
text2: Ntaa ' ra ' inca - di Paulus pai ' Barnabas patuju - rae . Toe pai ' metibo ' - ramo hilou hi tana ' Likaonia , pai ' - ra mo ' oha ' hi ree , mohu ' hi ngata Listra pai ' Derbe .

text: And there they preached the gospel .
text2: Hi ree wo ' o - ra mpoparata Kareba Lompe ' .

text: And there sat a certain man at Lystra , impotent in his feet , being a cripple from his mother ' s womb , who never had walked :
text2: Hi ngata Listra , ria hadua tomane to pungku ngkai lomo ' kaputu - na . Ntora mohura - i - wadi , apa ' uma moroho witi ' - na pai ' uma mpu ' u nakulei ' momako ' .

text: The same heard Paul speak : who stedfastly beholding him , and perceiving that he had faith to be healed ,
text2: Topungku toei mohura mpo ' epe Paulus mololita . Paulus mpenoto ' - i pai ' nahilo karia pepangala ' - na bona rapaka ' uri ' - i .

text: Said with a loud voice , Stand upright on thy feet . And he leaped and walked .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' uli ' napesukui : " Mokore monoa ' - moko ! " Hangkore - idile , pai ' - i momako ' hilou tumai .

text: And when the people saw what Paul had done , they lifted up their voices , saying in the speech of Lycaonia , The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men .
text2: Karahilo - na ntodea napa to nababehi Paulus toe , mololita - ramo hi rala basa - ra moto , to rahanga ' basa Likaonia , ra ' uli ' : " Hompo - mi anitu bola ' tumai hi wongko dunia ' molence mpo - manusia ' ! "

text: And they called Barnabas , Jupiter ; and Paul , Mercurius , because he was the chief speaker .
text2: Barnabas rahanga ' Zeus , pai ' Paulus rahanga ' Hermes , apa ' Paulus poko topololita .

text: Then the priest of Jupiter , which was before their city , brought oxen and garlands unto the gates , and would have done sacrifice with the people .
text2: Ngkai ree , apa ' ria - hawo tomi pepuea ' hi Zeus hi mali ngata , pangkeni agama - ra ngkeni ba hangkuja ma ' a pamawa japi pai ' wunga hilou hi wobo ' ngata , hangkaa - ngkania hante tauna to wori ' . Patuju - ra , doko ' mposumale ' japi toe rapopepue ' hi Barnabas pai ' Paulus .

text: Which when the apostles , Barnabas and Paul , heard of , they rent their clothes , and ran in among the people , crying out ,
text2: Ntaa ' we ' i , kara ' epe - na Barnabas pai ' Paulus napa patuju - ra , raheu ' - heu ' - mi pohea - ra , tanda kasusa ' nono - ra , pai ' - ra mokeno hilou hi laintongo ' tauna to wori ' , rapesukui mololita , ra ' uli ' :

text: And saying , Sirs , why do ye these things ? We also are men of like passions with you , and preach unto you that ye should turn from these vanities unto the living God , which made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all things that are therein :
text2: " Napa - di to nibabehi tohe ' i - ee ? Kai ' toi - e , manusia ' biasa moto wo ' o - ka - kaiwo hewa koi ' . Tumai - kai tohe ' i - e , mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi koi ' , bona nibahakai mepue ' hi pue ' to uma ria kalaua - na tetu , pai ' bona mepue ' - koi hi Alata ' ala to Tuwu ' , Alata ' ala to mpajadi ' langi ' , dunia ' , tahi ' hante hawe ' ea ihi ' - na .

text: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways .
text2: Owi Pue ' Ala mpelele ' tauna humalili ' dunia ' mpotuku ' konoa - ra moto .

text: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness , in that he did good , and gave us rain from heaven , and fruitful seasons , filling our hearts with food and gladness .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , uma nalipo ' mpowai ' - ta tanda - tanda to mpakanoto - taka karia - na Alata ' ala . Nawai ' - ta wori ' nyala pewai ' to lompe ' : nawai ' - ta uda ngkai langi ' , napopowua ' hinu ' a - ta hi tempo - na . Nawai ' - ta pongkoni ' , nawai ' - ta kagoea ' nono . "

text: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people , that they had not done sacrifice unto them .
text2: Nau ' wae - mi lolita - ra Paulus pai ' Barnabas hi ntodea , aga mokoro lia - pidi mpotagi - ra bona neo ' - ra mpokeni pepue ' - ra hi hira ' .

text: And there came thither certain Jews from Antioch and Iconium , who persuaded the people , and , having stoned Paul , drew him out of the city , supposing he had been dead .
text2: Uma mahae ngkai ree , ba hangkuja dua to Yahudi to ngkai ngata Antiokhia pai ' Ikonium rata hi Listra , doko ' mpo ' ewa Paulus . Mpo ' ukei ' - ra ntodea hi Listra bona hira ' wo ' o doko ' mpo ' ewa - i . Oti toe , hilou - ramo mpowatuhi - i pai ' - i radii ' hilou hi mali ngata pai ' rapalahii - mi hi retu , ra ' uli ' - rawo mate - imi .

text: Howbeit , as the disciples stood round about him , he rose up , and came into the city : and the next day he departed with Barnabas to Derbe .
text2: Ntaa ' we ' i , bula - ra topetuku ' Yesus mokore ntololikia - na , muu - mule ' memata - imi , pai ' - i kaliliu mesua ' hi rala ngata . Kamepulo - na , hilou - imi dohe Barnabas hi ngata Derbe .

text: And when they had preached the gospel to that city , and had taught many , they returned again to Lystra , and to Iconium , and Antioch ,
text2: Hi Derbe , Paulus pai ' Barnabas mpoparata wo ' o Kareba Lompe ' , alaa - na wori ' tauna jadi ' topetuku ' Yesus . Ngkai ree , nculii ' - ramo hilou hi ngata Listra , pai ' ngkai ree hilou hi Ikonium , kaliliu wo ' o hi ngata Antiokhia tana ' Pisidia .

text: Confirming the souls of the disciples , and exhorting them to continue in the faith , and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Hi butu ngata to rakahiloui toe , rarohoi nono - ra topetuku ' Yesus , ra ' uli ' - raka : " Neo ' tabahakai mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus , apa ' kita ' to jadi ' ntodea - na Alata ' ala kana mporata kaparia ncala ' , aga hi eo mpeno mo ' oha ' - ta dohe - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na . "

text: And when they had ordained them elders in every church , and had prayed with fasting , they commended them to the Lord , on whom they believed .
text2: Hi butu ngata to rakahiloui toe , Paulus pai ' Barnabas mpo ' ongko ' tauna to jadi ' pangkeni to mpototu ' ai topetuku ' Yesus hi ria . Mopuasa ' pai ' mosampaya - ra , merapi ' bona Pue ' mpewili ' - ra , apa ' Hi ' a - wadi poncarumakaa - ra .

text: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia , they came to Pamphylia .
