text2: Ane nginu - ta anggur hi pepue ' - ta hi Pue ' Yesus , uma - ta ma ' ala nginu wo ' o anggur dohe - ra to mepue ' hi seta . Uma - ta ma ' ala ngkoni ' roti mpokiwoi kamate - na Pue ' , pai ' ngkoni ' wo ' o dohe - ra to mepue ' hi seta . Jadi ' uma mpu ' u natao ane mesua ' - ta hi rala tomi pepuea ' hi pinotau pai ' ngkoni ' dohe - ra to mepue ' hi pinotau .

text: Do we provoke the Lord to jealousy ? are we stronger than he ?
text2: Ha ni ' uli ' - koina uma moapa ane tadohei - ra to mepue ' hi pinotau mpemai - mai roe - na Pue ' ? Ha ni ' uli ' - koina meliu karoho - ta ngkai Pue ' ?

text: All things are lawful for me , but all things are not expedient : all things are lawful for me , but all things edify not .
text2: Ria - koi to mpo ' uli ' : " Apa ' Alata ' ala mpobahaka - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - tae , ma ' ala moto - ta mpobabehi napa konoa - ta . " Makono moto tetu , aga aku ' mpo ' uli ' : ane tababehi mpu ' u napa konoa - ta , uma mpai ' mokalaua omea hi kita ' . Ma ' ala moto - ta mpobabehi napa konoa - ta , aga uma hawe ' ea - na mporohoi nono - ta ba nono doo .

text: Let no man seek his own , but every man another ' s wealth .
text2: Neo ' tababehi to mpotulungi woto - ta moto - wadi . Tababehi wo ' o to mpotulungi doo .

text: Whatsoever is sold in the shambles , that eat , asking no question for conscience sake :
text2: Napa - napa to rapobalu ' hi pasar , ma ' ala moto ta ' oli pai ' takoni ' . Uma mingki ' tapekune ' ncala ' ba to rapopepue ' hi pinotau ba uma - di . Ma ' ala takoni ' hante uma morara ' nono - ta ,

text: For the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof .
text2: apa ' " Dunia ' tohe ' i pai ' hawe ' ea ihi ' - na , Pue ' Ala - hana pue ' - na . "

text: If any of them that believe not bid you to a feast , and ye be disposed to go ; whatsoever is set before you , eat , asking no question for conscience sake .
text2: Ane ria - koi to rakio ' doo - ni to bela - ra to Kristen hilou ngkoni ' hi tomi - ra , pai ' dota - koi hilou , koni ' - mi - hana napa to ratonu - kokoi . Neo ' leba ' nipekune ' ba bau ' to rapopepue ' hi pinotau tohe ' e ba bela - di .

text: But if any man say unto you , This is offered in sacrifice unto idols , eat not for his sake that shewed it , and for conscience sake : for the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof :
text2: Aga ane ria to mpo ' uli ' - taka : " Bau ' tohe ' i - le , to rapopepue ' hi pinotau , " agina neo ' takoni ' apa ' mpenonoi doo - ta to mpo ' uli ' - taka toe , meka ' ba napopeda ' nono mpai ' ane takoni ' .

text: Conscience , I say , not thine own , but of the other : for why is my liberty judged of another man ' s conscience ?
text2: To ku ' uli ' tohe ' i , agina neo ' takoni ' apa ' mpenonoi nono doo - ta . Ane nono - ta moto , uma moapa ane takoni ' . Hiaa ' tantu ria mpai ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Ha napa pai ' konoa - ku ma ' ala nalawa ' tau ntani ' - na ?

text: For if I by grace be a partaker , why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks ?
text2: Ane kukoni ' bau ' toe , pai ' mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi moto - a hi Alata ' ala , ha napa - hana pai ' tau ntani ' - na mporuge ' - a ! "

text: Whether therefore ye eat , or drink , or whatsoever ye do , do all to the glory of God .
text2: Aga aku ' mpo ' uli ' : ane ngkoni ' ba nginu - ta , ba napa - napa to tababehi , babehi - mi - hana bona Alata ' ala rapomobohe .

text: Give none offence , neither to the Jews , nor to the Gentiles , nor to the church of God :
text2: Neo ' mpobabehi napa - napa to mpopanawu ' doo , ba to Yahudi - ra ba bela - ra to Yahudi ba hingka doo - ta to Kristen to napobagia Alata ' ala .

text: Even as I please all men in all things , not seeking mine own profit , but the profit of many , that they may be saved .
text2: Hewa aku ' wo ' o - kuwo , hi butu nyala - na kubabehi oa ' napa to lompe ' hi poncilo hawe ' ea tauna . Uma kubabehi to mokalaua hi woto - ku moto - wadi . Kubabehi napa to mokalaua hi doo bona tehore - ra ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Tuku ' po ' ingku - ku , hewa aku ' wo ' o mpotuku ' po ' ingku Kristus .

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Kakaliliua - na ompi ' , ku ' une ' - koi apa ' hi butu nyala - na nikiwoi oa ' - a , pai ' nituku ' oa ' tudui ' to kuparata - mikokoi .

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: Aga ria hanyala to kana kupopokiwoii - kokoi . Kristus ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki woo ' hi hawe ' ea tomane . Tomane - hawo hewa woo ' hi tobine , pai ' Alata ' ala hewa woo ' hi Kristus .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: Ane tomane mokaramuai pai ' - i mosampaya ba mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala hi pogamparaa , tomane toei mpokedi ' Kristus , to jadi ' woo ' - na .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Aga ane hadua tobine mosampaya ba mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala hi pogamparaa , pai ' uma - i mokaramuai , uma - hana lompe ' . Apa ' ntuku ' ada , tobine toei mpokedi ' tomane - na , to jadi ' woo ' - na . Tobine to uma mokaramuai toei , hibalia kame ' eai ' - na hante tobine to rakoku lau - mi wuluwoo ' - na .

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: Jadi ' , ane ria tobine to uma dota mokaramuai hi pogamparaa , agina ragunci lau - mi wuluwoo ' - na . Aga ane me ' ea ' - i ragunci ba rakoku , kana mokaramuai - i .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Tomane to mosampaya ba mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala , neo ' mokaramuai , apa ' tomane rapajadi ' hi rala lence Alata ' ala bona hanga ' Alata ' ala rapomobohe . Tobine - hawo kana mokaramuai apa ' tobine mpomobohe hanga ' tomane - na .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Apa ' tomane uma rapajadi ' ngkai tobine , tobine - hanale to rapajadi ' ngkai tomane - e .

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: Pai ' wo ' o , bela tomane to rapajadi ' bona mpotulungi tobine , tobine rapajadi ' bona mpotulungi tomane .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Toe - mi pai ' tobine kana mokaramuai , hewa tanda pengkoru - na , apa ' ria wo ' o - hawo mala ' eka to mpopanto ' - ta .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: Aga nau ' - pa wae , hi kita ' to mepangala ' hi Pue ' , tobine pai ' tomane hibaa - balia hi rala hawe ' ea - na . Tobine uma tuwu ' mokalaua hi woto - na moto , wae wo ' o tomane uma tuwu ' mokalaua hi woto - na moto .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Apa ' hewa tobine to lomo ' - na rapajadi ' ngkai tomane , tomane wo ' o - hawo putu ngkai tobine . Hawe ' ea - na ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: Pekiri moto - koi : ha natao tobine mosampaya hi Alata ' ala hi rala pogamparaa ane uma - i mokaramuai ?

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: Rapa ' - na ane tomane moloe wuluwoo ' - na , biasa ta ' uli ' uma ntoto ria taoa - na .

text: But if a woman have long hair , it is a glory to her : for her hair is given her for a covering .
text2: Aga ane tobine moloe wuluwoo ' - na , ta ' uli ' lompe ' . Wuluwoo ' - na to moloe toe kancolaa - na - hana , apa ' wuluwoo ' to moloe rawai ' - raka tobine raponcawa mua - ra .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: Tapi ' ane ria to doko ' mpobaro to ku ' uli ' tohe ' i , toi - wadi lolita - ku : ada to kituku ' kai ' , tobine kana mokaramuai hi pogamparaa , pai ' ada toe wo ' o - mi to ratuku ' topetuku ' Alata ' ala hi ngata - ngata ntani ' - na . Ntani ' - na ngkai toe , uma ria .

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: Kakaliliua - na , ria wo ' o - pi hanyala to doko ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi . Uma - koi ku ' une ' sabana kehi - ni tohe ' i , apa ' porumpu - ni uma mpokeni kalompea ' - na , kadada ' aa - na lau - wadi .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Lomo ' - lomo ' - na , ku ' epe kareba to mpo ' uli ' : ane morumpu - koi mogampara , ria posisalaa - ni hadua pai ' hadua . Hiaa ' neo ' kupemakono mpu ' u - e ' !

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: Lompe ' lau - di ane ria posisalaa - nie , bona incana ba hema mpu ' u - koi to moroho petuku ' - ni hi Pue ' .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Jadi ' , ane moromu - koi hangkaa - ngkania , po ' ingku - ni uma natao hi tauna to morumpu ngkoni ' roti pai ' nginu anggur mpokiwoi kamate - na Pue ' Yesus .

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: Apa ' hi poromu - ni , ria - koi hantongo ' to kaliliu mpokoni ' pongkoni ' - ni moto pai ' nginu anggur - ni moto , alaa - na nipolangu moto - mi - koina . Hiaa ' doo - ni to uma nakariai , mo ' oro ' moto - ra .

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: Ha uma - koi tomia - e ? Agina ngkoni ' pai ' nginu moto - mokoi rala tomi - ni ntuku ' konoa - ni . Napa pai ' hewa toe kehi - ni hi pogamparaa - e ? Ba nipokedi ' - ra - rana hingka doo - ni to napobagia Alata ' ala ? Doko ' ni ' eai ' - ra to uma nakariai - e ? Napa to kana ku ' uli ' - kokoi tohe ' i - e ? Ha taoa - na ku ' une ' - koi ? Uma - hanae ' ! Hi gau ' - ni tohe ' e uma - koi ku ' une ' .

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Apa ' kutudui ' moto - koi wengi napa batua - na ngkoni ' pai ' nginu hangkaa - ngkania mpokiwoi kamate - na Pue ' . Pai ' napa to kutudui ' - kokoi toe , kutarima ngkai Pue ' moto . Hi bengi karapobalu ' - na Pue ' Yesus , na ' ala ' - mi roti

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: pai ' ka ' oti - na mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala , napihe - pihe pai ' na ' uli ' - raka ana ' guru - na : " Toi - mi woto - ku to kutonu mpotolo ' - koi . Babehi - mokoi ada toi bona mpokiwoi - a . "

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Wae wo ' o ka ' oti - ra ngkoni ' , na ' ala ' sangkiri ' to ihia ' anggur , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Ihi ' sangkiri ' toi mpobatuai pojanci Alata ' ala to bo ' u , to mpoposidai ' Alata ' ala pai ' manusia ' , to rapadupa ' hante raa ' - ku . Butu ngkani - ni nginu , babehi - koi tohe ' i bona mpokiwoi - a . "

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Jadi ' , butu ngkani takoni ' roti pai ' ta ' inu anggur hangkaa - ngkania hewa toe , to tababehi toe mpotutura kamate - na Pue ' , duu ' - na rata nculii ' - i mpai ' .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : tauna to ngkoni ' roti ba mpo ' inu anggur Pue ' toe hante kehi to uma natao , bate masala ' - ra , apa ' hewa uma rasaile ' woto pai ' raa ' - na Pue ' to nabatuai ada toe .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Jadi ' , butu dua tauna kana mpoparesa ' ncala ' kehi - na , pai ' lako ' ma ' ala - idi ngkoni ' roti pai ' nginu anggur toe .

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: Apa ' tauna to ngkoni ' roti pai ' nginu anggur toe hante kehi to uma natao , bate nahuku ' - ra Alata ' ala , apa ' uma rasaile ' woto - na Pue ' to nabatuai ada toe .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Apa ' ngkai toe - die pai ' alaa - na wori ' - koi to peda ' ba lente wuku - nie , pai ' ria mpu ' u - mi doo - ni to mate .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: Jadi ' , ane taparesa ' mperi ' ulu moto - hawo kehi - ta , uma - hawo nahuku ' - ta Pue ' .

text: But when we are judged , we are chastened of the Lord , that we should not be condemned with the world .
text2: Aga ane nahuku ' - ta Pue ' hewa toe , batua - na naparesai ' - ta hewa hadua tuama mpoparesai ' ana ' - na , bona neo ' - ta mpai ' rahuku ' hangkaa - ngkania hante tauna to uma mpo ' incai Pue ' .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , when ye come together to eat , tarry one for another .
text2: Ngkai toe - mi ompi ' - ompi ' - ku , ane morumpu - koi ngkoni ' roti pai ' nginu anggur mpokiwoi kamate - na Pue ' , agina momepopea - koi pai ' lako ' ngkoni ' hangkaa - ngkania .

text: And if any man hunger , let him eat at home ; that ye come not together unto condemnation . And the rest will I set in order when I come .
text2: Ane ria to mo ' oro ' , ngkoni ' ncala ' hi tomi - na . Nee - neo ' mpai ' morumpu - koi bona mogampara , hiaa ' mporata huku ' lau - dakoi ngkai Pue ' . Pai ' ane gau ' - gau ' to ntani ' - na , ku ' atoro ' ane rata - a - damo mpai ' .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Kakaliliua - na ompi ' , mpotompo ' wiwi - a pakulea ' to tarata ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Patuju - ku bona ni ' inca mpu ' u napa to makono .

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Ni ' inca moto ompi ' , owi kako ' ia - na ni ' incai Alata ' ala , ntora ratete ' - koi hante uma ria pekiri - ni mpotuku ' pinotau - pinotau to uma howa ' mololita .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Toe pai ' kupopo ' incai - koi : tauna to mololita ngkai petete ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , uma hema to mpo ' uli ' " Tetotowi - imi Yesus ! " Wae wo ' o uma hema to mpo ' uli ' : " Yesus , Hi ' a - mi Pue ' ! " ane uma - i natete ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Alata ' ala mpowai ' - ta wori ' nyala pakulea ' mpobago bago - na , hore mporata - ta pakulea ' to mosisala . Aga hawe ' ea pakulea ' toe , pewai ' ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to hadua lau - wadi .

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Wori ' nyala pobago to tapobago - ki Pue ' , aga Pue ' to tapobago - ki toe , hadua lau - i - wadi .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Wori ' nyala ohea - na Alata ' ala mpopohiloi baraka ' - na hi rala katuwu ' - ta , aga Alata ' ala to hadua toe wo ' o - i - wadi to mpobago butu nyala - na hi rala katuwu ' butu - butu dua - ta .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Butu dua - ta , hore - hore rawai ' pakulea ' to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , bona ma ' ala - ta mpobabehi to mokalaua hi doo .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Hi tau hadua Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpowai ' kapantea mololita . Hi to hadua - na Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to hibalia toe wo ' o - wadi mpowai ' pe ' inca mpakanoto Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Hi tau hadua Inoha ' Tomoroli ' toe mpowai ' pepangala ' to moroho . Pai ' hi to hadua - na , bate Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to hibalia toe wo ' o - i - wadi mpowai ' kuasa mepaka ' uri ' .

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: Hi to hadua rawai ' baraka ' mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi , hi to hadua - na rawai ' pakulea ' mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala . Hi to hadua - na wo ' o rawai ' pe ' inca mpoposisala napa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' pai ' napa to bela ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Hi tau ntani ' - na rawai ' pakulea ' mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Pai ' hi to hadua wo ' o rawai ' pe ' inca mpotoli batua - na basa toe bona ma ' ala rapaha doo .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Hawe ' ea toe , Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to hadua toe oa ' wo ' o - i - wadi pue ' bago . Nabagi - bagi pewai ' - na hi butu - butu dua - ta ntuku ' kabotu ' - na Hi ' a moto .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Kita ' to mepangala ' hi Kristus ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki woto manusia ' . Woto hameha ' - wadi , aga wori ' bagia - na . Nau ' wori ' bagia - na , hawe ' ea bagia toe jadi ' hawoto lau - wadi .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Wae wo ' o kita ' . Kita ' omea hewa hameha ' woto - tamo , apa ' Alata ' ala mponiu ' - ta omea hante Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to hibalia . Ba to Yahudi - ta ba bela - ta to Yahudi , to tuwu ' batua ba to tuwu ' maradika , kita ' omea mporata Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to hibalia .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Ane tapekiri woto - ta , ria witi ' - ta , ria pale - ta , pai ' wori ' nyala bagia ntani ' - na . Uma habagia lau - wadi . Rapa ' - na witi ' mpo ' uli ' : " Aku ' , bela - a pale , jadi ' bela - a bagia ngkai woto . " Aga nau ' wae , bate bagia woto oa ' - i witi ' toe .

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Ane tilinga mpo ' uli ' : " Aku ' , bela - a mata , jadi ' bela - a bagia ngkai woto , " tilinga toe bate bagia ngkai woto .

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?
text2: Ane rapa ' - na hawe ' ea bagia woto - ta jadi ' mata omea - mi , beiwa - ta pe ' epe . Ba hawe ' ea jadi ' tilinga omea - wadi , beiwa - ta pe ' enga ' .

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .
text2: Toe pai ' Alata ' ala mohawa ' bona woto - ta rababehi ngkai wori ' nyala bagia , butu nyala bagia natu ' u hi woto - ta ntuku ' konoa - na , hore - hore hi pontu ' ua to taoa - na .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: Ane rapa ' - na napahanyala lau - wadi hawe ' ea bagia woto - ta , uma - ipi jadi ' woto .

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: Jadi ' , bate - na wori ' - hawo bagia woto , aga woto hameha ' lau - wadi .

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .
text2: Mata uma ma ' ala mpo ' uli ' - ki pale : " Uma - kuna kuparaluu - ko ! " Ba woo ' mpo ' uli ' - ki witi ' : " Uma - kuna kuparaluu - ko ! "

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :
text2: Kakono - na bagia woto - ta to hiloa - na lente lau - di to taparaluu lia - e .

text: And those members of the body , which we think to be less honourable , upon these we bestow more abundant honour ; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness .
text2: Bagia woto - ta to ta ' uli ' uma ncola rahi , bagia toe - di to tapenasa hante pohea to ncola . Bagia woto - ta to uma taoa - na rahilo doo , toe lau - di to tawuni .

text: For our comely parts have no need : but God hath tempered the body together , having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked :
text2: Aga bagia woto - ta to lompe ' ami ' hiloa - na , uma tatu ' ui napa - napa rahi . Alata ' ala mpo ' atoro ' bagia woto - ta bona bagia to kura ' rabila ' , toe lau - di to tapewili ' lia .

text: That there should be no schism in the body ; but that the members should have the same care one for another .
text2: Wae wo ' o kita ' to mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus : kita ' omea hewa bagia - bagia ngkai woto to hameha ' lau - wadi , pai ' kana momepewili ' - ta hadua pai ' hadua , bona neo ' ria posisalaa - ta .

text: And whether one member suffer , all the members suffer with it ; or one member be honoured , all the members rejoice with it .
text2: Ane hadua peda ' , kita ' omea ntodohaka dohe - na . Ane hadua ra ' une ' , kita ' omea goe ' dohe - na .

text: Now ye are the body of Christ , and members in particular .
text2: Hewa Alata ' ala mpopajadi ' woto - ta ngkai wori ' nyala bagia , wae wo ' o koi ' to wori ' napajadi ' hawoto lau - damo hi posidaia ' - ni hante Kristus . Ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' , butu dua - ni bagia ngkai woto Kristus omea - koi .

text: And God hath set some in the church , first apostles , secondarily prophets , thirdly teachers , after that miracles , then gifts of healings , helps , governments , diversities of tongues .
text2: Pai ' hi rala kahintuwuaa ' - ta to Kristen , Alata ' ala mohawa ' bona hore - hore ria bago - ta : lomo ' - na ria to jadi ' suro - na , karonyala - na ria nabi to mpohowa ' lolita - na , katolu - na ria to metudui ' . Oti toe , ria to nawai ' kuasa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi . Oti toe , ria to nawai ' kuasa mepaka ' uri ' , ria to mporata pakulea ' mpotulungi doo , ria to jadi ' pangkeni , ria to mporata pakulea ' mololita hante basa - basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Are all apostles ? are all prophets ? are all teachers ? are all workers of miracles ?
text2: Uma - hawo hawe ' ea jadi ' suro , ba nabi omea ba topetudui ' omea . Uma wo ' o ba mokuasa omea - mi mpobabehi tanda to mekoncehi

text: Have all the gifts of healing ? do all speak with tongues ? do all interpret ?
text2: ba mpaka ' uri ' tauna . Uma hawe ' ea to mporata pakulea ' mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' ba to mpotoli basa toe bona rapaha doo .

text: But covet earnestly the best gifts : and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way .
text2: Jadi ' , huduwukui - koi mporata pakulea ' ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' toe we ' i lau to meliu kalompe ' - na . Tapi ' to meliu mpu ' u kalompe ' - na , toi - mi ulu to ku ' uli ' - kokoi .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na mporata - ta pakulea ' ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' bona mololita hante wori ' nyala basa manusia ' ba basa - ra mala ' eka wo ' o , tapi ' ane uma ria ahi ' - ta hi doo , uma ria kalaua - na . Bate - na hewa goo ' to pario - wadi ba hewa tinti ' to padudu - wadi pololita - ta , uma ria kalaua - na .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na mporata - ta pakulea ' mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala pai ' - ta mporata hawe ' ea pe ' inca ngkai Alata ' ala duu ' - na ta ' inca hawe ' ea to uma ra ' incai doo ; pai ' ane moroho pepangala ' - ta duu ' - na ma ' ala - ta mpopentoli bulu ' ; tapi ' ane uma ria ahi ' - ta hi doo , uma ntoto ria tuju - na tuwu ' - ta .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Ane hawe ' ea rewa - ta tawai ' - raka tokabu , pai ' ane ta ' agi mate ratunu sabana petuku ' - ta hi Pue ' Yesus , tapi ' ane uma ria ahi ' - ta hi doo , uma ria kalaua - na tuwu ' - ta .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: To ra ' uli ' mpoka ' ahi ' doo - le , mosabara pai ' lompe ' nono , uma mohingi ' , uma mpope ' une ' , uma molangko nono .

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: Uma mokasara hi doo , uma - ta ntora mpopali ' konoa - ta moto , uma jolia morani ' nono , uma mowuku nono .

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: Ane ma ' ahi ' - ta hi doo , batua - na , uma - ta goe ' ane masala ' - i , goe ' - ta ane monoa ' - i .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Ane ma ' ahi ' - ta hi doo , batua - na , tapengkatarii butu nyala kehi - na to uma tapokonoi , taparasaya oa ' kehi to lompe ' ngkai doo , tasarumaka kalompe ' - na mpai ' kehi - na , pai ' mosabara oa ' - ta nau ' ba napa - napa anu merata .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Ahi ' uma ria kahudua - na . Tapi ' ane ria pakulea ' - ta mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala , bate rata mpai ' tempo - na pakulea ' - ta toe uma - pi ria . Ane ria pakulea ' - ta mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , rata mpai ' tempo - na pakulea ' - ta toe mento ' o - mi . Ane mporata - ta pe ' inca to ngkai Alata ' ala , rata mpai ' tempo - na pe ' inca - ta toe uma - pi raparaluu .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Apa ' tempo toi , pe ' inca to tarata ngkai Alata ' ala , ria kotoa - na . Pai ' pakulea ' - ta mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala uma wo ' o hono ' .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: Aga ane rata - damo mpai ' tempo - na Alata ' ala mpakahono ' hawe ' ea - na , uma - pi taparaluu pakulea ' to uma hono ' toe we ' i lau .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Rapa ' - na bula - ku kedi ' - pidi , mololita - a hewa ana ' to kedi ' , nono - ku hewa ana ' kedi ' , pekiri - ku hewa ana ' kedi ' . Tapi ' tempo toi , kama - ama , kehi ka ' anaa ' - ku kubahaka - mi . Wae wo ' o , pakulea ' to tarata ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' uma tida duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Apa ' tempo toi , kita ' hewa tauna to mponaa lence hi pampewao ' to mogawu , apa ' ko ' ia ta ' incai hawe ' ea - na hante kanoto - noto - na . Mpeno - damo pai ' lako ' tapaha hawe ' ea - na , apa ' tahilo - i Alata ' ala wingke - ngkawingke . Tempo toi , ko ' ia hono ' pe ' inca - ku . Mpeno - damo pai ' lako ' ku ' inca mpu ' u , hewa Alata ' ala wo ' o mpo ' inca - a .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: Jadi ' , tempo toi , to tolu nyala toi kana tababehi : mepangala ' hi Alata ' ala , ncarumaka janci - na Alata ' ala , pai ' mpoka ' ahi ' doo . Aga ngkai to tolu nyala toe , to meliu mpu ' u : mpoka ' ahi ' doo .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , to kana tapopori ' ulu mpu ' u , mpoka ' ahi ' - ta doo . Pai ' oti toe , kana tahuduwukui wo ' o mporata pakulea ' to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Pai ' pakulea ' to meliu mpu ' u kamokalaua - na , pakulea ' mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Apa ' tauna to mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , uma - i mpololitai hingka manusia ' - na . Mpololitai Alata ' ala - i - wadi . Apa ' doo - na uma mpo ' incai ba napa to na ' uli ' , mololita - i ngkai petete ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , mpotompo ' wiwi anu to uma ra ' incai manusia ' .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: Aga tauna to mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala - di , mpololitai manusia ' - i . Lolita - na mporohoi nono doo , mpo ' apui nono doo , mpotanta ' u doo .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Tauna to mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mporohoi nono - na moto - wadi . Tauna to mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala mporohoi nono doo to morumpu hangkaa - ngkania .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Konoa - ku ompi ' , bona hawe ' ea - ni ma ' ala mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Aga meliu kalompe ' - na ane mpohowa ' - koi lolita Alata ' ala . Apa ' tauna to mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala hi doo , meliu kamokalaua - na ngkai tauna to mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Sampale ane ria to mpotoli basa - na toe bona rapaha doo , pai ' lako ' terohoi nono doo to mogampara dohe - na .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , ane rapa ' - na rata - a hi pogamparaa - ni , pai ' - a mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , napa - mi kalaua - na hi koi ' ? Tapi ' ane mpakanoto - a patuju Alata ' ala ba kareba ngkai Alata ' ala to ko ' ia ni ' incai , ba mpohowa ' - a lolita Alata ' ala ba metudui ' - a , lako ' ria - di kalaua - na hi koi ' .

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Rapa ' - na rewa to rapomoni , hewa lalowe ba kasapi : ane uma lompe ' potuwui ' - na lalowe , ba ane uma makono pokado ' - na kasapi , tauna to mpo ' epe uma mpo ' incai lagu napa to rapomoni .

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: Wae wo ' o , ane sangkakala ratuwui ' mpokio ' tantara mosadia hilou hi panga ' ea , tapi ' ane uli ' karatuwui ' - na , hema - hana to sadia manga ' e ?

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Wae wo ' o hante koi ' - e ompi ' : ane mololita - koi hante basa to uma ra ' incai doo , beiwa kara ' inca - na ba napa - i to ni ' uli ' ? Koi ' hewa tauna to mpololitai ngolu ' - wadi .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Rala dunia ' toi , hewa apa - damo kawori ' nyala basa , pai ' butu nyala basa , ria batua - na .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: Aga ane ria tauna to mpololitai - ta pai ' uma ta ' incai batua basa - na , tantu ta ' uli ' molibu ' hinyai ' - i - wadi . Wae wo ' o ane kita ' mpololitai - i , na ' uli ' molibu ' hinyai ' - ta .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Wae wo ' o - hawo hante koi ' - e ompi ' : ane mololita - koi hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , doo - ni uma mpo ' incai kalaua - na . Jadi ' , apa ' doko ' rahi - koi mporata baraka ' ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' - e , wae - pi , agina merapi ' - koi hi Pue ' bona nawai ' - koi pakulea ' mporohoi nono doo to mogampara dohe - ni .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : hema to mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , agina merapi ' - i hi Pue ' mporata pakulea ' mpotoli basa toe bona hawe ' ea doo - na mpopaha batua lolita - na .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Apa ' ane mosampaya - ta hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , mosampaya moto - ta hi rala nono - ta , aga pekiri - ta uma molengo .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: Jadi ' , napa to lompe ' tababehi ? Agina mosampaya - ta hi rala nono - ta hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' mosampaya wo ' o - ta hante basa to rapaha doo . Morona ' - ta mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala hi rala nono - ta hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , pai ' morona ' wo ' o - ta mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala hante basa to rapaha doo .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Ane rapa ' - na mololita - ta hi rala basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala , pai ' uma monoto batua lolita - ta hi tauna to mpo ' epe , uma - ra - hawo mpai ' mpo ' uli ' " Amin ! Bate makono ! " apa ' uma - hawo ra ' incai napa to ta ' uli ' .

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Nau ' lompe ' - mi posampaya - ta mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala , aga uma - hawo ria tuju - na hi doo , apa ' uma terohoi nono - ra mpo ' epe posampaya - ta tetu .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Ku ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala apa ' mololita - a hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' meliu ngkai koi ' omea .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Aga hi rala pogamparaa , agina lau - pi mololita - a hante basa to ra ' inca doo bona rapaha lolita - ku . Agina - pi mololita hamela romela - wadi mpotudui ' doo , ngkai mololita moloe hi rala basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to uma rapaha doo .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' ! Neo ' - pi mopekiri oa ' hewa ana ' to kedi ' , kana monoto nono - ni hewa tauna to kama - mi . Aga hewa ana ' to kedi ' ko ' ia mpo ' incai mpobabehi gau ' to dada ' a , wae wo ' o kusarumaka neo ' - koi mpobabehi gau ' to dada ' a .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Hi rala Atura Pue ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : Na ' uli ' Pue ' Ala : Hante wiwi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi kupololitai - ra to Yahudi . Kuhubui - ra mpai ' tumai tauna ngkai ngata to molaa to mpololitai - ra hi rala basa to uma ra ' incai . Aga nau ' wae , bate uma oa ' - ra mpai ' dota mpopangala ' lolita - ku . "

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Jadi ' , ane ria - ta to mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , lolita - ta toe jadi ' tanda kamobaraka ' - na Pue ' hi tauna to uma - ra mepangala ' hi Pue ' , bela hi tauna to mepangala ' - mi hi Pue ' . Aga ane mpohowa ' - ta lolita Alata ' ala , lolita - ta toe jadi ' tanda kamobaraka ' - na Pue ' hi tauna to mepangala ' - mi , bela hi tauna to uma mepangala ' .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Rapa ' - na morumpu - koi hangkaa - ngkania mogampara , pai ' mololita omea - koi hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Ane mesua ' tauna to bela - ra to Kristen ba to ko ' ia mpo ' incai Lolita Alata ' ala , napa - mi mpai ' to ra ' uli ' - e ? Tantu ra ' uli ' wuli - koi .

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: Aga ane hawe ' ea - ni mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala pai ' mesua ' hadua tauna to bela - i to Kristen ba to ko ' ia - i mpo ' incai Lolita Alata ' ala , kampo ' epe - na napa omea to ni ' uli ' , monoto - mi hi rala nono - na kamojeko ' - na . Hewa ria hi rala nono - na to mpo ' uli ' : " To hi aku ' - mi tetu - e mai ! "

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: Alaa - na hawe ' ea to tewunii ' hi nono - na telohu - mi . Ka ' omea - na mpai ' , kamowingkotu ' - nami mepue ' hi Alata ' ala , pai ' na ' uli ' : " Bate makono - di ! Alata ' ala ria mpu ' u hi laintongo ' - ni ! "

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , napa batua - na hawe ' ea toe ? Ane mogampara - koi , butu dua tauna ria bagia - na : ria to morona ' , ria to metudui ' , ria to mpoparata Lolita Alata ' ala , ria to mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , ria to mpotoli batua - na to ra ' uli ' toe bona rapaha omea . Aga hawe ' ea toe kana nibabehi bona mporohoi nono doo .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Ane ria to mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' , agina rodua - wadi , neo ' melabi ngkai tolu . Pai ' neo ' - ra mololita hinto ' ua , kana momesampei . Pai ' kana ria to mpotoli napa to ra ' uli ' topololita toera .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: Ane uma ria to mpotoli , tauna to doko ' mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' kana mengkarodo rala pogamparaa , agina rala nono - ra - wadi mpololitai Alata ' ala .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Ane nabi to mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala , agina rodua ba tolu - ra to mololita , pai ' to ntani ' - na mpetonoi to ra ' uli ' toe , ba ngkai Alata ' ala mpu ' u - di ba bela - di .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na lolita ngkai Alata ' ala rata ncorobaa hi hadua to mohura , agina tauna to bula - na mololita mento ' o - i ulu , bona doo - na rapalogai mololita .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Ane hewa toe - koi , ma ' ala mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala omea - koi momesampei , bona hawe ' ea - ni mporata tudui ' pai ' hawe ' ea - ni te ' apui nono - ni .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Nabi to mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala mpokuasai woto - na moto - i : nakule ' mololita pai ' mento ' o mololita ntuku ' konoa - na .

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: Apa ' konoa Alata ' ala , bona tiapa ' pogampara - ta , uma napokonoi to moguriwo ' . Toe - mi atura to ratuku ' hi hawe ' ea pogamparaa to Kristen hi butu - butu ngata .

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: Jadi ' , tobine - ni kana mengkalino hi pogamparaa . Uma - ra rapiliu mololita hewa tetu , kana mengkoru - ra hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Atura Pue ' .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Ane doko ' - ra mpo ' inca ba napa - napa , agina rapekune ' hi tomane - ra hi tomi , apa ' uma - hawo natao ane tobine ntora mololita hewa tetu rala pogamparaa .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Napa - di pai ' ria - koi to uma dota mpotuku ' atura - atura toe we ' i ? Ha ni ' uli ' - koina , koi ' to lomo ' - na mpoparata Lolita Alata ' ala - e ? Ba muntu ' hi koi ' - wadi Lolita Alata ' ala raparata - e ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Tantu ria - ra hi retu to mpo ' uli ' nabi mpu ' u - ra , ra ' uli ' ria Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hi hira ' . Jadi ' , ane ria mpu ' u Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hi hira ' , kana rapangaku ' napa to ku ' uki ' hi rehe ' i bate parenta ngkai Pue ' .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Aga ane uma rapangalai ' lolita - ku toi , neo ' - ra rapangala ' !

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Ngkai toe - mi ompi ' , huduwukui - koi mporata pakulea ' mpohowa ' lolita Alata ' ala , aga neo ' wo ' o - ra ratagi to mololita hante basa to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Hawe ' ea kana rababehi ntuku ' ohea to natao pai ' ntuku ' aku - na .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Kakaliliua - na ompi ' - ompi ' , doko ' kupopokiwoii - koi ihi ' Kareba Lompe ' to kuparata - kokoi . Nitarima - mi Kareba Lompe ' toe pai ' moroho pepangala ' - ni duu ' tempo toi .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Tehore - mokoi ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ni , asala moroho pongkakamu - ni Kareba Lompe ' to kuparata - kokoi toe , nee - neo ' mpai ' uma ria tuju - na pepangala ' - ni .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Kareba Lompe ' to kuparata - kokoi toe ompi ' , to kutarima wo ' o - kuwo . To poko - na mpu ' u : Kristus mate mpotolo ' jeko ' - ta , hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' .

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Ratana - i , pai ' hi eo katolu - na rapotuwu ' nculii ' - imi , hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' .

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Oti toe , napopehuwu - mi woto - na hi Petrus , oti toe hi ana ' guru - na to ntani ' - na wo ' o .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Oti toe , mehupa ' wo ' o - imi hi lima atu labi tauna hangkani lau . Kaworia ' - ra tuwu ' - pidi duu ' tempo toi , aga ba hangkuja dua - ra mate - ramo .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Oti ngkai ree , mehupa ' wo ' o - imi hi Yakobus , pai ' hi hawe ' ea suro - na .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Ka ' omea - na lia , mehupa ' wo ' o - imi hi aku ' . Aku ' - e - kuwo , uma - a hewa suro - na to ntani ' - na . Aku ' - le jadi ' suro Pue ' Yesus ncorobaa hi tempo to uma rasangka , hewa ana ' lei to putu hi eo to ko ' ia wula - na .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Apa ' aku ' suro Pue ' Yesus to tepatu ' ai lia tuwu ' - ku ngkai hawe ' ea suro - na . Kakoo - kono - na , uma - a natao rahanga ' suro - na , apa ' ri ' ulu kubalinai ' - ra topetuku ' Alata ' ala .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Aga ngkai ahi ' pai ' petulungi - na Alata ' ala , pai ' alaa - na jadi ' hewa tohe ' i - ama - kuwo . Pai ' ria mpu ' u kalaua - na ahi ' pai ' petulungi - na hi aku ' . Apa ' aku ' - mi to meliu pobago - ku ngkai hawe ' ea suro Pue ' Yesus to ntani ' - na . Aga uma hante karohoa - ku moto . Ahi ' pai ' petulungi - na Pue ' - hanale to mporohoi - ae .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Jadi ' , ba ngkai hema ni ' epe Kareba Lompe ' toe , ba ngkai aku ' ba ngkai suro to ntani ' - na , uma mpenara ' . Poko - nale , toe - mi - hawo to kipalele , pai ' toe - mi to nipangala ' .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Jadi ' , ane ntoa ' kipalele - mi karapotuwu ' - na nculii ' Kristus ngkai kamatea - na , ha napa pai ' ria - koi to ncapuaka katuwu ' - ra nculii ' tauna to mate hi Eo Kiama - e ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Ane makono uma - rada tuwu ' nculii ' to mate - e , tantu wae wo ' o - hawo Kristus uma - i rapotuwu ' nculii ' .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Pai ' ane uma - i makono Kristus tuwu ' nculii ' , uma ria kalaua - nakai mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' , uma wo ' o ria tuju - na pepangala ' - ni , apa ' mepangala ' - koi hi kareba to uma makono .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Melabi ngkai toe , monoa ' - mi kamosabi ' boa ' - kai , apa ' hi rala hanga ' Alata ' ala ki ' uli ' kanapotuwu ' - na nculii ' Kristus . Hiaa ' ane makono mpu ' u tauna to mate uma mpai ' rapotuwu ' nculii ' , batua - na , Alata ' ala uma mpotuwu ' nculii ' - i Kristus .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Apa ' ane uma - ra - hawo rapotuwu ' nculii ' tauna to mate - e , tantu wae wo ' o - wadi - hawo Kristus uma - i - hawo rapotuwu ' nculii ' .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Pai ' ane uma mpu ' u - i - hawo rapotuwu ' nculii ' , uma ria kalaua - na pepangala ' - ni , uma - koi tebahaka ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ni .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Pai ' wae wo ' o , to Kristen to mpolia ' mate - ramo , bate mate rala jeko ' - ra - ramo pai ' - ra mpotoa ' naraka .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na Kristus mpotulungi - ta bula - ta tuwu ' hi dunia ' toi , pai ' hudu ree - wadi petulungi - na hi kita ' , batua - na ngkai hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' kita ' toi - mi - tana to mpe ' ahii ' lia .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Tapi ' to makono : rapotuwu ' nculii ' mpu ' u - imile Kristus - e . Pai ' katuwu ' - na nculii ' toe hewa janci karapotuwu ' - ra nculii ' wo ' o mpai ' hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na to mate .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Apa ' ngkai jeko ' tau hadua pai ' alaa - na manusia ' kana mate , wae wo ' o ngkai pobabehi tau hadua pai ' alaa - na manusia ' to mate rapotuwu ' nculii ' .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna to mosidai ' hante Adam kana mate . Wae wo ' o hawe ' ea to mosidai ' hante Kristus bate mporata katuwua ' to bo ' u .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Aga hore - hore pomeduncu - na : To lomo ' - na tuwu ' nculii ' , Kristus . Pai ' hi karata - na nculii ' hi rala dunia ' , lako ' rapotuwu ' nculii ' wo ' o - rada tauna to napobagia .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Oti toe - di mpai ' , lako ' rata kahudua dunia ' . Kristus mpodagi hawe ' ea topoparenta pai ' hawe ' ea to mokuasa pai ' to mobaraka ' , pai ' - i moparenta jadi ' Magau ' . Oti toe , pai ' natonu huraa kamagaua ' - na hi Alata ' ala to Tuama .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Apa ' Kristus kana moparenta jadi ' Magau ' duu ' - na Alata ' ala mpopengkoru hawe ' ea bali ' - na hi Hi ' a .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Jadi ' , ane napotuwu ' nculii ' hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na pai ' uma - pi ria kamatea , ma ' ala ta ' uli ' nadagi - mi bali ' - na to ka ' omea - na , toe - mi kamatea .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' : " Alata ' ala mpopengkoru hawe ' ea - na hi Hi ' a . " Jadi ' monoto - mi ta ' inca : bate hawe ' ea - na mpai ' rapopengkoru hi Kristus . Sampale to uma rapopengkoru hi Hi ' a , muntu ' Alata ' ala - wadi , apa ' Hi ' a - mi to mpopengkoru hawe ' ea - na hi Kristus .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Jadi ' , ane hawe ' ea - na - damo rapopengkoru hi Kristus , Hi ' a wo ' o - hawo mpai ' mengkoru hi Tuama - na , apa ' hewa to ku ' uli ' we ' i , Alata ' ala - mi to mpopengkoru hawe ' ea - na hi Hi ' a . Ngkai ree - damo mpai ' , pai ' Alata ' ala mpoparentai hawe ' ea - na pai ' meliu kabohe hanga ' - na ngkai hawe ' ea - na .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Beiwa - mi ompi ' , ane makono mpu ' u tauna to mate uma - pi mpai ' tuwu ' nculii ' , napa pai ' ria - ra tauna to raniu ' mposulewata doo - ra to mate ? Ane uma mpu ' u - hawo mpai ' tuwu ' nculii ' tomate - e , napa pai ' rababehi ada - ra toe ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Pai ' kai ' wo ' o , neo ' uma ria kaputua - nakai rapongasai ' bali ' - kai sabana mpokeni - kai Kareba Lompe ' . Hiaa ' ane uma mpu ' u - hawo rapotuwu ' nculii ' tomate - e , napa - mi kalaua - na hawe ' ea to kitodohaka toe ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Aku ' - le , butu eo - na olo ' mpobira ' - a tuwu ' sabana pobago - ku mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' . Mpu ' u ompi ' ! Napa to ku ' uli ' - kokoi makono lia , pai ' bohe mpu ' u nono - ku sabana koi ' ompi ' , apa ' mepangala ' - mokoi hi Pue ' - ta Kristus Yesus .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Hi rehe ' i - a hi ngata Efesus , ria - ama hangkani radulu tauna to buko ' mpobinata . Hiaa ' ane rapa ' - na kutodohaka hawe ' ea toe bula - ku tuwu ' hi wongko dunia ' toi , pai ' tauna to mate uma - pi tuwu ' nculii ' , napa - mi - kuwo kalaua - na ? Ane tomate uma mpai ' rapotuwu ' nculii ' , agina lau - pi ngkoni ' pai ' nginu - tamo mpali ' kagoea ' , apa ' mepulo romengi mpai ' , mate - tamo , pai ' hudu ree - wadi katuwu ' - ta . Wae - mi lolita tauna hantongo ' .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Neo ' - koi ma ' ala rabagiu ! Ane nituku ' - ra to mposapuaka katuwu ' - ra nculii ' tomate , po ' ingku - ni to lompe ' mobali ' jadi ' dada ' a wo ' o mpai ' .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : Pakanoto - mi nono - ni hewa to kasipato ' - na , bahakai - mi mpobabehi jeko ' . Apa ' ria - pidi - koi to ko ' ia monoto nono - ni mpo ' inca Alata ' ala . Lolita - ku tohe ' i - e , ku ' uli ' bona me ' ea ' - koi .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Tantu ria - ra to mpekune ' : " Ha beiwa - hawo tomate bisa rapotuwu ' nculii ' - e ? Woto to beiwa mpai ' to rawai ' - rakae ? "

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Wojo mpu ' u tauna to mpekune ' hewa tetu ! Ane mpotuja ' - ta ba napa - napa , tinuja ' - ta ko ' ia tuwu ' ane uma - i ratana pai ' ra ' urihi hewa tomate ncala ' .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Pai ' napa to tatuja ' , unto ' mara - i - wadi , ba pae - i ba tinuja ' to ntani ' - na . Uma - hawo tapuna ' hi rala tana ' hamuli to ntali kaho - na pai ' rau - na . Unto ' mara - wadi - hawo to tatuja ' - e .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Ka ' oti - na ratuja ' , Alata ' ala mpotuwu ' - i ntuku ' konoa - na , duu ' - na mehupa ' tumai hangkaho pae ba napa - i , butu nyala unto ' tuwu ' hore - hore ntuku ' lence - ra moto - ra - rawo .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Ane tapekiri wo ' o hawe ' ea binata to tuwu ' hi wongko dunia ' , uma ntumuu hibalia lence - ra . Manusia ' , kahanyala - na lence - ra . Danci , kahanyala - na lence - ra . Uru , kahanyala - na lence - ra . Butu nyala binata , hore - hore ntani ' - na lence - ra .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Wae wo ' o to hi langi ' , hewa eo , wula pai ' betue ' , uma hibalia hante to hi dunia ' . To hi langi ' - hawo , kahanyala - na kancola - ra , pai ' to hi dunia ' kahanyala - na kancola - ra .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Pehini eo kahanyala - na . Pehini wula , pehini betue ' hore kahanyala - na wo ' o . Bangku ' betue ' - betue ' - hawoe ' , hore - hore hanyala moto wo ' o - rawo pehini - ra .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Wae - mi mpai ' tomate - e ane tuwu ' nculii ' - ra . Bula - ta tuwu ' hi dunia ' toi , lente pai ' mpe ' ahii ' woto - ta . Ane mate - ta mpai ' , woto - ta ratana pai ' jadi ' pope . Aga ane rapotuwu ' nculii ' - tapa mpai ' , rabalii ' - mi woto - ta toi jadi ' woto to moroho pai ' ncola , to uma - pi mate ba jadi ' pope .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: To ratana , woto - ta to natao tuwu ' hi dunia ' toi . Aga ane rapotuwu ' nculii ' - ta - damo mpai ' , rabalii ' woto - ta jadi ' woto to natao mo ' oha ' hi suruga sabana baraka ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Woto - ta tempo toi , woto to natao mo ' oha ' hi dunia ' . Woto - ta hi eo mpeno , woto to natao mo ' oha ' hi suruga .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' : Alata ' ala mpajadi ' manusia ' to lomo ' - na , to rahanga ' Adam , pai ' nawai ' - i katuwua ' . Aga Kristus ma ' ala rahanga ' Adam to ka ' omea - na . Hi ' a to mpowai ' - ta katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Alata ' ala uma kaliliu mpobalii ' woto - ta bona natao - ta mo ' oha ' hi suruga . To lomo ' - na nawai ' - taka , woto - ta to natao mo ' oha ' hi dunia ' toi . Mpeno - damo pai ' lako ' nawai ' - ta woto to natao mo ' oha ' hi suruga .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Manusia ' to lomo ' - na rapajadi ' ngkai tana ' , pai ' - i mo ' oha ' hi wongko dunia ' toi . Aga Kristus ma ' ala rahanga ' Adam karodua - na . Hi ' a , ngkai suruga - i - hana .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Hawe ' ea tauna hi dunia ' , tuwu ' hewa Adam , apa ' muli - na omea - ta . Aga hawe ' ea to mosidai ' hante Kristus mporata katuwua ' to ngkai suruga , hewa katuwu ' - na Kristus .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Tempo toi , katuwu ' - ta hewa katuwu ' - na Adam , apa ' woto - ta woto to natao mo ' oha ' hi dunia ' - pidi . Mpeno - damo pai ' lako ' tuwu ' - ta hewa Kristus , pai ' nto ' u toe mpai ' woto - ta natao mo ' oha ' hi suruga .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , patuju - ku hewa toi : woto - ta hi dunia ' toi rapajadi ' ngkai ihi pai ' raa ' ; uma - ta mpai ' ma ' ala mo ' oha ' hi rala Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala to hi suruga hante woto - ta to hewa toi . Uma - ta ma ' ala mo ' oha ' hi suruga hante woto - ta to bisa mate toi , apa ' uma - hana ria kamatea hi ria .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca , ku ' uli ' - kokoi tudui ' to ko ' ia napopehuwu Alata ' ala ngkai owi , aga napopehuwu - mitaka tempo toi . Ane rata nculii ' - ipi mpai ' Pue ' Yesus , ria - ta - pidi to ko ' ia mate . Aga hawe ' ea - ta bate kana rabalii ' , lompe ' to tuwu ' - pidi lompe ' to mate - ramo .

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: Tohe ' e mpai ' jadi ' ncorobaa , rala - na hampinisi mata , nto ' u karatuwui ' - na sangkakala to ka ' omea - na . Apa ' nto ' u sangkakala toe ratuwui ' , tomate rapotuwu ' nculii ' hante katuwua ' to uma ria kahudua - na , pai ' kita ' to tuwu ' - pidi rabalii ' wo ' o - tamo - tawo .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Apa ' woto - ta to bisa mate pai ' jadi ' pope tohe ' i - e , kana rabalii ' jadi ' woto to uma ria kamatea - na pai ' to uma jadi ' pope . Jadi ' , ane rabalii ' mpu ' u - damo woto - ta tohe ' i - e , lako ' ree - di mpai ' kadupa ' - na lolita to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' owi to mpo ' uli ' : Alata ' ala mpodagi kamatea , uma - pi ria kamatea . "

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: Alata ' ala mpobahaka - ta mpai ' ngkai hawe ' ea to mpokeni kamatea , uma - pi mpai ' ria kuasa - na kamatea hi kita ' .

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Manusia ' kana mate sabana jeko ' . Pai ' jeko ' manusia ' kana rahuku ' apa ' mpotiboki Atura Pue ' .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Aga tarima kasi ta ' uli ' hi Alata ' ala , apa ' nabahaka - tamo ngkai hawe ' ea toe we ' i , pai ' nawai ' - ta pedagia , sabana petauntongoi ' - na Yesus Kristus Pue ' - ta .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Ngkai toe - mi ompi ' - ompi ' to kupe ' ahi ' , pakaroho pepangala ' - ni , neo ' - koi mogego ' , baka ' oa ' - koi mpobago bago Pue ' , apa ' ni ' inca moto - hawo napa to nipobago - ki Pue ' uma - hawo mpai ' bayangi ' , bate ria hiwili - na .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Kakaliliua - na ompi ' , mpotompo ' wiwi - a doi to nirumpu bona mpotulungi ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra hi tana ' Yudea . Kuperapi ' bona nibabehi hewa to kuhawai ' - raka to Kristen to hi tana ' Galatia .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Butu eo Mingku , butu dua - ni mpatani ' doi hi tomi - ni , hore - hore ntuku ' pomporataa - ni . Timamahi - koi doi tetu duu ' - ku rata , bona neo ' karata - ku - damo pai ' lako ' nirumpu .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ane rata - apa mpai ' , nipelihi ba hangkuja dua doo - ni to nisarumaka , kuwai ' - ra - damo sura kakamua - ra , pai ' kuhubui - ra mpokeni doi pewai ' - ni tetu hilou hi ngata Yerusalem .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Pai ' ane lompe ' ni ' uli ' , hilou moto - a dohe - ra .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Kupencuai ' moto - koi mpai ' ane oti - a mpencuai ' - ra to Makedonia , apa ' doko ' hilou hi ria - a ulu .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Konoa - ku bona mahae hala ' - a mpai ' dohe - ni , ba duu ' - na timpaliu tempo lengi ' , bona ane timpaliu - damo tempo lengi ' nipope ' ongko ' - ama mpokaliliu pomako ' - ku ba hiapa kahiloua - ku .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Uma - a dota mpojolo - wadi mpencuai ' - koi . Ane napokono Pue ' , konoa - ku bona mahae hala ' - a mpai ' dohe - ni .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Aga tempo toi , hi rehe ' i - a ulu hi ngata Efesus duu ' rata eo bohe Pentakosta .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Apa ' hi rehe ' i wori ' bago to mokalaua , nau ' wori ' wo ' o to me ' ewa .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Ane rata - ipi mpai ' Timotius , kusarumaka nitarima lompe ' - i - hawo , bona neo ' - i koro ' dohe - ni , apa ' hibalia bago - kai to kipobago - ki Pue ' .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Jadi ' , nee - neo ' mpai ' ria to uma mposaile ' - i . Pope ' ongko ' lompe ' - i , bona rata nculii ' - i mpai ' hi rehe ' i hante kalompe ' - na , apa ' rehe ' i - a mpopea - i hante doo - doo - na .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Kakaliliua - na , ane ompi ' - ta Apolos , wori ' ngkani moto - mi ku ' uli ' - ki : " Ria - ra ompi ' to neo ' me ' ongko ' hilou hi Korintus . Agina hilou wo ' o - ko - kowo dohe - ra . " Aga ko ' ia nahiloi nono - na tilou tempo toi . Aga ane ria - pi loga - na , tilou moto - i mpai ' .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi , pakaroho pokore - ni ! Pakaroho - koi pai ' bia ' hi pepangala ' - ni !

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Hawe ' ea to nibabehi , babehi hante ahi ' .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , tantu ni ' inca moto - ra hira ' Stefanus hantomia , kahira ' - na toe - mi to lomo ' - na jadi ' to Kristen hi propinsi Akhaya , pai ' - ra mpotonu katuwu ' - ra hi Pue ' doko ' mpotulungi - koi to mpotuku ' Pue ' . Jadi ' , kuperapi ' mpu ' u ompi '

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: bona nipengkorui mpu ' u - ra , nte hawe ' ea tauna to hampobagoa - ra hi rala pobago Pue ' .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Goe ' - a karata - ra Stefanus , Fortunatus pai ' Akhaikus hi rehe ' i . Hewa hira ' - mi posampei - ni tumai hi aku ' .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Hira ' toe - mi mporohoi nono - ku , hewa kararohoi - na wo ' o - mi nono - ni . Toe pai ' kuperapi ' bona nibila ' tauna to hewa hira ' .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Hawe ' ea to Kristen to hi propinsi Asia mpakatu tabe - ra hi koi ' . Akwila pai ' Priskila nte to Kristen to mogampara hi tomi - ra mpo ' uli ' wori ' tabe hi rala Pue ' .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Hawe ' ea ompi ' - ni hi rehe ' i mpakatu tabe - ra hi koi ' . Mometabe - tabe - koi hante nono mpu ' u ane hirua ' - koi hi pogamparaa .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Bagia sura tohe ' i aku ' moto - mi to mpo ' uki ' : wori ' tabe ngkai aku ' Paulus !

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Tauna to uma mpoka ' ahi ' Pue ' Yesus , kana natotowi - ra Alata ' ala . Maranata ! Tumai - moko Pue ' !

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Pue ' Yesus mpogane ' - koi !

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Kupoka ' ahi ' - koi omea hi rala Kristus Yesus . Hudu rei .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Sura toi ngkai aku ' Paulus , to na ' ongko ' Alata ' ala jadi ' suro Kristus Yesus ntuku ' konoa - na , pai ' ngkai Timotius , ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta , kipakatu tilou hi koi ' ompi ' - ompi ' to mepangala ' - mi hi Alata ' ala to hi ngata Korintus , duu ' - na hi hawe ' ea to Kristen to hi propinsi Akhaya .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Wori ' tabe : mekakae - kai hi Alata ' ala Tuama - ta pai ' Pue ' Yesus Kristus bona nagane ' - koi ngkai kabula rala - na pai ' nawai ' - koi kalompea ' tuwu ' .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Mai - tamo mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala Tuama - na Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus ! Apa ' Hi ' a - mi Tuama - ta to bohe ahi ' - na , Hi ' a - mi Alata ' ala to mporohoi oa ' nono - ta .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Narohoi nono - kai hi rala butu nyala kasusaa ' to mporumpa ' - kai , bona hante karohoa to kitarima ngkai Hi ' a toe , ma ' ala wo ' o - kai mporohoi nono doo to hi rala kasusaa ' ba napa - napa .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Kaparia to narata - mi Kristus , wori ' wo ' o to kirata kai ' . Aga wori ' wo ' o - mi karohoa nono to kirata ngkai Kristus .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Ane mporata - kai kaparia , napo ' ohea Alata ' ala bona ma ' ala - kai mporohoi nono - ni ompi ' , bona koi ' mporata kalompea ' , apa ' mporata kaparia wo ' o - moko - koiwo hewa to kirata kai ' . Jadi ' , ane Alata ' ala mporohoi nono - kai hi rala kaparia - kai , bate narohoi wo ' o - koiwo nono - ni , bona ntaha - koi hi rala kaparia .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Toe pai ' uma morara ' nono - kai hi koi ' , ki ' inca bate ntaha mpu ' u - koi hi rala kaparia . Apa ' ki ' inca kamporata - ni kaparia hibalia hante kai ' , pai ' Alata ' ala bate mporohoi nono - ni hibalia hante kai ' .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , bona ni ' inca , gaga rahi kasusaa ' to mporumpa ' - kai wengi hi propinsi Asia . Motomo lia kasusaa ' toe , meliu ngkai pakulea ' - kai , alaa - na mere ' - mi nono - kai , ki ' uli ' olo ' mpobira ' - kai tuwu ' .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Ki ' uli ' : " Bate mate mpu ' u - ta mpai ' tohe ' i - e . " Aga tohe ' e majadi ' bona neo ' - kai ncarumaka karohoa - kai moto , ncarumaka Alata ' ala - wadi - kai , apa ' Hi ' a - mi to mpotuwu ' tomate .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Jadi ' , ompi ' - ompi ' , nabahaka mpu ' u - makai ngkai kasusaa ' to gaga toe wengi , duu ' - na uma - waka - kaiwo mate . Pai ' bate nabahaka wo ' o - kai mpai ' ngkai kasusaa ' to majadi ' tempo toi - e . Pai ' kisarumaka nabahaka - kai ngkai kasusaa ' to majadi ' hi eo - eo to rata .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Pai ' koi ' wo ' o ompi ' kana mpohorongko - kai hante posampaya - ni . Apa ' ane wori ' tauna mposampayai - kai , Alata ' ala bate mpogane ' - kai , alaa - na wori ' tauna mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Bohe nono - kai ompi ' , apa ' ki ' inca kamoroli ' mpontolumanu ' - na nono - kai . Monoa ' po ' ingku - kai hi hawe ' ea tauna , peliu - liu - nami po ' ingku - kai hi koi ' . Hawe ' ea to kibabehi , uma ria to kiwunii ' , monoa ' patuju - kai , bate ntuku ' konoa Alata ' ala . Po ' ingku - kai uma ntuku ' kapantea manusia ' , mo ' ingku - kai ntuku ' petulungi - na Alata ' ala hi kai ' .

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Napa to ki ' uki ' - kokoi , to monoto - na nibasa , ni ' inca pai ' nipaha - wadi . Ria moto - mokoi hantongo ' to mpopaha patuju - kai , aga ria wo ' o - pidi to ko ' ia mpopaha . Jadi ' , kusarumaka koi ' omea mpai ' mpopaha patuju - kai , bona ane rata - ipi mpai ' Pue ' - ta Pue ' Yesus , bohe nono - ni sabana kai ' , hewa kai ' wo ' o bohe nono - kai sabana koi ' .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' ku ' uli ' ni ' inca mpu ' u ihi ' nono - kue , toe pai ' ria patuju - ku wengi mpencuai ' - koi rongkani , bona mporata wo ' o - koi rasi ' rongkani . Patuju - ku wengi , ke tilou ncala ' - a mpencuai ' - koi hi pomako ' - ku tumai hi Makedonia , pai ' ane nculii ' - apa mpai ' ngkai rei , kupehanii wo ' o - koi , bona nitulungi - a hi pomakoa ' - ku hilou hi Yudea .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Aga mobali ' - mi patuju - ku toe - e wengi . Ha ni ' uli ' wae , uma monoa ' tipa ' - kue ? Ha ni ' uli ' kubabehi patuju - ku ntuku ' kadota - ku moto , hangkani mpo ' uli ' " Io ' , " hampegoli mpo ' uli ' - a " Uma " ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Uma - e ' waetu ompi ' ! Hewa janci Alata ' ala hi kita ' monoa ' , wae wo ' o lolita - kai hi koi ' ompi ' monoa ' . Uma ki ' uli ' hangkani " Io ' " hangkani " Uma . "

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Apa ' kai ' Silas pai ' Timotius , kiparata - kokoi kareba ngkai Yesus Kristus , Ana ' Alata ' ala . Pai ' Yesus Kristus toei , uma mobali ' - bali ' patuju - na hi kita ' , hangkani mpo ' uli ' " Io ' " hangkani " Uma . " Bate monoa ' patuju - na hi kita ' .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Apa ' uma mowo kawori ' janci - na Alata ' ala hi kita ' , pai ' hawe ' ea janci - na toe bate madupa ' omea sabana posidaia ' - ta hante Yesus Kristus . Toe pai ' ane mpo ' une ' - ta Alata ' ala , ta ' uli ' - mi : " Amin ! Bate wae mpu ' u ! " apa ' bate madupa ' mpu ' u janci Alata ' ala hi kita ' sabana Yesus Kristus .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Alata ' ala moto - mi to mporohoi - ta omea , lompe ' kai ' lompe ' koi ' ompi ' , bona mosidai ' - ta hante Kristus . Tungkai ' napelihi - tamo jadi ' bagia - na ,

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: pai ' nawai ' - ta Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hewa pompetonoi - na kakita ' - nami bagia - na . Inoha ' Tomoroli ' toei hewa saa ' Alata ' ala hi rala nono - ta , to mporohoi pojanci - na hi kita ' , bona monoa ' hi kita ' kanawai ' - ta hawe ' ea to najanci - mitaka hi eo mpeno - na .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , uma - a boa ' , Alata ' ala sabi ' - ku . Na ' inca ihi ' nono - ku , ka ' uma - ku oko tilou hi Korintus wengi apa ' uma - a dota karapo ' rahi mpoparesai ' - koi .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Uma - kai dota mpohawai ' ntarurua ' - koi , apa ' moroho ami ' - mi pepangala ' - ni hi Kristus . Patuju - kai doko ' mobago - kai hangkaa - ngkania hante koi ' , bona goe ' - koi .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Jadi ' , ku ' uli ' agina neo ' - a ulu tilou mpencuai ' - koi , apa ' uma - a dota mpakasusa ' tena nono - ni , hewa to jadi ' nto ' u pencua ' - ku to ri ' ulu - e wengi .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Apa ' ane kupakasusa ' nono - ni , hema lau - damo mpai ' to mpotanta ' u - a ? Uma mpai ' hema , apa ' koi ' to kupakasusa ' nono - nie , koi ' lau - di to ma ' ala mpotanta ' u - a .

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Toe - mile patuju - ku mpo ' uki ' sura toe - e wengi , bona ane rata mpu ' u - a mpai ' , uma - pi nipakasusa ' nono - ku . Apa ' kakoo - kono - na , koi ' - dile to kana mpakagoe ' nono - kue . Pai ' monoto hi aku ' , ane goe ' - a , koi ' wo ' o mpai ' goe ' .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Nto ' u - ku mpo ' uki ' sura toe wengi , susa ' nono - ku , hewa motomo lia ku ' epe , duu ' - na tudo ' ue mata - ku . Bela patuju - ku mpo ' uki ' sura toe bona mpakasusa ' nono - ni . Ku ' uki ' sura toe bona ni ' inca beiwa kabohe ahi ' - ku hi koi ' .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Jadi ' ane ni ' anu , masala ' mpu ' u - i wengi , tapi ' uma muntu ' aku ' - wadi to napedahi nono - ku . Koi ' wo ' o napedahi nono - ni omea . Aga , bona neo ' wa karapo ' rahi lolita - ku , agina ku ' uli ' ria - koi hantongo ' to napedahi nono - ni .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Kaworia ' - ni hi Korintus , nihuku ' - imi - hawo . Jadi ' , ku ' uli ' - kokoi , hono ' - mi - hawo pehuku ' - ni tetu - e .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Ni ' ampungi pai ' nitanta ' u - imi - hawo . Nee - neo ' mpai ' susa ' rahi na ' epe , alaa - na mere ' - mi nono - na .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Toe pai ' kuperapi ' bona nipopohiloi - i - hawo ahi ' - ni .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Hi rala sura - ku to ri ' ulu wengi , kuhubui - koi mpohuku ' - i . Patuju - ku mpo ' uki ' sura toe , bona kuponciloi - kokoi ba nituku ' wa hawe ' ea hawa ' - ku ba uma . Pai ' nituku ' mpu ' u - mi hawa ' - ku toe - e wengi .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Aga hewa toe lau , ku ' uli ' agina neo ' - ipi nihuku ' oa ' . Ane ni ' ampungi - imi - hawo , aku ' wo ' o mpo ' ampungi - i . Ane ria mpu ' u sala ' - na hi aku ' , ku ' ampungi - i - kuna . Kristus mpo ' inca ihi ' nono - ku ! Apa ' konoa - ku bona hintuwu ' - koi .

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' agina ta ' ampungi - i - hawo , bona neo ' mpai ' napoka ' alai Magau ' Anudaa ' mposori - ta . Apa ' ta ' inca moto - mi akala - na .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Kakaliliua - na ompi ' , pe ' ongko ' - ku wengi ngkai ngata Efesus , hilou - a mpokeni Kareba Kristus hi ngata Troas . Karata - ku hi Troas , Pue ' mpobea ohea - ku bona mobago - a hi ria .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , uma oa ' rodo nono - ku , apa ' ko ' ia ku ' epei kareba to nakeni Titus ngkai koi ' - e ompi ' . Toe pai ' mpalakana - ama hi ompi ' - ompi ' to hi ria , pai ' kaliliu - ama tumai hi Makedonia toi - e .
