text2: Nabagi - taka rasi ' toe bona hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na rarewai hono ' , bona tapakule ' mpewili ' bago - na pai ' bona kamoroo - rohoa posidaia ' - ta hante Hi ' a pai ' hi himpau ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta hi rala Woto Kristus .

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: Nabagi - taka rasi ' toe , duu ' - na rata mpai ' tempo - na kita ' omea jadi ' hanono lau - ta - damo apa ' kita ' omea mpo ' inca pai ' mpopangala ' Ana ' Alata ' ala . Kamoroo - rohoa pai ' kamonoo - notoa - tamo , duu ' - na uma - pi ria kakuraa ' - ta , hibalia hante Kristus - tamo .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Ane hewa toe - tamo , uma - tapa hewa ana ' - ana ' to jolia rabagiu ba hewa rauniri to nawaro ngolu ' hilou tumai . Uma - tapa katuku ' - tuku ' hinyai ' tudui ' - tudui ' , uma - pi ncaliu ta ' ome ' lolita tauna to doko ' mpobagiu - ta hante akala - ra to mepanawu ' .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Uma - tapa jolia rabagiu apa ' moroho - mi pengkamu - ta hi tudui ' to makono hante nono to ma ' ahi ' . Kamoroo - rohoa pai ' kamonoo - notoa - ta hi butu nyala - na , duu ' - na hibalia - tamo hante Kristus . Kristus toei taponcawa Woo ' - ta ,

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: pai ' kita ' omea rarapai ' - ki bagia ngkai Woto Kristus . Ane hi woto manusia ' , butu nyala bagia - na momeduncu lompe ' pai ' mome ' umpu ' lompe ' bona jadi ' hawoto lau . Wae wo ' o kita ' to mepangala ' hi Kristus : ngkai posidaia ' - ta hante Hi ' a , mosidai ' - tamo hi himpau kita ' . Pai ' ane butu - butu dua - nata hore - hore mpewili ' bago to nabagii - taka Pue ' , kamoroo - rohoa petuku ' - ta hi Pue ' , pai ' katedoo - donihia kahintuwuaa ' - ta hadua bo hadua sabana ahi ' - ta hi himpau kita ' .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Ngkai toe - mi , hante kuasa to nawai ' - ka Pue ' tohe ' i , ku ' uli ' pai ' kuparesai ' - koi hante kanoto - noto - na : neo ' - pi nituku ' po ' ingku tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala , apa ' uma mokalaua pekiri - ra .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Mobengi nono - ra . Uma raratai katuwua ' to ngkai Alata ' ala , apa ' uma mpu ' u ra ' incai tudui ' to makono ngkai Alata ' ala . Uma ra ' incai apa ' ngkai kamotu ' a nono - ra .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Uma - pi ra ' incai me ' ea ' , alaa - na mpotuku ' - ra konoa woto - ra to dada ' a , pai ' rapokono rahi mpobabehi butu nyala gau ' to uma tumotoa .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Hiaa ' koi ' , bela gau ' to hewa toe to natudui ' - kokoi Kristus .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Tantu ni ' epe - mi libu ' - na , pai ' ngkai posidaia ' - ni hante Hi ' a ratudui ' - mokoi tudui ' to makono to tarata ngkai Yesus .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Ratudui ' - mokoi hewa toi : kana nibahakai po ' ingku - ni to ri ' ulu to nituku ' kako ' ia - ni mepangala ' hi Pue ' . Hawe ' ea kahinaa to nituku ' nto ' u toe mpopanawu ' - koi pai ' mpogero katuwu ' - ni .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Ratudui ' - koi mpobahaka po ' ingku - ni to ri ' ulu toe , pai ' mpopebo ' ui nono bo pekiri - ni hi Alata ' ala .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Pai ' ngkai ree babehi - mi po ' ingku to bo ' u , apa ' lawi ' Alata ' ala mpopajadi ' - mokoi manusia ' to bo ' u , to monoa ' pai ' moroli ' mpu ' u , ntuku ' po ' ingku - na Alata ' ala .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' , bahakai mpu ' u - mi po ' ingku - ni to ri ' ulu toe : neo ' - pi moboa ' , agina mpo ' uli ' to monoa ' hi doo , apa ' kita ' omea bagia ngkai Woto Kristus - tamo .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Ane moroe , neo ' roe - ta tohe ' e mpakeni - ta mojeko ' . Neo ' - ta moroe duu ' limpa eo ,

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: bona neo ' mpai ' ria loga - na Magau ' Anudaa ' mposori - ta .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Tauna to biasa manako , neo ' - pi - hawo manako oa ' . Agina mobago - ra hante pale - ra moto mpali ' pongkoni ' - ra , bona ma ' ala - ra mpobagii doo to nakakurai ' .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Neo ' ria lolita to dada ' a howa ' ngkai wiwi - ta . Agina mpohowa ' lolita to mpotulungi pai ' mporohoi nono doo , hewa to masipato ' . Lolita to hewa toe mpokeni kalompea ' hi tauna to mpo ' epe .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Pelompehi po ' ingku - ta bona neo ' mpopedahi nono Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to nawai ' - taka Alata ' ala . Kiwoi - e ' : Inoha ' Tomoroli ' toei hewa saa ' hi rala nono - ta , apa ' Hi ' a to jadi ' pompetonoi - na kakita ' - na bagia - na Alata ' ala . Ngkai karia - na Inoha ' Tomoroli ' hi rala nono - ta toe , monoa ' - mi ta ' inca karata mpai ' tempo - na Alata ' ala mpobahaka mpu ' u - ta ngkai dunia ' to dada ' a toi .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Jadi ' , bahaka - mi hawe ' ea kehi to hewa toi : jolia peda ' nono , moroe pai ' mowuku nono , motuda ' , metipo ' pai ' metuntui ' - - bahaka - mi omea hante hawe ' ea kehi ntani ' - na to dada ' a .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Kana lompe ' nono - ta pai ' momepoka ' ahi ' - ta hadua bo hadua , pai ' mpo ' ampungi sala ' doo , hewa Alata ' ala mpo ' ampungi sala ' - ta sabana posidaia ' - ta hante Kristus .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Jadi ' , lawi ' napo ' ana ' Alata ' ala - tamo pai ' nape ' ahi ' - tamoe , toe pai ' kana tatuku ' kehi Alata ' ala .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Hi po ' ingku - ta eo - eo - na , kana ma ' ahi ' - ta hi doo , hewa Kristus wo ' o mpoka ' ahi ' - ta ; napewai ' woto - na rapatehi bona mpotolo ' - ta . Pobabehi - na toe mpakagoe ' nono Alata ' ala , hewa pepue ' to mohonga to ratonu hi Hi ' a .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Aga neo ' mpu ' u ria to mobualo ' ba to mpobabehi gau ' - gau ' to babo ' ntani ' - na ba to mpokahina anu doo . Gau ' to hewa toe uma natao hi kita ' to napobagia Alata ' ala . Agina to hewa toe neo ' rapotompo ' wiwi hi laintongo ' - ta .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Uma wo ' o natao ane metarahu - ta ba mpohowa ' lolita to uma ria tuju - na ba mpo ' uli ' ore ' - ore ' to uma natao ra ' epe hi tilinga doo . Agina tapake ' wiwi - ta mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Apa ' bona ni ' inca : hema - hema to mobualo ' ba to mpobabehi gau ' to babo ' ntani ' - na ba to mpokahina anu doo , uma ria bagia - ra hi rala Kamagaua ' Kristus pai ' Alata ' ala . Tauna to mogau ' hewa toe , ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' mepue ' - ra hi napa to rapokahina toe .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Jadi ' , neo ' - ta ma ' ala rabagiu hante lolita tauna to doko ' mpohinai - ta mpobabehi gau ' to hewa toe . Bate uma makono lolita - ra toe . Apa ' ngkai gau ' - gau ' to hewa toe , Alata ' ala mpokaroe tauna to uma mengkoru hi Hi ' a .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Jadi ' , neo ' tadohei - ra hi rala pogau ' - ra tohe ' e .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Apa ' owi , mobengi - pidi nono - ni , aga wae lau mobaja - mokoi ngkai posidaia ' - ni hante Pue ' . Jadi ' , mo ' ingku - mokoi hewa tauna to mobaja - mi nono - ra .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Petonoi napa kehi to masipato ' hi poncilo Pue ' . Apa ' ngkai kamobaja nono - ni toe mehupa ' hawe ' ea kehi to lompe ' , to monoa ' pai ' to monoto .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Jadi ' , neo ' tapenau ' gau ' - ra to hi rala kabengia - na - pidi , apa ' uma ria gau ' to lompe ' to mehupa ' ngkai kabengia - na . Agina tapolonto ' lau - mi kadada ' a - na gau ' - ra toe .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Apa ' gau ' - gau ' to rababehi ngkawuni toe , nau ' ralolita - wadi me ' eai ' lia .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Aga ane tauna to dada ' a mpohilo po ' ingku - ni to lompe ' , lonto ' lau - mi kadada ' a po ' ingku - ra hira ' toe , alaa - na rabahakai - mi gau ' - ra to mobengi , pai ' jadi ' mobaja wo ' o - ramo - rawo .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Toe pai ' ria rona ' to mpo ' uli ' : Molike - mokoi toleta ' , Memata - mokoi ngkai kamatea - ni , Pai ' Kristus mpobajahi nono - ni . "

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Toe pai ' kana tapelompehi po ' ingku - ta : neo ' hewa tauna to wojo , agina mo ' ingku - ta hewa tauna to monoto nono - ra .

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Kana tapake ' lompe ' loga to ria hi kita ' , apa ' tempo toi - e dada ' a lia kehi manusia ' .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Toe pai ' neo ' kabua ' - bua ' - na kehi - ta , pekiri lompe ' napa kehi to napokono Pue ' .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Neo ' malangu , apa ' toe - hana mpopehuwu kahinaa to dada ' a . Kana nakuasai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' - tamo . Ngkai kuasa Inoha ' Tomoroli ' toe ,

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: momerohoi ngkanono - ta hante mpoporona ' mazmur , rona ' pe ' une ' pai ' rona ' ntani ' - na to nawai ' - taka Inoha ' Tomoroli ' ; morona ' goe ' - goe ' - ta mpo ' une ' Pue ' hante nono - ta mpu ' u ;

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi oa ' hi Alata ' ala to Tuama hante hanga ' Yesus Kristus Pue ' - ta ngkai butu nyala - na to nawai ' - taka ;

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: pai ' momepengkorui hadua bo hadua hewa pebila ' - ta hi Kristus .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Tobine - tobine , kana mengkoru - koi hi tomane - ni , hewa pengkoru - ni hi Pue ' .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Hewa rapa ' - na hi woto manusia ' , bagia to hi wongko - na mpu ' u , woo ' , pai ' woo ' toe - mi to mpohawai ' woto - na . Wae wo ' o tomane ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki woo ' hi tobine - na , hewa Kristus wo ' o jadi ' Woo ' hi kita ' to mpopangala ' - i . Kita ' to mpopangala ' - i ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki bagia ngkai Woto - na Kristus . Pai ' Hi ' a - mi Magau ' Tompohore - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Jadi ' , hewa kita ' omea mengkoru hi Kristus , wae wo ' o - hawo tobine kana mengkoru hi tomane - na hi butu nyala - na .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Pai ' koi ' - koiwo tomane , kana nipoka ' ahi ' tobine - ni , hewa Kristus mpoka ' ahi ' - ta to mpopangala ' - i , duu ' - na napewai ' woto - na rapatehi bona mpotolo ' - ta .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Hante pobabehi - na toe napatani ' - ta jadi ' bagia - na moto , nabohoi ' - ta ngkai jeko ' hante ue peniu ' pai ' hante lolita - na ,

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: bona kita ' to jadi ' bagia - na toe jadi ' moroli ' pai ' ncola , hante uma ria kasalaia ' ba rugea ' - na , bona natao - ta nakaratai .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Jadi ' , hewa ahi ' - na Kristus hi kita ' toe , wae wo ' o - hawo tomane kana mpoka ' ahi ' tobine - na , hewa pompoka ' ahi ' - na woto - na moto . Hema to mpoka ' ahi ' tobine - na , hewa mpoka ' ahi ' woto - na moto - imi .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Uma - hawo ria tauna to mpokahuku ' woto - na moto . Bate najaga pai ' napewili ' . Wae wo ' o Kristus mpewili ' tauna to mpopangala ' - i .

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: Napewili ' - ta apa ' kita ' to mpopangala ' - i , jadi ' bagia ngkai Woto - natamo .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : " Toe - mi pai ' hadua tomane mpalahii tina tuama - na , pai ' tuwu ' hintuwu ' hante tobine - na , bona hira ' tau rodua toe jadi ' hewa hadua lau - ra - damo . "

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Lolita toi , walatu to monala batua - na . Aga patuju - ku hi rehe ' i , mpotompo ' wiwi - a posidaia ' Kristus hante kita ' ntodea - na .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , bate ria wo ' o kalaua - na hi kita ' omea : butu dua tomane kana mpoka ' ahi ' tobine - na hewa pompoka ' ahi ' - na woto - na moto , pai ' tobine wo ' o - hawo kana mpobila ' tomane - na .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Ana ' - ana ' , tuku ' hawa ' totu ' a - ni hewa kampotuku ' - ni Pue ' , apa ' toe to masipato ' nibabehi .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' parenta toi : " Kana tabila ' tina pai ' tuama - ta . " Ngkai parenta to hampulu ' , lako ' toi - di parenta to ria janci - na .

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: Janci toe : " Ane tabila ' tina pai ' tuama - ta , lompe ' pai ' moloe tuwu ' - ta hi rala dunia ' toi . "

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Pai ' koi ' to tuama , neo ' nipedahi nono ana ' - ni . Pewili ' - ra - dile , tudui ' pai ' paresai ' - ra hante paresa ' to ngkai Pue ' .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' - ku to rapobatua , tuku ' hawa ' maradika - ni hi rala dunia ' toi . Bila ' pai ' pengkorui - ra ngkai kabula nono - ni . Toe nibabehi hewa pengkoru - ni hi Kristus .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Neo ' nibabehi toe nto ' u - na nahilo maradika - ni - wadi bona ngalai ' ra ' une ' manusia ' - wada - koi . Mobago - koi hewa batua Kristus to mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala hante nono mpu ' u .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Mobago hante kagoe ' nono - ni , niponcawa pobago - ni hi Pue ' , uma muntu ' hi manusia ' .

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Penonoi - koi : butu dua tauna to mpobabehi bago to lompe ' bate mporata hiwili - na ngkai Pue ' , lompe ' batua lompe ' to bela - i batua .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Pai ' koi ' - koiwo to ramaradika , wae wo ' o - koiwo kehi - ni hi batua - ni . Neo ' - koiwo nipongasai ' - ra . Apa ' penonoi - koi : koi ' to ramaradika pai ' batua - nie , hadua lau - wadi Pue ' - ni , Hi ' a - mi Pue ' to hi rala suruga . Uma - i - hana mpelence tauna .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Ka ' omea - na ompi ' , kana moroho - ta hante karohoa to tarata ngkai kabaraka ' - na Pue ' , lawi ' mosidai ' - tamo hante Hi ' a .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Henta - mi hawe ' ea rewa mpanga ' e to naporodo - taka Alata ' ala , bona moroho pokore - ta mpo ' ewa akala - akala Magau ' Anudaa ' .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Apa ' hi panga ' e - ta toi - e , uma - ta mpo ' ewa manusia ' . Mpo ' ewa - ta to mokuasa pai ' anu mobaraka ' to uma kahiloa . Mpo ' ewa - ta tadulako - tadulako kabengia to mokuasa hi wongko dunia ' . Mpo ' ewa - ta wori ' nyala seta pai ' anudaa ' to mpokuasai raoa .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Ngkai toe - mi , henta - mi hawe ' ea rewa mpanga ' e to ngkai Alata ' ala , bona ane rata eo panga ' ea , tapakule ' moto mpai ' mpo ' ewa perumpa ' - perumpa ' bali ' , bona rata hi kahudua panga ' ea , bate moroho oa ' pokore - ta .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Jadi ' , pakaroho mpu ' u pokore - ta hante rewa mpanga ' e to ngkai Alata ' ala . Pakaroho petuku ' - ta hi tudui ' to makono , taponcawa salepe ' to taperii hi hope ' - ta bona neo ' - ta lempe ' . Pakanoa ' po ' ingku - ta , taponcawa baju ahe ' to mpetalawai ' woto - ta ngkai pesori .

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Kana sadia - ta mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' to mpopohintuwu ' manusia ' hante Alata ' ala , taponcawa sapatu ' to mpakaroho pokore - ta .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Pai ' hi butu nyala - na kana moroho pepangala ' - ta hi Alata ' ala - wadi . Pepangala ' - ta toe taponcawa kaliawo to tatamaeo ncuu . Hante pepangala ' - ta toe , ma ' ala tajungki ' hawe ' ea rewa mpanga ' e to memoho ' to natoa ' - taka anudaa ' .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Kana tasarumaka Alata ' ala to mpobahaka - tamo ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta . Katebahaka - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta toe taponcawa songko ahe ' to mporohoi - ta bona tida nono - ta . Pai ' Lolita Alata ' ala taponcawa piho ' to ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Pai ' hi rala panga ' e - ni mpo ' ewa Magau ' Anudaa ' toe , mosampaya pai ' mekakae oa ' - koi hi Alata ' ala . Hi butu nyala - na mosampaya - koi ntuku ' petete ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Hi rala posampaya - ni toe , kana mojaga oa ' pai ' neo ' lempe ' , neo ' nibahakai mposampayai hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Pai ' niposampayai wo ' o - a - kuwo , bona nto ' u - ku mololita , Alata ' ala mpowai ' - a pololita to manopa ' , bona bia ' - a mpoparata Kareba Lompe ' to uma ra ' incai manusia ' ngkai owi .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Pue ' Yesus mpo ' ongko ' - a jadi ' suro - na , bona mpokeni - a Kareba Lompe ' , duu ' - na ohe ' i - ama hi rala tarungku ' . Jadi ' , posampayai - a - kuwo bona bia ' - a mpololita Kareba Lompe ' toe hewa to kasipato ' - na .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca kababeiwa - ku pai ' kababeiwa - na pobago - ku , mposuro - a ompi ' - ta Tikhikus tilou , bona hi ' a - damo mpo ' uli ' - kokoi napa omea to majadi ' hi rehe ' i . Tikhikus toei , ompi ' - ta to tape ' ahi ' , pai ' topobago to tida hi rala pobago Pue ' .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Toe pai ' kusuro - i tilou bona mpo ' uli ' - kokoi hi retu kabeiwa - nakai , bona tetanta ' u nono - ni .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Kusarumaka Alata ' ala to Tuama pai ' Pue ' Yesus Kristus mpowai ' kalompea ' tuwu ' hi hawe ' ea ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ku . Kusarumaka Alata ' ala mpodonihii ahi ' - ni pai ' pepangala ' - ni .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Pue ' mpogane ' hawe ' ea tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus hante ahi ' to uma ria ka ' oraa - na .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Sura toi ngkai aku ' Paulus pai ' Timotius , batua Kristus Yesus , kipakatu tilou hi koi ' ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - kai hi rala Kristus Yesus to hi ngata Filipi , duu ' - na hi pangkeni - ni pai ' tauna to mpokamu pobago Pue ' hi laintongo ' - ni .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Wori ' tabe : mekakae - kai hi Alata ' ala Tuama - ta pai ' hi Pue ' Yesus Kristus bona nagane ' - koi ngkai kabula rala - na pai ' nawai ' - koi kalompea ' tuwu ' .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Butu ngkani - na kukiwoi - koi ompi ' , ku ' uli ' oa ' tarima kasi hi Pue ' - ku , Pue ' Alata ' ala .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: Pai ' butu ngkani posampaya - ku , goe ' oa ' nono - ku mposampayai - koi omea .

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: Ku ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Pue ' Alata ' ala , apa ' ngkai lomo ' - na duu ' tempo toi - e nitulungi ncuu - a hi rala bago - ku mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Alata ' ala moto - mi to mobago hi rala nono - ni mpobago bago to lompe ' , pai ' kuparasaya pobago to natepu ' u - mi tetu napokaliliu duu ' - na hudu hi eo karata - na nculii ' Kristus Yesus .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Toto - na lia - a mpoinono - koi omea hewa toe - e ompi ' , apa ' kupoka ' ahi ' - koi , apa ' hampobagoa - ku omea - koi hi rala pobago to nawai ' - ka Alata ' ala toi . Nitulungi ncuu - a , lompe ' bula - ku rala tarungku ' toi - e , lompe ' nto ' u - ku mpo ' uli ' noa ' - ku pai ' mpakanoto kamakono - na Kareba Lompe ' .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Alata ' ala mposabii ' kamakono - na lolita - ku tohe ' i . Lentora mpu ' u - a ngkalentorai - koi omea , pai ' kalentora - ku toi , hewa ahi ' - na Kristus Yesus moto .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Jadi ' , toi - mi pomperapia ' - ku hi Alata ' ala , bona ahi ' - ni katedoo - donihia karoho - na , pai ' tedonihii wo ' o kamonoto nono - ni pai ' pe ' inca - ni mpo ' inca napa to natao nibabehi .

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: Ane hewa toe - mokoi ompi ' , ni ' inca mpu ' u - mi mpelihi napa to meliu kalompe ' - na . Mosampaya - a bona moroli ' katuwu ' - ni hante uma ria kasalaia ' - na hi eo karata - na nculii ' Kristus .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Mosampaya - a bona monoa ' oa ' po ' ingku - ni sabana pobago Yesus Kristus hi rala tuwu ' - ni , alaa - na wori ' tauna mpo ' une ' pai ' mpomobohe Alata ' ala .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Jadi ' , bona ni ' inca ompi ' , nau ' ratarungku ' - a tohe ' i - e , goe ' moto - a , apa ' ngkai karatarungku ' - ku toi , kawoo - woria ' lau - mi tauna to mpo ' epe Kareba Lompe ' .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Tantara to mpodoo tomi magau ' pai ' hawe ' ea tauna hi rehe ' i mpo ' inca karatarungku ' - ku toi apa ' batua Kristus - a .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Wae wo ' o , wori ' - mi ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta to hi rehe ' i terohoi pepangala ' - ra , apa ' rahilo napa to jadi ' hi aku ' bula - ku ratarungku ' , alaa - na uma - rapa me ' eka ' , kabii - biaa ' lau - ramo mpopalele Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Ria wo ' o - ra hantongo ' to ngkeni Kareba Kristus apa ' mohingi ' - ra pai ' doko ' mpo ' ewa - a . Aga ria moto wo ' o - ra hantongo ' to mpokeni Kareba Kristus hante karoli ' nono - ra .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Hira ' mpopalele Kareba Kristus apa ' nakeni ahi ' - ra , apa ' ra ' inca ka ' aku ' - na to na ' ongko ' Alata ' ala jadi ' suro - na to mpakanoto Kareba Lompe ' hi hawe ' ea tauna .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Tapi ' tauna to mohingi ' toera we ' i , mpopalele Kareba Kristus hante patuju to dada ' a , apa ' doko ' mpomobohe hanga ' - ra moto - wadi . Ra ' uli ' - ranale , babehia - ra toe mpodonihii kasusaa ' - ku hi rala tarungku ' .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , uma kutapari . Apa ' nau ' ba beiwa , lompe ' hante patuju to sala ' ba hante patuju to makono , Kareba Kristus bate rapalele ! Toe - mi to mpakagoe ' nono - kue . Pai ' bate goe ' oa ' - a ,

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: apa ' nau ' ba napa mpai ' to jadi ' hi aku ' , ku ' inca hante posampaya - ni ompi ' , pai ' hante petulungi Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to ngkai Yesus Kristus , bate mporata - a mpai ' to lompe ' .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Konoa - ku pai ' to kusarumaka lia , bona neo ' - a mporata ea ' hi pobago - ku toi . Kusarumaka bate bia ' ncuu - a mpo ' uli ' posabi ' - ku - - peliu - liu - nami tempo toi - e - - bona ba tuwu ' ba mate - a , hanga ' Kristus rapomobohe hi rala woto - ku .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Apa ' ane aku ' tuwu ' , Kristus - mile to tuwu ' hi rala tuwu ' - kue . Pai ' nau ' ba mate - a , kurasi ' lia .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Aga ane tuwu ' - a - pada hi dunia ' toi , ma ' ala - a - pidi mpokamu bago to mokalaua . Jadi ' , uma ku ' incai to ' uma - i to kupelihi .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: To ronyala toe mpomediii ' nono - ku . Doko ' lia - a mpalahii dunia ' toi pai ' hilou tida dohe Kristus , apa ' toe to meliu kalompe ' - na .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Aga ane tuwu ' - a - pada hi dunia ' toi , bohe - pi kalaua - na hi koi ' ompi ' , apa ' niparaluu - a - pidi .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Toe monoto lia hi rala nono - ku . Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' , bate tuwu ' - a - pada mpai ' , pai ' kupoka ' ala - pidi tilou mpencuai ' - koi , mpotulungi - koi bona tampai karoho pepangala ' - ni hi Pue ' Yesus pai ' tampai kagoe ' - ni mepangala ' hi Hi ' a .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Jadi ' , ane ria - apa mpai ' nculii ' dohe - ni pai ' nihilo - ama , karoo - rohoa - mi nono - ni mpo ' une ' Kristus Yesus .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Jadi ' , nau ' ba napa to jadi ' hi aku ' , po ' ingku - ni kana to masipato ' hi tauna to mpotuku ' Kareba Lompe ' Kristus . Ba kupohirua ' - pidi - kokoi mpai ' ompi ' ba uma - pi , kusarumaka ku ' epe moto mpai ' kareba to mpo ' uli ' katida pokore - ni , hanono pai ' hintuwu ' - koi mobago bona wori ' tauna mepangala ' hi Kareba Lompe ' .

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Nau ' ba napa - napa to jadi ' , neo ' mpu ' u - koi me ' eka ' hi tauna to mpo ' ewa - koi . Apa ' toe mpakanoto kanahuku ' - ra mpai ' Alata ' ala , pai ' koi ' ompi ' tebahaka ngkai huku ' , apa ' Alata ' ala mpobahaka - koi ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ni .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Neo ' - koi me ' eka ' , apa ' Alata ' ala mpelihi - koi uma muntu ' mepangala ' hi Kristus , tapi ' napelihi wo ' o - koi bona mporata kaparia bona hanga ' Kristus rapomobohe .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Jadi ' hewa toe lau , mporata kaparia mpu ' u - mokoi , hibalia hante kaparia to kurata aku ' toi - e , lompe ' kaparia to nihilo moto - mi bula - ku ria - pidi dohe - ni wengi , lompe ' kaparia to kurata hi rehe ' i - e , hewa to ni ' epe moto - mi .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , ku ' inca katerohoi - na nono - ni apa ' mosidai ' - mokoi hante Kristus . Tetanta ' u - mi nono - ni apa ' napoka ' ahi ' - mokoi . Hintuwu ' - mokoi apa ' ngkai petete ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Momepoka ' ahi ' - koi hadua bo hadua .

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: Bo lawi ' oo mpu ' u - koi , kuperapi ' bona nipakagoe ' mpu ' u - ka nono - ku : tuwu ' hintuwu ' - koi hante ahi ' - ni hibalia , nono - ni hibalia , patuju - ni hibalia .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Neo ' mpomobohe woto - ni moto - wadi , neo ' mpope ' une ' . Agina - pi - hana hore - hore mpakadingki ' nono , ta ' uli ' doo melabi ngkai kita ' .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Neo ' mpenonoi woto - ta moto , pekiri wo ' o katuwu ' doo .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Nono - ni kana hewa nono - na Kristus Yesus :

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Nau ' tuwu ' mpo ' Alata ' ala - i , uma - i mpentaei kahibalia - na hante Alata ' ala .

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: Nabahaka omea - mi tetu , pai ' - i tuwu ' mpobatua . Mewali manusia ' - i hante wotoloka ' manusia ' .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: Pai ' ka ' oti - nai jadi ' manusia ' , mengkadingki ' - imi , pai ' - i mpotuku ' hawa ' Alata ' ala , duu ' - na mate raparika ' hewa hadua tauna to dada ' a .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Toe - mi pai ' Alata ' ala mpo ' ongko ' - i hi pohuraa to molangko lia , pai ' nawai ' - i kuasa to meliu ngkai hawe ' ea kuasa to ntani ' - na ,

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: bona hawe ' ea to tuwu ' mengkoru hi Yesus , lompe ' ihi ' suruga , lompe ' ihi ' dunia ' , lompe ' to hi po ' ohaa ' tomate , hawe ' ea - ra mpai ' mowilingkudu menyompa hi Hi ' a ,

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: pai ' - ra mpangaku ' : Yesus Kristus , Hi ' a - mi Pue ' , alaa - na Alata ' ala to Tuama rapomobohe .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' to kupe ' ahi ' , ku ' inca kampotuku ' - ni hawa ' - ku . Bula - ku ria dohe - ni , nituku ' mpu ' u hawa ' - ku . Jadi ' , peliu - liu - nami tempo toi bula - ku molaa , kuperapi ' bona nipelompehi mpu ' u po ' ingku - ni , hewa to masipato ' hi tauna to nahore Alata ' ala ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra . Mengkoru - mokoi hi Alata ' ala , pai ' poka ' eka ' mpu ' u - koi mpobabehi po ' ingku to dada ' a .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Apa ' Alata ' ala moto - mi to mobago hi rala nono - ni , pai ' alaa - na dota - koi mpotuku ' konoa - na , pai ' nawai ' wo ' o - koi karohoa mpotuku ' konoa - na .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Napa - napa to nibabehi , neo ' ngkunuti ba momehono ' ,

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: bona monoa ' hi hawe ' ea tauna ka ' ana ' - na Alata ' ala mpu ' u - koi , to uma ria kasalaia ' - ni , to tuwu ' moroli ' pai ' uma ria patuju - ni to dada ' a . Hewa betue ' mehini hi rala kabengia - na , wae wo ' o koi ' hi laintongo ' tauna to bengku ' pai ' dada ' a nono - ra ,

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: apa ' niparata - raka Kareba Lompe ' to ngkeni katuwua ' . Ane hewa toe po ' ingku - ni ompi ' , bohe mpai ' nono - ku hi karata - na nculii ' Kristus . Apa ' po ' ingku - ni toe - mi to mpakanoto hawe ' ea bago - ku uma wa bayangi ' , ria moto wua ' - na .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , ngkai lomo ' kakukarebai - nakoi Kareba Lompe ' , mepangala ' - mokoi hi Pue ' Yesus , pai ' nitonu katuwu ' - ni hi Hi ' a bona mpobabehi konoa - na . Jadi ' , nau ' rahuku ' mate mpu ' u - a mpai ' sabana pobago - ku mpokarebai - koi Kareba Lompe ' - e , uma kutapari . Bate mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi oa ' - a hi Alata ' ala , pai ' goe ' - a hangkaa - ngkania hante koi ' .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Kusarumaka wo ' o bona ompi ' - ompi ' motarima kasi pai ' goe ' hangkaa - ngkania hante aku ' .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Ane napokono Pue ' Yesus , ria patuju - ku mpohubui Timotius tilou mpencuai ' - koi , bona ane nculii ' - ipi tumai , tetanta ' u - a mpo ' epe kareba - ni .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Muntu ' Timotius - kuwo to hi rehe ' i to mpohibalia - ki nono - ku pai ' to mpekiri kalompea ' - ni ompi ' .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Ane to ntani ' - ntani ' - naera , mpenonoi woto - ra moto - ra - wadi , uma - ra mpenonoi konoa - na Yesus Kristus .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Aga ane Timotius , nihilo moto - mi - koiwo karoho peparasaya - na . Mobago - i dohe - ku mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' . Kai ' roduaa , hewa ntali ana ' - wadi - kai .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Jadi ' , ane ku ' inca - damo mpai ' kahudua kara - kara - ku , kuhubui - imi tilou mpencuai ' - koi .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Pai ' kusarumaka hante petulungi Pue ' , uma moto - a mahae tilou mpencuai ' - koi .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Sampale - di , ane ompi ' - ta Epafroditus , to mahae - mi nihubui tumai mpongawa ' - a , ku ' uli ' agina kuhubui lau - imi tilou nculii ' hi koi ' . Kai ' rodua hewa tantara to hampanga ' ea , apa ' hampobagoa - kai hi rala pobago Pue ' , pai ' natulungi - a hi rala kaparia - ku .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Lentora lia - imi hi koi ' omea ompi ' , pai ' susa ' nono - na , meka ' ba lue ' ni ' epe - mi kapeda ' - na wengi .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Peda ' mpu ' u - idi , neo ' napomate - ki . Tapi ' mo ' uri ' nculii ' - imi apa ' Alata ' ala mpoka ' ahi ' - i - - aga uma muntu ' hi ' a , aku ' wo ' o napoka ' ahi ' , apa ' ane ke mate mpu ' u - i wengi , ke katedoo - donihia - mi kasusaa ' - ku .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' agina kupesahui mpohubui - i nculii ' tilou , bona ane hirua ' - pokoi , tetanta ' u - mokoi , pai ' aku ' hi rehe ' i monu - mi nono - ku .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Wae - pi , tarima - imi hi rala hanga ' Pue ' hante kagoe ' nono - ni . Bila ' wo ' o hawe ' ea tauna to mpohibalia - ki nono - na .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Ngkai pobago - na mpobago - ki Kristus , neo ' mate lia - i . Uma - i mpenonoi woto - na moto , apa ' doko ' - i nipopale hi rehe ' i mpotulungi - a .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Wae - pi ompi ' - ompi ' , kana goe ' - koi apa ' lawi ' mosidai ' - mokoi hante Pue ' .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi hi tauna to mpokeni tudui ' to dada ' a , kehi - ra hewa dike ' to mau . Doko ' - ra mpewuku - koi ratini ' ntuku ' Atura Musa . Neo ' - ra nipangalai ' ! Apa ' bela ngkai karatini ' - ta pai ' - ta jadi ' monoa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Kita ' toi - mile to monoa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala - e , kita ' to mpopue ' - i ngkai petete ' Inoha ' Alata ' ala , bohe nono - ta apa ' mosidai ' - tamo hante Kristus Yesus . Uma - ta ncarumaka ada to kahiloa - wadi bona ngalai ' jadi ' monoa ' - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Kakono - na , aku ' wo ' o ma ' ala mposarumaka ada tetu - e . Ane ria tauna to mpoperaha petuku ' - ra hi ada to kahiloa - wadi , peliu - liu - nami aku ' !

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: Ratini ' - a hi umuru kawalu eo - na ntuku ' Atura Musa . To Yahudi mpu ' u - a , muli to Israel , ngkai posantina - na Benyamin . Kako ' ia - ku mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus , kutuku ' Atura Musa ntuku ' tudui ' to Parisi .

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Nto ' u toe mantata ' mpu ' u petuku ' - ku hi agama Yahudi , duu ' - na ngasa ' - a mposesa ' - ra topetuku ' Yesus . Kutuku ' butu nyala parenta to hi rala Atura Musa , uma ria to kutiboki - na .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Hawe ' ea toe owi ku ' uli ' rasi ' - ku . Tapi ' tempo toi ku ' uli ' mepakarugi - wadi , apa ' muntu ' Kristus - damo to kusarumaka .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Meliu ngkai toe , butu nyala - na ku ' uli ' mepakarugi omea - wadi , apa ' to meliu kalompe ' - na , mpo ' inca - ama Kristus Yesus Pue ' - ku . Jadi ' , kubahaka - mi hawe ' ea to ntani ' - na , kuponcawa momo - damo , bona ma ' ala - a mporata Kristus ,

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: pai ' mposidai ' - ki . Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' kamonoa ' - ku hi poncilo - na , bela ngkai petuku ' - ku hi Atura Musa , tapi ' ngkai pepangala ' - ku hi Kristus . Aku ' jadi ' monoa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala , bela ngkai po ' ingku - ku , tapi ' muntu ' ngkai Alata ' ala - hana , apa ' mepangala ' - a .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Kahinaa - ku mpu ' u , doko ' ku ' inca - i - kuna Kristus , doko ' kurasai baraka ' to mpotuwu ' - i nculii ' ngkai kamatea . Doko ' kurata kaparia hewa to narata , duu ' - na ba mate - a hibalia hante Hi ' a ,

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: bona rapotuwu ' nculii ' wo ' o - a - kuwo mpai ' ngkai kamatea .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , uma ku ' uli ' kakurata - na mpu ' u - mi hawe ' ea toe , duu ' - na moroli ' - ama hante uma - pi ria jeko ' - ku . Uma - kuwo . Aga kuhuduwukui bona kurata hawe ' ea toe , bona jadi ' moroli ' mpu ' u - a - - apa ' toe - mi pai ' napelihi - a Kristus Yesus jadi ' bagia - na .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ompi ' - ku omea , kupangaku ' moto , ko ' ia moroli ' mpu ' u - a hante uma - pi ria jeko ' - ku . Aga hanyala to kubabehi : kulipo ' - mi hawe ' ea to kutilingkurihi , pai ' kuhuduwukui mperapai to kunyanyohi . Aku ' hewa tauna to motanta ' mokeno : uma kupe ' ili ' to hi tilingkuria - ku , mokeno ncuu - a mperapai to kutoa ' . Kuhuduwukui mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala , bona mporata - a mpai ' parasee pedagia to nawai ' - ka hi suruga - - apa ' toe - mi pai ' nakio ' - a jadi ' mosidai ' hante Kristus Yesus .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Jadi ' , kita ' to monoto - mi petuku ' - ta hi Pue ' , kana hanono lau - ta mo ' ingku hewa to ku ' uli ' we ' i . Aga ane ria - koi to mosisala - pidi pekiri - ni ngkai pekiri - ku , Alata ' ala moto mpai ' to mponotohi - koi .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Sampale - di , napa - hawo to ta ' inca - mi , toe to kana tatuku ' .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Ompi ' - ku omea , kuperapi ' bona nipenau ' po ' ingku - ku . Bula - kai ria dohe - ni , kipopohiloi - mokoi kehi to lompe ' . Petonoi pai ' penonoi tauna to mpotuku ' po ' ingku - kai toe .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Apa ' hewa to jau - mi ku ' uli ' - kokoi - - pai ' ku ' uli ' tena wae lau hante kageo ' - ku - - wori ' - ramo tauna to dada ' a gau ' - ra . Hante gau ' - ra toe , mposapuaka - ra patuju - na Kristus mate raparika ' .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Tauna to hewa toe bate mporata silaka hi rala naraka . Konoa woto - ra moto , toe - mi to rapue ' . Gau ' - ra to me ' eai ' , toe - mi to rapomobohe - ki nono - ra . Katuwu ' - ra to hi dunia ' toi , toe - wadi to rapoinono .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Aga kita ' ompi ' , uma ma ' ala hewa toe gau ' - ta , apa ' ihi ' ngata suruga - ta - tana . Ngkai ria mpai ' katumaia - na Magau ' Tompohore - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta , Pue ' Yesus Kristus . Hi ' a - mi to takalentorai pai ' to tapopea .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Ane tumai - ipi mpai ' , wotoloka ' - ta to lente toi , nabalii ' bona hibalia hante woto - na to uma mowo kabaraka ' - na . Ma ' ala - hana nababehi toe , apa ' meliu kuasa - na ngkai hawe ' ea kuasa to ntani ' - na . Hante kuasa - na toe , napopengkoru butu nyala - na to ria .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' to kupe ' ahi ' pai ' to kukalentorai : pakaroho mpu ' u - mi pokore - ni mpopangala ' Pue ' . Koi ' - die ompi ' kabohea nono - kue pai ' to mpakagoe ' nono - ku .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Ompi ' - ku Euodia pai ' ompi ' - ku Sintikhe ! Kuperapi ' bona hintuwu ' - koi hewa to masipato ' hi tauna to mepangala ' hi Pue ' .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Pai ' kuperapi ' hi iko , Sunsugus , ema ' - ku to tida , tulungi - ra - rawo tobine to rodua toera , bona neo ' - rapa mosisala . Bula - ku hi retu - pidi dohe - ni , mobago ntomo - ra mpodohei - a mpopalele Kareba Lompe ' , hante Klemens pai ' wo ' o doo - doo hampobagoa - ku to ntani ' - na . Hanga ' - ra ria omea te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Katuwua ' .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , kana goe ' oa ' - koi , apa ' mosidai ' - mokoi hante Pue ' . Hangkani - pi ku ' uli ' : pakagoe ' ncuu nono - ni .

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Kusarumaka hawe ' ea tauna mpohilo kalompe ' nono - ni . Kiwoi - e ' , uma - pi mahae rata Pue ' !

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Neo ' mpokakoro ' ba napa - napa . Hi butu nyala - na tida oa ' - koi mosampaya , mekakae , merapi ' hi Alata ' ala , pai ' mpo ' uli ' oa ' tarima kasi .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Ane nitonu kakoroa ' - ni hi Alata ' ala , nawai ' - koi kalompea ' to meliu ngkai pekiri manusia ' , alaa - na rodo - mi nono - ni pai ' pekiri - ni hi posidaia ' - ni hante Kristus Yesus .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Ka ' omea - na ompi ' , kuperapi ' bona nipenonoi oa ' napa - napa to lompe ' pai ' to natao ra ' une ' . Napa to makono , napa to masipato ' , napa to monoa ' , napa to moroli ' , napa to ncola , pai ' napa to lompe ' ra ' epe doo , toe - mi to nipenonoi .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Napa to nipenau ' ngkai aku ' , lompe ' tudui ' - ku to ni ' epe - mi pai ' to nitarima , duu ' - na gau ' - ku to nihilo moto - mi , toe - mi to nibabehi . Ane hewa toe - pi kehi - ni , Alata ' ala mpodohei - koi pai ' mpakarodo nono - ni .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Goe ' lia nono - ku ompi ' , pai ' - a mpo ' une ' Pue ' , apa ' nau ' mahae - tamo mogaa ' , nipakatu wo ' o - mi petulungi - ni hi aku ' . Uma - le ku ' uli ' ba uma - apa nikiwoi . Nikiwoi oa ' - a , ka ' uma - na ria loga - ni - wadi mpotulungi - a .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Pai ' ku ' uli ' toe , uma patuju - ku mpo ' uli ' karia - na kakuraa ' - ku . Apa ' kupobiasa moto - mi tuwu ' goe ' hante napa to ria .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Ku ' inca tuwu ' hi anu hangkedi ' , ku ' inca wo ' o tuwu ' hi anu to melabi . Nau ' ba napa - napa to mporumpa ' - a , ku ' inca oa ' mpakagoe ' nono - ku - - nto ' u bohu nto ' u mo ' oro ' , wori ' ba hangkedi ' , nakariai ba nakakurai ' .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Kupakule ' oa ' mponyanyo butu to merumpa ' , apa ' Kristus mporohoi nono - ku .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Aga nau ' wae , lompe ' lia nono - ni ompi ' mpotulungi - a hi rala kasusaa ' - ku tohe ' i - e .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' to Filipi ! Lomo ' pompohawu ' - ku Kareba Lompe ' hi ngata - ni , pai ' - a me ' ongko ' ngkai propinsi Makedonia , uma ria to Kristen hi ngata ntani ' - na to mpopakatui - a doi . Muntu ' koi ' - wadi ompi ' to mpohorongko - a nto ' u toe , hewa to ni ' inca moto - mi ompi ' .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Pai ' uma muntu ' toe , nto ' u - ku hi ngata Tesalonika - pidi , ria kakuraa ' - ku , ba hangkuja ngkani - mokoi mpakatui - a ba napa - napa .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Pai ' ku ' uli ' toe , uma kadoko ' - ku mporata pewai ' - wadi . Konoa - ku mpu ' u , bona ngkai kalompe ' nono - ni toe - e , katedoo - donihia pegane ' Alata ' ala hi koi ' ompi ' .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Jadi ' bona ni ' inca : hawe ' ea to nipakatu , kutarima - mi , kudoa omea - mi ngkai Epafroditus . Pakatu - ni toe mpohonoi ' pai ' melabi - mi ngkai to kuparaluu . Pewai ' - ni toe hewa anu mohonga to nipopepue ' hi Alata ' ala . Napokono lia , pai ' goe ' nono - na mpodoa .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Uma bisa kuhiwili kalompe ' nono - ni ompi ' . Alata ' ala to kupue ' , Hi ' a - damo to mpakagana hawe ' ea kaparaluua - ni , ntuku ' ka ' uaa ' - na to uma mowo kabohe - na , hi posidaia ' - ni hante Kristus Yesus .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Une ' - mi Alata ' ala Tuama - ta duu ' kahae - hae - na . Amin .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Parata - ka - kuwo tabe - ku hi hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Kristus Yesus to hi retu . Doa wo ' o - koi tabe ngkai ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ni to dohe - ku hi rehe ' i .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Yesus to hi ngata rehe ' i , nte hira ' to hi tomi magau ' , mpakatu tabe hi koi ' ompi ' .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus mpogane ' - koi omea . Hudu rei - mi .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Sura toi ngkai aku ' Paulus , to na ' ongko ' Alata ' ala jadi ' suro Kristus Yesus ntuku ' konoa - na , pai ' ngkai Timotius , ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: kipakatu tilou hi koi ' ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - kai to hi Kolose , to napobagia - mi Alata ' ala pai ' to mepangala ' - mi hi Kristus . Wori ' tabe : mekakae - kai hi Alata ' ala Tuama - ta , kiperapi ' bona nagane ' - koi ngkai kabula rala - na pai ' nawai ' - koi kalompea ' tuwu ' .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Butu ngkani - na kiposampayai - koi , mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi oa ' - kai hi Alata ' ala Tuama - na Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus ,

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: apa ' ki ' epe - mi kareba to mpo ' uli ' kamepangala ' - nimi hi Kristus Yesus pai ' kama ' ahi ' - ni hi hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Kristus Yesus .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Mepangala ' pai ' ma ' ahi ' - koi hewa toe , apa ' ncarumaka Alata ' ala - mokoi , nipopea napa to natimamahi - kokoi hi suruga , hewa to ni ' epe moto - mi hi rala Kareba Lompe ' to raparata - kokoi . Kareba Lompe ' toe , makono mpu ' u - hana ,

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: pai ' tetolele - mi hi humalili ' dunia ' , alaa - na kawoo - woria ' - mi tauna to mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus duu ' - na mpobabehi - ramo po ' ingku to lompe ' . Wae wo ' o to jadi ' hi koi ' - e ompi ' . Kampo ' epe - ni Kareba Lompe ' toe , mepangala ' - mokoi hi Pue ' Yesus , duu ' - na ni ' inca mpu ' u - mi kabula rala - na Alata ' ala .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Ni ' epe Kareba Lompe ' toe ngkai Epafras , doo hampobagoa - kai to kipoka ' ahi ' . Epafras toei , batua Kristus to tida mobago mpotulungi - koi .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Hi ' a to mpo ' uli ' - kakai kanipoka ' ahi ' - ra hawe ' ea topetuku ' Pue ' Yesus sabana baraka ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Jadi ' , ompi ' - ompi ' , ngkai lomo ' kaki ' epe - na kareba to mpokahangai ' - koi , kiposampayai ncuu - mokoi . Mekakae - kai hi Alata ' ala , kiperapi ' bona nawai ' - koi kanotoa nono pai ' pe ' inca mpo ' inca hawe ' ea konoa - na ,

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: bona po ' ingku - ni masipato ' hi tauna to mpotuku ' Pue ' , pai ' hawe ' ea kehi - ni mpakagoe ' nono - na . Mosampaya - kai , bona nipobago butu nyala pobago to lompe ' , pai ' bona katedoo - donihia noto - ni mpo ' inca Alata ' ala .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Merapi ' - kai hi Alata ' ala bona narohoi nono - ni hante hawe ' ea kuasa - na , ntuku ' kabaraka ' - na to uma mowo kabohe - na , bona ntaha pai ' tari oa ' - koi , nau ' ba napa - napa to mporumpa ' - koi .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Mosampaya - kai bona goe ' oa ' nono - ni mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Tuama - ta , apa ' Hi ' a - mi to mpo ' ongko ' - koi jadi ' ana ' - na , alaa - na masipato ' - koi mporata bagia hangkaa - ngkania hante hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na to mobaja .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Nabahaka - tamo ngkai kuasa kabengia - na , pai ' - ta napajadi ' ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' Ana ' - na to nape ' ahi ' .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Ana ' - na toe - imi to jadi ' tolo ' woto - ta , bona te ' ampungi jeko ' - ta .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Alata ' ala , uma - i kahiloa . Aga ane ta ' inca kehi pai ' baraka ' - na Ana ' - na , ta ' inca - mi kehi pai ' baraka ' - na Alata ' ala . Ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' , Ana ' - na toe - imi to Ulumua ' , apa ' meliu kuasa - na ngkai hawe ' ea to napajadi ' Alata ' ala .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Apa ' Hi ' a - mi to napopale Alata ' ala mpopajadi ' hawe ' ea to ria , lompe ' to hi suruga lompe ' to hi dunia ' , to kahiloa pai ' to uma kahiloa . Hawe ' ea mala ' eka pai ' karampua , hawe ' ea anu mobaraka ' pai ' to mokuasa - - hawe ' ea - na napajadi ' hante baraka ' - na pai ' ntuku ' konoa - na .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Kako ' ia - na ria napa - napa , mpolia ' ria - imi - hana . Pai ' hawe ' ea to ria nakuasai pai ' napewili ' hante baraka ' - na .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Kita ' to mepangala ' hi Kristus ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki woto - na , pai ' Kristus woo ' - ta . Hewa woo ' mpokuasai woto , wae wo ' o Hi ' a mpokuasai hawe ' ea tauna to mepangala ' hi Hi ' a . Pai ' Hi ' a - mi to mpowai ' - ta katuwua ' to bo ' u , apa ' Hi ' a - mi to Ulumua ' , batua - na , to lomo ' - na tuwu ' nculii ' ngkai kamatea . Alaa - na , Hi ' a - mi to poko - na ngkai hawe ' ea to ria .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Ane ta ' inca - i Ana ' Alata ' ala toei , ta ' inca - imi Alata ' ala , apa ' Alata ' ala mpobotuhi bona hawe ' ea kehi pai ' baraka ' - na , ria wo ' o hi Ana ' - na toei hante uma ria kakuraa ' - na .

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: Alata ' ala mpohubui Ana ' - na tumai mate hi kaju parika ' , bona hawe ' ea to ria rapopohintuwu ' nculii ' hante Hi ' a , lompe ' to hi dunia ' lompe ' to hi suruga . Kamate - na Yesus hi kaju parika ' toe - mi to mpopohintuwu ' hawe ' ea - na hante Alata ' ala .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Owi - koi ompi ' , molaa - koi ngkai Alata ' ala . Nipobali ' - ki apa ' dada ' a nono - ni pai ' po ' ingku - ni .

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: Aga tempo toi , ngkai kamate Ana ' - na , hintuwu ' - mokoi hante Alata ' ala , pai ' napomoroli ' - mokoi duu ' - na uma - pi ria kasalaia ' - ni ba kakuraa ' - ni hi poncilo - na .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' , tida - mokoi mepangala ' , neo ' mogego ' , neo ' nipelele ' ba hema - hema to doko ' mpobagiu - koi . Perohoi ngkakamu tudui ' to ni ' epe - mi . Neo ' nibahakai ncarumaka napa to najanci - kokoi Alata ' ala hi rala Kareba Lompe ' . Kareba Lompe ' toe , rapalele - mi hi humalili ' dunia ' . Pai ' aku ' , jadi ' pahawaa ' Pue ' wo ' o - ama - kuwo , mpopalele Kareba toe .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Hewa toe lau ompi ' , goe ' moto - a mpokolo kaparia sabana pobago - ku mpotulungi - koi . Apa ' ria - pidi kaparia to kana kutodohaka sabana pobago - ku hi Kristus , pai ' kaparia to kurata tempo toi , kurata sabana pobago - ku hi hawe ' ea topepangala ' hi Kristus . Kita ' omea to mepangala ' hi Kristus ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki woto - na .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Alata ' ala mpo ' ongko ' - a jadi ' pahawaa ' - na , nasarumaka - ka aku ' bago toi , bona aku ' - mi to mpoparata hawe ' ea Lolita - na hi koi ' to bela - koi to Yahudi .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Alata ' ala doko ' mpopo ' incai hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na beiwa kalompe ' patuju - na hi koi ' to bela - koi to Yahudi . Patuju - na toe : bona Kristus mo ' oha ' hi rala nono - ni , bona monoa ' kamporata - ni kabohea tuwu ' dohe Alata ' ala . Patuju - na Alata ' ala toe mo ' atu - atu mpae - mi ko ' ia ra ' incai manusia ' . Tapi ' hewa toe lau patuju - na toe rapakanoto - mi hi hawe ' ea tauna to napobagia .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Jadi ' , Kareba Kristus toe - mi to kipalele hi hawe ' ea tauna , ntuku ' hawe ' ea kanotoa nono - kai . Kiparesai ' pai ' kitudui ' - ra , pai ' kitete ' - ra butu dua - na , bona ane rata - kai hi nyanyoa Alata ' ala , ma ' ala kikeni - ra butu dua - na hi Hi ' a hante uma ria kakuraa ' - ra , apa ' mosidai ' - ramo hante Kristus .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Toe - mi pai ' mobago ntomo - ae , kuhuduwukui mpokamu bago - ku , ntuku ' karohoa to nawai ' - ka Kristus , apa ' moroho mpu ' u kabaraka ' - na hi rala katuwu ' - ku .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Jadi ' , doko ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi beiwa katomo pobago - ku hi hawe ' ea tauna to ko ' ia mpohiloi - a , lompe ' koi ' to hi Kolose , lompe ' hira ' to hi Laodikia .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi toe , bona terohoi nono - ni omea pai ' momepoka ' ahi ' - koi , duu ' - na hintuwu ' - mokoi . Konoa - ku , bona monoto mpu ' u nono - ni mpopaha patuju - na Alata ' ala to ko ' ia ra ' incai manusia ' ngkai owi . Konoa - ku , bona ni ' inca patuju - na Alata ' ala toe hante uma ria kamoraraa ' - na - - batua - na , bona ni ' inca - imi Kristus .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Apa ' Kristus toe - imi kunci to mpobea - taka hawe ' ea pe ' inca pai ' kanotoa nono - na Alata ' ala to tewuni .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Patuju - ku mpo ' uli ' - kokoi toi - e , bona neo ' - koi ma ' ala rabagiu tauna hante lolita - ra to mpo ' oluhi - koi .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Apa ' nau ' molaa - a ngkai koi ' , hi rala nono - ku ria moto - a dohe - ni . Pai ' goe ' lia - a mpo ' epe kahintuwua ' - ni pai ' katida pepangala ' - ni hi Kristus .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , lawi ' nitarima - imi Kristus Yesus jadi ' Pue ' - ni , wae - pi po ' ingku - ni butu eo - na kana mpotuku ' konoa - na , apa ' mosidai ' - mokoi hante Hi ' a .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Pakatiri pai ' pakatida nono - ni hi Hi ' a , pakatede ' pepangala ' - ni , hewa to oti - mi ratudui ' - kokoi . Pai ' hi rala nono - ni mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi oa ' - koi hi Alata ' ala .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Pelompehi - koi , bona neo ' mpai ' ria tauna to mpobagiu - koi pai ' mpewuku - koi mpotuku ' tudui ' agama to uma makono pai ' to uma ria kalaua - na . Apa ' tudui ' - ra toe , tudui ' to mehupa ' ngkai pekiri manusia ' - wadi , ratudui ' - koi mpotuku ' ada pai ' atura to mpokahangai ' dunia ' toi - wadi . Tudui ' - ra toe uma ngkai Kristus .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Jadi ' , neo ' - koi ma ' ala rabagiu , apa ' hi rala woto - na Kristus hawe ' ea kehi pai ' baraka ' Alata ' ala mo ' oha ' hante uma ria kakuraa ' - na .

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: Hi ' a - mi to meliu kamokuasa - na ngkai hawe ' ea kuasa pai ' hawe ' ea baraka ' . Jadi ' , ane mosidai ' hante Kristus - ta - damo , hono ' - mi , uma - pi ria kakuraa ' - ta .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Ngkai posidaia ' - ta hante Kristus , ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' ratini ' - tamo . Karatini ' - ta toe , bela petini ' to rababehi manusia ' , tapi ' petini ' hi rala nono - ta to nababehi Kristus . Batua - na , nabahaka - tamo ngkai kuasa jeko ' to hi rala nono - ta .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Nto ' u karaniu ' - ta hi rala hanga ' Kristus , ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' mate pai ' ratana wo ' o - ta hangkaa - ngkania hante Kristus . Pai ' nto ' u karaniu ' - ta hi rala hanga ' Kristus toe , ma ' ala ta ' uli ' rapotuwu ' nculii ' wo ' o - tamo hangkaa - ngkania hante Hi ' a , sabana pepangala ' - ta hi baraka ' Alata ' ala to mpopotuwu ' - i nculii ' ngkai kamatea .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Ri ' ulu , kako ' ia - ni mepangala ' hi Kristus , hewa to mate - pidi - koi , apa ' mpotiboki - koi hawa ' - na Alata ' ala , pai ' uma - koi ratini ' ntuku ' ada agama Yahudi apa ' bela - koi to Yahudi . Aga nau ' wae , koi ' to ri ' ulu hewa to mate sabana jeko ' - nie , napotuwu ' nculii ' - mokoi hangkaa - ngkania hante Kristus ngkai posidaia ' - ni hante Hi ' a , pai ' na ' ampungi - mi hawe ' ea petiboki - ni .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Ane kakono - na , masala ' omea - ta pai ' natao rahuku ' pai ' - ta ragaa ' ngkai Alata ' ala , apa ' mpotiboki - ta atura - na . Tapi ' ngkai kamate - na Yesus hi kaju parika ' , Alata ' ala mpopori hawe ' ea petiboki - ta , pai ' nabahaka - tamo ngkai atura to tatiboki toe , alaa - na uma - tapa oko rahuku ' .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Nto ' u Kristus rapatehi hi kaju parika ' , nadagi - mi hawe ' ea anudaa ' to mokuasa pai ' to mobaraka ' , pai ' napalele pedagia - na toe hante kanoto - noto - na .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , ria tauna to doko ' mpewuku - koi mpotuku ' ada agama - ra . Rasalai ' - koi apa ' uma nituku ' palia hi pongkoni ' pai ' hi ponginu . Rasalai ' - koi apa ' uma nituku ' ada eo bohe agama Yahudi , hewa eo bohe wula bo ' u ba palia mobago hi Eo Sabat . Neo ' nipangalai ' tauna toera ,

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: apa ' hawe ' ea ada pai ' atura toe - e lau , hewa walatu - wadi . Alata ' ala mpowai ' atura toe owi , bona mpowalatu kalompea ' to rata ngkabokoa ' . Kristus , Hi ' a - mi kadupa ' - na walatu toe - e .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Jadi ' , ane ria tauna to mposalai ' - koi apa ' uma nituku ' tudui ' - ra , neo ' nipangalai ' - ra . Ra ' uli ' tauna toera , ria inca - ra apa ' ria - ra to mpohilo pangila . Ra ' uli ' uma - koi mpai ' natarima Alata ' ala ane uma - koi mpakadingki ' nono - ni pai ' mponyompa mala ' eka . Neo ' nipelele ' tauna toera mposalai ' - koi . Molangko nono - ra hante uma ria huraa - ra , apa ' tudui ' - ra toe mehuwu ngkai nono - ra moto to mpopekiri dunia ' toi - wadi .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Tauna toera uma - pi ngkakamu tudui ' to mparipoko Kristus - - hiaa ' bo Kristus toe - idi to taponcawa woo ' - tae . Kita ' omea to mepangala ' hi Kristus ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki woto - na Kristus . Hewa woo ' mpokuasai woto pai ' woto toe rapoposidai ' pai ' rapome ' umpu ' hante ua ' - na , wae wo ' o Kristus mpopohintuwu ' - ta pai ' mpokeni - ta bona kamoroo - rohoa petuku ' - ta hi Hi ' a , ntuku ' konoa Alata ' ala .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Kita ' to mepangala ' hi Kristus , ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' mate - tamo hangkaa - ngkania hante Kristus . Apa ' ngkai posidaia ' - ta hante Hi ' a , tebahaka - tamo ngkai ada pai ' atura to hi dunia ' toi , uma - pi tatuku ' ada pai ' atura toe bona jadi ' monoa ' - ta hi poncilo Alata ' ala . Jadi ' , apa ' mate mpu ' u - tamo hangkaa - ngkania hante Kristus - e , neo ' - pi tapengkorui oa ' atura to wori ' nyala toe , hewa tauna to ko ' ia tebahaka ngkai atura toe .

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: Neo ' - pi tatuku ' atura to mpo ' uli ' : " Neo ' raganga toi ! " " Neo ' rakoni ' tetu ! " " Neo ' rareo toi pai ' tetu ! "

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Atura to hewa toe uma mpokeni kalompea ' hi kita ' , apa ' mpokahangai ' pongkoni ' pai ' rewa to uma tida duu ' kahae - hae - na , rapake ' hangkale ' liu - wadi ka ' omea - na oti . Atura toe mehuwu ngkai hawa ' pai ' tudui ' manusia ' - wadi .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Ane hiloa - nale , lompe ' - damo atura toe , apa ' tauna to mpotuku ' atura toe , hewa to mo ' agama mpu ' u - ra : mpakadingki ' nono - ra , pai ' - ra mpotuku ' ada agama to mposesa ' woto - ra . Hiaa ' kakono - na uma - le ria kalaua - na atura toe - e , apa ' tauna to mpotuku ' atura toe mpotuku ' konoa nono - ra to dada ' a - wadi .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Kita ' to mepangala ' hi Kristus , ma ' ala ta ' uli ' rapotuwu ' nculii ' - tamo hangkaa - ngkania hante Kristus , apa ' Alata ' ala mpowai ' - ta katuwua ' to bo ' u ngkai posidaia ' - ta hante Hi ' a . Jadi ' , apa ' rapotuwu ' nculii ' mpu ' u - tamo hangkaa - ngkania hante Kristus - e , kana tapali ' - mi napa to hi suruga , hi kariaa - na Kristus mohura hi mali ngka ' ana Alata ' ala .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Batua - na : tapenonoi katuwu ' - ta to bo ' u to mosidai ' hante Kristus to hi suruga , neo ' - pi ntora tapenonoi katuwua ' - ta to hi dunia ' - wadi .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Apa ' kita ' toi , ma ' ala ta ' uli ' mate - tamo hangkaa - ngkania hante Hi ' a . Pai ' tarata - mi katuwua ' to bo ' u ngkai Kristus , to mo ' oha ' dohe Alata ' ala hi suruga . Kristus toe - imile to mpowai ' - ta katuwua ' to bo ' u . Tempo toi , ko ' ia - i tahiloi . Tapi ' ane rata nculii ' - i - damo mpai ' , napopehuwu - mi kabohe tuwu ' - na . Pai ' kita ' wo ' o mpai ' ompi ' , rapomobohe wo ' o - ta - tawo hangkaa - ngkania hante Hi ' a .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' mate - tamo hangkaa - ngkania hante Kristus - e , kana tabahaka - mi kehi - ta to mosidai ' hante tuwu ' - ta to ri ' ulu . Neo ' mobualo ' , neo ' mogau ' sala ' ba mpobabehi gau ' - gau ' to uma tumotoa ntani ' - na . Neo ' mpokahina to dada ' a , neo ' mpokahina anu doo . Apa ' tauna to mogau ' hewa toe , ma ' ala ta ' uli ' mepue ' - ra hi napa to rapokahina toe .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Pai ' Alata ' ala bate mpokaroe tauna to mpotiboki hawa ' - na .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Ri ' ulu , kako ' ia - ni mengkoru hi Alata ' ala , bate toe - mi gau ' - ni .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Tapi ' tempo toi , tabahaka mpu ' u - mi hawe ' ea kehi to hewa toe . Neo ' moroe , neo ' mowuku nono , neo ' mohuku ' . Neo ' - hawo howa ' ngkai wiwi - ta lolita peruge ' , petuntui ' ba petarahu .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Neo ' moboa ' hi doo . Tabahakai hawe ' ea kehi to hewa toe , apa ' tebahaka - tamo ngkai katuwu ' - ta pai ' gau ' - ta to ri ' ulu to tatuku ' kako ' ia - ta mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus ,

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: pai ' tarata - mi katuwua ' to bo ' u , apa ' Alata ' ala mpajadi ' - ta manusia ' to bo ' u . Nabo ' ui ncuu nono - ta bona tatuku ' kehi - na , pai ' bona ta ' inca mpu ' u - mpu ' u - i .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' napajadi ' - tamo manusia ' to bo ' u - e , uma - pi tapoposisala to Yahudi pai ' to bela - ra to Yahudi , apa ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala hibalia - wadi tauna to ratini ' pai ' tauna to uma ratini ' . Uma napelence tauna to mosikola ba to uma mosikola , maradika ba batua . Kristus toe - mi poko - na ngkai hawe ' ea , pai ' Hi ' a - mi to mpo ' ohai ' - ta hawe ' ea .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Alata ' ala mpoka ' ahi ' - ta pai ' napelihi - tamo jadi ' bagia - na to moroli ' . Toe pai ' kana mometulungi - ta pai ' lompe ' nono - ta hadua bo hadua , pakadingki ' nono - ta , paka ' olu kehi - ta , pai ' mosabara hi doo .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Neo ' ntima ' sala ' doo ba mowuku nono hi doo . Ampungi doo to masala ' hi kita ' . Hewa Pue ' mpo ' ampungi sala ' - ta , wae wo ' o kita ' kana mpo ' ampungi doo - ta to masala ' hi kita ' hante karoli ' nono - ta .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
