text2: Meliu ngkai toe , kana momepoka ' ahi ' - ta , apa ' ane momepoka ' ahi ' - ta , hintuwu ' - tamo hante uma ria ruke - na .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Alata ' ala mpokio ' - tamo pai ' napajadi ' - ta hewa hawoto lau hi rala posidaia ' - ta hante Kristus . Jadi ' , neo ' tababehi napa - napa to mpokero kahintuwuaa ' pai ' karodoa nono - ta to ngkai Kristus toe . Pai ' mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi oa ' - ta .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Lolita Kristus kana tapo ' enu ' , tapoluba ' , pai ' tapoinono oa ' . Mometudui ' pai ' momerohoi ngkanono - ta , ntuku ' hawe ' ea kanotoa nono - ta . Mpoporona ' - ta mazmur , rona ' pe ' une ' pai ' rona ' ntani ' - na to nawai ' - taka Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Morona ' - ta ngkai nono - ta mpu ' u mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Napa - napa to tababehi , to talolita , babehi pai ' lolita - mi hi rala hanga ' Pue ' Yesus . Pai ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala to Tuama hi rala hanga ' Pue ' Yesus .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Hawe ' ea to motomanei , mengkoru - koi hi tomane - ni , hewa to masipato ' hi tobine to mpotuku ' Pue ' .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Pai ' koi ' wo ' o tomane , neo ' - koi karapo ' hi tobine - ni , kana nipoka ' ahi ' - ra .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Ana ' - ana ' , tuku ' hawe ' ea hawa ' totu ' a - ni , apa ' toe to masipato ' hi ana ' to mpotuku ' Pue ' , pai ' toe to napokono Pue ' .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Pai ' koi ' to tuama , neo ' nipedahi nono ana ' - ni , bona neo ' mpai ' mere ' nono - ra .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' to tuwu ' batua , tuku ' hawe ' ea hawa ' maradika - ni to hi dunia ' toi . Neo ' nituku ' hawa ' - ra nto ' u - ni rahilo - wadi apa ' kadoko ' - ni ra ' une ' - wadi . Tuku ' hawa ' - ra ngkai kabula nono - ni , hewa pengkoru - ni hi Pue ' .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Napa - napa pobago to rahubui - kokoi , nipobago hante nono mpu ' u , niponcawa pobago - ni hi Pue ' , uma muntu ' hi manusia ' .

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: Penonoi - koi : Pue ' moto mpai ' to mpowai ' - koi hiwili - na , hewa to najanci hi hawe ' ea tauna to napo ' ana ' . Kristus , Hi ' a - mi Maradika - ni , pai ' koi ' - mi batua - na .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Hema - hema to mpobabehi to dada ' a , narata moto mpai ' hiwili bago - na to dada ' a , apa ' Pue ' uma mpelence tauna .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Koi ' to ramaradika , wai ' batua - ni napa to lompe ' pai ' to masipato ' , apa ' ni ' inca moto - mi karia - na Maradika - ni hi suruga .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Tida - koi mosampaya , neo ' nibahakai mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Pai ' kai ' , niposampayai wo ' o - ka - kaiwo , bona nabea - kakai Alata ' ala ohea mpopalele Lolita - na to mpololita patuju - na to napadupa ' Kristus . Patuju - na toe ko ' ia ra ' incai manusia ' ngkai owi , aga hewa toe lau , aku ' - mi to mpopalele Kareba Kristus toe . Toe pai ' ratarungku ' - ama tohe ' i - e .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Jadi ' , posampayai - a - kuwo , bona kupakanoto Kareba Kristus hewa to kasipato ' - na .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Ane niposigalo - raka to uma hampepangalaa ' - ta , pakanoto mpu ' u nono - ni , pai ' pake ' lompe ' loga to ria hi koi ' , nibawai - ra mepangala ' hi Pue ' .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Ane nipololitai - ra , paka ' olu lolita - ni bona mpokeni kalompea ' hi doo . Pai ' pekiri lompe ' bona ni ' inca mpotompoi ' pompekunea ' - ra .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , mposuro - a ompi ' - ta Tikhikus tilou , bona na ' uli ' - kokoi napa omea to jadi ' hi aku ' . Tikhikus toei , ompi ' - ta to tape ' ahi ' , pai ' doo hampobagoa - ku to tida hi rala pobago Pue ' .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Kusuro - i tilou bona ni ' inca kababeiwa - kai , pai ' bona narohoi nono - ni .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Dohe Tikhikus , kusuro wo ' o Onesimus , ompi ' - ta to tape ' ahi ' to tida mepangala ' hi Pue ' , to hingka ngata - ni moto . Hira ' - damo mpai ' to mpo ' uli ' - kokoi hawe ' ea to jadi ' hi rehe ' i .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Aristarkhus , to dohe - ku hi rala tarungku ' , mpakatu tabe - na hi koi ' . Markus ompi ' - na Barnabas , mpakatu wo ' o - i tabe - na . ( Kiwoi - e ' to kuperapi ' wengi : ane rata - ipi mpai ' , nitarima - i hi rala tomi - ni ! )

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Tabe wo ' o ngkai Yesus , to rahanga ' wo ' o Yustus . Ngkai hawe ' ea to Yahudi , to tolu toe - ramo to mobago dohe - ku mpobago bago Kamagaua ' Alata ' ala . Pai ' hira ' - mi - kuwo to mporohoi nono - ku .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Tabe wo ' o ngkai Epafras , batua Kristus Yesus to hingka ngata - ni moto . Mosampaya oa ' - i mpekakae - kokoi nte nono - na mpu ' u , bona moroho pokore - ni pai ' monoto pepangala ' - ni mpotuku ' hawe ' ea konoa Alata ' ala hante uma ria ruke - na .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Kusabii ' moto kamobago ntomo - na mpobago - kokoi to hi Kolose , duu ' - na ompi ' - ta to hi Laodikia pai ' Hierapolis wo ' o .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Tabe wo ' o ngkai Dokter Lukas to tape ' ahi ' , pai ' ngkai Demas .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Parata - kaka - kaiwo tabe - kai hi ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ni to hi ngata Laodikia . Tabe - kai hi Nimfa hante to Kristen to moromu hi rala tomi - na .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Ane oti - mi nibasa sura toi hangkaa - ngkania , kuperapi ' bona nipakatu wo ' o hilou hi to Kristen to hi Laodikia bona rabasa wo ' o - rawo . Pai ' sura - ku to kupakatu hilou hi Laodikia , nibasa wo ' o - koiwo mpai ' .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Uli ' - ki Arkhipus bona naposipolea bago to nawai ' - ki Pue ' !

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Tabe ngkai aku ' Paulus . Ka ' omea sura toi ku ' uki ' hante pale - ku moto . Kiwoi - a - kuwo bula - ku hi rala tarungku ' - pidi toi . Pue ' mpogane ' - koi . Hudu rei - mi .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Sura toi ngkai kai ' tau tolu : Paulus , Silas pai ' Timotius , kipakatu tilou hi koi ' ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - kai to hi Tesalonika , to mepue ' - mi hi Alata ' ala to Tuama pai ' hi Pue ' Yesus Kristus ! Wori ' tabe : mekakae - kai hi Alata ' ala bona nagane ' - koi ngkai kabula rala - na pai ' nawai ' - koi kalompea ' tuwu ' .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Uma - kai putu mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala sabana koi ' ompi ' , pai ' kiporalasampaya oa ' - koi .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Ane mosampaya - kai hi Alata ' ala Tuama - ta , kikiwoi oa ' pobago - ni to nipobago sabana pepangala ' - ni , pai ' kikiwoi wo ' o petulungi - ni hi doo sabana ahi ' - ni , pai ' kikiwoi kantaha - ni hi rala pebalinaia ' apa ' ncarumaka - koi hi karata - na nculii ' Yesus Kristus Pue ' - ta .

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Ki ' inca moto ompi ' , Alata ' ala mpoka ' ahi ' - koi pai ' napelihi - mokoi jadi ' bagia - na .

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: Ki ' inca toe apa ' uma kiparata kareba mara hi koi ' ompi ' . Kareba Lompe ' to kiparata - kokoi toe , kiparata hante baraka ' ngkai Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Pai ' kiparasaya mpu ' u kamakono - na Kareba Lompe ' toe . Ni ' inca moto kehi - kai pai ' petulungi - kai hi koi ' bula - kai hi retu - pidi wengi dohe - ni . Kehi - kai toe - le mpakanoto - kokoi kamakono - na Kareba to kikeni .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Pai ' koi ' ompi ' , kani ' epe - na Kareba Lompe ' toe , nituku ' - mi kehi - kai , pai ' kehi - na Pue ' Yesus wo ' o . Apa ' nau ' rabalinai ' gaga - koi , goe ' oa ' nono - ni mpotarima Kareba Lompe ' toe . Inoha ' Tomoroli ' - hana to mpowai ' - koi kagoea ' tetu - e ompi ' .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Jadi ' , kehi - ni tetu rapotonco hawe ' ea ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta to hi tana ' Makedonia pai ' Akhaya .

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Apa ' ntepu ' u ngkai koi ' , Lolita Pue ' rapalele hobo ' hi Makedonia pai ' Akhaya . Meliu ngkai toe , pepangala ' - ni hi Alata ' ala rapotompo ' wiwi hiapa - apa . Hiapa pomakoa ' - kai , ra ' inca ami ' - mi pue ' ngata tutura - na , beiwa kanipangala ' - na Kareba Lompe ' to kikeni - kokoi . Uma mingki ' ki ' uli ' ba apa - apa , apa ' rapotompo ' wiwi ami ' - mi kanibahakai - nami mpopue ' pinotau , pai ' megoli - mokoi mepue ' hi Alata ' ala to makono pai ' to tuwu ' liu - liu .

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: Rapotompo ' wiwi wo ' o kampopea - ni karata - na nculii ' Yesus Ana ' Alata ' ala ngkai suruga . Alata ' ala mpotuwu ' - i nculii ' , pai ' Hi ' a - mi to mpobahaka - ta ngkai roe Alata ' ala to mporumpa ' ihi ' dunia ' toi mpai ' .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Ni ' inca moto ompi ' uma - wakai lenge ' mara mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi koi ' .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Kako ' ia - kai rata hi ngata - ni retu , rabalinai ' pai ' raruge ' - kai hi ngata Filipi - - ni ' inca moto - mi tutura - na ompi ' . Aga nau ' wori ' to mpo ' ewa - kai , Alata ' ala mporohoi nono - kai bona bia ' - kai mpoparata Kareba Lompe ' to ngkai Alata ' ala hi koi ' wo ' o .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Uma kibawai - koi mpotuku ' tudui ' to uma makono . Uma wo ' o ria patuju nono - kai to dada ' a , uma - kai doko ' mpobagiu ba hema - hema .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Uma wo ' o - kai mololita mpakagoe ' nono manusia ' - wadi . Mololita - kai bona mpakagoe ' nono Alata ' ala , apa ' Hi ' a - mi to mpoparesa ' nono - kai , pai ' na ' uli ' kanatao - kai mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' toe .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Ni ' inca moto ompi ' , uma - kai ria mololita mpolinuruhi - koi , uma - kai mpolerui patuju to dada ' a doko ' mporata ba napa - napa ngkai koi ' . Alata ' ala moto sabi ' - kai !

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Uma wo ' o - kai mpope ' une ' hi koi ' ba hi tau ntani ' - na . Kakoo - kono - na , uma - kai sala ' mperapii ' - koi ompi ' , apa ' suro - na Kristus mpu ' u - kai .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: Aga uma kibabehi hewa toe . Bula - kai retu - pidi wengi , mo ' alusu ' po ' ingku - kai , hewa hadua totina mpewili ' ana ' - na .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Kiparata - kokoi Kareba Lompe ' ngkai Alata ' ala . Pai ' meliu ngkai toe , ba tuwu ' ba mate - kai , bate sadia - kai mpotulungi - koi , apa ' kipoka ' ahi ' lia - koi .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Tantu nikiwoi moto ompi ' kamowewa - kai wengi mobago , hinamengi hina ' eo - kai mpali ' pongkoni ' - kai , bona neo ' - kai mposesei ' - koi bula - kai mpotudui ' - koi Kareba Lompe ' to ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Ni ' inca moto kamoroli ' po ' ingku - kai wengi hi koi ' to mepangala ' - mi hi Pue ' Yesus . Monoa ' po ' ingku - kai , uma ria kasalaia ' - na . Koi ' - mi sabi ' - kai ompi ' , hante Alata ' ala wo ' o .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Ni ' inca moto pepewili ' - kai hi koi ' butu dua - ni , hewa hadua tuama mpewili ' ana ' - ana ' - na . Kirohoi pai ' ki ' apui nono - ni ,

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: pai ' kiparesai ' mpu ' u - koi bona po ' ingku - ni masipato ' hi ntodea - na Alata ' ala . Apa ' Alata ' ala mpokio ' - koi jadi ' ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na bona mporata - koi bagia hi rala kabohe tuwu ' - na .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Ria - pi hanyala to mpakeni - kai mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi oa ' hi Alata ' ala . Apa ' kareba to ni ' epe ngkai kai ' nitarima hewa Lolita Alata ' ala mpu ' u , uma nitarima hewa lolita manusia ' - wadi . Pai ' bate wae mpu ' u , kareba toe bate Lolita Alata ' ala to mobago ncuu hi rala nono - ni to mepangala ' hi Pue ' .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Ki ' inca toe ompi ' , apa ' napa to jadi ' hi to Kristen hi tana ' Yudea to mepue ' hi Alata ' ala , wae wo ' o to jadi ' hi koi ' . Koi ' rabalinai ' hingka ngata - ni moto , wae wo ' o ompi ' - ta to napobagia Kristus Yesus hi Yudea toera rabalinai ' hingka to Yahudi - ra .

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: To Yahudi toe wo ' o - ra - wadi to mpopatehi nabi - nabi owi pai ' mpopatehi Pue ' Yesus , duu ' - na kai ' wo ' o - mi rabalinai ' to Yahudi toera . Me ' ewa ncuu - ra hi konoa Alata ' ala , pai ' jadi ' bali ' hawe ' ea tauna - ramo .

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: Apa ' ralawa ' - lawa ' ncuu ohea - kai bona ngalai ' neo ' kiparata kareba to mpokeni kalompea ' hi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi Jadi ' , ngkai hawe ' ea gau ' - ra to Yahudi toe , melabi rahi - mi jeko ' - ra , pai ' ka ' omea - na mporata - ramo roe Alata ' ala .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , ngkai pogaa ' - ta to hampai ' tohe ' i - e , lentora lia - kai mpokalentorai - koi . Nau ' mogaa ' - ta hi mata , aga kipoimata - mata oa ' - koi hi rala nono - kai . Jadi ' , kipali ' - mi ohea - kai tilou mpencuai ' - koi .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Ria mpu ' u - mi wengi hawa ' - kai ke tilou mpencuai ' - koie . Aku ' Paulus , ba hangkuja ngkani - ama moliwo tilou , aga Magau ' Anudaa ' melawa ' .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Doko ' mpu ' u - kai mpencuai ' - koi , apa ' ane rata - ipi mpai ' Pue ' - ta Pue ' Yesus , pai ' - ta morumpu hi nyanyoa - na , koi ' - mi to jadi ' wua ' bago - kai to kisarumaka . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , goe ' pai ' bohe nono - kai sabana koi ' ompi ' .

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Bate koi ' - mile kabohea pai ' kagoea ' nono - kaie !

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: Ka ' omea - na , uma - pi kidadahi kalentora - kai . Toe pai ' ki ' uli ' , agina aku ' mepopea hi ngata Atena , pai ' ompi ' - ta Timotius kipahawa ' tilou hi koi ' ompi ' - ompi ' hi Tesalonika . Timotius toei , doo hampobagoa - kai hi rala pobago Alata ' ala , apa ' natulungi - kai mpokeni Kareba Kristus . Jadi ' , kipahawa ' mpu ' u - imi Timotius tilou , ki ' uli ' - ki : " Iko - mi to hilou mpokinomo ompi ' - ta hi Tesalonika , nurohoi pai ' nupomotede ' pepangala ' - ra . "

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: Kipahawa ' - i tilou toe , bona neo ' mpai ' ria haduaa to mokalingka pepangala ' - ra sabana pebalinai ' to mporumpa ' - koi . Apa ' ta ' inca moto ompi ' , pebalinai ' to mporumpa ' - ta toe , gati patuju Alata ' ala ami ' - mi hi kita ' to Kristen .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Bula - kai retu - pidi wengi , ki ' uli ' ami ' - mi karia - ra mpai ' to mpobalinai ' - ta . Hiaa ' madupa ' mpu ' u - mi , hewa to ni ' inca moto - mi ompi ' .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Jadi ' , toe - die pai ' kuhubui - i Timotius tilou - e , bona ku ' inca kabeiwa - na pepangala ' - ni , apa ' uma mpu ' u - pi kudadahi kalentora - ku . Pai ' koro ' - a , nee - neo ' nasori Magau ' Topesori - koi duu ' - na napanawu ' - koi pai ' uma - pi ria kalaua lenge ' - kai mpokeni Kareba Lompe ' hi koi ' .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Jadi ' , hewa toe lau , rata nculii ' - imi Timotius hi rehe ' i , pai ' naparata - mikakai kareba to mpakagoe ' - kai . Na ' uli ' : " To Tesalonika toera ria , moroho moto pepangala ' - ra pai ' ahi ' - ra . Rapolio oa ' - ta pai ' lentora wo ' o - ra - rawo doko ' mpohirua ' - taka , hewa kita ' wo ' o doko ' mpohirua ' - raka . "

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Mpo ' epe kareba to nakeni Timotius toe , tetanta ' u - makai ompi ' . Nau ' rabalinai ' pai ' rapakasusa ' - kai hi rei , tetanta ' u oa ' nono - kai mpo ' epe kamoroho - na pepangala ' - ni .

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: Jadi ' , morawa - mi nono - kai , apa ' moroho pepangala ' - ni hi Pue ' Yesus .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Uma mowo kagoe ' - kai mpokagoe ' - koi ompi ' . Jadi ' , napa to ma ' ala kihiwili - ki Alata ' ala ngkai hawe ' ea kagoea ' to nawai ' - kakai toe ? Uma ria ntani ' - na , muntu ' mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi - kai hi rala posampaya - kai hi Alata ' ala Tuama - ta .

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Hinamengi hina ' eo - kai merapi ' hi Alata ' ala hante nono mpu ' u bona nabea ohea - kai mpencuai ' - koi , bona kipohonoi ' to kura ' hi pepangala ' - ni .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Mosampaya - kai hi Alata ' ala Tuama - ta pai ' hi Pue ' - ta Pue ' Yesus , kiperapi ' bona nabea - kakai ohea mpohirua ' - kokoi ompi ' .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Kiperapi ' bona katedoo - donihia ahi ' - ni , alaa - na momepoka ' ahi ' mpu ' u - koi hadua bo hadua , pai ' - koi mpoka ' ahi ' hawe ' ea tauna , hewa ahi ' - kai hi koi ' .

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: Kiperapi ' hi Alata ' ala bona narohoi nono - ni , bona moroli ' - koi hante uma ria kasalaia ' - ni hi nyanyoa - na ane rata - ipi mpai ' Pue ' Yesus hante hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na to moroli ' .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Ka ' omea - na ompi ' , kiperapi ' bona nituku ' hawa ' - hawa ' to ni ' epe - mi ngkai kai ' , bona po ' ingku - ni mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala . Kakoo - kono - na , lompe ' - mi po ' ingku - ni toe lau . Aga hante kuasa to nawai ' - kakai Pue ' Yesus , kiperapi ' pai ' kiparesai ' mpu ' u - koi bona nidonihii tena - pidi kalompe ' po ' ingku - ni toe - e .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ni ' inca - mi tudui ' to oti kiparata - kokoi hante kuasa Pue ' Yesus .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Tohe ' i konoa Alata ' ala , bona moroli ' katuwu ' - ta , neo ' - hawo mogau ' sala ' hante toronaa ba hante tobine doo .

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: Butu dua tomane kana mpodoo lompe ' tobine - ra , ntuku ' ohea to lompe ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala pai ' hi poncilo manusia ' .

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: Neo ' napakeni hina nono - ta to dada ' a , hewa to biasa jadi ' hi tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Hi gau ' tomane pai ' tobine toe , neo ' - ta mpobabehi to sala ' hi doo ba mpobagiu doo . Oti - mi kipolonto ' - kokoi wengi pehuku ' - na Alata ' ala hi tauna to mogau ' hewa toe .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Apa ' napa patuju - na Alata ' ala mpokio ' - ta ompi ' ? Uma - ta nakio ' bona mogau ' sala ' . Nakio ' - tale pai ' nawai ' - ta Inoha ' - na to moroli ' , bona moroli ' katuwu ' - ta . Jadi ' , hema to mposapuaka tudui ' tohe ' i - e , uma - i mposapuaka manusia ' . Alata ' ala - hana to nasapuaka .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Kakaliliua - na ompi ' , ane gau ' mpoka ' ahi ' ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta , kakono - na uma - pi - hawo mingki ' ki ' uki ' - kokoi ba apa - apa . Apa ' Alata ' ala mpotudui ' - koi momepoka ' ahi ' hadua bo hadua .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Nipoka ' ahi ' hawe ' ea ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ni hi Makedonia . Aga kiperapi ' mpu ' u ompi ' , bona nidonihii tena - pidi po ' ingku - ni tetu .

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Pelompehi mpu ' u bona tuwu ' hintuwu ' hante doo . Penonoi bago - ni moto , neo ' mpogalo urusia doo . Mobago mpali ' pongkoni ' - ni , hewa to oti - mi kitudui ' - kokoie wengi .

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: Ane hewa toe po ' ingku - ni , uma - koi mpai ' karapi ' - rapi ' hi doo . Pai ' tauna to uma mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus mpobila ' - koi .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , patuju - kai bona ni ' inca mpu ' u - hawo napa to jadi ' hi doo - ta to mate , bona neo ' susa ' rahi nono - ni hewa tauna to uma ncarumaka Alata ' ala .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Taparasaya Yesus mate - imi pai ' tuwu ' nculii ' - i . Toe pai ' taparasaya bate toe wo ' o mpai ' to jadi ' hi hawe ' ea tauna to mate - mi to mepangala ' hi Yesus . Ane tumai - i mpai ' Pue ' Yesus , Alata ' ala mpokeni - ra tumai hangkaa - ngkania hante Hi ' a .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Tohe ' i - mi tudui ' to kitarima ngkai Pue ' Yesus . Ane rata nculii ' - ipi mpai ' Pue ' , kita ' to tuwu ' - pidi nto ' u toe , uma - ta meri ' ulu ngkai doo - ta to mpolia ' mate - mi .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Apa ' ane mana ' u - ipi mpai ' Pue ' tumai ngkai suruga , ta ' epe pekio ' tadulako mala ' eka hante moni sangkakala Alata ' ala . Pai ' hi tanda toe , tuwu ' nculii ' - ramo tomate to mepangala ' hi Kristus .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Oti toe - di , kita ' to tuwu ' - pidi ra ' ore ' dohe - ra hilou hi rala limu ' mpohirua ' - ki Pue ' hi lolo raoa . Pai ' tida - tamo dohe Pue ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Jadi ' ngkai toe - mi ompi ' , mometanta ' u - mokoi hadua bo hadua hante lolita tohe ' e .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Ompi ' omea , uma mingki ' ki ' uki ' - kokoi ba nto ' uma mpu ' u eo karataa Pue ' .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Apa ' ni ' inca moto ompi ' : hewa karataa topanako ngkabengia , wae wo ' o mpai ' Eo Karataa Pue ' , konce mpai ' ihi ' dunia ' nakaratai .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Rata mpai ' tempo - na , tauna mpo ' uli ' : " Lompe ' moto katuwu ' - ta , uma ria to tapoka ' eka ' . " Ntaa ' we ' i , nto ' u toe - midi kanarumpa ' - ra silaka - e ! Tohe ' e mpai ' jadi ' ncorobaa , hewa pontodohaka tobine to neo ' mo ' ana ' . Uma ria ohea - ra mpasalewa huku ' - ra .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Aga koi ' , ompi ' , uma - koi hi rala kabengia - na . Uma - koi mpai ' konce hi eo karataa Pue ' Yesus , hewa hi karataa topanako .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Mobaja - mi nono - ni omea , mo ' ingku - koi hewa tauna to momako ' hi eo - na . Uma - ta hewa tauna to mpobabehi gau ' to dada ' a hi rala kabengia - na .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Jadi ' , mo ' inga ' - inga ' - ta pai ' mpakanoto nono - ta . Neo ' - ta leta ' hewa tauna to hi rala kabengia - na - pidi .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Apa ' tauna to turu pai ' malangu , turu pai ' malangu hi bengi - na .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Tapi ' kita ' toi - e , tauna to hi rala kabajaa - na . Toe pai ' kana tapakanoto nono - ta . Kana tapomotede ' mpu ' u pepangala ' - ta hi Pue ' pai ' ahi ' - ta hi doo , bona moroho - ta hewa tantara to mpobaju baju ahe ' . Kana ncarumaka - ta Alata ' ala , kanawai ' - nata kalompea ' hi eo mpeno - na , bona moroho - ta hewa tantara to mosongkoi songko ahe ' .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Kana tapakanoto nono - ta , apa ' Alata ' ala uma mpelihi - ta bona mporata roe - na . Napelihi - tale bona nahore - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta pai ' nawai ' - ta kalompea ' sabana petolo ' Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Yesus Kristus mate mpotolo ' - ta , bona ane rata - ipi mpai ' , tuwu ' hangkaa - ngkania hante Hi ' a - tamo , ba tuwu ' - ta - pidi nto ' u toe ba mpolia ' mate - tamo .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' , mome ' apui - koi , pai ' momerohoi mponono - mokoi , hewa to nibabehi - mi toe - e lau .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , kiperapi ' bona nibila ' - ra to mpokamu bago Pue ' hi laintongo ' - ni , apa ' hira ' to jadi ' totu ' a - ni hi rala Pue ' pai ' to mpoparesai ' - koi .

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Bila ' pai ' pengkorui mpu ' u - ra , pai ' poka ' ahi ' - ra sabana pobago - ra toe . Tuwu ' hintuwu ' hadua bo hadua .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Ompi ' , kiperapi ' bona niparesai ' - ra - rawo to lose mobago . Apui - ra to mere ' nono - ra . Pe ' inte ' - ra to lente pepangala ' - ra . Mosabara hi hawe ' ea tauna .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Ane ria to mogau ' dada ' a hi kita ' , neo ' tapehawai hante gau ' to dada ' a wo ' o . Agina - pi tababehi oa ' to lompe ' hi doo - ta pai ' hi hawe ' ea tauna .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Kana goe ' ncuu - ta ,

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: tida mosampaya ,

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: pai ' mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala nau ' ba napa to jadi ' , apa ' toe - mi konoa Alata ' ala hi kita ' to mosidai ' hante Kristus Yesus .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Neo ' nilawa ' pobago Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Neo ' uma nisaile ' lolita tauna ane mpohowa ' - ra Lolita Alata ' ala .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Pekiri lompe ' butu mela - na , niponciloi ba ngkai Alata ' ala mpu ' u - di ba bela - di , pai ' kakamu to lompe ' .

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Pelelii ' hawe ' ea kehi to dada ' a .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mekakae - a hi Alata ' ala to mpowai ' - ta kalompea ' tuwu ' , kuperapi ' bona napakaroli ' kehi - ni , duu ' - na moroli ' mpu ' u - koi . Kuperapi ' bona napewili ' - koi , lompe ' woto - ni lompe ' nono ba kao ' - ni , bona uma ria kasalaia ' - ni nau ' hangkedi ' ane rata nculii ' - ipi Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Alata ' ala mpokio ' - ta mpotuku ' - i . Jadi ' , Hi ' a wo ' o - wadi to mpopadupa ' hawe ' ea tohe ' e , apa ' napadupa ' oa ' janci - na .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , kiperapi ' bona niposampayai wo ' o - ka - kaiwo .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Parata - kaka - kaiwo tabe - kai pai ' ahi ' - kai hi hawe ' ea ompi ' hi rala Pue ' Yesus to hi retu - ra .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Hante kuasa to nawai ' - ka Pue ' , kuperapi ' bona sura toi nibasa hi nyanyoa hawe ' ea ompi ' hampepangalaa ' to hi retu - ra .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus mpogane ' - koi .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Sura toi ngkai kai ' tau tolu : Paulus , Silas pai ' Timotius , kipakatu tilou hi koi ' ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - kai to hi ngata Tesalonika , to mepue ' - mi hi Alata ' ala Tuama - ta pai ' hi Pue ' Yesus Kristus ! Wori ' tabe : mekakae - kai hi Alata ' ala to Tuama pai ' hi Pue ' Yesus Kristus bona nagane ' - koi ngkai kabula rala - na pai ' nawai ' - koi kalompea ' tuwu ' .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' ! Bate uma - kai putu mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala sabana koi ' . Masipato ' mpu ' u kipohewa toe , apa ' kamoroo - rohoa mpu ' u - mi pepangala ' - ni hi Pue ' , pai ' katedoo - donihia wo ' o - mi ahi ' - ni omea mpoka ' ahi ' doo - ni .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Toe pai ' hi ngata ntani ' - na ki ' une ' - koi hi ompi ' - ompi ' - ta to mepue ' - mi hi Alata ' ala . Bohe lia nono - kai , ki ' uli ' : " To Tesalonika toera ria , nau ' - ra rabalinai ' pai ' mporata kasusaa ' , uma mobali ' nono - ra , bate tida oa ' - ra mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus . "

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Jadi ' , hi katida pepangala ' - ni toe , tahilo kanoa ' pobotuhi - na Alata ' ala : ntaha - koi hi rala kasusaa ' to mporumpa ' - koi sabana petuku ' - ni hi Alata ' ala , toe pai ' Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' kamasipato ' - ni jadi ' ntodea - na hi rala Kamagaua ' - na .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Alata ' ala mpobabehi to monoa ' : napehawai mpai ' kehi - ra to mpobalinai ' - koi ,

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: pai ' nabahaka - koi ngkai kasusaa ' - ni ompi ' , wae wo ' o kai ' . Nabahaka - ta nto ' u Pue ' Yesus mehupa ' pai ' mana ' u tumai ngkai suruga hante hawe ' ea mala ' eka - na to mobaraka ' .

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Mana ' u - i tumai hante apu to wewo ' , mpohuku ' - ra to uma dota mpo ' incai Alata ' ala pai ' to uma dota mpotuku ' Kareba Yesus Pue ' - ta .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Tauna to uma mepangala ' toera rahuku ' duu ' kahae - hae - na , ratadi molaa - ra ngkai Pue ' alaa - na uma - pi rahiloi kabaraka ' - na pai ' kabohe tuwu ' - na .

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: Hawe ' ea toe jadi ' hi karata - na nculii ' Pue ' Yesus . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , hawe ' ea topetuku ' - na mpomobohe hanga ' - na , hawe ' ea tauna to mpangala ' - i mpo ' uli ' : " Uma mowo kabaraka ' - na ! " Pai ' koi ' wo ' o ompi ' bate mpomobohe hanga ' - na hi eo toe , apa ' nipangala ' - mi kareba to kiparata - kokoi .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Toe - mi pai ' kiposampayai oa ' - koi ompi ' . Hi posampaya - kai toe ki ' uli ' hewa toi : " O Alata ' ala Tuama - kai ! Kiperapi ' bona to Tesalonika toera nupajadi ' to masipato ' rahanga ' topetuku ' - nu , apa ' lawi ' nupelihi - ramo jadi ' topetuku ' - nu . Kiperapi ' bona hante baraka ' - nu nupadupa ' hawe ' ea patuju - ra doko ' mpobabehi to lompe ' , pai ' nuposipolea hawe ' ea pobago - ra to rapobago sabana pepangala ' - ra hi Pue ' Yesus . " Toe - mi sampaya - kai mposampayai - koi ompi ' .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Pai ' - kai mosampaya hewa toe , bona ngkai kehi - ni to lompe ' hanga ' Yesus Pue ' - ta rapomobohe , pai ' bona koi ' wo ' o mpai ' napomobohe Pue ' Yesus . Hawe ' ea toe bate madupa ' sabana kabula rala - na Alata ' ala Tuama - ta pai ' sabana Pue ' Yesus Kristus .

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: Kakaliliua - na ompi ' , doko ' ki ' uli ' - kokoi hamela romela , mpo ' uli ' napa to jadi ' ane rata nculii ' - ipi Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus mporumpu - ta dohe - na . Ria tauna to mpo ' uli ' - kokoi mpolia ' rata - mi eo karataa Pue ' . Aga uma makono lolita - ra toe . Meka ' ba ria tauna to mpo ' uli ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpopo ' incai - ra toe , ba ria tauna to mpotudui ' - koi tudui ' hewa toe . Ba meka ' ria mpu ' u to mpo ' uli ' karia - na sura ngkai aku ' to mpo ' uli ' karata - nami Eo Pue ' . Aga kiperapi ' mpu ' u - mpu ' u ompi ' , neo ' - koi jolia ingu ' ba morara ' nono - ni , apa ' uma makono kareba toe .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Nau ' ba beiwa mpu ' u - mi lolita doo , neo ' - koi ma ' ala rabagiu . Apa ' kako ' ia - na rata eo toe , to ronyala toi ulu kana jadi ' : wori ' tauna ngkala ' ura ngkai pepangala ' - ra , pai ' mehupa ' - mi hadua tauna to dada ' a to mpo ' ewa Alata ' ala . Tauna to dada ' a toei , molangko nono - na , mpopeliu tuwu ' - nai ngkai hawe ' ea to rapue ' hi dunia ' . Pai ' daho ' - i - hana mohura hi rala Tomi Alata ' ala , mpo ' uli ' kahi ' a - nami Alata ' ala . Jadi ' , monoa ' ami ' - mi karatadi - na hi naraka .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Tantu nikiwoi - pidi ompi ' , kakutudui ' - ni wengi hawe ' ea toe - e lau nto ' u - ku retu - pidi dohe - ni .

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Ane tempo toi , ko ' ia mehupa ' tauna to dada ' a toei , apa ' ria - pidi to mpolawa ' - i . Tantu nikiwoi moto napa to mpolawa ' - i tetu . Jadi ' , ane rata - damo tempo to napakatantu Alata ' ala , mehupa ' - imi tauna to dada ' a toei .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Tempo toi , kuasa to mpokuasai - i mobago bongo hi dunia ' . Aga woto - na ko ' ia mehupa ' , apa ' telawa ' oa ' - i - pidi . Jadi ' , ane rawi ' iha - damo topelawa ' tetui ,

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: lako ' mehupa ' - idi tauna to dada ' a toei . Aga ane rata - ipi Pue ' Yesus hante kabaraka ' - na to mehini , ora - mi kuasa tauna to dada ' a toei , pai ' Pue ' Yesus mpopatehi - i , natohoo hante inoha ' to ngkai nganga - na .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Ane tauna to dada ' a toei , mehupa ' - i mpai ' hante baraka ' bohe ngkai Magau ' Anudaa ' , pai ' - i mpobabehi wori ' nyala tanda mekoncehi to mebagiu .

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: Hawe ' ea akala - na to dada ' a napake ' mpobagiu tauna to monoa ' ami ' - mi kamporata - ra silaka . Mporata silaka - rale , apa ' oja ' - ra mpotarima kareba to makono , pai ' uma - ra mengkoru hi Alata ' ala bona nahore - ra ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Toe - die pai ' Alata ' ala mpopakatu hanyala noto hi tauna toera to mpobagiu - ra , alaa - na mepangala ' - ra hi lolita boa ' to nakeni tauna to dada ' a toei .

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: Ka ' omea - na mpai ' , Alata ' ala mpohuku ' hawe ' ea tauna to mpokono jeko ' pai ' to uma mpangalai ' kareba to makono .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Jadi ' , ompi ' - ompi ' to nape ' ahi ' Pue ' , toto - na lia - kai mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi oa ' hi Alata ' ala sabana koi ' . Apa ' napelihi - mokoi ngkai lomo ' - na bona tehore - koi ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ni . Tehore - koi ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ni toe , hante kuasa Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to mpopajadi ' - koi bagia Alata ' ala to moroli ' , pai ' hante pepangala ' - ni hi kareba to makono .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Toe - mi pai ' nakio ' - koi ompi ' hi kampo ' epe - ni Kareba Lompe ' to kiparata - kokoi . Nakio ' - koi bona mporata - koi bagia hi kabohe tuwu ' - na Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Jadi ' ngkai toe - mi ompi ' , pakaroho pepangala ' - ni , perohoi ngkakamu hawe ' ea to kitudui ' - kokoi , lompe ' to ki ' uli ' hante wiwi , lompe ' to ki ' uki ' hi rala sura .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Alata ' ala mpopohiloi - tamo ahi ' - na , pai ' napakaroho nono - ta duu ' kahae - hae - na pai ' nawai ' - ta poncarumakaa to lompe ' sabana kabula rala - na . Toe pai ' mekakae - a hi Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus hante Alata ' ala Tuama - ta

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: bona narohoi pai ' napakatida nono - ni ompi ' , bona lolita pai ' po ' ingku - ni lompe ' omea .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Ka ' omea - na ompi ' , kiperapi ' bona niposampayai wo ' o - ka - kaiwo . Lomo ' - lomo ' - na , merapi ' hi Pue ' bona kawoo - woria ' tauna mpo ' epe pai ' mpotarima Lolita Pue ' , hewa to jadi ' hi koi ' - e wengi .

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Merapi ' wo ' o - koi bona Alata ' ala mpobahaka - kai ngkai tauna to dada ' a pai ' to mebalinai ' , apa ' uma hawe ' ea tauna mepangala ' hi Lolita Pue ' toe .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Aga uma molaka ' pompewili ' - na Pue ' Yesus hi koi ' . Narohoi nono - ni pai ' napetalawai ' - koi ngkai to dada ' a .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' lawi ' Pue ' to mpewili ' - koie , toe pai ' monoa ' - mi ki ' inca kanituku ' - na napa to kitudui ' - kokoi , pai ' nipokaliliu mpai ' mpotuku ' napa - napa to kitudui ' - kokoi .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Kisarumaka Pue ' Yesus mpotete ' - koi , duu ' - na ni ' inca mpu ' u ahi ' Alata ' ala hi koi ' , bona ntaha - koi hi rala kasusaa ' , hewa kantaha - na Kristus wo ' o .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , hante kuasa to nawai ' - kakai Pue ' Yesus Kristus , kihawai ' - koi : neo ' mporomu - raka ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ni to lose pai ' to uma mpotuku ' atura to nitarima ngkai kai ' .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Ni ' inca moto ompi ' po ' ingku - kai nto ' u - kai dohe - ni wengi , ka ' uma - kai lose . Po ' ingku - kai tetu - mile to kana nituku ' - e .

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: Uma - kai mpokoni ' pongkoni ' to uma ki ' oli . Hinamengi hina ' eo - kai mobago pai ' mowewa bona neo ' - kai mposesei ' - koi .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Kakoo - kono - na , uma - kai sala ' mperapii ' - koie . Tapi ' doko ' kipopohiloi - koi tonco to lompe ' bona nituku ' .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Bula - kai retu - pidi dohe - ni wengi , ria ami ' - mi hawa ' to kitu ' u - kokoi , ki ' uli ' : tauna to uma dota mobago , neo ' - i rawai ' pongkoni ' .

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Pai ' - kai mpo ' uli ' hewa toe - e , ta ' uli ' - mi - hawo , apa ' ki ' epe karia - ra hi retu to mengkalose . Sese ' - ra mpogalo urusia doo - wadi , uma - ra mpobago lompe ' bago - ra moto .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Jadi ' , hante kuasa to nawai ' - kakai Pue ' Yesus Kristus , kihawai ' - ra tauna toera pai ' ki ' apui nono - ra bona rodo - ra mobago mpali ' pongkoni ' - ra .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Aga koi ' , ompi ' - ompi ' omea , neo ' nika ' ohai mpobabehi to lompe ' .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Ane rapa ' - na ria to uma dota mpotuku ' napa to ki ' uki ' hi rala sura toi , petonoi - ra . Neo ' niposigalo - raka , bona me ' ea ' - ra .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Aga neo ' wo ' o - ra wa niponcawa bali ' - ni . Paresai ' - ra , apa ' lawi ' nipo ' ompi ' - ra hi rala Pue ' Yesus .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Ngkai Pue ' - wadi kalompea ' tuwu ' - ta . Toe pai ' mekakae - a hi Pue ' , kuperapi ' bona nawai ' - koi kalompea ' tuwu ' butu eo - na pai ' hi butu nyala - na . Pue ' mpodohei - koi omea .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Tabe ngkai aku ' , Paulus . Kahudua sura tohe ' i - e , pale - ku moto - mi to mpo ' uki ' . Hewa tohe ' i lence ukia ' - ku hi rala hawe ' ea sura - ku , bona monoa ' ni ' inca kasura - ku mpu ' u .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus mpogane ' - koi omea .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Sura toi ngkai aku ' Paulus , suro Kristus Yesus . Aku ' jadi ' suro - na ntuku ' hawa ' Alata ' ala , Magau ' Tompohore - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta , pai ' ntuku ' hawa ' Kristus Yesus to jadi ' poncarumakaa - ta .

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Sura toi kupakatu hi iko Timotius , to kuponcawa ana ' - ku moto apa ' hibalia pepangala ' - ta hi Kristus Yesus . Wori ' tabe : mekakae - a hi Alata ' ala to Tuama pai ' hi Kristus Yesus Pue ' - ta bona nagane ' - ko ngkai kabula rala - na , napopohiloi - ko ahi ' - na , pai ' nawai ' - ko kalompea ' tuwu ' .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Kuperapi ' bona iko bate tida hi Efesus , hewa to ku ' uli ' - mi wengi kame ' ongko ' - ku tumai hi Makedonia . Apa ' ria hi retu ba hangkuja dua tauna to mpokeni tudui ' to uma makono , pai ' iko kana mpotagi - ra bona neo ' - rapa metudui ' oa ' hewa toe .

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: Tagi - ra bona neo ' - pi ntora mpenonoi jarita - jarita boa ' pai ' tutura po ' ompi ' to uma ria kahudua - na . Apa ' tauna to ntora mpenonoi jarita pai ' tutura toe , ntora momehono ' - wadi , uma ratuku ' patuju Alata ' ala to ta ' inca ngkai pepangala ' - ta hi Hi ' a .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Patuju hawa ' - ku toi , bona momepoka ' ahi ' - ta omea . Apa ' nono - ta napomoroli ' - mi Alata ' ala , ta ' inca hi rala nono - ta ka ' uma - napi masala ' - ta hi poncilo - na , pai ' mepangala ' mpu ' u - ta hi Pue ' Yesus . Toe pai ' alaa - na ma ' ala - ta momepoka ' ahi ' .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Ria - ra ba hangkuja dua tauna to uma - pi mpotuku ' ohea toe . Meleli ' - ramo ngkai ohea to makono , pai ' - ra ntora mpololita lolita to uma ria kalaua - na .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Doko ' - ra jadi ' guru Atura Musa , hiaa ' bo uma moto ra ' incai kalaua - na . Ra ' uli ' - rana , pante - ra mpakanoto batua - na Atura Musa , hiaa ' kakoo - kono - na uma - di ra ' incai patuju - nae .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Ta ' inca moto kalompe ' - na Atura Musa , asala tapake ' ntuku ' ohea to makono .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Bona makono pompake ' - ta , kana takiwoi patuju - na Atura Musa . Atura Musa uma rababehi - raka tauna to monoa ' po ' ingku - ra . Patuju - nale , bona mpotagi tauna to mpotiboki atura pai ' tauna to mekahia ' , to uma mengkoru hi Alata ' ala , to mojeko ' , to uma mposaile ' agama , to mpotuku ' kagoea ' dunia ' - wadi , to mpopatehi tina - ra ba tuama - ra , pai ' topepatehi ntani ' - na .

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: Patuju Atura Musa , bona mpotagi tauna to mobualo ' , to mogau ' sala ' tomane hingka tomane - na ba tobine hingka tobine - na , to mpo ' ala ' tauna bona rapobatua , to boa ' , to mosabi ' boa ' , pai ' hema - hema to mpobabehi to mosisala hante tudui ' to makono .

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: Tudui ' to makono toe tarua ' hi rala Kareba Lompe ' to ngkai Alata ' ala to bohe tuwu ' - na pai ' to natao ra ' une ' . Kareba Lompe ' toe , napopokoloi - ka aku ' - mi bona kupalele .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Aku ' mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Pue ' - ta Kristus Yesus , apa ' na ' ongko ' - ama jadi ' topobago - na , nawai ' - a karohoa , pai ' na ' uli ' kanatao - ku mpokamu bago - na .

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: Ri ' ulu - a mporuge ' Yesus , ngasa ' mpu ' u - a mpobalinai ' topetuku ' - na . Aga nau ' wae , napoka ' ahi ' moto - a , apa ' nto ' u toe ko ' ia - a - kuwo mepangala ' hi Hi ' a , jadi ' uma ku ' incai kalaua - na napa to kubabehi .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Aga nau ' hewa apa - mi kabohe jeko ' - ku , meliu tena kabohe ahi ' - na Pue ' - ta . Natulungi - a ngkai kabula rala - na , alaa - na kupangala ' pai ' kupoka ' ahi ' - imi Kristus Yesus .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Ria lolita bulawa to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : " Kristus Yesus tumai hi dunia ' bona mpohore topojeko ' ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra . " Makono mpu ' u lolita toe pai ' masipato ' taparasaya omea . Jadi ' , ngkai hawe ' ea topojeko ' , aku ' toi - mi to meliu jeko ' - ku .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Hiaa ' toe - mile pai ' napoka ' ahi ' - ama Alata ' ala - e , bona hi rala tuwu ' - ku aku ' to meliu kamojeko ' - ku toi - e , Yesus Kristus ma ' ala mpotudo ' kamoloe posabara - na . Jadi ' , hi rala katuwu ' - ku toi , ahi ' Pue ' jadi ' monoto lia , alaa - na aku ' - mi jadi ' tonco hi hawe ' ea tauna to rata ngkabokoa ' , bona mepangala ' hi Yesus wo ' o - ramo - rawo pai ' - ra mporata katuwua ' to lompe ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Masipato ' lia tabila ' pai ' ta ' une ' Alata ' ala , Magau ' to moparenta duu ' kahae - hae - na , to uma ria kamatea - na , to uma kahiloa , pai ' to uma ria karodua - na . Masipato ' tabila ' - i pai ' tapomobohe hanga ' - na duu ' kahae - hae - na . Amin ! Wae mpu ' u - hana !

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Timotius , ana ' - ku ! Tuku ' - mi hawa ' to kutu ' u - koko toi . Kiwoi lolita - ra pangkeni agama to mpo ' apui nono - nu pai ' to mpoparesai ' - ko . Paresa ' - ra toe nupo ' enu ' oa ' , bona moroho - ko mpobago bago to nukamu , hewa hadua tantara to bia ' manga ' e .

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: Perohoi pepangala ' - nu , pai ' babehi oa ' gau ' to lompe ' hewa to nu ' inca hi rala nono - nu . Ria ba hangkuja dua tauna to uma - pi mposaile ' hawe ' ea toe , alaa - na mokero - mi pepangala ' - ra .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Rodua to mokero pepangala ' - ra toe , hira ' Himeneus pai ' Aleksander . To rodua toera kutonu hi kuasa Magau ' Anudaa ' bona nahuku ' - ra , bona neo ' - rapa mpokedi ' kuasa Alata ' ala hante tudui ' - ra to dada ' a toe .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Lomo ' - lomo ' - na , mohawa ' - a bona hawe ' ea topetuku ' Pue ' Yesus mosampaya , mpobua ' pekakae , pomperapia ' pai ' pontarima kasi - ta hi Alata ' ala . Mosampaya - ta mposampayai hawe ' ea tauna ,

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: mposampayai magau ' duu ' - na hawe ' ea topoparenta . Kana taposampayai - ra , bona rodo - hawo katuwu ' - ta pai ' neo ' - tawo ria to mpobalinai ' - ta , bona mologa - ta mepue ' hi Alata ' ala pai ' mpobabehi oa ' gau ' to natao rabila ' doo .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Posampaya to hewa toe - mi to lompe ' , pai ' to napokono Alata ' ala , Magau ' Tompohore - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta .

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Apa ' konoa - na bona hawe ' ea tauna tehore ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra , pai ' - ra mpo ' inca tudui ' to makono .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Hadua lau - wadi Alata ' ala , pai ' hadua wo ' o - wadi Tauntongo ' to mpopohintuwu ' Alata ' ala hante manusia ' . Tauntongo ' toei , manusia ' wo ' o - i - hawo , Hi ' a - mi Kristus Yesus .

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: Napewai ' woto - na rapatehi bona mpotolo ' hawe ' ea manusia ' . Nababehi toe hi tempo to napakatantu Alata ' ala , bona monoto - mi tahilo konoa Alata ' ala bona hawe ' ea manusia ' tehore ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ra .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Toe pai ' na ' ongko ' - ama Alata ' ala jadi ' suro - na . Nahubui - a mpopalele kareba toe hi tauna to bela - ra to Yahudi . Nahubui - a mpotudui ' - ra tudui ' to makono , bona mepangala ' - ra hi Yesus . Makono to ku ' uli ' toe , uma - a boa ' .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Konoa - ku , bona butu ngkani mogampara , tomane - tomane mpo ' ongko ' pale - ra mosampaya . Aga kana to moroli ' gau ' - ra , uma - hawo natao ane mosampaya - ra bula - ra moroe pai ' momehono ' .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Wae wo ' o - hawo tobine . Tobine kana mpopake ' pohea to natao , ntuku ' ada to lompe ' . Neo ' mpenasa pohea - ra bona ra ' une ' doo , neo ' mpopenyala wuluwoo ' , neo ' mporampai woto hante bulawa ba mutiara pai ' pohea - pohea to masuli ' oli - na .

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: Agina tobine ra ' une ' sabana po ' ingku - ra to lompe ' , hewa to natao hi tobine to mengkoru hi Alata ' ala .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Tobine kana mengkalino mpe ' epei tudui ' hante nono to dingki ' .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Uma kupiliu tobine mpotudui ' ba mpohawai ' tomane . Kana mengkalino - ra mpe ' epei - wadi .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Apa ' to lomo ' - na napajadi ' Alata ' ala , Adam , pai ' lako ' Hawa .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Pai ' bela Adam to nabagiu Magau ' Anudaa ' , Hawa - hana to rabagiu , pai ' alaa - na mpotiboki - i parenta Alata ' ala .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Toe pai ' tobine mpotodohaka kaparia hi po ' ana ' - ra . Aga nau ' wae , mporata moto - ra kalompea ' ane tida - ra mepangala ' hi Pue ' , tida mpoka ' ahi ' doo , pai ' tuwu ' moroli ' ntuku ' ada to lompe ' .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : tauna to doko ' jadi ' pangkeni agama mpokahina bago to lompe ' .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Toe pai ' pangkeni agama kana to uma ria kasalaia ' - na . Motobinei hadua - wadi , pai ' kana na ' inca mpengkatarii konoa nono - na to dada ' a , monoto nono - na , pai ' mo ' ada lompe ' - i . Kana jole ' - i metorata , pai ' baka ' metudui ' .

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: Uma ma ' ala topalangu - langu ba to jolia motuda ' . Kana to mo ' olu nono - na , to tuwu ' hintuwu ' hante doo , pai ' to uma doko ' doi - wadi .

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: Kana na ' inca mpo ' atoro ' lompe ' tauna to tida hi rala tomi - na , pai ' ana ' - na kana mengkoru hi totu ' a - ra pai ' mpobila ' - ra .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Apa ' ane ria tauna to uma mpo ' incai mpo ' atoro ' tauna hi rala tomi - na moto , uma wo ' o mpai ' lompe ' pompewili ' - na ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta , to mepangala ' hi Alata ' ala .

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Hadua pangkeni agama uma ma ' ala to lako ' mepangala ' hi Pue ' Yesus , apa ' molangko mpai ' nono - na , alaa - na mporata huku ' - i hewa to rahuku ' - ki Magau ' Anudaa ' .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Wae wo ' o , pangkeni agama kana to uma ria kasalaia ' - na hi poncilo tauna to bela - ra to Kristen . Apa ' ane uma - i hewa toe , ratuntui ' - i mpai ' , alaa - na Magau ' Anudaa ' mposori pai ' mpopanawu ' - i .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Wae wo ' o - hawo kehi to ratuntu ' hi tauna to jadi ' topetulungi hi pobago Pue ' . Kana to monoto kehi - ra pai ' to natao rabila ' . Uma ma ' ala to boa ' , uma ma ' ala to nginu nta ' uo ' to melanguhi , pai ' uma ma ' ala to mpopekiri doi - wadi .

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: Kana mpokakamu mpu ' u - ra tudui ' to naparata - mitaka Alata ' ala , pai ' mpotuku ' tudui ' toe hante karoli ' - roli ' nono - ra .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Ane ria tauna to doko ' jadi ' topetulungi hi pobago Pue ' , raparesa ' ulu kehi - na , pai ' ane uma - i kasalaia ' , lako ' ma ' ala - idi ra ' ongko ' mpokamu bago toe .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Wae wo ' o tobine - ra , kana to monoto kehi - ra pai ' to natao rabila ' , neo ' to ngkeni lolita hilou - tumai . Kana ra ' inca mpengkatarii konoa nono - ra to dada ' a , pai ' monoa ' gau ' - ra bona ma ' ala - ra rasarumaka hi butu nyala - na .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Topetulungi hi pobago Pue ' , motobinei hadua - wadi , kana ra ' inca mpo ' atoro ' lompe ' ana ' - ra pai ' tauna to hi rala tomi - ra .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ane lompe ' pobago - ra mpobago bago Pue ' , wori ' tauna mpobila ' - ra , pai ' hangkedi ' kabia ' - ra mpololita pepangala ' - ra hi Kristus Yesus .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Timotius , moliwo - ama tilou mpencuai ' - ko . Aga nau ' wae , ku ' uki ' moto - koko sura toi ,

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: bona ane rapa ' - na mahae - a mpai ' rata , nu ' inca napa po ' ingku to natao hi butu dua tauna to napo ' ana ' Alata ' ala . Apa ' kita ' toi , mepue ' - ta hi Alata ' ala to tuwu ' duu ' kahae - hae - na . Kita ' toi - mi to ngkakamu tudui ' to makono to ngkai Alata ' ala . Moroho pepangala ' - ta hi tudui ' toe , pai ' tajaga tudui ' toe bona uma hema to mpobalii ' .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Uma mowo kalompe ' - na tudui ' to tatuku ' hi pengkoru - ta hi Alata ' ala . Ngkai owi , tudui ' toe ko ' ia rapopehuwu hi manusia ' , tapi ' hewa toe lau napopehuwu - mitaka Alata ' ala . Apa ' mepangala ' - ta hi Alata ' ala to mewali manusia ' . Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpakanoto kahema - na , pai ' - i rahilo mala ' eka . Rapalele kareba - na hi tauna to ko ' ia mpo ' incai Alata ' ala . Tauna hi humalili ' dunia ' mepangala ' hi Hi ' a . Ra ' ongko ' - imi hilou hi suruga , pai ' - i rawai ' kabohea tuwu ' .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Inoha ' Tomoroli ' mpo ' uli ' - taka hante kalonto ' - lonto ' - na napa mpai ' to jadi ' hi eo - eo to tumai . Nto ' u toe mpai ' , hantongo ' tauna mengkala ' ura ngkai pepangala ' - ra hi tudui ' to makono . Mengkoru lau - ra hi noto to mepohala ' tara , pai ' - ra mpotuku ' tudui ' to ngkai seta .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Tudui ' toe raparata tauna to boa ' , hanyala lolita - ra hanyala kehi - ra . Mobengi nono - ra , uma - pi ra ' incai me ' ea ' ane rababehi gau ' to dada ' a .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Metudui ' - ra bona tauna neo ' ncamoko pai ' neo ' mpokoni ' to rapalii ' . Hiaa ' hawe ' ea konia ' toe , napajadi ' Alata ' ala bona rakoni ' . Kita ' to mepangala ' hi Kristus pai ' to mpo ' inca - mi tudui ' to makono , ma ' ala takoni ' pongkoni ' toe pai ' - ta mpo ' uli ' tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Apa ' hawe ' ea to napajadi ' Alata ' ala , lompe ' omea , uma ria to rapalii ' ane tatarima hante pontarima kasi hi Alata ' ala .

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: Ntuku ' Lolita Alata ' ala , hawe ' ea ma ' ala takoni ' , pai ' taposampayai wo ' o bona nagane ' - taka .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Ane nutudui ' - ra ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta hawe ' ea toe , iko jadi ' topobago Kristus Yesus to lompe ' , pai ' nuperohoi nono - nu moto hante Lolita Alata ' ala to tapangala ' pai ' hante tudui ' to lompe ' to mahae - mi nutuku ' .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Neo ' nutadi tempo - nu mpewulihi ' jarita - jarita boa ' pai ' lolita to uma mpokeni - ta mengkoru hi Alata ' ala . Huduwukui mporohoi nono - nu mengkoru hi Alata ' ala .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Apa ' ane tarohoi wotoloka ' - ta , hangkedi ' - wadi kalaua - na . Tapi ' ane tarohoi nono - ta mengkoru hi Alata ' ala , wori ' kalaua - na , apa ' pengkoru - ta hi Alata ' ala toe mpokeni rasi ' hi katuwu ' - ta tempo toi , pai ' hi katuwu ' - ta hi eo mpeno - na wo ' o .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Makono mpu ' u lolita toe we ' i pai ' masipato ' taparasaya omea .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Toe - mi pai ' mobago ngkoro - ta , apa ' ncarumaka - ta hi Alata ' ala to tuwu ' duu ' kahae - hae - na , Magau ' Tompohore hawe ' ea tauna , peliu - liu - nami tauna to mepangala ' .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Hawe ' ea to ku ' uli ' - koko toi , tudui ' - raka pai ' hawai ' - ra bona ratuku ' .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Nau ' mongura - pidi - ko , aga neo ' - ko ma ' ala rapemarua ' . Kana jadi ' tonco - ko hi ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' hi rala pololita - nu , pogau ' - nu , ahi ' - nu hi doo - doo , pepangala ' - nu hi Pue ' , pai ' po ' ingku - nu to moroli ' .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Kako ' ia - ku rata , neo ' nu ' oloi ' mpobasa Buku Tomoroli ' hi ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' , nu ' apui nono - ra pai ' nutudui ' - ra .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Neo ' - ko lempe ' mpobago bago - nu tetu , ntuku ' pakulea ' to nawai ' - koko Inoha ' Tomoroli ' . Nawai ' - ko pakulea ' tetu nto ' u tauna mpoparata Lolita Alata ' ala mpoparesai ' - ko , pai ' pangkeni agama mpodampa pale - ra hi tanuana ' - nu mpo ' ongko ' - ko jadi ' pangkeni agama .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Neo ' nubahakai mpobago hawe ' ea toe , nuparipoko mpu ' u , bona monoto hi hawe ' ea tauna kabaka ' - nu mpokamu pobago Pue ' .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Jagai po ' ingku - nu , pai ' jagai wo ' o tudui ' - nu . Tida - ko mpobago hawe ' ea toe , apa ' ngkai toe mpai ' mporata - ko kalompea ' , wae wo ' o tauna to mpo ' epe tudui ' - nu .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Ane mpotudui ' - ko tauna to meliu umuru - ra ngkai iko , neo ' karapo ' rahi . Agina nupoka ' olu lolita - nu mpo ' apui nono - ra , nuponcawa tuama - nu moto . Kabilasa nuponcawa ompi ' - nu .

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: Tobine to meliu umuru - ra ngkai iko nuponcawa tina - nu . Pai ' tobine to mongura ngkai iko nuponcawa tu ' ai - nu , pai ' pelompehi bona moroli ' gau ' - nu pai ' pekiri - nu .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Ane ria tobine to balu mpu ' u , to uma mpu ' u ria to mpewili ' - ra , ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta kana mpewili ' - ra - rawo .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Aga ane tobalu to ria moto - ki ana ' - na ba kumpu - na , ana ' pai ' kumpu - na toe - ramo to lomo ' - lomo ' - na kana ratudui ' mpewili ' - i , bona mpohiwili kehi totu ' a - ra . Apa ' toe - mi to mpakagoe ' nono Alata ' ala .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Ane tobine to balu mpu ' u , batua - na uma hema to mpewili ' - i , ncarumaka Alata ' ala - i - wadi , hina ' eo hinamengi mosampaya - i mekakae hi Alata ' ala .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Aga tobalu to mpali ' kagoea ' - ra - wadi , hewa to mate - mi kao ' - ra nau ' tuwu ' - ra - pidi .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Parata - raka hawa ' - ku toi , bona uma kasalaia ' kehi - ra .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Apa ' ane ria tauna to mpo ' uli ' mepangala ' - i hi Alata ' ala , tapi ' uma - i mpewili ' totu ' a - na pai ' tauna to hi rala tomi - na moto , kehi - na toe mposapuaka pepangala ' - na , meliu kada ' a - na ngkai tauna to uma mepangala ' hi Alata ' ala .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Tobalu to ma ' ala rapopesua ' hanga ' - ra hi rala buku tobalu , muntu ' to hewa toi : umuru - ra uma kura ' ngkai ono mpulu ' mpae , motomanei hangkani - ra - wadi .

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: Kana to monoto kalompe ' gau ' - ra , rapa ' - na : mpewili ' lompe ' ana ' - ra , jole ' mpopehani toliu , mpotulungi ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ra , mpojampangi tauna to hi rala kasusaa ' , pai ' biasa mpobabehi butu nyala pobago to lompe ' . Tobalu to hewa toe - mi to natao rapewili ' ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' .

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: Ane tobalu ngkanguraa , neo ' ulu ra ' uki ' hanga ' - ra hi rala buku tobalu . Apa ' ane ria - pidi hina - ra doko ' motomanei , bate motomanei - ra mpai ' . Ka ' omea - na masala ' - ramo apa ' mpotiboki - ra pojanci - ra hi Kristus wengi to mpo ' uli ' kampobago - ra bago Pue ' - wadi .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Jadi ' , ane mongura - ra - pidi , neo ' ra ' uki ' hanga ' - ra hi rala buku tobalu . Apa ' mengkalose - ra - wadi mpai ' , pai ' ntora kakancua ' - ncua ' hi tomi doo . Pai ' uma muntu ' lose - ra , topotau ' lolita wo ' o - ra , doko ' mpogalo urusia doo , pai ' ntora mpololita lolita to uma natao ralolita .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Toe pai ' ku ' uli ' tobalu ngkanguraa agina motomanei lau - ra - rawo , mo ' anai ' , pai ' mpewili ' lompe ' tauna to hi rala tomi - ra , bona neo ' mpai ' ria ohea bali ' - ta mpotuntui ' - ta to mpotuku ' Kristus .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Pai ' - a mpo ' uli ' hewa toe , apa ' ria - ramo tobalu to uma - pi mpotuku ' konoa Kristus , mpotuku ' konoa Magau ' Anudaa ' - ramo .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Ane ria to Kristen , pai ' ria posantina - ra to balu , agina hira ' toe - mi to mpewili ' - i . Uma - hawo ohea - na ane hawe ' ea ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta kana mpewili ' tobalu toe . Apa ' ompi ' - ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta kana mpewili ' tobalu to balu mpu ' u , to uma hema to mpewili ' - ra .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Pangkeni agama to lompe ' pompakeni - ra , toto - na lia - ra rawai ' gaji ' rongkani lau kawori ' - na ngkai tau ntani ' - na , peliu - liu - nami pangkeni to metudui ' pai ' mpoparata Lolita Pue ' .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Apa ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : " Japi to rapopobago mpotodu gandum , neo ' ramumu ' nguju - ra , pelele ' moto - ra ngkuku ' ngkalako ' . " Pai ' te ' uki ' wo ' o : " Topobago masipato ' rawai ' gaji ' - ra . "

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Ane ria pangkeni agama to rapakilu , neo ' ncaliu nutarima pepakilu toe . Sampale ane rasabii ' rodua ba tolu tauna , pai ' lako ' nutarima .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Ane ria mpu ' u sala ' - na , paresai ' - i hi nyanyoa hawe ' ea ompi ' hampepangalaa ' , bona me ' eka ' - ra mpotuku ' gau ' - na .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Kuparesai ' mpu ' u - ko Timotius , bona nutuku ' hawe ' ea hawa ' - ku toi , neo ' - ko mpelence tauna , neo ' mopahamalia . Alata ' ala pai ' Kristus Yesus moto mpotiroi - ta , nte mala ' eka - na to moroli ' !

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Neo ' nusosai mpo ' ongko ' tauna jadi ' pangkeni agama , nee - neo ' mpai ' iko lau - mi to rakahurui ane mpobabehi - ra jeko ' . Nuparesa ' ulu kehi - ra , pai ' lako ' nudampa pale - nu hi tanuana ' - ra mpo ' ongko ' - ra jadi ' pangkeni agama . Pelompehi bona moroli ' oa ' po ' ingku - nu .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
