text2: Neo ' wo ' o - koi ngkahina rahi doi . Pokagoe ' - mi - hana napa to ria hi koi ' . Apa ' ria lolita Alata ' ala to mpo ' uli ' : Uma - ko kupelele ' , uma - ko kupalahii . "

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: Toe pai ' moroho nono - ta , pai ' ta ' uli ' : Pue ' to mpotulungi - a , uma - a me ' eka ' . Uma kupoka ' eka ' ba napa to rababehi - ka manusia ' . "

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: Neo ' uma nikiwoi pangkeni - pangkeni - ni to ri ' ulu , to mpoparata - kokoi Lolita Alata ' ala . Penonoi po ' ingku - ra duu ' hi kamate - ra , pai ' penau ' pepangala ' - ra .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: Yesus Kristus uma mobali ' : owi , wae lau , pai ' duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Neo ' nituku ' tudui ' to mepuhai pai ' to mosisala hante pepangala ' - ta , hewa rapa ' - na ada pai ' palia hi pongkoni ' . Ane agama - ra to Yahudi , wori ' ada to ratuku ' hi pongkoni ' , tapi ' ada toe uma mpokeni kalompea ' hi tauna to mpotuku ' . Agina - pi tarohoi nono - ta mpenonoi kabula rala - na Alata ' ala , apa ' toe - hana to mpokeni kalompea ' hi kita ' .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Ria - taka - tana to meliu kalompe ' - na ngkai ada agama Yahudi . Imam Bohe agama Yahudi mposumale ' porewua hi lolo meja ' pontunua pepue ' mpohompo ' jeko ' ntodea . Aga imam - imam to mobago hi rala Kemah Pepuea ' , rapalii ' mpokoni ' napa - napa ngkai pepue ' toe . Kita ' - tana , ria - taka pepue ' to meliu kalompe ' - na , toe - mi kamate - na Yesus mpohompo ' jeko ' - ta . Butu - butu dua - ta mporata kalompea ' ngkai mate - na Yesus toe .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Ane porewua to rasumale ' mpohompo ' jeko ' , raa ' - na nakeni Imam Bohe mesua ' hi rala Kamar to meliu tena Karoli ' - na , aga woto - na rakeni hilou hi mali ngata pai ' ratunu duu ' jadi ' awu .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Hewa porewua toe ratunu hi mali ngata , wae wo ' o Yesus rakeni hilou ntara hi wobo ' wala pai ' rapatehi hi mali ngata , bona raa ' - na mpakaroli ' ntodea .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Ngkai toe - mi ompi ' , hewa Yesus hilou hi mali ngata bona raruge ' , wae wo ' o kita ' kana mpobahaka petukua ' - ta to ntani ' - na , pai ' mpotuku ' Yesus - damo , nau ' ba hema - hema to mporuge ' - ta .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Apa ' hi rala dunia ' toi , uma ria po ' ohaa ' - ta to tida . Mpali ' - ta po ' ohaa ' to mpeno - na .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Jadi ' , ompi ' - ompi ' , hante petauntongoi ' - na Yesus toe , mai - tamo mpotonu ncuu pepue ' - ta hi Alata ' ala . Pepue ' - ta toe , pontarima kasi - ta pai ' lolita - ta to mpomobohe hanga ' - na .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Neo ' tabahakai mpobabehi gau ' to lompe ' pai ' mewai ' hi doo , apa ' toe - mi pepue ' to napokono Alata ' ala .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Tuku ' hawa ' pangkeni - ni pai ' pengkorui - ra . Apa ' hira ' to mpewili ' katuwu ' kao ' - ni , pai ' hira ' - hana mpai ' to mpotompoi ' pompekunea ' Alata ' ala ngkai pobago - ra . Tuku ' - koi hawa ' - ra bona goe ' - ra mobago . Ane uma nituku ' hawa ' - ra , susa ' nono - ra , ka ' omea - na koi ' lau - mi to nakarontoi rasi ' .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Kiperapi ' bona niposampayai oa ' - kai . Ki ' inca kamoroli ' mpontolumanu ' nono - kai , apa ' hi butu nyala - na doko ' oa ' - kai mpobabehi to monoa ' .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Pai ' aku ' , mperapi ' mpu ' u - a bona niposampayai - a - kuwo , bona sohi ' - a nculii ' pai ' mpohirua ' - kokoi .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: Hi kamate - na Pue ' - ta Yesus , raa ' - na mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai ' - ta hante Alata ' ala duu ' kahae - hae - na . Alata ' ala mpopemata - i nculii ' ngkai kamatea , pai ' napajadi ' - i Poko Topo ' ewu , pai ' kita ' toi - mi bima ewua - na . Toe pai ' mekakae - a hi Alata ' ala , pehupaa ' kalompea ' tuwu ' ,

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: kuperapi ' bona narewai hono ' - koi hante butu nyala to lompe ' , bona ma ' ala - koi mpobabehi konoa - na . Kuperapi ' bona hante petauntongoi ' - na Yesus Kristus , Alata ' ala mobago hi rala nono - ta , mpobabehi napa to napokono . Une ' - imi duu ' kahae - hae - na . Amin .

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , kuperapi ' bona neo ' - koi oha mpo ' epe paresa ' - ku toi , apa ' sura - ku toi rede ' - wadi .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: Bona ni ' inca wo ' o : ompi ' - ta Timotius , rabahaka - imi ngkai tarungku ' . Ane sohi ' - i rata hi rehe ' i , kubawa - i - damo tilou mpencuai ' - koi .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Parata - kakai tabe - kai hi hawe ' ea pangkeni - ni pai ' hi hawe ' ea topetuku ' Yesus to hi retu . Wori ' tabe ngkai ompi ' - ompi ' - ni to ngkai Italia .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Pue ' mpogane ' - koi omea . Hudu rei .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: Sura toi ngkai aku ' Yakobus , batua Alata ' ala pai ' batua Pue ' Yesus Kristus ; kupakatu hi to hampulu ' rontina to Israel to pagaa ' - gaa ' hi humalili ' dunia ' . Wori ' tabe !

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Ompi ' - ku hawe ' ea ! Ane wori ' nyala kasusaa ' pai ' pesori to mporumpa ' - ta , neo ' tapopeda ' nono , agina tapokagoe ' lau - wadi .

text: Knowing this , that the trying of your faith worketh patience .
text2: Apa ' ta ' inca : ane tida - ta mepangala ' hi Pue ' hi rala kasusaa ' , jadi ' moroho - ta mpai ' mpengkatarii ba napa - napa .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
text2: Toe pai ' kana tari ncuu - ta duu ' hi kahudua - na , bona moroho mpu ' u pepangala ' - ta pai ' uma ria kasalaia ' - na ba kakuraa ' - na .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: Ane ria - ta to uma monoto nono - ta , agina taperapi ' kanotoa nono ngkai Alata ' ala . Bate nawai ' moto - ta mpai ' kanotoa nono to taperapi ' . Apa ' hi butu dua tauna Alata ' ala mewai ' ngkai kamanara - na , uma - i ria mewai ' ngkahuru .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: Aga ane merapi ' - ta hi Alata ' ala , kana mepangala ' mpu ' u - ta , uma ma ' ala morara ' nono - ta . Apa ' tauna to morara ' nono - na , hewa rauniri to nawaro ngolu ' hilou tumai .

text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways .
text2: Apa ' tauna to hewa toe morompenga nono - na , uma ria kanoo - noaa ' - na hi rala katuwu ' - na . Toe pai ' neo ' nasarumaka kanarata - na ba napa - napa ngkai Pue ' .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: Ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ku ! Kita ' to kabu , kana goe ' - ta apa ' nau ' mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ta , napokalangko moto - ta Alata ' ala .

text: But the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
text2: Wae wo ' o kita ' to mo ' ua ' , kana goe ' - ta apa ' Alata ' ala mpakadingki ' nono - ta . Apa ' manusia ' topo ' ua ' hewa sehe kowo ' : hangkale ' liu - wadi katuwu ' - ra .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: Apa ' ane mehupa ' - damo eo pai ' mokara - pi , kaliliu molaju - mi kowo ' , alaa - na roda ' - mi sehe - na , uma - ipi ncola . Wae wo ' o topo ' ua ' - e : bate mate moto wo ' o - ra - rawo bula - ra mpo ' urusi - pidi ka ' uaa ' - ra .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Morasi ' tauna to tari hi rala kasusaa ' pai ' pesori . Apa ' ane ntaha - ra , mporata - ra mpai ' katuwua ' to lompe ' to najanci Alata ' ala hi tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' - i .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: Ane ria - ta to rasori bona mpobabehi gau ' to dada ' a , neo ' ta ' uli ' hewa toi : " Pesori toi ngkai Alata ' ala . " Uma makono toe , apa ' Alata ' ala uma - i ma ' ala rasori bona mpobabehi to dada ' a , pai ' uma wo ' o - i mposori - ta bona mpobabehi - ta to dada ' a .

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: Butu dua tauna rasori ane kahinaa nono - na moto - hawo to mpodii ' - i pai ' mpo ' opa - i .

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: Ane natuku ' kahinaa nono - na toe , walikaa - na mpobabehi jeko ' lau - imi . Pai ' ane mpobabehi jeko ' ncuu - i , ka ' omea - na mpai ' mate - i pai ' - i ragaa ' ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: Ompi ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' ! Neo ' - ta ma ' ala rabagiu : Alata ' ala uma - i - hana mposori - ta .

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: Hawe ' ea pewai ' to lompe ' pai ' to hono ' tarata ngkai Alata ' ala - hana . Hi ' a - mi to mpajadi ' hawe ' ea anu mehini hi langi ' . Hawe ' ea to mehini hi langi ' toe , ria kabalia ' - na . Aga Alata ' ala , uma - hana ria kabalia ' - na , pai ' uma wo ' o ria ka ' uncua kalompea ' - na .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Napohowa ' - taka lolita - na to makono , pai ' hante lolita - na toe napajadi ' - tamo ana ' - na . Nababehi toe ntuku ' konoa - na moto , bona ngkai hawe ' ea to napajadi ' , kita ' jadi ' pomobohea - na .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: Ompi ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' ! Penonoi lompe ' - e ' tohe ' i : Butu dua - ta kana rodo mpe ' epei , neo ' haliu mololita pai ' neo ' jolia moroe .

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: Apa ' tauna to moroe , uma - ra mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Toe pai ' kana tabahaka hawe ' ea gau ' to babo ' pai ' po ' ingku to dada ' a to jadi ' kabiasaa - ta , pai ' tapakadingki ' nono - ta mpe ' epei lolita to nahawu ' Alata ' ala hi rala nono - ta . Apa ' lolita - na toe - mi to mobaraka ' mpobahaka - ta ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: Jadi ' , kana tatuku ' - mi Lolita Pue ' , neo ' ra ' epe mara - wadi . Apa ' ane ta ' epe mara - wadi , mpobagiu woto - ta moto - tamo .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Tauna to mpo ' epe Lolita Pue ' pai ' uma ratuku ' , hira ' hewa tauna to mponaa lence - na hi pampewao ' .

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: Ka ' oti - na nanaa lence - na pai ' - i malai , uma - pi nakiwoi ba beiwa - ki lence - na .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: Toe pai ' kana tapoinono lompe ' hawa ' Pue ' pai ' tida - ta mpotuku ' . Apa ' hawa ' Pue ' , moroli ' lia , pai ' ria kabaraka ' - na mpobahaka - ta ngkai jeko ' . Jadi ' , neo ' ta ' epe mara - wadi , pai ' kaliliu talipo ' . Kana tatuku ' hawa ' - na toe . Apa ' tauna to hewa toe - mi to nagane ' Pue ' hi hawe ' ea to nababehi .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Ane ria tauna to mpo ' uli ' topo ' agama - i , hiaa ' uma najagai wiwi - na , mpobagiu woto - na moto - imi . Uma ria kalaua po ' agama - na tetu .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Ane po ' ingku tauna to mo ' agama mpu ' u hante uma ria pebagiua - na ba kasalaia ' - na hi poncilo Alata ' ala to Tuama , hewa toi : mpewili ' ana ' ilu pai ' tobalu to mpe ' ahii ' tuwu ' - ra , pai ' neo ' mpotuku ' gau ' - ra to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Ompi ' - ku hawe ' ea ! Pue ' - ta , Pue ' Yesus Kristus , uma mowo kabaraka ' - na . Jadi ' , ane mepangala ' - ta - damo hi Pue ' - e , neo ' - ta mpelence tauna .

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: Rapa ' - na rata hi porumpua - ta hadua tauna to mohincii bulawa pai ' moheai to ncola , pai ' rata wo ' o - hawo hadua tokabu to moheai ronto - na .

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: Ane meliu pebila ' - ta hi tauna to lompe ' pohea - na toe , pai ' ta ' uli ' - ki : " Mai - ta mohura hi pohuraa to lompe ' tohe ' i , " hiaa ' hi tauna to kabu ta ' uli ' : " Mokore hi retu - moko mai , " ba ta ' uli ' - ki : " Mohura retu - moko hi ila ' , "

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: batua - na , tapoposisala hingka doo - ta , pai ' tapelence tauna hante patuju to dada ' a .

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: Ompi ' - ku to kupe ' ahi ' ! Pe ' epei lompe ' - dile : tauna to mpe ' ahii ' katuwu ' - ra , nau ' uma - ra mo ' ua ' hi dunia ' toi , Alata ' ala mpelihi - ra bona jadi ' mo ' ua ' hi pepangala ' - ra . Hira ' toe - mi mpai ' to mporata rasi ' hi rala Kamagaua ' - na , hewa to najanci - raka tauna to mpoka ' ahi ' - i .

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: Hiaa ' ane hewa toe we ' i pololita - ta hi torata - e , hewa taruge ' lau - ramo doo - ta to kabu ! Hiaa ' hema to biasa - na mpobalinai ' - koi pai ' mpakilu - koi hi totu ' a ngata ? Bate tauna topo ' ua ' - hana !

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: Topo ' ua ' toe - ramo to mporuge ' hanga ' to tabila ' , to tatarima ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: Po ' ingku - ta to lompe ' ompi ' , ane tatuku ' hawa ' Magau ' - ta to tabasa hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Kana tapoka ' ahi ' doo - ta hewa kampoka ' ahi ' - ta woto - ta moto . "

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: Aga ane tapoposisala - di tauna ntuku ' tuwu ' - ra ba lence - ra , mojeko ' - ta ompi ' . Monoa ' - mi kamojeko ' - ta , apa ' Atura Pue ' - mi to tatiboki toe - e .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Apa ' nau ' tahuduwukui mpotuku ' hawe ' ea parenta to hi rala Atura Pue ' , ane tatiboki nau ' hanyala - wadi , bate masala ' - ta - hana . Ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' , hewa to tatiboki hawe ' ea lau - mi .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Apa ' ria hawa ' Pue ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Neo ' mobualo ' . " Pai ' ria wo ' o hawa ' - na to mpo ' uli ' : " Neo ' mepatehi . " Jadi ' , nau ' uma - ta mobualo ' , aga ane mepatehi - ta , mpotiboki Atura Pue ' oa ' - tamo .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Toe pai ' kana tapelompehi pololita - ta pai ' po ' ingku - ta . Apa ' kita ' toi - mi to rapohurai kara - kara - ta ntuku ' Atura Pue ' to mpobahaka manusia ' ngkai jeko ' .

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: Apa ' tauna to uma ria ahi ' - na hi doo - na , Pue ' mpai ' mpohuku ' - i hante uma ria ahi ' - na . Aga hi tauna to ma ' ahi ' hi doo - na , Pue ' wo ' o mpai ' mpopohiloi - i ahi ' - na hi eo pehukua ' .

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Ompi ' - ku hawe ' ea ! Napa - mi - hawo kalaua - na ane ta ' uli ' mepangala ' - ta hi Pue ' , pai ' po ' ingku - ta uma mpotuku ' konoa - na . Ha tebahaka - ta mpai ' ngkai huku ' jeko ' - ta ane hewa toe - wadi pepangala ' - tae ? Uma - e ' !

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Rapa ' - na ria hadua ompi ' - ta to mparaluu pohea , pai ' uma wo ' o hono ' pongkoni ' - na butu eo - na .

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: Napa - mi - hawo kalaua - na ane ta ' uli ' - ki hewa toi : " Pelompehi momako ' ! Kusarumaka moheai lompe ' - ko pai ' ngkoni ' mpebohui - moko ! " Hiaa ' ane uma - i tawai ' napa to naparaluu , napa - mi - hawo kalaua - nae ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: Wae wo ' o hante pepangala ' - ta : ane ta ' uli ' mepangala ' - ta hi Pue ' , pai ' po ' ingku - ta uma mpotuku ' konoa - na , batua - na mepangala ' mara - ta - wadi . Pepangala ' to hewa toe , hewa pae to lopa ' - - uma ria ihi - na .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: Meka ' ria mpai ' to mpo ' uli ' hewa toi : " To hadua ncarumaka hi pepangala ' - na , to hadua ncarumaka hi kalompe ' po ' ingku - na . " Hiaa ' aku ' mpo ' uli ' : uma - ko bisa mpopohiloi - a pepangala ' - nu tetu - e ane uma lompe ' po ' ingku - nu . Aga aku ' , ngkai po ' ingku - ku to lompe ' , kupopohiloi - koko karia - na wo ' o pepangala ' - ku hi Pue ' .

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: Ha tapangala ' kahadudua - na - wadi Alata ' ala - e ? Makono moto tetu . Aga ane tetu - wadi , uma hono ' ! Bangku ' seta - hawoe ' , rapangala ' wo ' o - rawo kahadudua - na - wadi Alata ' ala . Toe pai ' moridi ' - ra nakeni eka ' - ra .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: Wojo lia - ta ompi ' ane ta ' uli ' hono ' - mi mepangala ' mara - wadi hi Alata ' ala hante uma ria po ' ingku - ta to lompe ' . Uma ria tuju - na pepangala ' to hewa tetu .

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: Kiwoi tutura - na Abraham : Alata ' ala mpotarima - i napomonoa ' - i hi poncilo - na sabana po ' ingku - na , apa ' Abraham mpotonu Ishak ana ' - na hi Alata ' ala hi lolo watu pontunua pepuea ' .

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: Hi tutura tohe ' e , monoto - mi tahilo : pepangala ' - na Abraham incana hi po ' ingku - na . Jadi ' , ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' po ' ingku - na toe mpakaroli ' pepangala ' - na .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: Jadi ' , madupa ' - mi lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : " Abraham mepangala ' hi Alata ' ala , pai ' ngkai pepangala ' - na toe , Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' kamonoa ' - na hi poncilo - na . " Toe pai ' rahanga ' - i bale - na Alata ' ala .

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Monoto - mi tahilo kanapomonoa ' - ra Alata ' ala tauna to lompe ' po ' ingku - ra , uma wule ' mepangala ' mara - wadi .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Wae wo ' o tutura - na Rahab , tobine to uma tumotoa gau ' - na owi . Ba hangkuja dua tantara to Yahudi rahubui hilou mopadaso ' hi ngata bali ' , pai ' Rahab toe - imi to mpopehani - ra hi tomi - na pai ' natulungi - ra malai ntara ohea ntani ' - na . Ngkai po ' ingku - na to lompe ' toe - mi pai ' alaa - na rapohewa tauna to monoa ' - i .

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Jadi ' , hewa woto to uma inohaa ' , ta ' uli ' mate - imi . Wae wo ' o pepangala ' - ta , ane uma incana hi po ' ingku - ta , hibali mate , uma ria kalaua - na .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Ompi ' - ku hawe ' ea ! Neo ' - koi wori ' to doko ' jadi ' guru agama . Apa ' ta ' inca moto ompi ' , motomo - pi mpai ' pomparesa ' - na Alata ' ala hi kita ' to jadi ' guru ngkai pomparesa ' - na hi tau ntani ' - na .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Kita ' omea pontu - na hala ' mpo ' ingku . Ane rapa ' - na ria tauna to uma hala ' mpo ' ingku hi pololita - ra , hira ' toe - mi tauna to moroli ' . Ma ' ala - ra mpokuasai hawe ' ea kahinaa nono - ra .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Anu to kedi ' ma ' ala mpokuasai to bohe . Biasa - na tasamai ' jara ' bona natuku ' konoa - ta . Hante sama ' to kedi ' ma ' ala tahawai ' jara ' to bohe .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Wae wo ' o kapal hi tahi ' : nau ' hewa apa - mi kabohe - na pai ' nawui ngolu ' to bohe , kapal toe rapopomako ' hiapa konoa pangkeni - na hante kaju to kedi ' - wadi to rahanga ' poguli ' .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Wae wo ' o hante jila ' manusia ' - e . Nau ' kedi ' lia - wadi jila ' - ta , aga uma mowo kabohe pepakeni - na . Ngkai apu to kedi ' - wadi , ponulu to mowela ' bisa mampu .

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: Wae wo ' o hante lolita to tapohowa ' hante jila ' - ta . Lolita - ta toe hibalia kada ' a - na hante apu . Hi rala woto - ta , jila ' - ta toe - mi to mpopehuwu wori ' nyala kada ' aa - na , meliu ngkai hawe ' ea bagia woto - ta to ntani ' - na . Lolita to tapohowa ' hante jila ' - ta hewa apu to ngkai naraka , to mpakada ' a hobo ' katuwu ' - ta .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: Butu nyala binata to me ' ila , danci , binata to menyolo pai ' uru hi rala ue , ma ' ala rapomou ' , pai ' ria - mi tauna to mpomou ' - ra .

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: Aga uma ria tauna to ma ' ala mpomou ' jila ' manusia ' ! Jila ' manusia ' dada ' a lia - i , pai ' uma - i ma ' ala hawaia ' . Lolita to tapohowa ' hante jila ' - ta hewa rasu to mepatehi !

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: Lolita - ta ma ' ala tapake ' mpo ' une ' Pue ' Ala Tuama - ta . Pai ' ma ' ala wo ' o tapake ' mpotipo ' doo - ta to napajadi ' Pue ' Ala ntuku ' lence - na .

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: Ngkai wiwi to hameha ' lau - wadi mehuwu lolita pe ' une ' pai ' lolita petipo ' . Ompi ' - ku hawe ' ea ! Kakoo - kono - na ke neo ' - hawo hewa toe . Uma - hawo natao ane jila ' - ta tapake ' mpohowa ' to lompe ' pai ' mpohowa ' to dada ' a wo ' o .

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: Ha ria wo ' o - hawo ue tuwu ' to mpopehupa ' ue to mononto pai ' ue to mopai ' wo ' o ?

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Kaju ara uma - i mowua ' zaitun . Pai ' kaju anggur , uma - i mowua ' ara . Buwu to mopoi ' uma - i mpopehuwu ue to mononto .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: Ane ria hi laintongo ' - ta tauna to lompe ' pekiri - na pai ' monoto nono - na , kana napopehuwu kanotoa nono - na toe hante po ' ingku - na to lompe ' pai ' hante kehi - na to mehuwu ngkai kadingki ' nono - na , hewa to natao hi tauna to monoto nono - ra .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: Tapi ' ane ria hi rala nono - ta to mohingi ' hi doo - ta pai ' doko ' mpopeliu woto - ta moto , neo ' tapomolangko nono - ta , pai ' neo ' ta ' uli ' monoto mpu ' u - mi - tana nono - ta . Apa ' kehi - ta toe mosisala hante tudui ' to makono .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Kanotoa nono to hewa toe , bela - hana to ngkai Pue ' . Tetu ngkai dunia ' , ngkai kahinaa nono - ta , pai ' ngkai seta !

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: Apa ' ane ria tauna to mohingi ' pai ' - ra mpopeliu woto - ra moto , bate ria wo ' o potudaa ' pai ' butu nyala kehi to dada ' a .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: Aga ane tauna to mporata mpu ' u kanotoa nono ngkai Alata ' ala , hewa toi po ' ingku - ra : lomo ' - lomo ' - na moroli ' nono - ra . Doko ' tuwu ' hintuwu ' - ra hante doo , mo ' olu nono - ra pai ' - ra mpotuku ' konoa doo . Jau - ra mpotulungi tauna to mpe ' ahii ' , pai ' mpobabehi kehi to lompe ' . Uma - ra mopahamalia pai ' uma - ra turu mpomahapi .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Tauna to mpokono kahintuwuaa ' pai ' mpali ' kahintuwuaa ' , po ' ingku - ra bate mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: Napa pai ' alaa - na ria potudaa ' pai ' pomehonoa ' - ni ompi ' ? Tetu - le bate mehupa ' ngkai kahinaa nono - ni to dada ' a . Kahinaa nono - ni to dada ' a toe - mi to manga ' e ncuu hi rala nono - ni , mpokeni - koi mpobabehi to dada ' a .

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Mehina - koi aga uma niratai to nipokahina . Toe pai ' alaa - na mepatehi - mokoi . Mohingi ' - koi mpokahina anu doo , aga uma oa ' niratai . Toe pai ' alaa - na momehono ' pai ' motuda ' - mokoi . Uma oa ' niratai to nipali ' , apa ' uma niperapi ' hi Pue ' .

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: Ba nau ' niperapi ' - mi , uma oa ' - koi rawai ' , apa ' sala ' patuju - ni . Apa ' napa to niperapi ' tetu , doko ' nipake ' mpoka ' oha nono - ni - wadi .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: Koi ' , uma - koi tida mpotuku ' Pue ' ! Ha ni ' inca wa ompi ' , ane tatuku ' gau ' to dada ' a hi dunia ' toi , kita ' jadi ' bali ' - na Alata ' ala ? Hangkani - pi ku ' uli ' : hema to mpokono gau ' to dada ' a hi dunia ' toi , hi ' a - mi bali ' Alata ' ala !

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: Ba nipekiri - koina wae - e ompi ' , uma ria tuju - na ihi ' Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : Alata ' ala mpajadi ' nono manusia ' , tapi ' nono - ta toe uma mowo hina - na .

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: Aga petulungia to nawai ' - taka Pue ' ngkai kabula rala - na meliu - hana kamoroho - na ngkai hawe ' ea hina nono - ta . Toe pai ' ria te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' : " Alata ' ala mpo ' ewa tauna to molangko nono - ra . Tapi ' tauna to dingki ' nono - ra , natulungi - ra ngkai kabula rala - na . "

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: Toe pai ' kuparesai ' - koi ompi ' : mengkoru - mokoi hi Alata ' ala . Ewa - imi Magau ' Anudaa ' , napetiboi ' moto - koi mpai ' .

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: Mohui ' - imi Alata ' ala , pai ' Hi ' a wo ' o mpomohui ' - koi . Koi ' to mojeko ' , bahakai - mi mpobabehi jeko ' . Koi ' to morompenga nono - ni , pomoroli ' nono - ni .

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Kana soho ' nono - ta pai ' geo ' - ta mpokiwoi kamojeko ' - ta . Apa ' ane ta ' inca karia - na jeko ' - ta , uma - hawo lompe ' tapokagoe ' , kana taposoho ' nono - hawo pai ' tapokageo ' .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Kana tapakadingki ' nono - ta hi nyanyoa Pue ' , napomolangko moto - ta mpai ' .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , neo ' - ta mometuntui ' . Tauna to mpotuntui ' ba mposalai ' ompi ' - na , hewa mpotuntui ' ba mposalai ' Atura Pue ' lau - imi . Tauna to mposalai ' ompi ' - na , uma - i mpotuku ' Atura Pue ' . Ma ' ala - mi ta ' uli ' , hewa hi ' a lau - mi to mpobotuhi Atura Pue ' .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Hiaa ' hadua - na - wadi to masipato ' mpowai ' atura hi manusia ' pai ' to jadi ' Topobotuhi . Hi ' a - mi Alata ' ala , to ria kuasa - na mpohuku ' - ta ba mpobahaka - ta ngkai huku ' . Jadi ' kita ' toi , hema rahi - tadie , pai ' - ta daho ' mpotuntui ' doo - tae !

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: Toi paresa ' - ku hi koi ' to molangko nono - ni . Mololita - koi hewa toi : " Eo toe lau ba mepulo mpai ' , me ' ongko ' - kai hilou hi ngata nu ' anu , tida - makai hi ria nte hampae , modaga pai ' - kai mporata rasi ' . "

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: Hiaa ' bo uma ni ' incai napa to jadi ' mepulo ! Beiwa ntoto katuwu ' - ni ? Katuwu ' - nile hewa rangahu : kahiloa hampai ' , pai ' muu - mule ' moronto - mi !

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: Kakoo - kono - na kana hewa toe - di - hawo - le lolita - nie : " Ane napokono Pue ' , tuwu ' - kai pai ' ma ' ala kibabehi nu ' anu pai ' nu ' anu . "

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: Hiaa ' uma - di hewa toe pololita - nie . Molangko lau - di nono - ni pai ' mpopeliu tuwu ' - ni . Hawe ' ea to hewa tetu , bate dada ' a - hana .

text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: Jadi ' , tauna to mpo ' inca mpobabehi to lompe ' , pai ' uma - di nababehi - e , bate napojeko ' .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: Toi paresa ' - ku hi tauna topo ' ua ' . Motantangi ' - mokoi pai ' geo ' , apa ' narumpa ' - koi mpai ' kaparia .

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Ka ' uaa ' - ni moronto - mi . Pohea - ni ntoto ' - mi .

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: Bulawa pai ' salaka ' to niloju ' , ta ' igaraa ' - mi . Pai ' ka ' uaa ' - ni to ta ' igaraa ' tetu mpai ' jadi ' tanda kahala ' mpopake ' - ni ka ' uaa ' - ni . Mpoloju ' - koi rewa hi dunia ' , hiaa ' dunia ' toi neo ' hudu - mi ! Toe pai ' rasesa ' mpu ' u - koi mpai ' , hewa to nakoni ' apu .

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: Tauna to mobago hi bonea - ni , uma - ra niwai ' gaji ' . Epe - mi pontodohaka - ra ! Topobago to mepae hi bonea - ni mekakae mperapi ' tulungi , pai ' pekakae - ra toe na ' epe - mi Pue ' Alata ' ala , Pue ' to bohe baraka ' - na .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Koi ' hewa porewua to raruduhi pai ' rasumale ' , apa ' hi dunia ' toi tuwu ' mpomaradika - koi , mpali ' kagoea ' - ni , tapi ' ka ' omea - na mpai ' bate rahuku ' - koi .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Koi ' mpohuku ' pai ' mpopatehi tauna to uma masala ' , to uma - ra bisa mpo ' ewa - koi .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' , pai ' kana tari - ta duu ' - na Pue ' rata nculii ' . Hilo pe ' posabara topolia ' - e , mpopea - ra duu ' - na ria wua ' polia ' - ra to rasarumaka . Mosabara - ra mpopea uda ka ' oti - ra ntuja ' , duu ' - na rata tempo - na mepae .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Wae wo ' o kita ' kana mosabara ompi ' . Pakatida nono - ta , apa ' neo ' rata mpu ' u - imi Pue ' - ta .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: Ompi ' , neo ' - ta ngkunuti pai ' momesaa - salai ' , bona neo ' - ta rabelahi huku ' . Apa ' Pue ' , etu - imi mai hi wobo ' ! Hi ' a - damo mpai ' to mpobotuhi omea .

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: Ompi ' - ku hawe ' ea ! Kiwoi - koi nabi owi to mpokeni Lolita Pue ' . Mosabara - ra pai ' tari - ra mpotodohaka kaparia . Agina tatuku ' posabara - ra .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: Apa ' hema - ra - kona to ta ' uli ' morasi ' - e ? To morasi ' - le , tauna to ntaha hi rala kaparia . Ni ' inca moto tutura - na Ayub , kantaha - na hi rala kaparia - na . Pai ' ni ' inca beiwa Pue ' mpogane ' - i hi ka ' omea - na . Apa ' Pue ' , ma ' ahi ' lia - i , pai ' lompe ' nono - na .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: Ompi ' - ku hawe ' ea ! Ngkai hawe ' ea paresa ' - ku , toi - mi to meliu mpu ' u : Neo ' - ta mosumpa , mpokahangai ' langi ' ba mpokahangai ' dunia ' ba napa - napa ntani ' - na . Ane patuju - ta mpo ' uli ' io ' , uli ' - mi - hana " Io ' . " Ane patuju - ta mpo ' uli ' uma , uli ' - mi " Uma , " bona neo ' - ta rabelahi huku ' .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: Ane ria hi laintongo ' - ta to narumpa ' kasusaa ' , agina mosampaya - i . Ane ria to goe ' , agina morona ' - i mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: Ane ria to peda ' , agina mpokio ' - i pangkeni agama , bona pangkeni toera mposampayai - i pai ' mpogelai ' - i hante lana hi rala hanga ' Pue ' .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Ane mosampaya - ra hante nono to mepangala ' , tauna to peda ' bate mo ' uri ' mpai ' . Pue ' mpaka ' uri ' - i , pai ' ane ria jeko ' - na , ra ' ampungi - ki .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Toe - mi pai ' kana himpau tapangaku ' sala ' - ta pai ' momeposampayai , bona mo ' uri ' - ta . Posampaya tauna to monoa ' nono - ra moso ' lia .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: Kiwoi tutura - na nabi Elia owi . Nabi Elia toei , manusia ' hewa kita ' wo ' o - i - wadi - hawo . Mosampaya - i hante nono - na mpu ' u bona neo ' udaa . Uma mpu ' u - pi dungku uda rala - na tolu mpae ono mula .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Oti toe , mosampaya wo ' o - imi , duu ' - na langi ' mpopana ' u - mi uda pai ' alaa - na ria - mi wua ' polia ' - ra .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Ompi ' - ku hawe ' ea ! Ane ria doo - ta to meleli ' ngkai tudui ' to makono , pai ' ria hadua to mpotete ' - i nculii ' hi Pue ' , lompe ' kehi - na toe .

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: Apa ' tauna to mpokeni topojeko ' nculii ' ngkai kehi - na to sala ' , mpohore - imi ngkai silaka to duu ' kahae - hae - na , pai ' jeko ' - na to wori ' te ' ampungi - mi .

text: Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
text2: Sura toi ngkai aku ' , Petrus , suro Yesus Kristus , kupakatu tilou hi koi ' ompi ' - ompi ' to napelihi - mokoi Alata ' ala , pai ' to pahawu ' - hawu ' hi propinsi Pontus , Galatia , Kapadokia , Asia pai ' Bitinia , pai ' to mesowo ' hi olo ' tauna to uma mpo ' incai Alata ' ala .

text: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace unto you , and peace , be multiplied .
text2: Napelihi - koi Alata ' ala to Tuama apa ' wae - mi patuju - na ngkai lomo ' - na . Napelihi - koi hante pobago Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to mpopajadi ' - koi bagia - na , alaa - na mengkoru - mokoi hi Yesus Kristus pai ' napomoroli ' - mokoi hante raa ' - na . Wori ' tabe : mekakae - a hi Alata ' ala bona nawai ' - koi kawoo - woria ' gane ' - na pai ' kalompea ' tuwu ' .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
text2: Mai - tamo mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala , Tuama - na Pue ' - ta Yesus Kristus ! Ngkai pe ' ahi ' - na to bohe , nawai ' - tamo katuwua ' to bo ' u , pai ' katuwua ' to bo ' u toe tarata ngkai katuwu ' - na nculii ' Yesus Kristus . Toe pai ' moroho poncarumaka - ta .

text: To an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
text2: Tasarumaka Alata ' ala mpowai ' - ta rasi ' to naporodo hi hawe ' ea ana ' - na . Rasi ' toe , to uma mogero ba mobali ' ba jadi ' pope , apa ' natimamahi - taka hi suruga .

text: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
text2: Hawe ' ea toe ompi ' , bate nipobagia , apa ' mepangala ' - mokoi hi Alata ' ala pai ' napewili ' - koi hante baraka ' - na bona mporata - koi mpai ' kalompea ' to rodo ami ' - mi nawai ' - kokoi hi Eo Kiama .

text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a season , if need be , ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations :
text2: Ngkai toe - mi ompi ' , pai ' kana goe ' oa ' - koi . Nau ' tempo toi susa ' nono - ni apa ' wori ' nyala pesori mporumpa ' - koi , goe ' moto nono - ni , apa ' kasusaa ' - ni toe hangkale ' liu - wadi ,

text: That the trial of your faith , being much more precious than of gold that perisheth , though it be tried with fire , might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ :
text2: pai ' patuju - na bona rapongincai karoho pepangala ' - ni . Bulawa raparesa ' hante apu raponciloi - ki ba bulawa mpu ' u - idi ba bela - di . Pai ' pepangala ' - ni toe , meliu kasuli ' oli - na ngkai bulawa , apa ' bulawa uma tida duu ' kahae - hae - na . Jadi ' , hewa bulawa raparesa ' hante apu , wae wo ' o pepangala ' - ni raparesa ' hante pesori . Bona ane monoto mpu ' u - damo pepangala ' - ni , ra ' une ' , rabila ' pai ' rapomolangko - koi mpai ' , nto ' u karata - na nculii ' Yesus Kristus hi dunia ' toi .

text: Whom having not seen , ye love ; in whom , though now ye see him not , yet believing , ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory :
text2: Yesus Kristus toei , nau ' ko ' ia - i ria nihiloi owi , nipoka ' ahi ' - imi . Nau ' uma - i nihiloi wae lau , nipangala ' - imi . Toe pai ' goe ' nono - ni , pai ' kagoe ' nono - ni toe uma - pi hudu ra ' uli ' , apa ' bohe mpu ' u .

text: Receiving the end of your faith , even the salvation of your souls .
text2: Goe ' - koi , apa ' nirata - mi wua ' pepangala ' - ni , toe - mi kalompea ' tuwu ' kao ' - ni .

text: Searching what , or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify , when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glory that should follow .
text2: Nabi - nabi to owi mpolowa ami ' - mi beiwa Alata ' ala mpopohiloi - koi ahi ' - na hi tempo toi . Ngkai petete ' Inoha ' Kristus to hi rala nono - ra , Alata ' ala mpopo ' incai ami ' - ramo kaparia to mporumpa ' woto Kristus mpai ' , pai ' kabohe tuwu ' to narata ane timpaliu - damo kaparia - na toe . Aga nabi to owi toera , uma ra ' incai beiwa kadupa ' - na to ralowa toe . Toe pai ' rapewulihi ' mpu ' u , doko ' ra ' inca ba nto ' uma pai ' beiwa kadupa ' - na hawe ' ea to ralowa toe .

text: Unto whom it was revealed , that not unto themselves , but unto us they did minister the things , which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven ; which things the angels desire to look into .
text2: Alata ' ala mpo ' uli ' - raka nabi toera : napa to ralowa toe , bela hi hira ' moto kadungkua - na . To ralowa toe , hi koi ' - hana kadungkua - na . Pai ' hewa toe lau , napa to ralowa nabi to owi toera , raparata - mi hante kanoto - noto - na hi koi ' , apa ' ria - mi tauna to mpoparata - kokoi Kareba Lompe ' hante baraka ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' to ngkai Alata ' ala . Bangku ' mala ' eka - hawoe ' , doko ' lia - ra - rawo mpewulihi ' kalompea ' to nirata - mi toe - e ompi ' .

text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind , be sober , and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , apa ' ria - mi poncarumakaa - ni to moroho toe - e , toe pai ' ku ' uli ' - kokoi : pakanoto - mi nono - ni , neo ' lempe ' , pai ' ncarumaka mpu ' u - mokoi hi rasi ' to rawai ' - kokoi ane rata nculii ' - ipi mpai ' Yesus Kristus .

text: As obedient children , not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance :
text2: Apa ' lawi ' napo ' ana ' - mokoi Alata ' ala - e , tuku ' - mi hawa ' - na , neo ' - pi ntora mpotuku ' konoa - ni moto hewa owi nto ' u - ni hi rala kabengia - na - pidi .

text: But as he which hath called you is holy , so be ye holy in all manner of conversation ;
text2: Kana moroli ' - koi hi butu nyala akeka - ni , apa ' Alata ' ala , moroli ' - i - hana , pai ' nakio ' - koi bona mpotuku ' kehi - na .

text: Because it is written , Be ye holy ; for I am holy .
text2: Apa ' ria Lolita Alata ' ala to te ' uki ' owi to mpo ' uli ' : " Kana moroli ' - koi , apa ' Aku ' toi moroli ' - a . "

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , mo ' oha ' - koi hi dunia ' toi hewa tauna to liu - wadi . Pai ' ane mosampaya - koi hi Alata ' ala , ni ' uli ' Kahi ' a - na Tuama - ni . Toe pai ' kana mengkoru - koi hi Alata ' ala bula - ni mo ' oha ' hi dunia ' toi - pidi . Apa ' Alata ' ala to Nipotuama toei - e , Hi ' a - mi Topohura to mpobotuhi kara - kara butu dua tauna ntuku ' po ' ingku - ra , uma - i - hana mpelence tauna .

text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things , as silver and gold , from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers ;
text2: Mengkoru - koi hi Alata ' ala , apa ' ni ' inca moto napa pobayari - na Alata ' ala bona mpobahaka - koi ngkai tuwu ' - ni to ri ' ulu . Tuwu ' - ni to ri ' ulu to nipososora ngkai ntu ' a - ni toe , uma ria tuju - na . Aga Alata ' ala mpobahaka - mokoi ngkai tuwu ' - ni to ri ' ulu toe , pai ' pobayari - na bela rewa to uma tida duu ' kahae - hae - na , hewa bulawa ba salaka ' ,

text: But with the precious blood of Christ , as of a lamb without blemish and without spot :
text2: tapi ' to masuli ' lia oli - na , toe - mi raa ' - na Kristus . Kristus toe raponcawa ana ' bima to uma ria kasalaia ' - na ba kakuraa ' - na , to rasumale ' jadi ' tolo ' woto - ni .

text: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world , but was manifest in these last times for you ,
text2: Kako ' ia - na dunia ' rapajadi ' , napakatantu ami ' - mi Alata ' ala Kayesus - na to jadi ' Topetolo ' . Aga lako ' mehupa ' - idi hi dunia ' bona mpotolo ' - koi hi eo - eo mpomohui ' Eo Kiama toi - e .

text: Who by him do believe in God , that raised him up from the dead , and gave him glory ; that your faith and hope might be in God .
text2: Ngkai Hi ' a toe - mi pai ' alaa - na mepangala ' - mokoi hi Alata ' ala . Alata ' ala mpopotuwu ' - i nculii ' pai ' nawai ' - i kabohea tuwu ' - na , alaa - na mepangala ' pai ' mesarumaka - mokoi hi Alata ' ala .

text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren , see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently :
text2: Jadi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , nituku ' - mi Kareba to makono , pai ' nipakaroli ' nono - ni bona ma ' ala - koi mpoka ' ahi ' ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ni hante nono - ni mpu ' u . Toe pai ' kuparesai ' - koi bona momepoka ' ahi ' mpu ' u - mpu ' u - koi hadua pai ' hadua hante karoli ' - roli ' nono - ni .

text: Being born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , by the word of God , which liveth and abideth for ever .
text2: Apa ' mporata katuwua ' to bo ' u - mokoi , pai ' katuwua ' - ni to bo ' u toe , bela - pi ngkai manusia ' to kana mate . Katuwua ' - ni toe , ngkai Alata ' ala to uma - hana ria kamatea - na . Mporata - koi katuwua ' to bo ' u toe , apa ' mepangala ' - mokoi hi Lolita Alata ' ala to tuwu ' pai ' to tida duu ' kahae - hae - na .

text: For all flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man as the flower of grass . The grass withereth , and the flower thereof falleth away :
text2: Hewa to te ' uki ' hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' owi : Katuwu ' manusia ' - le , hewa kowo ' , hawe ' ea kancolaa - ra hewa sehe kowo ' . Kowo ' molaju , sehe - na roda ' ,

text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever . And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you .
text2: aga Lolita Pue ' tida duu ' kahae - hae - na . "

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
text2: Toe pai ' kuparesai ' - koi ompi ' : bahaka - mi butu nyala kehi to dada ' a pai ' hawe ' ea lolita - ni to boa ' . Neo ' - pokoi mebagiu , neo ' mohingi ' , neo ' mporuge ' doo .

text: As newborn babes , desire the sincere milk of the word , that ye may grow thereby :
text2: Hewa ana ' lei to lako ' putu to mpokahina ue tii ' , koi ' wo ' o kana mpokahina pongkoni ' kao ' - ni , tetu - mi Lolita Pue ' . Bona ngkai Lolita Pue ' toe kamoroo - rohoa pai ' kamonoo - notoa katuwua ' kao ' - ni .

text: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious .
text2: Neo ' nibahakai mpokahina Lolita Pue ' toe , lawi ' nirasai - mi kalompe ' nono - na .

text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,
text2: Pue ' Yesus rarapai ' - ki hameha ' watu to tuwu ' . Watu toe ratadi manusia ' , apa ' ra ' uli ' uma ria kalaua - na . Tapi ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala , watu toei masuli ' lia oli - na , pai ' Alata ' ala mpopelihi watu toei jadi ' poko parawatu . Pai ' koi ' wo ' o , ompi ' - ompi ' tumai - mokoi hi Pue ' ,

text: Ye also , as lively stones , are built up a spiritual house , an holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God by Jesus Christ .
text2: bona napajadi ' - koi hewa watu - watu to tuwu ' to rapake ' mpowangu tomi pepuea ' hi Alata ' ala . Napajadi ' wo ' o - koi imam - imam to moroli ' . Apa ' hewa imam mpotonu pepue ' hi Alata ' ala , wae wo ' o koi ' mpotonu nono - ni hi Alata ' ala , niponcawa pepue ' - ni hi Hi ' a . Pai ' pepue ' - ni toe bate mpakagoe ' nono - na , sabana petauntongoi ' - na Yesus Kristus .

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .
text2: Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' , Magau ' Topetolo ' rarapai ' - ki watu to napelihi Alata ' ala , hewa toi moni - na : Hilo ! Kupelihi hameha ' watu to masuli ' oli - na , kuhu ' a hi Bulu ' Sion , kupajadi ' poko parawatu . Hema - hema to mepangala ' hi watu toei , uma - ra mpai ' hala ' nawu ' . "

text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious : but unto them which be disobedient , the stone which the builders disallowed , the same is made the head of the corner ,
text2: Magau ' Topetolo ' toei hewa watu to masuli ' oli - na hi koi ' to mpopangala ' - i . Aga tauna to uma mpopangala ' - i bate mporata silaka , alaa - na madupa ' - mi lolita Buku Tomoroli ' to mpo ' uli ' : Watu toe ratadi topowangu tomi . Ntaa ' we ' i , watu toe lau - idi to jadi ' poko parawatu - e . "

text: And a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offence , even to them which stumble at the word , being disobedient : whereunto also they were appointed .
text2: " Watu toe jadi ' watu katewincia ' - ra , pai ' watu katehopoa ' - ra . "

text: But ye are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , an holy nation , a peculiar people ; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light :
text2: Aga koi ' ompi ' - ompi ' , napelihi - moko - koina Alata ' ala , napajadi ' - koi imam - imam to mpokamu bago mpepue ' hi Magau ' - ta . Napatani ' - koi jadi ' bagia - na pai ' ntodea - na to moroli ' . Nababehi toe bona koi ' mpopalele hi hawe ' ea tauna babehia - na to mobaraka ' , nitutura - raka kanakio ' - ni malai ngkai kabengia - na mesua ' hi rala kabajaa - na to uma mowo kalompe ' - na .

text: Which in time past were not a people , but are now the people of God : which had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
text2: Owi , bela - koi bagia - na , aga wae lau napobagia - mokoi . Owi - koi uma mpo ' incai pe ' ahi ' - na , aga wae lau ni ' inca - mi pe ' ahi ' - na .

text: Dearly beloved , I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims , abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' to kupe ' ahi ' ! Katuwu ' - ta hi rala dunia ' toi , hewa tauna to mesowo ' pai ' hewa tauna to liu - ta - wadi , apa ' mo ' oha ' - ta hi olo ' tauna to uma - ra mepangala ' hi Pue ' . Toe pai ' kuparesai ' - koi : neo ' mpotuku ' kahinaa nono - ni to dada ' a , apa ' kahinaa to dada ' a toe mosisala hante kalompea ' tuwu ' kao ' - ni .

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: Pontu - na ria tauna to uma mpo ' incai Pue ' to mpobalihi - koi , ra ' uli ' dada ' a gau ' - ni . Toe pai ' kana nipelompehi mpu ' u po ' ingku - ni , bona rahilo kalompe ' po ' ingku - ni toe . Ka ' omea - na mpai ' , rapangaku ' - mi kalompe ' po ' ingku - ni , pai ' mpo ' une ' Alata ' ala - ramo hi eo karata - na .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;
text2: Kana mengkoru - ta hi hawe ' ea topoparenta to rapakatantu manusia ' , apa ' toe - mi konoa Pue ' . Mengkoru hi magau ' bohe , apa ' lawi ' hi ' a - mi to hi wongko - na mpu ' u .

text: Or unto governors , as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers , and for the praise of them that do well .
text2: Mengkoru hi gubernur , apa ' lawi ' hi ' a to napopale magau ' mpohuku ' tauna to dada ' a gau ' - ra pai ' mpo ' une ' tauna to lompe ' gau ' - ra .

text: For so is the will of God , that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
text2: Apa ' toe - mi konoa Pue ' , bona ngkai kalompe ' po ' ingku - ta , tauna to uma mpo ' incai Pue ' , uma - rapa daho ' mpobalihi - ta , apa ' monoto - mi ka ' uma - na makono pebalihi - ra toe .

text: As free , and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness , but as the servants of God .
text2: Kakoo - kono - na , kita ' to Kristen , uma - tapa napobatua jeko ' , apa ' Alata ' ala mpobahaka - tamo ngkai kuasa jeko ' . Aga kabela - ta batua toe neo ' - hawo tapo ' ohea mpobabehi to dada ' a . Agina mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala - tamo , apa ' lawi ' batua - na mpu ' u - tamo .

text: Honour all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honour the king .
text2: Saile ' hawe ' ea tauna . Poka ' ahi ' ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ta , pengkorui Alata ' ala , pai ' bila ' magau ' - ta .

text: Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
text2: Batua - batua , pengkorui pai ' bila ' maradika - ni , uma wule ' hi maradika - ni to lompe ' pai ' to mo ' olu kehi - ra . Bangku ' maradika - ni to seke - e ' , bate nipengkorui - ra .

text: For this is thankworthy , if a man for conscience toward God endure grief , suffering wrongfully .
text2: Ane ria - koi to nabalinai ' maradika - ni nau ' uma ria sala ' - ni , pai ' ane ntaha - koi mpokolo kaparia toe apa ' mpokiwoi - koi konoa Alata ' ala , bate nagane ' - koi Alata ' ala .

text: For what glory is it , if , when ye be buffeted for your faults , ye shall take it patiently ? but if , when ye do well , and suffer for it , ye take it patiently , this is acceptable with God .
text2: Ha na ' une ' - koi mpai ' Alata ' ala ane mosabara - koi mpengkatarii kaparia to nirata apa ' masala ' - koie ? Uma - hawo . Tapi ' ane mporata - koi kaparia sabana po ' ingku - ni to lompe ' pai ' mosabara - koi mpokolo kaparia toe , bate nagane ' - koi Alata ' ala .

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :
text2: Apa ' toe - mile pai ' nakio ' - koi Alata ' ala - e : nakio ' - koi bona mo ' ingku lompe ' , nau ' - koi rabalinai ' . Apa ' Kristus wo ' o mporata kaparia sabana koi ' , pai ' nawai ' - koi tonco bona nituku ' laa ' - na .

text: Who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
text2: Uma - i ria mpobabehi jeko ' , uma ria lolita boa ' to howa ' ngkai wiwi - na .

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
text2: Ralibui ' - i , uma - i mehawa mpolibui ' - ra . Rasesa ' - i , uma - i metipo ' . Mpotonu tuwu ' - nai - wadi hi Alata ' ala , Topobotuhi to monoa ' .

text: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree , that we , being dead to sins , should live unto righteousness : by whose stripes ye were healed .
text2: Nakolo huku ' jeko ' - ta hi woto - na moto hi karapatehi - na hi kaju parika ' , bona tebahaka - ta ngkai kuasa jeko ' pai ' tuwu ' ntuku ' konoa Alata ' ala - tamo . Ngkai weho - na toe - mi pai ' alaa - na mo ' uri ' - mokoi .

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: Owi hewa bima to puha - koi . Aga tempo toi nculii ' - mokoi hi Topo ' ewu to mpewili ' kao ' - ni .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;
text2: Wae wo ' o koi ' tobine , mengkoru - koi hi tomane - ni , bona ane ria - ra tomane - ni to uma mepangala ' hi Lolita Alata ' ala , kehi - ni toe - mi mpobalii ' - ra jadi ' mepangala ' . Uma mingki ' ni ' uli ' - raka napa - napa ,

text: While they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear .
text2: apa ' kampohilo - ra kehi - ni to moroli ' pai ' pengkoru - ni , kehi - ni toe - mi mpotudui ' - ra , pai ' - ra mepangala ' - mi - hawo hi Pue ' .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;
text2: Ane doko ' subo ' - koi , neo ' kasuboa ' to hi mali - na - wadi , hewa mporampai wuluwoo ' ba mpakancola woto hante bulawa pai ' pohea to masuli ' oli - na .

text: But let it be the hidden man of the heart , in that which is not corruptible , even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God of great price .
text2: Poko kasuboa ' mpu ' u - le , mehupa ' ngkai rala nono - ta , hewa rapa ' - na tobine to monono pai ' to mo ' olu kehi - na . Toe - hana kasuboa ' to uma ria kabalia ' - na , pai ' to masuli ' lia oli - na hi poncilo Alata ' ala .

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :
text2: Apa ' wae wo ' o - hawo po ' ingku tobine to owi to moroli ' katuwu ' - ra pai ' to ncarumaka Alata ' ala . Tobine toera jadi ' subo ' apa ' mengkoru - ra hi tomane - ra .

text: Even as Sara obeyed Abraham , calling him lord : whose daughters ye are , as long as ye do well , and are not afraid with any amazement .
text2: Hewa rapa ' - na Sara mpotuku ' hawa ' - na Abraham tomane - na , pai ' nahanga ' - i tua . Hiaa ' koi ' ompi ' , ma ' ala ta ' uli ' ana ' Sara - mokoi , ane nituku ' po ' ingku - na to lompe ' pai ' uma - koi me ' eka ' ane ria to mpobalinai ' - koi .

text: Likewise , ye husbands , dwell with them according to knowledge , giving honour unto the wife , as unto the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the grace of life ; that your prayers be not hindered .
text2: Wae wo ' o koi ' tomane , tuwu ' hintuwu ' - koi hante tobine - ni , pai ' penonoi beiwa ohea - ni mpotulungi - ra , apa ' karohoa - ra uma hewa karohoa tomane . Aga nau ' wae , tobine - ni bate hibalia hante koi ' hi poncilo Alata ' ala , apa ' nawai ' wo ' o - ra - rawo katuwua ' to duu ' kahae - hae - na hibalia koi ' . Toe pai ' kana nibila ' - ra hewa to kasipato ' - na . Apa ' ane uma - koi hintuwu ' hante tobine - ni , telawa ' mpai ' posampaya - ni .

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: Ka ' omea - na , tuwu ' hintuwu ' - ta omea , hameha ' hawa ' pai ' hanono lau , momepoka ' ahi ' hewa to ntali ompi ' , lompe ' nono pai ' mpakadingki ' nono hi doo .

text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: Ane ria tauna to mpodaa ' - ta , neo ' tapehawai hante to dada ' a . Ane ralibui ' - ta , neo ' tatimalihi - ra . Agina - pi gau ' to dada ' a toe tapehawai hante mperapi ' - raka gane ' to lompe ' ngkai Alata ' ala . Apa ' Alata ' ala mpokio ' - ta jadi ' topetuku ' - na bona mporata gane ' to lompe ' ngkai Hi ' a .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :
text2: Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : Hema to doko ' goe ' pai ' lompe ' tuwu ' - na kana mpojagai wiwi - na bona neo ' - i mpohowa ' lolita to dada ' a , pai ' neo ' - i mebagiu .

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: Kana nabahakai gau ' to dada ' a pai ' babehi - mi gau ' to lompe ' . Kana nahuduwukui mpali ' kahintuwuaa ' hi doo .

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: Apa ' Pue ' mpewili ' tauna to mpotuku ' konoa - na , pai ' na ' epe pekakae - ra . Aga na ' ewa tauna to dada ' a gau ' - ra . "

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: Ha hema - hana to mpodaa ' - tae ane tida - ta mpobabehi po ' ingku to lompe ' - e ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: Aga ane rapa ' - na mporata kaparia mpu ' u - ta ngkai kehi - ta to monoa ' , marasi ' lau - ta ompi ' ! Jadi ' , ane ria to mpongasai ' - ta , neo ' tapoka ' eka ' - ra pai ' neo ' koro ' .

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: Tonu katuwu ' - ta hi Kristus , pai ' pangaku ' - mi Kahi ' a - na - wadi Pue ' - ta . Kana taporodo ami ' - mi petompoi ' - ta mpotompoi ' tauna to mpekune ' - ta napa pai ' ncarumaka Alata ' ala - ta . Aga tatompoi ' - ra , hante lolita to mo ' olu pai ' hante nono to dingki ' .

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
text2: Pai ' uma ma ' ala kasalaia ' po ' ingku - ta . Po ' ingku - ta kana hewa to masipato ' hi topetuku ' Kristus , bona ane ria tauna to mpobalihi - ta , me ' ea ' huli ' lau - ra - wadi mpai ' .

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: Lompe ' - di ane mporata kaparia - ta sabana ingku - ta to lompe ' , ane toe konoa Alata ' ala hi kita ' . Agina lau - pi toe , ngkai mporata kaparia sabana ingku - ta to dada ' a .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Apa ' Kristus wo ' o mporata kaparia nau ' uma ria sala ' - na . Mate hangkani lau - i - wadi mpokolo jeko ' manusia ' . Hi ' a to uma ria sala ' - na mposampei - ta to masala ' , bona nakeni - ta hi Alata ' ala . Woto - na rapatehi , tapi ' rapotuwu ' nculii ' - imi hante baraka ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' .

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: Hante baraka ' Inoha ' Tomoroli ' toe , hilou - imi mpopalele pedagia - na hi rate - rate to ratarungku ' .

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: Ratarungku ' - ra toe sabana pesapuaka - ra hi Alata ' ala owi nto ' u katuwua ' - na nabi Nuh . Nto ' u toe owi , moloe ahi ' - na Alata ' ala mpopea kabali ' nono manusia ' bula - na Nuh mpobabehi sakaya - na . Aga ka ' omea - na , Alata ' ala mpogero dunia ' hante ue , pai ' walu - ra - wadi tauna to mesua ' hi rala sakaya pai ' mporata kalompea ' .

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: Ue to mpogero dunia ' nto ' u toe , ma ' ala rarapai ' - ki ada peniu ' tempo toi , apa ' ada toe mpokeni kalompea ' hi kita ' wae lau ompi ' . Aga ada toe bela - hawo ada to mpobohoi ' wotoloka ' - ta ngkai to babo ' . Ada toe taponcawa pomperapi ' - ta hi Alata ' ala , taperapi ' bona nabohoi ' nono - ta ngkai jeko ' . Pai ' nabohoi ' mpu ' u - tamo ngkai jeko ' - ta , hante katuwu ' - na nculii ' Yesus Kristus .

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: Katuwu ' - na nculii ' toe , hilou - imi hi suruga , pai ' - i mohura hi mali ka ' ana Alata ' ala . Hawe ' ea mala ' eka pai ' topoparenta pai ' pue ' - pue ' to mobaraka ' ntani ' - na , rapopengkoru hi Hi ' a omea - ramo .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: Jadi ' , apa ' lawi ' Kristus wo ' o mporata kaparia hi rala woto - na nto ' u kamatea - nae , toe pai ' koi ' wo ' o - koiwo kana mpakaroho nono - ni hante pekiri to hibalia hante pekiri - na Kristus : apa ' hema to mporata kaparia hi rala woto - na , mogaa ' - mi posidaia ' - na hante jeko ' .

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: Jadi ' , bula - ni tuwu ' - pidi hi rala dunia ' toi , neo ' - pi nituku ' konoa manusia ' , mpotuku ' konoa Alata ' ala - mokoi .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Apa ' hono ' - mi - hawo kahae - ni mpobabehi hewa to rababehi tauna to uma mpo ' incai Pue ' . Nto ' u toe , uma katonoa tuwu ' - ni , mpotuku ' - koi kahinaa - ni to uma lompe ' , nginu palangu - langu , ntora mosusa ' , ntora bibo - bibo , pai ' mepue ' - koi hi pue ' - pue ' to uma natao rapue ' .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Toe pai ' ema ' - ni to ri ' ulu mpokehele - koi apa ' uma - pi nidohei - ra hewa ri ' ulu mpobabehi gau ' to babo ' hante uma ria huka ' - na . Toe pai ' alaa - na raruge ' - mokoi .

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: Tapi ' rata mpai ' tempo - na , tauna toera kana mpotompoi ' pompekunea ' Alata ' ala hi gau ' - ra to dada ' a toe . Apa ' sadia - imi Alata ' ala mpohurai kara - kara hawe ' ea tauna , lompe ' to tuwu ' - pidi , lompe ' to mate - mi .

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Toe pai ' Kareba Lompe ' rapalele hi tauna to mate - ramo . Patuju - na bona nau ' mate - ra hewa to biasa jadi ' hi manusia ' , mporata moto - ra katuwua ' kao ' to lompe ' ntuku ' konoa Alata ' ala .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' , neo ' rata - mi kahudua dunia ' hante hawe ' ea ihi ' - na . Toe pai ' mo ' inga ' - inga ' - mokoi pai ' pakanoto - mi nono - ni , bona motora - koi mosampaya .

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: Melabi ngkai hawe ' ea - na , momepoka ' ahi ' - mokoi ngkai nono - ni mpu ' u , apa ' ane tapoka ' ahi ' doo - ta , uma tapoinono sala ' - ra to wori ' hi kita ' .

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: Kana jole ' - koi mometorata hi tomi - ni , pai ' neo ' ngkunutia .

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: Alata ' ala mpowai ' butu dua - ta pakulea ' to mosisala . Kana tapake ' pakulea ' - ta toe mpotulungi doo , kana tapobago lompe ' pobago to nakolai ' - taka Alata ' ala ngkai kabula rala - na .

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Hema to mpokeni Lolita Pue ' kana mololita hewa tauna to napowiwi Alata ' ala . Hema to mpotulungi doo , tulungi - ra hante karohoa to ngkai Alata ' ala . Bona hi rala hawe ' ea to jadi ' , Alata ' ala rapomobohe hi rala hanga ' Yesus Kristus . Hi ' a - mi to mobaraka ' pai ' to masipato ' rapomobohe hanga ' - na duu ' kahae - hae - na ! Amin .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Ompi ' - ompi ' to kupe ' ahi ' ! Mporata - koi kaparia to hewa apu karani ' - na tetu - e , bona raponciloi karoho pepangala ' - ni . Aga neo ' nikehelei ba ni ' uli ' mporata - koi kaparia to melabi ngkai to lalau .

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: Pokagoe ' lau - mi - hana , apa ' lawi ' mporata - mokoi bagia hi rala kaparia to narata - mi Kristus . Ngkai toe - mi ompi ' , ane rata - damo tempo - na Kristus mpopehuwu kabohe tuwu ' - na hi hawe ' ea tauna , uma mpai ' mowo kagoe ' - ni .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Marasi ' - dakoi ompi ' ane raruge ' - koi sabana mpotuku ' - koi Kristus , apa ' toe mpobatuai kahompo - na Noto to mobaraka ' hi koi ' , toe - mi Inoha ' to ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Aga neo ' mpu ' u - koi ria haduaa to mporata kaparia apa ' topepatehi - i , ba topanako - i ba to dada ' a ntani ' - na ba to bibo .

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: Aga ane rabalinai ' - koi apa ' to Kristen - koi , neo ' nipoka ' ea ' . Uli ' - mi - hana tarima kasi hi Alata ' ala , apa ' topetuku ' Kristus mpu ' u - koi .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: Neo ' rata - mi tempo - na Alata ' ala mpohurai kara - kara butu dua tauna . To napohurai mperi ' ulu , kita ' to napo ' ana ' . Hiaa ' ane kita ' to ri ' ulu napohurai kara - kara - ta , peliu - liu - nami mpai ' kagaga pehuku ' - na ane mpohurai - i kara - kara - ra tauna to uma dota mpangala ' Kareba Lompe ' to ngkai Alata ' ala .

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: Hi rala Buku Tomoroli ' te ' uki ' hewa toi : Bangku ' tauna to monoa ' kehi - rae ' kana mpotodohaka kaparia ncala ' , pai ' lako ' mporata kalompea ' . Peliu - liu - nami tauna to dada ' a pai ' to uma mengkoru hi Alata ' ala ! "

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' , ane ria - ta to mporata kaparia apa ' lawi ' wae - mi konoa Alata ' ala , tatonu - mi katuwu ' - ta hi Alata ' ala Topejadi ' . Bate napadupa ' janci - na hi kita ' . Pai ' neo ' tabahakai mpobabehi po ' ingku to lompe ' .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: Ria wo ' o pomperapia ' - ku hi koi ' to jadi ' pangkeni hi rala agama . Ku ' uki ' - kokoi tohe ' i apa ' aku ' wo ' o hadua pangkeni agama , pai ' kusabii ' moto - mi kaparia to narata Kristus owi . Pai ' ane rata nculii ' - ipi mpai ' Kristus mpopehuwu kabohe tuwu ' - na hi hawe ' ea tauna , aku ' wo ' o mporata bagia hi rala kabohe tuwu ' - na toe .

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: Kuperapi ' bona nipewili ' lompe ' - ra topepangala ' hi Alata ' ala to jadi ' ewua - ni . Apa ' hira ' toe hewa bima ewua - ni to nahawai ' - kokoi Alata ' ala mpo ' ewu . Pewili ' - ra hante kanangkoa ' nono - ni ntuku ' konoa Alata ' ala , neo ' hewa to baha rapewuku - wadi . Tulungi - ra hante kabula nono - ni , neo ' aga mpenonoi gaji ' - wadi .

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: Neo ' wo ' o - koi mpoparentai - ra to rasarumaka - kokoi toera hewa topoparenta mpoparentai ntodea - na . Agina koi ' jadi ' tonco hi hira ' .

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: Pai ' ane rata - ipi mpai ' Poko Topo ' ewu , nawai ' - koi songko pedagia , to uma ria kabalia ' peringkila ' - na .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Wae wo ' o koi ' to mongura - pidi umuru - ni , mengkoru - koi hi totu ' a . Hawe ' ea - ni himpau mpakadingki ' nono pai ' mometulungi . Apa ' Alata ' ala mpo ' ewa tauna to molangko nono - ra , aga tauna to dingki ' nono - ra napoka ' ahi ' . "

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: Toe - mi ompi ' , pakadingki ' nono - ni , pai ' mengkoru - koi hi Alata ' ala to mobaraka ' , bona napomolangko - koi ane rata - pi tempo - na .

text: Casting all your care upon him ; for he careth for you .
text2: Tonu hawe ' ea kakoroa ' - ni hi Pue ' , apa ' Hi ' a to mpewili ' - koi .

text: Be sober , be vigilant ; because your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
text2: Mojaga pai ' mo ' inga ' - inga ' - koi ! Apa ' Magau ' Anudaa ' to jadi ' bali ' - ni , modao ' - dao ' - i hewa singa to mo ' oa mpali ' to ma ' ala nahungongo ' .

text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith , knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world .
text2: Kana ni ' ewa mpu ' u - i hante pepangala ' - ni to moroho . Apa ' ni ' inca moto ompi ' , hingka ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ni hi humalili ' dunia ' , rarata wo ' o - rawo kaparia hewa to nirata - mi koi ' - e .

text: But the God of all grace , who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus , after that ye have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
text2: Pai ' ane timpaliu - damo kaparia to hangkale ' liu toe - e , Alata ' ala moto mpakahono ' to kura ' hi koi ' : batua - na , narohoi , napomonoa ' pai ' napakatida - koi . Apa ' Hi ' a - mi pehupaa ' hawe ' ea ahi ' . Hi ' a to mpokio ' - koi jadi ' ana ' - na , bona ngkai posidaia ' - ni hante Kristus , mporata - koi bagia hi rala kabohe tuwu ' - na to uma ria kahudua - na .

text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Une ' - imi apa ' mobaraka ' - i duu ' kahae - hae - na . Amin !

text: By Silvanus , a faithful brother unto you , as I suppose , I have written briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand .
text2: Sura - ku to rede ' toi ku ' uki ' hante petulungi - na Silwanus , ompi ' - ta hi rala Pue ' Yesus , ku ' inca katida pepangala ' - na . Patuju - ku we ' i mpo ' uli ' - kokoi hante kanoto - noto - na beiwa kakono - na ahi ' Alata ' ala hi kita ' , pai ' ku ' apui nono - ni bona tida - koi mposarumaka ahi ' - na toe .

text: The church that is at Babylon , elected together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth Marcus my son .
text2: Tabe ngkai ompi ' hampepangalaa ' - ni to hi rehe ' i hi ngata Babilon , to napelihi wo ' o - ramo - rawo Alata ' ala hewa koi ' . Wae wo ' o ana ' - ku Markus , mpakatu wo ' o - i - hawo tabe - na .

text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity . Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Mometabe - koi hadua pai ' hadua hante ahi ' hewa topo ' ompi ' rala Pue ' . Mekakae - a hi Alata ' ala bona nawai ' - koi omea kalompea ' tuwu ' apa ' mosidai ' - mokoi hante Kristus . Hudu rei .
